Yɛɛr ayopõi lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be a ka a sɩ sɛ̃ ka a ba kpɛ̃ɛ kul pɔɔ na waa dɔɔ bie ɛ, tɩ kpi tɩchɛ a pɔɔkʋɔr bar ka a yɛbɛ de kul.
Ka a ayi sʋɔ mɩ de a pɔɔkʋɔr kul baa mɩ dɔɔ bie, tɩchɛ ka wʋ mɩ kpi. A lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ ata tɩ tãn a ayopõi sʋɔ.
Ba jaa na wa kul a pɔɔkʋɔr nyã lʋɔr taa baar a pɔɔkʋɔr nyã mɩ baar kpi.
Bala wa ir yi a kũu pɔ, a nɩbɛ banyã ayopõi an pɔɔ, lɛ wʋn ɩ, an ɩ ba jaa kul wʋn lʋɔr taa?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yaa nyɛ yɩn bɔr, bojũu yaa bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma nɩ a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ.
Nɩbɛ wa ir a kũu pɔ, ba kʋ̃ lɛ kul taa ɛ, tɩ ban kaara fɩka malakasɩ na be a saaju.
Tɩchɛ a kũu pɔ ir fʋ yele, yaa kar a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ yɩ ɩka,
n ɩ naa a Abraham Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Isaakɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn ɛ? Wʋ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn vʋr, waa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn kũu ɛ."
A nɩbɛ na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃ nɛɛr 'maa ba naa nɩ a wʋ wiilfʋ.
A Faraseemɩne na wa wõ ɩka Yesu 'yɛr tʋ̃ɔ a Saduseemɩne, ba mɩ lɔ̃ɔn taa.
Ka a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ na ɩ a nɛɛ wiwile sʋʋr 'yɛrbir bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ bɛɛr a Yesu kaa,
"Wiwile, A Mosesɩ nɛbinsɩ a jaa pɔ, buor lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, " 'Nʋ̃ a fʋ Soro Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a fʋ nyãa wʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ nyɛvʋr wʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ tɩɛr wʋ jaa.'
Nyã lɛ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a nɛdɔ̃ɔ.
A ayi sʋɔ mɩ nɩ nyã, 'Nʋ̃ a fʋ tɔ sʋɔ a fʋ kaar.'
A Mosesɩ nɛɛr a jaa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ wiilfʋ kpãkpãana na a binfʋ nyãna."
A Faraseemɩne na wa 'mataa, Yesu sʋʋr ba naa.
"Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tɩɛr a Nɩ-iraa yele? An bie lɛ wʋ ɩ?" Ka ba 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "David bie lɛ."
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr ba, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ka a nãa David a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ, a wʋ bʋɔl wʋ ɩka, 'N Soro'? Bojũu wʋ 'yɛr naa ɩka,
'A Soro 'yɛr kʋ a n Soro, "Jɩ̃nɛ a n nũsʋ̃ɔ jie, ka n wa de a fʋ dɔ̃dẽme ka ba ɩ a fʋ gbɛɛ dɔɔlfʋ jie." '
Ala ɩ David bʋɔl wʋn wʋ ɩka, 'N Soro,' ŋmɩnɛ wʋn ɩrɛ wa ɩ a wʋ bie?"
An yɩ a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ chiine, nɩrɛ jaa ba lɛ haa nɛɛ 'yɛr 'yɛr ɛ bɩɩ lɛ 'la sʋʋr sʋʋrfʋ jaa go ɛ.
Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʋ a nɩyɔɔ bala nɩ a wʋ poturbo,
"A nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne jɩ̃nɛ na a Mosesɩ dakɔɔ ju.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ maala a lɛ ban wile tɩ na yɩ turo, tɩ yɩ ta maala a lɛ ban maala ɛ, bojũu ba maa turo a lɛ ban wile ɛ.
Ba ma lũn tuor tɩɩr tuo nɩbɛ, tɩ maa sɔɔ de a ba nubir sɩɩr ɛ.
"Yele jaa ban tʋ̃nɔ̃, ba ma bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka nɩbɛ ba nyɛ ba, na ba ma lũ a fɔɔr a ba jur pɔ, tɩ na ba ma su fuusɩ ban ma sɛ bonsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ jaa vɛvɛɛ.
Bala wa lɔ̃ɔ taa dire, a ji'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ jie lɛ ba ma nʋ̃ ɩka ba jɩ̃nɛ, nɩ a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir a jibɛrɛ jiir.
Ala tɩ na ba ma bʋɔrɔ ɩka bama puoro ba a dar pɔ, na ba ma bʋɔrɔ ɩka nɩbɛ ba bʋɔlɔ ba, Wiwiilbe.
"Yɩ ta sɔɔ ka ba bʋɔlɔ yɩ, Wiwiilbe ɛ, nɩkpɛ̃ɛ bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ yɩ tara. Yɩ jaa ɩn yɛɛr.
Yɩ ta bʋɔl nɩrɛ jaa yɩ, sãa a wɛr pɔ ɛ, bojũu yɩ tara na Sãa bʋ̃'yen na be a saaju.
Bɩɩ yɩ ta bʋɔl nɩrɛ jaa wiwile ɛ, bojũu yɩ tara na Wiwile bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ na ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
A 'lɔ na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ ɩ a yɩ kpɛ̃ɛ wʋ ɩ a yɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'mɔɔrɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ire nɩ, Nãaŋmɩn na suun wʋn pĩlem tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na siir wʋ mɩ̃ɛ Nãaŋmɩn na 'mɔɔ wʋn ka wʋ do.
"Tɩchɛ nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ pɔɔn a nɩbɛ var bar a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ. Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ ba kpɩɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ na yɩ pɔɔ var a bala na bʋɔrɔ a kpɛfʋ bar.

"Nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ ma yɔn jitɛbɛ nɩ a man pɔ na yɩ tɩ 'yɛr lɩɛb nɩrɛ tɩɛr, yɩn wa tʋ̃ɔ wʋ ka wʋ kaara a yɩ kaar, yɩ ma lɩɛb wʋ naa ka wʋn di dɔɔyɛ a bũu dagel pɔ a yɩ kaar.
"Nɛbier ben a bala na ɩ jɔ̃n tɩ na ba tɔɔrɔ a jɔ̃n, na ba ma 'yɛr ɩka, 'Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na pɔn a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir a ba ɩ tuo ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na pɔn a sɛlma 'lɔ na be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir a lũ wʋ naa.'
Yɩ ɩn jɔ̃n na yɩ ɩ jɔlɔ. Buor lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ, a sɛlma bɩɩ a Nãaŋmɩn yir 'lɔ na maal a sɛlma ka wʋ ɩ a chɛchɛ?
Yɩ mɩ 'yɛr naa, 'Ala ɩ nɩrɛ pɔn na a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʋ jie, a ba tuo ɛ, tɩchɛ ala ɩ nɩrɛ pɔn na a Nãaŋmɩn kʋfʋ 'lɔ na dɔɔl a jie, a lũ wʋ naa.'
Yɩn jɔ̃n banyã. Buor lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ, a kʋfʋ bɩɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʋ jie na ma vɛ̃ ka wʋ ɩ chɛchɛ?
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na pɔn a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʋ jie, pɔn wʋ naa nɩ bon jaa na dɔɔl a wʋ ju.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na pɔn a Nãaŋmɩn yir, pɔn wʋ naa nɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a be.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na pɔn a saaju, pɔn naa a Nãaŋmɩn nãkɔɔ nɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na jɩ̃nɛ a be.

"Nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ ma ir a bonsɩ pɔ jiir pie pɔ bʋ̃'yen lɔ̃ɔn badʋʋ gba vaar kʋ Nãaŋmɩn, tɩ na yɩ tɔr a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛr ala na tɩrɛ bar na ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ sɔr tufʋ, nɩbaal kaafʋ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ tarfʋ. A anyã lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka yɩ turo tɩ na yɩ taa ire amɩne bara ɛ.
Yɩn jɔ̃tɔɔrbɔ ba nyã. Yɩ ma chuor a jãajubil bar tɩ ma vɔl a nyɔɔma.
"Nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ ma pɛɛn a ŋmanyuraa nɩ a ladiraa a yõo tɩchɛ ka a pʋɔ sɛɛn bɔgar nɩ nyuur.
Yɩn Faraseemɩne na ɩ jɔ̃n. Yɩ ma dɔ̃ɔ pɛɛ a ŋmanyuraa pʋɔ tɩchɛ ka a yõo mɩ pãa pɛɛ a yõo ka a vɩɛlɛ.
"Nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ kaara fɩka yar ban pɩ̃ɛ ka a vɩɛlɛ, tɩchɛ ka a pʋɔ pɔ tara nɩbɛ kɔbɔ nɩ dɛɛr jaa bʋrɔ.
Lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ a yɩn a yõo, yɩ ɩn nɩtor a yɩ taaba sɛ̃, tɩchɛ a yɩ pʋɔm, yɩ tara na nɛɛr ayi nɩ putuyele.
"Nɛbier ben a yɩn nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne na ɩ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme sɛ̃. Yɩ mɛn a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ yar, tɩ na chɔɔr a bala na tor yar,
tɩ na yɩ 'yɛr ɩka, 'Sɩn ta be be a sɩ sãakpãmɩne sɔ̃ɔ, sɩ kʋ̃ naa ta pʋɔ ba kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ɛ.'
A nɩtɔ̃ jũu yɩ din a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ dãasɩɛ ɩka yɩ ɩn a nɩbɛ bala na kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ bibiir.
Yɩ baar baar a lɛ a yɩ sãakpãmɩne na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ.
"Yɩn waa bibiir, ŋmɩnɛ yɩn ɩrɛ wa chɩ̃ɛ a bũu dagel kũu.
A lɛ jũu ɩn tʋ̃n Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ, yɛ̃n dẽme, nɩ a wiwiilbe, ka yɩ kʋ bamɩne yɔɔl a daa ju, yɩn pɔɔn bamɩne na yɩ fɔb ba a yɩ lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir, tɩ na yɩ pãa tulo yʋɔrɔ bʋɔrɔ ba a tẽn a jaa.
Ka a na di yɩ a nɩbɛ bala na ɩ a nɩtor ba bɔ̃ɔ yele jaa yɩn kʋ, piel a Abel jɩ̃ɩ sɔ̃ɔ tɩ tãn a Jekariya bidaba Barakiya ban kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʋ jie nɩ a puorfʋ jie chara pɔ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ na nyɛn gefʋ a yele anyãna jũu.

"Pa yɩn Jerusalɛm nɩbɛ, a yɩn na ma kʋrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na yɩ lɔɔrɔ a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ a yɩ sɛ̃ nɩ kʋsɩbɛ, nyɛ lɛ an ma ɩrɛ ma vɔlaa jɩ̃ ka n ma bʋɔrɔ ɩka n kaal a fʋ bibiir 'mataa fɩka nʋ̃ɔ na ma ũun a wʋ bil, tɩchɛ ka faa bʋɔrɔ ɩka fʋ maal a lɛ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu n bar a fʋ tẽe kʋ fʋ ka wʋ ɩ dakpolo.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩ kʋ̃ lɛ nyɛ ma go ɛ, wa tɩ tãn yɩn na 'yɛr ɩka, 'Nãaŋmɩn wʋ sʋ̃ʋ a 'lɔ wʋn tʋ̃.' "
Yesu na wa yi a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir pɔ na wʋ chiine, a wʋ poturbo turo wile ɩka wʋ nyɛ lɛ ban mɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir ka wʋ kaara.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Mɩ yɩ mɩ nyɛ naa anyãna a jaa? Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, a kʋsɩvɩɛl anyãna ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa kʋ lɛ wa chɛnɛ dɔɔl a wʋ tɔ ju ɛ. Ban wa dãn a jaa lɔb."
Yesu na wa do jɩ̃nɛ a Olive Tɔ̃ɔju, a poturbo wan a wʋ sɛ̃ a ba tɛɛ wa sʋʋr wʋ, "'Yɛr kʋ sɩ a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a anyãna nɩ na ɩ. Bo lɛ na ɩ a jɩ̃nɛ a fʋ waa sɔ̃ɔ nɩ a wɛr baarfʋ daar?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn sʋ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa ta wa bɛl yɩ ɛ.
Bojũu, nɩyɔɔ na de naa maa yuor waan wa 'yɛrɛ, 'Maa lɛ a Nɩ-iraa,' na ban bɛl nɩyɔɔ.
Yɩn wa wõn tam, ka ba 'yɛrɛ a tam 'yɛr, yɩ ta mɩrɛ ɛ. A lɛ na ɩ naa, tɩchɛ a wɛr baarfʋ chɛnɛ na be puor.
Paal dẽdẽme na yin tam, ka a nãmɩne mɩ yɩ tam ka kɔ̃ mɩ lo ka a tẽe jiir amɩne dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
A dɔɔyɛ anyãna, an kaara fɩka a pɔɔ na ma dɔɔrɔ ka a wõnõ wʋ.
"Ban pãa nyɔɔr yɩn chiin na ba tɩ pɔb yɩ na ba kʋ yɩ, ka a paalsɩ a jaa 'laar yɩ, yɩn sɔɔ ma jũu.
Nɩyɔɔ na bar a ba sɔɔfʋ, na ba gar 'yɔ̃ɔ taa na ba 'laar taa.
Jir ŋmarba 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na wan wa 'yɛrɛ bɛlɛ nɩyɔɔ.
Nɩyɔɔ nɩ na tɔr Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ, ba kʋ̃ nʋ̃ taa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ nyã na ara tɩ tãn a baaraa Nãaŋmɩn na faa wʋ naa.
Ban mʋɔl a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã a wɛr wʋ jaa ka a ɩ dãasɩɛ a paalsɩ a jaa pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a wɛr pãa baar.
"Yɩn wa nyɛ naa a yele 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'laar na waara nɩ sɔ̃ɔfʋ ka wʋ be a jichɛchɛ 'lɔ nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Danɩɛl na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr. Vɛ̃ ka a nyã na kara bɔ̃ɔ a par.
Yɩn wa nyɛ a lɛ a nɩbɛ bala na kpɩɛrɛ a Juda, ba jo do a tɔ̃ɔ ju.
Nɩrɛ jaa na be gar ju, wʋ ta suu a die pɔ tɩ de bon jaa ɛ.
'Lɔ mɩ na be a puo pɔ wʋ ta kul a yir tɩ de a wʋ fuu ɛ.
A bɩbir nyãna wa vɩɛ an ɩn tuo kʋ a pɔɔpʋʋr nɩ a bala na tara a bi'yɛnsɩ.
Yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a yɩ jofʋ ta ɩ sɩ̃ɛ ɛ, bɩɩ a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn na maal a wɛr wa tãn a pʋ̃pãanyã, baa di a dɔɔyɛ nyã bʋrɔ ɛ, bɩɩ dɔɔyɛ kʋ̃ lɛ wa jɩ̃ wʋ go ɛ.
Ala ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn ba ŋmaa a ber ala bar ɛ, nɩrɛ kʋ̃ lɛ chɛnɛ go ɛ. Tɩchɛ a bala wʋn chɛl ir jũu wʋn ŋmaan a ber bar.
A lɛ daar nɩrɛ wa 'yɛr yɩ ɩka, 'Nyɛ a Nɩ-iraa,' bɩɩ ''Lɔ nɩ nyã,' yɩ ta sɔɔ de ɛ.
Bojũu jirsɩ Nɩ-irsɩ nɩ jirsɩ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na wa naa wa tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ na ba bɛl nɩbɛ bamɩne ala ɩ ba tʋ̃ɔ naa ban 'mantaa bɛl a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na chɛl ir.
Yɩ nyɛ, n den nie 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ.
"A lɛ jũu, bala wa 'yɛr kʋ yɩ ɩka, 'Nyɛ 'lɔ nɩ nyã a dãlpʋɔ ju,' yɩ ta yi a be ɛ. 'Bala wa 'yɛr nyɛ, 'lɔ nɩ nyã a die pɔ,' yɩ ta sɔɔ ɛ.
A lɛ a saa nyɩɩrfʋ na ma yi a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʋ jie na wʋ chaar 'yɔ̃ɔ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ mʋrfʋ jie, lɛ lɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie waa mɩ na kaara.
Jie 'lɔ jaa bʋ̃kũu na be, be lɛ a sɩdumo ma 'laara.
"Ajienaa, a ber anyãna a dɔɔyɛ baarfʋ puor, 'A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na lii naa, ka a chuu mɩ kʋ̃ lɛ chaar ɛ, ka a ŋmɛrbie pɔrɔ yire a saaju loro, ka a saaju bonsɩ a jaa dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.'
"A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ban nyɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na waara a julõjuur pɔ, ka a paalsɩ a jaa na be ka a wɛr pɔ kõnõ. Ka ba nyɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na yi a saaju a julõjuur pɔ, waara nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ tɩɩr.
Wʋn tʋ̃n a wʋ malakasɩ ka ba pɛɛl a ɩɩl kpɛ̃ɔ jaa na ba bʋɔl a nɩbɛ bala wʋn chɛl ir a wɛr wʋ jaa 'mataa.
"Yɩ de a pɔlpɔl tɩɛr yele jãn yɛ̃. 'Lɔ wa tʋɔrɔ a vaar, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a tʋl sɔɔ gbʋr naa.
A lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ, yɩn wa nyɛ a yelsɩ anyãna, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a maa Nɩsaal Bie waa gbʋr naa jaa yɛ̃yɛ̃.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, a pʋ̃pãanyã nɩbɛ kʋ̃ kpi baar ɛ, wa tɩ tãn a yelsɩ anyãna na ɩ.
A saaju nɩ a wɛr na wa baaraa, tɩchɛ maa 'yɛrbie 'lɔ kʋ̃ wa baar ɛ.
"Nɩrɛ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ a bɩbir nyã ɛ, bɩɩ a sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a malakasɩ mɩ gba na be a saaju ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, bɩɩ a Bie ɛ, ka a Sãa tɛɛ ba lɛ bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
A lɛ an dɔ̃ɔ kaara a Nowa sɔ̃ɔ, lɛ lɛ an mɩ na kaara a maa Nɩsaal Bie waa sɔ̃ɔ.
Bojũu sɛrɛ, tɩchɛ ka a kɔ̃paalaa wa nɩbɛ dire na, tɩ nyuro, ka dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ kulo taa, tɩ tãn a bɩbir 'lɔ a Nowa na kpɛ a daka bulomtum pɔ.
Baa bɔ̃ɔn ɛ, tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a kɔ̃paalaa na wa di ba, lɛ mɩ lɛ an kaara a maa Nɩsaal Bie waa daar.
Nɩbɛ ayi na ben puo pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa de a ɩ̃sʋɔ chiin tɩ bar a ɩ̃sʋɔ.
Pɔbɔ ayi na 'mantaa nɩɛnɛ jɔ̃ ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa de a ɩ̃sʋɔ chiin tɩ bar a ɩ̃sʋɔ.
"A lɛ jũu yɩ kaara sʋ̃, bojũu yaa bɔ̃ɔ a bɩbir 'lɔ a yɩ Soro nɩ na wa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a yele anyã par, a yir sʋɔ ta bɔ̃ɔn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a nãnyie na waara a tɩ̃sɔɔ, wʋ kʋ̃ naa gur ɛ, ka a nãnyie wa kar kpɛ wʋ a yir ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ mɩ guro a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ, bojũu a maa Nɩsaal Bie na wan a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn kʋ̃ bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
"An lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ɩ a yɛ̃ nɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔ ka wʋ kaara wʋ a yir na wʋ kʋrɔ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ a ba bʋ̃diir a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ?
An ɩn bɔɔsʋ̃n kʋ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ nyãna a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa nyɛ ka wʋ ɩrɛ a lɛ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, wʋn vɛ̃n ka wʋ kaara a wʋ bonsɩ a jaa.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ nyãna ɩn putusʋɔ na wʋ tɩɛr a wʋ nyãa pɔ ɩka, a n nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kor naa,
tɩ piel gere a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ bala na be a yir tɩ pãa ma di na wʋ ma pʋɔ a dãnyurbo pɔ,
a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa dũu wʋ naa a bɩbir 'lɔ wʋn ba tɩɛr nɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋn ba bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
Wʋn ŋma wʋn gbʋl gbʋl 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɛɛr ayi dẽme pɔ, be lɛ ban kõnõ tɩ ɔɔrɔ nyɩmɛ.
"A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ na kaara fɩka pɔɔsarsɩ pie na de a ba fɩ̃tɩnɛ ɩka ba tɩ tuor a pɔɔ paalaa nɩ a wʋ sɩrɛ.
Ka a ba anũu ɩ jɔlɔ, tɩchɛ ka a ba anũu mɩ ɩ yɛ̃ dẽme.
A jɔlɔ bala den a ba fɩ̃tɩnɛ tɩchɛ baa de kãa pʋɔ ɛ,
tɩchɛ ka a ba anũu bala mɩ na ɩ a yɛ̃ dẽme, de kãa pʋɔ a ba fɩ̃tɩnɛ pɔ.
A pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ na wa kor a waa jũu, gʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ba naa ka ba gã gur.
"A tɩ̃sɔɔ bɩ̃ɩn lɛ ba ŋme chɛlma tãna 'yɛrɛ, 'A pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ waara, yɩ yi wa tuor wʋ yooo.'
"A pɔɔsarsɩ pie banyãna vaan ir tɩɛ tɩɛ a ba gonsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba fɩ̃tɩnɛ pɔ.
A jɔlɔ bala 'yɛr kʋ a yɛ̃ dẽme, 'Yɩ pʋr a yɩ kãa amɩne kʋ sɩ, a sɩ bonsɩ kpĩine naa.'
"Be lɛ ka a yɛ̃ dẽme bala 'yɛr kʋ ba, 'Kai, a kʋ̃ ta sɩ nɩ a yɩn ɛ. Yɩ chen a be ban daara na yɩ tɩ da.'
"Tɩchɛ, ban lɩɛb chiine a dafʋ jie, a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ wa naa, ka a bala jaa na chɔɔr 'mataa kpɛ a pɔɔ paalaa kulfʋ jie, tɩ na ba nyɔɔ a pãn pɔɔ.
"A jɔlɔ anũu bala mɩ wa bɩɛr wa na ba mɩ wa kpooro a pãn 'yɛr, 'Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, yuo a pãn ka sɩ kpɛ.'
"Tɩchɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, 'Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa, n ba bɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ.'
"A lɛ jũu yɩ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ bojũu yaa bɔ̃ɔ a bɩbir bɩɩ a sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
"A mɩ lɛ nyɛntãan go fɩka daba kɔ̃ɔ na bʋɔrɔ yɔfʋ na wʋ bʋɔl a wʋ gbãgbaar 'mataa de a wʋ bonsɩ põ ba.
Wʋ kʋn ɩ̃sʋɔ sɛlbie anũu, na wʋ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ sɛlbie ayi na wʋ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ sɛlbir bʋ̃'yen. Wʋ ma kʋn ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa man a wʋ fɔ̃ɔ, tɩ na wʋ yɔ.
A 'lɔ na de a sɛlbie anũu tɩ yar nyɛ sɛlbie anũu tʋ̃nɔ̃ dɔɔl.
A 'lɔ mɩ na de a sɛlbie ayi tɩ yar mɩ nyɛ sɛlbie ayi tʋ̃nɔ̃ dɔɔl.
Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na de a sɛlbir bʋ̃'yen tɩ tuun bɔɔ de a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛlbir ũu.
"An wa kor bɩ̃lãa ka a gbãgbaar bala nɩkpɛ̃ɛ wa wa ɩka ba guor a sɛlbie yele.
A 'lɔ na de a sɛlbie anũu waan na sɛlbie anũu wa 'yɛr, 'Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, sɛlbie anũu lɛ fʋ dɔ̃ɔ kʋ ma, nyɛ sɛlbie anũu tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ n nyɛ dɔɔl.'
"Ka a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'Fʋ tʋ̃n vɩla, gbãgbamɩ̃ɛ lɛ fʋ ɩ. Fʋ tara na yelmɩ̃ɛ a bʋ̃bile pɔ, ɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ fʋn ka fʋ kaara bʋ̃yɔɔ. Wa pʋɔ ma ka sɩ 'mataa dire a nʋ̃ɔ.'
"A 'lɔ mɩ wʋn kʋ a sɛlbie ayi wa 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, 'Fʋ dɔ̃ɔ kʋ ma sɛlbie ayi, nyɛ sɛlbie ayi tʋ̃nɔ̃ lɛ n nyɛ dɔɔl.'
"Ka a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'Fʋ tʋ̃n vɩla, gbãgbamɩ̃ɛ lɛ fʋ ɩ. Fʋ tara na yelmɩ̃ɛ a bʋ̃bile pɔ, ɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ fʋn ka fʋ kaara bʋ̃yɔɔ. Wa pʋɔ ma ka sɩ 'mataa dire a nʋ̃ɔ.'
"A 'lɔ mɩ wʋn kʋ a sɛlbir bʋ̃'yen wa 'yɛr naa, 'Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, n bɔ̃ɔn na fʋn ɩ nɩbikõo sʋɔ na fʋ ma ŋma a be fʋn ba bʋr ɛ, na fʋ ma wob a be fʋn maa yaar bar ɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ma ka de a fʋ sɛlbir tɩ ũu bar. Nyɛ a fʋ sɛlbir.'
"Ka a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'Fʋ̃ʋ gbãgbaputuo nɩ koro sʋɔ nyã. Fʋn ben bɔ̃ɔn ɩka n ma ŋman a be ɩn maa bʋr ɛ, naa wob a jie 'lɔ ɩn maa yaar bar ɛ,
a ta sɛɛn ɩka fʋ ta de a n sɛlbir tɩ yɔ̃ɔ a libie yir pɔ, ka maa ta wa lɩɛb wa ka n nyɛ tʋ̃nɔ̃ dɔɔl ɛ?
" 'Yɩ faa a sɛlbir bʋ̃'yen a wʋ sɛ̃ na yɩ kʋ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara a sɛlbie pie.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na tara yɔɔ, ban kʋ wʋn yɔɔ pʋɔ ka ba tara yɔɔ tɩchɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba tara bon jaa ɛ, a bɩ̃lãa 'lɔ wʋn tara gba ban faan yin a wʋ sɛ̃.
A gbãgbaburbur nyã 'lɔ, yɩ de wʋ lɔb bar yõo be lɛ ban kõnõ tɩ ɔɔrɔ nyɩmɛ.'
"A maa Nɩsaal Bie wa wa a n tɩɩr pɔ, nɩ a n malakasɩ ba jaa, ɩn wa jɩ̃nɛ naa, a n tɩɩr nãalʋ̃ʋ dakɔɔ ju.
A paalsɩ a jaa na pãa lɔ̃ɔ taa a n niem, ka n pãa oor a nɩbɛ nɩtãa lɛ pɛchinɛ na ma oor a piir nɩ a bʋʋr.
Ɩn oon a piir bar a n nũsʋ̃ɔ jie, tɩchɛ ka a bʋʋr mɩ ara a n gʋbaa jie.
"Ka n pãa 'yɛr kʋ a bala na be a n nũsʋ̃ɔ jie, 'Yɩ wa, yɩn a n Sãa Nãaŋmɩn na sʋ̃ʋ. Yɩ wa kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ, de a yɩ nãbomo wʋn chɔɔr bin gun yɩ a wɛr pielfʋ sɔ̃ɔ.
Bojũu kɔ̃ dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ ma, ka yɩ kʋ ma ka n di, kɔ̃nyũur dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ ma, ka yɩ kʋ ma kʋ̃ɔ ka n nyũ, n dɔ̃ɔ ɩ sãan ka yɩ ir ma sãan.
N ba dɔ̃ɔ tara bʋ̃sursɩ ɛ, ka yɩ kʋ ma fuu ka n su, n dɔ̃ɔ bɩɛrɛ ka yɩ sãa ma. N dɔ̃ɔ be pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, ka yɩ wa piir ma kaa.'
"A nɩmɩn na pãa lɩɛb sʋʋr wʋ, 'Sɩ Soro, nyɩnɛ lɛ sɩ nyɛ fʋ, ka a kɔ̃ kpɛ fʋ, ka sɩ kʋ fʋ bʋ̃diir a fʋ di, bɩɩ ka kɔ̃nyũur kpɛ fʋ, ka sɩ kʋ fʋ kʋ̃ɔ a fʋ nyũ?
Sɔ̃ɔ buor lɛ sɩ nyɛ fʋ, ka fʋ ɩ sãan ka sɩ ir fʋ a sãan, bɩɩ ka faa tara bʋ̃sursɩ ɛ, ka sɩ kʋ fʋ fuu a fʋ su?
Sɔ̃ɔ buor lɛ sɩ nyɛ fʋ, ka fʋ bɩɛrɛ, ka sɩ tɩ piir fʋ kaa, bɩɩ sɔ̃ɔ buor lɛ ba nyɔɔ fʋ pɔɔ ka sɩ chen tɩ piir fʋ kaa?'
"A nãa na 'yɛr kʋ ba, 'Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, a lɛ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ maal kʋ a nɩba'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ bala na ɩ a n sofʋ, maa lɛ yɩ maal kʋ.'
"Tɩchɛ na wʋ pãa 'yɛr kʋ a bala mɩ na be a wʋ gʋbaa jie, 'Pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ turo yɩ naa, yɩ tɔɔ chen be na yɩ tɩ kpɛ a bũu 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na gbɔɔ gun a tɩɩ nɩ a wʋ malakasɩ.
Bojũu kɔ̃ dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ ma, ka yaa kʋ ma bon jaa ka n di ɛ. Kɔ̃nyũur dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ ma, ka yaa kʋ ma kʋ̃ɔ ka n nyũ ɛ.
N dɔ̃ɔ ɩ sãan, ka yaa kaa ma sãan kaa fʋ ɛ, n ba tara bon jaa na su ɛ, ka yaa kʋ ma fuu ka su ɛ, ka n bɩɛrɛ, bɩɩ be pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, ka yaa wa piir ma kaa ɛ.'

"Ka ba pãa mɩ lɩɛb sʋʋr wʋ, 'Sɩ Soro, sɔ̃ɔ buor lɛ sɩ nyɛ fʋ, ka a kɔ̃ kpɛ fʋ, bɩɩ ka a kɔ̃nyũur kpɛ fʋ, bɩɩ ka fʋ ɩ sãan, bɩɩ ka faa tara bon jaa na su ɛ, bɩɩ ka fʋ bɩɛrɛ, bɩɩ ka fʋ be pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, ka saa kaa fʋ ɛ?'
"Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, 'Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, yɩn ba maal kʋ a nɩba'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ bala ɩ̃sʋɔ ɛ, maa lɛ yaa maal kʋ ɛ.'
"A nɩbɛ banyãna na chen a dɔɔyɛ 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʋ jie, tɩchɛ ka a nɩmɩn mɩ chen a nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ jie."
A Yesu na wa 'yɛr a anyãna a jaa baar, wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo,
"Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a chɛn ber ayi ka a Gõl Bar Difʋ na ta, ka ba na de a maa Nɩsaal Bie tɩr ka ba kpa ma a daa ju."
A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ lɔ̃ɔ taa a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ yir na di Kayafasɩ,
na ba bʋɔrɔ vuo ban na tu nyɔɔ a Yesu na ba kʋ.
Tɩchɛ ka ba 'yɛr, a ta ɩ a Gõl Bar Difʋ sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, ka jɛɛr taa ɩrɛ wa ir a chara pɔ ɛ.
Yesu na wa be a Betanɩ a Simon 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ yir,
ban wa jɛ̃ dire, pɔɔ kɔ̃ɔ waan na pɩ̃rtɔvɩla nɩ kãnyũu kɔ̃ɔ dafʋ na ba wõnõ ɛ, na wʋ kpaar dɔɔl a Yesu ju.
A poturbo na wa nyɛ a lɛ, ba nyɛn suur na ba 'yɛr, "Bo lɛ so ka wʋ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a kãnyũu nyã bar a nɩtɔ̃?
Fʋn taa den a kãnyũu anyãna da libiyɔɔ de kʋ a nɔ̃n dẽme."
Yesu na bɔ̃ɔn a ba tɩɛr, wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ mii 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ? Wʋ maal vɩla kʋ ma.
A nɔ̃n dẽme 'lɔ, yɩn nɩ bala ben ka tɩchɛ maa kʋ be a yɩ sɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ jaa ɛ.
Wʋn kpaar a kãnyũu anyãna 'yɔ̃ɔ ma, wʋ maal a lɛ chɔɔr ma gun a n ũufʋ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, jie jaa ban wa mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna a wɛr wʋ jaa pɔ, ban 'yɛr naa a lɛ a pɔɔ nyã na ɩ na ba chɛnɛ tara a wʋ tɩɛr."
A Pie Nɩ Ayi bala ɩ̃sʋɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Judas Isɩkariyot chen a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃
tɩ sʋʋr ba, "Bo lɛ yɩn kʋ ma ala ɩ n de wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩ nuur pɔ?" Ba sɔr sɛlbie lɩjɛr nɩ pie kʋ wʋ.
An yɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ wʋ bʋɔrɔ na vuo wʋn na tu de a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba nuur pɔ.
A bɩbir dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩ naa a Paanʋ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʋ, ka a Yesu poturbo wa sʋʋr wʋ, "Nyɩnɛ lɛ fʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ chen tɩ chɔɔr a Gõl Bar nyã Difʋ bar ka sɩ tɩ di?"
Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ chen a tẽe pɔ, daba kɔ̃ɔ sɛ̃ na yɩ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'A wiwile 'yɛr naa, a n sɔ̃ɔ gbʋr naa, ka maa nɩ a n poturbo na di a Gõl Bar Difʋ a fʋ yir.' "
A poturbo ɩn a lɛ jaa a Yesu na 'yɛr ɩka ba ɩ. Ka ba maal a Gõl Bar bʋ̃diir.
A jãanʋɔr na wa ta, Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo Pie nɩ Ayi wa jɛ̃n jil a bʋ̃diir na di.
Ban wa dire, wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma."
Be lɛ ka ba jaa pʋʋr sɔ̃ɔ ka ba sʋrɔ wʋ bʋ̃'yen 'yen, "An ɩn maa lɛ ɔ, n Soro?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "A 'lɔ ɩn 'mataa tun ala bʋ̃'yen pɔ lɛ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma.
A maa Nɩsaal Bie na kpi naa nɩtãa lɛ ban sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ. Tɩchɛ nɛbier ben a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a maa Nɩsaal Bie wʋn din dɔɔyɛ gar nɩrɛ jaa. Bala ta ba dɔɔ wʋ ɛ, ala sa."
Judas a 'lɔ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ sʋʋr, "An ɩn maa lɛ ɔ, Wiwile?" Ka a Yesu sɔɔ, "Ɔ̃ɔ, fʋ̃ʋ lɛ."
Ban wa dire, Yesu den a paanʋ̃ɔ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan na wʋ ŋma de kʋ a wʋ poturbo, tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr, "Yɩ de 'wɔb, a maa ɩ̃gãn lɛ."
Wʋ lɛ den a ŋmele 'lɔ ban nyuro nɩ, na wʋ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ lɛ de kʋ ba, "Yɩ jaa yɩ de nyũ.
A anyãna lɛ ɩ a n jɩ̃ɩ na ɩ a nɛtɩraa ɩn tara nɩ yɩ na tara kpɛ̃ɔ. An kpaar na a faa nɩyɔɔ ka yelbier vɛ̃ kʋfʋ be be.
N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, n kʋ̃ lɛ nyũ a dãa anyãna ɛ, wa tɩ tãn a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩn na 'mataa nyũn yɩ a dãpaalaa a n Sãa nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ."
Ban wa yiel a yiel dãn Nãaŋmɩn, ba suun chen a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju.
Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ jaa na jon a tɩ̃sɔɔ nyãna tɩ bar ma a n yõ, a maa jũu. A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, 'Ɩn ŋme naa pɛchinɛ kʋ ka a piir yɛ̃yɛl.'
Tɩchɛ maa wa ir a kũu pɔ, ɩn dɔ̃ɔ yɩn nie chen a Galilee."
Ka a Pita 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Ala ɩ ba jaa sɔɔn bar fʋ a fʋ jũu, maa 'lɔ kʋ̃ bar fʋ ɛ."
Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a Pita, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ fʋ, ɩka a tɩ̃sɔɔ nyãna a nɔrdɔ̃ɔ kʋ̃ kõ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka fʋ chiir ma gbɛɛ ata."
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita 'yɛr kʋ wʋ ɩka, "Ala ɩ maa nɩ fʋ̃ʋ na 'mataa kpi gba, tɩ n kʋ̃ 'yɛr ɩka n ba bɔ̃ɔ fʋ ɛ." Ka a poturbo bala mɩ na chɛ 'yɛr a lɛ nɛ.
Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo chen a jie 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a Getɩsemanɩ, ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ jɩ̃nɛ a kana tɩchɛ ka n chen tɩ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn."
Be lɛ wʋ tara Pita nɩ Jebedee bibiir ayi ka a wʋ pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ jaa ka tɩɛr nyɔɔ wʋ.
Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "N tɩɛr sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩ nyɛtãan kũn, yɩ jɩ̃nɛ a ka na gu ma."
Wʋ chen a niem bɩ̃lãa tɩ lo kpa tẽe sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ, "N Sãa ala ɩ a tara naa ɩfʋ kɔ̃ɔ, vɛ̃ ka a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele nyãna po ma. Tɩchɛ a ta ɩ lɛ maa na bʋɔrɔ ɛ, tɩ a ɩ a lɛ fʋ̃ʋ na bʋɔrɔ."
Wʋ lɩɛb wa a poturbo sɛ̃ wa nyɛ ka ba guro. Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A mɔ̃ yɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ jɛ̃ bɩ̃lãa jaa gu ma ɛ?
Yɩ jɛɔ chɛlɛ, na yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a bɛɛr kaa ta wa nyɔɔ yɩ ɛ. A ba tɩɛr bʋɔrɔ naa tɩchɛ ka a ba ɩ̃gãma ba tʋɔr ɛ."
Wʋ lɛ chen a gbɛɛ ayi sʋɔ tɩ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn. "N Sãa, ala ɩ a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele nyã kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ po ma ɛ, ka maa ba nyũn wʋ ɛ, fʋ̃ʋ bɔfʋ wʋ ɩ."
Wʋ lɛ wan wa nyɛ ka ba chɛnɛ guro, bojũu gʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ba naa.
Be lɛ wʋ lɛ bar ba tɩ chen a gbɛɛ ata sʋɔ tɩ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn a lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju.
Wʋ lɩɛb wa a poturbo sɛ̃ wa sʋʋr ba, "Yɩ chɛnɛ na gã guro na yɩ pɛnɛ wɛ? Nyɛ, a sɔ̃ɔ ta naa ka ban gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a maa Nɩsaal Bie de wʋ kʋ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ.
Yɩ vaa ir ka sɩ chen. Yɩ nyɛ a gagaraa na waara."
A Yesu na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ, ka Judas na ɩ a wʋ poturbo Pie nɩ Ayi ɩ̃sʋɔ, tɩ daasãa nɩ nɩbɛ na yi a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃ waara nɩ sɔbɛrɛ nɩ dakʋrsɩ a wʋ sɛ̃.
A Judas dɔ̃ɔ man ba ɩka, a 'lɔ wʋn tɩ puor tɩ mʋʋr a kɔtɩr 'lɔ lɛ, yɩ nyɔɔ wʋ.
Ban wa tɩ ta, Judas pɔɔn chen tɩ 'yɛr, "Wiwile, n puor fʋ naa," tɩ mʋʋr a Yesu kɔtɩr.
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "N badaba, tʋ̃ a lɛ fʋn bʋɔrɔ ɩka fʋ tʋ̃." Be lɛ ba wa nyɔɔ a Yesu.
Be lɛ ka a Yesu poturbo ɩ̃sʋɔ na ara gbʋr wʋ vʋ̃ɔ a sʋɔ chen a Juu dẽme bɔɔrlo nãa gbãgbaa toor ŋmaa.
Be lɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "De a sʋɔ su a sʋkpa pɔ, bala na jɛɛrɛ nɩ a sʋɔ na kpin a sʋɔ kũu.
Fʋ tɩɛr ɩka n kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ bʋɔl a n Sãa ka wʋ sʋ̃ʋ ma nɩ a malakasɩ gbulo pie nɩ ayi bɩɩ?
Tɩchɛ ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an ɩrɛ wa ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma na 'yɛr ɩka a nɩtɔ̃ lɛ na ɩ?"
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, a Yesu sʋʋr a nɩyɔɔ bala, "A mɔ̃ nɩbier lɛ n ɩ ka yɩ waan sʋʋr nɩ dakʋrsɩ a n nyɔɔ fʋ jie wɛ? Bɩbir jaa lɛ n ma jɩ̃nɛ wile yɩ a puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ, tɩ yaa nyɔɔ ma ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a ɩ naa a lɛ ka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn gãma pɔ ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ." Be lɛ ka a Yesu poturbo ba jaa bar wʋ tɩ jo.
A bala na nyɔɔ a Yesu, chiin wʋ naa a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa Kayafasɩ sɛ̃, ka a nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa wa lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Tɩchɛ ka Pita be a puor jaa turo, na wʋ tɩ kpɛ a bɔɔrlo nãa yir bɛchaar pɔ, tɩ lɔ̃ɔ jɩ̃nɛ nɩ a gugurbo, ɩka wʋ nyɛ lɛ an na baar.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ nɩbɛrɛ pãa bʋɔrɔ jir ŋmarba ka ba na ŋmaa jire 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ, ka ba na tu a be kʋ a Yesu.
Tɩchɛ baa nyɛ yele jaa a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ. Nɩyɔɔ daan yi ŋma jiryɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ, tɩchɛ ka a ba 'yɛrbie ɩ jirsɩ. A baaraa nɩbɛ ayi daan yi
na ba 'yɛr ɩka, "A daba nyãna lɛ 'yɛr ɩka, 'Ɩn tʋ̃ɔ ŋmɛr a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir nyãna bar tɩ de ber ata lɛ mɛn wʋ.' "
A be lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa ir ara tɩ sʋʋr a Yesu, "Faa tara 'yɛr jaa na 'yɛr bɩɩ? Bo dãasɩɛ lɛ a anyã ban dire dɔɔlɔ fʋ?"
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu ɩ jaa gbul. Be lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa 'yɛr, "N sʋrɔ fʋ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a vʋr niem, ɩka fʋ 'yɛr kʋ sɩ, ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie."

Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Ɔ̃ɔ, a lɛ nɛ fʋn 'yɛr lɛ. Tɩchɛ yɩ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ ɩka daar kɔ̃ɔ, yɩn nyɛn a maa Nɩsaal Bie na jɩ̃nɛ a Kpɛ̃ɔ Sʋɔ nũsʋ̃ɔ jie. Yɩ mɩ na lɛ nyɛ ma naa ka n yɩ a julõjuur pɔ waara."
Ka a bɔɔrlo nãa tɔɔ a fuu chɩɛr tɩ 'yɛr, "Wʋ sɔ̃ɔn Nãaŋmɩn yuor. Bo lɛ so sɩn chɛnɛ bʋɔrɔ dãasɩdirbe? Yɩ wõn wʋ tʋ Nãaŋmɩn.
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tɩɛr?" Ka ba 'yɛr, "Wʋ sɛɛn kũu."
Ba chir nataar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ a nie pɔ, tɩ ma gbul nũu ŋmen wʋ, ka bamɩne mɩ ma 'ma wʋ,
tɩ sʋʋr, "Nɩ-iraa, ala ɩ fʋ bɔ̃ɔn yele jaa wiil sɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ŋme fʋ?"
Pita jɩ̃nɛ naa a yõo a bɛchaar pɔ. Ka a gbãgbapɔɔbile ɩ̃sʋɔ wa a wʋ sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr, "Fʋ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ turo a Yesu na yi a Galilee."
Tɩchɛ ka wʋ chiir a ba jaa niem tɩ 'yɛr, "N ba bɔ̃ɔ a 'yɛr 'lɔ par fʋn 'yɛrɛ ɛ."
Wʋn wa tɩ ara a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ, a pɔɔbile ɩ̃sʋɔ nyɛ wʋ naa na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ na ara a be, "A daba nyã mɩ dɔ̃ɔ turo a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ."
Be lɛ a Pita lɛ chiir pɔ tɩ 'yɛr ɩka, "N ba bɔ̃ɔ a daba nyãna ɛ."
A ba kor ɛ, ka a bala na ara gbʋr a Pita mɩ 'yɛr, "Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, fʋ ɩ naa a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ. A fʋ kɔkɔr yin fʋn chãa pɔ."
Be lɛ ka a Pita pɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɩ mɩ pɔrɔ kʋrɔ ba 'yɛrɛ ɩka, "N ba bɔ̃ɔ a daba nyãna ɛ." Ka a nɔraa mɩ tɔ̃ɔ kõ.
Be lɛ ka Pita tɩɛr tɔ a lɛ a Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, "Fʋn chiir ma naa gbɛɛ ata tɩchɛ ka a nɔraa kõ." Ka a Pita ir yi a yõo tɩ kõ nɩbaal kõn.
A wɛr na wa chaar bibio, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa guor lɛ ban na ɩ kʋ a Yesu.
Ba lũ wʋn tara chiin a paal Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate sɛ̃.
Judas na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ na wa nyɛ ɩka ba tɔɔr a Yesu 'yɛr guor a wʋ kʋfʋ, wʋ pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa ka wʋ lɛ lɩɛb a libibie lɩjɛr nɩ pie na wʋ tɩ kʋ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ.
Tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr, "N maal yelbier nɩ ɩn gar 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ na ba maal yelbier jaa ɛ." Tɩchɛ ka ba 'yɛr, "Sɩ baka ba lɛ ɛ? Fʋ 'yɛr a ɩ."
Wʋ den a libie lɔb bar a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir pɔ, tɩ na wʋ yi tɩ yɔɔl miir.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ wob a libie na ba 'yɛr ɩka a ba sɛɛ ɩka sɩ de yaa 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir libie pɔ ɛ, bojũu a ɩn jɩ̃ɩ libie.
Ban wa guor taa baar, ba den a libie dãn a lamɩɛr wɛr a jie ban ma ũno sãanba.
Lɛ lɛ so ka nɩbɛ bʋɔlɔ a jie nyã, "Jɩ̃ɩ Wɛr," wa tãn dɩna.
A ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Jeremiya na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, "Ba den a libibie lɩjɛr nɩ pie a lɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ na sɔɔ de,
na ba dãn a lamɩɛr wɛr nɩtãa lɛ a sɩ Soro na 'yɛr."
Yesu na wa ara a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate niem, wʋ sʋʋr wʋ naa, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa ɔ?" Ka a Yesu 'yɛr "Ɔ̃ɔ, a lɛ nɛ fʋn 'yɛr lɛ."
A bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wʋ yuor, waa 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa ɛ.
Be lɛ a Pilate sʋʋr wʋ, faa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr jaa wɛ? Nyɛ lɛ ban sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʋ yuor jɩ̃?
Tɩchɛ a Yesu ba haa nɛɛ sɔɔ wʋ nɩ a ala a jaa ban 'yɛrɛ dɔɔlɔ wʋ ɛ, ka a 'maa a Pilate nɛɛ.
A lɔ̃ɔ difʋ sɔ̃ɔ wa ta, ba ma 'yɛr ɩka a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate wʋ ir nɩrɛ 'lɔ a nɩbɛ na bʋɔrɔ a pɔɔ fʋ die pɔ bar.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, ba pɔɔn daputuo sʋɔ kɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ jaa na bɔ̃ɔ ka wʋ di Barabasɩ.
A lɛ a nɩyɔɔ na wa lɔ̃ɔ taa, Pilate sʋʋr ba naa, "An lɛ yɩ bʋɔrɔ ɩka n yuo kʋ yɩ, Barabasɩ bɩɩ Yesu, a 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a Nɩ-iraa?"
Bojũu wʋ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a nyuur ban tara nɩ a Yesu lɛ so ban nyɔɔ wʋ waan a wʋ sɛ̃.
A Pilate na wa jɩ̃nɛ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ dakɔɔ ju, a wʋ pɔɔ tʋ̃n 'yɛr wʋ, "Taa ɩrɛ wa ɩrɛ a daba 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na ba maal bon jaa yele jaa ɛ, bojũu jãa, n din dɔɔyɛ jãn pɔ nɩ a wʋ yele."
Tɩchɛ a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩyɔɔ ɩka ba sʋɔr ka wʋ yuo Barabasɩ bar, tɩ kʋ a Yesu.
Ka a Nãa Pilate lɛ bɔ̃ɔ sʋʋr ba go, "A nɩbɛ banyã ayi, buor lɛ yɩ bʋɔrɔ ɩka n yuo kʋ yɩ?" Ka ba 'yɛr, "Barabasɩ."
Ka a Nãa Pilate sʋʋr ba, "Tɩ n ɩ ŋmɩnɛ nɩ a 'lɔ yɩn bʋɔlɔ a Nɩ-iraa?" Ka ba jaa 'yɛr, "Kpa wʋ a daa ju."
Ka wʋ sʋʋr ba, "Bo yelbier lɛ wʋ ɩ? Bo dɛɛr lɛ wʋ maal?" Tɩchɛ ka ba tãna kpɛ̃ɔ jaa 'yɛrɛ, "Kpa wʋ a daa ju."

A Pilate na wa nyɛ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ yele jaa ɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ wɩlɛwɩlɛ jaa tɩ gar, ka wʋ de kʋ̃ɔ pɛɛn a wʋ nuur a nɩyɔɔ niem, tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr, "Maa ba pʋɔ a daba nyã kũu pɔ ɛ. Yɩn sɛ̃ lɛ a be."
Be lɛ ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa 'mataa 'yɛr, "Vɛ̃ ka a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ dɔɔl a sɩn nɩ a sɩ bibiir ju."
Be lɛ wʋ yuo a Barabasɩ kʋ ba. Wʋ vɛ̃ naa ka ba fɔb a Yesu tɩ wʋ de wʋ kʋ a sojasɩ ka ban tɩ kpa a daa ju.
Be lɛ ka a sojasɩ tara a Yesu tɩ kpɛ̃n a nãa yir kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ pɔ, tɩ bʋɔl a ba taaba sojasɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Ba yaar a wʋ bonsɩ bar tɩ de fuu jɩɛ su wʋ,
na ba lɛ de gʋʋr wob nãa jupil kaar su wʋ. Ba den dãgbal 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ a nũsʋ̃ɔ pɔ, na ba gbur dumo a wʋ niem laara wʋ, "Yãan yooo, Juu nɩbɛ nãa!"
Ba ma chɩr nataar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ tɩ de daa ŋmen wʋ a ju pɔ.
Ban wa la wʋ a nɩtɔ̃ wa baar, ba yãan a fuu jie 'lɔ bar tɩ de a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ fuu su wʋ, na ba pãa de wʋ chiin ɩka ba tɩ kpa a daa ju.
Ban wa yi a sɔr pɔ, ba nyɛn daba na yi Sirenɩ ka a wʋ yuor di Simon, ka ba nyɔɔ wʋ fɩr wʋ ka wʋ tuo a Yesu daa.
Ba tɩ tãn jie ban bʋɔlɔ Gɔlgɔta, a par lɛ ɩka, Julaa Jie.
Ba den tɩ̃ɩtuo 'yɔ̃ɔ dãa pɔ ɩka a Yesu wʋ nyũ, tɩ wʋn wa lɛm kaa, wʋ tɔr bar.
Ban wa kpa wʋ a daa ju baar, ba põ naa a wʋ fɔɔr ŋmen gbãm bɔ̃ɔn ala ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa nɩ na di,
tɩ na ba jɩ̃nɛ a jie pire wʋ.
Ba sɛb a yele 'lɔ jũu ban kʋn wʋ mar a daa ju ɩka, NYƐ A YESU, A JUU NƖBƐ NÃA.
Ba mɩ kpan nɩfarba ayi a dabãbɩ̃nsɩ mɩ ju, ka ɩ̃sʋɔ be a Yesu nũsʋ̃ɔ jie ka ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ be a wʋ gubaa jie.
A bala na tala a be tʋrɔ wʋ, na ba vavire jur
'yɛrɛ, "A fʋ̃ʋ na 'yɛr ɩka fʋn ŋmɛr a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir tɩ de ber ata mɛn, faa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ. Ala ɩ fʋ ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, wa suu a daa ju."
Lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ mɩ laara wʋ,
na ba 'yɛrɛ, "Wʋ faan nɩbɛ bamɩne, tɩ wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ faa a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ a Isɩral Nãa, wʋ wa suu a daa ju a pʋ̃pãanyãna, ka sɩ sɔɔ de wʋ.
Wʋ sɔɔn Nãaŋmɩn. Vɛ̃ ka Nãaŋmɩn faa wʋ a pʋ̃pãanyãna, bojũu wʋ 'yɛr naa ɩka wʋ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn Bie."
Lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ a nɩfarba ayi bala mɩ ban kpa gbʋr wʋ, mɩ tʋ wʋ.
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa ara gar ju sãlsɔɔ, a wɛr wʋ jaa sɔb naa tɩ tãn a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ balfʋ sɔ̃ɔ.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a Yesu chɩɩr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa na wʋ 'yɛr, "Ɛloɩ, Ɛloɩ, lama sabakatanɩ." A par lɛ ɩka "N Nãaŋmɩn, n Nãaŋmɩn, bo lɛ so fʋn lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ ma?"
A nɩbɛ bala na ara gbʋr wʋ, na wa wõ a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr, ka ba 'yɛr ɩka, "Elaija lɛ wʋ bʋɔlɔ."
Ajienaa ka a daba ɩ̃sʋɔ jo chen tɩ 'mɔɔ sapɔ 'lɔr a dãmiir amɩne pɔ, na wʋ char daa pɔ, de kʋ a Yesu ɩka wʋ mʋʋr.
Tɩchɛ ka bamɩne 'yɛr, "Yɩ bar a sɩ kaara, Elaija na wa yɔɔ wʋ naa bɩɩ."
Be lɛ a Yesu chɩɩr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa tɩ ŋmaa a vʋʋr.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir pɔ, ban lũ fɔbaa chɩɛr a saaju tɩ gbem a par. Ka a tẽe dãm, ka a kʋsɩbɛ mɩ ŋmɛr ŋmɛr.
A yar mɩ yuo yuor, ka a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ bamɩne na dɔ̃ɔ kpi, jɛɔ.
Ban wa yi a ba yar pɔ a lɛ, ka a Yesu na wa ir a kũu pɔ baar, ka ba pãa kpɛ a tẽchɛchɛ pɔ, ka nɩyɔɔ jaa tɩ nyɛ ba.
A sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a bala wʋn ara nɩ na ba pire a Yesu, nyɛn a wɛr na dãm nɩ a lɛ jaa na ɩ, ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba, ka ba 'yɛr, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ, a daba nyã ɩn a Nãaŋmɩn Bie."
Pɔɔ yɔɔ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ be a be ara tɛɛr jaa kaara, bala lɛ dɔ̃ɔ tu wʋ yin a Galilee na ba sʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ.
A pɔbɔ banyãna pɔ lɛ Mɛɛr na yi Magdala, nɩ Mɛɛr na ɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Josefʋ ma, nɩ a Jebedee bibiir ma.
A jãanʋɔr na wa ta, a taraa sʋɔ kɔ̃ɔ na yɩ Arimatɩya ban bʋɔlɔ Josefʋ, wʋ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Yesu poturo.
Wʋ chen a Pilate sɛ̃ tɩ sʋɔr a Yesu ɩ̃gãn. Ka a Pilate bar sɔr ka ba yɔɔ a Yesu kʋ wʋ.
A Josefʋ yɔɔn a ɩ̃gãn pil fɔpɩla,
kul tɩ ũu a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yaa paalaa pɔ wʋn chɩ a kʋsɩr pɔ. Wʋ bil kʋsɩr wa pɔɔ a yaa nɛɛ tɩ na wʋ kul.
Mɛɛr na yi Magdala nɩ a Mɛɛr ɩ̃sʋɔ ben be jɩ̃nɛ a yaa puor.
A Chɔɔrfʋ Bɩbir ka a wɛr na chaar ka a ɩ a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir lɛ, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Faraseemɩne chen tɩ 'yɛr a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate,
"Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, sɩ lɛ tɩɛr a lɛ a jir ŋmara 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr wʋn dɔ̃ɔ chɛnɛ, 'Ɩka ber ata daar ɩn lɛ lɩɛb ir ɩ vʋr.'

A lɛ jũu vɛ̃ ka ba gu a yaa tɩ tãn a ber ata daar, ka ala ba ɩ lɛ ɛ, a wʋ poturbo na chen tɩ ju a ɩ̃gãn a yaa pɔ, tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ ɩka, 'lɔ lɛ ir a kũu pɔ, ka a bɛlfʋ taa ɩ dɛɛr gar a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɛ."
Ka a Pilate 'yɛr, "Yɩ de gugurbo ka ba tɩ gu a yaa a lɛ yɩn bɔ̃ɔ."
Be lɛ ba tara a gugurbo chiin ka ba tɩ bɛ a yaa bɔɔ pɔɔ, tɩ na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a kʋsɩr jɩ̃nɛ, tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ ka a gugurbo ara gu.
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir na wa baar, ka a na ɩ a Pɛ̃nfʋ divɩɛ bio daar a wɛr na wa chaara wa la la la, Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala nɩ a Mɛɛr ɩ̃sʋɔ yin chen ɩka ba tɩ kaa a yaa.
Be lɛ ka a tẽe dãm kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, ka a ɩ Nãaŋmɩn malaka lɛ yi a saaju suu wa bil a kʋsɩr bar a yaa nɛɛ tɩ do jɩ̃nɛ.
A wʋ nie nyɩlɛ saa nyɩɩrfʋ kaar, ka a wʋ bʋ̃sursɩ pɛl jaa pɩlpɩl.
Dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ̃n a bala na ara kaara, ka ba gĩem ara kũn kaar.
A malaka 'yɛr kʋ a pɔbɔ, "Yɩ ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, n bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Yesu 'lɔ ban kpa a daa ju lɛ yɩ bʋɔrɔ.
Waa be ka ɛ. Wʋ ir naa ɩ vʋr nɩtãa a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr. Yɩ wa muul kaa a jie wʋn gã.
Yɩ chen fɔɔ jaa na yɩ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo, 'Wʋ lɩɛb ir a kũu pɔ, na wʋ de yɩ nie chiine a Galilee. Be lɛ yɩn tɩ nyɛ wʋ.' N pãa 'yɛr kʋ yɩ."
A pɔbɔ banyãna yin a yaa par nɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ jo fɔɔ jaa nɩ pʋpɛl chen ɩka ba tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo.
Be lɛ ka ajienaa, ka a ɩ Yesu lɛ tuor puor ba, ka ba lo kpa a wʋ niem nyɔɔ a wʋ gbɛɛ puor wʋ.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, yɩ ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, "Yɩ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a n yɛɛr ɩka ba chen a Galilee, be lɛ ban tɩ nyɛ ma."
A pɔbɔ na wa chiine, a sojasɩ bamɩne na dɔ̃ɔ guro a yaa kpɛ̃n a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ pɔ, tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ a lɛ jaa na ɩ.
A bɔɔrlo nãa nɩ a wʋ nɩbɛrɛ na wa lɔ̃ɔ taa, ba guor taa de libiyɔɔ kʋ a sojasɩ
tɩ na ba 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ 'yɛr ɩka, 'A wʋ poturbo lɛ wa ju a wʋ ɩ̃gãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn chɛnɛ gã guro.'
Ala ɩ a 'yɛr nyã wa lon a Nãa Pilate toor pɔ, sɩn maal wʋ naa ka a wʋ pʋɔ pɛl a sɩ ir yɩ yin wõm pɔ."
A sojasɩ den a libie tɩ na ba ɩ a lɛ ban 'yɛr ɩka ba ɩ. A Juu nɩbɛ ma chɛnɛ na 'yɛr a yele nyãna a dɩna.
A poturbo pie nɩ bʋ̃'yen chen a Galilee a tɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ju a Yesu na wiil ba ɩka ba do.
Ban wa nyɛ wʋ, ba gbur dumo na ba puor wʋ tɩchɛ ka bamɩne chɛnɛ baala.
Ka a Yesu wa 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A n Sãa den a kpɩ̃ɛn ala a jaa na be a saaju, nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn ala a jaa na be a wɛr pɔ kʋ ma.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ yɔ a wɛr wʋ jaa na yɩ tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ paalsɩ ka ba wa turo ma, na yɩ suoro ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, a Sãa yuor, nɩ a Bie yuor, nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yuor 'yɔ̃ɔ,
tɩ na yɩ wile ba ka ba sɔɔ de, tɩ turo bon jaa ɩn 'yɛr kʋ yɩ. Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka ɩn ma ben a yɩ sɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ jaa, tɩ tãn a wɛr baarfʋ daar."
Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ pielfʋ.
'Yɛ'yɛrɛ kɔ̃ɔ yuor na di Isaiya sɛb naa, "Nyɛ, ɩn tʋ̃ naa a n tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ ka wʋ de nie tɩ chɔɔr a sɔr kʋ fʋ."
"Kɔkɔr tãna naa a dãlpʋɔ ju, 'Chɔɔr a sɔr kʋ a sɩ Soro na fʋ maal a wʋ sɔr ka wʋ tor.' "
Lɛ lɛ a Jɔɔn wa, na wʋ wa suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ be a dãlpʋɔ ju, na wʋ mʋɔl 'yɛr, "Yɩ lɩɛb yi a yɩ tɩɛr dɛɛr pɔ so a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, ka wʋ vɛ̃ a yelbebe kʋ yɩ."
Ka a nɩbɛ yire a tẽn ala a jaa na be a Judiya wɛr pɔ, ka a bamɩne mɩ yire a Jerusalɛm. Ba chire naa a ba pʋʋr 'yɛrɛ a ba yelbebe kʋrɔ wʋ tɩchɛ ka wʋ suoro ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ a Jordan man pɔ.
Nyɔɔma kɔɔlʋ fuu lɛ Jɔɔn ma su tɩ de gãn lũn a sɩɛ. Soor nɩ sɩkãa lɛ ɩ a wʋ bʋ̃diir.
Wʋ 'yɛr naa, "N puor sʋɔ ben be, na wʋ gar ma. A wʋ nafɔɔr mibe gba n ba sɛɛ ɩka n guun for ɛ.
Maa suoro yɩ naa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ tɩchɛ 'lɔ na so yɩ naa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ."
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ Yesu yi naa Najaretɩ na be a Galilee wɛr pɔ wa, ka a Jɔɔn so wʋ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ a Jordan man pɔ.
A Yesu na wa yire a kʋ̃ɔ pɔ, wʋ nyɛ naa a saaju na tɔɔ yuo ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa suro fɩka papa wa kpɛ a Yesu pɔ.
Tɩ a kɔkɔr yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ 'yɛrɛ, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a n binʋ̃nãa, ka a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ma 'maa nɩ fʋ."
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ de wʋ fɔɔ jaa chiin a dãlpʋɔ ju,
ka wʋ tɩ be be ber lɩjaayi ka a Satan bɛɛr wʋ kaa. 'Lɔ nɩ a mɔdʋ̃n lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, ka a malakasɩ wa sʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ.
Jɔɔn ban wa nyɔɔ pɔɔ baar, Yesu chen naa a Galilee na wʋ tɩ mʋɔlɔ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ.
Wʋ 'yɛr naa, "A sɔ̃ɔ ta naa ka a Nãaŋmɩn di a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ. Yɩ lɩɛb yi a tɩɛr dɛɛr pɔ na yɩ sɔɔ de a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ."
A lɛ a Yesu na wa de a Galilee man lana, wʋ nyɛ naa Simon nɩ a wʋ yɛbile Andiru ka ba lɔɔrɔ lɔyaar, jɩ̃nyɔɔrbɔ lɛ ba ɩ,
ka wʋ bʋɔl ba, "Yɩ wa turo ma, ka n lɩɛb yɩ ka yɩ nyɔɔrɔ nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ."
Ka ba tɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ a jɩ̃mɛ nyɔɔrfʋ bar tɩ turo wʋ.
Wʋn wa chen a niem bɩ̃lãa, wʋ nyɛ naa Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn, Jebedee bibiir, a ba be a gboro pɔ chɔɔrɔ a lɔyaarsɩ.
Wʋn wa nyɛ ba, wʋ bʋɔl ba naa, ka ba bar a ba sãa nɩ a gboro nɩ a bala ban yara tɩ turo a Yesu.
Be lɛ ba wa chen a Kapenahum ka a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir wa ta, ka a Yesu chen tɩ kpɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie tɩ piel wile.
A nɩbɛ nɛɛr 'maa naa nɩ a wʋ wiilfʋ, bojũu wʋ wile ba naa nɩ Nãaŋmɩn sɔr. Waa ɩ fɩka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe ɛ.
A sɩdɛɛr sʋɔ kɔ̃ɔ mɩ chen tɩ kpɛ a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie tãna 'yɛrɛ nɩ,
"Bãa lɛ a fʋ̃ʋ Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ bʋɔrɔ a sɩ sɛ̃? Fʋ wa naa ɩka fʋ wa sɔ̃ɔ sɩ bar bɩɩ? N bɔ̃ɔ naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ fʋn ɩ, fʋ ɩ naa a chɛchɛ 'lɔ na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃!"
Ka a Yesu tãn wʋ, "Pɔɔ a fʋ nɛɛ tɩ wa yi a daba pɔ!"
Ka a sɩdɛɛr daa a daba lɔb tẽe nɩtãa kpũgul loro tɩ ŋme chɛlma tɩ wa yi a daba pɔ.
Ka a nɛɛr 'maa a nɩbɛ ka ba lɩɛb sʋrɔ taa, "Bo lɛ? Wiil paal bo mɩ nɩ nyã, na tara kpɛ̃ɔ lɛ! Wʋ ma 'yɛr 'yɛr, ka a sɩdɛbɛ ma tu a wʋ nɛɛ."
Ka a wʋ yele yaar a Galilee wɛr wʋ jaa.
Ban wa yi a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie, 'lɔ nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn chen naa a Simon nɩ Andiru yir,
ka a ɩ̃gãn tɔ a Simon dɩ̃ɛ pɔɔ ka ba 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu.
Yesu kpɛ naa a wʋ sɛ̃ tɩ nyɔɔ a wʋ nũu sʋ̃ʋ wʋ ka wʋ ir. A ɩ̃gãn tʋl baar wʋ, ka wʋ ir maal bʋ̃diir kʋ ba.
A jãanʋɔr 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa mʋr, a nɩbɛ waan na baalsɩ nɩ a bala a sɩdɛbɛ na tara a Yesu sɛ̃.
Ka a tẽe nɩbɛ ba jaa wa lɔ̃ɔ a dɔ̃dɔ̃rʋ,
ka a Yesu sãa nɩyɔɔ na tara baal jaa bʋrɔ. Wʋ mɩ dii naa a sɩdɛbɛ yɔɔ ka a yi, tɩ maa sɔɔ ka a sɩdɛbɛ 'yɛr 'yɛr ɛ, bojũu ba bɔ̃ɔ naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ wʋn ɩ.
A wɛr na chaara a bibio pipi tɩ chɛnɛ sɔb, Yesu ir na wʋ yi a yir na wʋ chen a jie ɩ̃sʋɔ ɩka wʋ tɩ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn.
Simon nɩ a wʋ taaba mɩ yin bʋɔrɔ wʋ na ba wa nyɛ wʋ,
na ba 'yɛr, "Nɩbɛ ba jaa yʋɔrɔ na bʋɔrɔ fʋ!"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Yɩ ɩ ka sɩ chen jiyuo, a tẽn anyã na gbʋr, ka n tɩ mʋɔl 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a be, ala 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ n wa."
Wʋ yɔ naa a Galilee wɛr wʋ jaa na wʋ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ yie pɔ tɩ na wʋ dire a sɩdɛbɛ mɩ ka a yire.
Ka a daba ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ na ɩ kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ wa gbur dumo sʋɔr wʋ, "Fʋ̃ʋ sɔɔ, sãa ma."
Ka nɩbaal kpɛ a Yesu ka wʋ tur a wʋ nũu sɩɩr a daba tɩ 'yɛr, "N sɔɔ naa. Sa!"
Ajienaa ka a kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ sa.
Yesu kpãa wʋ naa kpãkpãan wʋ ɩka,
"Taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ nɩrɛ ɛ. Chen tɩ wiil a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro tɩ ir a nɛɛ 'lɔ a Mosesɩ na 'yɛr ka a ɩ dãasɩɛ."
Tɩchɛ a daba na wa yi wʋ piel naa na wʋ ŋme a Yesu yele yaar, ka a lɛ jũu Yesu ba lɛ tʋ̃ɔ yʋɔrɔ chãa pɔ a tẽe pɔ ɛ. Wʋ ma be naa a tẽe kõkoor, a nɩbɛ chɛnɛ yire jiir jaa waara a wʋ sɛ̃.
A anyã puor, Yesu lɩɛb wa a Kapenahum, ka nɩbɛ wõ ka wʋ be naa a yir.
Nɩyɔɔ wan wa duo na ba sɛɛ a die wa tɩ yin a yõo. Ka wa 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋrɔ ba.
Be lɛ ka daba ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ bɩɛrɛ, a wʋ nuur nɩ a wʋ gbɛɛ kpi naa, ka nɩbɛ anaar jɛ̃jɛl wʋ na ba waan a Yesu sɛ̃.

Ka ba wa ta, ka jie ba be be a ba na tu kpɛ̃n a be a Yesu na be ɛ, a nɩyɔɔ jũu. Be lɛ ba do a gar ju na ba tɩ ŋmaa puo a jie 'lɔ a Yesu na ara, tɩ na ba de a daba nɩ a fɔbaa 'lɔ ban 'mɔɔn wʋ waan tur bar ka wʋ suu tɩ gã a Yesu niem.
Be lɛ a Yesu na wa nyɛ a lɛ ban sɔɔ de wʋ, wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a dabaala, "N bie, n vɛ̃ naa fʋ yelbebe bar."
Ka be lɛ ka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe bamɩne na be be tɩɛrɛ,
"Ka nyɛ daba na ara fere na wʋ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn yuor tɛɛ. An lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ nɩrɛ yelbebe vɛ̃ bar, ka Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ?"
Ajienaa Yesu bɔ̃ɔn naa a lɛ ban tɩɛrɛ a ba pʋʋr pɔ, ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Bãa lɛ yɩ tɩɛrɛ a lɛ a yɩ pʋʋr pɔ?
Buor sʋɔ lɛ ɩ kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃, n 'yɛr ɩka n vɛ̃ naa wʋ yelbebe bar, bɩɩ, n 'yɛr ɩka a daba nyã wʋ ir, 'mɔɔ a wʋ bʋ̃gãnaa, na wʋ kulo nɩ?
N bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a Nɩsaal Bie tara naa kpɛ̃ɔ a wɛr pɔ na vɛ̃ nɩrɛ yelbebe kʋ wʋ." Be lɛ wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a daba 'lɔ nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ na kpi,
"Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ, ir, na fʋ 'mɔɔ a bʋ̃gãnaa, na fʋ kulo nɩ."
Be lɛ, ka wʋ vaa ir 'mɔɔ a bʋ̃gãnaa yin a nɩbɛ ba jaa niem. Nɛɛr 'maa ba naa ka ba dãna Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ, "Saa dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ a lɛ ɛ."
Yesu lɩɛb chen a man nɛɛ ka nɩyɔɔ wa a wʋ sɛ̃ ka wʋ wile ba.
A Yesu na wa chiine wʋ nyɛ naa a Alfayasɩ bie, Levi, ka wʋ jɩ̃nɛ a lõpo defʋ jie, ka Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Ir turo ma," ka wʋ ir turo wʋ.
A lõpodierbe nɩ a yelbetʋ̃nbɔ yɔɔ turo naa a Yesu, ka 'lɔ nɩ a bamɩne nɩ a wʋ poturbo 'mataa dire a Levi yir.

A Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe na ɩ a Faraseemɩne nyɛ a lɛ wʋn jɩ̃nɛ nɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a yelbetʋ̃nbɔ 'mataa dire, ka ba sʋʋr a wʋ poturbo, "Bãa lɛ so a daba nyã na 'mataa dire nɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a yelbetʋ̃nbɔ?"

Yesu wõ naa a lɛ ban 'yɛr, ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nɩrɛ na kpɛ̃mɛ waa chiine tɩtɩlɛ jie ɛ. Baalaa lɛ ma chen. N ba wa ɩka n wa bʋɔl a nɩtorsɩ ɛ. N wa naa ɩka n wa bʋɔl a yelbebe tʋ̃nbɔ ka ba wa lɩɛb a tɩɛr."
Jɔɔn poturbo nɩ a Faraseemɩne nɩbɛ gal kɔ̃, ka nɩbɛ wa sʋʋr a Yesu, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a Jɔɔn poturbo nɩ a Farasee poturbo ma gal kɔ̃, tɩchɛ ka a fʋ̃ʋ poturbo maa gal kɔ̃ ɛ?"
A Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an ɩ ka nɩbɛ be a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ jie tɩ tʋ̃ɔ kɔ̃ gal? Wʋn chɛnɛ be a ba sɛ̃, ba kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɛ.
A daar 'lɔ ban wa de a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ, ban gal a kɔ̃.
"Nɩrɛ maa ŋmaa fɔpaalaa sɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ fɔkoraa pɔ ɛ. 'Lɔ be sɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a lɛ, a fɔpaalaa na tɔɔ naa a fɔkoraa chɩɛr.
Nɩrɛ maa de dãbɩ̃ɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ wɔkoraa pɔ ɛ. 'Lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a wʋɔ na pur naa, ka a dãa nɩ a wʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ. Wʋ ma 'yɔ̃ɔ naa dãbɩ̃ɩn wɔpaalaa pɔ."
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar, Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo kpɛ̃n tala puo sãlsɔɔ, ka a wʋ poturbo piel fɔrɔ a bʋ̃bie.
Ka a Faraseemɩne 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu, "Nyɛ lɛ a fʋ poturbo na ɩrɛ. Bo lɛ so ka ba tʋ̃nɔ̃ a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir? A ba tara sɔr ɛ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a par a lɛ yɩn kar kaa a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ a nãa David nɩ a wʋ nɩbɛ na ba dɔ̃ɔ tara bon na di ɛ!

A ber ala pɔ Abiyata lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, kɔ̃ dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ ba, ka wʋ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn yir, ka a Abiyata de a paanʋ̃ɔ ala ban bin kʋ Nãaŋmɩn kʋ wʋ, ka wʋ 'wɔb. A paanʋ̃ɔ ala a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo tɛɛ lɛ ma 'wɔb, a ba tara sɔr ɩka nɩyuo wʋ 'wɔb ɛ, tɩchɛ ka David 'wɔb tɩ de kʋ a bala na be a wʋ sɛ̃, ka ba mɩ 'wɔb."
Be lɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir ben be a nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a ba ɩ a nɩbɛ ben be a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka a Nɩsaal Bie ɩ a Soro lɔ̃ɔn a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir gba."
Sɔ̃ɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ go Yesu chen tɩ kpɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie, ka a daba kɔ̃ɔ mɩ be be ka a wʋ nũpɛl kpi.
Ka a nɩbɛ bamɩne na be be bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba gar a Yesu, be lɛ ba tɔɔ gbʋr kaara wʋ. Ka wʋn sãa naa a daba nũu baal a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir bɩɩ.
Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a daba nũpɛl na kpi, "Ir ara a sɩ jaa nyɛ fʋ."
Be lɛ ka a Yesu sʋʋr ba, "Tʋ̃buor sʋɔ lɛ tara sɔr a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir daar ɩka fʋ tʋ̃, a fʋ maal vɩla bɩɩ dɛɛr, fʋ faa nyɛvʋr bɩɩ fʋ kʋ wʋ?" Ka ba ɩ jaa gbulo gbulo.
Wʋ kaa naa ba jaa gʋɔr nɩ suur, ka a wʋ pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ a ba bachɛlfʋ jũu. Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a daba 'lɔ nũpɛl na kpi, "Tur a fʋ nũu." Wʋ tur naa ka a nũpɛl wʋ jaa sa.
Be lɛ ka a Faraseemɩne yi chen a Hɛrɔd nɩbɛ sɛ̃, a ba tɩ 'mataa guoro a Yesu, bʋɔrɔ sɔr 'lɔ ban na tu kʋ wʋ.
Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo yin chen a man pɔ ka a nɩyɔɔ na yi Galilee wɛr tu ba.
Nɩyɔyɔɔ mɩ yi naa Judiya wɛr, Jerusalɛm, Idumea wɛr nɩ a Jordan man gɔ̃ɔn, nɩ a tẽn na be Tire nɩ Sidon wɛr pɔ, wa a wʋ sɛ̃ bojũu ba wõ naa a lɛ jaa wʋn tʋ̃.
A nɩyɔɔ jũu, Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo, "Yɩ kaa nyɛ gboro kʋ ma ka n sɛr bɩ̃lãa." Wʋ 'yɛr naa a lɛ bojũu waa bʋɔrɔ ɩka a nɩbɛ ba mɩl pɔɔ wʋ ɛ.
A nɩbɛ yɔɔ wʋn sãa lɛ so, a baalsɩ dara taa bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba sɩɩr wʋ.
A sɩdɛbɛ na ma wa nyɛ a Yesu ba ma da naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ban be lɔb tẽe tɩ tãna 'yɛrɛ nɩ, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie!"
Tɩchɛ wʋ kpaal ban jũu, ka ba taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ wʋn ɩ ɛ.
Yesu do naa a tɔ̃ɔ ju tɩ bʋɔl a bala wʋn bʋɔrɔ ka ba do wa a wʋ sɛ̃.
A ba pɔ lɛ wʋ kaa ir pie nɩ ayi, bʋɔlɔ ba nɩtʋ̃nsɩ, ka ba na be a wʋ sɛ̃, ka wʋ ma tʋ̃ ba ka ba chen tɩ mʋɔl 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr,
tɩ tara kpɛ̃ɔ dire nɩ sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire.
A nɩbɛ pie nɩ ayi bala wʋn ir yoe lɛ a anyã. Simon, wʋn lɛ kʋ wʋ yopaalaa Pita.
Jemesɩ, nɩ a wʋ yɛbile Jɔɔn, a ba sãa yuor lɛ Jebedee, wʋ bʋɔlɔ ba naa Bɔɔnɛgasɩ, a par lɛ sa tãna bibiir.
Andiru, Filip, Batolomi, Matiu, Tomasɩ, Jemesɩ na ɩ Alfayasɩ bidaba, Tadius, Simon na mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a wʋ wɛr yele,
nɩ a Judas Isɩkariyot, 'lɔ lɛ na wa de a Yesu tɩr.
A Yesu na lɩɛb wa a yir, nɩyɔɔ wa naa wa lɔ̃ɔ go, ka 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ poturbo ba tara jaa gba na di ɛ.
Be lɛ a wʋ yir dẽme na wa wõ a lɛ, ba chen naa ɩka ba tɩ ka wʋ, bojũu ba 'yɛr naa ɩka, "Burbur kpɛ wʋ naa."
Ka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛr wiwiilbe bamɩne na yi a Jerusalɛm mɩ 'yɛrɛ, "A Beeljebul, lɛ pɔb wʋ! A sɩdɛbɛ nãa lɛ wʋ ma de dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire."
Yesu bʋɔl naa a nɩbɛ na wʋ lɔb sʋkpar kʋ ba, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a Satan na ɩ lɛ dii a Satan?
Ala ɩ nãa ir jɛɛrɛ nɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nãalʋ̃ʋ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʋn ɩ ara?
Yir nɩbɛ mɩ ir jɛɛrɛ taa, a yir 'lɔ nɩbɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'mataa kpɛ ɛ.
Ala ɩ a Satan ir naa na wʋ jɛɛrɛ nɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, wʋ mɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ara ɛ, a wʋ baaraa lɛ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ gãdaa yir tɩ ju a wʋ bonsɩ ka waa de nie lũ wʋ ɛ. 'Lɔ wa lũ wʋ a lɛ wa baar, wʋn pãa tʋ̃ɔ naa a wʋ yir bonsɩ ju.
Sɩrɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, yeldɛbɛ nɩ ferfʋ a jaa nɩbɛ na fere sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn yuor ban nyɛn vɛ̃ kʋfʋ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na fere nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋ̃ nyɛ vɛ̃ kʋfʋ ɛ, bojũu wʋ lo naa a yeldɛɛr 'lɔ pɔ, na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ."
Ban 'yɛr ɩka wʋ tara naa a sɩdɛɛr lɛ so ka wʋ 'yɛr a lɛ.
Be lɛ ka a Yesu ma nɩ a wʋ yɛɛr wa. Ba ara naa a yõo tɩ tʋ̃ nɩrɛ ka wʋ bʋɔl wʋ.
Nɩyɔɔ jɩ̃nɛ naa jilʋ̃ a Yesu tɩ ba 'yɛr wʋ, "A fʋ ma nɩ a fʋ yɛɛr be naa a yõo bʋɔrɔ fʋ."
Ka wʋ sʋʋr ba, "An lɛ ɩ a n ma nɩ a n yɛɛr?"
Be lɛ wʋ kaa a bala na jɩ̃nɛ jilʋ̃ wʋ tɩ 'yɛr, "Banyã lɛ ɩ a n ma nɩ a n yɛɛr!
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na turo a Nãaŋmɩn sɔr, 'lɔ lɛ a n yɛbɛ nɩ a n yɛpɔɔ nɩ a n ma."
Sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ go, Yesu piel wile a man nɛɛ. A nɩyɔyɔɔ na wa lɔ̃ɔ jũu, wʋ kpɛ naa a gboro pɔ jɩ̃nɛ, tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ ara kɔɔ a kʋ̃ɔ nɛɛ.
Sʋkpar lɛ wʋ lɔɔrɔ wile nɩ ba yelyɔɔ, sʋkpa ɩ̃sʋɔ nɩ nyã:
"Yɩ chɛlɛ! Kʋɔraa lɛ yi chen ɩka wʋ tɩ yaar a wʋ bʋ̃bʋrɔ.
Wʋ yaar naa ka amɩne lo a sɔr pɔ ka a lubil wa tuur di.
Ka amɩne mɩ lo a jie 'lɔ a kʋsɩbɛ na waa gar a tãna, na a bul fɔɔ, a tãna na ba tɩrɛ jũu.
Tɩchɛ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa nyãa, a jʋɔl naa na a kpi, bojũu a ba tara nyɩbɛ ɛ.
Amɩne mɩ tɩ lo naa gʋʋr pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a gʋʋr bul fɩ̃ɩn naa tara, a ba tʋ̃ɔ dɔɔ ɛ.
Ka amɩne mɩ tɩ lo a kɔjɔ̃ vɩla pɔ, na a dɔɔ yɔɔ. Ka amɩne dɔɔ a lɩjɛr nɩ pie, amɩne lɩjaata ka amɩne mɩ kɔbaa."
Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nɩrɛ jaa na tara toor, wʋ chɛlɛ!"
A nɩyɔyɔɔ bala na wa chen tɩ chɛ a nɩbɛ bala na turo wʋ nɩ a wʋ poturbo pie nɩ a ayi bala wʋn ir, ka a ba sʋʋr wʋ a sʋkpar par.
Be lɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩn 'lɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋ yɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ yelsɔɔlaa, tɩchɛ a banyã 'lɔ na ba pʋɔ ɛ, a yelsɩ a jaa ɩ naa sʋkpar kʋ ba.
A lɛ jũu, 'Ba ma kãan lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ ba maa nyɛ ɛ, na ba ma chɛl lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ ba maa wõ ɛ. Ala ba ɩ lɛ ɛ ban lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr ka Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ kʋ ba.' "
Ka Yesu sʋʋr ba, "Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a sʋkpa nyã par ɛ? Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩn ɩ wa bɔ̃ɔ sʋkpa jaa par?
Yɩ kaa, a kʋɔraa lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na yaara a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
Nɩbɛ bamɩne kaara naa fɩka a bʋ̃bie ala ban yaar ka a lo a sɔr pɔ. Bala wa wõ a 'yɛr wa baar, a Satan ma wa naa, wa de a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrbir ban bʋr a ba nyãa pɔ.
Ala mɩ na lo a jie 'lɔ a kʋsɩbɛ na waa gar a tãna ɩ naa a bala na wõ a 'yɛr na ba ma sɔɔ de fɔɔ jaa nɩ pʋpɛl,
tɩchɛ baa tara nyɩbɛ ɛ, ba maa kor ɛ. A 'yɛr jũu, wõm bɩɩ gefʋ wa wa a ba sɛ̃, ba ma lɩɛb puor fɔɔ jaa.
A ala mɩ na lo a gʋʋr pɔ ɩ naa a bala na wõ a 'yɛr,
tɩchɛ ka a ɩ̃gãn nyã wõm, nɩ a bʋ̃tarsɩ bɛlfʋ, nɩ a bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ fɩ̃ɩn a 'yɛr, ka waa tʋ̃ɔ dɔɔ ɛ.
A anyã mɩ na lo a kɔjɔ̃ pɔ ɩ naa a bala na wõ a 'yɛr na ba sɔɔ de na ba dɔɔ jur, ka amɩne ɩ lɩjɛr nɩ pie, amɩne lɩjaata, amɩne mɩ kɔbaa."
Wʋ sʋʋr ba naa, "Ba ma chʋm fɩ̃tɩn na ba de laa kpa pɔɔ bɩɩ de su gado pĩlem bɩɩ? A ba ɩ a jie 'lɔ wʋn na chaar nɩrɛ jaa lɛ ba ma dɔɔl ɛ?
Bon jaa na pɔɔ ban yuo wʋ naa, ka ala a jaa mɩ na sɔɔl yi chãa pɔ.
Nɩrɛ jaa na tara toor, wʋ chɛlɛ!"
Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ bɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ sʋ̃ a lɛ yɩn wõnõ. A lɛ fʋn man tɩr, lɛ mɩ lɛ ban man kʋ fʋ, tɩ dɔɔl gba.
Nɩrɛ jaa na tara, Nãaŋmɩn ma vɛ̃ naa ka wʋ nyɛrɛ dɔɔlɔ, nɩrɛ nyã mɩ na ba tara ɛ, a bɩ̃lãa ala gba wʋn tara, Nãaŋmɩn na de naa a wʋ sɛ̃."
Tɩ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ nɩtɔ̃ lɛ wʋ kaara. Daba ma yaar a wʋ bʋ̃bʋrɔ bar.
Tɩ̃sɔɔ nɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ, ka wʋ gãn bɩɩ wʋ ir naa, a bʋ̃bie ma bulaa naa nʋ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ gba maa bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
A bʋ̃bie ma bul naa a tẽe naa tɔ vaar tɩ dɔɔ jur, bɩ a bie.
Ala wa bɩ baar, wʋ ma chiin nɩ sʋɔ tɩ ŋman bojũu a ŋmab sɔ̃ɔ ta naa."
Ka Yesu lɛ 'yɛr, "Bo lɛ sɩn de man a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ bɩɩ sʋkpa buor lɛ sɩn lɔb gbɛb wʋ?
Wʋ kaara fɩka a kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ bir, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a bʋ̃bie a jaa pɔ bʋ̃bile.
Tɩchɛ wʋ ma bul ɩ tɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wʋ tɛ wilbɛrɛ, ka a lubil ma wa mara a wʋ 'maar pɔ."
Yesu de naa sʋkpayɔɔ na nyɛtaa na wʋ 'yɛr a 'yɛr kʋ ba, a lɛ an na ɩ ka ba tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par.
Sʋkpar tɛɛ lɛ wʋ ma de 'yɛrɛ nɩ a 'yɛr kʋrɔ ba. Tɩchɛ ala wa ɩ 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ poturbo tɛɛ lɛ, wʋ ma wiil naa a jaa par kʋ ba.
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jãanʋɔr, wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo, "Yɩ ɩ a sɩ gɔ̃ɔ chen a man gɔ̃ɔn."
Ba bar naa a nɩyɔyɔɔ bala tɩchɛ ka a wʋ poturbo tara wʋ, ka ba 'matãan a gborsɩ amɩne gɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
Ka a man kʋ̃ɔ sɛkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ ire ka a kʋ̃ɔ kpɛ a gboro pɔ ɩrɛ na sɛɛ
tɩchɛ ka a Yesu be a gboro par gã kɔɔl wʋ ju guro. Ka a wʋ poturbo sɩ̃ɩ wʋ na ba sʋrɔ wʋ, "Wiwile, a ba bã fʋ sɩn mʋrɔ bɩɩ?"
Be lɛ ka wʋ ir tãn a sɛsɛbɛ nɩ a man, "Yɩ ŋmaa vʋʋr! Yɩ ara a lɛ nɛ!" Ka a sɛsɛbɛ ŋmaa vʋʋr ka a man ara jomm.
Ka wʋ sʋʋr a wʋ poturbo, "Bo lɛ so ka yɩ joro a dãbɩ̃ɛ? Yɩ chɛnɛ na ba sɔɔ ma bɩɩ?"
Ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba ka ba lɩɛb sʋrɔ taa, "An lɛ a nyã ka a sɛsɛbɛ nɩ a man tu a wʋ nɛɛ?"
Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo gɔ̃ɔ naa a man, a Gerasenɩ nɩbɛ wɛr pɔ.
Yesu na wa yi a gboro pɔ, daba na gele yi naa a yar par wa tuor wʋ.
A gẽgelaa nyã kpɩɛrɛ naa a yar par ka nɩrɛ jaa ba be be na tʋ̃ɔ lũ wʋ nɩ bɔ̃jɔrsɩ gba ɛ.
Ba ma lũ naa a wʋ gbɛɛ nɩ a nuur tɩchɛ ka wʋ ŋma, tɩ kar a kue ala bar. Nɩrɛ jaa ba be be na tʋ̃ɔ wʋ ɛ.
Tɩ̃sɔɔ nɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ, wʋ ma be naa a yar par nɩ a tɔ̃n ju tãna tɩ ŋmara a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ kʋsɩbɛ.
Wʋn wa nyɛ a Yesu na be tɛɛr, wʋ jo naa tɩ lo gbur dumo a wʋ niem,
tɩ na wʋ ŋme chɛlma 'yɛrɛ, "Bo fʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka fʋ ɩ ma? Fʋ ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na gar a jaa Bie pɔn Nãaŋmɩn ɩka fʋ kʋ̃ ge ma ɛ."
Bojũu Yesu dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ wʋ ɩka, "A fʋ̃ʋ sɩdɛɛr wa yi a daba pɔ."
Be lɛ ka Yesu sʋʋr wʋ, "Bãa a fʋ yuor di?" Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Sɩyɔɔ, bojũu sɩ waa naa."
Ka wʋ sʋɔr a Yesu yãayãabɩlɛ ɩka wʋ ta dii wʋ bar a jie 'lɔ ɛ.
Doyɔɔ mɩ ara na gbʋr a tɔ̃ɔ, dire.
Ka a sɩdɛbɛ sʋɔr a Yesu, "Ir sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a dor ala pɔ na fʋ sɔɔ ka sɩ tɩ kpɛ a ba pɔ."
Wʋ sɔɔ naa ka a sɩdɛbɛ yi tɩ kpɛ a dor ala. A ɩ naa dor tur ayi (2,000) ka a jaa tĩgbil suu tɩ kpɛ a man pɔ gbʋ̃m kpi kpi.
A bala na kaara a dor jon kul a tẽe pɔ nɩ a tẽbil ala na gbʋr tɩ 'yɛr a lɛ na ɩ. Ka a nɩbɛ yi chen ɩka ba tɩ kaa.
Ba wa naa a Yesu sɛ̃ wa nyɛ a daba 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ tara a sɩdɛyɔɔ gele ka wʋ chɩ su bonsɩ jɩ̃nɛ, ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba.
A bala na nyɛ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ a lɛ na ɩ a daba na dɔ̃ɔ tara a sɩdɛbɛ nɩ a dor 'yɛr,
ka a nɩbɛ piel sʋɔrɔ a Yesu ka wʋ yi a ba wɛr pɔ.
Yesu na wa kpɩɛrɛ a gboro pɔ ka a daba 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩdɛbɛ na yi sʋɔr wʋ ɩka wʋ ɩ a ba 'mataa chen.
Ka a Yesu ba sɔɔ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr wʋ, "Kul a fʋ yir dẽme sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba a lɛ a Soro na ɩ kʋ fʋ, nɩ a lɛ wʋn jo a fʋ nɩbaal."
A daba chen na wʋ tɩ piel 'yɛrɛ a lɛ a Yesu na maal kʋ wʋ a wɛr 'lɔ pɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a Dekapolisɩ. Ka a nɛɛr 'maa a nɩbɛ.
Yesu na wa gɔ̃ɔ a man gɔ̃ɔn go, nɩyɔyɔɔ lɔ̃ɔ naa na ba jilʋ̃ wʋ. Wʋ chɛnɛ na ara a man nɛɛ,
ka a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Jairusɩ wa a be. Wʋn wa nyɛ a Yesu,
wʋ gbur dumo a Yesu niem tɩ sʋɔr wʋ, "Yãayãabɩlɛ, a n bipɔɔbile lɛ ɩ baal ɩrɛ na kpi. Wa dɔɔl wʋ a fʋ nũu ka wʋ sa ta kpi ɛ."
Ka a Yesu nɩ a daba 'mataa chiine. Nɩyɔyɔɔ turo naa dara taa tɩɛrɛ wʋ.
Pɔɔ kɔ̃ɔ mɩ ben be lo sɩɛ suoro faara yuomo pie nɩ ayi.
Wʋ bal di dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ a tɩtɩɩlbɛ jie na wʋ sɔ̃ɔ bon jaa wʋn tara tɩ ba sa ɛ. Ka a baal tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʋ.
Wʋn wa wõ a Yesu yele, wʋ tu naa a puor tɩ sɩɩr a wʋ fuu,
bojũu wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ. "Maa tʋ̃ɔ sɩɩr a wʋ fuu gba, ɩn sa naa, na n pɛ̃n."
Wʋn wa sɩɩr a Yesu fuu nɛɛ wa baar, a jɩ̃ɩ ŋmaa naa a dẽdẽe daa ka wʋ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a wʋ wʋʋr baar naa.
Ka a Yesu mɩ bɔ̃ɔn a fɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a kpɛ̃ɔ na yi a wʋ sɛ̃. Ka a wʋ lɩɛb a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ sʋʋr, "An lɛ sɩɩr a n fuu?"
Ka a wʋ poturbo 'yɛr, "Nyɛ a lɛ a nɩyɔyɔɔ banyã na dara taa tɩɛrɛ fʋ, tɩchɛ a fʋ sʋrɔ a sʋɔ 'lɔ na sɩɩr fʋ!"
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu chɛnɛ kaara gʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ nyɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɩɩr wʋ.
Ka a pɔɔ na bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ na ɩ, dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ wʋ naa ka wʋ mɩrɛ na wʋ wa gbur dumo a Yesu niem tɩ 'yɛr a lɛ jaa na ɩ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "N yɛpɔɔ, fʋn sɔɔ ma jũu, fʋ sa naa. Kulo nɩ ɩ̃gãn 'maar, a fʋ dɔɔyɛ baar naa."
A Yesu ba 'yɛr baar ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩbɛ kɔ̃ɔ yi a Jairusɩ yir wa 'yɛr wʋ, "A fʋ bie kpi naa. Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ fʋ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wiwile go?"
Yesu ba chɛlɛ a lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a daba, "Taa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Sɔɔ ma dɛ."
Yesu ba sɔɔ ka nɩrɛ jaa tu wʋ ɛ, ka Pita nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ a wʋ yɛbile Jɔɔn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Ban wa ta a Jairusɩ yir, Yesu nyɛ naa a nɩbɛ na kõnõ ŋmiere chɛlsɩ.
Ka wʋ kpɛ tɩ sʋʋr ba, "Bãa lɛ yɩ kõnõ ŋmiere nɩ a chɛlsɩ a lɛ? A bie ba kpi ɛ. Wʋ gur naa."
A ba laara tʋrɔ nɩ wʋ. Wʋ dii naa a nɩbɛ ba jaa bar ka ba yi tɩ wʋ tara a bie sãa nɩ a ma nɩ a wʋ poturbo bala wʋn 'mataa chiin, a ba kpɛ a jie 'lɔ a bikũu na be.
Ka wʋ tɩ nyɔɔ a pɔɔbile nũu tɩ 'yɛr, "Talita kum!" A par lɛ a Yesu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr pɔ, "Pɔɔbile, ir!"
Ka wʋ vaa ir chiine. Yuomo pie nɩ ayi bie lɛ. Ka a yele 'maa ba nɛɛ.
Yesu kpaal ba naa jũu ka ba taa vɛ̃ ka a nɩrɛ jaa wõ naa ɛ. Tɩ 'yɛr ɩka ba kʋ a pɔɔbile bʋ̃diir ka wʋ di.
Yesu yi naa a be ka a wʋ poturbo tu wʋ ka a ba 'mataa kul a Najaretɩ na ɩ a wʋ tẽe.

Ka a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir wa ta, ka wʋ kpɛ be a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie tɩ piel wile, ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na wõ nɛɛr 'maa. Ka ba sʋrɔ, "Nyɩnɛ lɛ a daba nyã nyɛ a bɔ̃ɔfʋ nyã? Yɛ̃ buor lɛ a nyã wʋn tara na wʋ gba tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃?
A ba ɩ a mɩmɩɛrɛ lɛ ɛ? A ba ɩ a Mɛɛr bie lɛ ɛ, a wʋ yɛbil ɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Josesɩ nɩ Judas nɩ Simon ɛ? Ka a wʋ yɛpɔbɔ mɩ be ka a sɩ sɛ̃ ɛ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ nyɛrɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ jie jaa, tɩchɛ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tẽe nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme nɩ a wʋ nɩbɛ sɛ̃ lɛ waa nyɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ ɛ."
Waa tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ yɔɔ a be ɛ, tɩ wʋ dɔɔl a wʋ nũu baalsɩ bɩ̃lãa a ba sa.
Yesu nɛɛ 'maa wʋ naa bojũu baa sɔɔ de wʋ ɛ. Wʋ yɔn gʋɔr a tẽn na wʋ wile.
Wʋ bʋɔl naa a wʋ poturbo Pie nɩ Ayi bala wʋn dɔ̃ɔ ir, ka ba wa a wʋ sɛ̃ ka wʋ tʋ̃ ba ayir yir, na wʋ kʋ ba kpɛ̃ɔ ka ba tʋ̃ɔ sɩdɛbɛ.
Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ ta de bon jaa ɛ, yɩ tara dadiirsɩ tɛɛ. Yɩ ta tara bʋ̃diir ɛ, bɩɩ wʋʋr ɛ, bɩɩ yɔ̃ɔ libie a yɩ sɩɩr gãma pɔ ɛ.
Yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ su nafɔbɔ nɩ fuu bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ.
Yir jaa pɔ yɩn wa kpɛ, yɩ be a be tɩ ta a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn wa yi a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ.
Tẽe jaa pɔ yɩn wa kpɛ ka baa de yɩ ɛ, bɩɩ sɔɔ a 'yɛr ɛ, yɩn wa yire yɩ kpoor a yɩ gbɛɛ tã-uul ka a di a ba dɛɛr dãasɩɛ."
Ba yin chen tɩ mʋɔlɔ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɩka a nɩbɛ ba lɩɛb ba tɩɛr.
Ba diin a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi, tɩ 'lɩɩ baalsɩ kãa ka ba sa.
A nãa Hɛrɔd mɩ wõ naa a anyã, bojũu nɩrɛ jaa wõ naa a Yesu yuor. Ka a bamɩne 'yɛrɛ, "A Jɔɔn 'lɔ na ɩ a kɔ̃suoro, 'lɔ lɛ tɔ̃ɔ yi a yaa pɔ, ala lɛ so ka wʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ a lɛ."
Ka a banyã mɩ 'yɛrɛ, "Elaija lɛ." Ka a bamɩne mɩ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ, "Wʋ ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ nɩtãa a bala na dɔ̃ɔ be be a kõro jaa."
Tɩchɛ a Hɛrɔd na wa wõ, wʋ 'yɛr naa, "A Jɔɔn 'lɔ ɩn vɛ̃ ka ba ŋmaa a wʋ ju lɛ, yi."
A Hɛrɔd mɩ̃ɛ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka ba nyɔɔ a Jɔɔn waan, wa lũ 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ. Wʋ ɩ naa a nɩtɔ̃, a wʋ yɛbile Filip pɔɔ Hɛrɔdiyas wʋn de jũu.
Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʋ a Hɛrɔd, "A ba tara sɔr ɩka fʋ de a fʋ yɛbil vʋr pɔɔ kul ɛ."
Ka a Hɛrɔdiyas tara nɩ a Jɔɔn jɛɛr bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ kʋ wʋ, tɩchɛ waa tʋ̃ɔ ɛ.
A Hɛrɔd bɔ̃ɔ naa a Jɔɔn na ɩ nɩsʋ̃ nɩ chɛchɛ, na wʋ joro a Jɔɔn dãbɩ̃ɛ, na wʋ gu wʋ tara. A Hɛrɔd wa wõ a Jɔɔn 'yɛr a ma sɔb wʋn nɩbir, tɩchɛ wʋ ma bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ chɛlɛ a wʋ 'yɛr.

Tɩchɛ sɔr wa yuon kʋ a Hɛrɔdiyas a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a nãa na wa maala a wʋ dɔɔfʋ bɩbir yele. A wʋ dɔɔfʋ bɩbir nyãna daar, wʋ bʋɔl naa a nɩbɛrɛ bala na turo a wʋ puor, nɩ a sojasɩ nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ na be a Galilee pɔ.
A Hɛrɔdiyas bipɔɔ wa kpɛ naa, na wʋ sɛ a bɩ̃nɛ ka a pɛl a nãa Hɛrɔd nɩ a wʋ nɩbɛrɛ bala ba jaa pʋɔ. Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a pɔɔbile, "Sʋɔr ma bon jaa fʋn bʋɔrɔ, ɩn kʋ fʋ naa."
Be lɛ wʋ põl kʋ a pɔɔbile, "Bon jaa fʋn sʋɔr ala ɩ a n nãalʋ̃ʋ ŋmaa gba lɛ, n na kʋ fʋ naa."
Ka wʋ yi chen tɩ sʋʋr a wʋ ma, "Bo lɛ ɩn sʋɔr?" Ka a wʋ ma 'yɛr wʋ, "Tɩ sʋɔr a Jɔɔn Kɔ̃suor ju."
Ka a pɔɔbile yi pɔɔ fɔɔ lɛ kpɛ a nãa sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, "N bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Jɔɔn Kɔ̃suor ju a la'yɛlma pɔ kʋ ma a pʋ̃pãanyã."
A nãa pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩchɛ a nɩbɛ bala wʋn bʋɔl na wʋn põl kʋ a pɔɔbile jũu, waa bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ tɔr ɛ.
Ka wʋ tʋ̃ a nɩkʋrɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ a dẽdẽe daa ɩka wʋ chen tɩ ŋmaa a Jɔɔn ju waan. A daba chen tɩ ŋmaa a Jɔɔn ju a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ
'yɔ̃ɔ a la'yɛlma pɔ waan, wa kʋ a pɔɔbile ka wʋ de kʋ a wʋ ma.
A Jɔɔn poturbo na wõ a lɛ, ba chen tɩ 'mɔɔ wʋ na ba ũu.
A Yesu nɩtʋ̃nsɩ lɩɛb wa lɔ̃ɔ taa a wʋ sɛ̃, na ba wa man a lɛ jaa ban tʋ̃ tɩ wiil a nɩbɛ, na ba kʋ a Yesu.
A nɩbɛ yɔɔ na waara tɩ chiine jũu, jaa gba ba be be a ban di ɛ. Be lɛ ka Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ wa a sɩn tɛɛ chen a jie 'lɔ a nɩbɛ na ba be ɛ, a yɩ tɩ jɩ̃nɛ pɛ̃n."
Ba kpɛ naa a gboro bala tɛɛ chen a jie 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
Tɩchɛ a nɩbɛ na wa nyɛ ban chiine ba bɔ̃ɔ ba naa. A ba yi a tẽn a jaa de nie jon gbɛɛ tɩ ara a be.
A Yesu na wa tɩ ta, na wʋ nyɛ a nɩyɔɔ a ba ɩrɛ nɩbaal a wʋ sɛ̃, ban kaara fɩka piir na ba tara chɩnɛ jũu, wʋ piel wile ba yelyɔɔ.
Mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa mʋrɔ a wʋ poturbo wa naa wa 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu, "A ka ɩ naa mɔgɔ̃ɔ, tɩ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ mɩ mʋrɔ;
wɛl a nɩbɛ bar a ba chen a por nɩ a tẽn na gbʋr tɩ bɔ bʋ̃diir da di."
Ka be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr sɔɔ ba, "Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ yɩ kʋ ba bʋ̃kɔ̃ɔ a ba di." Ka a poturbo 'yɛr ɩka, "Nyɩnɛ lɛ sɩn nyɛ a libie anyãna? Nɩbʋ̃'yen ŋmɛrsɩ aniin sãyar gba! Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ sɩn ɩ kʋ ba jaa bʋ̃diir?"
A be lɛ a Yesu sʋʋr ba, "Paanʋ̃ɔsɩ aŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tara? Yɩ chen tɩ kaa." Be lɛ ba chen tɩ kaa tɩ wa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Paanʋ̃ɔsɩ anũu, nɩ jɩ̃mɛ ayi."
A Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a poturbo a ba ɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa a ba jɛ̃ gbulsɩ a mɔ'yɔlɔ ju.
Be lɛ a nɩbɛ jɩ̃nɛ jɩ̃nɛ, a gbulsɩ gbulsɩ. Bamɩne jɩ̃nɛ naa kɔɔr kɔɔr, ka bamɩne mɩ jɩ̃nɛ lɩjaayi nɩ piir.

A Yesu de naa a paanʋ̃ɔsɩ anũu nɩ a jɩ̃mɛ ayi ala na wʋ kaa saaju tɩ dʋl puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan. Wʋ de naa a paanʋ̃ɔsɩ ŋma ŋma tɩ de kʋ a wʋ poturbo tɩ 'yɛr, "Yɩ de põ a nɩbɛ." Tɩ lɛ de a jɩ̃mɛ ayi ala mɩ ŋma põ a nɩbɛ.
A nɩbɛ ba jaa din, na ba tɩɩ,
tɩchɛ ka a poturbo wob a bʋ̃ŋmaara 'yɔ̃ɔ pɛr pie nɩ ayi.
A nɩbɛ bala na dɔ̃ɔ di a bʋ̃diir ala, dɔɔr tɛɛ ɩ naa tur anũu.
Ajienaa, ka a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ poturbo a ba kpɛ a gboro na ba de nie chiine a Betɩsaida tɩ wʋ na wɛl a nɩbɛ bar.
Wʋn wa bar ba wa baar, wʋ do naa a tɔ̃ɔ ju ɩka wʋ tɩ puor.
A wɛr na wa sɔɔrɔ, a gboro be naa a man sãlsɔɔ, tɩchɛ ka wʋ be a wɛyõo, 'lɔ tɛɛ.
Wʋ nyɛ naa a wʋ poturbo ka ba mɔ̃nɔ̃ a gboro faara bojũu a sɛsɛbɛ furo na tuoro ba. A wɛr na wa gbʋrɔ a chaarfʋ, wʋ yin chiine a kʋ̃ɔ ju waara a ba sɛ̃, ta bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ po ba.
Ban wa nyɛ wʋn chiine a kʋ̃ɔ ju a lɛ, ba tɩɛr ɩka kpĩin lɛ, na ba ŋme chɛlsɩ,
bojũu ba jaa nyɛ wʋ naa ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba. Ajienaa, ka a Yesu tãn, "Yɩ nyɔɔ nyãa! Maa lɛ! Yɩ taa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ."
Tɩ pãa kpɛ a gboro pɔ ka a sɛsɛbɛ ŋmaa vʋʋr. Ka a nɛɛr 'maa ba yɔɔ jaa.
Baa dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a paanʋ̃ɔsɩ ala par ɛ, bojũu a ba ju ba wõnõ nyaar ɛ.
Ban wa gɔ̃ɔ a man do lũ a gboro a Genesaretɩ gɔ̃ɔn,
tɩ tɔ̃ɔ yi a gboro pɔ, nɩbɛ nyɛ naa a Yesu bɔ̃ɔ.
A nɩbɛ jon yɔ a wɛr 'lɔ wʋ jaa na ba tuo a ba baalsɩ nɩ sɔ̃n chiin jie jaa ban wõ ɩka wʋ be naa.

Jie jaa wʋn chen, tẽkpɛ̃ɛ pɔ bɩɩ, tẽbile pɔ bɩɩ, ka a tẽe kõkoor lɛ̃ɛɛ, ba ma gaal naa a ba baalsɩ a chãa pɔ. Ba ma sʋɔrɔ naa a Yesu ɩka wʋ sɔɔ ka ba sɩɩr a wʋ fuu nɛɛ gba, bala jaa na sɩɩr, ma sa naa.
A Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe bamɩne yi naa a Jerusalɛm wa lɔ̃ɔ a Yesu sɛ̃,
na ba nyɛ a wʋ poturbo ka ba dire nɩ nũdɛbɛ. Ka a lɛ wiil ɩka baa pɛɛ a ba nuur a, "Puorfʋ pɛɛfʋ 'lɔ ɛ."
A Faraseemɩne nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ba maa di ka bala ba pɛɛ a ba puorfʋ pɛɛfʋ 'lɔ ɛ, na ba turo a lɛ a ba nɩbɛrɛ na bin.
Bala wa yi daa wa, ba maa di ka bala ba pɛɛ a pɛɛfʋ 'lɔ ɛ. Ban turo a ba bin yɔɔ ala jũu, ba ma pɛɛn a ŋmama, dʋʋr nɩ a kulaar.
Ala lɛ so ka a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe sʋʋr a Yesu, "Bo lɛ so ka a fʋ poturbo ba turo a lɛ a sɩ nɩbɛrɛ na bin ɛ, na baa pɛɛ a ba nuur ɛ tɩ dire nɩ nũdɛbɛ!"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ a Isaiya dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a yɩn nɛɛr ayi dẽme 'yɛr na wʋ sɛb. Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa, 'A yɩn nɩbɛ banyãna 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma naa nɩ a yɩ nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka a yɩ pʋtɩɛr jãa a n sɛ̃.
Pɔrɔ lɛ yɩ puoro ma, bojũu yɩ wile naa nɩsaal nɛbinsɩ tɩ tɩɛr ɩka maa nɛɛ lɛ.'
Yɩ bar naa a Nãaŋmɩn Nɛɛ tɩ turo a lɛ a yɩ nɩbɛrɛ na bin.
"A ba ɩ ka yɩ de yɛ̃ bar a Nãaŋmɩn Nɛɛ tufʋ tɩ turo a lɛ a yɩn mɩ̃ɛ na bin ɛ.
Mosesɩ 'yɛr naa a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, ''Yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʋ sãa nɩ a fʋ ma.' Na wʋ mɩ lɛ 'yɛr, 'Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ sãa bɩɩ a wʋ ma, ba kʋ wʋ.'
Tɩchɛ ka yɩn 'yɛr ɩka a sɛɛ na, nɩrɛ wa 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ sãa bɩɩ a wʋ ma, 'Bon jaa ɩn naa kʋ fʋ, n den kʋ Nãaŋmɩn.'
Yɩ maa lɛ vɛ̃ ka wʋ maal bon jaa kʋ a wʋ sãa bɩɩ a wʋ ma ɛ.
Yɩn ɩrɛ a nɩtɔ̃ jũu, ka yɩ kaara a Nãaŋmɩn Nɛɛ pɔrɔ tɩ turo a lɛ yɩn mɩ̃ɛ na bin. Yelyɔɔ mɩ ben be yɩn ɩrɛ nɩ nyɛtaa a nɩtɔ̃."
A Yesu lɛ bɔ̃ɔ bʋɔl a nɩyɔɔ ka ba lɩɛb wa a wʋ sɛ̃. Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ chɛl wõ ɩn 'yɛrɛ tɩ na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par.
Bon jaa ba be ka a yõo ka nɩrɛ na de di ka a bʋ̃nyɩnɛ vɛ̃ ka wʋ dɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ bon 'lɔ na yi a nɩrɛ pʋtɩɛr pɔ lɛ na vɛ̃ ka wʋ dɛɛ."
Sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋn wa bar a nɩyɔɔ bala tɩ kpɛ a yir, a wʋ poturbo sʋʋr wʋ naa a sʋkpa par.
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr ba, "Yɩ mɩ ɩ naa a nɩbɛ bala na ba bɔ̃ɔ a par bɩɩ? Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka bon jaa ba be be ka nɩrɛ na de di na wʋ dɛɛ ɛ,
bojũu wʋ maa kpɛ a wʋ tɩɛr pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ pʋɔm lɛ wʋ ma suu na wʋ tɩ yi." Yesu 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ na wʋ wiil ɩka a bʋ̃diir a jaa sɛɛn difʋ.
Na wʋ mɩ lɛ 'yɛr ɩka, "Bon nyã na yi a nɩrɛ pʋtɩɛr pɔ lɛ ma tʋ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka wʋ dɛɛ.
Ala na ma yi a nɩrɛ pʋtɩɛr pɔ lɛ, tɩɛr dɛbɛ, nɩ a sɛ̃sɛ̃yele, nɩ a nãnyuur, nɩ nɩrɛ kʋfʋ, nɩ sɛ̃fʋ,
nɩ a nyuur, nɩ a putuo, nɩ jire, nɩ kakaba, nɩ bɔbier, nɩ yosɔ̃ɔ, nɩ pɔlyele nɩ a jɔlyele.
A yeldɛbɛ anyãna a jaa lɛ ma yi a nɩrɛ pʋtɩɛr pɔ, vɛ̃ ka wʋ dɛɛ."
Be lɛ ka a Yesu yi a be na wʋ chen a Tire wɛr pɔ. Wʋ tɩ kpɛ naa a yir ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔ, tɩ waa bʋɔrɔ ɩka nɩrɛ jaa wʋ bɔ̃ɔ ka wʋ ben be ɛ. Tɩchɛ wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ sɔɔl ɛ.
Ala a pɔɔ na tara wʋ bipɔɔ ka a sɩdɛɛr tara, ajienaa wʋn wʋ wõ a Yesu 'yɛr, wʋ wan wa lo gbur dumo a wʋ niem.
A pɔɔ ba dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ, na wʋ dɔ̃ɔ yi be a Siriya Fonisiya paal pɔ. Wʋ sʋɔr naa a Yesu ɩka, wʋ dii a sɩdɛɛr bar a wʋ bipɔɔ pɔ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Bar ka a bibiir di a lɛ ban bʋɔrɔ, taa de a bibiir bʋ̃diir kʋ baar ɛ."
Ka a pɔɔ mɩ 'yɛr, "Sɩrɛ lɛ, n Soro, tɩchɛ a baar mɩ ma dire naa a bʋ̃ pʋr pʋr ala a bibiir na ma dire, tɩchɛ ka a loro a tẽe."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "A nɩtɔ̃ fʋn 'yɛr jũu, kulo. A sɩdɛɛr bar naa a fʋ bipɔɔ."
Wʋ kul tɩ nyɛ a bie na gã a gado ju, tɩ a sɩdɛɛr yi.
Yesu lɛ yi naa a Tire wɛr pɔ, na wʋ tu a Sidon suu a Galilee man pɔ, na wʋ tɩ chen a Dekapolisɩ paal pɔ.
Be lɛ ka nɩbɛ bamɩne waan daba na ɩ wõo, na waa tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ 'yɛrɛ sʋ̃ ɛ. Ba sʋɔr a Yesu ka wʋ sɩɩr a daba nɩ a wʋ nũu na wʋ sãa wʋ.
Ka Yesu tara a daba yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ, na wʋ de a wʋ nubie su a daba tobɔɔr pɔ, be lɛ wʋ chɩr nataar tɩ sɩɩr a daba jãlbir.
Na wʋ dʋl kaa a saaju tɩ vʋʋr na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a daba, "Efata!", a par lɛ a Yesu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr pɔ, yuo.
Ajienaa ka a daba tobo yuo ka a jãlbir lɩɛb ka wʋ piel 'yɛrɛ jaa chɛchɛ.
Yesu kpaal ban jũu ɩka ba taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ. Tɩchɛ a lɛ wʋn kpãa ba lɛ lɛ ba mɩ 'yɛrɛ yʋɔrɔ nɩ a jie wʋ jaa.
A nɩbɛ nɛɛ 'maan yɔɔ jaa ka ba 'yɛrɛ, "Wʋ ɩn yele jaa sʋ̃. Wʋ gba ma vɛ̃ naa ka wõo wõnõ, tɩ jãlbir lɩɛb 'yɛrɛ chɛchɛ."
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ, nɩyɔɔ lɛ lɔ̃ɔn taa go a Yesu sɛ̃, tɩ baa tara bon na di ɛ. Yesu bʋɔl a wʋ poturbo ka ba wa a wʋ sɛ̃ ka wʋ 'yɛr,
"A nɩbɛ banyã ɩrɛ naa nɩbaal, bojũu ber ata nɩ nyã ban be a n sɛ̃, baa lɛ tara bon na di ɛ.
Maa mɩ bar ba ka ba kulo nɩ a kɔ̃, ban tɩ lon sɔr pɔ, bojũu bamɩne yin tɛɛr."
Ka a wʋ poturbo 'yɛr, "Tɩchɛ nyɩnɛ lɛ a kanaa a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ nɩrɛ na nyɛ bʋ̃diir kʋ ba?"
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr ba, "Paanʋ̃ɔsɩ aŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tara?" Ka ba 'yɛr, "Paanʋ̃ɔsɩ ayopõi."
Wʋ 'yɛr naa a nɩbɛ, ka ba jɩ̃nɛ tẽe, tɩ na wʋ de a paanʋ̃ɔsɩ ayopõi ala puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ ŋma ŋma de kʋ a wʋ poturbo ka ba de põ a nɩbɛ.
Ba tara naa a jɩ̃bil amɩne, ka wʋ de a ala mɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ 'yɛr ɩka a poturbo ba de põ a nɩbɛ.
Ba di naa tɩɩ tɩ chɛ. Ka a wʋ poturbo wob a bʋ̃ŋmaara ala ban di faa 'yɔ̃ɔ pɛr ayopõi.
Ba ɩ naa tur anaar. Ka wʋ bar ba a sɔr.
Ajienaa, 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ poturbo 'mantaa kpɛ a gboro pɔ, na ba chen a Dalmanuta paal pɔ.
Be lɛ a Faraseemɩne wa sʋrɔ wʋ yelsʋʋrsɩ, bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba bɛɛr wʋ kaa, na ba 'yɛr ɩka wʋ wiil ba jɩ̃nɛ kɔ̃ɔ ka ba bɔ̃ɔ ɩka wʋ yin a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Ka wʋ vʋʋr lɛ fãa tɩ 'yɛr, "Bo lɛ so ka a yɩn pʋ̃pãanyã nɩbɛ bʋɔrɔ jɩ̃nɛ ɩka yɩ nyɛ? Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, yɩ kʋ̃ nyɛ jɩ̃nɛ jaa ɛ."
Wʋ bar ba naa tɩ kpɛ a gboro gɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a man gɔ̃ɔn.
A wʋ poturbo ĩin naa ba tara paanʋ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ tara bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ a gboro pɔ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a Faraseemɩne paanʋ̃ɔ dãbɩl nɩ a Hɛrɔd paanʋ̃ɔ dãbɩl mɩ."
Ka a wʋ poturbo guor taa 'yɛrɛ, "Sɩn ba tara a paanʋ̃ɔ lɛ so."
Yesu na bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ, wʋ sʋʋr ba naa, "Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ 'yɛrɛ ɩka yaa tara paanʋ̃ɔ ɛ? Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a par sɛrɛ ɛ? A yɩ nyãa kpɛ̃mɛ na mɩ?
Yɩ tara na nɩbie tɩ ba nyɛrɛ ɛ, na yɩ tara tobo tɩ ba wõnõ ɛ. Yɩ ĩin bɩɩ?
A paanʋ̃ɔsɩ anũu ɩn dɔ̃ɔ de ŋma kʋ a dɔɔr tur anũu, pɛr aŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ wob a bʋ̃ŋmaar na chɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ?" Ka ba 'yɛr, "Pɛr pie nɩ ayi."
Ka a Yesu lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, "Ɩn lɛ de a paanʋ̃ɔsɩ ayopõi na n ŋma kʋ a nɩbɛ tur anaar, pɛr aŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ lɛ wob 'yɔ̃ɔ?" Ka ba 'yɛr, "Pɛr ayopõi."
Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a par sɛrɛ ɛ?"
Ba wa ta na a Betɩsaida tẽe pɔ, ka a nɩbɛ bamɩne tara jɔ̃ɔ waan a Yesu sɛ̃ wa sʋɔr wʋ, ka wʋ sɩɩr a jɔ̃ɔ ka wʋ nyɛrɛ.
Yesu nyɔɔ naa a jɔ̃ɔ nũu tɩ tɔɔ wʋ yin a tẽe chɛchɛ. Wʋ tɩ chɩr nataar 'yɔ̃ɔ a daba nɩbie pɔ tɩ dɔɔl wʋ a nũu tɩ sʋʋr wʋ, "Fʋ nyɛn bon bɩɩ?"
Ka a daba dʋɔ kaa tɩ 'yɛr, "N nyɛn nɩbɛ na kaara tɩɩr kaar na ba vire yʋɔrɔ."
Ka a Yesu lɛ de a wʋ nuur pɔɔ a daba nɩbie, ka a wʋ nɩbie yuo, ka wʋ nyɛrɛ pãa nyɛ bomo a jaa chɛchɛ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Kulo, ta lɛ kpɛ a tẽe pɔ ɛ."
Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo chen naa a tẽn ala naa gbʋr Sisariya Filipai. A sɔr pɔ ban be chiine, a Yesu sʋʋr ba naa, "An lɛ a nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka n ɩ naa?"
Ka ba 'yɛr, "Bamɩne 'yɛr naa ɩka fʋ̃ʋ lɛ a Jɔɔn 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ. Ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr ɩka Elaija. Ka a bamɩne mɩ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka fʋ ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na dɔ̃ɔ be be."
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr ba, "Tɩchɛ an lɛ yɩ mɩ 'yɛr ɩka n ɩ naa?" Ka a Pita 'yɛr, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ a Nɩ-iraa, a Nãaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ ɩka fʋ faa a wʋ nɩbɛ."
Ka a Yesu kpãa ba, "Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ a n 'yɛr kʋrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ."

Yesu piel wile ba na wʋ 'yɛrɛ ɩka a Nɩsaal Bie na din dɔɔyɛ yele yɔɔ pɔ, ka a Juu nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a ba bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe tɔr wʋ bar, na ba kʋ wʋ. Tɩchɛ a ber ata daar wʋn ir naa a kũu pɔ ɩ vʋr.
Wʋ 'yɛr naa anyã chãa pɔ, ka a Pita tara wʋ yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ tɩ piel mii 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu lɩɛb kaa a wʋ poturbo tɩ mɩ mii 'yɔ̃ɔ a Pita 'yɛrɛ, "Tɔɔ chen be, Satan! A fʋ tɩɛr ɩn nɩrɛ tɩɛr, waa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn tɩɛr ɛ."
Be lɛ wʋ bʋɔl a nɩyɔɔ nɩ a poturbo ka ba wa a wʋ sɛ̃, ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ turo ma, a nɩnyɩnɛ na 'laara a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɩ de a daa na ɩ dɔɔyɛ nɩ kũu, tɩ turo ma.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bʋɔrɔ a wʋ nyɛvʋr, a wʋ nyɛvʋr na bɔr na, tɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɔɔ a wʋ nyɛvʋr bɔrfʋ a maa nɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã jũu, na faa wʋ naa.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ tara naa a wɛr nyã bonsɩ a jaa tɩ a wʋ sɩɛ wɛ, bo tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ be be?
Bɩɩ bo lɛ nɩrɛ na de tɛɛn a wʋ sɩɛ?

Ala ɩ nɩrɛ mɩ nyɛ naa a maa nɩ a n 'yɛrbie ka a ɩ vɩ̃ yele a nɩbɛ banyã na tɔr Nãaŋmɩn bar, nɩ a putudẽme sɛ̃, a Nɩsaal Bie mɩ na kaa naa a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ ka wʋ ɩ vĩ sʋɔ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋn wa lɩɛb wa nɩ a wʋ Sãa tɩɩr 'matãan a malaka chɛchɛsɩ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, bamɩne ara naa a kana na ba kʋ̃ kpi ɛ, tɩchɛ na ba nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ na na wa nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ."
A ber ayʋɔb puor, Yesu tara naa Pita nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn tɛɛ na wʋ de ba nie ka ba 'mataa do tɔ̃wõo kɔ̃ɔ ju. Be lɛ wʋ tɩ chil a ba niem.
A wʋ fuu pɛl nyɩlɛ gar bʋ̃pɩla jaa nɩrɛ na maal a ka a wɛr pɔ.
Ka a Elaija nɩ a Mosesɩ, wa daa yi a ba sɛ̃. Ka bala nɩ a Yesu 'mataa 'yɛrɛ.
Ka a Pita 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu, "Wiwile, a sɛɛ naa sɩn be a ka. Sɔɔ, ka sɩ maal sɛɛr ata: fʋ̃ʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ, Mosesɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ, Elaija mɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ."
Pita ba bɔ̃ɔ ŋmɩnɛ wʋ na 'yɛr ɛ, bojũu dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba naa.
Ka a julõjuur wa pɔɔ ba, tɩ kɔkɔr 'yɛr a be a julõjuur pɔ, "N binʋ̃nãa lɛ a nyãna. Yɩ chɛlɛ a wʋ 'yɛr."
Ajienaa ban ɩka ba kaa, baa lɛ nyɛ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ, tɩ nyɛ a Yesu tɛɛ.
Ban wa yi a tɔ̃ɔ ju suro, ka a Yesu kpãa ba ɩka ba taa wa 'yɛrɛ a lɛ ban nyɛ kʋrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ, wa tɩ tãn a lɛ a Nɩsaal Bie na ir yi a wʋ kũu pɔ.
Baa 'yɛr kʋ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ, tɩ 'yɛrɛ na ba sʋrɔ taa a kũu pɔ irfʋ par.
Ka ba sʋʋr wʋ, "Bo lɛ so ka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe 'yɛr ɩka Elaija lɛ na de nie wa?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ a Elaija de nie wa chɔɔr a yele jaa. Tɩ ba mɩ sɛb ɩka a Nɩsaal Bie na din dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ ka ba tɔr wʋ bar.
Tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka a Elaija wa naa ka ba ɩ a lɛ jaa ban bʋɔrɔ kʋ wʋ nɩtãa a lɛ ban sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ."
Ban wa ta a poturbo ŋmaa bala sɛ̃, ba nyɛn nɩyɔɔ na ara jilʋ̃ ba ka a bala nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe chɩrɛ taa.
Ka nɩbɛ na wa nyɛ a Yesu na waara, ka ba nɛɛ 'maa ka ba jo tuor puor wʋ.
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr a wʋ poturbo, "Bo lɛ yɩ chɩrɛ taa a lɛ?"
Ka nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ 'yɛr a be a nɩyɔɔ pɔ, "Wiwile, n bidaba lɛ sɩdɛɛr nyɔɔ ka wʋ maa tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɛ, ka n waan a fʋ sɛ̃.
'Lɔ wa ir wʋ, wʋ ma daa wʋn lɔb tẽe ka wʋ furo a natafuul tɩ ɔɔrɔ a nyɩmɛ tɩ tãa. Ka n wa sʋɔr a fʋ poturbo ɩka ba dii a sɩdɛɛr nyãna bar, ka baa tʋ̃ɔ ɛ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Aa, a yɩn nɩbɛ banyã na ba tara sɔɔfʋ ɛ, n be a yɩ sɛ̃ kor ta ŋmɩnɛ? N tara kãnyir ŋmɩnɛ kʋ yɩ? Waan a bie wa kʋ ma."
Ka ba waan a bie. A sɩɛ na wa nyɛ a Yesu, wʋ ir tãa a bie ka wʋ lo tẽe, mɩrɛ tɩ bile tɩ furo a natafuul.
Be lɛ a Yesu sʋʋr a bie sãa, "Sɔ̃ɔ buor lɛ a piel wʋ a nɩtɔ̃?" Ka a sãa 'yɛr, "A bibile daar jaa lɛ a piel wʋ.
Wʋ ma daa wʋn lɔb bũu pɔ bɩɩ kʋ̃ɔ pɔ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ kpi. Ala ɩ fʋn tʋ̃ɔ ɩ yele kɔ̃ɔ, kaa a sɩ nɩbaal tɩ na fʋ sʋ̃ʋ sɩ."
Ka a Yesu mɩ 'yɛr, "Bo lɛ so ka a fʋ 'yɛr ɩka ala ɩ ɩn tʋ̃ɔ naa? Yele jaa ɩn kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ kʋ a bala na sɔɔ de ma."
Ajienaa lɛ a bie sãa chɩɩr, "N sɔɔn de fʋ! Sʋ̃ʋ ma, a n sɔɔfʋ ba bɛrma ɛ!"
Yesu na wa nyɛ a nɩyɔɔ na joro lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa a jie, wʋ tãn a sɩdɛɛr, "Fʋ̃ʋ sɩdɛɛr na ma vɛ̃ ka nɩbɛ ɩ wõn, wa yi a bie pɔ na fʋ taa lɛ ɩrɛ wa kpɩɛrɛ a wʋ pɔ go ɛ!"
Ka a sɩɛ ŋme chɛlma tɩ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bie yɔɔ tɩ yi, ka a bie gã kaara fɩka kũu. Ka a nɩbɛ 'yɛr, "Wʋ kpi naa!"
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu nyɔɔ a wʋ nũu tɔɔ, ka wʋ ir ara.
Yesu na wa kpɛ a yir 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ poturbo tɛɛ, ka ba sʋʋr wʋ, "Bãa lɛ so ka sɩn ba tʋ̃ɔ a sɩdɛɛr nyã dii bar ɛ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ tɛɛ lɛ na vɛ̃ a fʋ dii a sɩɛ nyã ka wʋ yi."
Ba yin a jie 'lɔ tɩ tu a Galilee tal. Yesu ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka nɩrɛ jaa wʋ bɔ̃ɔ a jie ban be ɛ,
bojũu wʋ wile naa a wʋ poturbo, "Ban de naa a Nɩsaal Bie kʋ a nɩbɛ, ka ba kʋ wʋ. Ka a ber ata daar wʋn ir naa, na wʋ tara nyɛvʋr."
Tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ a par a lɛ wʋn 'yɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɩka ba sʋʋr wʋ.
Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo wa ta na a Kapenahum. Ban wa kpɛ a yir, a Yesu sʋʋr ba naa, "Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ chɩrɛ taa a sɔr pɔ a lɛ?"
Ka ba ɩ jaa gbulo, bojũu a sɔr pɔ ba chɩrɛ na taa ɩka an lɛ ɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ.
Yesu na wa jɩ̃nɛ wʋ bʋɔl naa a wʋ poturbo Pie nɩ Ayi na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ wa bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ de nie, a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ wʋ ɩ a yɩ jaa bile, na wʋ ɩ a yɩ jaa tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃."
Yesu vɛ̃ naa ka bibile kɔ̃ɔ ir ara a ba jaa sãlsɔɔ. Wʋ 'mɔɔn a bie tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba,
"Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na de a bibiir banyãna taaba a n jũu, maa lɛ wʋ de. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa mɩ na de ma, a ba ɩ maa lɛ wʋ de ɛ, tɩchɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tʋ̃ ma lɛ wʋ de."
Ka a Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Wiwile, sɩ nyɛ naa nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ na de a fʋ yuor na wʋ dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire. Ka sɩ 'yɛr ɩka wʋ bar bojũu waa ɩ a sɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ ɛ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ ta dii wʋ bar ɛ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na de a n yuor tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ kʋ̃ 'yɛr ma 'yɛrdɛɛr go ɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa na ba jɛɛr nɩ sɩ ɛ, pʋɔ sɩ naa.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na kʋ yɩ kɔ̃'maar nɩ ŋmele, yɩn ɩ a maa sofʋ jũu, a nɩnyɩnɛ kʋ̃ wa faa a wʋ sãyar ɛ.
"Ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa mɩ vɛ̃ naa a bʋ̃bil banyãna ɩ̃sʋɔ na sɔɔ ma ɩ yelbier, a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, bala 'mɔɔ nɩɛr lũ yɔɔl a wʋ nyĩe pɔ daa 'yɔ̃ɔ a man pɔ, ala sa.
Ala ɩ a fʋ nũu vɛ̃ naa ka fʋ ɩ yelbier, ŋmaa bar. Fʋn tɩ kpɛ nyɛvʋr pɔ nɩ nũŋmaa sa naa fʋn tara a nuur a jaa ayi tɩ tɩ kpɛ a wõm jie a be a bũu na ba kpĩine ɛ.
Ala ɩ a fʋ gbɛr mɩ vɛ̃ naa ka fʋ ɩ yelbier, ŋmaa bar fʋn tɩ kpɛ nyɛvʋr pɔ nɩ gbɛŋmaa sa naa fʋn tara a gbɛɛ a jaa ayi tɩ tɩ kpɛ a wõm jie.
Ala ɩ a fʋ nɩbir mɩ vɛ̃ naa ka fʋ ɩ yelbier, 'loo bar. Fʋn tɩ kpɛ Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ nɩ nɩbifɩɛ sa naa fʋn tara a nɩbie ayi tɩ tɩ kpɛ a wõm jie.
Be lɛ a 'Bufulo ba kpire ɛ, ka a bũu mɩ ba kpĩine ɛ.'
Dɔɔyɛ difʋ na lɩɛb nɩrɛ jaa nɩtãa lɛ nyaar na ma wõ bʋ̃diir ka a nʋ̃mɔ̃.
"Nyaar ɩ naa, tɩchɛ a nʋ̃ɔ wa baar, ban lɛ bʋɔl wʋn nyaar ɔ? Yɩ ɩ nyaar, na yɩ tara nyã'maar kʋ taa."
Yesu pãa yin a jie 'lɔ na wa chen a Judiya paal, na wʋ tɩ gɔ̃ɔ a Jordan man. Nɩyɔɔ lɛ wa naa a wʋ sɛ̃ go, ka wʋ wile ba nɩtãa a lɛ wʋn ma wile ba.
A Faraseemɩne bamɩne wa naa ɩka ba wa bɛɛr wʋ kaa, na ba sʋʋr wʋ, "Sɔr ben be ka daba na tɔr a wʋ pɔɔ bar bɩɩ?"
Ka a Yesu mɩ sʋʋr ba, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a Mosesɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr?"
Ka ba 'yɛr, "Mosesɩ bar sɔr ɩka daba wʋ sɛb dãasɩɛ gãn tɩ na wʋ tɔr a wʋ pɔɔ bar."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A yɩ nyãkpɩ̃ɛn jũu lɛ so ka wʋ sɛb a lɛ.
Tɩchɛ a wɛr pielfʋ, Nãaŋmɩn maal daba nɩ pɔɔ.
A lɛ jũu, daba na bar a wʋ sãa nɩ a wʋ ma tɩchɛ ka 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ pɔɔ ɩ bʋ̃'yen,
ka ba jaa ayi ɩ ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen. Baa lɛ ɩ ayi ɛ, tɩ ɩ bʋ̃'yen.
A lɛ jũu, bon 'lɔ jaa Nãaŋmɩn na 'mataa, nɩrɛ wʋ ta nyɔɔ wɛl ɛ."
Ban wa lɩɛb kul a yir, a Yesu poturbo sʋʋr wʋ naa a 'yɛr nyã go.
Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Daba jaa na tɔr wʋ pɔɔ bar tɩ kul pɔɔ yuo, wʋ maal yelbier.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ, pɔɔ wa tɔr a wʋ sɩrɛ bar tɩ kul dayuo wʋ mɩ maal yelbier."
Nɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔ waara nɩ a ba bibiir ɩka Yesu wʋ dɔɔl ba a wʋ nũu, tɩchɛ ka a wʋ poturbo mii 'yɔ̃ɔ ba.
Yesu na wa nyɛ a lɛ a wʋ poturbo na ɩ, wʋ nyɛn suur na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ bar a bibiir ka ba wa a n sɛ̃, na yɩ ta ŋmaa ba sɔr ɛ. A ba nyãna taaba lɛ so a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ jaa na ba sɔɔ de a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ nɩtãa a bibile ɛ, wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ be ɛ."
Be lɛ wʋ 'mɔɔr a bibiir, tɩ dɔɔl ba nuur na wʋ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ ba.
Yesu na wa de a sɔr chiine, daba jon var gbur dumo a Yesu niem tɩ sʋʋr wʋ, "Wiwiilmɩ̃ɛ, bo lɛ ɩn maal, naa nyɛ nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ fʋ bʋɔl ma nɩmɩ̃ɛ? Nɩrɛ jaa ba ɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Fʋ bɔ̃ɔ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Nɛɛ. Taa kʋ nɩrɛ ɛ. Taa sɛ̃nɛ ɛ. Taa juro ɛ. Taa dire dãasɩjirɩ ɛ. Taa fɔlɔ ɛ. 'Yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʋ sãa nɩ a fʋ ma."
Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Wiwile, n bile sɔ̃ɔ jaa lɛ n turo a Nɛɛ anyãna wa tãn a dɩna."
Yesu kaa naa a daba nɩ nʋ̃fʋ, tɩ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "A chɛ fʋn yelbʋ̃'yen. Kul tɩ da a fʋ bonsɩ a jaa de põ nɔ̃n dẽme, ala lɛ fʋn tara bʋ̃mɩ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃. Tɩ na fʋ pãa wa turo ma."
A 'yɛr nyã vɛ̃ naa ka a daba sɔ̃ nie na wʋ kul pʋsɔ̃ɔ, bojũu tara sʋɔ lɛ wʋ ɩ.
Be lɛ ka a Yesu kaa gʋɔr na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo, "A tara sʋɔ kpɛfʋ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ ɩn kpɛ̃ɔ!"
A 'yɛrbie anyãna vɛ̃ naa ka ba nɛɛr 'maa, tɩchɛ ka wʋ lɛ 'yɛr go, "Bibiir, a ɩn kpɛ̃ɔ kʋ nɩrɛ jaa na na kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ!
An ɩn kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃, nyɔɔma na na kpɛ kparpĩi bɔɔ pɔ gar tara sʋɔ na na kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ."
Ka a poturbo pãa ɩ chĩcham, tɩ lɩɛb sʋrɔ taa, "An lɛ na pãa tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ faafʋ?"
Ka a Yesu kaa ba tɩ 'yɛr, "Nɩrɛ sɛ̃ 'lɔ, a ɩn tuo, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ba lɛ ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ yele jaa ba ɩ tuo ɛ."
Be lɛ Pita 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Nyɛ, sɩn bar bon jaa tɩ wa turo fʋ!"
Ka Yesu 'yɛr, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bar a wʋ yir bɩɩ yɛɛr, bɩɩ yɛpɔbɔ bɩɩ a wʋ sãa bɩɩ a wʋ ma, bɩɩ bibiir bɩɩ wɛr, tɩ 'la maa nɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã jũu,
wʋn nyɛn yɔɔ a dɩna. Wʋn nyɛn yie, yɛɛr, yɛpɔbɔ, mamɩne, bibiir nɩ wɛr dɔɔl gbɛɛ kɔbaa, nɩ a gefʋ! Tɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na waara, ka wʋ nyɛ nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a nɩyɔɔ bala na de nie na wa ben puor, ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na be a puor mɩ wa de a nie."
Ba dɔ̃ɔ de a sɔr duoro a Jerusalɛm ka Yesu de a nie, tɩ a wʋ poturbo nɛɛr 'maa ka bala mɩ na turo joro dãbɩ̃ɛ. Wʋ tɔɔ naa a Pie Nɩ Ayi yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ 'yɛr kʋ ba a lɛn na wa a wʋ sɛ̃.
Yesu 'yɛr naa, "Sɩn chiine a Jerusalɛm tẽe pɔ, be lɛ ban tɩ de a Nɩsaal Bie kʋ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe, ka ba ɩka wʋ sɛɛn kũu, na ba nyɔɔ wʋ kʋ a nɩbɛ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
A banyãna na la wʋ naa, na ba chɩr nataar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ, na ba fɔb wʋ tɩ kʋ wʋ. Ka a ber ata daar wʋn ir naa a kũu pɔ ɩ vʋr."
Be lɛ a Jebedee bibiir Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn tɔɔ gbʋr a Yesu na ba 'yɛr, "Wiwile, sɩ bʋɔrɔ na ɩka sɩ sʋɔr fʋ yele kɔ̃ɔ ka fʋ maal kʋ sɩ."
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr ba, "Bãa lɛ yɩ bʋɔrɔ ɩka n maal kʋ yɩ?"
Ka ba 'yɛr, "Vɛ̃ ka a sɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jɩ̃nɛ a fʋ nũsʋ̃ɔ loor, ka 'yen mɩ jɩ̃nɛ a fʋ gʋba loor a fʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a bon yɩn sʋɔrɔ ɛ. Yɩn tʋ̃ɔ nyũn a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele 'lɔ ɩn wa nyũn, bɩɩ kpɛ a dɔɔyɛ 'lɔ pɔ ɩn wa kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ sofʋ kaar ɔ?"
Ka a ba 'yɛr, "Ɔ̃ɔ." Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Yɩn nyũn a ŋmele 'lɔ ɩn na nyũn, na yɩ so a kʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn na so,
tɩchɛ a n nũsʋ̃ɔ loor nɩ a n gʋba loor 'lɔ n ba tara sɔr ɩka n kʋ yɩ ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ lɛ tara sɔr ɩka wʋ de a jiir anyãna kʋ a bala wʋn chɔɔr."
A poturbo pie bala na chɛ na wa wõ a yele, ba nyɛn suur 'yɔ̃ɔ a Jemesɩ nɩ a Jɔɔn.
Ka a Yesu bʋɔl ba jaa 'mataa tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa a bala na ɩ a nãmɩne a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ma fɩrɛ naa a nɩbɛ, ka a nɩbɛrɛ ma wile a ba kpɩ̃ɛn.
A ba ɩ lɛ lɛ a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ ɩ a yɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, wʋ ɩ a yɩ jaa tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃,
ka a 'lɔ mɩ na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ ɩ a nɩdiere, wʋ ɩ a yɩ jaa gbãgbaa.
A Nɩsaal Bie mɩ gba ba wa, ɩka ba wa tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ wʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ wa naa ɩka wʋ wa tʋ̃ kʋ ba, na wʋ de a wʋ nyɛvʋr lɩɛ faan nɩyɔɔ."
Ba pãa wa naa a Jeriko. Ban wa kpɛ a Jeriko tɩ yire, nɩyɔɔ turo naa Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo, ka a jɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Batimayus, Timeyus bidaba, jɩ̃nɛ a sɔr kõkoor sʋɔrɔ bomo.
Wʋn wa wõ ka a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ lɛ, ka wʋ piel gboolo, "Yesu, David Bie, kaa n nɩbaal!"
Ka a nɩbɛ bamɩne ɩka wʋ pɔɔ a nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka wʋ pãa chɛnɛ mal gboolo, "David Bie, kaa n nɩbaal!"
Be lɛ a Yesu tɛɛ ara tɩ 'yɛr, "Yɩ bʋɔl wʋ." Ka ba bʋɔl a jɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr wʋ, "'Maa nyãa! Ir ara, wʋ bʋɔlɔ fʋ naa."
Ka wʋ vaa ir lɔb a fɔbaa bar tɩ wa a Yesu sɛ̃.
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr wʋ, "Bãa fʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka n maal kʋ fʋ?" Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Wiwile, n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n nyɛrɛ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Chiine! Fʋ sa naa, fʋn sɔɔ ma jũu." Ajienaa, wʋ nyɛrɛ naa, na wʋ turo a Yesu ka ba de a sɔr.
A lɛ ban wa gbʋrɔ a Jerusalɛm, ba ta naa a tẽn ayi, Betefagɩ nɩ Betanɩ na be a Olive tɔ̃ɔ par, ka Yesu tʋ̃ wʋ poturbo ayi.
Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ chen a tẽbile 'lɔ na be a yɩ niem, Yɩn wa kpɩɛrɛ a tẽe pɔ, yɩn nyɛn bʋ̃bile nɩrɛ jaa na ba do wʋ sɛrɛ ɛ, ban lũ. Yɩ for waan.
Ka nɩrɛ wa sʋʋr yɩ ɩka bãa lɛ yɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ, yɩ 'yɛr wʋ ɩka, a yɩ Soro lɛ bʋɔrɔ wʋ, tɩ wʋn lɩɛb waan fɔɔ."
Ba chen tɩ nyɛ a bʋ̃bile ban lũ a yõo dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ. Ban wa foro,
nɩbɛ bamɩne na ara a be sʋʋr ba naa, "Bãa lɛ yɩ foro a bʋ̃bile ɩrɛ nɩ?"
Ka ba 'yɛr a lɛ a Yesu na ɩka ba 'yɛr, ka a nɩbɛ bar ba.
Be lɛ ba waan a bʋ̃bile wa kʋ a Yesu, na ba de a ba fɔɔr 'yɩɛr dɔɔl a bʋ̃bile ju, ka wʋ do jɩ̃nɛ.
Nɩyɔɔ na bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu jũu, ba den fɔɔr 'yɩɛr a sɔr pɔ, ka bamɩne mɩ kar vaɩ a por pɔ wa 'yɩɛr a sɔr pɔ.
Ka a bala na be a niem nɩ a bala na be a puor, pãa chɩlɛ gɔ̃nɔ̃ 'yɛrɛ, "Yãan yooo! Nãaŋmɩn wʋ sʋ̃ʋ a 'lɔ wʋn tʋ̃!
Nãaŋmɩn wʋ sʋ̃ʋ a sɩ sãa David nãalʋ̃ʋ na waara! Yãan yooo! Sɩ dãn Nãaŋmɩn yɔɔ jaa!"
Yesu na wa ta a Jerusalɛm, wʋ chen tɩ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʋ Yir kaa a bomo a jaa. A wɛr na sɔɔrɔ jũu, 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ poturbo pie nɩ ayi yin chen a Betanɩ.
A wɛr na wa chaar ka a Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo lɩɛb yi a Betanɩ waara a Jerusalɛm, kɔ̃ kpɛ naa a Yesu.
Be lɛ wʋ nyɛ a kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ na tɔ vaar ara a niem, ka wʋ chen ɩka wʋ tɩ kaa wɔ̃mɔ̃ ben be bɩɩ. Wʋ chen tɩ ta ka a ɩ wɔ̃mɔ̃ ba be be ɛ, vaar tɛɛ lɛ, bojũu a ba ɩ a wɔ̃mɔ̃ sɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɛ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a tɩɛ, "Nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ lɛ wa pɔr a fʋ wɔ̃mɔ̃ di ɛ." A wʋ poturbo wõ naa a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr.

Ban wa ta a Jerusalɛm, Yesu chen tɩ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʋ Yir bɛchaar pɔ dire a nɩbɛ bala na chiin a bonsɩ tɩ daara nɩ a bala na daara. Wʋ daa naa libitɛɛrbɛ tɛɛbʋlsɩ lɩɛb kpa, tɩ da a bala mɩ na daara a papasɩ dakɔɔr lɔb.
Waa sɔɔ ka a nɩrɛ jaa tuo bon jaa tun a bɛchaar 'lɔ pɔ ɛ.
Be lɛ ka wʋ pãa wile ba na wʋ 'yɛr, "A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa a wʋ gãn pɔ, 'N yir ɩ naa a yir a nɩbʋrɔ ba jaa na wa puor ma,' tɩchɛ ka a yɩn 'lɔ maal wʋ a nɩfarba jie."
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃ bʋɔrɔ sɔr 'lɔ ban tu kʋ wʋ, tɩ na ba joro wʋ dãbɩ̃ɛ bojũu a nɩyɔɔ nɛɛr 'maa ba naa a wʋ wiilfʋ pɔ.
A jãanʋɔr na wa ta, Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturo lɩɛb chen a Betanɩ.
A wɛr na wa chaar bibio ka ba lɩɛb chiine a Jerusalɛm, ba nyɛ naa ka ɩ a kɔ̃kɔ̃tɩɛ na kpi lɔ̃ɔn a nyɩbɛ.
Be lɛ ka a Pita tɩɛr a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr kʋ a tɩɛ, na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Wiwile, nyɛ a tɩɛ 'lɔ fʋn pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ! Wʋ kpi naa!"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ sɔɔ de Nãaŋmɩn.
Sɩrɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, ala ɩ yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ sɔɔ naa de Nãaŋmɩn na waa baala a wʋ tɩɛr pɔ ɛ, 'lɔ gba na tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ a tɔ̃ɔ nyãna, 'Ir tɩ lo a man pɔ,' a Nãaŋmɩn na sɔɔ naa ka a lɛ ɩ.
Ala lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, fʋ̃ʋ puor Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔr bon jaa tɩ sɔɔ ɩka, wʋn ɩn kʋ fʋ, wʋn ɩ naa.
Fʋ̃ʋ wa ɩka fʋ puor, tɩ tara nɩrɛ nɩ 'yɛr, vɛ̃ kʋ a nɩnyɩnɛ. A fʋ Sãa na be a saaju mɩ na vɛ̃ naa a fʋ yelbier kʋ fʋ."
Ba lɛ wa naa a Jerusalɛm go, ka a Yesu tɩ kpɛ yʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʋ Yir bɛchaar pɔ. A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ wa naa a wʋ sɛ̃.
Ba wa sʋʋr wʋ naa, "An lɛ kʋ fʋ a sɔr ka fʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyã? Fʋ tara naa a sɔr ɩka fʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyã ɔ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "N sʋʋr yɩ sʋʋrfʋ bʋ̃'yen. Yɩn wa tʋ̃ɔ wiil ma a par, n mɩ na wiil yɩ naa a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kʋ ma a sɔr ka n tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyã.
Jɔɔn na dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʋ wʋ a sɔr bɩɩ, nɩbɛ lɛ kʋ wʋ a sɔr? Yɩ 'yɛr n kaa!"
