A ba lɩɛb chɩrɛ taa, "Sɩn be 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ tʋ̃ wʋ, wʋn sʋʋr sɩ naa, ka bo lɛ so ka saa sɔɔ wʋ ɛ?
Tɩchɛ sɩn mɩ 'yɛr ɩka nɩrɛ lɛ tʋ̃ wʋ, a ba ɩ ɛ." Ba joro naa a nɩbɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ, bojũu nɩrɛ jaa sɔɔ naa ɩka a Jɔɔn ɩn Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
Lɛ lɛ ba 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu, "Saa bɔ̃ɔ ɛ." Ka a Yesu mɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "N mɩ kʋ̃ 'yɛr kʋ yɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kʋ ma a sɔr ka n tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyãna ɛ."

Ka a Yesu lɛ piel 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ ba nɩ sʋkpa. Wʋ 'yɛr naa, "Daba lɛ kɔ wʋ puo na wʋ bʋr tɩwɔ̃nsɩ. Wʋ wɔɔ naa a puo wʋ jaa jilʋ̃, na wʋ tuu bɔɔ ka ban ma pɔr a wɔ̃mɔ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ na ba nɛŋmɛr ir a kʋ̃ɔ. Wʋ mɛn jie ɩ̃sʋɔ na do ka nɩrɛ na ma do jɛ̃ a be kaara a puo. Wʋ de naa a puo na wʋ kʋ nɩbɛ ɩka ba kaara tɩ na wʋ yɔ chen paal yuo pɔ.
A wɔ̃fʋ sɔ̃ɔ wa ta naa ka wʋ tʋ̃ a wʋ gbãgbaa ɩ̃sʋɔ ɩka wʋ chen a nɩbɛ bala sɛ̃ tɩ de a wɔ̃mɔ̃ amɩne.
Tɩchɛ ka ba nyɔɔ wʋ ŋme bar ka wʋ kul nũjaal.
Be lɛ wʋ lɛ tʋ̃ a gbãgbaa ɩ̃sʋɔ ka ba lɛ ŋme wʋ a ju puo tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ vĩ.
Wʋ lɛ tʋ̃n ɩ̃sʋɔ ka ba kʋ a 'lɔ. Ka wʋ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃ bamɩne, ka ba pɔb bamɩne tɩ kʋ a bamɩne.
"Wʋ chen nɩbʋ̃'yen wʋn na tʋ̃, 'lɔ lɛ a wʋ bibʋ̃'yen wʋn nʋ̃. 'Lɔ lɛ wʋ wa tʋ̃ a baaraa jaa na wʋ 'yɛr, 'Ban 'yɔ̃ɔ naa a n bie.'
"Tɩchɛ a pokaarba na wa nyɛ a bie, ba 'yɛr kʋ taa, 'A nyã lɛ ɩ a bʋ̃dire! Yɩ ɩ a sɩ kʋ wʋ, tɩ chɛ ka a bonsɩ ɩ a sɩ sofʋ.'
Be lɛ ba nyɔɔ wʋ kʋ lɔb bar a puo kõkoor.
"Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tɩɛr ɩka a puo sʋɔ na ɩ naa? Wʋn wan wa kʋ a pokaarba banyãna ba jaa tɩ de a puo kʋ nɩyor!
Yaa kar a jie nyã a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɛ? Wʋ 'yɛr ɩka, 'A kʋsɩr 'lɔ a mɩmɩɛrbɛ na tɔr bar lɛ ɩ a kʋsɩr ju.
A sɩ Soro lɛ tʋ̃ a nɩtɔ̃ ka sɔb sɩ a nɩbie.' "
Be lɛ a Juu nɩbɛrɛ bʋɔrɔ sɔr ɩka ba nyɔɔ a Yesu, bojũu ba bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka bala lɛ wʋ lɔb a sʋkpa gbɛb. Tɩchɛ ba joro naa a nɩyɔɔ bala dãbɩ̃ɛ, na ba bar wʋ tɩ lɩɛb chen.
Ba lɛ tʋ̃ naa a Faraseemɩne bamɩne nɩ nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a nãa Hɛrɔd sɛ̃, ka ba wa bɛr Yesu nɛɛ nyɔɔ wʋ, a wʋ 'yɛrbie pɔ.

Ba wa na wa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Wiwile, sɩ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka fʋ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ. Nɩbɛ 'yɛrbie maa tʋ̃ɔ a fʋ pʋtɩɛr lɩɛb ɛ, bojũu fʋ maa chɛlɛ a lɛ nɩrɛ jaa na be ɛ. Tɩchɛ fʋ wile na a Nãaŋmɩn sɔr nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ. A tara naa sɔr ɩka sɩ yab a lõpo kʋ a nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa bɩɩ?
Sɩ yab bɩɩ sɩ ta yab ɛ?" Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu bɔ̃ɔn a ba nɛbɛr yele ban waan, na wʋ sʋʋr ba, "Bo lɛ yɩ bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ bɛɛr ma kaa? Yɩ de a libir ɩ̃sʋɔ waan ka n kaa."
Be lɛ ba de a libir kur ɩ̃sʋɔ waan, ka wʋ sʋʋr ba, "An foto nɩ a yuor lɛ be a libir pɔ?" Ka ba 'yɛr, "Siisa lɛ."
Lɛ lɛ ka Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ de a 'lɔ na ɩ a Siisa sofʋ na yɩ yab wʋ, na yɩ mɩ de a 'lɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sofʋ na yɩ mɩ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn." Ka ba faa tɩ nyɔɔr a nɛɛr ara nɩ.
A nɩbɛ bamɩne ban bʋɔlɔ a Saduseemɩne na 'yɛr ɩka kũu pɔ irfʋ ba be be ɛ, mɩ wa naa wa sʋʋr wʋ,
"Wiwile, Mosesɩ sɛb kʋ sɩ ɩka nɩrɛ yɛbɛ wa kpi tɩ bar pɔɔ na ba tara bie ɛ, a wʋ yɛbɛ wʋ kul a pɔɔkʋɔr 'lɔ na wʋ dɔɔ bibiir kʋ a wʋ yɛbɛ 'lɔ na kpi.
Yɛɛr ayopõi lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, ka ba kpɛ̃ɛ kul pɔɔ kpi tɩ chɛ bar, waa tara bie ɛ.
Ka a wʋ turo de a pɔɔkʋɔr kul, baa mɩ dɔɔ bie ɛ, tɩchɛ ka wʋ mɩ kpi. A lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ a turo ata sʋɔ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa a yɛɛr ayopõi banyãna ba jaa kulnaa a pɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, tɩ waa dɔɔ bie ɛ, a baaraa jaa ka a pɔɔ mɩ kpi.
Bala wa ir yi a kũu pɔ, an pɔɔ lɛ wʋn ɩ, an ɩ ba jaa kul wʋn lʋɔr taa?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Yaa nyɛ yɩn bɔr, bojũu yaa bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛbɛ nɩ a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ.
Nɩbɛ wa ir a kũu pɔ ba kʋ̃ lɛ kul taa ɛ, tɩ ban kaara naa fɩka a malakasɩ, baa kulo taa ɛ.
A kũu pɔ irfʋ yele yɩ kar a Mosesɩ gãn pɔ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋn nyɛ a tɩbile na 'lɩrɛ bũu, ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'N ɩ naa a Abraham Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Isaakɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn.'
Wʋ ɩ naa vʋr Nãaŋmɩn, waa ɩ kũn Nãaŋmɩn ɛ. Yɩ tul naa."
A Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wile ɩ̃sʋɔ wa ara na chɛl a lɛ a Yesu nɩ a nɩbɛ na 'mataa 'yɛrɛ. Ka wʋ nyɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr nʋ̃mɔ̃. Ka wʋ mɩ sʋʋr a Yesu, "A Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛr a jaa pɔ, buor sʋɔ lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ?"
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "A 'lɔ na ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar a jaa nɩ nyã, 'A Isɩral nɩbɛ, yɩ chɛlɛ! A sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn, wʋ ɩ naa Soro bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ.
Nʋ̃ a fʋ Soro Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a fʋ nyãa, nɩ a fʋ nyɛvʋr wʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ tɩɛr wʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ kpɛ̃ɔ wʋ jaa.'
A 'lɔ na tu nɩ nyã, 'Nʋ̃ a fʋ tɔ sʋɔ nɩtãa lɛ fʋn nʋ̃ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ.' Nɛɛ jaa ba be be ɩ kpɛ gar a anyã ɛ."
Ka a daba 'yɛr, "Wiwile, fʋ 'yɛr yelmɩ̃ɛ, a lɛ fʋn 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ be be, ka ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba lɛ be be pʋɔ wʋ ɛ.
A fʋ nʋ̃ wʋ nɩ a fʋ nyãa, nɩ a fʋ tɩɛr wʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ kpɛ̃ɔ wʋ jaa, na fʋ lɛ nʋ̃ a fʋ tɔ sʋɔ nɩtãa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ, a yele anyãna tufʋ ɩn gar dʋ̃n fʋn kʋ chʋm kʋ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ bɔɔrlorsɩ a jaa."
Yesu na nyɛ a lɛ a daba na 'yɛr nɩ yɛ̃ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Faa jãa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ ɛ." An yi a be chiine nɩrɛ jaa ba lɛ 'la sʋʋr wʋ sʋʋrfʋ go ɛ.
A lɛ a Yesu na wile a Puorfʋ Yir bɛchaar pɔ, wʋ sʋʋr naa a nɩbɛ, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a ta ka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe 'yɛr ɩka David bie lɛ a Nɩ-iraa?
A ba ɩ a David mɩ̃ɛ pɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, ka wʋ 'yɛr ɩka, 'A n Soro Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ a n Soro nyã wʋn ir, "Jɩ̃nɛ a n nũsʋ̃ɔ loor ka n wa de a fʋ dɔ̃dẽme bin a fʋ gbɛɛ pĩlem." '
Ala ɩ David mɩ̃ɛ bʋɔl wʋ naa a wʋ Soro, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʋn lɛ ɩ a wʋ bie tɛɛ?" Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala ara chɛlɛ wʋ nɩ pʋpɛl.
Yesu wile naa tɩ na wʋ kpãa ba, "Yɩ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe sɛ̃, ba ma su naa a fuu vɛɛsɩ ala yʋɔrɔ ɩka ba puor ba a dar pɔ.
Bala be wa kpɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie, a niem lɛ ba ma jɩ̃nɛ.
Ba mɩ ma fɔlɔ naa a pɔɔkɔɛ, na ba mɩ ma puor Nãaŋmɩn kor, bʋɔrɔ ɩka nɩbɛ ba kaara ba. A nɩbɛ banyãna 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ na kpɛ̃mɛ naa."
Yesu jɛ̃n gbʋr a jie ban 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a libie a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʋ Yir pɔ, na wa kaara a lɛ a nɩyɔɔ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a ba libie. Taraa dẽme yɔɔ jaa lɔɔrɔ naa yɔɔ.
Be lɛ ka a pɔɔkɔnɔ̃ɔ sʋɔ mɩ be be na wʋ mɩ waan libikue ayi na ɩ kobo wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a libie pɔ.
Ka Yesu bʋɔl a wʋ poturbo ka ba tɔɔ gbʋr wʋ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, a pɔɔkɔnɔ̃ɔ sʋɔ nyã lɔb gar ba jaa.
A tara dẽme ma 'yɔ̃ɔn tɩ chɛ a libiyɔɔ amɩne, tɩchɛ a pɔɔkɔnɔ̃ɔ sʋɔ nyã 'lɔ, a jaa lɛ wʋ de 'yɔ̃ɔ. Waa lɛ tara bon jaa go ɛ."
Yesu na wa yire a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʋ Yir pɔ, a wʋ poturo ɩ̃sʋɔ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Wiwile, nyɛ a kʋsɩbɛ ban mɛn a yir kpɛ̃ɛ nyã ka wʋ kaara ka!"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr sɔɔ wʋ, "Mɩ fʋ nyɛ naa a lɛ ban mɛ a yir kpɛ̃ɛ nyãna? A kʋsɩvɩɛl anyãna 'yen jaa kʋ̃ lɛ wa chɛnɛ dɔɔl wʋ tɔ ju ɛ. Ban dãn a jaa lɔb."
Yesu na wa jɩ̃nɛ a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju, a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʋ Yir nidaa, Pita nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn nɩ Andiru sʋʋr wʋ naa a ba tɛɛ,
"'Yɛr kʋ sɩ a daar 'lɔ a anyã na ɩ. Bo lɛ na ɩ a jɩ̃nɛ sɛrɛ tɩ chɛ ka a wa ɩ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ka nɩrɛ jaa ta wa bɛl yɩ ɛ!
Nɩyɔɔ na de naa maa yuor waan wa 'yɛrɛ, 'Maa lɛ a Yesu,' na ba wa bɛlɛ nɩyɔɔ.
Yɩn wa wõn tam, ka ba 'yɛrɛ a tam 'yɛr, yɩ taa mɩrɛ ɛ. A lɛ na ɩ naa, tɩchɛ a wɛr baarfʋ chɛnɛ na be puor.
Nɩbʋr dẽdẽme na yin tam, ka a nãmɩne mɩ yi tam. Ka a tẽgãn dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ jiir yɔɔ, ka kɔ̃ mɩ lo. A dɔɔyɛ anyãna lɛ ɩ a pielfʋ.

"Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn, ɩka ban ma nyɔɔr yɩn chiin a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie, na ba lɛ pɔb yɩ, a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir. A maa yɩn sɔɔ jũu, ban tara yɩn chiin a tẽe nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nãmɩne jie, ɩka ba tɩ tɔɔr a yɩ 'yɛr, tɩ yɩn tu naa a be 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ ba.
A 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã na den nie ta a nɩbʋrɔ ba jaa.

Bala wa nyɔɔr yɩ chiin a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka tɩɛr nyɔɔ yɩ a lɛ yɩn tɩ 'yɛr ɛ. Lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na wiil yɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ sɔ̃ɔ, 'yɛr wʋ. A ba ɩ yɩn lɛ 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ a 'yɛrbie yi naa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛ̃.
"Yɛbɛ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ yɛbɛ, ka ba kʋ wʋ, ka a sãa mɩ gar 'yɔ̃ɔ bie, ka ba kʋ wʋ. Bibiir kʋ̃ lɛ wõnõ a ba sãamɩne toor ɛ, na ba vɛ̃ ka ba kʋ a ba sãamɩne.
Nɩrɛ jaa na 'laar yɩ naa, yɩn sɔɔ ma jũu, tɩ 'lɔ na sɔɔ tɩ ta a baaraa, na nyɛn Nãaŋmɩn faafʋ.

"Yɩn nyɛ naa a yele 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'laar na be a jie 'lɔ an ba sɛɛ ɛ, na wʋ sɔ̃ɔ a jie, na wʋ vɛ̃ ka a wʋ suur dire. A fʋ̃ʋ nyã na kara bɔ̃ɔ a par. Yɩn wa nyɛ a lɛ, nɩbɛ na be a Judiya ba jo do a tɔ̃ɔ ju.
Nɩrɛ jaa na be gar ju, ta suu a die pɔ tɩ de bon jaa ɛ.
'Lɔ mɩ na be a puo pɔ, ta lɛ chen tɩ de a wʋ fɔbaa ɛ.
A bɩbir nyãna an ɩn tuo kʋ a pɔɔpʋʋr nɩ a bala na tara a bi'yɛnsɩ.
Yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a ta wa ɩ uon ɛ.
A ber ala pɔ, nɩbɛ na din dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ. Nãaŋmɩn na maal a wɛr baa di a dɔɔyɛ nyã bʋrɔ ɛ, tɩ ba mɩ kʋ̃ lɛ wa di wʋ go ɛ.
Ala ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn ba ŋmaa a ber ala bar ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ chɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ a bala wʋn chɛl ir jũu, wʋ ŋmaan bar.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, nɩrɛ wa 'yɛr kʋ yɩ ɩka yɩ nyɛ a Nɩ-iraa a ka, bɩɩ kasɛn lɛ wʋ be, yɩ taa sɔɔrɔ ɛ.

Bojũu a jire Nɩ-iraa nɩ a jire 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na wa na wa tʋ̃nɔ̃ a lɛ a nɩbɛ na ba dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ ɛ, na ba maala yelbɛrɛ fɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʋ ba a kpɛ̃ɔ. Na ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba bɛl a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na chɛl ir, ala ɩ ban tʋ̃ɔ naa.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn! N den nie 'yɛr kʋ yɩ.
"Tɩchɛ a dɔɔyɛ nyã baarfʋ sɔ̃ɔ, 'Mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na lii naa, ka a ŋmɛraa kʋ̃ mɩ lɛ chaar ɛ,
Ka a ŋmɛrbie pɔrɔ yire a saaju loro, tɩ a saaju wʋ jaa dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.'
"A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, ban nyɛn a Nɩsaal Bie na waara a julõjuur pɔ, nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ tɩɩr.
Wʋn tʋ̃ naa a wʋ malakasɩ, ka ba wa lɔ̃ɔ taa a bala wʋn chɛl ir a wɛr wʋ jaa, tɩ yin a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʋ jie tɩ tɔ a mʋrfʋ jie.
"Yɩ de a pɔlpɔl tɩɛ yele jãn yɛ̃. 'Lɔ wa tʋɔrɔ a vaar yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a tʋl sɔ̃ɔ gbʋr naa.
A lɛ mɩ nɩ wʋ ju lɛ, yɩn wa nyɛ a lɛ n 'yɛr kʋ yɩ na ɩrɛ, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a sɔ̃ɔ gbʋr naa jaa yɛ̃yɛ̃.
N 'yɛrɛ naa yelmɩ̃ɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, ɩka a pʋ̃pãanyã nɩbɛ kʋ̃ kpi baar ɛ, tɩ yɩ nyɛ a yele anyãna ka a ɩ.
A saaju nɩ a wɛr na wa baar naa tɩchɛ maa 'yɛrbie dɔ̃ɔ kʋ̃ wa baar ɛ.
"Nɩrɛ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ a bɩbir nyã ɛ, bɩɩ a sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a malakasɩ gba na be a saaju ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a Bie mɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a Sãa tɛɛ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ.
Yɩ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ vɩla! Yɩ kaar sʋ̃! Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
An kaar naa fɩka yir sʋɔ na wa yʋɔrɔ tɩ de a wʋ yir 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ nuur pɔ, na wʋ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa nɩ wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃, tɩ mɩ 'yɛr kʋ a dɔ̃dɔr guro ka wʋ kaara.
A lɛ jũu yɩ kaara tɩ guro wʋ, bojũu yaa bɔ̃ɔ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a yir sʋɔ na na lɩɛb wa ɛ. Amɩne kɔ̃ɔ a wa ɩ jãanʋɔr, bɩɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ bɩ̃ɩn, bɩɩ nɔrsɩ na kõnõ, bɩɩ bibio pipi.
Yɩ ta wa vɛ̃ ka wʋ wa dũu yɩ a yɩ be gʋ̃ɔ pɔ ɛ.
A lɛ n 'yɛr kʋ yɩ, nɩrɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛr kʋ yɩ kaar sʋ̃!"
A chen ber ayi ka ban di a Gõl Bar Difʋ nɩ a Paanʋ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʋ, ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe bʋɔrɔ vuo 'lɔ ban na tu sɔɔl nyɔɔ a Yesu kʋ.
Tɩchɛ ka ba 'yɛr, "A ta ɩ a lɔ̃ɔfʋ sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, ka a jɛɛr taa ir a chara pɔ ɛ."

Yesu na wa be a Betanɩ a Simon 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a kɔ̃kɔn yir, ka ba 'mataa dire, pɔɔ kɔ̃ɔ wa waan na pɩ̃rtɔvɩla nɩ kãnyũu kɔ̃ɔ dafʋ na ba wõnõ ɛ. A pɔɔ kpɩr naa a pɩ̃rtʋɔ nyĩe tɩ kpaar a kãnyũu ala dɔɔl a Yesu ju.
Ka a nɩbɛ bala na be be nyɛ suur tɩ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa, "Bo lɛ so ka wʋ sɔ̃ɔ a kãnyũu nyã bar a nɩtɔ̃?
Wʋn taa den da nɩbʋ̃'yen yuon gbul sãyar libie na wʋ de kʋ nɔ̃n dẽme." Tɩ mii 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ bar wʋ! Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ mii 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ? Wʋ maal vɩla kʋ ma.
A nɔ̃n dẽme 'lɔ, yɩn nɩ bala ben ka. Yɩn tʋ̃ɔ sʋ̃ʋ ba sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa yɩn bʋɔrɔ, tɩchɛ maa kʋ̃ be a yɩ sɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ jaa ɛ.
Wʋ ɩ naa a lɛ wʋn tʋ̃ɔ. Wʋ kpaar a kãnyũu 'yɔ̃ɔ ma tɩ chɛ ka n ba kpi sɛrɛ ɛ, na wʋ chɔɔr ma guro nɩ a n ũufʋ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, jie jaa ban wa 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna a wɛr wʋ jaa pɔ, ban 'yɛr naa a lɛ a pɔɔ nyã na ɩ na ba chɛnɛ tara a wʋ tɩɛr."
A Pie nɩ Ayi bala wʋn kaa ir ɩ̃sʋɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a Judas Isɩkariyot chen a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr ba ɩka wʋ bʋɔrɔ na ɩka wʋ de a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba nuur pɔ.
Ban wa wõ a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr ka a nʋ̃mɔ̃ ba, ka ba 'yɛr ɩka ban kʋ wʋn libie. Ka a Judas pãa bʋɔrɔ vuo 'lɔ wʋn na tu de a Yesu kʋ ba.
A bɩbir dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩ naa a Paanʋ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʋ, ka ban na kʋ a pele na ba di a Gõl Bar Difʋ, Yesu poturbo sʋʋr wʋ naa, "Nyɩnɛ lɛ fʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ chen tɩ chɔɔr a Gõl Bar nyã bʋ̃diir a fʋ tɩ di?"
Wʋ tʋ̃ naa a wʋ poturbo ayi, na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ chen a tẽe pɔ, daba na tuo kʋ̃ɔ nɩ dʋʋ na tuor yɩ naa. Yɩ turo wʋ.
A yir 'lɔ pɔ wʋn wa tɩ kpɛ, yɩ sʋʋr a yir sʋɔ, 'A Wiwile ɩka sɩ wa sʋʋr fʋ, "Nyɩnɛ lɛ a 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ poturbo na wa 'mataa di a Gõl Bar Difʋ?" '
Wʋn wiil yɩ naa bɔɔpɩɛ ban chɔɔr. Yɩ maal a bʋ̃diir a be."
Ba yin chen a tẽe tɩ nyɛ a lɛ jaa a Yesu na 'yɛr kʋ ba. Ka ba maal a Gõl Bar bʋ̃diir.
Jãanʋɔr na wa ta, Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo Pie nɩ Ayi wa naa.
Ban wa dire, wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ na tɩ gar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma; ɩ̃sʋɔ sɩn 'mataa dire nɩ a labʋ̃'yen pɔ."
Be lɛ ka ba jaa pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ ka ba sʋrɔ wa bʋ̃'yen 'yen, "Maa lɛ ɔ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "A yɩ Pie nɩ Ayi ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ! A yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ sɩn 'mataa tũno a labʋ̃'yen pɔ lɛ.
A Nɩsaal Bie na kpi naa nɩtãa lɛ ban sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ. Tɩchɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nɩsaal Bie na din dɔɔyɛ gar nɩrɛ jaa! Ka bala ta ba dɔɔ wʋ ɛ, ala sa."
Ban wa dire ka a Yesu de a paanʋ̃ɔ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ ŋmaa de kʋ a wʋ poturbo, na wʋ 'yɛr, "Yɩ de, a n ɩ̃gãn lɛ."
Wʋ lɛ den a ŋmele 'lɔ ban nyuro nɩ, na wʋ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ lɛ de kʋ ba, ka ba jaa nyũ.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "N jɩ̃ɩ lɛ a anyã na vɛ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛtɩraa na tara kpɛ̃ɔ, an chir naa, na a faa nɩyɔɔ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, n kʋ̃ lɛ nyũ a dãa anyãna ɛ, wa tɩ tãn a daar 'lɔ ɩn na nyũ a bʋ̃paalaa a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ."
Ban wa yiel yiel dãn Nãaŋmɩn, ba suun chen a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju.
Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ jaa na jon tɩ bar ma, nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr a wʋ gãn pɔ, Ɩn ŋme naa pɛchinɛ kʋ ka a piir yɛ̃yɛl.
Tɩchɛ maa wa ir a kũu pɔ, ɩn de yɩn nie chen a Galilee."
Ka a Pita chɛ nyãa 'yɛr, "Ala ɩ gba, ba jaa sɔɔn bar fʋ tɩ maa 'lɔ kʋ̃ bar fʋ ɛ."
Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a Pita, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ fʋ, dɩna tɩ̃sɔɔ, a nɔrdɔ̃ɔ kʋ̃ kõ gbɛɛ ayi sɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ fʋ 'yɛr gbɛɛ ata ɩka faa bɔ̃ɔ ma ɛ."
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita 'yɛr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa ɩka, "Maa nɩ fʋ̃ʋ na 'mantaa kpi gba, tɩ n kʋ̃ 'yɛr ɩka n ba bɔ̃ɔ fʋ ɛ." Ka a bala mɩ na chɛ 'yɛr a lɛ nɛ.
Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo chen naa a jie 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Getɩsemanɩ, ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ jɩ̃nɛ a kana, tɩ ka n chen tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn."
Be lɛ wʋ tara Pita nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn 'mataa chiin ka a wʋ pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ jaa, ka tɩɛr nyɔɔ wʋ yɔɔ.
Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "N tɩɛr sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩ nyɛtãan kũu. Yɩ jɩ̃nɛ a kana gu ma tɩ na yɩ taa guro ɛ."
Wʋ chen naa a niem bɩ̃lãa tɩ lo kpa tẽe sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɩka ala ɩ a tara naa ɩfʋ kɔ̃ɔ, wʋ vɛ̃ ka a sɔ̃ɔ nyãna po wʋ.
Wʋ 'yɛr naa, "N Sãa, yele jaa ba gar a fʋ maalfʋ ɛ. De a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele nyãna bar a n sɛ̃, tɩchɛ a ta tu maa bɔfʋ ɛ, a tu a lɛ fʋ̃ʋ na bʋɔrɔ."
Wʋ lɩɛb chen a poturbo sɛ̃ tɩ nyɛ ka a ɩ ba gur naa. Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a Simon Pita, "Simon, fʋ guro naa ɔ? A fʋ kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ jɛ̃ bɩ̃lãa gu ma ɛ?
Yɩ jɛ̃ gu chɛlɛ, na yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a bɛɛrkaa ta wa tʋ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ. A yɩ tɩɛr 'lɔ bʋɔrɔ naa tɩchɛ ka a yɩ ɩ̃gãma ba tʋɔr ɛ."
Wʋ lɛ chen naa tɩ puor a Nãaŋmɩn a lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju.
Wʋ lɩɛb wa nyɛ ba go ka a ɩ ba gur naa bojũu gʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ba naa. Baa bɔ̃ɔ ŋmɩnɛ ban lɛ 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu ɛ.
Wʋ lɩɛb wa a ba sɛ̃ a gbɛɛ ata sɔ̃ɔ wa sʋʋr ba, "Yɩ chɛnɛ na gã guro na yɩ pɛ̃nɛ ɔ? A sɛɛ naa! A sɔ̃ɔ ta naa. Nyɛ, ba gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nɩsaal Bie kʋ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ!
Yɩ vaa ir, ka sɩ chen a ba sɛ̃. Nyɛ, a n gagaraa na waara!"

Yesu na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ lɛ ka Judas na ɩ a wʋ poturo pie nɩ ayi ɩ̃sʋɔ tɩ daasãa, nɩ nɩbɛ na tara sɔbɛrɛ nɩ dakʋrsɩ waara nɩ a Yesu nyɔɔfʋ jie. A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ lɛ tʋ̃ ba.
Judas dɔ̃ɔ wiil a nɩbɛ mana ɩka, "A 'lɔ ɩn na tɩ puor mʋʋr a kɔtɩr yɩ nyɔɔ a 'lɔ, na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ tara wʋ chiin."
Ban wa ta, Judas pɔɔn chen a Yesu sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, "Wiwile!" Tɩ puor wʋ nɩ mʋʋrfʋ.
Ka a bala wʋn chiin nyɔɔ a Yesu.
Be lɛ ka a bala ɩ̃sʋɔ na ara gbʋr a Yesu vʋ̃ɔ a wʋ sʋɔ chɛn a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa gbãgbaa toor ŋmaa.
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr ba, "A mɔ̃ nɩbier lɛ n ɩ ka yɩ waan sɔbɛrɛ, nɩ dakʋrsɩ a n nyɔɔfʋ jie ɔ?
Bɩbir jaa lɛ n ma dɔ̃ɔ be a yɩ sɛ̃, na n wile yɩ a Puorfʋ Yir pɔ, tɩ yaa nyɔɔ ma ɛ. Tɩchɛ a ɩ naa a lɛ ɩka a tu a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr."
Be lɛ a Yesu poturbo ba jaa bar wʋ tɩ jo.
Pɔlbile kɔ̃ɔ mɩ na vaar fɔbaa tɛɛ turo nɩ a Yesu, ba nyɔɔ wʋ naa.
Ka wʋ mɩɩr a fɔbaa 'yɔ̃ɔ ba tɩ jon sal'mʋɔr.
Be lɛ ba chiin a Yesu a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa yir, ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ 'matãan a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe, na ɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ nɩbɛrɛ, wa lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Pita mɩ turo naa a puor jaa na wʋ wa tɩ kpɛ a bɔɔrlo nãa yir bɛchaar pɔ, na wʋ 'mataa jɩ̃nɛ nɩ a bala na kara a Puorfʋ Yir uoro bũu.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ nɩbɛrɛ na chɛ bʋɔrɔ yele kɔ̃ɔ na wiil ɩka Yesu sɛɛn kũu, tɩ baa nyɛ ɛ.
Nɩyɔɔ mɩ ŋman jirsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ, tɩchɛ a ba 'yɛrbie ŋma taa poe.
Ka a bamɩne mɩ ir ŋmaa jire 'yɛr ɩka,
"A ba sɛ̃, wʋ 'yɛr naa ɩka, 'A Puorfʋ Yir nyãna a nɩrɛ nũu na mɛ, ɩn ŋmɛr wʋ naa tɩ na n de ber ata mɛn 'lɔ na ba ɩ nɩrɛ nũu bʋ̃mɩɛraa ɛ.' "
Tɩchɛ a ba 'yɛr mɩ ba ɩ bʋ̃'yen ɛ.
Be lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa ir ara tɩ sʋʋr a Yesu, "Faa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr sɔɔrɔ ba bɩɩ? Bo dãasɩɛsɩ lɛ anyãna ban dire dɔɔlɔ fʋ. A ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ ɔ?"
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu ɩ jaa gbul, waa 'yɛr sɔɔ wʋ ɛ. Ka a bɔɔrlo nãa lɛ sʋʋr wʋ go, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ sɩn 'Yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Bie na ɩ a Nɩ-iraa ɔ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Maa lɛ. Yɩn nyɛ naa a Nɩsaal Bie na jɩ̃nɛ a Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ nũsʋ̃ɔ loor. Yɩ mɩ na lɛ nyɛn wʋn waara a julõjuur pɔ."
Ka a bɔɔrlo nãa tɔɔ a fuu chɩɛr nɩ suur, tɩ sʋʋr, "Bãa lɛ sɩn lɛ bʋɔrɔ nɩrɛ ɩka wʋ lɛ 'yɛr a wʋ 'yɛr go?
Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ wõ naa a lɛ wʋn fere. Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ tɩɛr?" Ka ba jaa 'yɛr ɩka wʋ sɛɛn kũu.
Be lɛ a bamɩne piel chɩrɛ nataar 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʋ, ka a bamɩne mɩ pɔɔ a wʋ nɩbie tɩ ŋme wʋ, tɩ sʋʋr wʋ, "Wiil sɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ŋme fʋ." Ka a bala mɩ na guro a Puorfʋ Yir mɩ ŋme ŋme wʋ.
Pita jɩ̃nɛ naa a be a bɛchaar pɔ, ka a bɔɔrlo nãa gbãgbapɔɔbile ɩ̃sʋɔ wa wa.
Wʋn wa nyɛ a Pita na uoro a bũu, wʋ kaa wʋ naa lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ 'yɛr, "Fʋ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ turo a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ."
Ka a Pita chɩɩr tɩ 'yɛr, "N ba bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ fʋn 'yɛrɛ par ɛ." Tɩ na wʋ tɔɔ chen tɩ ara a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ.
A pɔɔbile na wa nyɛ a Pita a be, wʋ lɛ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ na ara a be, "A nyã mɩ ɩ naa a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ."
Ka a Pita lɛ chɩɩr go. A ba kor ɛ, tɩ a bala na ara gbʋr a Pita mɩ 'yɛr, "Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, fʋ ɩ naa a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ, bojũu Galilee lɛ fʋ mɩ yi."
Ka a Pita pɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, tɩ pɔrɔ kʋrɔ ba 'yɛrɛ ɩka, "N ba bɔ̃ɔ a daba nyã 'yɛr yɩn 'yɛr ɛ."

Ajienaa lɛ ka a nɔraa mɩ tɔ̃ɔ kõ a gbɛɛ ayi sʋɔ. Ka a Pita pãa tɩɛrtɔ a lɛ a Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Fʋn chɩɩr ma naa gbɛɛ ata, tɩ ka a nɔrdɔ̃ɔ kõ gbɛɛ ayi." Pita na wa tɩɛr bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ, ka wʋ kõ yɔɔ jaa.
A wɛr na wa chaar bibio, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ nɩbɛrɛ na chɛ, lɔ̃ɔn guor taa lũ a Yesu tara wʋ chiin tɩ kʋ a nãa Pilate.
Ka a Pilate sʋʋr wʋ, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa ɔ?" Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Ɔ̃ɔ, a ɩn a lɛ fʋn 'yɛr."
Ka a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Yesu yuor.
Be lɛ a Pilate sʋʋr a Yesu, "Faa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr jaa ɛ, nyɛ lɛ ban sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ fʋ a yuor jɩ̃!"
Tɩchɛ Yesu ba haa nɛɛ ɛ, ka a 'maa a Pilate nɛɛ.
A mɩ ɩ naa a ba tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ ka bala wa lɔ̃ɔ taa dire a Gõl Bar Difʋ, a ba nãa ma ir nɩrɛ 'lɔ a nɩbɛ na bʋɔrɔ a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ bar.
Barabasɩ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ pʋɔ a nɩbɛ bamɩne pɔ, na dɔ̃ɔ ir jɛɛr nɩ a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na ba kʋ nɩbɛ, ka ba nyɔɔr ba pɔɔ.
Nɩyɔɔ wa naa a Pilate sɛ̃ wa sʋɔr wʋ ɩka, wʋ ɩ kʋ ba a lɛ wʋn ma ɩ.
Ka a Pilate sʋʋr ba, "Yɩ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n ir a Juu nɩbɛ nãa kʋ yɩ bɩɩ?"
Pilate bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a nyuur ban tara nɩ a Yesu lɛ vɛ̃ ban nyɔɔ wʋ waan a wʋ sɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ ka a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ dʋ̃ a nɩbɛ toor ɩka, ba 'yɛr ɩka, wʋ yuo a Barabasɩ bar.
Ka a Pilate sʋʋr ba go, "Tɩ n ɩ ŋmɩnɛ nɩ a 'lɔ yɩn bʋɔlɔ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa?"
Ka ba tãn, "Kpa wʋ a daa ju!"
Be lɛ ka a Pilate sʋʋr ba, "Bãa wʋ ɩ? Bo tʋ̃dɛɛr lɛ wʋ tʋ̃?" Tɩchɛ ka ba tãna kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, "Kpa wʋ a daa ju!"
Pilate na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ pɛl a nɩbɛ pʋɔ jũu, wʋ yuo naa a Barabasɩ kʋ ba. Wʋ vɛ̃ naa ka ba fɔb a Yesu yɔɔ jaa, tɩ de wʋ kʋ a sojasɩ ɩka, ba tɩ kpa wʋ a daa ju, ka wʋ kpi.
Be lɛ a sojasɩ tara a Yesu kpɛ̃n a nãa yir kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ pɔ, tɩ bʋɔl a ba taaba sojasɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Ba den fuu jɩɛ nãa fuu kaar su wʋ, na ba lɛ de gʋʋr vil nãa jupil kaar su wʋ.
Tɩ pãa piel laara wʋ, "Yãan yooo, Juu nɩbɛ nãa!"
Tɩ ma de daa ŋmen wʋ a jũu tɩ chɩrɛ nataar 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʋ. Ba gbur dumo a wʋ niem puoro wʋ.
Ban wa la wʋ a nɩtɔ̃ wa baar, ba yaa naa a fuu 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ bar, tɩ de a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ fuu su wʋ, na ba pãa de wʋ chiin ɩka ba tɩ kpa wʋ a daa ju.
A sɔr pɔ, ba nyɛn Simon na yi Sirenɩ tẽe pɔ, Aleksanda nɩ Worofʋs sãa lɛ. Mʋɔ pɔ lɛ wʋ yi tala, ka ba nyɔɔ wʋ fɩr ka wʋ de a Yesu daa tuo.
Ba chiin naa a Yesu tɩ tãn a be ban bʋɔlɔ a Yesu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr pɔ, Gɔlgɔta. A par lɛ ɩka, Julaa Jie.
Ka ba pãa de tɩ̃ɩ kɔ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a dãa pɔ, ɩka wʋ nyũ, tɩ wʋ tɔr.
Be lɛ ba kpa wʋ a daa ju. Ba põ naa a wʋ fɔɔr na ba ŋme gbãm bɔ̃ɔ a ala ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na na de.
Bibipɔl lɛ ba kpa wʋ.
Ba sɛb naa a yele 'lɔ jũu ban kʋn wʋ mar a daa jũu ɩka, "A JUU NƖBƐ NÃA."
Ba mɩ kpan nãnyisɩ ayi a dabãbɩ̃nsɩ mɩ ju, ka ɩ̃sʋɔ be a Yesu nũsʋ̃ɔ loor ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ be a wʋ gʋba loor.
A bala na tala a be a wʋ kpafʋ jie tʋrɔ wʋ, vavire a ba jur 'yɛrɛ, "Wooo, a fʋ̃ʋ nyã na 'yɛr ɩka fʋn sɔ̃ɔ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʋ Yir nyã bar tɩ mɛ wʋ a ber ata,
wa suu a daa ju, na fʋ faa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ!"
Lɛ nɩ wʋ ju lɛ, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe mɩ laara wʋ, na ba 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa, "Nyɛ, wʋ faan bamɩne, tɩ wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ faa ɛ!
Vɛ̃ a 'lɔ na 'yɛr ɩka, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa, na wʋ ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ nãa, suu a daa ju a sɩ kaa, tɩ na sɩ pãa sɔɔ." A bala mɩ ban kpa gbʋr wʋ, lɛ lɛ ba mɩ tʋ wʋ.
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa ara a gar ju sãlsɔɔ, a wɛr wʋ jaa sɔb naa wa tɩ tãn a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ balfʋ sɔ̃ɔ.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ lɛ, ka a Yesu chɩɩr bʋɔl, "Eloi, eloi, lama sabakatanɩ." A par lɛ a Yesu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr pɔ ɩka, "N Nãaŋmɩn, n Nãaŋmɩn, bo lɛ so ka fʋ lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ ma?"
A bala na ara gbʋr a be wõ na ba 'yɛr, "Yɩ chɛlɛ! Elaija lɛ wʋ bʋɔlɔ."
Ka a daba ɩ̃sʋɔ jo chen tɩ 'mɔɔ sapɔ 'lɔr a dãmiir amɩne pɔ, na wʋ chab daa tur a Yesu ɩka wʋ mʋʋr, tɩ na wʋ lɛ 'yɛr, "Yɩ vɛ̃ a sɩ kaara, Elaija na wa yɔɔ wʋ naa bɩɩ."
Be lɛ a Yesu chɩɩr tɩ ŋmaa a vʋʋr.
Ka a Juu Nɩbɛ Puorfʋ Yir pɔ, ban lũ a fɔbaa var a die chɩɛr a saaju tɩ gbem a par.
A sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na ara a be a Yesu niem na wõ a wʋ chɩɩrfʋ, tɩ nyɛ a lɛ mɩ wʋn ŋmaa a vʋʋr, wʋ 'yɛr naa, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa, a daba nyã ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Bie."
A pɔbɔ bamɩne lɔ̃ɔn Mɛɛr na yi Magdala tẽe pɔ, nɩ Salome, nɩ a Mɛɛr na ɩ a Jemesɩ bile, nɩ Josesɩ ma mɩ ara na tɛɛr jaa tɩ kaar wʋ.
A Galilee pɔ, a pɔbɔ banyãna lɛ turo wʋ, na ba sʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ. Ka a pɔbɔ bamɩne mɩ na 'matãan wʋ wa a Jerusalɛm, mɩ be be.
A daar 'lɔ ɩ naa a ba Chɔɔrfʋ Bɩbir ban na chɔɔr a ba mɩ̃ɛ, bojũu a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ wa mʋr, a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir piel naa. A jãanʋɔr na wa tara
a Josefʋ na yi a Arimatɩya tẽe pɔ, na ɩ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ ban 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃, tɩ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Nãalʋ̃ʋ, nyɔɔn nyãa chen a Pilate sɛ̃, tɩ sʋɔr a Yesu ɩ̃gãn ɩka wʋ ũu.
Pilate na wa wõ ɩka a Yesu kpi naa, a 'maa wʋn nɛɛ. Be lɛ wʋ bʋɔl a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ka wʋ wa, ka wʋ sʋʋr wʋ, "A Yesu kpin bɩɩ?"
Ka a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr, "Ɔ̃ɔ, wʋ kpi naa." Ka a Pilate sɔɔ ɩka a Josefʋ wʋ tɩ yɔɔ a Yesu ɩ̃gãn.
Josefʋ dãn fɔbaa na wʋ tɩ yɔɔ a Yesu ɩ̃gãn vil wʋ chiin tɩ ũu, a yaa ban chɩ kʋsɩr pɔ. Ba bil kʋsɩr wa pɔɔ a yaa nɛɛ.
A Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala, nɩ a Mɛɛr na ɩ a Josesɩ ma, nyɛ naa a jie 'lɔ ban ũu wʋ.
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir na wa baar, Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala, nɩ Salome, nɩ a Mɛɛr na ɩ a Jemesɩ ma, ba dãn a kãnyũur ala ɩka ba chiin tɩ jɛ a Yesu ɩ̃gãn.
A Pɛ̃nfʋ divɩɛ bio daar, bibio mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na pur baar, ba chen naa a yaa par.
A kʋsɩr na pɔɔ a yaa nɛɛ ba gbʋr ɛ, ka ba sʋrɔ taa, "An lɛ na tɩ bil a kʋsɩr bar sɩ a yaa nɛɛ?"
Tɩchɛ ban dʋɔ kaa a ba nidaa, a kʋsɩr 'lɔ bil yi a yaa nɛɛ.
Ban tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a yaa pɔ, ba nyɛn pɔlbile na su fuu pɩla jɩ̃nɛ nɩ a nũsʋ̃ɔ loor, ka pɩla ɔɔ ba.
A pɔlbile 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka yɩ pɩla ɔɔrɔ ɛ. Yɩ bʋɔrɔ naa a Yesu 'lɔ na yi a Najaretɩ ban kpa a daa ju. Wʋ ir naa ɩ vʋr! Waa be a ka ɛ! Yɩ nyɛ a jie 'lɔ ban gaal wʋ.
Yɩ lɩɛb kul tɩ 'yɛr a wʋ poturbo nɩ a Pita ɩka, wʋ de yɩn nie chiine a Galilee, be lɛ yɩn tɩ nyɛ wʋ, nɩtãa a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ yɩ."
Chĩcham kpɛ ba naa ka ba nɛɛ 'maa, ka ba jo yi a yaa par. Baa 'yɛr 'yɛr kʋ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ, bojũu dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba naa.
A Pɛ̃nfʋ divɩɛ bio daar bibio, Yesu na wa ir a kũu pɔ, wʋ den nie dũu a Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala, a 'lɔ pɔ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ dii a sɩdɛbɛ ayopõi bar ka a yi.
A Mɛɛr chen tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a bala na dɔ̃ɔ be a Yesu sɛ̃, a bala a nie na sɔb ka baa kõnõ.
Ban wa wõ ka wʋ 'yɛr ɩka a Yesu ir naa kũu pɔ ɩ vʋr, ka wʋ nyɛ wʋ, baa sɔɔ de ɛ.
A anyã puor lɛ, a Yesu lɩɛb nɩyuo na wʋ dũu a ba ayi na de sɔr chiine a tẽe ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔ.
Ba lɩɛb chen a Jerusalɛm tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a ba taaba, tɩchɛ baa sɔɔ ɛ.
A ba kor ɛ, tɩ a Yesu lɛ dũu a Pie nɩ Bʋ̃'yen na 'mataa dire. Wʋ miin 'yɔ̃ɔ ba a ba ba sɔɔfʋ pɔ, nɩ a ba nyãkpɩ̃ɛn jũu, bojũu baa sɔɔ de a bala na nyɛ wʋn ir a kũu pɔ 'yɛr.
Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ yɔ a wɛr wʋ jaa, na yɩ mʋɔl 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã kʋ a nɩbʋrɔ ba jaa.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã, ka ba so wʋ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, wʋn nyɛn a Nãaŋmɩn faafʋ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ba sɔɔ de a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã ɛ, a nɩnyɩnɛ na wɛ naa.
A jɩ̃nsɩ anyã na turo naa bala na sɔɔ. Ban de naa n yuor diin sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi, na ba lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrbʋlsɩ 'yɛrfʋ.
Ban ma 'mɔɔr waba. Bala wa nyũ bon na tara lɔɔ, tɩ a kʋ̃ ɩ ba yele ɛ. Baalaa ban dɔɔl a ba nũu, wʋn sa naa."
A Soro Yesu na wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ kʋ a wʋ poturbo, Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ naa ka wʋ do a saaju tɩ jɩ̃nɛ a wʋ nũsʋ̃ɔ loor.
Be lɛ ka a poturbo yi chen tɩ mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ jie jaa. Be lɛ ka a Soro 'mataa tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ ba, ka a wʋ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ anyã ban tʋ̃nɔ̃ wiil ɩka a wʋ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a nɩyɔɔ na mɔ̃ man a lɛ na ɩ a sɩ ber anyã pɔ,
a lɛ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ, ba dɔ̃ɔ be be na ba nyɛn nɩbir a pielfʋ, na ba ɩ a 'yɛr nyã gbãgbaar.
A lɛ jũu n baraa Teofilusɩ, n mɩ mɔ̃n vɩɛr a 'yɛr tɩ tãn a pielfʋ nyɛ ka a ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ, ka n bʋɔrɔ ɩka n sɛb a lɛ na tu taa kʋ fʋ.
Ka fʋ na tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a lɛ ban wiil fʋ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ.
A Judiya Nãa Hɛrɔd sɔ̃ɔ, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro ɩ̃sʋɔ ben be ban bʋɔlɔ Jekariya wʋ pʋɔ naa a Abija gbul pɔ ka a wʋ pɔɔ yuor di Elijabetɩ na yi a Aaron bʋrɔ pɔ.
Ba jaa ayi yele tor Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ka ba turo a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ na 'yɛr na baa tara chɛfʋ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ baa tara bie ɛ, bojũu a Elijabetɩ abbaa ka 'lɔ naa sɩrɛ jaa nyɔ̃ɔ.
A mɩ lʋɔr wa ta a Jekariya ka wʋ̃n tʋ̃ a bɔɔr lofʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ kʋ Nãaŋmɩn.
Gbãm lɛ ba gba ir wʋ nɩtãa lɛ a ba bɔɔrlo tʋ̃mɔ̃ na be, ka wʋn ma kpɛ a puorfʋ yir tɩ chʋm a tɩ̃ɩ nyũu vɩla ala.
Ka a sɔ̃ɔ na wa ta ɩka wʋ chʋm a tɩ̃ɩ nyũu vɩla anyãna, a nɩbɛ ara naa a yõo puoro.
Be lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn malaka wa dũu wʋ be a tɩ̃ɩ nyũu vɩla chʋmfʋ jie a nũsʋ̃ɔ jie.
Jekariya na wa nyɛ wʋ a lɛ, pɩla ɔɔ wʋ naa ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ wʋ.
Tɩchɛ ka a malaka 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Jekariya ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn wõn a fʋ sʋɔrfʋ, a fʋ pɔɔ Elijabetɩ na dɔɔn dabile ka fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ yuor Jɔɔn.
A wʋ yele na ɩn nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ fʋ ka fʋ chɩlɛ ka nɩyɔɔ mɩ chɩlɛ a wʋ dɔɔfʋ jũu.
An ɩ wʋn ɩn kpɛ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn niem, wʋ kʋ̃ nyũ dãa ban 'yɔ̃ɔ dãbɩl ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na sɛɛ wʋn be a ma pʋɔm.
Wʋn lɩɛb naa a Isɩral nɩbɛ yɔɔ jie waan a ba Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.

Wʋn den a sɩ Soro nie nɩ a sɩɛ nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ be a Elaija 'yɔ̃ɔ, na wʋ lɩɛb sãamɩne ka ba tara a ba bibiir tɩɛr. Ka bawõnsɩ mɩ nyɛ yɛ̃ na ba maala yeltorsɩ na wʋ vɛ̃ ka nɩbɛ mɩ chɔɔr ba mɩ̃ɛ gun a sɩ Soro."
Ka a Jekariya sʋʋr a malaka, "Ŋmɩnɛ ɩn ɩrɛ wa sɔɔ a nɩtɔ̃ fʋn 'yɛr? Maa nɩ n pɔɔ jaa kor naa."
Ka a malaka 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Maa lɛ a Gabɩrɛl na ma ara a Nãaŋmɩn niem, 'lɔ lɛ tʋ̃ ma nɩ a 'yɛr nyã ɩka n wa 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã kʋ fʋ.
A lɛ jũu fʋn ɩn wõo fʋ kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr 'yɛr ɛ, wa tãn a bɩbir 'lɔ a anyãna na ɩ bojũu faa sɔɔ de a 'yɛr ala na wa ɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na sɛɛ ɛ."
A nɩbɛ bala na be a yõo chɛlɛ a Jekariya wʋ̃n kor a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir, ka chĩcham kpɛ ba.
Be lɛ ka wʋ wa yi tɩ wʋ kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr 'yɛr ɛ, ka a nɩbɛ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka wʋ nyɛn nyɛfʋ kɔ̃ɔ bojũu nuur kaalfʋ lɛ wʋ mana nɩ ba tɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɛ.
A lɛ a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ bɩbie na wa baar be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir, wʋ lɩɛb kul a wʋ yir.
A anyã puor lɛ ka wʋ pɔɔ Elijabetɩ tara pʋɔ na wʋ sɔɔl ŋmɛrsɩ anũu.
Na wʋ pãa 'yɛrɛ, "Nyɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na maal ma, a wʋ maal vɩla bɩbir vɩɛ naa ka wʋ ir ma a vĩ yin a nɩbɛ niem bar."
Elijabetɩ pʋɔ na wa ta ŋmɛrsɩ ayʋɔb, Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃ naa a Gabɩrɛl a tẽe na be a Galilee paal pɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Najaretɩ,
be lɛ pɔɔsarbile kɔ̃ɔ be, ka daba ban bʋɔlɔ Josefʋ na ɩ a Nãa David yɔ̃ɔ ŋmaa baraa na kul ka a pɔɔbile yuor di Mɛɛr.
A malaka chen a wʋ sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, "N puorfʋ naa, fʋ ɩn nɩ'yɔ̃ɔ naa, Nãaŋmɩn ben a fʋ sɛ̃."
Ka dãbɩ̃ɛ nyɔɔ a Mɛɛr nɩ a puorfʋ nyã bʋrɔ, na wʋ sʋrɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a puorfʋ nyã par.
Tɩchɛ ka a malaka 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, fʋ ɩn nɩ'yɔ̃ɔ naa Nãaŋmɩn niem.
Fʋn tara na pʋɔ dɔɔ dabile, na fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ yuor Yesu.
Wʋn ɩn kpɛ̃ɛ, ka ba bʋɔlɔ wʋ a Nãaŋmɩn na be a Saaju Bie. A sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn na den a wʋ sãa David nãalʋ̃ʋ kʋ wʋ.
'Lɔ lɛ na di a Jekɔb yir nãa jaa kpo kpo, a wʋ nãa kʋ̃ wa baar ɛ."
Ka a Mɛɛr sʋʋr a malaka, "N ba ta daba sɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ ŋmɩnɛ ɩn ɩrɛ wa dɔɔ a bie?"
Ka a malaka 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na wa kpɛ fʋ naa, ka a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ wa ger pɔɔ fʋ a bichɛchɛ 'lɔ fʋn na dɔɔ, ban bʋɔlɔ wʋ̃n Nãaŋmɩn Bie.
Nyɛ a fʋ yɛbɛ Elijabetɩ gba na ɩ a pɔɔ abbaa na wʋ nyɔ̃ɔ tɩ wʋ tara na pʋɔ na dɔɔ bie, chuur ayʋɔb nɩ nyã wʋn gal.
Yele jaa ba ɩ tuo Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ."
Be lɛ a Mɛɛr 'yɛr, "Nyɛ, Nãaŋmɩn gbãgbaa lɛ n ɩ, a ɩ a lɛ kʋ ma fʋn 'yɛr?" Ka a malaka bar wʋ tɩ chen.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Mɛɛr pɔɔ yi do a tɔ̃ɔ ju a Judiya tẽe pɔ.
Wʋ tɩ kpɛ naa a Jekariya yir na wʋ puor a Elijabetɩ.
Elijabetɩ na wõ a Mɛɛr puorfʋ ka a bie ɔɔ lɩɛb be a wʋ pʋɔm ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛɛ a Elijabetɩ.
Ka wʋ ŋme chɛlma 'yɛrɛ, "Nãaŋmɩn sʋ̃ʋ fʋn gar a pɔbɔ ba jaa, na wʋ mɩ sʋ̃ʋ a bie 'lɔ na be a fʋ pʋɔm.
Tɩchɛ nyɛ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ na kaara, ka a n Soro ma wa a n sɛ̃?
Ɩ̃n wa wõ a fʋ puorfʋ a bie na gã a n pʋɔm ɔɔn lɩɛb nɩ pʋpɛl.
Pʋpɛl sʋɔ lɛ fʋ ɩ an ɩ fʋ sɔɔn de a lɛ a n Soro na tʋ̃, ka ba wa 'yɛr fʋ ɩka an ɩ naa a lɛ."
Ka a Mɛɛr 'yɛr, "N pɛɛn Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a pʋɔ wʋ jaa.
A n sɩɛ chɩlɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a n Fafaara 'yɔ̃ɔ.
An ɩ wʋ tɩɛrtɔ a wʋ gbãgbapɔɔbile mɩ̃ɛ siirfʋ. An yi dɩna chiine, a dɔɔ tu taa ba jaa na bʋɔlɔ ma naa bɔɔsʋ̃n sʋɔ.
An ɩ a Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ lɛ maal a lɛ kʋ ma. A wʋ yuor ɩn chɛchɛ.
A wʋ nɩbaal be naa a bala na joro wʋ dãbɩ̃ɛ sɛ̃, yi a yɔn tɩ tãn a yɔn suulsɩ.
A wʋ nũu tʋ̃n tʋ̃bɛrɛ, wʋ yɛ̃yɛl naa a bala na bʋɔrɔ a yuor a ba tɩɛr pɔ bar.
Wʋ dɔɔn nãmɩne a ba nãa dakɔɔr jur bar, tɩchɛ na wʋ 'mɔɔr a bala na siir a ba mɩ̃ɛ ka ba do saaju.
Wʋ kʋ naa a kɔ̃ dẽme bʋ̃sʋ̃n, tɩ dii a tara dẽme bar nũjaalsɩ.
Wʋ sʋ̃ʋn a wʋ gbãgbaa Isɩral tɩ tɩɛrtɔ ɩka wʋ kaa Abraham nɩ a wʋ yɔn nɩbaal bɩbir jaa, nɩtãa lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ a sɩ sãamɩne."
Mɛɛr jɩ̃nɛ na a Elijabetɩ sɛ̃ ŋmɛrsɩ ata tɩ lɩɛb kul a wʋ tẽe.
Elijabetɩ dɔɔfʋ bɩbir wa vɩɛ naa ka wʋ dɔɔ dabile.
Ka a bala na kpɩɛrɛ gbʋr a Elijabetɩ nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme na wõ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na maal vɩla kʋ wʋ ba pʋɔ mɩ pɛl naa a wʋ kaar.
A ber aniin daar ba wa naa ɩka ba wa ŋmaa a bie yʋɔr, na ba ta bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba de a sãa yuor 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ bʋɔlɔ a Jekariya.
Tɩchɛ ka a ma ba sɔɔ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr, "A bie yuor din Jɔɔn."
A ba 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Fʋ bal nɩrɛ jaa ba di a yuor nyã ɛ."
Tɩ na ba pãa 'lɩɩr sʋʋr a sãa a yobuor wʋn bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a bie.
Ka wʋ man ba ɩka ba kʋ wʋ bon ka wʋ sɛb, wʋn ben wa de a bon na wʋ sɛb, "A bie yuor din Jɔɔn." Ka nɛɛr 'maa ba jaa.
Ajienaa lɛ a Jekariya nɛɛ mɩ 'laa ka a jãlbir bal ka wʋ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ na wʋ pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn.
Ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a bala jaa na gbʋr a be ka nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ ka a yaar de a Judiya tẽn ala na be a tɔ̃n ju.
Nɩrɛ jaa na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ a ma 'maa wʋn nɛɛ ka wʋ ma sʋʋr, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a bie nyã na wa kaara?" Bojũu a Soro nũu dɔɔl naa a bie.
Jekariya na ɩ a sãa, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛɛ wʋ naa ka wʋ 'yɛrɛ,
"Pɛɛfʋ wʋ ta a Isɩral Nãaŋmɩn, bojũu wʋ wa naa wa faa a wʋ nɩbɛ.
Wʋ kʋ sɩn gãdaa ɩka wʋ faa sɩ na yi a wʋ gbãgbaa Nãa David yir,
nɩtãa lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ tu a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ chɛchɛ bala sɛ̃ a kõr jaa ka ba 'yɛr,
ɩka wʋ faa sɩ a sɩ dɔ̃dẽme sɛ̃, na wʋ faa sɩ a bala na laar sɩ nuur pɔ.
Wʋ maal a nɩtɔ̃ ɩka wʋ wiil nɩbaal kʋ a sɩ sãamɩne, na wʋ lɛ tɩɛr a wʋ nɛtɩr chɛchɛ 'lɔ,
a lɛ wʋn pɔ kʋ a sɩ sãakpã Abraham.
Wʋ pɔn 'yɛr ɩka, wʋn faa sɩ naa a sɩ dɔ̃dẽme nuur pɔ, ka sɩ puoro wʋ kʋ̃ lɛ joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ,
na sɩ ɩ chɛchɛ nɩ nɩtorsɩ a wʋ niem a ber a jaa.
A fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a n bie ban bʋɔlɔ fʋ naa a saaju Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ, an ɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ na de a sɩ Soro nie chɔɔr a wʋ sɔr,
na fʋ vɛ̃ ka wʋ nɩbɛ bɔ̃ɔ a faafʋ sɔr, na ba nyɛ yelbier vɛ̃ kʋfʋ.
Nãaŋmɩn na tara nɩ sɩ nɩbaal jũu, wʋ vɛ̃ naa ka a fafaara pur chaar 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ yi a saaju,
na wʋ chaar 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na kpɩɛrɛ a libe pɔ, tɩ be a kũu gãagiel pĩlem, na wʋ wiil a sɩ gbɛɛ ka a de nyã'maar sɔr."
A bie nʋ̃ɔ naa ka a sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ be a wʋ sɛ̃. Mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ lɛ wʋ kpɩɛrɛ tɩ tãn a bɩbir 'lɔ wʋn na wiil a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Isɩral nɩbɛ.
A ber ala pɔ, a paal Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa Agustus 'yɛr naa ɩka ba sɔr a nɩbɛ ba jaa na be a Worom paal pɔ.
A sɔrfʋ nyã lɛ ɩ a sɔrdɔ̃ɔ ban sɔr a nɩbɛ ka a Kiriniyus mɩ ɩ a Siriya nãa.
Nɩrɛ jaa kul a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tẽe ka ban tɩ sɔr wʋ.
Ala lɛ so ka a Josefʋ mɩ na yi a Najaretɩ tẽe na be a Galilee wɛr pɔ, na wʋ chen a Judiya wɛr pɔ, a Nãa David tẽe ban bʋɔlɔ a Bɛtɩlɛhɛm, bojũu a Nãa David yir lɛ wʋ yi tɩ lɛ ɩ a wʋ bal nɩrɛ.
Josefʋ tara na a Mɛɛr na tara a pʋɔ wʋn bʋɔrɔ a kulfʋ 'mataa chiin ka ban tɩ sɔr ba.
A lɛ ban be a Bɛtɩlɛhɛm ka a Mɛɛr bie dɔɔfʋ daar ta.
Ka wʋ dɔɔ a pɔɔsarbie ka wʋ ɩ dabile a wʋ vil wʋ a fɔbaa gaal a dʋ̃n mʋɔr 'wɔfʋ jie bojũu baa nyɛ jie na kpɛ a sãanba kpɛfʋ jie ɛ.
Pɛchiinbɛ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ gbʋr a tẽe na ba gãn a ba piir be a mʋ̃ɔ pɔ kaara.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn malaka yi a saaju wa a ba sɛ̃, ka Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr chaar pɔɔ ba, ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba.
Tɩchɛ a malaka 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ lɛ n waan a yɩ sɛ̃, an ɩn chɩlfʋ kpɛ̃ɛ kʋ a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
A dɩna tɩ̃sɔɔ ba dɔɔ naa a Fafaara a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãa David tẽe pɔ. Wʋ ɩ naa a sɩ Soro nɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
Jɩ̃nɛ yɩn na de bɔ̃ɔn wʋ nɩ nyã. Yɩn nyɛ naa a bipɩla ban vil a fɔbaa gaal wʋ a dʋ̃n mʋɔr 'wɔfʋ jie."
Ajienaa a saaju malakasɩ yɔɔ wa naa wa 'matãan a malaka 'lɔ a ba dãna a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ nɩ,
"Tɩɩr wʋ ta a Nãaŋmɩn na be a saaju, ka nyã'maar mɩ be a nɩbɛ bala na pɛlɛ a wʋ pʋɔ a wɛr pɔ."
A malakasɩ na wa bar ba tɩ lɩɛb do a saaju, ka a pɛchiinbɛ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa, "Yɩ ɩ a sɩ chen a Bɛtɩlɛhɛm tẽe pɔ, tɩ kaa a yelnyɩnɛ na ɩ ka a Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃ 'yɛr sɩ."
Be lɛ ba pɔɔ chen tɩ nyɛ a Mɛɛr nɩ a Josefʋ nɩ a bipɩla na gã a dʋ̃n mʋɔr 'wɔfʋ jie.
A lɛ ban wa nyɛ wʋ, ba 'yɛr naa a lɛ a malaka na 'yɛr kʋ ba a bibile yele.
A bala ba jaa na wõ a lɛ a pɛchiinbɛ na 'yɛr a bie 'yɛr kʋ ba, ka nɛɛr 'maa ba jaa.
Tɩchɛ ka a Mɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a anyãna a wʋ pʋɔm tara tɩɛrɛ.
A pɛchiinbɛ lɩɛb chen a piir jie tɩ dãna Nãaŋmɩn na ba pɛɛrɛ wʋ a ala a jaa ban wõ tɩ nyɛ a lɛ a malaka na 'yɛr kʋ ba.
A ber aniin na wa ta, ba ŋmaa wʋn a yʋɔr tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ a yuor Yesu, a yuor nyã lɛ a malaka 'yɛr kʋ a Mɛɛr tɩ ka wʋ wa tara a pʋɔ.
Mɛɛr na wa baar a padɔɔr a lɛ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ na 'yɛr, Josefʋ nɩ a Mɛɛr den a bie chiin a Jerusalɛm na tɩ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn.
Nɩtãa lɛ a Soro na 'yɛr, "Yɩ de dabil dɔ̃ɔ jaa kʋ a Soro."
Ba den a bɔɔrlo bomo ala a Soro na 'yɛr ɩka, "Ŋmama ayi bɩɩ papa pɔlɔ ayi tɩ pɔl a ba mɩ̃ɛ."
Daba kɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ be a Jerusalɛm ban bʋɔlɔ Simeon na wʋ ɩ nɩtor na waa baala Nãaŋmɩn ɛ. Wʋ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ faafʋ bɩbir ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ be a wʋ sɛ̃.
A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ ɩka wʋn nyɛ naa a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ a Soro na tʋ̃ nɩ nɩbir tɩ kpi.
A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ vɛ̃n ka Simeon chen be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ, ka a ɩ a Josefʋ nɩ a Mɛɛr mɩ waan naa a ba bie Yesu a be na wa ir a nɛɛ.
Ka a Simeon de a bie 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ nũu pɔ tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan 'yɛrɛ,
"Tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋɔ, nɩtãa lɛ fʋn tɩr a fʋ nɛɛ kʋ a maa na ɩ a fʋ gbãgbaa, fʋn tʋ̃ɔ bar ma sɔr nɩ nyã'maar.
Bojũu n nɩbir nyɛ naa a fafaara,
'lɔ fʋn chɔɔr ka nɩrɛ jaa nyɛ wʋ.
Wʋn ɩn chãa wiil a nɩbɛ bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩ na wʋ ɩ tɩɩr kʋ a fʋ nɩbɛ Isɩral."
Ka a Yesu sãa nɩ a ma nɛɛ 'maa a lɛ a Simeon na 'yɛr a wʋ yele.
Ka a Simeon pãa 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ ba, tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a Mɛɛr na ɩ a ma, "A bie nyãna lɛ Nãaŋmɩn kʋ a Isɩral nɩbɛ, ka ba yɔɔ na ŋme gbɛr lo tɩ ir, na wʋ ɩ jɩ̃nɛ ka ban 'yɛrɛ kpɛrɛ nɩ wʋ.
Nɩbɛ yɔɔ pʋtɩɛr na gãn chãa pɔ, ka a fʋ̃ʋ mɩ pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ fɩka sʋɔ ban chɔr fʋ."
Pɔɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ben be ban bʋɔlɔ Ana na wʋ ɩ Fanuwɛl bie na wʋ ɩ Aserɩ bal nɩrɛ, na wʋ ɩ pɔɔ nyɔ̃ɔ. Wʋ kul sɩrɛ maal yuomo ayopõi.
Ka a sɩrɛ kpi tɩ wʋ ɩ a pɔɔkʋɔr maal yuomo lɩjaanaar nɩ anaar (84). Waa gala a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ ma ben be na wʋ ma gal bʋ̃diir tɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn tɩ̃sɔɔ nɩ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ wʋ wa a ba sɛ̃ tɩ dãn Nãaŋmɩn tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr a bie 'yɛr kʋ a bala jaa na chɛlɛ a Jerusalɛm faafʋ bɩbir.
A lɛ a Josefʋ nɩ a Mɛɛr na wa ir a nɛɛ maal a lɛ a Soro na bin, ba lɩɛb kul a Najaretɩ na ɩ a ba tẽe na be a Galilee wɛr pɔ.
Be lɛ a bie tɩ nʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ fɔ̃ɔ na wʋ sɛɛn yɛ̃ ka a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ be a wʋ sɛ̃.
Yuon jaa a sãa naa ma ma chen a Jerusalɛm tɩ lɔ̃ɔ na ba di a Gõl Bar Difʋ.
Yesu na wa nyɛ yuomo pie nɩ ayi ba tara wʋn don a Difʋ nyã jie nɩtãa lɛ ban ma ɩrɛ.
A Gõl Bar Difʋ ber na wa baar, ba lɩɛb kulo a ba tẽe tɩchɛ a Yesu bar a Jerusalɛm ka baa bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
Ba tɩɛr ɩka wʋ taa pɔɔ a ba nɩbɛ kulo nɩ tɩ chen bɩbir bʋ̃'yen baa nyɛ wʋ ɛ, na ba pãa yʋɔrɔ bʋɔrɔ wʋ a ba nɩbɛ nɩ a ba nɩbɔ̃ɔnsɩ nɩ a ba barmɩne sɛ̃.
Ban ba wa nyɛ wʋ ɛ, ba lɩɛb chen a Jerusalɛm a wʋ bɔfʋ jie.
A ber ata daar lɛ a ba tɩ nyɛ wʋ a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ, ka wʋ jɩ̃nɛ a wiwiilbe chara pɔ chɛlɛ a lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ na wʋ sʋrɔ ba sʋʋrfʋsɩ.
Nɩrɛ jaa na wõ a lɛ wʋn ire a 'yɛrsɩ par a chɔ̃ chɔ̃ nɛɛ 'maa ba naa.
A sãa nɩ a ma na wa nyɛ wʋ a ba nɛɛ mɩ 'maa ba naa ka a ma sʋʋr, "Pa n bie, bo lɛ fʋ maal sɩ a nɩtɔ̃, ka maa nɩ a fʋ sãa yɔbɔ fʋ lɛ̃ɛɛ wa faa?"
Ka Yesu sʋʋr a ma, "Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ yʋɔrɔ bʋɔrɔ ma? Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka ɩn be naa a n Sãa yir ɛ?"
Tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna wʋn 'yɛr kʋ ba par ɛ.
A wʋ ir pɔɔ ba, a ba pãa kul a Najaretɩ a wʋ tɩ wõnõ a ba toor, tɩchɛ ka a ma 'yɔ̃ɔ a 'yɛr anyãna a jaa a wʋ pʋɔm.
Ka a Yesu nʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ yɛ̃ nɩ a kpɛ̃ɛ ka wʋ yele nʋ̃mɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ nɩ a nɩbɛ sɛ̃.

Yuon pie nɩ anũu lɛ a Tiberiyus Siisa di a nãkpɛ̃ɛ ka a Pontius Pilate mɩ ɩ a Judiya paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ka a Hɛrɔd mɩ di a Galilee nãa ka a wʋ yɛbɛ Filip mɩ ɩ a Ituriya nɩ a Tɩrakonɩtɩs nãa. Ka a Lisaniyasɩ mɩ di a Abilenɩ nãa.
Anasɩ nɩ Kayafasɩ bala lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn de a wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a Jekariya bidaba Jɔɔn be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ.
Wʋ yɔn a tẽn ala a jaa na jilʋ̃ a Jordan man na wʋ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a nɩbɛ, "Yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr na yɩ so a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, ka Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ a yɩ yeldɛbɛ kʋ yɩ."
Nɩtãa lɛ a Isaiya na sɛb a wʋ gãn pɔ, "Nɩrɛ 'yɛrɛ naa be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ, 'Yɩ chɔɔr a sɩ Soro sɔr, na yɩ maal a wʋ sɔr ka wʋ tor.
Na yɩ 'mʋr a kʋlsɩ, na yɩ ŋmɛr a tɔ̃n nɩ a gbẽgbẽnsɩ ka a jɩ̃taa. Yɩ maal a sɔgɔ̃rsɩ a jaa ka a tor, na yɩ maal a sɔr nyara nyara ka wʋ sal.
Nɩsaal bʋrɔ ba jaa na nyɛn Nãaŋmɩn faafʋ.' "
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na waara a Jɔɔn sɛ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ sofʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka wʋ sʋʋr ba, "Yɩn waa bibiir, an lɛ 'yɛr kʋ yɩ ɩka yɩ jo yi a Nãaŋmɩn suur na waara a yɩ sɛ̃?
Yɩ vɛ̃ ka yɩ befʋ wiil ɩka yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr. Yɩ ta chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɩka, Abraham lɛ ɩ a sɩ sãa, n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ɔn maal a kusɩbɛ anyãna a ba lɩɛb ɩ a Abraham bibiir.
A 'lar dɔɔl a tɩɛ nyɩbɛ ju, tɩɛ jaa ba wa wɔ̃nɔ̃ wɔ̃ sʋ̃n ɛ, ban ŋmaa wʋn lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ bũu pɔ."
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala sʋʋr wʋ, "Ŋmɩnɛ sɩn pãa ɩ?"
Ka Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na tara fuusɩ ayi, wʋ ir ɩ̃sʋɔ kʋ a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ na ba tara ɛ, nyã mɩ na tara bʋ̃diir wʋ ɩ a lɛ."
Lõpodierbe mɩ wan a Jɔɔn sɛ̃ ɩka wʋ so ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, na ba mɩ sʋʋr wʋ, "Wiwile sɩ mɩ ɩ ŋmɩnɛ?"
Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ ta ma de dɔɔl a lɛ ban ɩka yɩ de ɛ."
Sojasɩ bamɩne mɩ wan wa sʋʋr wʋ, "Sɩn mɩ, sɩ ɩ ŋmɩnɛ?" Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ ta fɩr nɩrɛ de libir ɛ, yɩ ta mɩ ŋmaa jir kara dɔɔl nɩrɛ ɛ, na yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ sãyar sɛɛn yɩ."
Ka a nɩbɛ mɩ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ toor chɛlɛ, pãa tɩɛrɛ ɩka a Jɔɔn lɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
A Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Maa 'lɔ kʋ̃ɔ lɛ n suoro yɩ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na gar ma na wa naa, a wʋ nafɔɔr mibe gba, n ba sɛɛ ɩka n for ɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ na de Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩ bũu son yɩ.
A ŋmayɩɛl naa ben a wʋ nũu pɔ, a wʋ na yɩɛl a mʋ̃ɩ a vafʋ jie na wʋ kpaar a bie 'yɔ̃ɔ a boor pɔ tɩ chʋm a sɔ̃sɔɔr nɩ bũu 'lɔ na ba tara kpĩinfʋ bar."
Jɔɔn kpãa ban nɩ yelyɔɔ na wʋ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ ba.
Tɩchɛ a nãa Hɛrɔd na de a wʋ yɛbɛ pɔɔ Hɛrɔdiyas kul, Jɔɔn 'yɛr wʋ naa ɩka a ba tara sɔr ka wʋ kul wʋ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr wʋ a dɛbɛ amɩne wʋn ɩ.
Hɛrɔd lɛ maal dɛɛr wʋn vɛ̃ ka ba nyɔɔ Jɔɔn tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ.
Ban ba nyɔɔ a Jɔɔn pɔɔ sɛrɛ ɛ, wʋ so naa a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ na wʋ mɩ so a Yesu a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ. Ka a Yesu sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a saaju yuo.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ de papa ɩ̃gãn suu wa 'mar a Yesu ju, tɩ a kɔkɔr yi be a saaju 'yɛr, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a n Bidanʋ̃naa ka fʋ yele pɛl a n pʋɔ."
Yesu nyɛn yuon lɩjɛr nɩ pie tɩ piel a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃, ka nɩbɛ tɩɛr ɩka wʋ ɩ naa a Josefʋ bidaba, na ɩ a Heli bidaba,
Matatɩ bidaba, Levi bidaba, Melki bidaba, Janai bidaba, Josefʋ bidaba,
Matatiyasɩ bidaba, Amosɩ bidaba, Nahum bidaba, Esili bidaba, Nagai bidaba,
Maat bidaba, Matatiyasɩ bidaba, Semeyin bidaba, Josekɩ bidaba, Joda bidaba,
Joanan bidaba, Aresa bidaba, Jerubabel bidaba, Sealtɩɛl bidaba, Neri bidaba,
Melki bidaba, Adi bidaba, Kosam bidaba, Elmadam bidaba, Erɩ bidaba,
Josua bidaba, Eliyeja bidaba, Jorim bidaba, Matatɩ bidaba, Levi bidaba,
Simeon bidaba, Juda bidaba, Josefʋ bidaba, Jonam bidaba, Eliyakim bidaba,
Melea bidaba, Mena bidaba, Matata bidaba, Natan bidaba, David bidaba,
Jesɩ bidaba, Obed bidaba, Boajɩ bidaba, Salmon bidaba, Nason bidaba,
Aminadab bidaba, Aram bidaba, Hejoron bidaba, Perejɩ bidaba, Juda bidaba,
Jekɔb bidaba, Isaakɩ bidaba, Abraham bidaba, Tera bidaba, Nahor bidaba,
Serugu bidaba, Wɛru bidaba, Peleg bidaba, Eber bidaba, Sela bidaba,
Kainan bidaba, Afakadɩ bidaba, Sem bidaba, Nowa bidaba, Lamekɩ bidaba,
Metusela bidaba, Enok bidaba, Jared bidaba, Mahalaleel bidaba, Kenan bidaba,
Enosɩ bidaba, Setɩ bidaba, Adama bidaba, Nãaŋmɩn bidaba.
Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛɛn a Yesu na wʋ lɩɛb wʋ yin a Jordan man jie kpɛ̃n wʋ a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ.
Be lɛ a tɩɩ bɛɛr wʋ kaa ber lɩjaayi, waa di bon jaa a ber anyãna pɔ ɛ, ka a kɔ̃ kpɛ wʋ.
A tɩɩ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, 'yɛr kʋ a kʋsɩbɛ anyãna, ka a lɩɛb bʋ̃diir."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ ɩka, a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Bʋ̃diir tɛɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kʋ nɩrɛ nyɛvʋr ɛ."
A tɩɩ lɛ tara wʋn don tɔ̃ɔ ju tɩ wiil wʋ a nãa di jiir a jaa na be ka a wɛr pɔ
tɩ 'yɛr, "Ɩn kʋ fʋ naa anyãna a jaa fɔ̃ɔ nɩ a ba nãyele, maa lɛ ba de a ba fɔ̃ɔ kʋ, ka n mɩ na de kʋ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa ɩn bʋɔrɔ.
Ala ɩ, fʋ gbur dumo puor ma fʋ̃ʋ lɛ so."
Ka Yesu 'yɛr wʋ, "A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka fʋ puor, na fʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ a 'lɔ tɛɛ."
A tɩɩ lɛ tara wʋn chiin a Jerusalɛm ka wʋ tɩ do a puorfʋ yir jie 'lɔ na do na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu, "Ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie ɔɔ lo a tẽe,
bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, 'Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ naa ka a wʋ malakasɩ wa gu fʋ taa lɛɛ,
na ba nyɔɔ fʋ nɩ a ba nuur ka a fʋ gbɛr kʋ̃ ŋme kʋsɩr ɛ.' "
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a tɩɩ, a mɩ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Ta bɛɛr a fʋ Nãaŋmɩn kaa ɛ."
A tɩɩ na wa baar a bɛɛr kaa anyãna wʋ bar wʋn tɩ chen, tɩ lɛ guro nɩ sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ wʋn lɛ wa nyɛ jie.
Yesu lɩɛb kul a Galilee nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ ka a wʋ yele yaar a wɛr 'lɔ wʋ jaa.
Wʋ tɩ wile naa a nɩbɛ a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir ka a nɩrɛ jaa pɛɛrɛ wʋ.
Yesu lɩɛb chen a Najaretɩ be wʋn nʋ̃ɔ, a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar wʋ tɩ kpɛ̃n a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir an ɩ lɛ lɛ wʋ ma ɩrɛ na wʋ ir ara na wʋn kar gãn.
Ka ba de Isaiya gãn kʋ wʋ, ka wʋ nyɔɔ 'yɩɛr a jie 'lɔ ban sɛb,
"Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ be naa a n 'yɔ̃ɔ, bojũu wʋ ir ma naa ɩka n tɩ 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ a nɔ̃n dẽme, naa mɩ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ gbãgbaar ka ban so ba mɩ̃ɛ, naa 'yɛr kʋ jɔ̃n ka ba yuo, naa 'yɛr faa a bala ban gere,
naa 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn maal vɩla yuon kʋ ba."
Be lɛ wʋ pilʋ̃ a gãn de kʋ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ tɩ jɩ̃nɛ, ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa na be a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir kpa a nɩbie 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ.
Ka wʋ piel 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ ba, "Dɩna a lɛ yɩn wõ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, a ɩ naa a lɛ."
Ba jaa 'yɛrɛ naa a wʋ sʋ̃ 'yɛr ka ba nɛɛr 'maa a 'yɛr vɩɛlsɩ na yire a wʋ nɛɛ pɔ ka ba sʋrɔ taa, "A ba ɩ a Josefʋ bidaba lɛ a nyã ɛ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, yɩn sʋʋr ma naa nɩ a sʋkpa nyã, 'Tɩtɩlɛ, tɩɩl a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ, maal a ala fʋn maal a Kapenahum ka a fʋ tẽe.' "
A wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, ba maa de Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tẽe pɔ ɛ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka pɔɔkɔyɔɔ ben a Isɩral nɩbɛ wɛr pɔ a Elaija sɔ̃ɔ, a war bũu 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ŋmaa a yuom ata nɩ ŋmɛrsɩ ayʋɔb a wɛr wʋ jaa.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn ba tʋ̃ a Elaija a pɔɔkɔɛ ba nyã ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩ tʋ̃ wʋ a pɔɔkʋɔr na be a Jarefat na be a Sidon wɛr pɔ.
A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Elisa sɔ̃ɔ, kɔ̃kɔ̃n mɩ ben a Isɩral nɩbɛ wɛr pɔ tɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba sa ɛ, ka Naaman na yi a Siriya wɛr pɔ ba lɛ ɛ."
A nɩyɔɔ bala na be a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir 'lɔ pɔ, ka suur kpɛ ba jaa.
Ba ir da wʋ yin a tẽe pɔ don a tɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ju a ba tẽe na mɛ bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba daa wʋ lɔb a tɔ̃ɔ koro pɔ.
Tɩchɛ ka wʋ fʋɔl yi a nɩyɔɔ bala sãlsɔɔ a lɛ na wʋ chen.
Be lɛ wʋ suu chen a Kapenahum na be a Galilee wɛr pɔ, ka a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar ka wʋ piel wile a nɩbɛ.
Ka a wʋ wiilfʋ 'maa ba nɛɛ bojũu a wʋ 'yɛr tara na kpɛ̃ɔ.
Daba mɩ ben a be a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir na tara a dɛɛr sʋɔ, ka a sɩdɛɛr be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a wʋ ŋme chɛlma sʋʋr,
"Ai, a fʋ̃ʋ Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ, bo fʋ bʋɔrɔ ka a sɩ sɛ̃? Fʋ wa naa ɩka fʋ wa sɔ̃ɔ sɩ bar bɩɩ? N bɔ̃ɔ naa a nɩnyɩnɛ fʋn ɩ, fʋ ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nɩchɛchɛ 'lɔ."
Ka Yesu tãn wʋ, "Pɔɔ a nɛɛ tɩ wa yi a daba 'yɔ̃ɔ." A sɩdɛɛr daan a daba lɔb a nɩbɛ niem tɩ na wʋ yi a daba 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩ waa 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ baal ɛ.
Ka a nɛɛr 'maa a nɩbɛ ka ba sʋrɔ taa, "Wiilbuor mɩ nɩ nyã? Wʋ den kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ tʋ̃ɔfʋ 'yɛr kʋ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi."
Ka a wʋ yele yaar de a tẽn ala na jilʋ̃ a be.
Yesu yi naa a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir na wʋ chen a Simon yir. Ka ɩ̃gãn tɔ a Simon dɩ̃ɛ ma ka ba sʋɔr a Yesu ɩka wʋ sʋ̃ʋ wʋ.
Ka wʋ guun ger a pɔɔ na wʋ tãn a ɩ̃gãn tʋl ka wʋ bar a pɔɔ, ka wʋ sa na wʋ ir maal bʋ̃diir kʋ ba.
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa mʋrɔ nɩbɛ waan naa ba baalsɩ a Yesu sɛ̃, ka wʋ dɔɔl ba a wʋ nũu na wʋ sãa baal jaa bʋrɔ ban waan.
Sɩdɛbɛ yin a nɩyɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ tãna 'yɛrɛ, "Fʋ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn Bie." Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu tãn ba ka ba ta 'yɛrɛ ɛ, an ɩ ba bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
A wɛr na wa chaar Yesu yin tɩ jɩ̃nɛ a jie ɩ̃sʋɔ wʋ yõ, ka a nɩbɛ yɔbɔ wʋ tɩ nyɛ a jie wʋn be ba lɛ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ bar ba tɩ chen ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A sɛɛ naa ɩka n 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr kʋ a tẽn anyã mɩ bojũu a lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃ ma."
Tɩ na wʋ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr be a a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ yie a Juu nɩbɛ tẽe pɔ.
Bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ Yesu be naa a Genesaretɩ man nɛɛ, ka nɩyɔɔ ara jilʋ̃ wʋ chɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
Wʋ nyɛn gborsɩ ayi a gogoro nɛɛ a jɩ̃nyɔɔrbɔ na bar tɩ suu pɛɛrɛ a ba lɔyaarsɩ.
Ka wʋ kpɛ a gboro ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔ na ɩ Simon bon tɩ sʋɔr wʋ ɩka wʋ daa wʋ ka wʋ jãan a gogoro bɩ̃lãa. Wʋ pãa jɩ̃nɛ naa a gboro pɔ tɩ wile a nɩbɛ.
Wʋn wa baar a 'yɛr ka wʋ 'yɛr a Simon, "Daa a gboro chiin a kɔ̃die pɔ na fʋ tɩ lɔb a fʋ lɔyaar."
Ka a Simon 'yɛr, "Kpãkpãana, tɩ̃sɔɔ jaa lɛ sɩ lɔb lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ saa nyɔɔ bon ɛ, tɩchɛ fʋn 'yɛr go, ɩn lɔbaa."
Ban wa lɔb, ba nyɔɔr jɩ̃yɔɔ ka a lɔyaarsɩ ɩrɛ na chɩɛr.
Ka ba 'lɩɩr a ba taaba na be a gboro ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔ, ka ba wa sʋ̃ʋ ba. Ba wa naa ka a gborsɩ a jaa ayi wa sɛɛ ka ba ɩrɛ na mʋr.
Simon Pita na wa nyɛ a lɛ, wʋ lon kpa a Yesu niem tɩ 'yɛr, "N Soro sɛr chen tɩ bar ma yelbe-ɩrɛ lɛ n ɩ."
A jɩ̃yɔɔ anyã ban nyɔɔr jũu, 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ taaba nɛɛr 'maa naa.
Lɛ lɛ a Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn na ɩ a Jebedee bibiir na ɩ a Simon taaba. Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a Simon, "Ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, an yi dɩna chiine fʋn nyɔɔrɔ na nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ."
Be lɛ ba tɔɔ a gborsɩ waan a gogoro nɛɛ wa bar bomo a jaa tɩ turo a Yesu.
Yesu na wa be a tẽe ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔ, daba kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ baal na de a ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa nyɛn a Yesu na wʋ lo kpa tẽe a Yesu niem tɩ sʋɔr wʋ, "N Soro, fʋ̃ʋ sɔɔ, sãa ma."
Ka Yesu tur a wʋ nũu sɩɩr a daba tɩ 'yɛr, "N sɔɔ naa sa." Ajienaa ka a kɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ baal bar wʋ.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Taa 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ nɩrɛ ɛ, tɩ chen tɩ wiil a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro na fʋ ir a nɛɛ 'lɔ a Mosesɩ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ka a di dãasɩɛ ɩka fʋ ɩn nɩsʋ̃."
Tɩchɛ ka a wʋ yele chɛnɛ ŋme yaar a jie wʋ jaa ka a nɩyɔɔ wa chɛlɛ a wʋ 'yɛr ka wʋ sãa a ba baalsɩ.
Tɩchɛ wʋ ma chɛnɛ na tɔɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ tɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn.
Bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ Yesu na wile ka a ɩ a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe na yi a Galilee tẽbil a jaa nɩ a Judiya ka bamɩne yi a Jerusalɛm mɩ ben be jɩ̃nɛ. Ka a Soro kʋ a Yesu kpɛ̃ɔ ɩka wʋ sãan baalsɩ.
Dɔɔr bamɩne tuon nɩrɛ nɩ sɔ̃ɔ a nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ na kpi waan bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba kpɛ̃n wʋ tɩ gaal a Yesu niem.
Ban ba wa nyɛrɛ sɔr a nɩyɔɔ jũu, ba don naa gar ju tɩ yuo bɔɔ tur bar ka wʋ suun a sɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ sãlsɔɔ tɩ gã a Yesu niem.
Yesu na nyɛ a lɛ ban sɔɔ de, ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a baalaa, "N baraa, a fʋ yeldɛbɛ vɛ̃n bar."
Ka a nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Faraseemɩne pãa jɛ̃ tɩɛrɛ, "An lɛ a nyã na jɩ̃nɛ fere sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn yuor a nɩtɔ̃? An lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ nɩrɛ yelbier vɛ̃ bar ka Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ?"
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban tɩɛrɛ ka wʋ sʋʋr ba, "Bo lɛ yɩ tɩɛrɛ a anyã a lɛ a yɩ pʋɔm?
'Yɛr buor lɛ ɩ kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃? N 'yɛr ɩka a wʋ yeldɛbɛ vɛ̃n bar bɩɩ n 'yɛr ɩka wʋ ir chiine?
Tɩchɛ nɩtɔ̃ lɛ yɩn bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a maa Nɩsaal Bie tara na kpɛ̃ɔ a wɛr pɔ na vɛ̃ yeldɛbɛ bar." Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a dagbɛrɛ, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ nɩ ir 'mɔɔ a fʋ sɔ̃ɔ kulo nɩ."
Ajienaa ka wʋ vaa ir ara a ba niem, 'mɔɔ a wʋ bʋ̃gãnaa pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn kulo nɩ.
Ka nɩrɛ jaa nɛɛ 'maa ka ba dãna Nãaŋmɩn. Ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba ka ba 'yɛrɛ, "Sɩ nyɛn yelkal bala dɩna."
A anyã puor Yesu yin tɩ nyɛ lõpodiere ban bʋɔlɔ Levi na jɩ̃nɛ diere wʋ lõposɩ, ka wʋ bʋɔl wʋ, "Ir turo ma."
Ka a Levi vaa ir bar bomo a jaa tɩ turo wʋ.
Levi maal bʋ̃diir kʋ a Yesu a be a wʋ yir na wʋ bʋɔl a taaba lõpodierbe nɩ nɩyɔɔ ka ba wa 'mataa dire.
Tɩchɛ a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe hũhũnõ nɩ a yele nyã sʋrɔ a Yesu poturbo, "Bo lɛ so ka yɩ 'mataa dire nɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a tʋ̃dɛbɛ tʋ̃nbɔ?"
Ka Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A ba ɩ nɩrɛ na kpɛ̃mɛ lɛ chiine tɩtɩlɛ jie ɛ, tɩchɛ baalaa lɛ ma chen.
N ba wa ɩka n wa bʋɔl a nɩtorsɩ ɛ, n wa naa ɩka n wa bʋɔl a tʋ̃dɛbɛ tʋ̃nbɔ ka ba wa lɩɛb tɩɛr."
Ka ba lɛ sʋʋr a Yesu, "Ŋmɩnɛ a ɩ ka Jɔɔn poturbo nɩ a Faraseemɩne poturbo ma jɛ̃n kɔ̃ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn, tɩchɛ ka a fʋ̃ʋ poturbo ma tɔ̃ɔ kpal a dib nɩ a nyũfʋ a lɛ a tɔ̃tɔ̃?"
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr ba, "Fʋn tʋ̃ɔ maal a bala ban bʋɔl a pɔɔ paalaa jie ka ba jɛ̃n kɔ̃ a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ na chɛnɛ be a ba sɛ̃ ɔ?
Tɩchɛ bɩbir kɔ̃ɔ na wa vɩɛ naa ka a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ yi a ba sɛ̃, a ber ala pɔ 'lɔ ban jɛ̃n nɩ kɔ̃."
Sʋkpa nyã lɛ wʋ lɔb kʋ ba, "Nɩrɛ maa ŋmaa fɔpaalaa sɛ choo fɔkoraa pɔ ɛ, 'lɔ be ɩ a lɛ a fɔpaalaa na chɩɛraa a fɔkoraa, bʋ̃paalaa nɩ bʋ̃koraa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'mataa ɛ.
Nɩrɛ maa 'yɔ̃ɔ dãbɩ̃ɩn a dãa wɔkoraa pɔ ɛ, 'lɔ be ɩ a lɛ a dãbɩ̃ɩn na pur naa a wʋɔ ka a dãa kpaar ka a wʋɔ mɩ sɔ̃ɔ.
Ba ma den dãbɩ̃ɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ a dãa wɔpaalaa pɔ.
Nɩrɛ wa nyũ a dãgaa wʋ maa lɛ bʋɔrɔ a dãbɩ̃ɩn ɛ, wʋ ma 'yɛr ɩka a dãgaa ɩn gar a dãbɩ̃ɩn."
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ daar, Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo kpɛ̃n tala a puo sãlsɔɔ, ka a wʋ poturbo piel fɔrɔ a bʋ̃bie na ba ŋmɩɛnɛ nɩ a nuur ɔɔrɔ.
Ka a Farasee bamɩne sʋʋr ba, "Bo lɛ yɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ na ba tara sɔr a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar ɛ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yaa kar a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ nyɛ a lɛ a David na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ nɩ a wʋ nɩbɛ a kɔ̃ na kpɛ ba ɛ?
Wʋ kpɛ̃n a Nãaŋmɩn yir tɩ de a paanʋ̃ɔ ala ban bin kʋ Nãaŋmɩn na wʋ 'wɔb an ba tara sɔr ɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔrlorbo tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ. Tɩ de amɩne mɩ kʋ a wʋ nɩbɛ."
Ka a Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Maa Nɩsaal Bie lɛ ɩ a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Soro."
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar ɩ̃sʋɔ, wʋ ben a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir na wʋ wile, ka a daba ɩ̃sʋɔ be be a nũsʋ̃ɔ na kpi.
A Faraseemɩne nɩ a nɛɛ wiwiilbe bʋɔrɔ sɔr na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu, lɛ lɛ ba tɔɔ gbʋr kaara wʋ ɩka ba kaa ala ɩ wʋn sãan a baal a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir ɔ.
Tɩchɛ Yesu bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban tɩɛrɛ na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a daba 'lɔ nũu na kpi, "Ir ara ka nɩrɛ jaa nyɛ fʋ." Ka a daba ir ara.
Ka a Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʋ ba, "N sʋʋr yɩ kaa, bo lɛ sɛɛ ɩka a maal a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar, fʋ maal vɩla bɩɩ fʋ maal dɛɛr? Fʋ kʋ nɩrɛ bɩɩ fʋ faa nɩrɛ, bɩɩ fʋ sɔ̃ɔ bar?"
Wʋ kãan ba jaa gʋɔr tɩ 'yɛr a daba, "Tur a fʋ nũu." A wʋ tur ka a nũu wʋ jaa sa.
Tɩchɛ ka a suur kpɛ ba ka ba guoro taa a lɛ ban na ɩ a Yesu.
A ber ala ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔ, Yesu don a tɔ̃ɔ ju Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ jie, wʋ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn a tɩ̃sɔɔ 'lɔ wʋ jaa.
A wɛr na wa chaar a bibio, wʋ bʋɔl naa a poturbo ka ba wa a wʋ sɛ̃, ka wʋ ir a ba pɔ pie nɩ ayi bʋɔlɔ ba nɩtʋ̃nsɩ.
A bala wʋn ir lɛ, Simon wʋn lɛ kʋ yopaalaa Pita, nɩ a wʋ yɛbɛ Andiru, Jemesɩ, Jɔɔn, Filip, Batolomi,
Matiu, Tomasɩ, Jemesɩ na ɩ Alfayasɩ bidaba, Simon na mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a wʋ wɛr yele,
Jemesɩ bidaba Judas, nɩ a Judas Isɩkariyot 'lɔ lɛ wa ɩ a gagaraa.
Yesu tara ban suun ka ba tɩ ara a jie 'lɔ na jɩ̃taa, kaa poturbo yɔɔ be be, ka a nɩyɔɔ mɩ yi Judiya, Jerusalɛm, ka bamɩne mɩ yi a Tire tẽe nɩ a Sidon tẽe na be a man koor.
Ba wa naa ɩka ba wa chɛl a wʋ 'yɛr tɩ wʋ sãa a ba baalsɩ. Wʋ sãan a bala ba jaa na tara a sɩdɛbɛ.
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa bʋɔrɔ a Yesu sɩɩrfʋ bojũu kpɛ̃ɔ yire naa a wʋ pɔ sãana a ba jaa baalsɩ.
Yesu kaara naa a wʋ poturbo tɩ 'yɛr, "Pʋpɛl lɛ kʋ a yɩn banyãna na ɩ a nɔ̃n dẽme. Yɩn lɛ so a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ.
Pʋpɛl lɛ kʋ a yɩn a kɔ̃ na kpɛ pʋ̃pãanyã yɩn lɛ na wa tɩɩ. Pʋpɛl lɛ kʋ a yɩn na kõnõ a pʋ̃pãanyã, yɩn wa laara naa.
Pʋpɛl lɛ kʋ yɩ a nɩbɛ na wa 'laar yɩ, na ba oo yɩ bar, tɩ tʋrɔ yɩ na ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yɩ yuor fɩka bʋ̃dɛɛr a maa Nɩsaal Bie jũu.
A bɩbir nyã wa vɩɛ yɩ chɩlɛ nɩ pʋpɛl, bojũu a yɩ sãyar waa naa na be a saaju. Lɛ lɛ a ba sãakpãmɩne dɔ̃ɔ maal a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ.
Nɛbier pɔɔn a yɩn na ɩ a tara dẽme, yɩn 'lɔ nyɛn a yɩ 'maalfʋ.
Nɛbier kpɛ̃n a yɩn na tɩɩ a pʋ̃pãanyã kɔ̃ na kpɛ yɩ naa. Nɛbier kpɛ̃n a yɩn na laara a pʋ̃pãanyã, yɩn lɛ nɩbaal na wa kpɛ a yɩ kõnõ.
Nɛbier kpɛ̃n a yɩn nɩbɛ jaa na bʋɔlɔ yɩ yo sʋ̃, lɛ lɛ a ba sãakpãmɩne mɩ dɔ̃ɔ bʋɔlɔ a jir 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ a yosʋ̃n.
"Tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ a yɩn na chɛlɛ a n 'yɛr, yɩ nʋ̃ a yɩ dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃sɩ na yɩ maal vɩla kʋ a bala na 'laar yɩ.
Yɩ 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ, na yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ a bala na gere yɩ.
Nɩrɛ wa 'ma fʋ tʋkpal pɔ, lɛ lɩɛb a bʋ̃'yen ka wʋ lɛ 'ma, nɩrɛ wa de a fʋ fuu kpɛ̃ɛ ta mɔ̃ɔ wʋ a fuu bile ɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa wa sʋɔr fʋ bon de kʋ wʋ, nɩrɛ wa de a fʋ bon taa lɛ wa sʋrɔ wʋ go ɛ.
A lɛ yɩn bʋɔrɔ ɩka a nɩbɛ ba maal kʋ yɩ, yɩ mɩ maal a lɛ kʋ ba.
"Ala ɩ yɩ nʋ̃ naa a bala na nʋ̃ yɩ, yobuor lɛ yɩ nyɛ? A yelbetʋ̃nbɔ gba mɩ nʋ̃n a bala na nʋ̃ ba.
Ala ɩ yɩ maala na vɩla kʋrɔ a bala na maal yɩ a vɩla, yobuor lɛ yɩn nyɛ? A yelbetʋ̃nbɔ gba mɩ ɩrɛ naa a lɛ.
Ka ala ɩ fʋ pɛ̃ɛn a bala fʋn tɩɛr ɩka ban wa yab fʋ naa, yobuor lɛ yɩn wa nyɛ? A yelbetʋ̃nbɔ ma pɛ̃ɛn a ba taaba tɩɛrɛ ɩka ban wa yab a jaa.

Tɩchɛ yɩ nʋ̃ a yɩ dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃sɩ na yɩ maal vɩla kʋ ba, yɩ pɛ̃ɛ ba na yɩ taa chɛlɛ ɩka ba lɛ wa yab yɩ ɛ. Ala lɛ a yɩ sãyar na waa, ka yɩ na ɩ a saaju Nãaŋmɩn bibiir, bojũu 'lɔ lɛ maala vɩla kʋrɔ a nɩhayasɩ nɩ putudẽme.
Yɩ ɩ nɩbibaal dẽme nɩtãa lɛ a yɩ Sãa na ɩ a nɩbibaal sʋɔ.
"Yɩ ta tɔɔr nɩrɛ 'yɛr ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn mɩ wa tɔɔr a yɩ 'yɛr ɛ. Yɩ ta 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ 'yɛr ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn mɩ ta 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ 'yɛr ɛ. Yɩ vɛ̃ kʋ nɩrɛ ka Nãaŋmɩn mɩ vɛ̃ kʋ yɩ.
Yɩ de tɩr, Nãaŋmɩn mɩn kʋ yɩ naa, man vɩla tɩ dib 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩ yɛ yɛɛ ka a yaara, an kpaar dɔɔl a yɩ gbɛɛ ju. A bon 'lɔ yɩn man tɩr, 'lɔ mɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na man kʋ yɩ."
Sʋkpa nyã lɛ a Yesu lɛ lɔb kʋ ba, "Jɔ̃ɔ na tʋ̃ɔn jɔ̃ɔ tɔɔ? Ba jaa ayi kʋ̃ lo bɔɔ pɔ ɛ?
Nɩrɛ na jãna wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ gar a wʋ wiwile ɛ, tɩ 'lɔ wa jãn baar wʋn tʋ̃ɔ kaara a wʋ wiwile kaar.
"Ŋmɩnɛ a fʋ kaara a dabile na be a fʋ yɛbɛ nɩbir pɔ, tɩ ba chɛlɛ a dakpɛ̃ɛ na be a fʋ̃ʋ nɩbir pɔ ɛ?

Bɩɩ Ŋmɩnɛ a ɩ ka fʋ 'yɛr kʋ a fʋ yɛbɛ, n yɛbɛ vɛ̃ ka n ir a a dabile bar a fʋ nɩbir pɔ, tɩ ba ire a dakpɛ̃ɛ na be a fʋ̃ʋ nɩbir pɔ ɛ? Fʋ̃ʋ nɩbɛlɛ nyã, de nie ir a dakpɛ̃ɛ a fʋ nɩbir pɔ bar na fʋ pãa nyɛrɛ tʋ̃ɔ ir a dabile a fʋ yɛbɛ nɩbir pɔ bar.
"Tɩsʋ̃ ba wɔ̃nɔ̃ bidɛbɛ ɛ, bɩɩ tɩdɛɛr mɩ ba wɔ̃nɔ̃ bisʋ̃n ɛ.
Tɩɛ jaa a wʋ wɔ̃mɔ̃ lɛ ba ma de bɔ̃ɔn wʋ. Ba maa pɔr kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ gʋtɩɛ ju ɛ, bɩɩ pɔr 'wɔ̃rɔ tamiir tɩɛ ju ɛ.
Nɩsʋ̃ a yelsʋ̃ ala na be a wʋ pʋɔm lɛ wʋ ma 'yɛrɛ, ka a nɩdɛɛr mɩ ma 'yɛrɛ a yeldɛbɛ ala na be a wʋ pʋɔm. Ala na sɛɛ a pʋɔ lɛ a nɛɛ ma 'yɛrɛ.
"Ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ bʋɔlɔ ma ɩka Soro, tɩ na yaa turo a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr ɛ?
Nɩrɛ jaa na wa a n sɛ̃ na wʋ wõ a n 'yɛr tɩ maala, ɩn wiil yɩ naa a lɛ wʋn be.
Wʋ kaara fɩka nɩrɛ na mɩɛrɛ yir na wʋ tuu a dachin par kparaa bɔɔ tɩ pɔɔn kʋsɩr na mɛ a dachin dɔɔl. Kʋ̃ɔ wa yaar yi jilʋ̃ a yir, ka a kɔ̃sɛbɛ ŋmiere a yir tɩ waa dam ɛ, bojũu ba mɛ wʋn sʋ̃.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na wõ a n 'yɛr tɩ na waa maala ɛ, wʋ kaara fɩka nɩrɛ na mɛ yir dɔɔl a tãn mʋɔr ju, waa tuu tɩ mɛ ɛ. A kɔ̃sɛbɛ wa yin ŋme a dachin, ka a dachin wʋ jaa lo ŋmɛr."
A lɛ a nɩbɛ na wõ a 'yɛrsɩ anyãna a Yesu na 'yɛr kʋ ba baar wʋ chen a Kapenahum.
Be lɛ a soja nɩdiere gbãgbaa wʋn nʋ̃ yɔɔ jaa bɩɛrɛ ɩrɛ na ŋmaa vʋʋr.
Soja nɩdiere na wõ a Yesu yele, wʋ tʋ̃n a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdierbe bamɩne ka ba tɩ sʋɔr a Yesu ka wʋ wa sãa a wʋ gbãgbaa.
Ba wan a Yesu sɛ̃ wa sʋɔr wʋ yãayãabɩlɛ 'yɛrɛ, "A daba nyã sɛɛ naa ɩka fʋ tɩ sʋ̃ʋ wʋ,
bojũu wʋ nʋ̃n a sɩ nɩbɛ na vɛ̃ ka ba mɛ a sɩ lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie."
Yesu pɔɔ ba naa ka ba 'mataa chiine tɩ gbʋrɔ a daba yir, ka wʋ tʋ̃ a wʋ barmɩne ka ba tuor 'yɛr a Yesu ɩka. "N Soro, ta bal a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, bojũu n ba sɛɛ ka fʋn wa kpɛ a n yir ɛ.
Ala lɛ so gba maa mɩ̃ɛ na ba 'la wa a fʋ sɛ̃ ɛ. Tɩchɛ 'yɛr bir tɛɛ an sãan a n gbãgbaa.

Bojũu maa mɩ̃ɛ tara na nɩbɛrɛ ɩn joro dãbɩ̃ɛ, naa mɩ tara a sojasɩ ka ba mɩ be a n pĩlem. Maa 'yɛr kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ ɩka wʋ, chen wʋ ma chen naa, bɩɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ ɩka wʋ wa, wʋ ma wa naa. N ma 'yɛr kʋ a n gbãgbaa, maal anyã, ka wʋ ma maal."
A lɛ a Yesu na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ a daba nyã na ba ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ na 'yɛr, ka nɛ'maa wʋ, ka wʋ lɩɛb 'yɛr kʋ a nɩyɔɔ bala. "A Isɩral nɩbɛ pɔ gba, n ba nyɛ a sɔɔfʋ nyã bʋrɔ ɛ."
Ka a wʋ barmɩne bala wʋn tʋ̃ lɩɛb kpɛ a yir tɩ nyɛ ka a gbãgbaa sa.
Ala lɛ a wɛr chaar ka Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo 'matãan nɩyɔɔ na turo wʋ ka ba 'mantaa chen a tẽe ban bʋɔlɔ Nain.
Wʋn wa gbʋr a tẽe dɔ̃dɔr kpɩɛraa ba tuon kũu wa yin na ɩ a pɔɔ bidabʋ̃'yen tɩ wʋ ɩ pɔɔkʋɔr. Ka a tẽe 'lɔ nɩbɛ yɔɔ mɩ pʋɔ wʋ.
A lɛ a Soro na wa nyɛ a pɔɔ, nɩbaal kpɛ wʋ naa ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a pɔɔ, "Ta kõnõ ɛ."
Tɩ na wʋ chen tɩ sɩɩr a kũu ban tuo, ka a bala na tuo a ba ara. Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Pɔlbile, fʋ̃ʋ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ nɩ ir."
Ka a kũu vaa ir jɩ̃nɛ tɩ piel na wʋ 'yɛrɛ ka Yesu de wʋ kʋ a ma.
Dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ̃n ba jaa ka ba pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ nɩ, "Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrkpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ yi sɩ, Nãaŋmɩn wan ɩka wʋ wa sʋ̃ʋ a wʋ nɩbɛ."
Ka a Yesu yele ŋme yaar a Judiya paal wʋ jaa nɩ a tẽn ala na gbʋr.
Jɔɔn poturbo tɩ man a yele anyã a jaa kʋ wʋ, ka wʋ bʋɔl a ba ayi
na wʋ tʋ̃ ba a Soro sɛ̃ ka ba tɩ sʋʋr wʋ kaa, "Fʋ̃ʋ ɩ a 'lɔ na wa bɩɩ sɩ chɛlɛ nɩyuo?"
Ka a nɩbɛ bala wa a Yesu sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr, "A Jɔɔn kɔ̃suor lɛ tʋ̃ sɩ a fʋ sɛ̃ ɩka sɩ wa sʋʋr fʋ kaa, fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a 'lɔ na wa bɩɩ sɩ chɛlɛ nɩyuo?"
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ mɩ lɛ Yesu sãa baalsɩ, bala na tara a sɩdɛbɛ na wʋ yuon jɔ̃n nɩbie.
Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a bala a Jɔɔn na tʋ̃, "Yɩ lɩɛb kul tɩ man kʋ a Jɔɔn a lɛ yɩn nyɛ tɩ wõ, jɔ̃n nyɛrɛ naa ka gbɛrsɩ chiine ka kɔ̃kɔ̃n sa, ka wõn wõnõ, ka kũusɩ ir ɩ vʋɛ, ka a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ mɩ ta a nɔ̃n dẽme.
Pʋpɛl sʋɔ lɛ a 'lɔ a n yele na ba bãr wʋ lɔb ɛ."
A bala a Jɔɔn na tʋ̃ na wa chen baar, Yesu piel 'yɛrɛ a Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʋrɔ a nɩyɔɔ bala, "Bo lɛ yɩ dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ a kaafʋ jie? A jɩmur a sɛsɛbɛ na dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ bɩɩ?
Ala ba ɩ lɛ ɛ, bo yɩ chen tɩ nyɛ? Daba na su bʋ̃pɩɛl ɔ? Kai, a bala na suro a bʋ̃sʋ̃n, na ba dire a bʋ̃sʋ̃n nãa yir lɛ ba ma be.
Tɩchɛ bo lɛ yɩ tɩ nyɛ? Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɔ. Ɔ̃ɔ, n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka wʋ gar Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
A anyã yele lɛ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, 'Ɩn tʋ̃ naa a n tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ ka wʋ de a fʋ nie na wʋ tɩ chɔɔr a fʋ sɔr kʋ fʋ.'
N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka bala pɔɔ na dɔɔ ka a wɛr pɔ ba ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar a Jɔɔn ɛ, tɩchɛ 'lɔ mɩ na ɩ jaa pʋʋr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ gar wʋ naa."
Ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa lɔ̃ɔn a lõpodierbe gba na wõ a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr, ba sɔɔ naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn yele tor naa, na ba sɔɔ ka a Jɔɔn so ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ.
Tɩchɛ a Faraseemɩne nɩ a bala na bɔ̃ɔ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ, bala mɩ̃ɛ tɔr naa a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ, bojũu baa sɔɔ ka a Jɔɔn so ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ ɛ.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Ba boo lɛ ɩn de a dɩna nɩbɛ naa man? Bo lɛ ba nyɛtãan?
Ba nyɛntãan bibiir na jɩ̃nɛ daa pɔ bʋɔlɔ taa, 'Sɩ pɛɛlɛ naa a laa 'lɩr tɩ yaa sɛɛrɛ bɩ̃nɛ ɛ, na sɩ kõnõ kõyiel tɩ yaa ŋmara nɩbikʋ̃ɔ ɛ.'
A Jɔɔn kɔ̃suor na wa, waa dire bʋ̃diir ɛ, waa nyuro dãa ɛ, ka yɩ 'yɛr ɩka sɩdɛɛr lɛ wʋ tara.
Ka a maa Nɩsaal Bie wa na n dire na n nyuro ka yɩ lɛ 'yɛr, 'Wʋ dire na ba gala ɛ, na wʋ nyuro dãa, na wʋ ɩ a lõpodierbe nɩ a tʋ̃dɛtʋ̃nbɔ baraa.'
Tɩchɛ a yɛ̃ ma wiil a lɛ wʋn tor a wʋ bibiir pɔ."
A Farasee nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ bʋɔl a Yesu ɩka wʋ wa di bʋ̃diir a wʋ yir, ka wʋ chen a Farasee nɩrɛ 'lɔ yir tɩ jɩ̃nɛ a bʋ̃diir difʋ jie.
Pɔɔ ben a tẽe pɔ na wʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ tʋ̃dɛbɛ, wʋn wa wõ ɩka a Yesu ben a Farasee yir, wʋ den a kãnyũvɩla na sɛɛ pɩ̃rtɔbile na wʋ chiin.
Wʋ tɩ kpɛ̃n naa na wʋ ara a Yesu gbɛɛ par kõnõ. Wʋ soor a nɩbikʋ̃ɔ 'maan a Yesu gbɛɛ tɩ nyɔɔ a jukɔɔl fɩɛl bar, tɩ mʋʋr a gbɛɛ tɩ kpaar a kãnyũvɩla ala 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu gbɛɛ pɔ.
Ka a Farasee nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bʋɔl wʋ ka wʋ tɩ dire, na nyɛ a lɛ ka wʋ tɩɛr, "Ala ɩ a daba nyãna ta ɩn Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ wʋn taa bɔ̃ɔn naa a pɔɔ nyãna tɔ sʋɔ na sɩrɛ wʋ, wʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ na tʋ̃dɛbɛ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr sɔɔ wʋ, "Simon, n tara na 'yɛr na sʋʋr fʋ." Ka a Simon 'yɛr, "Wiwile, sʋʋr ma."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Nɩbɛ ayi kɔ̃ɔ lɛ tɩ pɛ̃ɛ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ libie, ɩ̃sʋɔ pɛ̃ɛn kɔɔr anũu (500) ka ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ pɛ̃ɛ lɩjaayi nɩ pie (50).
A nɩbɛ ayi banyãna ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba tara a libie na yab wʋ ɛ, ka a 'lɔ na so a libie 'yɛr, 'Yɩ ta lɛ yab go ɛ, a sãn baar naa.' Buor sʋɔ lɛ na nʋ̃ wʋ yɔɔ?"
Ka a Simon 'yɛr, "N tɩɛr ɩka a 'lɔ sãn na waa lɛ." Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Sɩrɛ fʋ 'yɛr."
Yesu lɩɛb tor a pɔɔ tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʋ a Simon, "Fʋ nyɛn a pɔɔ nyãna? Ɩn wa kpɛ a fʋ yir, faa kʋ ma kʋ̃ɔ ɩka n pɛɛ gbɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a pɔɔ pɛɛn a n gbɛɛ nɩ a wʋ nɩbikʋ̃ɔ tɩ de a wʋ jukɔɔl fɩɛl bar.
Faa sʋʋr ma kpɩ̃ɛn ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa ɩn wa kpɛ a pɔɔ nyã ba bar ma kpɩ̃ɛn sʋʋrfʋ ɛ.
Faa pur kãa 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a ju pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ a pɔɔ kpaar a kãnyũvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a gbɛɛ pɔ.
A lɛ jũu n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ fʋ ɩka a wʋ tʋ̃dɛbɛ ala a jaa vɛ̃n kʋ wʋ, bojũu a wʋ nʋ̃fʋ waa naa. Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ jaa pʋʋr kʋ a wʋ nʋ̃fʋ mɩ ɩn jaa pʋʋr."
A Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʋ a pɔɔ, "A fʋ yeldɛbɛ vɛ̃n bar."
Ka a bala na lɔ̃ɔ jɛ̃n wʋ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa, "An lɛ anyã, na wʋ mɩ ma vɛ̃ nɩrɛ yeldɛɛr bar?"
A Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a pɔɔ, "A fʋ sɔɔfʋ faa fʋ naa, chiine nɩ nyã'maar."
A anyãna puor, Yesu yɔn a tẽbɛrɛ nɩ a tẽbil 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr kʋrɔ ba ka a wʋ nɩtʋ̃nsɩ Pie nɩ Ayi pʋɔ wʋ.
Ka a pɔbɔ bamɩne mɩ pʋɔ wʋ, bala lɛ wʋ dɔ̃ɔ dii a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi na wʋ sãa a ba baalsɩ, ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ ba bʋɔlɔ Mɛɛr na yi a Magdala 'lɔ lɛ wʋ dii a sɩdɛbɛ ayopõi ka a yi,
Joana lɛ a ɩ̃sʋɔ na ɩ a Kuja na kaara a Hɛrɔd yir pɔɔ, Susana lɛ a ɩ̃sʋɔ nɩ a pɔbɔ yɔɔ bamɩne. Banyãna lɛ de a ba bomo sʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo.
Nɩyɔɔ yin tẽn tẽn waara a Yesu sɛ̃, a nɩyɔɔ banyãna na wa duo, sʋkpa nyã lɛ wʋ lɔb kʋ ba,
"Kʋɔraa lɛ yin wʋ bʋ̃bʋrɔ bʋrfʋ jie. Wʋ tɩ yaara naa yʋɔrɔ nɩ ka amɩne tɩ lo sɔr pɔ, ka ba nɛ nɛb ka lubil wa tuur di.
Ka amɩne mɩ tɩ lo kʋsɩr pãn ju naa bul tɩ kpi bojũu tãn ba be be ɛ.
Ka amɩne mɩ lo gʋʋr pɔ 'mataa bul ka a gʋʋr nʋ̃ɔ fɩ̃ɩn ba.
Tɩchɛ ka amɩne mɩ lo a kɔjɔ̃ pɔ bul dɔɔ jur kɔɔkɔɔr naa gar a lɛ wʋn bʋr." Yesu na wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ baar, wʋ 'yɛr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, "Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara tuor wõnõ nɩ wʋ chɛlɛ."
Ka a wʋ poturbo sʋʋr wʋ a sʋkpa nyã par.
A wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩn 'lɔ, n vɛ̃ naa ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ yelsɔɔlsɩ, tɩchɛ a bala na chɛ, sʋkpar lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ ba, 'Ba ma kaa naa tɩ maa nyɛ ɛ, na ba ma wõnõ tɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ.'
"A sʋkpa par nɩ nyã. Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr lɛ ɩ a bʋ̃bie.
A ala na lo a sɔr pɔ ɩn a bala na wõ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ka a tɩɩ wa ir naa a ba nyãa pɔ, ka ba ta sɔɔ de nyɛ faafʋ ɛ.
Ala mɩ na lo a kʋsɩr pãn ju ɩn a bala na wõ a 'yɛr den pʋpɛl, tɩchɛ baa tara nyɩbɛ ɛ. Ba sɔɔn ara bɩ̃lãa tɩchɛ bɛɛr kaa wa wa ba ma lo naa.
A bʋ̃bie ala na lo a gʋʋr pɔ ɩn a bala na wõ a 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ka a ɩ̃gãn nyã vɔlaa nɩ bʋ̃tarsɩ nɩ a bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ fɩ̃ɩn ba ka baa tʋ̃ɔ dɔɔ bie ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a bʋ̃bie ala na lo a kɔjɔ̃ pɔ, ɩn a bala na wõ a 'yɛr na ba sɔɔ den nyãa ara nɩ pʋpɛl, ka a kãnyir vɛ̃ ka ba dɔɔ jur.
"Nɩrɛ jaa maa chʋm fɩ̃tɩn de laa kpa pɔɔ ɛ, bɩɩ de su gado pĩlem ɛ. Tɩchɛ wʋ ma den dɔɔl a dɔɔlfʋ jie ka a bala na kpɩɛrɛ nyɛ a chãa.
Bojũu bon jaa ba be be na sɔɔl ka ba kʋ̃ nyɛ wʋ ɛ, bɩɩ bon jaa ba be be sɔɔl ka ba kʋ̃ bɔ̃ɔn ɛ, bɩɩ kʋ̃ yi chãa pɔ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃ a lɛ yɩn chɛlɛ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bɔ̃ɔ a par Nãaŋmɩn na lɛ kʋ wʋn dɔɔl, nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na den a bɩ̃lãa 'lɔ wʋn tɩɛr ɩka wʋ bɔ̃ɔn a par."
Yesu ma nɩ a wʋ yɛɛr wan ɩka ba wa nyɛ wʋ, tɩchɛ a nɩyɔɔ jũu ba kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ɛ.
Ka nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ 'yɛr wʋ, "A fʋ ma nɩ a fʋ yɛɛr lɛ be a yõo bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba nyɛ fʋ."
A Yesu 'yɛr, "N ma nɩ a n yɛɛr lɛ a bala na wõ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr na ba turo."
Bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo, "Yɩ ɩ a sɩ gɔ̃ɔ a kasɛn a manyal gɔ̃ɔn." Be lɛ ba kpɛ a gboro na ba gɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
Ban gɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ tɩ wʋ gã gur. Ka a kɔ̃sɛkpɛ̃ɛ ire a man pɔ ka a kʋ̃ɔ ɔɔrɔ kpɩɛrɛ a gboro pɔ, ka ba ɩrɛ na mʋr.
Ka a poturbo tɩ sɩ̃ɩ wʋ 'yɛrɛ, "Kpãkpãana, a kʋ̃ɔ na di sɩ naa." Ka a Yesu ir tãn a sɛsɛbɛ nɩ a kʋ̃ɔ na ɔɔrɔ, ka a sɛsɛbɛ ŋmaa vʋʋr ka a kʋ̃ɔ mɩ lo jaa jomm....
Tɩ pãa sʋʋr a wʋ poturbo, "Nyɩnɛ a yɩ sɔɔfʋ be?" Ka ba mɩ de dãbɩ̃ɛ sʋrɔ nɩ taa, "Nɩ an lɛ anyã, na 'yɛr ka a sɛsɛbɛ nɩ kʋ̃ɔ tu a wʋ nɛɛ?"
Ba yin a Galilee gɔ̃ɔn na ba gɔ̃ɔ a Gerasenɩ gɔ̃ɔn.
Yesu na wa yire a gogoro ju wʋ tuor daba na tara sɩdɛbɛ na wʋ gele yi a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ. Bojũu a kor wʋn yi a yir na wʋ maa su fuu ɛ, tɩ na wʋ gãna a yar par.
Wʋn wa nyɛ a Yesu wʋ ŋmen chɛlma tɩ lo a Yesu niem na wʋ tãna 'yɛrɛ nɩ, "Bo lɛ fʋ bʋɔrɔ ka a n sɛ̃, a fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a saaju Nãaŋmɩn Bie? N sʋɔrɔ fʋ naa, ta ge ma ɛ."

Bojũu Yesu dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ a sɩdɛɛr ɩka wʋ yi a daba 'yɔ̃ɔ. Gbɛɛ yɔɔ jaa lɛ a ma ir a daba ka ba ma gbar a nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ nɩ bɔ̃jɔrsɩ kaara wʋ, tɩ wʋ ma kar a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ bar ka a sɩdɛɛr ma dii wʋ bar be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ wʋ yõ.
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr wʋ, "A fʋ yuor lɛ di bo?" Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Nɩyɔɔ." Bojũu sɩdɛyɔɔ lɛ kpɛ wʋ.
Ka a sɩdɛbɛ sʋɔrɔ a Yesu ɩka wʋ ta dii ba 'yɔ̃ɔ be a bɔɔ fulom 'lɔ pɔ ɛ.
Doyɔɔ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ara be a tɔ̃ɔ kõkoor dire, ka a sɩdɛbɛ sʋɔr a Yesu ɩka wʋ sɔɔ ka ba yi tɩ kpɛ a dor ala pɔ, ka wʋ sɔɔ kʋ ba sɔr.
A sɩdɛbɛ yin a daba pɔ tɩ kpɛ a dor pɔ, ka a tĩgbil suu tɩ kpɛ a man kʋ̃ɔ pɔ tɩ gbʋ̃m kpi kpi.
A bala na kaara a dor na wa nyɛ a lɛ na ɩ, ba jon kul a tẽe pɔ, nɩ a tẽbil ala na gbʋr tɩ 'yɛr a lɛ na ɩ.
Ka a nɩbɛ yi chen ɩka ba tɩ kaa a lɛ na ɩ. Ba chen a Yesu sɛ̃ tɩ nyɛ a dagẽgelaa a sɩdɛbɛ na yi tɩ chɛ bar ka wʋ chɩ na wʋ su a fuu jɩ̃nɛ a Yesu gbɛɛ par, ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba.
A nɩbɛ bala na dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ a lɛ an ɩ ka a gẽgelaa sa pãa mana kʋrɔ a nɩbɛ.
Ka a Gerasenɩ paal nɩbɛ ba jaa sʋɔrɔ a Yesu ɩka wʋ yi a be, bojũu dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba naa. Lɛ lɛ wʋ kpɛ a gboro yi a be chen.
Ka a daba 'lɔ pɔ a sɩdɛbɛ na yi sʋɔr a Yesu ɩka ba 'mataa chen, tɩchɛ a Yesu lɩɛb wʋ bar tɩ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ,
"Lɩɛb kul a fʋ yir tɩ man a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ kʋ fʋ." Lɛ lɛ ka a daba kul a tẽe pɔ tɩ mana kʋrɔ a nɩbɛ a lɛ a Yesu na ɩ kʋ wʋ.
Yesu na wa lɩɛb wa, a nɩyɔɔ tuor de wʋ, bojũu ba dɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ wʋ.
Ka daba ban bʋɔlɔ Jairusɩ na ɩ a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir nɩdier, wa gbur dumo a Yesu niem sʋɔrɔ wʋ yãayãabɩlɛ ɩka wʋ wa a wʋ yir,
bojũu a wʋ bipɔɔ bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ na nyɛ yuom pie nɩ ayi lɛ kpire. Yesu na de a sɔr chiine ka a nɩyɔɔ mɩl pɔɔ wʋ.
Ka pɔɔ mɩ be be na lo sɩɛ suoro faara yuom pie nɩ ayi, nɩrɛ jaa ba tʋ̃ɔ wʋ sãa ɛ.
A wʋ turo a puor tɩ sɩɩr a Yesu fuu nɛɛ ka a jɩ̃ɩ ŋmaa ajienaa.
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr, "An lɛ sɩɩr ma?" Ka ba jaa chiir ɩka baa sɩɩr wʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a Pita 'yɛr, "N Soro, a nɩbɛ waa naa na dara taa tɩɛr fʋ."
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩɩr ma na wʋ sa ka n bɔ̃ɔn."
A pɔɔ na wa nyɛ ka ɩ wʋ kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ sɔɔl ɛ, wʋ mɩrɛ naa wa lo gã a Yesu niem. A nɩyɔɔ bala niem tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr a lɛ jũu wʋn sɩɩr wʋ na wʋ sa ajienaa.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "N bipɔɔ, a fʋ sɔɔfʋ sa fʋ naa, kulo nɩ nyã'maar."
Yesu na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ, nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ yin a lɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩdier Jairusɩ yir wa 'yɛrɛ, "A fʋ bipɔɔ kpi naa ta lɛ fɩrɛ a wiwile go ɛ."
Yesu na wõ a lɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a Jairusɩ, "Ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Sɔɔ ma dɛ. Wʋn sa naa."
Wʋn wa ta a Jairusɩ yir waa sɔɔ ka nɩyuo kpɛ be ɛ, tɩ tara Pita, Jɔɔn nɩ Jemesɩ nɩ a bi sãa nɩ a ma kpɛ̃n.
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na kõnõ ŋmiere a chɛlsɩ, Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ bar a kõn waa kpi ɛ, wʋ gur naa."
Ka ba laara wʋ ban bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a bie kpi naa.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu nyɔɔ a bie nũu tɩ 'yɛr, "N bie, ir."
Ka wʋ sɩɛ lɩɛb wa kpɛ ka wʋ vaa ir. Ka a Yesu pãa 'yɛr, yɩ kʋ wʋ bʋ̃kɔ̃ɔ ka wʋ di.
Ka a sãa naa ma nyɔɔ nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka a Yesu kpãkpãan ba ɩka ba taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ nɩrɛ jaa a lɛ na ɩ ɛ.
Yesu na wa bʋɔl a wʋ nɩtʋ̃nsɩ pie nɩ ayi lɔ̃ɔ taa, wʋ kʋ ban kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ tʋ̃ɔfʋ ka ban diin sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi tɩ sãa baalsɩ.
Wʋ tʋ̃ ba naa ka ba chen tɩ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr tɩ sãa baal.
Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ taa tara bon jaa chiine ɛ. Yɩ ta de dãgbal ɛ, bɩɩ wʋɔ ɛ, bɩɩ bʋ̃diir ɛ, bɩɩ libie ɛ, bɩɩ de fuusɩ ayi ɛ.
Yir jaa pɔ yɩn tɩ kpɛ, yɩ jɩ̃nɛ a be tɩ tãn a daar 'lɔ yɩn na yi a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ.
Ala ɩ nɩbɛ ba wa de yɩ ɛ, yɩ yi a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ, tɩ yɩn wa yire yɩ pĩ pĩ a yɩ gbɛɛ tã-uul ka a di a ba dãasɩɛ."
Be lɛ ba yi lʋɔrɔ a tẽn tẽn 'yɛrɛ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã sãa na nɩ a nɩbɛ baalsɩ a jie wʋ jaa.
A Nãa Hɛrɔd na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ na ɩrɛ, ka tɩɛr nyɔɔ wʋ, bojũu bamɩne 'yɛrɛ naa ɩka Jɔɔn lɛ tɔ̃ɔ ir ɩ vʋr.
Ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ ɩka a Elaija lɛ tɔ̃ɔ yi, ka bamɩne mɩ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ tɔ̃ɔ ir ɩ vʋr.
Tɩchɛ ka a Hɛrɔd 'yɛr, "N ŋmaan Jɔɔn ju, tɩ an 'yɛr lɛ a nyã ɩn wõnõ?" Na wʋ mʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ nyɛ a Yesu.
A nɩtʋ̃nsɩ lɩɛb wa na ba wa man kʋ a Yesu a lɛ ban tʋ̃. Ka wʋ pãa tara a bala tɛɛ ka ba 'mataa chen a tẽe ban bʋɔlɔ Betɩsaida.
Tɩchɛ ka a nɩyɔɔ chɛnɛ bɔ̃ɔn na ba bɩɛr chen a jie. Wʋ de ba naa na wʋ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, tɩ sãa a bala na bʋɔrɔ a sãafʋ.
Mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa mʋrɔ, a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ pie nɩ ayi tɩ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Wɛl a nɩbɛ bar a ba chen a tẽbil anyã nɩ a por anyã na gbʋr na ba tɩ bɔ gaa jie nɩ bʋ̃diir di bojũu a ka ɩn mɔgɔ̃ɔ."
Ka wʋ 'yɛr sɔɔ ba, "Yɩn lɛ na kʋ ba bʋ̃kɔ̃ɔ ka ba di." Ka ba 'yɛr, "Paanʋ̃ɔsɩ anũu nɩ jɩ̃bie ayi tɛɛ lɛ sɩ tara, ka a ba ɩ sɩ chen tɩ da bʋ̃diir wa kʋ a nɩyɔɔ ba nyãna ɛ?"
A nɩyɔɔ bala, dɔɔr tɛɛ ɩn tur anũu (5,000). Tɩchɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a poturbo, "Yɩ ŋma a nɩbɛ ka ba jɩ̃nɛ jɩ̃nɛ gbulsɩ lɩjaayi nɩ pie pie."
A poturbo ɩn a lɛ ka nɩrɛ jaa jɛ̃ tẽe.
Yesu den a paanʋ̃ɔsɩ a nũu nɩ a jɩ̃mɛ ayi ala dʋl kaa saaju tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ na wʋ ŋma ŋma, de kʋ a poturbo ɩka ba de põ a nɩbɛ.
Ba jaa din tɩɩ, ka a poturbo wob a bʋ̃ŋmaar ala na chɛ sɛɛ pɛr pie nɩ ayi.
Daar kɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Yesu tɛɛ wa sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka wʋ poturbo be be ka wʋ sʋʋr ba, "An lɛ a nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka n ɩ naa?"
Ka ba 'yɛr, "Bamɩne 'yɛr ɩka fʋ ɩn a Jɔɔn 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr ɩka Elaija lɛ, ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ lɩɛb wa."
Ka wʋ sʋʋr ba, "Tɩchɛ yɩn mɩ, an lɛ yɩ 'yɛr ɩka n ɩ naa?" Ka a Pita 'yɛr, "Fʋ ɩ naa a Nɩ-iraa yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃."
Ka a Yesu kpãkpãan ba ɩka ba taa 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ.
Tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr, "A maa Nɩsaal Bie na din dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ ka a nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe tɔr ma bar, ka ba kʋ ma, ka a ber ata daar ka n ir ɩ vʋr."
Be lɛ wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba jaa, "Ala ɩ nɩrɛ na turo ma naa, wʋ 'laar a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɩ tuo a wʋ daa turo nɩ ma.
Bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ faa a wʋ nyɛvʋr a wʋ nyɛvʋr na bɔr naa, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na lɔb a wʋ nyɛvʋr bar a maa jũu na faa wʋ naa.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ tara naa a wɛr wʋ jaa bonsɩ tɩ bɔr bɩɩ ka a wʋ sɩɛ wɛ, bo tɔ̃nɔ̃ wʋ nyɛ?
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ nyɛ naa maa nɩ a n 'yɛr ka a ɩ vĩ yele a wʋ sɛ̃, a maa Nɩsaal Bie mɩ na kaa naa nɩnyɩnɛ ka wʋ ɩ vĩ sʋɔ maa wa lɩɛb waara nɩ a n tɩɩr nɩ a Sãa tɩɩr nɩ a malaka chɛchɛ bala.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka a yɩ bamɩne gba ara naa kana kʋ̃ kpi ɛ, tɩ na ban nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ."
Yesu na 'yɛr a 'yɛrbie anyãna baar a maal ber aniin tɩ wʋ tara Pita, Jɔɔn nɩ Jemesɩ don a tɔ̃ɔ ju Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ jie.
Wʋn tɩ sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn ka a nie lɩɛb, ka a fuu pɛl nyɩlɛ bũu 'lɩraa kaar.
Ka a dɔɔr ayi, Mosesɩ nɩ Elaija wa naa a wʋ sɛ̃.
Ba wa yin naa a saaju tɩɩr 'yɛrɛ nɩ a Yesu. Ba 'mantaa 'yɛrɛ a kũu a Yesu na tɩ kpi a Jerusalɛm 'yɛr.
Gʋ̃ɔ kpɛ̃n a Pita nɩ a wʋ taaba, tɩchɛ ban wa jɔɔ ir ba nyɛn a wʋ tɩɩr nɩ a dɔɔr ayi bala a ba ara a wʋ sɛ̃.
A dɔɔr bala na lɩɛb chiine ka Pita 'yɛr, "N Soro, a sɛɛn ka sɩn kpɩɛrɛ a ka. Bar a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɛɛr ata, fʋ̃ʋ so ɩ̃sʋɔ, Mosesɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ Elaija mɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ." Waa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ wʋn 'yɛrɛ ɛ.
Wʋn chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ a julõjuur wa pɔɔn ba jaa ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a Pita, Jɔɔn nɩ Jemesɩ.
Ka a kɔkɔr yi be a julõjuur pɔ 'yɛrɛ, "Nyã lɛ ɩ a n Bie ɩn ir, yɩ chɛlɛ a wʋ 'yɛr."
A kɔkɔr na wa 'yɛr baar, ba nyɛn a Yesu tɛɛ na ara. Ka a poturbo ba 'la man kʋ nɩrɛ a lɛ ban nyɛ ɛ.
A wɛr na wa chaar, ba yin a tɔ̃ɔ ju suu, a nɩyɔɔ wa lɔ̃ɔ a wʋ sɛ̃.
Ka a daba bʋɔl be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ, "Wiwile, n sʋɔrɔ fʋ naa, kaa a n bidaba, 'lɔ tɛɛ lɛ ɩ a n bie.
Sɩɛ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ tara wʋ, ma ire wʋ ba gala ɛ. Wʋ maa ŋmen a chɛlma tɩ tãanaa tɩ furo a natafuul a nɛɛ pɔ. Wʋ maa bara wʋ ɛ, na wʋ bʋɔrɔ a wʋ sɔ̃ɔfʋ.
N sʋɔr a fʋ poturbo ɩka ba dii a sɩɛ nyã bar tɩchɛ baa tʋ̃ɔ ɛ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Yɩn babãma dẽme na ba tara sɔɔfʋ ɛ, n be a yɩ sɛ̃ naa tara yɩ nɩ kãnyir tɩ tãn dabor?" Tɩ 'yɛr a daba, "Tɔɔ a bie wa kʋ ma!"
A bie na chɛnɛ waara ka a sɩdɛɛr ir a bie tãa lɔb a tẽe, tɩchɛ ka a a Yesu tãn a sɩdɛɛr na wʋ sãa a bie de kʋ a sãa.
Nɩbɛ ba jaa nɛ'maa naa ban nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ. A nɩbɛ na chɛnɛ kpire a lɛ a Yesu na ɩ, tɩ wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a poturbo,
"Yɩ chɛlɛ a lɛ ɩn 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, ban gar naa maa Nɩsaal Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ nuur pɔ."
Tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna wʋn 'yɛr par ɛ, a lii ba naa, ka ba bɔ̃ɔ faa, tɩ joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ba 'la sʋʋr wʋ ɛ.
Nɛchɩrɛ ir naa a Yesu poturbo pɔ ɩka a ba buor sʋɔ lɛ na ɩ a ba kpɛ̃ɛ.
Yesu na bɔ̃ɔ a ba tɩɛr, wʋ tɔɔn bibile wa lan a wʋ lõboor.
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nɩrɛ jaa na de a bibile nyãna a maa jũu maa lɛ wʋ de. Nɩrɛ jaa mɩ na de ma wʋ mɩ den a 'lɔ na tʋ̃ ma. Bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ɩ a yɩ jaa bile, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ gar yɩ jaa."
Ka a Jɔɔn 'yɛr, "N Soro, sɩ nyɛn nɩrɛ na de a fʋ yuor dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire, ka sɩ 'yɛr wʋ ɩka wʋ ta ɩrɛ a lɛ ɛ, bojũu waa ɩ a sɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ ɛ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Yɩ ta ŋmaa wʋ sɔr ɛ, bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba kpɛrɛ yɩ ɛ, wʋ pʋɔ yɩ naa."
Lɛ a sɔ̃ɔ na wa gbʋrɔ ka Yesu na lɩɛb do a saaju, wʋ ŋmen nyãa a Jerusalɛm chenfʋ.
Wʋ den nie tʋ̃ nɩbɛ ka ba de nie chen a Samariya tẽbile ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔ, na ban tɩ chɔɔr a jie bar wʋ.
Tɩchɛ a tẽe 'lɔ nɩbɛ ba sɔɔ de wʋ ɛ, bojũu Jerusalɛm lɛ wʋ chiine.
Ka a wʋ poturbo Jemesɩ nɩ Jɔɔn na wa nyɛ a lɛ, ka ba sʋʋr a Yesu, "Sɩ Soro, fʋ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka sɩ bʋɔl bũu ka ayi saaju suu wa di ba bɩɩ?"
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu lɩɛb tãn ba ɩka ba ta ɩ a lɛ ɛ.
Tɩ na ba chen tẽyuo pɔ.
A sɔr ban chɛnɛ de chiine ka daba ɩ̃sʋɔ 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu, "Jie jaa fʋn chiine ɩn turo fʋ naa!"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Mɔbaar tara naa bɔɔr ka a lubil mɩ tara choor, tɩchɛ maa Nɩsaal Bie ba tara jie na bin a n ju ɛ."
Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a daba ɩ̃sʋɔ, "Turo ma." Tɩchɛ ka a daba 'yɛr, "N Soro, bar ma sɔr ka n kul tɩ ũu a n sãa baar."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a daba, "Bar ka a kũn ũno ba mɩ̃ɛ kũn tɩchɛ fʋ̃ʋ 'lɔ, chen tɩ mʋɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr."
Ka ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ 'yɛr, "N Soro, ɩn turo fʋ naa tɩ bar ma sɔr ka n kul tɩ 'yɛr a n yir dẽme."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Nɩrɛ na nyɔɔ niin kuur tɩ lɩɛb kaara a puor ba sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɛ."
A nyã puor Yesu lɛ ir naa nɩbɛ lɩjaata nɩ pie nɩ ayi (72) bamɩne go, na wʋ tʋ̃ ba ayir yir ka ba de nie chen a tẽn nɩ a jiir ala a jaa wʋn na yɔ.
Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A puo bɛr ma naa, tɩchɛ ka a bala na ŋmara ba waa ɛ, a lɛ jũu yɩ sʋɔr a puo sɔɔ ka wʋ waan tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a puo pɔ.
Yɩ chen, yɩ kaara na fɩka piir ɩn tʋ̃nɔ̃ ka yɩn tɩ kpɛ gbõgborosɩ pɔ.
Yɩ taa de libie ɛ, bɩɩ wʋɔ ɛ, bɩɩ na fɔɔr ɛ, na yɩ puor nɩrɛ taa wa jaa a sɔr pɔ ɛ.
"Yir jaa pɔ yɩn wa kpɛ, yɩ de nie 'yɛr, 'Nyã'maar wʋ be a yir nyã pɔ.'
Ala ɩ nyã'maar sʋɔ ben a yir pɔ, a yɩ nyã'maar na be naa a wʋ sɛ̃, ala ba ɩ lɛ ɛ, an lɩɛb wa a yɩ sɛ̃.
Yɩ jɩ̃nɛ a yir nyɩnɛ pɔ dire na yɩ nyuro bon jaa ban wa kʋ yɩ, tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ sãyar sɛɛn wʋ naa. Yɩ taa lʋɔrɔ yie yʋɔrɔ nɩ ɛ.
Tẽe jaa pɔ yɩn wa kpɛ, ka ba de yɩ, yɩ dire bon jaa ban kʋ yɩ.
Yɩ sãana a baalsɩ bala na be be tɩ na yɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba, 'A Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ gbʋr yɩ naa.'
Tɩchɛ tẽe jaa pɔ yɩn wa kpɛ, ka baa de yɩ ɛ, yɩ yi de a tẽe sãlsɔɔ tɩ 'yɛr,
'A yɩ tẽe tã-uul gba na mar a sɩ gbɛɛ, sɩ kpoor 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ. Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a nyãna ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ gbʋr naa.'
N 'yɛr kʋ yɩ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ bɩbir, Sodom na sa naa a tẽe 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.

"Nɛbier ben a yɩn Korajin dẽme sɛ̃, nɛbier mɩ ben a yɩn Betɩsaida dẽme mɩ sɛ̃. A nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ ala ɩn tʋ̃ a yɩ jie, ala ɩ a mɩ ta tʋ̃n a lɛ a Tire nɩ Sidon tẽe pɔ, ban taa sun bʋ̃jarsɩ jɛ̃n tãpɩɛl pɔ lɩɛb ba tɩɛr.
Tɩchɛ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ daar, a Tire nɩ a Sidon na sa yɩ naa.
A yɩn Kapenahum dẽme, ban 'mɔɔ yɩn don saaju bɩɩ? Kai, ban suun yɩ naa kpĩisɩ tẽe.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na chɛlɛ a yɩn na ɩ a n poturbo na chɛl naa a n 'yɛr, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tɔr yɩ mɩ tɔr ma naa. Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tɔr ma mɩ tɔr naa a 'lɔ na tʋ̃ ma."
A nɩbɛ lɩjaata nɩ pie nɩ ayi bala wʋn tʋ̃ lɩɛb wa a wʋ sɛ̃ chɩlɛ 'yɛrɛ, "Sɩ Soro, a fʋ yuor jũu a sɩdɛbɛ tu naa a sɩ nɛɛ na be yire a nɩbɛ pɔ."
Ka Yesu 'yɛr sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, "N nyɛn Satan na yi saaju lo fɩka saa na nyɩɩr.
N kʋ yɩn kpɛ̃ɔ ka yɩn nɛɛrɛ waba nɩ lɔ̃n na yɩ tʋ̃ɔ a yɩ dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃ Satan, bon jaa kʋ̃ ɩ yɩ ɛ.
Yɩ ta chɩlɛ a sɩdɛbɛ na tu a yɩ nɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ chɩlɛ a yɩ yuor sɛb bin be a saaju."

A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ a Yesu ka wʋ 'yɛr, "N dãn a fʋ̃ʋ n Sãa na ɩ a saaju nɩ a tẽe Soro, bojũu fʋ̃ʋ lɛ sɔɔl a yele anyãna bar ka a bala na ɩ a yɛ̃ dẽme nɩ a bala na jãn ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ na fʋ de wiil kʋ bibiir. Ɔ̃ɔ, n Sãa lɛ lɛ nʋ̃mɔ̃ fʋ ka fʋ maal.

Maa lɛ a n Sãa kʋ a yele a jaa, nɩrɛ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ a Bie ka a Sãa ba lɛ ɛ. Nɩrɛ jaa mɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ a Sãa ka a Bie ba lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala a maa Nãaŋmɩn Bie na ir, na wiil naa a sãa kʋ ba. Ka ba bɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na be."
Tɩ pãa lɩɛb 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo tɛɛ, "Pʋpɛl dẽme lɛ a bala nɩbir na nyɛ a anyã yɩn nyɛ.
Bojũu n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nɩ a nãmɩne dɔ̃ɔ bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba nyɛ a anyã yɩn nyɛ, tɩ ba nyɛ ɛ, na ba ta wõ a anyã yɩn wõ tɩ ba wõ ɛ."
Nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na bɔ̃ɔ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ bɛɛr a Yesu kaa na wʋ ir sʋʋr, "Wiwile, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn ɩ naa nyɛ nyɛvʋr kpo kpo?"
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr wʋ, "Bo ba sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ bin? Ŋmɩnɛ fʋ ma kar?"
Ka a daba 'yɛr, "Nʋ̃ a fʋ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a fʋ nyãa wʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ nyɛvʋr wʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ kpɛ̃ɔ wʋ jaa, nɩ a fʋ tɩɛr wʋ jaa. Na fʋ nʋ̃ a fʋ tɔ sʋɔ nɩtãa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ."
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr, "Fʋ 'yɛr vɩla, tɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ, fʋn ben be kpo kpo."
Tɩchɛ wʋn ba ɩrɛ a lɛ ɛ, tɩ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ sɔɔl a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ bar jũu, wʋ sʋʋr naa Yesu, "Nɩbuor lɛ ɩ a n tɔ sʋɔ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Daba kɔ̃ɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ yi Jerusalɛm chiine Jeriko ka a nãnyisɩ tɩ var wʋ be a sɔr pɔ. Ba yaar naa fuusɩ tɩ ŋme ŋme wʋ, ka wʋ vɔɔ chɛ bɩ̃lãa naa kpi, ka ba bar wʋ tɩ chen.
A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ de a sɔr 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, wʋn tɩ nyɛ a daba, wʋ gõl bar tɩ chen.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Puorfʋ yir tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ waara wa nyɛ, na wʋ mɩ gõl tu jiyuo chen.
Tɩchɛ ka a nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na ɩ a Samariya nɩrɛ mɩ tu a sɔr 'lɔ a daba na gã, wʋn wa nyɛ wʋ, nɩbaal kpɛ wʋ naa.
Ka wʋ tɔɔ ta a daba pʋr dãa pɛɛn a natɩɛ bar, tɩ maal kãa fɔ, tɩ de fɔbaa lũ pɔɔ. Na wʋ 'mɔɔ a daba dɔɔl a wʋ bʋ̃ɔ ju chiin a sãanba gaa jie tɩ gãn.
Wɛr na wa chaar, wʋ den a kpãna libikue ayi kʋ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kaara a sãanba tɩ 'yɛr, 'Kaara wʋ, maa wa lɩɛb gɔr, ala ba wa ta ɛ, ɩn lɛ yab kʋ fʋ.' "
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr a daba, "A nɩbɛ ata banyãna, buor sʋɔ lɛ ɩ a daba nyã, a nãnyisɩ na ŋme tɔ sʋɔ?"
A wʋ 'yɛr, "Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kaa a wʋ nɩbaal." Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Mɩ chen tɩ maal a lɛ nɛ."
Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo na chiine ba vɩɛn kpɛ tẽbile kɔ̃ɔ pɔ, ka pɔɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Mata ka wʋ de ba na ir ba sãan.
A Mata tara na yɛbɛ ban bʋɔlɔ Mɛɛr, ka 'lɔ jɩ̃nɛ a Soro gbɛɛ par chɛlɛ a lɛ wʋn 'yɛrɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Mata wʋ yõ sõsoro nɩ a tʋ̃mɔ̃, na wʋ wa tɔɔ ta a Yesu sɛ̃ 'yɛr, "N Soro, a ba bã fʋ a n yɛbɛ na bar a tʋ̃mɔ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma ka n sõsoro nɩ ɛ? 'Yɛr wʋ ka wʋ ir wa sʋ̃ʋ ma."
Ka a Soro 'yɛr, "Mata, Mata fʋ fɩrɛ na fʋ mɩ̃ɛ ka suur kʋrɔ fʋ.
Tɩchɛ yelbʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ fɛr, Mɛɛr ir naa a bʋ̃sʋ̃ nɩrɛ na kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ faa wʋ yin a wʋ sɛ̃ ɛ."
Bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ Yesu ben a jie kɔ̃ɔ na wʋ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn, wʋn wa sʋɔr baar, ka a wʋ poturbo ɩ̃sʋɔ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Sɩ Soro, wiil sɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ, nɩtãa lɛ a Jɔɔn na wiil a wʋ poturbo."
A wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩn ma wa sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yɩ 'yɛr, Sɩ Sãa, sɩ kʋ naa a fʋ yuor tɩɩr. A fʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ wʋ wa.
Na fʋ kʋ sɩ a sɩ bɩbir jaa bʋ̃diir.
Vɛ̃ a sɩ maal dɛbɛ bar, bojũu sɩ mɩ vɛ̃n kʋ a bala jaa na maal sɩ a dɛɛr. Ta sɔɔ ka bɛɛr kaa nyɔɔ sɩ ɛ."
Be lɛ wʋ pãa 'yɛr kʋ ba. "Ala ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ tara na baraa na wʋ wa ir chen a wʋ sɛ̃ tɩ̃sɔɔ bɩ̃ɩn tɩ 'yɛr, 'Pɛ̃ɛ ma jɔ̃ nɩ ŋmele,
bojũu n baraa ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ wa suu a tɩ̃sɔɔ nyãna tɩ n ba tara bon na maal kʋ wʋ ɛ.'
Ka wʋ gã be a die pɔ tɩ 'yɛr, 'Ta dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma ɛ, a pãn pɔɔ naa ka maa naa bibiir be gã, n kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ ir kʋ fʋ bon go ɛ.'
N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ, a wʋ baraa na ba sɔɔ ir kʋ wʋ a jɔ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋn chɛnɛ ara kpãkpãana, wʋn wa ir kʋ wʋ jɩ̃ a lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ.
"Lɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, yɩ sʋɔr, Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ yɩ naa. Yɩ kaa yɩn nyɛ naa, yɩ kpoor a pãn wʋn yuo naa.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sʋɔr, wʋn nyɛ naa, ka a 'lɔ mɩ na kaara nyɛ, ka a pãn mɩ yuo kʋ a 'lɔ na kpoor.
A yɩn na ɩ a sãamɩne, buor sʋɔ bie lɛ na sʋɔr wʋ jɩ̃m ka wʋ de waa kʋ wʋ.
Bɩɩ sʋɔr najɛl ka wʋ de lɔ̃ɔ kʋ wʋ?
Ala ɩ a yɩn gba na ɩ nɩdɛbɛ bɔ̃ɔn vɩla ma ɩ kʋ a yɩ bibiir, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an ɩ ka yɩ Sãa na be a saaju kʋ̃ de a Sɩɛ kʋ a bala na sʋɔr wʋ ɛ?"
Yesu dire naa a sɩdɛɛr na be daba yɔ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka wʋ ɩ wõo. A sɩdɛɛr na wa yi a daba 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka wʋ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ, ka nɛ'maa a nɩbɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka a bamɩne 'yɛrɛ, "A sɩdɛbɛ nãa Beeljebul lɛ wʋ de dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ."
Ka a bamɩne mɩ bɛɛr wʋ kaara na ba bʋɔrɔ jɩ̃nɛ na yi saaju.
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ban tɩɛrɛ na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nãa jaa na jɛɛrɛ nɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a wʋ nãa na sɔ̃ɔ naa. Yir nɩbɛ mɩ na ir jɛɛrɛ taa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'mataa kpɛ ɛ.
