Lɛ mɩ lɛ, ala ɩ a Satan lɩɛb jɛɛrɛ nɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ na ɩ ara? N 'yɛr naa nɩtɔ̃ bojũu yɩ 'yɛr ɩka a Beeljebul lɛ n de dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ.
Ala ɩ a Beeljebul lɛ n tara dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ, tɩ a bala na ɩ a yɩ poturbo bo lɛ ba tara dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ? A lɛ jũu, bala lɛ na ɩ a yɩ 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ lɛ n dire nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yire wiil yɩn ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ wa naa a yɩ sɛ̃.
"Gãdaa na gu a wʋ yir nɩ jɛɛr bomo, a wʋ bonsɩ maa dam ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ wa wa naa na wʋ kpɛ̃mɛ gar wʋ, wʋn faan a wʋ jɛɛr bomo ala wʋn dɩɛl tɩ de a wʋ bonsɩ põn nɩbɛ.
"Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba be a n sɛ̃ ɛ, wʋ tara man nɩ 'yɛr, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba pʋɔ ma a sɩ kaala lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa ɛ, wʋ ma yɛ̃yɛl bar.
"Sɩdɛɛr ban wa dii bar ka wʋ yi nɩrɛ pɔ, wʋ ma chen dal pʋɔ ju tɩ bʋɔrɔ pɛ̃nfʋ jie, na waa nyɛ ɛ, na wʋ pãa wa 'yɛr, 'Ɩn lɩɛb kul a nɩrɛ 'lɔ pɔ ɩn yi tɩ chɛ bar.'
Wʋn wa lɩɛb wa, wʋ nyɛn a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kaara yir kaar ban pɩɩr tɩ chɔɔr wʋ sʋ̃.
Ka wʋ pãa tɩ bɔ sɩɩr ayopõi na tara putuo gar wʋ ka ba chen tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a be. Ka a daba pãa ɩ dɛɛr gar a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ be."
A nyãna lɛ a Yesu 'yɛrɛ ka a pɔɔ ŋme chɛlma be a nɩyɔɔ pɔ tɩ 'yɛr, "Pʋpɛl lɛ kʋ a fʋ ma 'lɔ na dɔɔ fʋ, nɩ a wʋ bɩr fʋn 'yɛn."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, a bala na wõ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr na ba turo, bala lɛ ɩ a pʋpɛl dẽme."
A nɩbɛ na waara 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ka Yesu 'yɛr, "A dɩna nɩbɛ banyãna ɩn putudẽme tɩ bʋɔrɔ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ ka a na ɩ jɩ̃nɛ, tɩchɛ ba kʋ̃ nyɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɛ, ka a Jona jɩ̃nɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Bojũu, lɛ a Jona na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ jɩ̃nɛ kʋ a Ninive dẽme, lɛ mɩ lɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na ɩ a jɩ̃nɛ kʋ a dɩna nɩbɛ.
A Siba Pɔɔ Nãa na yin a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ daar na wʋ wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ 'yɛr, bojũu wʋ dɔ̃ɔ yi be a tẽtɛɛr wa chɛl a Nãa Solomon yɛ̃ 'yɛr, tɩchɛ yɩ kaa a 'lɔ na gar a Solomon ben ka.
A 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ daar Ninive nɩbɛ na ir 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ 'yɛr, bojũu ba lɩɛb ba tɩɛr a Jona na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ ba, yɩ kaa a 'lɔ na gar a Jona ben ka.
"Nɩrɛ jaa ba be na chʋm fɩ̃tɩn na wʋ sɔɔl bar ɛ, bɩɩ de laa kpa pɔɔ ɛ. Wʋ ma dɔɔl bar a dɔɔl fʋ jie, ka a bala na kpɩɛrɛ nyɛ a chãa.
A fʋ nɩbir ɩn a ɩ̃gãn fɩ̃tɩn. A fʋ nɩbie wa ɩ, a fʋ ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa ma sɛɛn nɩ chãa. Tɩchɛ ala ba wa ɩ ɛ, a fʋ ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa ma ɩn libe.
Yɩ kaara sʋ̃ ka a chãa 'lɔ na be a yɩ pɔ, taa lɩɛb libe ɛ,
A lɛ jũu, ala ɩ a chãa sɛɛn a fʋ ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa ka a libe bɩ̃lãa jaa ba be be ɛ, wʋ jaa na ɩn chãa nɩtãa lɛ a fɩ̃tɩn na ma chaar fʋ a wʋ chãa."
Yesu na wa 'yɛr baar, Farasee nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ bʋɔl wʋ naa ka wʋ tɩ di bʋ̃diir, lɛ lɛ wʋ chen tɩ kpɛ jɩ̃nɛ a bʋ̃diir par.
Tɩchɛ ka a Farasee nɩrɛ jʋrɔ a Yesu ka a ɩ waa pɛɛ a ba pɛɛfʋ ɛ, ka nɛɛ 'maa wʋ.
Be lɛ a Soro pãa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Faa nyɛ, a yɩn Faraseemɩne ma pɛɛr naa a ŋmama nɩ a laar dũkur, tɩchɛ ka a yɩ pʋɔ sɛɛn fɔlfʋ nɩ putuo.
Jɔlɔ banyã, a ba ɩ a 'lɔ na maal a yõo 'lɔ lɛ mɩ maal a pʋɔ ɛ?
Tɩchɛ a ala na be a laa pʋɔm, yɩ de kʋ a nɔ̃n dẽme ka a bonsɩ a jaa pãa vɩɛlɛ kʋ yɩ.

"Nɛbier ben a yɩn Faraseemɩne sɛ̃, bojũu bʋ̃bile jaa yɩn da lɔ̃ɔn badʋʋ gba vaar, yɩ ma ir a da ŋmaa tɩ na yɩ ĩin vɩla maalfʋ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃fʋ bar. Ala lɛ yɩn taa irɛ na yɩ ta ĩin a ala na de nie bar ba maal ɛ.
Nɛbier ben a yɩn Faraseemɩne sɛ̃, bojũu yɩ nʋ̃ naa a nɩbɛrɛ jaa jie a yɩ lɔ̃ɔfʋ yie pɔ na yɩ mɩ nʋ̃ a daa pɔ puorfʋ.
Nɛbier ben a yɩ sɛ̃, bojũu yɩ kaara naa fɩka yar nɩbɛ na ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ do yʋɔrɔ."
Ka a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwile ɩ̃sʋɔ 'yɛr, "Wiwile, a anyãna fʋn 'yɛr, sɩ jaa lɛ fʋ 'mataa tʋrɔ."
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr wʋ, "A yɩn Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɛbier ben a yɩ sɛ̃, bojũu yɩ ma tuon nɩbɛ tuor na tɩrɛ tɩ na yɩ maa ir a yɩ nubir gba tɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ɛ.
Nɛbier ben a yɩ sɛ̃, bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ bala a yɩ sãamɩne na kʋ, yɩn lɛ mɛ a ba yar.
A lɛ yɩn maal din dãasɩɛ ɩka a yɩ sãamɩne lɛ. Bala lɛ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ka yɩ mɩ mɛ a ba yar.
A nɩtɔ̃ jũu lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ yɛ̃ sʋɔ 'yɛr, 'N tʋ̃n a n 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nɩ a n nɩtʋ̃nsɩ a ba sɛ̃, ka ban ir bamɩne kʋ tɩ ge bamɩne.'
A lɛ jũu, yele tuon a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ. A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ bala ban kʋ a kõr jaa, yɩn lɛ na yab a ba sãn.
Piel a Abel jɩ̃ɩ sɔ̃ɔ tɩ tãn a Jekariya ban kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʋ jie nɩ a puorfʋ jie chara pɔ. Ɔ̃ɔ, n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka a yɩn dɩna nɩbɛ lɛ na yab a jaa sãn.
Nɛbier ben a yɩn Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe sɛ̃, bojũu yɩn lɛ tara a bɔ̃ɔfʋ pãn bir, yɩn mɩ̃ɛ ba kpɩɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ pɔɔ var a bala na bʋɔrɔ a kpɛfʋ."
Yesu yin a be wʋn 'yɛr a anyãna, ka a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe kpãkpãana wʋ nɩ suur sʋrɔ nɩ wʋ 'yɛr yɔɔ.
Na ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ 'yɛr 'yɛr lɩɛb nyɔɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ lɛ, a nɩyɔɔ turo turo tire taa na ba nɛɛrɛ taa, ka Yesu piel kpãana a wʋ poturbo na wʋ 'yɛrɛ, "Yɩ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a Faraseemɩne dãbɩl pɔ, ala lɛ ɩ a ba nɛɛr ayi.
Bon jaa ba be be na pɔɔ naa kʋ̃ wa yuo ɛ, bɩɩ sɔɔl ka ba kʋ̃ bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
Ala yɩn 'yɛr libe pɔ, na yin chãa pɔ, ka ba wõ naa, ka a ala yɩn bʋl 'yɛr be a die pɔ, ban mʋɔl 'yɛr be a gar ju.
"N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ a yɩn na ɩ a n barmɩne ɩka, yɩ ta joro a bala na kʋ a yɩ ɩ̃gãn ɛ, tɩ na ba kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ yele jaa ɩ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ɩn wiil yɩ naa a 'lɔ yɩn na joro. Yɩ joro a 'lɔ na tʋ̃ɔ kʋ yɩ, tɩ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ lɔb yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a dɔɔyɛ jie. Ɔ̃ɔ, 'lɔ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ ɩka yɩ joro.
A ba ɩ kobsɩ ayi lɛ ba ma dãn tiitasɩ anũu ɛ? Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn maa ĩin a ba bʋ̃'yen bar ɛ.
Sɩrɛ jaa, Nãaŋmɩn sɔr a yɩ jukɔɔl a jaa bɔ̃ɔ, yɩ ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, yɩ gar tiita yɔɔ.
"N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na wa 'yɛr chã a nɩbɛ niem, ɩka wʋ bɔ̃ɔ naa a maa Nɩsaal Bie, 'lɔ lɛ n mɩ na 'yɛr chã ɩka, n bɔ̃ɔ wʋ naa a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ niem.
Tɩchɛ 'lɔ mɩ na chiir ma a nɩbɛ niem, 'lɔ lɛ n mɩ na chiir a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ niem.
Nɩrɛ jaa na 'yɛr 'yɛr kpɛ̃n a maa Nɩsaal Bie na chɛnɛ na nyɛ vɛ̃ kʋ fʋ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋ̃ nyɛ vɛ̃ kʋ fʋ ɛ.
Bala wa nyɔɔr yɩ chiin a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yie nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme sɛ̃, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a ɩ yɩ tɩɛr a lɛ yɩn na tɩ 'yɛr faa yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, bɩɩ a lɛ yɩn na 'yɛr ɛ.
Bojũu a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na wiil yɩ naa a lɛ yɩn na 'yɛr."
Ka nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ na be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Wiwile 'yɛr a n yɛbɛ ka wʋ ɩ a sɩ põ a kpĩi bonsɩ."
A Yesu 'yɛr wʋ, "Daba, an 'yɔ̃ɔ ma ɩka n ɩ 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ naa põnõ yɩ kpĩi bomo?"
Tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ kaara sʋ̃, na yɩ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a bʋ̃yɔɔ bɔfʋ pɔ, nɩrɛ bʋ̃yɔɔ ba kʋrɔ wʋ nyɛvʋr ɛ."
Be lɛ wʋ lɔb a sʋkpa nyã kʋ ba, "Danãa kɔ̃ɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, na wʋ kɔ chɛ yɔɔ jaa a wʋ puo pɔ.
Na wʋ piel tɩɛrɛ ɩka ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʋn ɩ, 'Ɩn ba tara jie na bin a bonsɩ ɛ?'
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ ɩn ɩ, 'Ɩn ŋmɛr a bobo anyãna bar, tɩ naa mɛ bʋ̃bɛrɛ naa su a chi 'yɔ̃ɔn a bonsɩ a be.
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʋ n mɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃gãn, pɛnɛ, n tara na bʋ̃yɔɔ ɩn bin kʋ n mɩ̃ɛ yuon kʋ̃ bɔ̃ɔ sɔr ɛ. Ɩn dire naa, na n nyuro, na n chɩlɛ.'
Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'Jɔl nyã, fʋn kpin a tɩ̃sɔɔ nyãna, tɩ a bonsɩ ala fʋn bin kʋ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ, an lɛ na de?'
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ an be nɩrɛ jaa na bin bonsɩ kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, tɩ ba ɩ tara sʋɔ Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ."
Kaa Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo, "A lɛ jũu, n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, yɩ ta waala a yɩ nyɛvʋr 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, 'yɛrɛ ɩka bo lɛ yɩn di ɛ. Bɩɩ waala ɩka bo lɛ yɩn su pɔɔ a ɩ̃gãn ɛ.
A nyɛvʋr gar naa a bʋ̃diir, ka a ɩ̃gãn mɩ gar a fɔɔr.
Yɩ kaa a gagasɩ, ba maa bʋr ɛ, bɩɩ ŋma ɛ, bɩɩ tara boor ma bin ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ guolo ba. Yɩn, yɩ gar a lubil.
A yɩ buor sʋɔ lɛ na waal na wʋ wa de bɩbir bʋ̃'yen pʋɔ a wʋ nyɛvʋr pɔ?
Ala ɩ yɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ a yelbile nyãna ɩ ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ tɩɛrɛ a ala na chɛ?
"Yɩ kaa nyɛ a lɛ a bonsɩ puul na ma nʋ̃ɔ. Ba maa tʋ̃ ɛ, bɩɩ wob fuu su ɛ, tɩchɛ a nãa Solomon gba nɩ a wʋ bʋ̃tarsɩ ba dɔ̃ɔ su fuu ka wʋ vɩɛlɛ gar naa ɛ.
Ala ɩ nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn ma pɩ̃ɛ a bonsɩ puul a mʋ̃ɔ pɔ ka a vɩɛlɛ a dɩna tɩchɛ ka a wɛr chaar ka a bũu di, wʋ kʋ̃ pɩ̃ɛ a yɩn gar a lɛ ɛ? Yɩn sɔɔfʋ na ba jɩ̃ bon ɛ.
Yɩ ta ir nyãa 'yɔ̃ɔ a ala yɩn na di bɩɩ nyũ pɔ ɛ, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a yɩ pɩla ɔɔrɔ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa, ala puor lɛ ba turo, tɩchɛ a yɩ Sãa bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka yɩ bʋɔrɔ naa a bonsɩ anyãna.
Yɩ de nie bɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ, ka anyãna a jaa wʋn den pʋɔ yɩ.
"Yɩn piir na ba jɩ̃ bon ɛ, yɩ ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, bojũu a yɩ Sãa pʋɔ pɛl naa wʋn kʋ yɩ a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ.
Yɩ da a yɩ bonsɩ de a libie põ nɔ̃n dẽme, yɩn tara naa a libie wʋʋr ala na ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ. Ka a yɩ bʋ̃tarsɩ be a saaju, naa kʋ̃ wur ɛ. Nãnyie kʋ̃ gbʋr be ɛ, kpolo ba be be na mʋʋ ɛ.
Bojũu, a jie a yɩ bʋ̃tarsɩ na be, be lɛ a yɩ nyãa mɩ ma gã.
"Yɩ chɔɔr yɩ mɩ̃ɛ gu tɩ chʋm a yɩ fɩ̃tɩnsɩ ka a lɩrɛ.
Yɩ kaara fɩka tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ na chɛlɛ a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ka wʋn yi a pɔɔ kulfʋ jie wa. 'Lɔ wa kpoor a pãn ban yuo wʋn a pãn ajienaa ka wʋ kpɛ.
An ɩn bɔɔsʋ̃n kʋ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ banyãna a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa nyɛ ba ka ba chɛnɛ jɛ̃ gu wʋ. Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka wʋn chɔɔr naa a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ka ba 'mataa jɩ̃nɛ a bʋ̃diir jie ka wʋ põ ba a bʋ̃diir.
An ɩn bɔɔsʋ̃n kʋ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ bala a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa nyɛ ban chɔɔr, ala ɩ gba ka tɩ̃sɔɔ põn lɛ bɩɩ, ka nɔrsɩ kõnõ naa.
Tɩchɛ yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par, ɩka ala ɩ a yir sʋɔ bɔ̃ɔ naa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a nãnyie na waara, wʋ kʋ̃ sɔɔ ka a nãnyie kar a pãn tɩ kpɛ a yir ɛ.
A yɩn mɩ yɩ chɔɔr gu, bojũu a maa Nɩsaal Bie na lɩɛb wa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn ba lɛ tɩɛrɛ ma ɛ."
Ka a Pita sʋʋr wʋ, "N Soro, sɩn lɛ fʋ lɔb a sʋkpa nyã kʋ bɩɩ nɩrɛ jaa lɛ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "An lɛ pãa ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a yɛ̃ sʋɔ, a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔ ka wʋ kaara wʋ a yir, na wʋ kʋrɔ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ a ba bʋ̃diir a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na sɛɛ?
An ɩn bɔɔsʋ̃n kʋ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ nyãna a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa nyɛ wʋn ɩrɛ a lɛ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, wʋn vɛ̃n ka wʋ kaara a wʋ bonsɩ a jaa.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ nyãna tɩɛr a wʋ nyãa pɔ ɩka, a n nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kor a waa, tɩ piel pɔɔrɔ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ bala na be a yir, tɩ pãa ma di na wʋ nyũ buu.
A tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ nyãna, a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa dũu wʋ naa a bɩbir 'lɔ wʋn ba tɩɛrɛ nɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋn ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ. Wʋn ŋma wʋn jaa gbʋl gbʋl, tɩ lɔb wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na ba sɔɔ de pɔ ɛ.
A tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ 'lɔ na bɔ̃ɔ lɛ a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na bʋɔrɔ tɩ na waa chɔɔr tʋ̃n a lɛ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na bʋɔrɔ ɛ, wʋn nyɛn ŋmefʋ yɔɔ.
Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ maal bɔr ban ŋme wʋn jaa bɩ̃lãa. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ ban kʋ yɔɔ ban bʋɔrɔ na yɔɔ yi a wʋ sɛ̃, fʋ̃ʋ nũu pɔ ban 'yɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ, fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ban sʋʋr yɔɔ.
"Bũu lɛ n waan ɩka n wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a wɛr pɔ, ɩn taa bʋɔrɔ naa ala ɩ a ben ta 'lɩrɛ.
Tɩchɛ n chɛnɛ tara yele ɩn na ɩ Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ sofʋ kaar ka a ɩ ma tɩɛr tɩ tãn ɩn na wa baar.
Yɩ maa tãan nɛbʋ̃'yen yele lɛ n waan a wɛr pɔ bɩɩ? Kai, n 'yɛr kʋ yɩ, tɩchɛ ootaa lɛ n waan.
An yi a dɩna nɩbɛ anũu na kpɩɛrɛ yir na ŋman jiir ayi. Ka ata jɛɛrɛ nɩ a ayi ka ayi mɩ jɛɛrɛ nɩ a ata.
Ban ooro nɩ taa, sãa na oon bie ka a bie mɩ oo a sãa, ka a ma oo a bipɔɔ ka a bipɔɔ mɩ oo a ma. Pɔɔ na oo naa a wʋ bidaba pɔɔ, ka a bidaba pɔɔ mɩ oo a wʋ sɩrɛ ma."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a nɩyɔɔ bala, "Yɩn wa nyɛ julõjuur na ire a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ mʋrfʋ jie yɩ ma 'yɛr ɩka saa na wa naa, ka a ma ɩ a lɛ.
Yɩn wa nyɛ sɛsɛbɛ mɩ na furo duoro jũu, yɩ ma 'yɛr ɩka tʋl na wa naa. Ka a ma ɩ a lɛ.
A yɩn nɛɛr ayi dẽme banyãna. Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a tẽe nɩ a saaju 'yɛr ma 'yɛr, ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ a dɩna 'yɛr 'yɛr ɛ?
"Bo lɛ so ka yɩn mɩ̃ɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ tɔɔr a lɛ na tor ɛ?
An ɩ a yɩn nɩ a yɩ sãn sʋɔ lɛ 'mataa chiine, yɩ mʋlɔ wʋ a sɔr pɔ, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, wʋn de yɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ a 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ nũu pɔ, ka wʋ de yɩ kʋ a nɩpɔɔrɔ ka wʋ mɩ pɔɔ yɩ bar.
N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, ala be ɩ a lɛ, faa be na wa yi ka faa yab a fʋ sãn baar ɛ."
Nɩbɛ bamɩne mɩ ben be a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, na ba pãa mana kʋrɔ a Yesu a lɛ a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate na dɔ̃ɔ kʋ a Galilee dɔɔr bamɩne, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban be a bɔɔr lofʋ jie.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ tɩɛr ɩka bala lɛ maal dɛɛr gar a Galilee nɩbɛ ba jaa, ala lɛ so ban di a dɔɔyɛ nyã bɩɩ?
A ba ɩ lɛ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩn ba wa lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr ɛ, yɩ mɩ na wɛ naa.
Bɩɩ a nɩbɛ pie nɩ aniin (18) bala a jiwõo 'lɔ na kar lo kʋ a Siloam, yɩ tɩɛr ɩka bala lɛ maal yeldɛɛr gar a bala jaa na kpɩɛrɛ a Jerusalɛm bɩɩ?
N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩn mɩ baa lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr ɛ, yɩ mɩ na wɛ naa."
A sʋkpa nyã lɛ Yesu pãa lɔb kʋ ba, "Daba kɔ̃ɔ lɛ tara kɔ̃kɔ̃tɩɛ a wʋ puo pɔ, a wʋ wa chen ɩka wʋ tɩ kaa a tɩɛ wɔ̃n bɩɩ, tɩchɛ a tɩɛ ba wɔ̃ ɛ.
Be lɛ wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ wʋn vɛ̃ ka wʋ kaara a puo, 'Bojũu, yuom ata nɩ nyã ɩn yɔ ka, ma bʋɔrɔ a wɔ̃mɔ̃ ɩka n pɔr tɩ ma wa bɔ faa. Ŋmaa wʋ lɔb, ŋmɩnɛ an ɩ ka wʋ pii a wɛr ara nɩ?'
Ka a 'lɔ na kaara a puo 'yɛr, 'Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, bar wʋ ka n tuu jilʋ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ pʋɔr ka yuon waara,
'lɔ wa wɔ̃ go, tɩ 'lɔ ba wa wɔ̃ ɛ, ka n ŋmaa wʋ lɔb.' "
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar Yesu ben a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔ wile ba,
be lɛ a pɔɔ be a sɩdɛbɛ na maal ka wʋ kab gʋ̃mɔ̃ yuom pie nɩ aniin (18), wʋ maa tʋ̃ɔ dɔl ɛ.
Yesu na nyɛ a pɔɔ a lɛ, wʋ bʋɔl wʋ naa ka wʋ wa a wʋ sɛ̃, ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Pɔɔ, a fʋ baal bar fʋ naa."
Tɩ na wʋ pãa de a wʋ nũu dɔɔl a pɔɔ, ka a pɔɔ dɔl ajienaa na wʋ pɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn.

Tɩchɛ ka a suur kpɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir nɩdier Yesu na sãa a baalaa a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar jũu, ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ, "Bibie ayʋɔb ben be ka nɩrɛ na de tʋ̃n tʋ̃mɔ̃, yɩ ma wa ka wʋ sãana yɩ a ber ala pɔ, yɩ ta ma waara a Pɛ̃nfʋ Daar ɛ."
Ka a Soro 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Yɩn nɛɛr ayi dẽme banyãna, a yɩ buor sʋɔ lɛ maa yuo a wʋ niin bɩɩ a wʋ bon chiin tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ kʋ̃ɔ a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir ɛ?
Ka a pɔɔ nyãna na ɩ a Abraham bipɔɔ, a tɩɩ na lũ yuom pie nɩ aniin (18), a ba sɛɛ ɩka wʋ for a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar bɩɩ?"
Wʋn wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ ka a vĩ kpɛ a bala jaa na bɛrɛ wʋ a nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ chɩlɛ a tʋ̃vɩɛlɛ ala wʋn tʋ̃.
A Yesu pãa 'yɛr, "Bo lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ nyɛtãan? Bo lɛ ɩn de man?
Wʋ kaara fɩka kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ bir nɩrɛ na de bʋr a puo pɔ ka wʋ bul na wʋ ɩ tɩɛ, ka a lubil wa 'yɔ̃ɔ choor a wilsɩ ju."
Wʋ lɛ sʋʋr ban go, "Bo lɛ ɩn de a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ man?
Wʋ kaara fɩka dãbɩl pɔɔ na de 'yɔ̃ɔ jɔ̃ yɔɔ pɔ ka a ir vʋ̃."
Yesu wile naa nɩbɛ be a tẽbɛrɛ nɩ a tẽbil ala pɔ tɩ na wʋn chen Jerusalɛm.
Be lɛ a nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ sʋʋr wʋ, "N Soro, nɩbɛ bɩ̃lãa tɛɛ lɛ na nyɛ faafʋ bɩɩ?" Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba,
"Yɩ mɔ̃ tu a dɔ̃dɔ̃ bile pɔ kpɛ, n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka nɩyɔɔ lɛ na mʋɔrɔ bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba kpɛ tɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ɛ.
A yir sʋɔ na wa ir pɔɔ a pãn var yɩ bar be a yõo, ka yɩ ara kpooro sʋɔrɔ, 'Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, yuo sɩ a pãn.' Tɩchɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ yɩ, 'N ba bɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ, bɩɩ a jie yɩn yi ɛ.'
Ka yɩ pãa 'yɛrɛ, 'Sɩn nɩ fʋ̃ʋ jaa 'mantaa di tɩ nyũ, a fʋ wiil sɩ be a sɩ tẽe sãlsɔɔ.'
Tɩchɛ ka wʋn 'yɛr, 'N ba bɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ, bɩɩ a jie yɩn yi ɛ, yɩ tɔɔ yi tɩ chɛ ma a yɩn na tʋ̃nɔ̃ a dɛbɛ.'
"Be lɛ yɩn kõnõ ɔɔrɔ a nyɩmɛ, yɩn wa nyɛ a Abraham, Isaakɩ nɩ Jekɔb nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ba jaa be a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a yɩn 'lɔ be a yõo.
Nɩbɛ na yin a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʋ jie, a mʋrfʋ jie, a jũu nɩ a par na ba wa jɩ̃nɛ dire be a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ.
Sɩrɛ jaa, nɩbɛ ben puor tɩ na ban wa de nie, ka a bala mɩ na be a niem mɩ wa be a puor."
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ lɛ a Faraseemɩne bamɩne wa a Yesu sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Yi a ka chen jiyuo. A Hɛrɔd bʋɔrɔ na a fʋ kʋfʋ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ chen tɩ 'yɛr a mɔbaa 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, ɩn dii naa a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi ka n sãa a nɩbɛ baalsɩ a dɩna nɩ bio ka a dayere daar ka n baar a n tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Lɛ jaa an ɩ, ɩn chɛnɛ na chiine a dɩna nɩ bio nɩ a dayere. Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ kʋ̃ kpi ka Jerusalɛm ba lɛ ɛ.

"Gboo yɩn Jerusalɛm dẽme, yɩn lɛ ma kʋrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ tɩ lɔɔrɔ a bala Nãaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ a yɩ sɛ̃ nɩ kʋsɩbɛ. N ma bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n kaal a fʋ bibiir 'mataa nɩtãa lɛ nʋ̃ɔ na ma kaal a wʋ bil 'mataa a wʋ pɩrɛ pɔ, tɩ yɩ maa sɔɔ ɛ.
Yɩ nyɛ, a yɩ yir na lɩɛb dakpolo, tɩ ka n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩ kõ lɛ nyɛ ma go ɛ, tɩ tãn a daar 'lɔ yɩn na 'yɛr, 'Nãaŋmɩn wʋ sʋ̃ʋ a 'lɔ wʋn tʋ̃!' "
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ daar, Yesu chen a Faraseemɩne nɩdiere ɩ̃sʋɔ yir difʋ jie ka ba jʋrɔ wʋ.
Be lɛ ka daba kɔ̃ɔ na tara a baal vʋ̃ naa ara a wʋ niem.
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ bɔ̃ɔnbɔ, "A tara na sɔr ka fʋn sãa nɩrɛ na bɩɛrɛ a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir bɩɩ a ba tara sɔr ɛ?"
Tɩchɛ ka ba ɩ jaa gbulo, ka Yesu de a nũu dɔɔl a daba sãa a wʋ baal tɩ bar wʋ sɔr.
Tɩ na wʋ pãa sʋʋr ba, "Ala ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ bie bɩɩ a wʋ nadar lon bulo pɔ a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir, wʋ kʋ̃ chen tɩ ir wʋ fɔfɔɔ jaa bɩɩ?"
Baa lɛ tara 'yɛr na 'yɛr ɛ.
Yesu nyɛn a nɩbɛ bala ban bʋɔl ɩka ba wa di, ka ba tuur a nɩbɛrɛ jaa jiir jɩ̃nɛ, ka wʋ lɔb a sʋkpa nyã kʋ ba,
"Nɩrɛ wa bʋɔl fʋ pɔɔ kulfʋ jie, fʋ̃ʋ wa chen ta tɩ jɩ̃nɛ a nɩbɛrɛ jaa jie ɛ, amɩne wʋ bʋɔl nɩrɛ na gar fʋ ka wʋn wa.
Ala wa ɩ a lɛ, wʋn wa 'yɛr fʋ naa, 'Ir, ka a daba nyã jɩ̃nɛ a fʋ jaa jie.' Vĩ lɛ fʋn ir tɩ jɩ̃nɛ nɩ a puor.
Tɩchɛ bala wa bʋɔl fʋ, tɩ jɩ̃nɛ a puor, ka a 'lɔ na bʋɔl fʋ wa 'yɛr, 'N badaba wa jɩ̃nɛ ka a niem, be lɛ fʋn pãa vʋ̃ a fʋ taaba niem.'
Bojũu, nɩrɛ jaa na 'mɔɔrɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ saaju, Nãaŋmɩn na siir wʋ naa, 'lɔ mɩ na siir a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na 'mɔɔ wʋn saaju."

Ka Yesu pãa 'yɛr kʋ a 'lɔ na bʋɔl wʋ, "Fʋ̃ʋ wa bʋɔl nɩrɛ ɩka wʋ wa di, taa wa bʋɔlɔ a fʋ barmɩne, bɩɩ a fʋ yɛɛr, bɩɩ a fʋ bal nɩbɛ, bɩɩ a fʋ tɔ dẽme bala na ɩ tara dẽme ɛ. Ala ɩ fʋ ɩn a lɛ, ban bʋɔl fʋn daar kɔ̃ɔ tɩ yaa a sãn.
Tɩchɛ fʋ̃ʋ wa bʋɔlɔ nɩbɛ ɩka ba wa di, bʋɔl a nɔ̃n dẽme, nɩ a gbɛrsɩ, nɩ a nɩbaalsɩ, nɩ a jɔ̃n.
Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na sʋ̃ʋ. Ban ba tara bon na yab fʋ ɛ, fʋ̃ʋ lɛ na nyɛ sãyar a lɛ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ na wa ir a kũu pɔ ɩ vʋ ɛ."
Ka a bala na lɔ̃ɔ dire ɩ̃sʋɔ na wõ a nɩtɔ̃, na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu, "An ɩn bɔɔsʋ̃n kʋ a 'lɔ na wa jɩ̃nɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ dire."
Be lɛ a Yesu lɔb a sʋkpa nyã, "Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ chɔɔrɔ na wʋ bʋɔlɔ nɩyɔɔ ɩka ba wa di.
A sɔ̃ɔ na wa ta, wʋ tʋ̃n a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ ɩka wʋ chen tɩ 'yɛr a bala wʋn bʋɔl ɩka wʋ maal yele a jaa baar.
Tɩchɛ ka a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa 'yɛr ɩka ba kʋ̃ nyɛ jie ɛ. Ka a 'lɔ ban dɔ̃ɔ ta ka wʋ 'yɛr, 'N dãn popaalaa naa chiine ɩka n tɩ kaa, n kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ tɩ ɛ.'
Ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ 'yɛr, 'N dãn narkʋɔrsɩ pie naa jãna n kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ tɩ ɛ.'
Ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ 'yɛr, 'Pɔɔ lɛ n de n kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ tɩ be ɛ.'

"A tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ lɩɛb wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ kʋ a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, ka a suur kpɛ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃, 'Lɩɛb chen fɔfɔɔ jaa a tẽe sãlsɔɔ nɩ a kõkorsɩ pɔ, na fʋ tɩ bʋɔl a nɔ̃n dẽme, a gbɛrsɩ, jɔ̃n nɩ a nɩbaalsɩ waan.'
Ka a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ wa 'yɛr, 'Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, n ɩ naa a lɛ fʋn 'yɛr ɩka n ɩ, tɩchɛ ka a jie chɛnɛ be be.'
Be lɛ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ pãa lɛ 'yɛr kʋ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃, 'Yi chen a sɔɩ pɔ, nɩ a sɛɛr pɔ tɩ bʋɔl nɩbɛ waan ka n yir wa sɛɛ.
N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa kʋ̃ lɛ̃ maa ɛ.' "
Yesu nɩ a nɩyɔɔ 'mantaa chiine, ka wʋ lɩɛb kaa ba tɩ 'yɛr,
"Ala ɩ nɩrɛ na wa naa a n sɛ̃, na waa 'laar a wʋ sãa nɩ a wʋ ma, nɩ a wʋ pɔɔ, a wʋ bibiir, a wʋ yɛɛr nɩ a wʋ yɛpɔbɔ 'matãan a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nyɛvʋr ɛ, wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɩ a n poturo ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na ba de a wʋ daa tuo turo nɩ ma ɛ, wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɩ a n poturo ɛ.
"Ala ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ bʋɔrɔ na yir kpɛ̃ɛ mɛfʋ, a ba ɩ wʋn den nie jɩ̃nɛ guor kaa ala ɩ wʋ tara naa a libie na tʋ̃ɔ mɛn baar ɛ?
Na wʋ taa kpar a yir tɩ ba tʋ̃ɔ baar ɛ, ka a wʋ taaba nyɛ laara wʋ
'yɛrɛ, 'Jaal piel a mɛfʋ tɩ na waa baar ɛ.'
Bɩɩ nãbuor lɛ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ tɩ jɛb a wʋ nãa tɔ sʋɔ na waa de nie jɩ̃nɛ kaa ɩka wʋn tʋ̃ɔ de a wʋ nɩbɛ turo pie (10,000) tɩ jɛb a 'lɔ na waara nɩ a wʋ nɩbɛ turo lɩjɛr (20,000) ɔ?
Ala ɩ wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɛ, wʋn tʋ̃n nɩbɛ ka ba chen tɩ 'maal a nãa 'lɔ na chɛnɛ be a tɛɛr.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ, a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa baa bar a wʋ bonsɩ a jaa ɛ, wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɩ a n poturo ɛ.
"Nyaar ɩ naa, tɩchɛ a wʋ nʋ̃ɔ wa baar, ŋmɩnɛ ban lɛ ɩ wʋ ka wʋ lɛ nʋ̃mɔ̃ go?
Wa vɩɛl kʋ a tãpuor tãna ɛ, ban lɔb bar. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor wõnõ, vɛ̃ ka wʋ wõ naa."
A lõpodierbe nɩ a tʋ̃dɛtʋ̃nbɔ lɔ̃ɔn taa na chɛl a Yesu 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ ka a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe hũhũnõ 'yɛrɛ, "A daba nyã diere naa tʋ̃dɛtʋ̃nbɔ ka ba 'mataa dire."
A Yesu pãa lɔb a sʋkpa nyã kʋ ba,
"Ala ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ tara na piir kɔbaa ka a bʋ̃'yen wa bɔr, a ba ɩ wʋn bar a kɔbaa forbir ala a pɛchiin baa pɔ, tɩ yʋɔrɔ bʋɔrɔ a bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa wʋn wa tɩ nyɛ wʋ bɩɩ?
'Lɔ wa nyɛ a pɛr nʋ̃ɔ ma kpɛ wʋ naa ka wʋ 'mɔɔ dɔɔl bɔɔ ju
kulo nɩ a yir, tɩ pãa bʋɔlɔ a wʋ barmɩne nɩ a wʋ taaba lɔ̃ɔ taa tɩ 'yɛr, 'Yɩ pʋɔ ma chɩlɛ, bojũu n nyɛ naa a n pɛr 'lɔ na bɔr.'
N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka a lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ, chɩl kpɛ̃ɛ na ben a saaju a tʋ̃dɛtʋ̃nɔ̃ bʋ̃'yen na lɩɛb a wʋ tɩɛr gar a kɔbaa forbir bala na ba tara tɩɛr lɩɛb fʋ ɛ.
"Bɩɩ pɔɔ buor lɛ tara libibie pie ka ɩ̃sʋɔ bɔr, wʋ kʋ̃ chʋm bũu den saar pɩɩr a die wʋ jaa na wʋ wa tɩ nyɛ wʋ bɩɩ?
'Lɔ wa nyɛ wʋ, wʋ ma bʋɔl a wʋ barmɩne nɩ a wʋ taaba lɔ̃ɔ taa tɩ 'yɛr, 'Yɩ pʋɔ ma chɩlɛ, n nyɛ naa a n libir na bɔr.'
Lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, nʋ̃ɔ mɩ na kpɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ ala ɩ a tʋ̃dɛtʋ̃nɔ̃ bʋ̃'yen lɩɛb a wʋ tɩɛr."
Yesu chɛnɛ na 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ ba, "Daba lɛ tara wʋ dabil ayi.
Ka a bile sʋɔ wa 'yɛr kʋ a sãa, 'N sãa, põ a fʋ kpĩi bomo ir a n bon kʋ ma.' Ka a sãa de a wʋ kpĩi bomo põ ba.
A ba kor ɛ, ka a bile 'lɔ lɔ̃ɔ taa a wʋ bonsɩ a jaa yi chiin tẽyuo pɔ, na wʋ tɩ bũbur a bonsɩ sɔ̃ɔ a jaa bar.
Wʋn wa sɔ̃ɔ a jaa baar, ka a kɔ̃ lo a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ, ka a wõm piel kpɛ wʋ.
Wʋ chen a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ yir tɩ bɔ tʋ̃mɔ̃, ka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ ma tʋ̃ wʋ ka wʋ chen a puo pɔ tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ dor bʋ̃diir.
A jɔ̃ pɛbɛ ala ma ɩrɛ wʋn vɔlaa ka wʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ 'wɔb tɩɩ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ jaa maa kʋ wʋ bon ɛ.
"Ka a yɛ̃ wa wʋ ka wʋ 'yɛr, 'N sãa tara na tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ a ŋmɩnɛ a ba ma di bʋ̃diir faa, tɩchɛ ka a maa wa kpire nɩ kɔ̃ ka?
Ɩn lɩɛb kul a n sãa sɛ̃ naa tɩ 'yɛr wʋ, n maal dɛɛr Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ nɩ a fʋ sɛ̃.
N ba lɛ chɛnɛ sɛɛ ka ban bʋɔl ma a fʋ bie ɛ, maal ma ka n ɩ a fʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ ɩ̃sʋɔ.'
Lɛ wʋ ir kulo a sãa sɛ̃. Tɩchɛ wʋn chɛnɛ be a nɩdaa waara, a sãa nyɛ wʋ naa ka nɩbaal kpɛ wʋ ka wʋ jotuor a bie kõr tɩ puor wʋ.
Ka a bidaba 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'N sãa, n maal dɛɛr Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ nɩ a fʋ sɛ̃, n ba lɛ sɛɛn ka ban bʋɔl ma a fʋ bie go ɛ.'
Tɩchɛ ka a sãa 'yɛr kʋ a gbãgbaar, 'Yɩ pɔɔ fɔɔ tɩ de fuu nyã na vɩɛlɛ wa su wʋ, na yɩ de bɔ̃bile 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ a nubir pɔ, na yɩ de nafɔbɔ wa su wʋ.
Yɩ tɩ kaa nele na 'wɔr na yɩ waan wa kʋ ka sɩ 'wɔb tɩ chɩlɛ.
Bojũu a n bidaba nyãna dɔ̃ɔ kpi tɩ lɛ ir ɩ vʋr, wʋ dɔ̃ɔ bɔr tɩ sɩ lɛ nyɛ wʋ.' Ka ba piel chɩlɛ.
"Tɩchɛ ka a bidakpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ be a puo pɔ, na wʋ wa ir waara, wʋn wa gbʋrɔ a yir wʋ wõn bɩ̃nɛ nɩ chɛlsɩ.
Be lɛ wʋ bʋɔl a gbãgbaa ɩ̃sʋɔ na wʋ sʋʋr a yelnyɩnɛ na be be.
Ka a gbãgbaa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'A fʋ yɛbile lɛ wa ka a fʋ sãa ɩ a ba kʋ nel'wɔr jaa, bojũu wʋ nyɛn a wʋ bie na lɩɛb wa nɩ lãafɩɛ tɩ chɛnɛ kpɛ̃mɛ.'
A suur kpɛ a yɛkarma ka wʋ jɛ, waa kpɛ ɛ. Ka a sãa yi 'maala wʋ ɩka wʋ kpɛ.

Tɩchɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a sãa, 'Nyɛ lɛ ɩn wõnõ a fʋ toor naa tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ fʋ a yuom anyãna a jaa, n ba gɔ̃ɔ fʋ nɛɛ jaa ɛ. Tɩchɛ faa mɩ wa kʋ ma bule gba ɩka, n mɩ kʋ ka maa nɩ a n barmɩne mɩ 'mataa di tɩ chɩlɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a fʋ bibawõno nyãna na de a fʋ bonsɩ yin ka a 'lɔ nɩ a pɔɔ baar tɩ 'mataa sɔ̃ɔ bar, tɩ lɩɛb wa a yir ka fʋ ir kʋ nel'wɔr kʋ wʋ.'
Ka a sãa 'yɛr, 'Fʋ̃ʋ 'lɔ, fʋ ben a n sɛ̃, ka a bomo a jaa ɩn tara ɩ a fʋ bonsɩ.
Tɩchɛ a sɛɛ naa ka sɩn dɩ̃ɛnɛ na sɩ chɩlɛ bojũu a fʋ yɛbile nyãna dɔ̃ɔ kpi tɩ lɛ ɩ vʋr go, na wʋ dɔ̃ɔ bɔr tɩ sɩ lɛ nyɛ wʋ.' "
Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo ɩka, "Taraa sʋ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, na wʋ tara nɩrɛ na kaara wʋ a bonsɩ, na wʋ pʋ̃pʋrɔ bara.
Ka wʋ bʋɔl wʋ waan wa sʋʋr, 'N wõn ban 'yɛrɛ a fʋ 'yɛr yʋɔrɔ nɩ, man a lɛ fʋn tʋ̃ kʋ ma, bojũu fʋ kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɛ.'
Ka a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, 'Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn pãa ɩ a pʋ̃pãanyã? A n nɩkpɛ̃ɛ faa man a tʋ̃mɔ̃, n mɩ ba lɛ kpɛ̃mɛ na tʋ̃ɔ kɔ ɛ, a mɩ na ɩn vĩ ɩn na sʋɔrɔ.
N bɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɩn na ɩ maa ba lɛ wa tara tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka nɩbɛ chɛnɛ de ma a ba yie.'
Be lɛ wʋ bʋɔl a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sãma dẽme ba jaa na wʋ sʋʋr a 'lɔ na de nie, 'A ŋmɩnɛ lɛ fʋ di a n nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sãn?'
Ka wʋ 'yɛr, 'Kãlaar kɔbaa (100) lɛ n di a sãn.' Ka a 'lɔ na kaara a bonsɩ 'yɛr, 'De a gãn nyãna jɛn fɔɔ jaa na fʋ sɛb lɩjaayi nɩ pie (50).'
Tɩ na wʋ lɛ sʋʋr a ayi sʋɔ, 'A ŋmɩnɛ fʋ mɩ di a n nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sãn?' Ka wʋ 'yɛr, 'Chi bɔtɔr kɔbaa (100) sãn lɛ n di.' Ka wʋ 'yɛr, 'De a fʋ gãn na fʋ sɛb lɩjaa naar 'yɔ̃ɔ (80).'
Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ dãn a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ nyãna na ba tara yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ, bojũu wʋ tɩɛr nɩdaar. A wɛr nyã nɩbɛ tara na yɛ̃ a ba taaba jie gar a chãa nɩbɛ.
"N 'yɛr na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, yɩ de a wɛr nyã bʋ̃tarsɩ na yɩ ŋman barmɩne ala wa baar, Nãaŋmɩn na de yɩn kpɛ̃n a yir kpo kpo 'lɔ pɔ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na tara yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a bʋ̃bile, wʋn tara naa yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a bʋ̃yɔɔ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa mɩ na ba tara yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a bʋ̃bile ɛ, wʋ kʋ̃ mɩ tara yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a bʋ̃yɔɔ ɛ.
Ala ɩ yaa tara yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a wɛr bʋ̃tarsɩ ɛ, an lɛ na sɔɔ de a yelmɩ̃ɛ bomo kʋ yɩ?
Ala ɩ yaa tara yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ bon ɛ, an lɛ na kʋ yɩ a yɩ bon?
Gbãgbaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃ kʋ nɩbɛrɛ ayi ɛ, wʋn nʋ̃n ɩ̃sʋɔ tɩ 'laar ɩ̃sʋɔ, bɩɩ wʋn wõnõ na ɩ̃sʋɔ toor tɩ ba wõnõ ɩ̃sʋɔ toor ɛ. Yɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃ kʋ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ libie ɛ."
A Faraseemɩne na nʋ̃ libie na wõ a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr, ka ba laara wʋ.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ ma maal yɩ mɩ̃ɛ nɩtorsɩ a nɩbɛ niem, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔn a yɩ tɩɛr. Bon 'lɔ nɩbɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃chiiraa.
"A Mosesɩ Nɛɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ 'yɛr wa tãn a Jɔɔn sɔ̃ɔ. An yi a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋ jaa, ba 'yɛr naa a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr sʋ̃n ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa mʋɔrɔ wʋ sɔr, ɩka wʋ kpɛ.
An ɩn kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ kʋ a saaju nɩ a tẽe ka a po tal, gar a Nɛɛ 'yɛr bir na yi lo.
Nɩrɛ jaa na dii a wʋ pɔɔ bar tɩ kul pɔɔ yuo, wʋ maal dɛɛr, ka a daba 'lɔ mɩ na kul a pɔɔ a sɩrɛ na dii bar, mɩ maal dɛɛr.
"Tara sʋɔ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, na wʋ ma su kparsɩ nɩ fuu pɩɛl na wʋ dire bʋ̃nʋ̃n bɩbir jaa.
Ka a sʋsʋɔrɔ kɔ̃ɔ yuor na di Lajarusɩ mɩ be be na ɩ natɩnara ma jɩ̃nɛ a tara sʋɔ dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ.
Na wʋ ma bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ nyɛ a bʋ̃di pʋr pʋr ala a tara sʋɔ na dire ka a ŋmara loro, ka a baar gba ma wa lɛnɛ a wʋ natɩɛ.
A sʋsʋɔrɔ nyãna wa kpi naa, ka a malakasɩ wa de wʋ chiine tɩ bin a Abraham sɛ̃. Ka a tara sʋɔ 'lɔ mɩ wa kpi ka ba ũu wʋ.
"A be a kpĩisɩ tẽe, ka a ɩ dɔɔyɛ jie lɛ, ka wʋ gbã nyɛ Abraham tɛɛr jaa ka a Lajarusɩ jɩ̃nɛ a wʋ lõboor.
Be lɛ wʋ bʋɔl, 'N sãa Abraham, kaa n nɩbaal tɩ na fʋ tʋ̃ a Lajarusɩ ka wʋ 'me kʋ̃ɔ nɩ nubir wa 'maan ma jãlbir, bojũu a wõnõ ma naa ka a bũu pɔ.'
Tɩchɛ ka a Abraham 'yɛr, 'N bie, tɩɛr kaa fʋn dɔ̃ɔ be a wɛr pɔ dire nʋ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ ka a Lajarusɩ mɩ dire dɔɔyɛ, pʋ̃pãanyã, wʋ mɩ dire naa a nʋ̃ɔ tɩchɛ ka fʋ mɩ dire a dɔɔyɛ.
A nyã gba ba ɩ yele ɛ, a bɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛ nyã na be a sɩ chara pɔ, ka a bala na bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba yi a ka tɩ a yɩ sɛ̃ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɛ, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ yi a be tɩ mɩ wa a sɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.'
"Ka wʋ lɔb nũu 'yɛr, 'Yãayãaabɩlɛ lɛ n sʋɔrɔ, n sãa, tʋ̃ a Lajarusɩ ka wʋ kul a be a sãa yir,
n tara na yɛɛr anũu wʋ tɩ kpãa ba ka ba taa ɩrɛ mɩ wa wa a dɔɔyɛ nyã pɔ ɛ.'
Ka Abraham 'yɛr, 'Mosesɩ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ a lɛ ban sɛb bin ben a ba sɛ̃, ba chɛlɛ a ala ban 'yɛrɛ.'
Ka wʋ 'yɛr, 'Kai n sãa Abraham, ala ɩ nɩrɛ lɛ ir a kũu pɔ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba ban lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr.'
Ka a Abraham 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'Ala ɩ ba kʋ̃ chɛl a lɛ a Mosesɩ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na 'yɛr lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr ɛ, nɩrɛ sɔɔ ir kũu pɔ tɩ 'yɛr an ɩn pɔrɔ.' "
Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ poturbo, "Yelsɩ ala na vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ ɩ bier ben be na wa, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jie an tu wa ben pɔ'yɔ̃ɔ fʋ pɔ.
A nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, bala 'mɔɔ nɩɛr lũ yɔɔl a nyĩe pɔ daa lɔb a man kʋ̃ɔ pɔ, ala sa wʋn na vɛ̃ ka a bʋ̃bil banyãna ɩ̃sʋɔ ɩ bier.
Yɩ guro yɩ mɩ̃ɛ, ala ɩ fʋ yɛbɛ maal fʋn dɛɛr gɔ̃ wʋ, 'lɔ wa de a bɔrfʋ vɛ̃ kʋ wʋ.
Ala ɩ a bɩbir bʋ̃'yen pɔ lɛ wʋ maal fʋ dɛɛr gbɛɛ ayopõi tɩ mɩ lɩɛb wa a gbɛɛ ayopõi wa de bɔrfʋ, vɛ̃ kʋ wʋ."
Ka a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ 'yɛr, "Sɩ Soro, pʋɔ sɩ sɔɔfʋ."
Ka a Soro 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩn tara sɔɔfʋ jaa pʋʋr fɩka kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ bir, yɩn tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ a tɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyãna, 'Vʋ̃ɔ tɩ ba man pɔ, ka wʋ tu a lɛ yɩn 'yɛr.'
"Ala ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ tara na gbãgbaa ka wʋ kʋɔrɔ bɩɩ ŋmaara piir, 'lɔ wa yi a tʋ̃mɔ̃ jie wa, fʋn 'yɛr wʋ naa ɩka wʋ wa jɩ̃nɛ di ɔ?
A ba ɩ fʋn 'yɛr wʋ naa, 'Maal a bʋ̃diir fɔɔ na fʋ chɔɔr a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ wa ara gu ma, ka n di tɩ nyũ baar ka fʋ mɩ pãa di tɩ nyũ ɛ.'
Wʋn puor naa a gbãgbaa nyãna wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ ka wʋ maal bɩɩ?
A yɩn mɩ lɛ lɛ, yɩn wa maal ala a jaa Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ, yɩn 'yɛr naa, 'Saa sɛɛn ɛ, gbãgbaar lɛ sɩ ɩ na sɩ maal a lɛ na ɩ a sɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃.' "
Yesu den a sɔr chiine a Jerusalɛm, wʋ kpɛ̃n a Samariya nɩ a Galilee chara pɔ.
Na wʋ chiine kpɛ a tẽbile ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔ, ka a kɔ̃kɔ̃n pie tuor wʋ a be. Ba ara na tɛɛr jaa
tɩ gboolo bʋɔlɔ, "Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Yesu, kaa sɩ nɩbaal."
Wʋn nyɛ ba a lɛ, na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ chen tɩ wiil a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo." Ban chen a lɛ, ka a ɩ ba sa naa.
A ba ɩ̃sʋɔ na nyɛ ka a ɩ wʋ sa naa, wʋ lɩɛb wa de nɛkpɛ̃ɛ na wʋ pɛɛrɛ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn.
Wʋ lon kpa a Yesu gbɛɛ par tɩ puor wʋ, Samariya lɛ wʋ yi.
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr, "A ba ɩ pie lɛ sa ɛ? Ka nyɩnɛ a pie forbir be?
Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba lɩɛb wa ɩka wʋ wa puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan ka a sãan nyã ba lɛ ɛ."
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Ir kulo, a fʋ sɔɔfʋ sa fʋ naa."
A Faraseemɩne lɛ sʋʋr naa Yesu ɩka dabor lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ na wa, ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ kʋ̃ wa ka ba bɔ̃ɔn ɛ.
Bɩɩ ka nɩbɛ 'yɛr, yɩ nyɛ wʋ ka, bɩɩ yɩ nyɛ wʋ kasɛn, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ ben a yɩ pɔ."
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʋ a poturbo, "Sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ waara na a yɩn wa bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ nyɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie nɩ nɩbir, tɩchɛ yɩ kʋ̃ nyɛ ma ɛ.
Nɩbɛ na 'yɛr yɩ naa, 'Kasɛn lɛ wʋ be,' bɩɩ 'Ka lɛ wʋ be.' Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa joro turo ba chiine be ɛ.
A maa Nɩsaal Bie bɩbir na kaara naa fɩka a saa na ma nyɩɩr a saaju yi a lõboor nyã tɩ gbem a lõboor ɩ̃sʋɔ.
Tɩchɛ ɩn den nie di dɔɔyɛ yele yɔɔ jaa pɔ, ka a dɩna nɩbɛ tɔr ma.
"Lɛ an dɔ̃ɔ kaara a Nowa sɔ̃ɔ, lɛ mɩ lɛ an kaara a maa Nɩsaal Bie sɔ̃ɔ.
Nɩbɛ dire naa na ba nyuro ka dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ kulo taa, tɩ tãn a bɩbir 'lɔ a Nowa na kpɛ a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ, ka a kʋ̃ɔ paal wa sɔ̃ɔ ba jaa bar.
"Lɛ mɩ lɛ a kaara a Lotɩ sɔ̃ɔ, nɩbɛ dire naa, na ba nyuro, na ba daara lɩɛb daara, na ba bʋrɔ na ba mɩɛrɛ nɩ yie.
Tɩchɛ a bɩbir 'lɔ a Lotɩ nɩ wa yi a Sodom bũu nɩ kʋsɩlirsɩ yin saaju lo pɔɔ a nɩbɛ ka ba jaa kpi.
Lɛ lɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie bɩbir mɩ na kaara.
"A bɩbir 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, nɩrɛ na be a wʋ gar ju, ka a wʋ bonsɩ be a die pɔ, wʋ kʋ̃ suu tɩ de ɛ. Lɛ mɩ lɛ nɩrɛ na be puo pɔ kʋ̃ kul tɩ de bon ɛ.
Yɩ tɩɛr a Lotɩ pɔɔ.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ faa a wa nyɛvʋr na bɔr wʋ naa, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na lɔb a wʋ nyɛvʋr bar, wʋn tara wʋ naa.
"N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka a tɩ̃sɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, nɩbɛ ayi na gãn gaa jie, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa de bʋ̃'yen tɩ chɛ bʋ̃'yen bar.
Ka a pɔbɔ ayi nɩɛnɛ jɔ̃, ka a Nãaŋmɩn de bʋ̃'yen tɩ chɛ bʋ̃'yen bar.
Dɔɔr ayi mɩ na ben puo pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa de ɩ̃sʋɔ tɩ chɛ bʋ̃'yen bar."
Ka ba sʋʋr wʋ, "Sɩ Soro, nyɩnɛ?" Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Jie bʋ̃kũu na be, be lɛ sɩdumosɩ ma loro."
Yesu pãa lɔb sʋkpa kʋ a wʋ poturbo na wʋ wiil ba a lɛ ban na sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn taa baala ɛ.
Wʋ 'yɛr naa, "A tẽe kɔ̃ɔ pɔ, 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ kɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ be be, waa joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, waa mɩ kaara nɩrɛ nɩbaal ɛ.
Ka a pɔɔ kʋɔr kɔ̃ɔ mɩ be be a tẽe pɔ, na wʋ ma waara a wʋ sɛ̃ wa 'yɛrɛ, ''Yɛr faa ma a n sãn sʋɔ sɛ̃.'
Bojũu, gbɛɛ aŋmɩnɛ jaa lɛ wʋ ma tɔr, tɩ wa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, 'N gba ba joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, bɩɩ kaara nɩrɛ nɩbaal lɛ.
Tɩchɛ bojũu, a pɔɔ kʋɔr nyãna na yʋɔrɔ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma, ɩn tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ ka wʋ ta yʋɔrɔ bala ma ɛ.' "
Ka a Soro 'yɛr, "Yɩ nyɛ lɛ a 'yɛr tɔɔr filefile nyã na 'yɛr.
Nãaŋmɩn mɩ kʋ̃ 'yɛr faa a wʋ nɩ-irsɩ na kõnõ kʋrɔ wʋ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ jaa ɛ? Bɩɩ wʋn lɩɛrɛ ban bara?
N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na tɔɔr a ba 'yɛr fɔɔ jaa kʋ ba. A maa Nɩsaal Bie wa lɩɛb wa a wɛr pɔ, ɩn nyɛn nɩbɛ ka ba tara sɔɔfʋ ɔ?"
Yesu lɛ lɔb sʋkpa de man a nɩbɛ bamɩne na tɩɛr ɩka ba ɩn nɩtorsɩ tɩ kaara a ba taaba pɔrɔ.
"Nɩbɛ ayi lɛ dɔ̃ɔ do a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir ɩka ba tɩ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn. Ɩ̃sʋɔ ɩn Farasee nɩrɛ, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ ɩ lõpodiere.
Ka a Farasee nɩrɛ 'lɔ ir ara, tɩ sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ nɩ, 'Nãaŋmɩn n puor fʋn yãan, nɩ ɩn ba kaara a nɩbɛ bamɩne kaar ɛ, nɩfarba, tʋ̃dɛtʋ̃nbɔ, sɛ̃sɛ̃nbɛ, bɩɩ a lõpodiere nyã kaar gba ɛ.
Maa 'lɔ, n ma gal kɔ̃ gbɛɛ ayi daa jaa pɔ, n bonsɩ pie jaa pɔ, n ma ir naa a bʋ̃'yen.'
Tɩchɛ ka a lõpodiere 'lɔ mɩ ara tɛɛr jaa na wʋ 'wor nuur, waa 'la dʋɔ kaa saaju ɛ, tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr, 'Nãaŋmɩn kaa n nɩbaal, yelbe-ɩrɛ lɛ n ɩ.'

A lõpodiere nyã yele tor naa a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ka wʋ lɩɛb kul gar, a Farasee nɩrɛ 'lɔ. Bojũu nɩrɛ jaa na 'mɔɔrɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ saaju, Nãaŋmɩn na siir wʋ naa, tɩ nɩrɛ nyã mɩ na siir a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na 'mɔɔ wʋn saaju."
Nɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔ waara nɩ bibibil a Yesu sɛ̃ ɩka wʋ sɩɩr ba, ka a poturbo na nyɛ a lɛ na ba mĩi 'yɔ̃ɔ ba.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu bʋɔl a bibiir ka ba wa a wʋ sɛ̃, ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Yɩ bar a bibiir sɔr ka ba wa a n sɛ̃, na yɩ ta ŋmaa ba sɔr ɛ, bojũu banyãna taaba lɛ so a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba wa de a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ nɩtãa a bibibile nyãna kaar ɛ, wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ be ɛ."
A nɩdiere kɔ̃ɔ sʋʋr a Yesu, "Wiwiilsʋ̃, bo lɛ ɩn ɩ naa nyɛ nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ?"
Ka a Yesu sʋʋr wʋ, "Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ fʋ bʋɔl ma nɩsʋ̃? Nɩrɛ jaa ba ɩ nɩsʋ̃ ka Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Fʋ bɔ̃ɔ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Nɛɛ. Taa sɛ̃nɛ ɛ, taa kʋrɔ nɩrɛ ɛ, taa juro ɛ, taa ŋmaa jir kara 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ ɛ, na fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʋ sãa nɩ a fʋ ma."
Ka a daba 'yɛr, "A anyãna a jaa lɛ n turo a n bile sɔ̃ɔ wa tãn dɩna."
Yesu na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "A chɛ fʋn yelbʋ̃'yen, tɩ da a fʋ bonsɩ a jaa, de põ nɔ̃n dẽme ka a fʋ tara bomo be a saaju, tɩ na fʋ pãa wa turo ma."
A daba na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ wʋ pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ naa, bojũu tara sʋɔ lɛ wʋ ɩ.
Yesu kaa wʋn tɩ 'yɛr, "An ɩn kpɛ̃ɔ a tara sʋɔ na kpɛ Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ.
Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, an ɩn kɔ̃mɔ̃kɔ̃mɔ̃ nyɔɔma na kpɛ kparpĩi bɔɔ pɔ, gar tara sʋɔ na kpɛ Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ."
Ka a bala na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ sʋʋr a Yesu, "An lɛ na pãa nyɛ faafʋ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Ala na ɩ tuo nɩrɛ sɛ̃, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ yele jaa ba ɩ tuo ɛ."
A Pita 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Sɩn bar bonsɩ a jaa, tɩ wa turo fʋ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, nɩrɛ na bar a wʋ yir, bɩɩ pɔɔ, bɩɩ yɛɛr, bɩɩ a wʋ sãa naa ma, bɩɩ bibiir a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ jũu,
wʋn nyɛn dɔɔl taa a dɩna nɩ daar kɔ̃ɔ na wa lɔɔn nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ."
Yesu tɔɔn a Pie nɩ Ayi yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Sɩ ben duoro a Jerusalɛm, ala a jaa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na sɛb 'yɛr a maa Nɩsaal Bie 'yɛr, an tɩ ɩ naa.
Ban tɩ nyɔɔ man kʋ a nɩbɛ bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka ba la ma, tʋrɔ ma, na ba chɩr nataar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma, na ba ge ma, tɩ kʋ ma.
Ka a ber ata daar ka n ir ɩ vʋr go."
A poturbo ba bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna wʋn 'yɛr par bɩ̃lãa jaa ɛ. A liin ba jaa, baa bɔ̃ɔ a ala wʋn 'yɛrɛ ɛ.
Yesu na wa gbʋrɔ a Jeriko, jɔ̃ɔ jɛ̃n be a sɔr kõkoor na wʋ sʋɔrɔ.
Wʋn wa wõ a nɩyɔɔ na chiine tala, a wʋ sʋrɔ, ɩka bo lɛ ɩrɛ.
Ka ba 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Yesu na yi Najaretɩ lɛ tala."
A wʋ gboolo, "Yesu, David Bidaba, kaa a n nɩbaal."
Ka a bala na de a nie tãn wʋ 'yɛrɛ pɔɔ a nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka wʋ chɛnɛ gboolo bʋɔlɔ, "Yesu, David Bidaba, kaa n nɩbaal."
Ka Yesu tɛɛ ara tɩ 'yɛr ɩka ba tara a daba waan. Lɛ a jɔ̃ɔ na wa gbʋr a Yesu ka wʋ sʋʋr wʋ,
"Bo lɛ fʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka n ɩ kʋ fʋ?" Ka a jɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, "N Soro n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n nyɛrɛ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Nyɛrɛ a fʋ sɔɔfʋ sa fʋ naa."
Ajienaa ka a ɩ wʋ nyɛrɛ naa, na wʋ dãna Nãaŋmɩn turo nɩ a Yesu. A nɩbɛ ba jaa na wa nyɛ a lɛ, ba mɩ dãna naa a Nãaŋmɩn.
Yesu kpɛ̃n a Jeriko tẽe pɔ tala.
Ka a daba kɔ̃ɔ be be ban bʋɔlɔ Jakiyas, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a lõpodierbe nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wʋ ɩ tara sʋɔ.
Wʋ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ nyɛ Yesu nɩ nɩbir, tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ waa, a wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ wʋ ɛ, bojũu nɩŋmaa lɛ wʋ ɩ.
Be lɛ wʋ de nie jo chen tɩ do kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ ju ɩka wʋ nyɛ a Yesu an ɩ a be lɛ wʋ tu tala.
Yesu na wa ta a tɩɛ pĩlem, wʋ dʋɔn bʋɔl wʋ, "Jakiyas wa suu fɔɔ, a fʋ yir lɛ ɩn gã dɩna."
Ka a Jakiyas suu fɔɔ jaa na wʋ tuor de a Yesu nɩ pʋpɛl.
A nɩbɛ ba jaa nyɛn a lɛ na ba piel hũhũnõ 'yɛrɛ, "Wʋ ben na tɩ kpɛ a yelbe-ɩrɛ nyãna sãan."
Tɩchɛ ka a Jakiyas ir ara tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu, "Nyɛ n Soro, ɩn põ naa a n bʋ̃tarsɩ ŋmaa, naa kʋ a nɔ̃n dẽme, ala ɩ n mɩ fɔl nɩrɛ jaa bon, ɩn yab a lɛ dɔɔl gbɛɛ anaar."
A Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Dɩna faafʋ wan a yir nyã pɔ, bojũu a daba nyã mɩ ɩn a Abraham bie.
Bojũu a maa Nɩsaal Bie wa naa ɩka n wa bɔ na n faa a bala na bɔr."
Ban chɛlɛ a anyãna ka wʋ lɔb sʋkpa kʋ ba, bojũu ba gbʋrɔ naa a Jerusalɛm ka nɩbɛ tɩɛr ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ na tɔɔn daa yi ajienaa.
Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nãbie ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ ir na chen a tẽtɛɛr ɩ̃sʋɔ ka ba tɩ su wʋ nãa, ka wʋ lɩɛb wa.
Na wʋ bʋɔl a wʋ gbãgbaar pie na wʋ de a sɛlbie pie na wʋ kʋ ba tɩ 'yɛr, 'Yɩ de a libie anyãna tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ, wa tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn na lɩɛb wa.'
Tɩchɛ ka a wʋ tẽe dẽme 'laar wʋ, ir nɩbɛ tʋ̃ wʋn chen baar ka ba tɩ 'yɛr ɩka, 'Baa bʋɔrɔ a daba nyã ɩka wʋ wa ɩ a ba nãa ɛ.'
"Wʋ din a nãa na wʋ lɩɛb wa a wʋ tẽe, wʋ wa tʋ̃n bʋɔl a wʋ gbãgbaar bala wʋn kʋ a libie ka ba wa a wʋ sʋʋr kaa a lɛ ban tʋ̃n a libie.
A 'lɔ na de nie wa 'yɛr naa, 'Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, a fʋ libir dɔɔn pie dɔɔl.'
Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr, 'Fʋ maal vɩla fʋn ben tara yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a bʋ̃bile nyã, ɩn vɛ̃ naa ka fʋ kaara tẽn pie.'
A ayi sʋɔ wa 'yɛr, 'Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, a fʋ libir mɩ dɔɔn anũu dɔɔl.'
Ka a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr, 'Mɩ kaara tẽn anũu.'
"Ka ata sʋɔ mɩ wa 'yɛr, 'Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyɛ a fʋ libir ɩn lũ 'yɔ̃ɔ fɔbaa pɔ bin.
N joro fʋn dãbɩ̃ɛ, bojũu a fʋ yele kpɛ̃mɛ naa. Fʋ ma den a jie 'lɔ fʋn ba bin ɛ, na fʋ ŋma a jie 'lɔ fʋn ba bʋr ɛ.'
Ka a wʋ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr, 'A fʋ nɛɛ 'yɛrbie lɛ ɩn de tɔɔr a fʋ 'yɛr, gbãgbadɛɛr lɛ fʋ ɩ. Fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a n yele kpɛ̃mɛ naa, ma de a be ɩn ba bin ɛ, na n ma ŋmara a jie 'lɔ ɩn ba bʋr ɛ.
Bo lɛ so ka faa de a n libir tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a be a libie binfʋ jie ɛ, ɩn ben ta wa, n kʋ̃ naa de ka bon dɔɔl ɛ?'
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʋ a bala na ara a be, 'Yɩ faa a libir 'lɔ a wʋ sɛ̃, na yɩ kʋ a 'lɔ na tara a libie pie.'
Ka ba 'yɛr, 'Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, pie lɛ wʋ tara.'
Wʋ 'yɛr naa, 'N 'yɛrɛ yɩ naa ɩka nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara wʋn lɛ nyɛn dɔɔl, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba tara ɛ, tɩ tara bɩ̃lãa ban den a bɩ̃lãa ala.
Tɩchɛ a n dɔ̃dẽme bala na ba bʋɔrɔ ma ɩka n ɩ a ba nãa ɛ, yɩ nyɔɔr ba waan wa kʋ a ka a n niem.' "
Yesu na 'yɛr a anyãna baar wʋ de ban nie ka ba duoro a Jerusalɛm.
A lɛ wʋn wa gbʋrɔ a Betefagɩ nɩ a Betanɩ, tɔ̃ɔ ben be ka ba bʋɔlɔ Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ, wʋ tʋ̃ naa a wʋ poturbo ayi tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba.
"Yɩ chen a tẽbile 'lɔ a yɩ niem, yɩn wa kpɩɛrɛ a tẽe pɔ yɩn nyɛn bʋ̃pɔlbile ban lũ, baa do wʋ jaa sɛrɛ ɛ, yɩ for wʋ waan.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa sʋʋr yɩ naa, 'Ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ foro a bʋ̃pɔlbile?' Yɩ 'yɛr wʋ, 'A sɩ Soro lɛ bʋɔrɔ wʋ.' "
A bala wʋn tʋ̃ chen tɩ nyɛ a lɛ nɛ wʋn 'yɛr ba.
Ban wa foro a bʋ̃pɔlbile, a bʋ̃pɔlbile dẽme sʋʋr ba naa, "Ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ foro a bʋ̃pɔlbile?"
A ba 'yɛr, "A sɩ Soro lɛ bʋɔrɔ wʋ."
Ba waan naa a bʋ̃pɔlbile wa kʋ a Yesu, na ba 'yɩɛr a ba fɔɔr dɔɔl a bʋ̃pɔlbile ju, tɩ nyɔɔ a Yesu ka wʋ do jɩ̃nɛ.
A lɛ wʋn chiine, lɛ mɩ lɛ a nɩbɛ 'yɩɛrɛ a fɔɔr den a sɔr.
Wʋn chen wa gbʋrɔ a jie a sɔr na suu a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju, a nɩyɔɔ bala na turo wʋ piel chɩlɛ nɩ nɛkpɛ̃ɛ na ba pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ ala a jaa ban nyɛ jũu.
"Nãaŋmɩn wʋ sʋ̃ʋ a nãa 'lɔ wʋn tʋ̃! Nyã'maar ben a saaju, ka a tɩɩr be a saaju jaa saaju."
Ka a Faraseemɩne na be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ, 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu, "Wiwile tãn a fʋ poturbo a ba bar a gɔ̃n."
A Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Ala ɩ ba bar a gɔ̃n, kʋsɩbɛ na pɔɔrɔ naa gɔ̃mɔ̃."
Yesu na wa tara a Jerusalɛm na wʋ nyɛ a tẽe wʋ kõn kʋ wʋ,
tɩ 'yɛr, "Ala ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ, fʋ̃ʋ gba ta bɔ̃ɔ a bon 'lɔ a dɩna bɩbir nɩ taa waan nyã'maar, tɩchɛ a sɔɔl naa a fʋ sɛ̃.
A bɩbir na wa vɩɛ yɩ naa, ka a yɩ dɔ̃dẽme wa jilʋ̃ yɩ gʋɔr gʋɔr a jie wʋ jaa.
Ban nɛb yɩn ŋmɛr nɩ a yɩ bibiir nɩ a yɩ tẽe ba kʋ̃ wa bar kʋsɩr ka wʋ dɔɔl wʋ tɔ ju ɛ, bojũu yaa tɩɛr tɔ a sɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na waara a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ."
Wʋ pãa tɩ kpɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ na wʋ piel dire a bala na daara bara.
Na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, 'A n yir na ɩ naa a puorfʋ jie,' tɩchɛ ka a yɩn maal wʋ a 'nãnyisɩ sɔɔlfʋ jie.' "
Bɩbir jaa lɛ wʋ wile ba be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir, tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ bʋɔrɔ a wʋ kʋfʋ.
Tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ lɛ ban na ɩ ɛ, bojũu nɩbɛ ba jaa 'yɔ̃ɔn toor chɛlɛ a wʋ 'yɛr.
A bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ Yesu ben a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ, wile a nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋrɔ ba. Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ wa a wʋ sɛ̃.
Na ba sʋʋr wʋ, "'Yɛr kʋ sɩ a jie fʋn nyɛ a sɔr maala nɩ a anyãna, an kʋ fʋ a sɔr nyã?"
Ka a Yesu mɩ 'yɛr, "N tara na sʋʋrfʋ na sʋʋr yɩ.
A Jɔɔn na dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ an lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ, Nãaŋmɩn lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ nɩrɛ lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ?"
A ba lɩɛb guor taa 'yɛrɛ, "Ala ɩ sɩ ben 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ, wʋn lɩɛb sʋʋr sɩ, ŋmɩnɛ a saa sɔɔ de wʋ ɛ?
Tɩchɛ sɩn mɩ 'yɛr ɩka nɩrɛ lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ, a nɩbɛ ba jaa na lɔb sɩn nɩ kʋsɩbɛ, bojũu ba jaa sɔɔn de ɩka Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ lɛ wʋ ɩ."
Be lɛ a ba 'yɛr, "Saa bɔ̃ɔ a jie an yi ɛ."
A Yesu mɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "N mɩ kʋ̃ 'yɛr kʋ yɩ a jie ɩn nyɛ a sɔr maala nɩ a anyãna ɛ."
Yesu chɛnɛ na 'yɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ na wʋ lɔb a sʋkpa nyã kʋ ba, "Daba lɛ bʋr a tɩwɔ̃nsɩ de kʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ a ba kaara, tɩ yɔ chen tɛɛr na wʋ tɩ kor be jaa.
Ka a tɩɩr wɔ̃mɔ̃ mʋɔfʋ sɔ̃ɔ wa ta ka wʋ ir a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ ɩ̃sʋɔ tʋ̃ a bala na kaara wʋ a puo ka ba pɔr a wɔ̃mɔ̃ amɩne tɩr. Tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ bala ŋme wʋ bar ka wʋ kul nũjaal.
Ka wʋ lɛ tʋ̃ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ ɩ̃sʋɔ go, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ mɩ ba lɛ ŋme ŋme naa tɩ tu tu wʋ bar, ka wʋ mɩ lɩɛb kul a nũjaala.
Ka wʋ lɛ maal tʋ̃ a ata sʋɔ ka ba ŋme a 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ baal 'mɔɔ lɔb bar a yõo.
"A puo sʋɔ pãa 'yɛr, 'Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn ɩ? Ɩn tʋ̃n a n bidanʋ̃naa amɩne sɛ̃ ban jo wʋn vĩ.'
Tɩchɛ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ na wa nyɛ a bidaba na waara a ba guor taa 'yɛr, 'Nyã lɛ ɩ a bʋ̃dire, yɩ ɩ a sɩ kʋ wʋ bar tɩ de a bonsɩ.'
Na ba nyɔɔ wʋ vu yin a puo kõkoor na ba tɩ kʋ wʋ. Bo lɛ a puo sʋɔ na wa ɩ a nɩbɛ banyãna?
Wʋn wa kʋ naa a nɩbɛ banyãna bar, tɩ de a puo kʋ nɩyor." Lɛ a nɩbɛ na wa wõ a 'yɛrbir nyã a ba 'yɛr, "A kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɩ a lɛ ɛ."
Ka a Yesu kaa ba a lɛ a tɩ̃ɩɩ tɩ sʋʋr, "Ala ɩ a kʋ̃ ɩ a lɛ ɛ, a par nɩ bo an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, 'A kʋsɩr 'lɔ a mɩmɩɛrbɛ na tɔr lɛ ɩ a kʋsɩr ju?'
Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa lo a kʋsɩr nyã ju na kar kara, tɩchɛ 'lɔ mɩ wa lo dib ɩ̃sʋɔ wʋn pʋrpʋr wʋ naa."
Ka a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ kaara sɔr 'lɔ ban na tu nyɔɔ wʋ fɔɔ, bojũu ba bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka bala lɛ wʋ lɔb a sʋkpa gbɛb, tɩchɛ na ba joro a nɩbɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ.
Ba jʋrɔ naa Yesu, na ba ir nɩbɛ tʋ̃ ka ba tɩ maala fɩka nɩsʋ̃n tɩ jʋrɔ wʋ. Ba bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka ba wõ a wʋ nɛɛ 'yɛrbie de nyɔɔn wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ kpɛ̃ɔ sʋɔ nũu pɔ, na ɩ a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ.
A nɛbɛr nɩbɛ banyãna sʋʋr wʋ naa, "Wiwile sɩ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka fʋ ma 'yɛr naa na fʋ wiil a lɛ na tor, faa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩbɛ gar taa ɛ, tɩchɛ na fʋ wile a nɩbɛ Nãaŋmɩn sɔr nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Sɔr ben be a sɩn yab a lõpo kʋ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa bɩɩ sɔr ba be be ɛ?"
Yesu nyɛn a ba yɛ̃ na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba,
"Yɩ wiil ma a libikur. An ju ŋmaa nɩ a wʋ yuor lɛ be be?"
A ba 'yɛr, "A Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa lɛ." A wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba. "Yɩ kʋ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa a ala na ɩ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa bon na yɩ mɩ de a ala na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bon mɩ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn."
Ba bɛr wʋn a nɛɛ faa a anyãna wʋn 'yɛr a chãsara, ka nɛɛr 'maa ba nɩ a 'yɛr nyãna wʋn 'yɛr, a ba ɩ gbulo gbulo.
A Saduseemɩne na 'yɛr ɩka a kũu pɔ irfʋ ba be be ɛ, bamɩne wan a Yesu sɛ̃ wa sʋʋr wʋ.
"Wiwile, Mosesɩ sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ gãn pɔ kʋ sɩ ɩka, ala ɩ daba kul pɔɔ na wʋ wa kpi, tɩchɛ ka a pɔɔ ba dɔɔ bie ɛ, a yɛbɛ wʋ de a pɔɔ kʋɔr kul na wʋ dɔɔ bie kʋ a yɛbɛ.
Yɛɛr ayopõi lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, ka a ba kpɛ̃ɛ kul pɔɔ na wʋ kpi, tɩ baa dɔɔ bie ɛ.
Ka a wʋ turo
nɩ a ata sʋɔ mɩ kul a pɔɔ, tɩ kpi, lɛ a yɛɛr ayopõi bala mɩ, kul a pɔɔ tɩ kpi baa dɔɔ bie ɛ.
A baaraa jaa ka a pɔɔ mɩ kpi.
An be a lɛ, bala wa ir a kũu pɔ, buor sʋɔ pɔɔ lɛ wʋn ɩ, an ɩ ba jaa ayopõi kul wʋ naa?"
A Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nɩbɛ na be ka a wɛr pɔ, kulo nɩ taa.
Tɩchɛ a bala na sɛɛn na ir a kũu pɔ a bɩbir 'lɔ, bala ba kulo taa ɛ.
Bala kʋ̃ lɛ kpi go ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ a malakasɩ na ba kpire ɛ. Ba ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn bibiir an ɩ bala lɛ ɩ a kũu pɔ irfʋ bibiir.

A kũu pɔ irfʋ, Mosesɩ mɩ wiil sɩ naa ɩka a ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ a lɛ wʋn sɛb a wʋ gãn pɔ, a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛrɛ nɩ wʋ a tɩbile na 'lɩrɛ a bũu, ka wʋ sɛb ɩka Nãaŋmɩn bʋɔl wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, Abraham, Isaakɩ nɩ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn.
Waa ɩ kũn Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ ɩn a vʋɛ Nãaŋmɩn a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ ba jaa ɩ vʋɛ."
Ka a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe bamɩne 'yɛr, "Wiwile, fʋ 'yɛr vɩla."
Nɩrɛ jaa ba lɛ 'la sʋʋr wʋ go ɛ.
Yesu pãa sʋʋr ba naa, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a ɩ ka a nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka a Kɩrɩsɩto ɩn a Nãa David Bidaba?
A Nãa David mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr a wʋ yiel gãn pɔ, 'A n Soro Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ a n Soro nyã wʋn ir, "Jɩ̃nɛ a n nũsʋ̃ɔ jie,
ka n wa de a fʋ dɔ̃dẽme bin a fʋ gbɛɛ pĩlem." '
A Nãa David bʋɔl wʋ naa a wʋ Soro, ŋmɩnɛ wʋn lɛ ɩrɛ wa ɩ a wʋ bie?"
A nɩbɛ na chɛlɛ a lɛ wʋn 'yɛrɛ, ka Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a poturbo.
"Yɩ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe 'yɔ̃ɔ. Ba nʋ̃ naa fuu vɛɛsɩ sufʋ, na ba nʋ̃ ɩka ba puoro ba a dar pɔ. A ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ yie a niem lɛ ba ma jɩ̃nɛ na ba jɩ̃nɛ a jibɛrɛ jie bala wa lɔ̃ɔ dire.
Bala lɛ ma fɔlɔ a pɔɔ kɔɛ yie na ba ma sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn kor bʋɔrɔ ɩka a nɩbɛ ba kaara ba. Ban nyɛn ge dɛɛr."
Yesu dʋɔn kaa nyɛ a tara dẽme na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a ba libie be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir.
Wʋ nyɛn pɔɔ kʋɔr nɔ̃ɔ sʋɔ mɩ na 'yɔ̃ɔ kobsɩ ayi.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka a pɔɔ kʋɔr nɔ̃ɔ sʋɔ nyã 'yɔ̃ɔn gar ba jaa.
A nɩbɛ banyãna ma ir 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩ chɛ a libie amɩne, tɩchɛ a pɔɔ nyã bon jaa wʋn tara lɛ wʋ de 'yɔ̃ɔ."
A Yesu poturbo bamɩne 'yɛrɛ na a lɛ ban maal a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir nɩ a kʋsɩr vɩɛlsɩ, nɩ a kʋfʋsɩ ban kʋ Nãaŋmɩn. Tɩchɛ ka Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba,
"A kʋsɩbɛ anyãna yɩn nyɛ a kana, sɔ̃ɔ waara naa, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa kʋ̃ dɔɔl a wʋ tɔ ju ɛ, a jaa na wɛl gã tẽe."
Ka ba sʋʋr wʋ, "Wiwile, dabor lɛ an ɩ? Bo lɛ na ɩ a jɩ̃nɛ ala wa bʋɔrɔ a ɩfʋ?"
A wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ka nɩrɛ taa bɛl yɩ ɛ. Bojũu nɩyɔɔ lɛ na de a n yuor waan wa 'yɛrɛ ɩka, 'Maa lɛ ba ɩ,' ka a ɩ, 'Sɔ̃ɔ gbʋr naa.' Yɩ taa turo ba ɛ.
Yɩn wa wõ jɛɛr nɩ faa taa, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ yɩ ɛ. A anyãna lɛ na de nie wa, tɩchɛ a ba ɩ a baarfʋ lɛ ɛ."
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nɩbɛ na ir tɩ jɛɛr nɩ a tẽe ɩ̃sʋɔ nɩbɛ, ka a nãmɩne mɩ ir jɛɛrɛ taa.
A tẽe na mɩr naa a jie wʋ jaa ka a kɔ̃ lo ka a baal dɛbɛ de jiir a jaa ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ nɩ jɩ̃nɛ yi saaju.
"Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka anyãna na wa ɩ ban ge yɩ naa, na ba nyɔɔr yɩ chiin a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir na ba fɩr yɩ chiin tɩ pɔɔ. Ban fɩr yɩn chiin a nãmɩne yie nɩ a paal nɩbɛrɛ jie a n yuor jũu.
A anyãna na kʋ yɩn sɔr ka yɩ di a n dãasɩɛ kʋ ba.
Tɩchɛ yɩ ta ɩ ka a ɩ yɩ tɩɛrɛ a lɛ yɩn na tɩ 'yɛr faa yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Bojũu maa lɛ na kʋ yɩ a 'yɛr nɩ a yɛ̃ ka a yɩ sãma dẽme kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ jie chɩɩr yɩ ɛ.
A yɩ sãamɩne nɩ a yɩ mamɩne, yɛɛr nɩ a yɩ bal nɩbɛ nɩ a yɩ barmɩne na gar 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ ka ba kʋ a yɩ bamɩne.
Nɩbɛ ba jaa na 'laar yɩ naa a maa jũu.
Tɩchɛ a yɩ jukɔɔlbir kʋ̃ wa wɛ ɛ.
Yɩn chɛnɛ sɔɔ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ yɩn faan yɩ mɩ̃ɛ.
"Yɩn wa nyɛ a sojasɩ a ba wa ŋmaa jilʋ̃ a Jerusalɛm, yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a wʋ wɛlfʋ gbʋr jaa yɛ̃yɛ̃.
Ka a bala na pãa be a Judiya ba joro duoro a tɔ̃n jur. A bala mɩ na be a a Jerusalɛm tẽe pɔ, yɩ joro yire, ka a bala mɩ na be a tẽe kõkoor ba ta lɛ kpɛ a tẽe pɔ go ɛ.
A sɔ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na kpãa a Isɩral nɩbɛ, a kpãafʋ nyã na ɩn a lɛ ban sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ.
A bɩbir nyã na ɩn wõm kʋ a pɔɔ pʋʋr nɩ a bipɩlɛ dẽme, dɔɔyɛ kpɛ̃ɛ na ben a wɛr pɔ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn suur lɛ dire a wʋ nɩbɛ.
Sɔkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ ban kʋn ba, tɩ nyɔɔr ba nɩpɔɔrsɩ kaar kʋ a paalsɩ. Ka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ na nɛɛrɛ naa a Jerusalɛm wa tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɔ̃ɔ kʋ ba.
"Yɩn nyɛn jɩ̃nsɩ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ pɔ, ŋmɛra pɔ nɩ a ŋmɛrbie pɔ. Tuo na pɔɔn nɩbʋrɔ jaa na be ka wɛr ju, ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a nɩbɛ, a man kpɛ̃ɛ kʋ̃ɔ na kara na a ɔɔrɔ.
Dãbɩ̃ɛ nyã na vɛ̃ naa ka a nɩbɛ pɛl, bojũu ba bɔ̃ɔn naa a dɔɔyɛ nyã na waara a wɛr pɔ, a saaju bomo a jaa na dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa.
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ban nyɛ a maa Nɩsaal Bie na yi a julõjuur pɔ, waara nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ a tɩɩr kpɛ̃ɛ.
A yele anyãna wa ɩrɛ, yɩ ir ara tɩ jɛɛr a yɩ jur, bojũu a yɩ faafʋ gbʋrɔ naa."
Sʋkpa nyã lɛ a Yesu lɔb kʋ ba, na wa 'yɛr, "Yɩ kaa a pɔlpɔl tɩɛ nɩ a tɩɩr a jaa.
Yɩn wa nyɛ ka a tʋɔrɔ a vaar yɩ ma bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka tʋl tara naa.
A lɛ mɩ lɛ, yɩn wa nyɛ a yelsɩ anyãna ka a ɩrɛ, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ gbʋr naa.
"Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka nɩsaal jaa kʋ̃ kpi baar ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a yelsɩ anyãna ɩ ɛ.
A saaju nɩ a tẽe, a jaa na wa baaraa, tɩchɛ a maa 'yɛrbie kʋ̃ wa baar ɛ.
"Yɩ guro yɩ mɩ̃ɛ, ka a yɩ nyãa taa pɔɔ ɛ, nɩ dãa kuolfʋ nɩ a ɩ̃gãn nyã bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ ka a bɩbir nyã taa wa dũu yɩ fɩka chɛbaa na tɛb ɛ.
Bojũu a lɛ na ɩ ɩn na wa, pɔɔn nɩrɛ jaa na be ka a wɛr nyã pɔ.
Yɩ kaara na yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn, na yɩ tʋ̃ɔ jo yi a ala a jaa na wa wa ɩ pɔ, na yɩn tʋ̃ɔ ara a maa Nɩsaal Bie niem."
A Yesu ma wile naa a nɩbɛ be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir, tɩchɛ ka a tɩ̃sɔɔ ka wʋ ma do a tɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ tɩ gã a be.
Ka a nɩbɛ ma chɛnɛ ŋmaa ir a bibio wa be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir ɩka ba wa chɛl a wʋ 'yɛr.
A Paanʋ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʋ ban bʋɔlɔ a Gõl Bar Difʋ gbʋrɔ naa.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe bʋɔrɔ sɔr 'lɔ ban na tu nyɔɔ a Yesu jaa jom, bojũu ba joro naa a nɩbɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ.
Ka a Satan pãa kpɛ a Judas na yi a Isɩkariyot na ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ pie nɩ ayi ɩ̃sʋɔ.
Wʋ ir chen a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir gugurbo sɛ̃, ka ba tɩ man taa lɛ wʋn na ɩ, ka ba nyɔɔ a Yesu.
Ba pʋɔ pɛl naa ka ba sɔɔ ɩka ban kʋ wʋ naa libie.
Judas sɔɔ naa na wʋ kaara bʋɔrɔ sɔr 'lɔ wʋn na nyɔɔ a Yesu kʋ ba ka a nɩyɔɔ ba be be ɛ.
A Paanʋ̃kõo bɩbir vɩɛ naa, ka ban kʋ a Gõl Bar Difʋ pɛr.
Yesu tʋ̃n a Pita nɩ Jɔɔn na wʋ 'yɛr, "Yɩ chen tɩ chɔɔr jie ka sɩ chen tɩ di a Gõl Bar Difʋ."
Ka ba sʋʋr wʋ, "Nyɩnɛ lɛ fʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ chen tɩ chɔɔr?"
A wʋ 'yɛr, "Yɩn wa tɩ kpɛ a tẽe pɔ, yɩn tuor daba na tuo kʋ̃ɔ nɩ yuor yɩ turo wʋ tɩ kpɛ̃n a yir 'lɔ pɔ wʋn kpɛ.
Na yɩ tɩ 'yɛr a yir sʋɔ, a wiwile lɛ 'yɛr ɩka sɩ wa sʋʋr fʋ kaa, ka nyɩnɛ lɛ a sãanba die be, ka 'lɔ naa wʋ poturbo na wa di a Gõl Bar Difʋ?
Wʋn wiil yɩn bɔɔpɩɛ dikpɛ̃ɛ ban chɔɔr yɩ maal a bʋ̃diir a be."
Ba chen tɩ nyɛ a lɛ nɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr na ba chɔɔr a bʋ̃diir a be.
A sɔ̃ɔ na wa ta Yesu nɩ a wʋ nɩtʋ̃nsɩ wa jɩ̃nɛ naa a bʋ̃diir par.
Be lɛ wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "N bʋɔrɔ na yɔɔ jaa ɩka n 'mataa din yɩ a Gõl Bar nyã bʋ̃diir tɩ na n di a dɔɔyɛ.
Bojũu n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka n kʋ̃ lɛ di yaa go ɛ, wa tɩ tãn yele jaa na maal baar a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ."
Wʋn wa de a dãa naa ŋmele wʋ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ nɩtʋ̃nsɩ, "Yɩ de a anyã nyũ lʋɔr taa.
Bojũu n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka n kʋ̃ lɛ nyũ a dãa anyãna go ɛ, tɩ tãn a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ waa daar."
Wʋ lɛ den a paanʋ̃ɔ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ na wʋ ŋma de kʋ ba tɩ 'yɛr, "A maa ɩ̃gãn lɛ a nyãna ɩn diere kʋrɔ yɩ, yɩ maala a nɩtɔ̃ tɩɛrɛ nɩ ma."
Lɛ nɩ wʋ ju lɛ ban wa di baar wʋ den a ŋmele tɩ 'yɛr, "A ŋmele nyã ɩn a nɛtɩr paalaa na ɩ a maa jɩ̃ɩ na kpaar a yɩ jũu.
"Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na garʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma lɛ n 'mataa dire nɩ a bʋ̃diir.
A maa Nɩsaal Bie na chen naa nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bin, tɩchɛ nɛbier ben a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na garʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma."
A ba piel sʋrɔ taa ɩka a ba buor sʋɔ lɛ na pãa tʋ̃ a nɩtɔ̃.
Ka nɛchɩrɛ mɩ ir a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ pɔ, a ba chɩrɛ taa bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba bɔ̃ɔ buor sʋɔ lɛ na ɩ a ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ.
A Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãmɩne ɛ, ma fɩrɛ naa a nɩbɛ, ka a bala mɩ na wile a ba kpɩ̃ɛn bʋɔlɔ ba mɩ̃ɛ, nɩsʋ̃nbɔ.
Tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ a ba ɩ lɛ lɛ ɛ, a 'lɔ na ɩ a yɩ kpɛ̃ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ na ɩ a yɩ jaa bibile, a 'lɔ na kaara yɩ, 'lɔ lɛ na tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ yɩ.
Nɩbuor sʋɔ lɛ ɩ kpɛ̃ɛ, a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a bʋ̃diir par, bɩɩ a 'lɔ na põnõ? A ba ɩ a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a bʋ̃diir par ɛ? Tɩchɛ a maa na ɩ a yɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ben a yɩ sɛ̃, ɩ a yɩ bʋ̃ põnõ.
"Yɩn lɛ ɩ a nɩbɛ bala na chɛnɛ ara gu ma a n wõm pɔ.
N kʋ yɩn a nãalʋ̃ʋ nɩtãa lɛ a n Sãa na kʋ ma a nãalʋ̃ʋ.
Ka maa nɩ yɩn lɔ̃ɔ di tɩ nyũ be a n nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ, na yɩ jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju tɔɔrɔ a Isɩral balsɩ pie nɩ ayi 'yɛr.
"Simon, Simon, a Satan sʋɔr sɔr Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɩka wʋ yɩɛl yɩ chi kaar.
Tɩchɛ a fʋ̃ʋ Pita n sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʋ fʋ ɩka, a fʋ sɔɔfʋ ta bʋ̃bʋr ɛ, a fʋ̃ʋ wa lɩɛb puor, fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a fʋ taaba ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn."
Tɩchɛ ka a Simon 'yɛr, "N Soro, n chɔɔr naa ɩka maa nɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ na lɔ̃ɔ kpɛ a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, na sɩ 'mataa kpi."
A Yesu 'yɛr, "A fʋ̃ʋ Pita, sɛrɛ ka a nɔraa kõ a dɩna fʋn chɩɩr gbɛɛ ata ɩka faa bɔ̃ɔ ma ɛ."
Be lɛ a Yesu pãa sʋʋr ba, "Ɩn dɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃ yɩ a nũjaala, yaa tara libie ɛ, bɩɩ wʋɔ nɩ nafɔɔr ɛ, yɩ dɔ̃ɔ bɔ bon faa bɩɩ?" A ba 'yɛr ɩka baa bɔ bon jaa faa ɛ.
A wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã, fʋ̃ʋ nyã na tara libie de, fʋ̃ʋ nyã mɩ na tara wʋɔ de, fʋ̃ʋ nyã na ba wa tara sɔkpɛ̃ɛ ɛ, de a fʋ fuu da na fʋ dãn a sɔkpɛ̃ɛ.
A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, 'Ba sɔr wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ a tʋ̃dɛbɛ dẽme pɔ.' N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka maa lɛ ban maal a lɛ nɛ, ɔ̃ɔ, a lɛ ban sɛb a n yele a gbʋrɔ na tafʋ."
Ka a poturbo 'yɛr, "Sɩ Soro nyɛ sɔbɛrɛ ayi." A wʋ 'yɛr, "A sɛɛ naa."
Yesu yin duoro a Olive Tɩɩr Tɔ̃ɔ ju, nɩtãa lɛ wʋn ma ɩrɛ ka a wʋ poturbo turo wʋ.
Wʋn wa ta a jie wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn na yɩ taa lo a bɛɛr kaa pɔ ɛ."
Wʋ tɔɔn jãa ba bɩ̃lãa fɩka kʋsɩr fʋn na lɔb ka wʋ ta, na wʋ gbʋr dumo sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ,
"N Sãa, ala ɩ fʋ bʋɔrɔ naa, de a dɔɔyɛ ŋmele nyãna bar ma, a ɩ a fʋ bɔfʋ a ta ɩ a maa bɔfʋ ɛ."
Be lɛ a malaka yi be a saaju wa a wʋ sɛ̃ wa 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ.
A nɩbaal na kpɛ wʋ a lɛ, ka wʋ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ jaa ka a nyĩe hãna wʋ loro tẽe fɩka jɩ̃ɩ.
Wʋn wa ir a Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ jie lɩɛb chen tɩ nyɛ ka a wʋ poturbo gã gur nɩ pʋsɔ̃ɔ.
Ka wʋ sʋʋr ba, "Ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ gã guro? Yɩ ir sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn na yɩ taa lo a bɛɛr kaa pɔ ɛ."
Wʋn chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ a lɛ ka a ɩ a nɩyɔɔ daan sãa, ka a 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a Judas a Pie Nɩ Ayi ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ de ba a nie. Wʋ tɔɔn ta a Yesu puor wʋ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu sʋʋr wʋ, "Judas, fʋ ben de puorfʋ garʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a maa Nɩsaal Bie?"
Yesu poturbo na nyɛ a lɛ na ɩrɛ ka ba sʋʋr wʋ, "Sɩ Soro, sɩ chɩɛrɛ nɩ a sɔbɛrɛ bɩɩ?"
Ka a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ chɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ gbãgbaa nũsʋ̃ɔ toor ŋmaa.
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Yɩ ta lɛ maal a lɛ ɛ." Tɩ na wʋ sɩɩr a daba toor ka wʋ choo.
A Yesu pãa sʋʋr a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir gugurbo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdierbe, "A mɔ̃ nɩbier lɛ n ɩ ka yɩ waan sɔbɛrɛ nɩ dakʋrsɩ a n nyɔɔfʋ jie bɩɩ?
Maa nɩ yɩn lɛ be be bɩbir jaa be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ, yaa nyɔɔ ma ɛ, tɩchɛ a yɩ bɩbir vɩɛ naa ka a libe mɩ di nãa."
Ba nyɔɔ naa Yesu, na ba chiine a bɔɔrlo nãa yir, ka a Pita mɩ be a puor na wʋ turo.
Ban tɩ ta ba gbɔɔn bũu be a bɛchaar sãlsɔɔ 'mataa jɩ̃nɛ ka a Pita mɩ tɩ pʋɔ ba ka ba 'mataa jɩ̃nɛ.
Ka a gbãgbapɔɔbile nyɛ wʋ a bũu na chaar na wʋ kaara wʋ jaa tɩ̃ɩɩ tɩ wa 'yɛr, "A daba nyã mɩ ɩn a wʋ poturo ɩ̃sʋɔ."
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita chiir 'yɛr, "Pɔɔ, n ba bɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɛ."
A ba kor ɛ ka a nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ nyɛ wʋ na wʋ 'yɛr, "Fʋ mɩ ɩn a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ." Ka a Pita 'yɛr, "Daba, n ba ɩ a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ ɛ."
A ba lɛ kor ɛ, ka a nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ 'yɛr, "A ba ɩ baal ɛ, a daba nyã ɩn a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ bojũu Galilee lɛ wʋ yi."
Ka a Pita 'yɛr, "Daba, n ba bɔ̃ɔ a ala fʋn 'yɛrɛ ɛ." Ka a nɔraa mɩ tɔ̃ɔ kõ a lɛ nɛ.
Ka a Yesu lɩɛb na wʋ kaa a Pita, a wʋ tɔ̃ɔ tɩɛr tɔ a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr kʋ wʋ ɩka, "Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka a nɔraa kõ a dɩna fʋn chiir man gbɛɛ ata."
Ka a Pita ir yi a yõo na wʋ tɩ kõ nɩbaal kõn.
A dɔɔr bala na nyɔɔ a Yesu, piel na ba ɩrɛ wʋ laara tɩ ŋmiere wʋ.
Ba pɔɔ wʋ naa nɩbie tɩ sʋʋr, "Bɔ̃ɔ na fʋ 'yɛr kʋ sɩ a nɩnyɩnɛ na ŋme fʋ?"
Ba lɛ den 'yɛrbidɛbɛ yɔɔ tʋ tʋn wʋ.
A wɛr na wa chaar, a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdierbe nɩ a ba bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe lɔ̃ɔn taa, ka ba tara a Yesu waan a be.
A ba sʋʋr wʋ, "Ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ, 'yɛr kʋ sɩ." Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Maa 'yɛr, yɩ kʋ̃ sɔɔ ɛ.
Ala ɩ n sʋʋr yɩn 'yɛr yɩ kʋ̃ haa ma nɛɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ an yi a dɩna chiine, a maa Nɩsaal Bie na jɩ̃nɛ naa Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ sɔɔ nũsʋ̃ɔ jie."
Ka ba sʋʋr wʋ, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie ɔ?" Kaa a Yesu 'yɛr, "Yɩn lɛ 'yɛr ɩka lɛ n ɩ."
Ka ba pãa 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa, "Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩ lɛ bʋɔrɔ dãasɩɛ go? Sɩ wõn yi a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɛɛ pɔ."
Be lɛ a nɩyɔɔ bala pãa tara a Yesu chiin a be a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Pilate sɛ̃.
Na ba tɩ piel 'yɛrɛ a 'yɛrsɩ anyãna dɔɔlɔ wʋ, "Sɩ nyɛn a daba nyãna ka wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nɩbɛ 'yɛr, a ba ta yab a lõpo kʋ a Nãa Siisa ɛ, na wʋ lɛ 'yɛr ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa na ɩ a nãa."
Ka a Pilate sʋʋr a Yesu, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa ɔ?" Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Ɔ̃ɔ, fʋ̃ʋ baa 'yɛr."
Ka a Pilate pãa 'yɛr kʋ a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ, "N ba nyɛ chɛfʋ jaa a daba nyã jie ɛ."
Tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ tɔr tɩ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ, "Wiilfʋ nyãna lɛ wʋ tara dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a nɩbɛ be a Judiya. Galilee lɛ wʋ piel a yele nyãna be wa tãn a ka."
Pilate na wõ a nɩtɔ̃ ka wʋ sʋrɔ, Galilee lɛ a daba yi bɩɩ?
Wʋn wa bɔ̃ɔn ka a Hɛrɔd paal nɩrɛ lɛ, wʋ vɛ̃ naa ka ba tara wʋ chiin tɩ kʋ a Hɛrɔd, ka ɩ a Jerusalɛm lɛ wʋ mɩ be a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
Hɛrɔd na wa nyɛ a Yesu, wʋ pʋɔ pɛl naa, bojũu a kor wʋn wõ a Yesu yele na wʋ bʋɔrɔ a wʋ nyɛfʋ, ka wʋ tʋ̃ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Na wʋ sʋʋr a Yesu sʋʋr yɔɔ tɩ waa haa wʋ nɛɛ ɛ.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwiilbe na ara a be 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr kpɩ̃ɛn dɔɔlɔ wʋ.
Hɛrɔd nɩ a wʋ sojasɩ maal a Yesu dɛɛr na ba ɩrɛ wʋ laara. Ba su wʋ naa a nãa fuu tɩ lɩɛb wʋ chiin a Pilate sɛ̃.
Hɛrɔd nɩ a Pilate dɔ̃ɔ tara taa nɩ 'yɛr, tɩ a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ba maal a 'yɛr.
Be lɛ a Pilate bʋɔl a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a tẽe nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩn lɛ waan a daba nyãna a n sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr ɩka wʋ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa a nɩbɛ. N vɩɛr naa a wʋ 'yɛr a yɩ jaa niem ka a ala yɩn 'yɛr dɔɔl wʋ ba ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Hɛrɔd mɩ ba nyɛ yele jaa a wʋ jie ɛ, ala lɛ so ka wʋ lɛ lɩɛb wʋ wa kʋ sɩ, yɩn mɩ̃ɛ nyɛ naa wʋn ba maal yele jaa na sɛɛn kũu ɛ.
A lɛ jũu ɩn vɛ̃ naa ka ba fɔb wʋ tɩchɛ kaa n bar wʋ."
Ka ba jaa ŋme chɛl daa 'yɛrɛ, "Ŋmaa daba nyã ju tɩ na fʋ yuo a Barabasɩ na fʋ kʋ sɩ."
Ba pɔɔ naa a Barabasɩ, bojũu 'yɛr dɔ̃ɔ lo be a tẽe pɔ, ka wʋ kʋ nɩrɛ.
Pilate na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ bar a Yesu wʋ lɛ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ go.
Tɩchɛ ka ba chɛnɛ ŋmiere a chɛlsɩ 'yɛrɛ, "Kpa wʋ a daa ju, kpa wʋ a daa ju."
Gbɛɛ ata lɛ wʋ sʋʋr ba, "Bo? Bãa dɛɛr lɛ wʋ ɩ? Maa ba nyɛ dɛɛr jaa wʋn sɛɛn kũu ɛ. A lɛ jũu ɩn vɛ̃n ka ba fɔb wʋ tɩ bar wʋ."
Tɩchɛ ka ba chɛnɛ tãna bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ kpa wʋ a daa ju, ka a ba gɔ̃mɔ̃ wa tʋ̃ɔ wʋ.
Lɛ lɛ a Pilate 'yɛr ɩka wʋn ɩ naa a lɛ ban 'yɛr.
A Barabasɩ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ dam a tẽe na wʋ kʋn nɩrɛ ka ba nyɔɔ wʋ pɔɔ, wʋ yuo wʋn bar tɩ kʋ ba a Yesu.
A lɛ ban chiine a Yesu, ba nyɔɔn daba yuor na di Simon, Sirenɩ lɛ wʋ yi na wʋ yi a yõo tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a tẽe pɔ. Ba fɩr wʋn de a Yesu daa tuo wʋ ka wʋ turo nɩ wʋ.
Nɩyɔɔ turo wʋ naa lɔ̃ɔn pɔbɔ, bala lɛ kõnõ waala kʋrɔ wʋ.
Ka a Yesu lɩɛb 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Jerusalɛm pɔɔbil, yɩ ta kõnõ kʋrɔ ma ɛ, yɩ kõnõ kʋrɔ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a yɩ bibiir.
Bojũu bɩbir kɔ̃ɔ na wa vɩɛ naa ka yɩ 'yɛr, 'Pʋpɛl lɛ kʋ a pɔbɔ bala na ab nɩ pɔɔ 'lɔ jaa na ba dɔɔ bie ɛ, bɩɩ bɩrɛ ala jaa na ba 'yɛn kaa ɛ.'
'A ban pãa 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a tɔ̃bɛrɛ, "Yɩ lo pɔɔ sɩ, na yɩ ũu sɩ." '
Ala ɩ nɩbɛ maala naa a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ kʋ a tɩɛ na chɛnɛ ɩ a 'maar, ŋmɩnɛ ban ɩ wʋ 'lɔ wa ko?"
Dɔɔr ayi na maal dɛɛr, ka ba nyɔɔr ba 'matãan a Yesu chiine a kʋfʋ jie.
Ba chiin ban tɩ tãn a jie ban bʋɔlɔ Julaa, be lɛ ba kpa ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa a wʋ daa ju, ka a nɩdɛbɛ ayi bala ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ be a Yesu nũsʋ̃ɔ jie, tɩchɛ ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ be a wʋ gʋbaa jie.
Be lɛ a Yesu 'yɛr, "N Sãa, vɛ̃ kʋ ba, baa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ban ɩrɛ ɛ." Gbãm lɛ ba gba na ba põn a wʋ fuusɩ.
Ka a nɩbɛ ara kaara wʋ, ka a Juu nɩbɛ nɩbɛrɛ ara kpɛrɛ wʋ na ba 'yɛrɛ, "Wʋ ma faan bamɩne, vɛ̃ a wʋ faa a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ala ɩ 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na ir."
Ka a sojasɩ mɩ wa ɩrɛ wʋ laara, na ba de a dãmiir kʋ wʋ.
Tɩ na ba 'yɛrɛ, "Ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nãa, faa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ."
Ba sɛb sɛbie mar be a wʋ ju pɔ ka a 'yɛr, "Nyãna lɛ ɩ a Juu Nɩbɛ Nãa".
A nɩdɛbɛ bala ban lɔ̃ɔ kpan wʋ, ɩ̃sʋɔ tʋrɔ wʋn 'yɛrɛ, "A ba ɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa ɛ? Faa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɩ mɩ faa sɩ."
Tɩchɛ ka a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ 'lɔ gɔ̃nɔ̃ wʋ 'yɛrɛ, "Faa joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, an ɩ a kũu 'lɔ lɛ fʋ mɩ kpire.
Sɩn gefʋ sɛɛn sɩ naa, sɩ nyɛn a lɛ na sɛɛ sɩn maal, tɩchɛ a daba nyã 'lɔ ba maal dɛɛr jaa ɛ."
Tɩ pãa 'yɛr kʋ a Yesu, "Tɩɛr tɔ ma fʋ̃ʋ wa kpɛ a fu nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ fʋ, dɩna maa nɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tẽvɩla pɔ."
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbʋrɔ a garju sãlsɔɔ tɩchɛ ka a chãa ɩ jaa gbɛb, ka a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ wa tɩ vɩr.
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ ba lɛ chaar go ɛ, ka a fɔbaa 'lɔ ban lũ var a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir die pɔ 'mar ayi.
Be lɛ a Yesu tãn kpɛ̃ɔ jaa 'yɛr, "N Sãa, fʋ nũu pɔ lɛ n de a n sɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ." Wʋn wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ baar, tɩ vʋʋr a wʋ vʋʋr baaraa.
A sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na nyɛ a lɛ na ɩ wʋ dãn Nãaŋmɩn tɩ 'yɛr, "Sɩrɛ jaa a daba nyã ɩn nɩtor."
Ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa na lɔ̃ɔ taa a be nyɛn a lɛ na ɩ ka ba lɩɛb pʋsɔ̃ɔ, na ba waala kulo.
Tɩchɛ a wʋ nɩbɔ̃ɔnsɩ pʋɔn a pɔbɔ bala na tu wʋ yi a Galilee ara tɛɛr tɩ kaara a lɛ na ɩrɛ.
Daba ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ ben be ban bʋɔlɔ Josefʋ, wʋ pʋɔ naa a nɩbɛrɛ pɔ, na wʋ ɩ nɩsʋ̃ nɩ nɩtor.
Wʋ tɔr naa a lɛ ban 'yɛr nɩ a lɛ ban ɩrɛ. Wʋ yi naa a Judiya paal pɔ tẽe ban bʋɔlɔ Arimatɩya, wʋ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ.
'Lɔ lɛ chen a Pilate sɛ̃ tɩ sʋɔr a Yesu ɩ̃gãn ɩka wʋ ũu.
Na wʋ pãa yɔɔ a kũu suun tɩ vil wʋ a fɔpɩla pɔɔ tɩ ũu wʋ a yaa ban chɩ kʋsɩr pɔ, ban ba ũu nɩrɛ sɛrɛ ɛ.
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ba mɩ chɔɔrɔ ka a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir na piel.
A pɔbɔ bala nɩ a Yesu na 'mataa yi a Galilee wa, ba tu naa a Josefʋ tɩ nyɛ a yaa nɩ a lɛ ban ũu a Yesu.
Tɩ na ba pãa lɩɛb kul tɩ chɔɔr a tɩ̃ɩ nɩ a kãnyũu vɩla na tɩ fɔ a Yesu ɩ̃gãn, tɩchɛ a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir jũu, baa dam ɛ, ba pɛ̃n naa a lɛ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ na 'yɛr.
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir divɩɛ bio bibio, a pɔbɔ den a kãnyũur vɩla ala ban chɔɔr chiin a be a yaa par.
Ba tɩ nyɛn ka a kʋsɩr bil yi a yaa nɛɛ pɔ.
Ka ba kpɛ tɩchɛ baa nyɛ a Yesu ɩ̃gãn ɛ.
A ba ara bẽne a lɛ nɛ ka a dɔɔr ayi wa dũu ba ka a ba bʋ̃sursɩ pɛl saa nyɩɩrfʋ kaar.
Ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a pɔbɔ, ka ba kpa kpa jur a tẽe, tɩchɛ ka a dɔɔr sʋʋr ba, "Bo so ka yɩ bʋɔrɔ a vʋr a kũusɩ pɔ?
Waa be ka ɛ. Wʋ ir naa. Yɩ tɩɛr a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr kʋ yɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋn be a yɩ sɛ̃, be a Galilee.
'Ban nyɔɔ naa a maa Nɩsaal Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩdɛbɛ nuur pɔ, ka ba kʋ ma a daa ju, tɩchɛ a ber ata daar, ka n lɛ ir ɩ vʋr.' "
Be lɛ ba pãa tɩɛr tɔ a wʋ 'yɛrbie.
Ban wa yi a yaa par kul, ba tɩ man a anyãna kʋ a Pie Nɩ Bʋ̃'yen nɩ nɩrɛ jaa.
Mɛɛr na yi Magdala, nɩ Joana nɩ a Jemesɩ ma Mɛɛr nɩ a bamɩne na pʋɔ ba lɛ man a anyãna kʋ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ.
Tɩchɛ baa sɔɔ de a pɔbɔ 'yɛr ɛ, bojũu a ba 'yɛr nyɛntãan jire.
An be a lɛ ka Pita vaa ir jo chen a yaa par, na wʋ tɩ guun muul kaa na wʋ nyɛ a fɔpɩla na for gã wʋ yõ, ka wʋ lɩɛb yi tɩ bẽne a lɛ na ɩ.
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a wʋ poturbo ayi chiine naa a tẽbile ɩ̃sʋɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Emayusɩ na ba jãan a Jerusalɛm ɛ.
Ka ba pãa 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa a lɛ jaa na ɩ.
A lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ na ba mana a anyãna kʋrɔ taa, ka a Yesu mɩ̃ɛ wa pʋɔ ba a ba 'mataa chiine.
Tɩchɛ ka a lɩɩ ba a baa bɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɛ.
Ka wʋ sʋʋr ba, "Bo lɛ yɩ chiine mana kʋrɔ taa a lɛ mɔ̃?" Ka a nɩbaal kpɛ ba a ba tɛɛ ara.
Ka ba ɩ̃sʋɔ yuor na di Kɩleopasɩ sʋʋr wʋ, "Fʋ̃ʋ tɛɛ lɛ ɩ sãan be a Jerusalɛm na faa bɔ̃ɔ lɛ na ɩ a be a ber ayi anyãna ɛ?"
A wʋ sʋʋr, "Bo yele?" Ka ba 'yɛr, "A Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ, Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ lɛ wʋ ɩ, ka a wʋ 'yɛr nɩ a wʋ maalfʋ kpɛ̃mɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a nɩbɛ niem.
A bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a sɩ nɩbɛrɛ nyɔɔ wʋn tɩr ɩka ba kʋ, ka ba kpa wʋ a daa ju.
Tɩchɛ 'lɔ lɛ sɩn mɩ tɩɛrɛ ɩka wʋn faan a Isɩral nɩbɛ. A ala na ɩ dɛɛr jaa nɩ nyã, ber ata nɩ nyã a lɛ na ɩ.
A sɩ pɔbɔ bamɩne lɛ wa 'maa sɩ nɛɛ, a bibio nyãna lɛ ba chen a yaa par,
tɩchɛ baa tɩ nyɛ a wʋ ɩ̃gãn ɛ. Na ba wa 'yɛr kʋ sɩ ɩka ba nyɛn malakasɩ ka ba 'yɛr ɩka wʋ ir ɩ vʋr.
Ka a sɩ taaba bamɩne pãa mɩ chen a yaa par tɩ nyɛ ka ɩ a lɛ nɛ a pɔbɔ na 'yɛr lɛ, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ mɩ̃ɛ baa nyɛ wʋ ɛ."
Ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ yɩ faa tɩɛr lɛ, na yaa tʋ̃ɔ tɩɛr tɔ na yɩ sɔɔ de a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na 'yɛr ɛ?
A ba ɩ a Nɩ-iraa na din a dɔɔyɛ anyãna tɩ na wʋ pãa kpɛ a wʋ tɩɩr pɔ ɛ?"
Wʋ piel naa Mosesɩ nɩ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ba jaa, na wʋ pãa wiil ba a par a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr.
A lɛ ban wa tara a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ ban chiine, a Yesu po naa fɩka tɛɛr wʋn chiine.
Tɩchɛ ka ba sʋɔr wʋ yãayãabɩlɛ 'yɛrɛ, "Lɩɛb kpɛ wa gã a sɩ sɛ̃, bojũu mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ 'mʋr baar." Ka wʋ lɩɛb kpɛ na gã a ba sɛ̃.
Be lɛ a ba tɩ 'mataa jɩ̃nɛ a bʋ̃diir par na di, ka wʋ de a paanʋ̃ɔ na puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, tɩ piel ŋmara põnõ ba.
Ka a ba nɩbie pãa yuo, ka ba bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Yesu lɛ, tɩ wʋ bɔr a ba niem.
Ka ba 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa, "Ala lɛ so wʋn 'yɛrɛ nɩ sɩ a sɔr pɔ ka a nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ sɩ a lɛ, wʋn wiil sɩ a lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ."
Be lɛ ba vaa ir fɔɔ jaa lɩɛb chen a Jerusalɛm tɩ nyɛ a Pie Nɩ Bʋ̃'yen nɩ a Yesu poturbo bamɩne na lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Na ba 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ a sɩ Soro ir ɩ vʋr, na wʋ ir a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ wiil a Simon."
A ba ayi bala pãa man a lɛ na ɩ a sɔr pɔ nɩ a lɛ ban de bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Yesu lɛ wʋn wa ŋma a paanʋ̃ɔ.
A anyãna ban chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ ka a Yesu mɩ̃ɛ wa ara a ba sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nyã'maar wʋ be a yɩ sɛ̃."
Ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba a ba mii a lɛ a gbɛ gbɛ, tɩɛr ɩka kpĩin lɛ ba nyɛ.
A wʋ sʋʋr ba, "Bo lɛ so ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ yɩ a lɛ, a nɩ bo lɛ so ka yɩ baala a lɛ?
Yɩ kaa nyɛ a n nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ, maa mɩ̃ɛ lɛ, yɩ sɩɩr ma kaa, kpĩin ba lɛ ɛ. Kpĩin maa tara ɩ̃gãn nʋ̃n nɩ kɔɔr nɩtãa lɛ yɩn nyɛ ma ɩn tara ɛ."
Wʋn 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ baar, wʋ wiil ban a wʋ nuur nɩ a wʋ gbɛɛ.
Tɩchɛ baa chɛnɛ sɔɔ de sɛrɛ ɛ, nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ba naa ka a nɛɛr 'maa ba, ka wʋ sʋʋr ba, "Yaa tara bon na kʋ ma ka n di ɛ?"
Be lɛ ba kʋ wʋ jɩ̃ŋmaa ban wɔ̃,
ka wʋ 'wɔb be a ba niem.
Wʋ pãa 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A anyãna lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ chɛnɛ be a yɩ sɛ̃. Yele a jaa na sɛb a Mosesɩ nɛɛ pɔ, nɩ a ala na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ gãn pɔ, nɩ a yiel gãn pɔ, a n jũu na ɩ naa lɛ."
Be lɛ wʋ pãa yuo a ba tɩɛr ka ba tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ala na sɛb a wʋ gãn pɔ.
Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A anyãna lɛ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, a Nɩ-iraa na din dɔɔyɛ na wʋ kpi na wʋ lɛ ir ɩ vʋr a ber ata daar.
Ban den a wʋ yuor mʋɔl kʋ nɩbʋrɔ ba jaa, ka ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa lɩɛb a wʋ tɩɛr, Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ naa a wʋ yeldɛɛr bar, Jerusalɛm lɛ an piel.
Yɩn lɛ ɩ a anyãna dãasɩɛ dẽme.
A maa na tɩ tʋ̃ naa a 'lɔ a n Sãa na tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ yɩ, tɩchɛ yɩ chɛnɛ jɩ̃nɛ a Jerusalɛm, ka a kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ wa yi a saaju wa pɔɔ yɩ."
Wʋ tara ban yin tɩ gbʋrɔ nɩ a Betanɩ na wʋ tur a nuur saaju sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ ba.
A lɛ wʋn sʋɔr a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ ba, wʋ bar ba naa ka Nãaŋmɩn 'mɔɔ wʋ don be a saaju.
A ba pãa gbʋr dumo puor wʋ tɩ lɩɛb pʋpɛl kul a Jerusalɛm.
Bɩbir jaa lɛ ba ma chen be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir tɩ dãna a Nãaŋmɩn.
A pielfʋ daar a 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a 'Yɛr ben be, ka a 'Yɛr be a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ka a 'Yɛr ɩ Nãaŋmɩn.
Wʋ dɔ̃ɔ be a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ a pielfʋ daar.
A 'Yɛr nyã lɛ Nãaŋmɩn maal bomo a jaa. Bon jaa ba maal ka a ba tu a 'Yɛr nyã pɔ ɛ.
A wʋ pɔ lɛ nyɛvʋr be, a wʋ nyɛvʋr nyã lɛ kʋrɔ bomo a jaa chãa.
A chãa nyã lɛ chaara a libe pɔ, ka libe ba tʋ̃ɔ wʋ kpĩin ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃n daba na di Jɔɔn.
'Lɔ lɛ wa di a dãasɩɛ na wʋ 'yɛr a chãa nyã 'yɛr, ka a nɩrɛ jaa na tu a wʋ sɛ̃ sɔɔ de a chãa.
Jɔɔn ba ɩ a chãa ɛ, tɩ wʋ wa naa ɩka wʋ wa 'yɛr a chãa 'yɛr.
A yelmɩ̃ɛ chãa nyã lɛ chaara 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩrɛ jaa na waara a wɛr pɔ.
A 'yɛr dɔ̃ɔ be a wɛr pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn gba maal a wɛr tu a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɛ.
Wʋ wa naa a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ paal pɔ, tɩchɛ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩbɛ ba de wʋ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩbɛ bamɩne de wʋ naa, na ba sɔɔ de a wʋ yuor, ka wʋ kʋ ba sɔr ka ba ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bibiir.
Baa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bibiir nɩrɛ dɔɔfʋ kaar ɛ, bɩɩ nɩrɛ bɔfʋ pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ maal ba a wʋ bibiir.
A 'yɛr wa ɩ naa nɩrɛ na wʋ jɩ̃nɛ a sɩ sɛ̃. Sɩ nyɛ naa a wʋ tɩɩr, a tɩɩr nyã na ɩ a Sãa Bidabʋ̃'yen tɛɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ yi a Sãa sɛ̃ wa, na wʋ tara wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Jɔɔn 'yɛr a wʋ 'yɛr, na wʋ tãna 'yɛrɛ, "Nyã lɛ n 'yɛr yɩ ɩka wʋn wa naa, 'lɔ na be a n puor waara gar ma naa, bojũu wʋ dɔ̃ɔ be be tɩ ba wa dɔɔ ma."
A wɩ̃ɛfʋ sɛɛ wʋ naa, ka a wʋ maal vɩla lʋɔr sɩ jaa bʋ̃'yen 'yen dɔɔlɔ taa waara a sɩ sɛ̃.
Bojũu, Mosesɩ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ waan a nɛɛ, tɩchɛ Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ lɛ waan a wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Nɩbʋ̃'yen jaa ba nyɛ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, tɩchɛ a Bidabʋ̃'yen tɛɛ 'lɔ na be a Sãa lõboor lɛ wiil sɩ a lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na be.
A nɩbɛrɛ na be a Jerusalɛm tʋ̃n a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ puorfʋ jie sʋ̃sʋ̃nbɔ ka ba tɩ sʋʋr Jɔɔn, nɩbuor lɛ wʋ ɩ,
Ka a Jɔɔn 'yɛr ba, "N ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ wʋn tʋ̃ ɩka wʋ wa faa a wʋ nɩbɛ ɛ."
Ka ba lɛ sʋʋr wʋ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Elaija bɩɩ? Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "N ba ɩ wʋ ɛ." Ka ba lɛ sʋʋr wʋ ka 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɔ? Ka wʋ ɩka, "Kai."
Ka ba sʋʋr wʋ, "Tɩ an lɛ fʋ pãa ɩ? A sɩn tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a bala na tʋ̃ sɩ, 'yɛr sɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ fʋn ɩ."
Jɔɔn den a lɛ a Isaiya na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb na wʋ 'yɛr, "Maa lɛ a kɔkɔr 'lɔ na tãna a dãlpʋɔ pɔ, ɩka yɩ chɔɔr a Soro sɔr."
A Faraseemɩne tʋ̃n nɩbɛ bamɩne a Jɔɔn sɛ̃.
Ba wa sʋʋr wʋ naa, "Ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ baa ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Nɩ-iraa ɛ, bɩɩ a Elaija ɛ, bɩɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ a fʋ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ?"
Be lɛ a Jɔɔn 'yɛr ba, "Maa den kʋ̃ɔ suoro nɩ a nɩbɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ ben a yɩ pɔ, yɩn ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
An ɩ maa lɛ de nie wa gba, n ba sɛɛ ɩka n for a wʋ nafɔbɔ mibe gba ɛ."
Jɔɔn be naa a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ puorfʋ jie suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, a Jordan man gɔ̃ɔn na be a Betanɩ, be lɛ wʋ 'yɛr a 'yɛr anyãna.
Wɛr na wa chaar, Jɔɔn nyɛn a Yesu na tor wʋ waara ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Pɛraabile, 'lɔ lɛ na de a wɛr nɩbɛ yeldɛbɛ bar.
Wʋ ɩ naa a 'lɔ ɩn 'yɛr ɩka, 'nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na wa naa, wʋ gar ma naa, bojũu 'lɔ dɔ̃ɔ be be tɩ ba wa dɔɔ ma.'
Maa ba bɔ̃ɔ a nɩnyɩnɛ wʋn ɩ ɛ, tɩ naa wa suoro yɩ nɩ kʋ̃ɔ ka bala jaa na be a Isɩral na nyɛ wʋ."
A Jɔɔn dãasɩɛ nɩ nyã, "N ben be nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na yi saaju fɩka ŋmam, wa 'mar wʋ, ka a Sɩɛ be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
N ba dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a nɩnyɩnɛ wʋn ɩ ɛ. A 'lɔ na tʋ̃ ma ɩka n wa suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ ma, 'A nɩrɛ 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ fʋn wa nyɛ a Sɩɛ na suu wa 'mar na waa yi ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ na suoro a nɩbɛ nɩ a Sɩɛ.'
N nyɛn a anyã na ɩ, 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bidabʋ̃'yen."
A wɛr na chaar go, Jɔɔn ara na a be nɩ a wʋ poturbo ayi.
Be lɛ wʋ nyɛ Yesu na tala, ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Yɩ nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Pɛraabile."
A Jɔɔn poturbo ayi bala na wõ a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr, ka ba turo a Yesu chiine.
Yesu na wa lɩɛb nyɛ ba, wʋ sʋʋr ba naa, "Bo yɩ bʋɔrɔ?" Ka ba 'yɛr, "Wiwile nyɩnɛ fʋ kpɩɛrɛ?"
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Yɩ wa bɔ̃ɔ a jie." Ba jɩ̃nɛ naa a wʋ sɛ̃, bojũu mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ bal baar a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
A nɩbɛ ayi bala na wõ a lɛ Jɔɔn na 'yɛr ka ba turo a Yesu, ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ Andiru na ɩ a Simon Pita yɛbɛ.
Lɛ a Andiru na de nie ɩ lɛ, wʋ bɔ naa a wʋ yɛbɛ Simon 'yɛr wʋ, "Sɩ nyɛn a Nɩ-iraa 'lɔ na wa faa a wʋ nɩbɛ ban bʋɔlɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto."
Andiru tara naa a yɛbɛ waan a Yesu sɛ̃. Yesu na wa nyɛ wʋ, ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Jɔɔn bidaba Simon, ban bʋɔlɔ fʋ naa Sɩfasɩ." A wʋ par lɛ Pita.
A ber anaar daar, Yesu chiine naa a Galilee, be lɛ wʋ nyɛ Filip na wʋ bʋɔl wʋ ɩka wʋ wa turo wʋ.
A Filip yin Betɩsaida, Andiru nɩ Pita tẽe.
Filip mɩ chen tɩ nyɛ Natanɩɛl 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Sɩ nyɛn a 'lɔ a Mosesɩ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na sɛb a wʋ yele, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ, Josefʋ bidaba."
Be lɛ a Natanɩɛl sʋʋr wʋ, "Yelsʋ̃ na tʋ̃ɔ yi a Najaretɩ tẽe ɔ?" Ka a Filip 'yɛr, "Wa kaa."
Yesu na wa nyɛ a Natanɩɛl na tor wʋ waara, wʋ 'yɛr naa, "Yɩ nyɛ a sɩ sãakpã Isɩral yɔ̃ɔ na ba tara bɛlfʋ ɛ."
Ka a Natanɩɛl sʋʋr a Yesu, "Ŋmɩnɛ fʋ ɩrɛ wa bɔ̃ɔ ma?" Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Filip na wa bʋɔlɔ fʋ, ka n nyɛ fʋ naa a kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ pĩlem."
Be lɛ a Natanɩɛl 'yɛr, "Wiwile, fʋ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn Bie nɩ a Isɩral Nãa."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr sɔɔ wʋ, "Fʋ sɔɔ ma naa, bojũu ɩn 'yɛr ɩka n nyɛ fʋ naa a kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ tɩɛ pĩlem ɔ? Fʋn nyɛn yelbɛrɛ ka a gar lɛ.
Na wʋ 'yɛr, sɩrɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ fʋ ɩka fʋn nyɛn saaju na yuo ka a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ suro tɩ duoro a maa Nɩsaal Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ."
A ber a nyã puor, Yesu ma Mɛɛr be naa a pɔɔ ban kulo a tẽe na be a Galilee paal pɔ, ka ba bʋɔlɔ Keena.
Ba bʋɔl Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo ka ba mɩ be be a pɔɔ kulfʋ jie.
A dãa na wa baar, Mɛɛr 'yɛr kʋ Yesu, "A nɩbɛ dãa baar naa."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "N ma, n sɔ̃ɔ ba ta ɛ, ta wiil ma a lɛ ɩn na ɩ ɛ."
Mɛɛr lɩɛb 'yɛr kʋ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ, "Yɩ ɩ lɛ Jaa a Yesu na wa 'yɛr ɩka yɩ ɩ."
Kʋsɩɛ dʋʋr ayʋɔb ben be, be lɛ a nɩbɛ ma ɔ̃ɔ a kʋ̃ɔ pɛɛ a ba mɩ̃ɛ lɛ a ba puorfʋ na ɩka ba ɩ. Yoi anaar bɩɩ anũu lɛ ma sɛɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa.
Yesu 'yɛr a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ ɩka ba ɔ̃ɔ kʋ̃ɔ sɛɛ a dʋʋr.
An wa sɛɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ pãa ɔ̃ɔ a kʋ̃ɔ amɩne kʋ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ na kaara a pɔɔ paalaa yele." Ka a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ ɩ a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr ba.
Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ na wa nyũ a kʋ̃ɔ ala na lɩɛb ɩ dãa, waa bɔ̃ɔ a jie a dãa na yi ɛ. A tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ 'lɔ bɔ̃ɔ naa. Be lɛ wʋ bʋɔl a pɔɔ paalaa sɩrɛ yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ,
na wʋ 'yɛr, "Nɩbɛ ma den nie waan a dãnʋ̃ɔ, bala wa nyũ tɩɩ baar, ka ba pãa waan a ala na ba bɔ̃ɔ nʋ̃mɔ̃ ɛ. Tɩchɛ fʋ̃ʋ 'lɔ bin a dãnʋ̃ɔ bar wa ta a baaraa."
A nɛ'maa yele nyã lɛ de nie Yesu na ɩ a Keena na be a Galilee paal pɔ. Be lɛ Yesu wiil a wʋ tɩɩr, ka a wʋ poturbo sɔɔ de wʋ.
A nyã puor, 'lɔ naa ma nɩ a wʋ yɛbil naa poturbo 'mantaa chen Kapenahum ɩka ba tɩ jɛ̃ bɩ̃lãa.
A kʋ̃ lɛ kor ɛ, ka a Juu nɩbɛ Gõl Bar Difʋ ta, Yesu don a Jerusalɛm.
Be lɛ wʋ tɩ nyɛ nɩbɛ na daara niin, piir nɩ papar, a Juu nɩbɛ puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ. Wʋ nyɛn bamɩne mɩ na jɛ̃n tɛɛbʋlsɩ tɛɛrɛ libie.
Wʋ den miir maal kpaara diin ba bar a puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ, nɩ a ba piir nɩ a niin. Wʋ tɩɛ naa a libitɛɛrbɛ tɛɛbʋlsɩ lɔb ka a libie yɛ̃yɛl.
Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a bala na daara a papar, "Yɩ yin a papar a ka, na yɩ ta maal ma a Sãa yir daa difʋ jie ɛ."
Ka a poturbo pãa tɩɛr tɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr, "Lɛ ɩn nʋ̃ a fʋ yir 'moro man fɩka bũu."
A Juu nɩbɛrɛ pãa sʋʋr a Yesu, "Jɩ̃nɛ buor lɛ fʋn maal wiil sɩ ka a ɩ fʋ tara na sɔr fʋn maal a lɛ?"
Ka Yesu 'yɛr, "Yɩ ŋmɛr a puorfʋ yir nyãna, tɩ ka n de ber ata mɛn wʋ go."
Ka a nɩbɛrɛ 'yɛr, "Yuom lɩjaayi nɩ ayʋɔb lɛ ba de mɛn a puorfʋ yir nyã, ŋmɩnɛ fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ de ber ata tɛɛ mɛn wʋ?"
Tɩchɛ a puorfʋ yir nyã a Yesu na 'yɛrɛ, ɩ naa a wʋ ɩ̃gãn lɛ wʋ 'yɛrɛ.
Yesu na wa ir a kũu pɔ, ka a wʋ poturbo tɩɛr yuo a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr, na ba pãa sɔɔ de lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr nɩ lɛ mɩ a Yesu na 'yɛr.
A be a Jerusalɛm a Gõl Bar Difʋ na wa ta, nɩyɔɔ sɔɔn de a wʋ yuor, bojũu ba nyɛn a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ wʋn tʋ̃.
Tɩchɛ Yesu na bɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ jaa tɩɛr, waa sɔɔ de wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ ba ɛ.
A ba ɩ nɩrɛ lɛ na 'yɛr wʋ lɛ nɩbɛ na be ɛ, bojũu wʋ bɔ̃ɔn nɩrɛ jaa tɩɛr.
Daba dɔ̃ɔ be be a Faraseemɩne pɔ, ka a wʋ yuor di Nikodimasɩ, wʋ mɩ ɩ naa a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdiere ɩ̃sʋɔ.
Wʋ dɔ̃ɔ chen a Yesu sɛ̃ tɩ̃sɔɔ na wʋ tɩ 'yɛr, "Wiwile, sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ tʋ̃ fʋ ɩka, fʋ wa wiil sɩ. Fʋ kʋ̃ naa tʋ̃ɔ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ anyãna tʋ̃ ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn ba be a fʋ sɛ̃ ɛ."
Ka a Yesu haa 'yɛr, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ fʋ, fʋ̃ʋ ba nyɛ dɔɔ paalaa ɛ, fʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ ɛ."
A Nikodimasɩ sʋʋr wʋ, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ban lɛ ɩ dɔɔ nɩkoraa gbɛɛ ayi? Wʋ kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ a wʋ ma pʋɔ pɔ ka wʋ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ dɔɔ wʋ go ɛ."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ fʋ, fʋ̃ʋ na kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ, ka baa dɔɔ wʋ nɩ a kʋ̃ɔ nɩ a Sɩɛ ɛ.
A 'lɔ a nɩrɛ na dɔɔ ɩ naa nɩrɛ bie, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mɩ lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ nɩrɛ lɩɛb ka wʋ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bie.
Ta ɩ a nɛɛ 'maa fʋ ɩn 'yɛr ɩka a sɛɛ naa ka ba dɔɔfʋ dɔɔ paalaa ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tɛɛ lɛ tɩrɛ a nyɛvʋr paalaa. A Sɩɛ kaar naa sɛsɛbɛ na furo chiine jie 'lɔ wʋn bʋɔrɔ, fʋn tʋ̃ɔn wõ a dɔɔn, tɩchɛ fʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a jie wʋn yi ɛ, bɩɩ a jie wʋn chiine ɛ."
Ka a Nikodimasɩ sʋʋr wʋ, "Ŋmɩnɛ an ɩ wa ɩ a lɛ?"
Ka a Yesu haa 'yɛr, "Ŋmɩnɛ fʋ ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ wiwile tɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna ɛ?
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ fʋ, sɩ 'yɛrɛ naa ala sɩn bɔ̃ɔ, na sɩ di a ala sɩn 'yɛrɛ dãasɩɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba de a lɛ sɩn 'yɛr ɛ.
Ala ɩ yaa sɔɔ de a wɛr nyã bonsɩ 'yɛr ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ yɩn ɩrɛ wa sɔɔ de ala ɩ, n 'yɛr naa saaju bonsɩ 'yɛr?
Nɩrɛ ba do saaju jaa ɛ, ka a Nɩsaal Bie na yi a be wa tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
A Nɩsaal Bie na 'mɔɔn saaju nɩtãa lɛ a Mosesɩ na maal a kur jɩɛ 'mɔɔ a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ.
Ka nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na pãa sɔɔ de a Nɩsaal Bie na tara na nyɛvʋr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
"Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃ naa a nɩbɛ na be ka a wɛr pɔ yɔɔ jaa, na wʋ de a wʋ Bidabʋ̃'yen tɛɛ kʋ sɩ, nɩrɛ jaa wa sɔɔ de wʋ, wʋ kʋ̃ wɛ ɛ, tɩ tara a nyɛvʋr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Bojũu, Nãaŋmɩn ba tʋ̃ a wʋ Bidabʋ̃'yen nyã a wɛr pɔ ɩka wʋ wa sɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ wa naa ɩka wʋ wa faa ba.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na wa sɔɔ de a Nãaŋmɩn Bidabʋ̃'yen nyã, wʋ kʋ̃ sɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ba wa sɔɔ de wʋ ɛ, wʋn sɔ̃ɔ wʋn bar, bojũu waa sɔɔ de a Nãaŋmɩn Bidabʋ̃'yen tɛɛ nyã yuor ɛ.
A baaraa nɩ nyã, chãa wan ka a wɛr pɔ, tɩchɛ a nɩbɛ nʋ̃n libe gar a chãa, bojũu a ba maalfʋ ɩn bier.
A nɩbɛ bala na ɩrɛ a bier 'laar chãa, ba kʋ̃ sɔɔ yi chãa pɔ ɛ, bojũu a chãa na wiil naa a lɛ ban be.
Tɩchɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na be be nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ ma wan chãa pɔ, bojũu ba bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka a ba taaba ba bɔ̃ɔ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ maala a lɛ ban maala."
A nyã puor, Yesu nɩ a wʋ poturbo 'mantaa chen Judiya be lɛ wʋ jɛ̃n ba bɩ̃lãa, na wʋ suoro nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ.
Jɔɔn mɩ dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ be a Ainon, a be ba jãa naa Salim ɛ, bojũu kʋ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ be be yɔɔ. Nɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔ chiine a wʋ sɛ̃ ka wʋ suoro ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ.
Baa na nyɔɔ a Jɔɔn pɔɔ sɛrɛ ɛ.
Jɔɔn poturbo bamɩne nɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ chɩrɛ nɩ taa nɩ a ɩ̃gãn pɛɛfʋ yele.
Ba chen a Jɔɔn sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, "Wiwile, fʋ 'yɛr a daba 'lɔ sɛ̃ fʋn dɔ̃ɔ be a Jordan man gɔ̃ɔn. Wʋ suoro na nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ ka nɩrɛ jaa chiine a wʋ sɛ̃."
Ka Jɔɔn haa 'yɛr, "Nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɩ bon jaa ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn na be a saaju baa sɔɔ ɛ.
Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ chɛnɛ na tɩɛr a ŋmɩnɛ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr yɩ ɩka n ba ɩ a Nɩ-iraa ɛ. Tɩchɛ wʋ tʋ̃ ma naa ka n de a wʋ nie.
A 'lɔ na kulo a pɔɔ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a pɔɔ sʋɔ. A wʋ bɩbɩɛlɛ pʋɔ ma pɛl naa wʋn ara a be wõnõ a pɔɔ sʋɔ kɔkɔr. Ala lɛ so ka a n pʋɔ mɩ pɛl.
A sɛɛ naa ɩka Yesu wʋ do, tɩchɛ ka maa suu.
"Nãaŋmɩn Bie nyã lɛ yi a saaju, 'lɔ lɛ gar ba jaa, nɩrɛ na yi ka a tẽe ɩn a tẽe tʋɔr na wʋ ma 'yɛrɛ a tẽe bomo 'yɛr. A 'lɔ na yi a saaju wa gar a bomo a jaa.
Wʋ ma 'yɛr naa a lɛ wʋn nyɛ nɩ a lɛ wʋn wõ tɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa maa sɔɔ de wʋ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na wa sɔɔ de, a wiil naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn ɩ naa yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ.
Bojũu, Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃ naa a wʋ Bie ka wʋ wa 'yɛr a wʋ 'yɛr. Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ naa ka a wʋ Sɩɛ sɛɛ wʋ.
A Sãa nʋ̃ naa Bie na wʋ de yele a jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ nũu pɔ.
Nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ de a Bie tara na nyɛvʋr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tɔr wʋ, ba tara a nyɛvʋr nyã ɛ, tɩ Nãaŋmɩn suur be a wʋ sɛ̃."
Yesu bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Faraseemɩne wõ naa wʋn nyɛrɛ nɩbɛ suoro ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, ka a bala na turo wʋ gar a bala na turo a Jɔɔn.
Tɩchɛ Yesu poturbo lɛ dɔ̃ɔ suoro a nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, a ba ɩ Yesu mɩ̃ɛ lɛ ɛ.
Yesu bar naa Judiya tɩ lɩɛb chiine a Galilee go.
Ka a ɩ Samariya lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka wʋ tu.
A sɔr 'lɔ wʋn tu tɩ yi naa a Saika tẽe pɔ, na wʋ gbʋr a wɛr 'lɔ a Jekɔb na dɔ̃ɔ de kʋ a wʋ bidaba Josefʋ a kõr jaa.
A lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ a Jekɔb na dɔ̃ɔ tuu chɛnɛ na be be, ka a Yesu jɛ̃ gbʋr a lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ bojũu wʋ chen bal. Mɔ̃tɔ̃tuo sɔ̃ɔ lɛ.
Ka a Samariya pɔɔ suu a lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ pɔ kʋ̃ɔ ɔ̃ɔfʋ jie. Ka a Yesu sʋɔr wʋ, "Pɔɔ yãayãabɩlɛ, ɔ̃ɔ a kʋ̃ɔ kʋ ma ka n nyũ."
A Yesu poturbo mɩ kpɛ̃n a tẽe pɔ ɩka ba tɩ da bʋ̃diir.
Ka a Samariya pɔɔ 'yɛr, "Fʋ̃ʋ Juu nɩrɛ, maa mɩ Samariya pɔɔ, taa ɩ ŋmɩnɛ ka fʋ ɩka n kʋ fʋ kʋ̃ɔ ka fʋ nyũ," sɩn nɩ Juu nɩbɛ na ba mʋɔrɔ taa bũu ɛ?
A Yesu 'yɛr wʋ, "Faa bɔ̃ɔ a bon a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ kʋ fʋ ɛ. Faa mɩ bɔ̃ɔ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sʋɔrɔ fʋ a kʋ̃ɔ ɩka wʋ nyũ ɛ, fʋ̃ʋ ta bɔ̃ɔ, fʋn taa sʋɔr man a kʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ na kʋrɔ nyɛvʋr."
A pɔɔ 'yɛr, "Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, faa tara bʋ̃-ɔ̃ɔnaa ɛ, ka a lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ mɩ yulʋ̃, nyɩnɛ lɛ fʋn nyɛ a kʋ̃ɔ ala na kʋrɔ a nyɛvʋr?
A sɩ sãakpã Jekɔb lɛ tuu a lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ nyãna kʋ sɩ, ka wʋ yɔn nɩ a wʋ dʋ̃n nyuro. Fʋ̃ʋ bɛrma gar a Jekɔb bɩɩ?"
Ka Yesu 'yɛr, "Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na nyũ a kʋ̃ɔ nyãna, kɔ̃nyũur na kpɛ wʋ̃n go.
Tɩchɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na nyũ a kʋ̃ɔ ala ɩn na kʋ wʋ, kɔ̃nyũur kʋ̃ lɛ kpɛ wʋ go ɛ. A kʋ̃ɔ ala ɩn na kʋ wʋ kaara kɔ̃bulaa na yire, naa kʋrɔ nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ."
Ka a pɔɔ 'yɛr, "Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ yãayãabɩlɛ, kʋ ma a kʋ̃ɔ ala ka n nyũ, ka a kɔ̃nyũur ta lɛ nyɔɔ ma ka n suu a lɔ-ɔ̃ɔ nyã pɔ go ɛ."
A Yesu 'yɛr wʋ, "Kul tɩ tara a fʋ sɩrɛ waan."
Ka a pɔɔ 'yɛr, "N ma tara sɩrɛ ɛ." A Yesu 'yɛr, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ fʋ 'yɛr ɩka faa tara sɩrɛ ɛ.
Fʋ dɔ̃ɔ kul sɩrbɛ anũu, tɩ a daba 'lɔ sɛ̃ fʋn be a pʋ̃pãanyã ba ɩ a fʋ sɩrɛ ɛ."
Ka a pɔɔ 'yɛr, "Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ n nyɛ naa a fʋ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
A sɩ sãakpãmɩne, a tɔ̃ɔ nyã ju lɛ ba ma do tɩ puor a Nãaŋmɩn tɩchɛ a yɩn Juu nɩbɛ 'yɛr ɩka Jerusalɛm tɛɛ lɛ ɩ a puorfʋ jie."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Pɔɔ sɔɔ de ma, sɔ̃ɔ waara an kʋ̃ ɩ a tɔ̃ɔ nyã ju bɩɩ Jerusalɛm yɩn do tɩ puor a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn go ɛ.
A yɩn Samariya nɩbɛ ba bɔ̃ɔ a 'lɔ yɩn puoro ɛ, a sɩn Juu nɩbɛ bɔ̃ɔ naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ sɩn puoro. Bojũu a sɩ jie lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na tu faa nɩbɛ.
Tɩchɛ a sɔ̃ɔ waara, wʋ gɔr ta baar, a bala na puoro a Nãaŋmɩn sɩrɛ jaa, a sɩɛ na wiil ba naa ka ba puor a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ. Ba nyãna puorfʋ lɛ a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn bʋɔrɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn ɩn sɩɛ, bala na puoro wʋ a sɩɛ pɔ wʋn wiil ba naa ka ba puor wʋ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ pɔ."
Ka a pɔɔ 'yɛr, "N bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka a Nɩ-iraa na wa naa, a 'lɔ sɩn na bʋɔlɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto. 'Lɔ wa wa, wʋn wiil sɩ naa yele a jaa par."
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a pɔɔ, "Maa lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ nɩ fʋ̃ʋ na 'yɛrɛ a pʋ̃pãanyã."
Ka a ɩ a poturbo mɩ tɔ̃ɔ ta nyɛ wʋn 'yɛrɛ nɩ a pɔɔ ka a nɛɛr 'maa ba. Tɩchɛ ba ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba 'la sʋʋr wʋ bo lɛ wʋ bʋɔrɔ bɩɩ bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ wʋ 'yɛrɛ nɩ a pɔɔ ɛ.
A jie lɛ a pɔɔ bar a yuor tɩ jo kul a tẽe pɔ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ,
"Yɩ wa nyɛ daba na 'yɛr ma ala a jaa n na dɔ̃ɔ maal. Kaa 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa naa 'lɔ bɩɩ?"
Nɩrɛ jaa na be a tẽe pɔ yin chen na tɩ kaa a Yesu.
An wa ɩrɛ a lɛ ka a poturbo sʋɔr a Yesu. "Wiwile yãayãabɩlɛ, di bʋ̃diir."
Tɩchɛ ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ ba, "N tara na bʋ̃diir yɩn ba bɔ̃ɔ a yele ɛ."
Ka wʋ poturbo piel sʋrɔ taa, "Nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ tɔ̃ɔ waan bon kɔ̃ɔ wa kʋ wʋ ka wʋ di bɩɩ?"
A Yesu 'yɛr, "N bʋ̃diir lɛ ka n ɩ a lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ, 'lɔ lɛ tʋ̃ ma, ka n baar a tʋ̃mɔ̃ 'lɔ wʋn kʋ ma ɩka n tʋ̃.
Yɩn 'lɔ 'yɛr naa ɩka a chɛn ŋmɛrsɩ anaar ka a ŋmab ta, maa 'yɛr kʋ yɩ ɩka, yɩ kaa yɩn nyɛn a por bonsɩ na mʋ̃ɔ sɛɛ ŋmab.
Pʋ̃pãanyã gba, a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ bala na ŋmara nyɛrɛ naa a ba sãyar, ban lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bʋ̃ŋmarsɩ waara nɩ nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃. Ka a bala na bʋr a bʋ̃bie nɩ a ŋmaŋmarba pãa 'mataa chɩlɛ.
A sʋkpa na ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ ɩka, bamɩne lɛ bʋr ka bamɩne mɩ ŋma.
Maa tʋ̃nɔ̃ yɩ naa ɩka, yɩ chen tɩ ŋma a puo 'lɔ pɔ a bamɩne na tʋ̃ hãn."
Nɩyɔɔ na yi a Samariya tẽe pɔ sɔɔn de Yesu, bojũu a pɔɔ 'yɛr kʋ ba ɩka, "A daba nyã 'yɛr naa a lɛ jaa n na dɔ̃ɔ maal."
Ba wan wa sʋɔr wʋ ɩka wʋ jɩ̃nɛ a ba tẽe, ka wʋ jɛ̃ be ber ayi.
A Samariya tẽe dẽme yɔɔ jie mɩ lɛ sɔɔn de Yesu bojũu ba wʋn a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr.
Be a ba 'yɛr kʋ a pɔɔ, "A ba ɩ lɛ fʋn 'yɛr kʋ sɩ jũu sɩ sɔɔ de a Yesu ɛ, sɩn mɩ̃ɛ wõ naa a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr kʋ sɩ, ka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ na faa a wɛr nɩbɛ."
A ber ayi na po, wʋ yin a be na wʋ chen Galilee.
Yesu 'yɛr naa, "Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nyɛrɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ jie jaa, tɩchɛ a ba tẽe dẽme ba 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ba ɛ."
Wʋn wa ta a Galilee, a nɩbɛ de wʋn nuur ayi a be, bojũu ba mɩ dɔ̃ɔ chen a Jerusalɛm a Gõl Bar Difʋ jie tɩ nyɛ a lɛ jaa wʋn maal.
Yesu na wa be a Galilee, wʋ lɩɛb chen a Keena tẽe pɔ be wʋn dɔ̃ɔ lɩɛb a kʋ̃ɔ ka a ɩ a dãa. Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kɔ̃ɔ ben Kapenahum ka a wʋ bie bɩɛrɛ.
Wʋn wa wõ ɩka a Yesu yin a Galilee wa a Judiya, wʋ chen tɩ sʋɔr wʋ ɩka wʋ sãa a wʋ bie na kpire.
Ka a Yesu 'yɛr kʋ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, "Yɩn baa nyɛ jɩ̃nɛ nɩ nɛ'maa yele ɛ, yɩ kʋ̃ sɔɔ de ɛ."
Ka a daba 'yɛr, "Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, yãayãabɩlɛ, wa ka a n bie ta kpi ɛ."
A Yesu pãa 'yɛr, "A fʋ bie sa naa, kulo a yir." A daba sɔɔn de a lɛ a Yesu na 'yɛr na wʋ lɩɛb kulo a yir.
