"A lɛ jũu, vɛ̃ ka a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba jaa bɔ̃ɔ sɩrɛ jaa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn maal naa Yesu nyã yɩn kpa a daa ju ka wʋ ɩ a sɩ Soro nɩ a Nɩ-iraa."
A nɩbɛ na wõ a nɩtɔ̃, ka a ŋmara ba a nyãn, ka ba sʋʋr a Pita nɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ, "N yɛɛr, ŋmɩnɛ sɩn ɩ?"
Ka a Pita 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr, ka ba de a Yesu yuor son yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, ka a yɩ yelbier baar. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ yɩ a wʋ Sɩɛ.
Yɩn nɩ a yɩ bibiir lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩr a wʋ nɛɛ kʋ, yɩn nɩ a bala ba jaa na be a tɛɛr, nɩ a bala ba jaa a sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn na wa bʋɔl."
Pita den 'yɛr yɔɔ kpãan ba, na wʋ kpãkpãan ba 'yɛrɛ, "Yɩ faa yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin a dɩna nɩfɩlefɩlesɩ pɔ."
Ka a bala na sɔɔ de a wʋ 'yɛr, ba so naa a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, ka nɩbɛ tur ata (3,000) pʋɔ ba a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
Ba den ba mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ wiilfʋ, na ba tara nɛbʋ̃'yen lɔ̃ɔ dire, na ba lɔ̃ɔ puoro a Nãaŋmɩn.
Dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ̃n nɩrɛ jaa a lɛ ban nyɛ ka a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ tʋ̃ a tʋ̃fɛrsɩ nɩ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃.
A bala na sɔɔ de, ba jaa lɔ̃ɔn taa jibʋ̃'yen na ba sʋ̃nɔ̃ taa.
Na ba daara a ba bʋ̃tarsɩ na ba ma põ ir kʋ taa lɛ jaa ɩ̃sʋɔ na bʋɔrɔ.
Bɩbir jaa lɛ ba ma lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ, na ba yʋɔrɔ taa yie ŋmara a paanʋ̃ɔ dire nɩ pʋpɛl nɩ pʋtɩɛr bʋ̃'yen.
Ba pɛɛrɛ naa Nãaŋmɩn ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa mɩ ara a ba puor. A sɩ Soro ma vɛ̃ naa ka a bala na nyɛ faafʋ, pʋɔ ba bɩbir jaa.
Bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ Pita nɩ Jɔɔn duoro naa a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ, a puorfʋ jie mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na gɔr.

Ka a daba ban lɔ̃ɔ dɔɔn a wʋ gbɛr, a ba ma tuo wʋ tɩ bin a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ, Vɩla. Be lɛ ba ma tuo wʋ tɩ bin bɩbir jaa a wʋ ma sʋɔrɔ a bala na kpɩɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn yir bɛchaar pɔ libie.
Wʋn wa nyɛ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn na kpɩɛrɛ, a wʋ sʋɔrɔ ba a libir.
Ka a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn kaara wʋ a lɛ a tɩ̃ɩɩ, ka a Pita wa 'yɛr, "Kaara sɩ."
Ka a daba tɔ̃ɔ fur a nɩbir a lɛ chir chir chir 'yɔ̃ɔ ba tɩɛrɛ ɩka wʋn nyɛn bon.
A Pita pãa 'yɛr, "N ba tara libir bɩɩ, sɛlma kʋrɔ fʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ ɩn tara lɛ ɩn kʋ fʋ. Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na yi a Najaretɩ yuor pɔ, ir chiine."
Tɩ na wʋ nyɔɔ a daba nũsʋ̃ɔ sʋ̃ʋ wʋ ka wʋ ir ka a ɩ a gbɛpɛlɛ nɩ a nakɔɔtɩɛ kpɛ̃mɛ naa.
Ka a daba ɔɔ chʋr a gbɛɛ na wʋ piel chiine, na wʋ pãa tu ba kpɛ̃n be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ. Be lɛ wʋ tɩ ɔɔrɔ yʋɔrɔ na wʋ pɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn.
A nɩbɛ ba jaa na wa nyɛ wʋ, a lɛ wʋn chiine pɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn,
ba bɔ̃ɔ wʋ naa an ɩ 'lɔ lɛ ma jɩ̃nɛ sʋɔrɔ libie be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir dɔ̃dɔr 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a, Vɩla. Ka a ɩ ba chĩcham naa 'maa ba nɛɛ a lɛ na ɩ.
An ɩ a daba chɛnɛ na pɔɔ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn ka a nɩbɛ nɛɛr 'maa a ba jo wa titaa a be ban bʋɔlɔ a Solomon Bɛchaar pɔ.

Pita na nyɛ a lɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ, "Isɩral dɔɔr woɩ, bãa lɛ so ka a nɛɛr 'maa yɩ a lɛ mɔ̃? Bãa lɛ yɩ fur a nɩbir 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ fɩka sɩn mɩ̃ɛ kpɛ̃ɔ bɩɩ sɩn mɩ̃ɛ maal vɩla lɛ sɩ maal a daba nyã ka wʋ chiine?

A Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a Abraham, Isaakɩ nɩ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne Nãaŋmɩn lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ Yesu yuor. Yɩn lɛ nyɔɔ wʋ tɩr ɩka ba kʋ wʋ, ka a Pilate ŋme nyãa na bar wʋ tɩ yɩ 'yɛr ɩka yaa bɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɛ.
Yɩ 'yɛr naa ɩka yaa bɔ̃ɔ a chɛchɛ sʋɔ nɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ ɛ, tɩ na yɩ sʋɔr ka ba yuo a nɩkʋrɔ kʋ yɩ.
Yɩn lɛ kʋ a nyɛvʋr sʋɔ, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn sɩ̃ɩ wʋ a kũu pɔ. Sɩn lɛ nyɛ anyãna nɩ nɩbir.
A daba nyãna nɩ a sɩn na 'mataa sɔɔ a Yesu lɛ sa a daba nyãna baal yɩn nyɛ na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ, sɩrɛ jaa sɩn sɔɔ de a Yesu yuor lɛ wʋ sa, a daba nyãna yɩn ben nyɛ.
"Pʋ̃pãanyã, yɛɛr, n bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka ba bɔ̃ɔ fʋ lɛ vɛ̃ ka yɩ tʋ̃ a lɛ nɛ a yɩ nɩbɛrɛ na dɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn ɩ naa a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ 'yɛr ɩka, a wʋ Nɩ-iraa na din dɔɔyɛ.
Yɩ pãa lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr, na yɩ lɩɛb wa a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ka wʋ fɩɛl a yɩ yeldɛbɛ bar. A ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ paalaa yɩn na nyɛ na yin a sɩ Soro sɛ̃,
ka wʋ gba na tʋ̃ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'lɔ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ ir bin kʋ yɩ.
Wʋn chɛnɛ na jɩ̃nɛ be a saaju, tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ Nãaŋmɩn na 'mataa a bonsɩ a jaa nɩtãa lɛ wʋn tɩr a nɛɛ a kõr jaa tu, a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ chɛchɛsɩ sɛ̃.
Bojũu Mosesɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, 'A Soro Nãaŋmɩn na ir 'yɛ'yɛrɛ a n kaar ka wʋ ɩ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ nɩrɛ, a yɩ chɛlɛ a ala a jaa wʋn na 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba wa chɛlɛ a lɛ wʋn na 'yɛrɛ ɛ, ban ir wʋ nũu bar a wʋ nɩbɛ pɔ.'
"Sɩrɛ jaa, a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ba jaa na yi a Samuwɛl sɔ̃ɔ mɩ 'yɛr naa a bɩbie anyãna 'yɛr.
Yɩn lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ banyãna bibiir nɩ a nɛtɩraa 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na tara nɩ a sɩ sãamɩne. Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a Abraham, 'An tu naa a fʋ yɔn pɔ, ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa na be ka a tẽe na nyɛ sʋ̃ʋfʋ.'
Nãaŋmɩn na wa ir a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃, yɩn sɛ̃ lɛ wʋ de nie tʋ̃ wʋ ka wʋ tɩ sʋ̃ʋ yɩ na wʋ lɩɛb a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa yin a wʋ putusɔr pɔ."
A lɛ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo nɩ a puorfʋ yir nɩdiere 'matãan a Saduseemɩne wan a ba sɛ̃.
Ba wa nyɛn suur, bojũu ba wile naa a nɩbɛ ɩka Yesu jũu nɩrɛ jaa na ir naa kũu pɔ.
Be lɛ ba nyɔɔ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ ba pɔɔfʋ die pɔ bar ka wɛr na chaar, bojũu mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ mʋr baar.
Tɩchɛ a bala na wõ a lɛ a Pita na 'yɛr a Yesu 'yɛr na ba sɔɔ de na ɩn dɔɔr tur anũu (5,000).
A wɛr na wa chaar, a ba nɩdierbe nɩ a ba nɩbɛrɛ 'matãan a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe lɔ̃ɔn taa be a Jerusalɛm.
Ka Anasɩ na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ Kayafasɩ, Jɔɔn nɩ Aleksanda 'matãan a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩbɛ bamɩne.
A ba tɩ yuo a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn waan a ba wa sʋrɔ ba, "Kpɛ̃ɔ buor nɩ yobuor lɛ yɩ de tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a anyãna?"
Ka a Pita na sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A yɩn nɩdierbe nɩ a yɩn nɩbɛrɛ,
ala ɩ yɩ ben bʋɔl sɩ dɩna ɩka sɩ wa man a maal vɩla nyã na vɛ̃ ka a gbɛrɛ sa.

Yɩ pãa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka yaa, a yɩn nɩ nɩrɛ jaa na be a Isɩral, ɩka a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nyã na yi a Najaretɩ yuor pɔ, a 'lɔ yɩn kʋ a daa ju, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn sɩ̃ɩ wʋ a kũu pɔ, ka wʋ ɩ vʋr, lɛ sa a daba nyãna na ben ara a kana.
Wʋ ɩ naa 'A kʋsɩr 'lɔ a yɩn mɩmɩɛrbɛ na tɔr bar, 'lɔ lɛ wa ɩ a kʋsɩr ju.'
Fafaara jaa ba lɛ be be ɛ, bojũu yuor jaa ba lɛ be ka a tẽe pɔ, na tʋ̃ɔ nɩrɛ faa ɛ."
Ban nyɛ a lɛ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn na ba joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩ mɩ bɔ̃ɔn ban ba jãn gãn chen tɛɛr ɛ, ka nɛ'maa ba. Ka ba tɩɛrtɔ ban dɔ̃ɔ be a Yesu sɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ ba mɩ nyɛn a daba 'lɔ na sa 'mataa ara nɩ ba, baa lɛ tara 'yɛr na 'yɛr ɛ.
Lɛ lɛ ba 'yɛr ba a ba yi chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ, tɩ ba pãa guoro taa 'yɛrɛ,
"Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ sɩn ɩ a nɩbɛ banyãna? Nɩrɛ jaa na be ka a Jerusalɛm bɔ̃ɔn naa a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ ban tʋ̃ a sɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ chiir ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ sɩn pɔɔ naa a yele nyãna sɔr ka nɩrɛ kʋ̃ lɛ wõ naa ɛ, yɩ ɩ a sɩ fuu ba ka ba taa ɩrɛ wa pʋrɔ a yuor nyãna kʋrɔ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ."
Be lɛ ba bʋɔl ba a ba kpɛ ka ba kpãkpãan ba ɩka, ba taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ bɩɩ wile nɩ a Yesu yuor go ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ yɩ pɛ kaa, a sɛɛn Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ka sɩn tu a yɩ nɛɛ gar a Nãaŋmɩn bɩɩ?
Bojũu sɩn 'lɔ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ bar a 'yɛr sɩn nyɛn nɩbir tɩ wõ 'yɛrfʋ ɛ."
Lɛ lɛ ba vuur ba tɩ bar ba a ba chen. Baa bɔ̃ɔ kpãa buor lɛ ban kpãa ba ɛ, bojũu a nɩbɛ ba jaa pɛɛrɛ naa Nãaŋmɩn a lɛ na ɩ.
Bojũu a daba nyãna na sa a nɛ'maa safʋ nyãna kor gar yuomo lɩjaayi (40).
Ban wa bar a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn, ba chen a ba taaba sɛ̃ tɩ man ala a jaa a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ na 'yɛr kʋ ba.
A ba taaba na wõ a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃, ba jaa 'mantaa nɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen puor Nãaŋmɩn na ba 'yɛrɛ, "Tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ Sʋɔ, fʋ̃ʋ lɛ maal a saaju nɩ a tẽe nɩ a man kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ bon jaa na be a pɔ.
Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka a fʋ Sɩɛ haa a fʋ gbãgbaa na ɩ a sɩ sãa David nɛɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr, 'Bo lɛ so ka a paalsɩ nyɛ suur, ka a nɩbɛ ŋmara a dɔɔl pɔrsɩ?
A wɛr nãmɩne tʋɔrɔ naa gbɛchile, ka a nɩbɛrɛ mɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa jɛɛrɛ nɩ a Soro nɩ a fʋ Nɩ-iraa.'
Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ a Hɛrɔd nɩ a Pontius Pilate lɔ̃ɔ taa nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ a tẽe nyãna pɔ, na ba jɛb a fʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃chɛchɛ Yesu, a 'lɔ fʋn ir.
Ba maal naa a lɛ fʋn kaa ir na ɩ a fʋ pʋtɩɛr, nɩ a fʋ kpɛ̃ɔ, nɩ a fʋ bɔfʋ fʋn dɔ̃ɔ de nie chɔɔr tɩ a wa ɩ.
"Pʋ̃pãanyã sɩ Soro, kaa lɛ ban fuu sɩ, tɩ na fʋ sʋ̃ʋ a fʋ gbãgbaar a sɩ mʋɔl a fʋ 'yɛr nɩ 'lafʋ.
Tur a fʋ nũu sãan baalsɩ, na fʋ tʋ̃ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ nɩ a fʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃chɛchɛ Yesu yuor."
Ban wa puor baar, a jie 'lɔ ban lɔ̃ɔ taa damaa. Ka ba jaa sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, na ba 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nɩ 'lafʋ.
Ka a bala na sɔɔ de, ba jaa tara na tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen nɩ nyãbʋ̃'yen. Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa maa 'yɛr ɩka a wʋ bonsɩ ɩ naa a 'lɔ tɛɛ bon ɛ, ba ma põn bon jaa ban tara.
A nɩtʋ̃nsɩ den kpɛ̃ɔ mana nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu kũu pɔ irfʋ 'yɛr, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ be a ba jaa sɛ̃.
Ba ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba dɔ̃ɔ faa bon ɛ, sɔ̃ɔ jaa lɛ a bala na tara por nɩ yie ma da na ba ma waan a libie,
wa bin a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ sɛ̃, ka ba ma põ ir kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa lɛ an sɛɛn wʋ.
Josefʋ na yi Sipurusɩ na wʋ ɩ a Levi bal nɩrɛ, kaa a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ bʋɔlɔ wʋ Banabasɩ. A par lɛ nɩrɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn.
Wʋ dãn a wʋ puo, na wʋ de a libie waan wa bin a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ sɛ̃.
Ka a daba ɩ̃sʋɔ na be be di Ananias ka a wʋ pɔɔ mɩ di Safira. Ba mɩ den a ba pobile da.
Wʋ ir naa libie amɩne bin ka a pɔɔ bɔ̃ɔn, tɩchɛ na wʋ chiin a ŋmaa tɩ bin a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ sɛ̃.
Ka a Pita sʋʋr a Ananias, "Bo lɛ so ka a Satan sɛɛ fʋ a nyãa a fʋ ŋmaa jir kara yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, na fʋ ir a libie amɩne a lɛ fʋn da a puo bin?
A ba ɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ so na fʋ de da ɛ? Fʋn wa da baar a ba ɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ so a libie ɛ? Bo lɛ ɩ a fʋ tɩɛr a fʋ maal a nɩtɔ̃? Nɩrɛ ba lɛ fʋ ŋmaa a jir nyã 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ."
Ananias na wõ a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ na wʋ lo kpi a jie. Ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a bala jaa na wõ naa.
Ka a pɔlbil ir a ba pɔ 'mɔɔ a kũu lũ tuo yin tɩ ũu.
An wa kor bɩ̃lãa ka a wʋ pɔɔ mɩ wa bʋ̃n dɔɔl ba bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ na ɩ ɛ,
ka a Pita sʋʋr a pɔɔ, "A libie a jaa lɛ a anyãna a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a Ananias na da a puo nyɛ ɔ? 'Yɛr kʋ ma." A wʋ 'yɛr, "Ɔ̃ɔ, lɛ lɛ."
A Pita 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a ɩ a yɩ guor taa ɩka yɩ bɛɛr a sɩ Soro Sɩɛ kaa? Nyɛ a nɩbɛ bala a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ bala lɛ tuo a fʋ sɩrɛ yin tɩ ũu, ba mɩn tuo fʋn yin."
Ajienaa ka a ɩ wʋ mɩ lon kpi be a Pita niem. A pɔlbil bala na ben wa kpɛ nyɛ ka a ɩ wʋ kpi naa, ka ba tuo wʋ yin tɩ ũu lan a sɩrɛ.
Ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a pupuorbiir ba jaa nɩ nɩrɛ jaa na wõ naa.
A nɩtʋ̃nsɩ tʋ̃n nɛ'maa tʋ̃ yɔɔ a nɩbɛ sɔ̃ɔ. Ka a bala na sɔɔ de, ba jaa tara na nɛbʋ̃'yen ma lɔ̃ɔ taa a be a Solomon Bɛchaar pɔ.
Nɩrɛ jaa kpire ba naa, tɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa maa 'la lɔ̃ɔn ba ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩyɔɔ jaa chɛnɛ na waara, ka dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ na sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro pʋɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
A lɛ vɛ̃ naa ka a nɩbɛ yin a ba baalsɩ tɩ gaal ba a gador ju nɩ a sɔ̃n pɔ a sɔr kõkoor chɛlɛ nɩ a Pita, ɩka 'lɔ wa tala a wʋ gãagiel wʋ pɔɔ ba.
Nɩyɔɔ yin a tẽbil ala na jilʋ̃ a Jerusalɛm waan a ba baalsɩ wa lɔ̃ɔn 'matãan a bala a sɩdɛbɛ na tara, ka ba jaa sa.
Ka a nyuur kpɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a wʋ taaba bala na pʋɔ a Saduseemɩne gbul pɔ.
A ba nyɔɔr a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ pɔɔfʋ die pɔ bar.
Tɩchɛ a tɩ̃sɔɔ a sɩ Soro tʋ̃ naa a wʋ malaka ka wʋ wa yuo a pɔɔfʋ die pãn na wʋ tɔɔ ba yin
tɩ 'yɛr, "Yɩ chen a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ na yɩ tɩ 'yɛr a nyɛvʋr paalaa nyã 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ."

A wɛr na wa chaar ba kpɛ̃n be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ, nɩtãa lɛ a malaka na 'yɛr ba tɩ piel wile a nɩbɛ. A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a wʋ taaba mɩ wa lɔ̃ɔn taa na ba bʋɔl a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdierbe ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa na ba na guor a 'yɛr, na ba pãa tʋ̃ ɩka ba chen a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ tɩ yuo a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ waan.
Tɩchɛ ban wa tɩ ta a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ baa nyɛ nɩrɛ jaa ɛ. A ba lɩɛb chen tɩ mana kʋrɔ ba,
"Sɩ chen tɩ nyɛ a pɔɔfʋ die dɔ̃dɔr na chɛnɛ kpal, ka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ara gu chɛnɛ ara a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ, tɩchɛ sɩn wa yuo a pãn nɩrɛ jaa ba be be a die pɔ ɛ."
Ban wa wõ a anyãna ban man ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir guguro nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãmɩne ka a ɩ ba chĩcham, a ba baala baa bɔ̃ɔ lɛn na ɩ ɛ.
Ka a nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ wa 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ nyɛ a nɩbɛ bala yɩn nyɔɔr pɔɔ, ba ben be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ wile a nɩbɛ."
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir guguro nɩkpɛ̃ɛ tara a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ chiin tɩ tara a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ jaa jom waan. Baa tɩ fɩr ba ɛ, bojũu ba joro na dãbɩ̃ɛ ɩka a nɩbɛ na lɔb ban nɩ kʋsɩbɛ.
Ban wa waan ba, ba vɛ̃n ka ba ara a nɩbɛrɛ niem, ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na sʋʋr ba 'yɛr,

"Saa kpãkpãan yɩ jaa 'yɛr ɩka, yɩ taa lɛ ɩrɛ wa pʋrɔ a yuor nyãna wile nɩ nɩrɛ jaa go ɛ? Tɩchɛ a yɩ chɛnɛ tɔr tɩ sɛɛ a Jerusalɛm nɩ a yɩ wiilfʋ nyãna, na yɩ bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ de a daba nyãna jɩ̃ɩ yele dɔɔl sɩ."
Ka a Pita nɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ bala na chɛ 'yɛr, "Sɩn tun Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ gar nɩsaal.
A sɩ sãakpãmɩne Nãaŋmɩn lɛ sɩ̃ɩ a Yesu a kũu pɔ, a 'lɔ yɩn yɔɔl a daa ju ka wʋ kpi.
Nãaŋmɩn 'mɔɔ wʋn don bin be a wʋ nũsʋ̃ɔ jie, ka wʋ ɩ Nãa nɩ Fafaara ɩka wʋ kʋ a Isɩral nɩbɛ sɔr ka ba lɩɛb ba tɩɛr, na ba nyɛ vɛ̃ kʋfʋ.
Sɩn lɛ ɩ a anyãna dãasɩɛ dẽme nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'lɔ wʋn de kʋ a bala na tu a wʋ nɛɛ."
Ban wa wõ a anyãna, ba suur ir naa ka ba bʋɔrɔ a ba kʋfʋ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Farasee ɩ̃sʋɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Gamaliel na ɩ a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ wiwile, nɩrɛ jaa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʋ naa, ka wʋ ir ara a nɩdierbe pɔ tɩ 'yɛr ɩka, ba vɛ̃ ka a dɔɔr bala yi yõo bɩ̃lãa.
Tɩ na wʋ pãa 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Isɩral dɔɔr, yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃ a lɛ yɩn bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ maal a nɩbɛ banyãna.
Sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Tiudasɩ dɔ̃ɔ ir 'yɛr gãdaa 'yɛr ɩka nɩkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ wʋ ɩ ka a dɔɔr kɔɔr anaar (400) ir turo wʋ. Ba kʋ wʋ naa ka a nɩbɛ bala yɛ̃yɛl ka a jaa ɩ pɔrɔ.
Ala puor lɛ ka a Judas na yi a Galilee a nɩbɛ sɔrfʋ yuon ir nɩyɔɔ ka ba turo wʋ. Ba mɩ kʋ wʋ naa ka a bala jaa na turo wʋ mɩ bũbur.
A lɛ jũu, maa na 'yɛr yɩ naa ɩka yɩ ir nũu, tɩchɛ a nɩbɛ ba nyã bar. Yɩ bar ba a ba chiine. Ala ɩ a lɛ ban maala ɩn nɩrɛ lɛ bin an ɩn pɔrɔ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ lɛ a yi, yaa be jaa na wa tʋ̃ɔ ŋmaa a nɩbɛ banyãna sɔr ɛ, yɩn wa bɔ̃ɔn naa ka a ɩ Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ yɩ jɛɛrɛ nɩ."
A nɩbɛrɛ tu naa a lɛ a Gamaliel na 'yɛr, tɩ na ba bʋɔl a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ fɔb ba tɩ kpãkpãan ba ɩka ba taa lɛ ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr pʋrɔ nɩ a Yesu yuor go ɛ, tɩ bar ba a ba chen.
A nɩtʋ̃nsɩ na wa yi a nɩbɛrɛ banyãna niem, ba chɩlɛ naa, bojũu ba sɛɛn naa a dɔɔyɛ nɩ a vɩ̃ difʋ a Yesu yuor jũu.
Bɩbir jaa lɛ ba ma be a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ wile a nɩbɛ na ba mɩ yʋɔrɔ a yie ba gala ɛ, na ba wile a nɩbɛ tɩ 'yɛrɛ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ ɩka a Yesu lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.

A ber ala pɔ, a poturbo na waara pʋɔrɔ a bala ban dɔɔ a paal yuo pɔ, ka baa tʋɔrɔ 'yɛrɛ a Juu kɔkɔr ɛ, hũhũnõ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bala na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ, bojũu a ba pɔɔkɔɛ maa nyɛ a bɩbir jaa bʋ̃diir ban ma põ ɛ.
Be lɛ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ pie nɩ ayi bʋɔl a poturbo ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa wa 'yɛr, "A ba tara sɔr ka sɩn bar a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʋ tɩ põnõ bʋ̃diir ɛ.
A lɛ jũu yɛɛr, yɩ kaa a yɩ pɔ na yɩ ir dɔɔr ayopõi, bala yɩn bɔ̃ɔ ka ba sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tɩ mɩ tara yɛ̃, ka sɩn de a tʋ̃mɔ̃ nyã kʋ ba.
Tɩchɛ a sɩn 'lɔ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ nɩ a wʋ 'yɛr."

A 'yɛr nyã pɛl ba jaa na duo a be pʋɔ, ka ba ir a nɩbɛ banyãna. Sɩteven a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na sɛɛ ka wʋ mɩ tara sɔɔfʋ, nɩ Filip, nɩ Porokorusɩ, nɩ Nɩkanor, nɩ Tɩmon, nɩ Pamenasɩ, nɩ Nikolasɩ na yi Antiok na wʋ lɩɛb kpɛ a Juu nɩbɛ puorfʋ pɔ.
A nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ ba ir waan a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ sɛ̃, ka ba dɔɔl ba nuur sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʋ ba.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr yaar, ka a poturbo mɩ na be a Jerusalɛm pʋɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃. A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo yɔɔ jie mɩ sɔɔn de a 'yɛr.
Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ ben a Sɩteven sɛ̃ ka wʋ tara kpɛ̃ɔ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃yɔɔ a nɩbɛ sɛ̃.

A nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie a ba bʋɔl ba, Mɩ̃ɛ Sorbo, nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a Sirenɩ nɩ a Aleksandiriya, ka bamɩne mɩ yi a Sɩlɩsɩya nɩ Asɩya. A nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ piel a nɛchɩrɛ na ba chɩrɛ nɩ a Sɩteven.
Tɩchɛ baa tʋɔrɔ wʋ ɛ, a yɛ̃ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na kʋ wʋ a wʋ 'yɛrɛ nɩ.
A ba pãa sɔɔl tʋ̃ nɩbɛ bamɩne ka ba ŋmaa jir 'yɛr ɩka, "Sɩn lɛ wõ a Sɩteven na fere 'yɛrɛ 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Mosesɩ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn."
Tɩ tɔ a nɩbɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba nyɔɔ a Sɩteven chiin a ba 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ sɛ̃.
Be lɛ ba waan jir ŋmarba ka ba wa 'yɛr, "A daba nyãna ba gala 'yɛr dɛbɛ wʋn 'yɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir chɛchɛ nyãna ɛ, nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wʋn bin ɛ.
Sɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ wõ wʋn 'yɛr ɩka a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ na ŋmɛr a jie nyãna, tɩ na wʋ lɩɛb a binfʋ ala a Mosesɩ na dɔ̃ɔ bin kʋ sɩ."
Ka a bala jaa na jɩ̃nɛ a be a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie, kãan a Sɩteven nie ka wʋ kaara fɩka a malaka nie.
Be lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sʋʋr wʋ, "Sɩrɛ lɛ a anyãna ban 'yɛr bɩɩ?"
Ka a Sɩteven haa 'yɛr, "Yɛɛr nɩ sãamɩne, yɩ chɛlɛ. A Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr sʋɔ dɔ̃ɔ yi a sɩ sãa Abraham lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ chɛnɛ be a Mesopotamiya wɛr pɔ sɛrɛ tɩ wa chen a Haran.
A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'Yi a fʋ tẽe na fʋ bar a fʋ nɩbɛ tɩ na fʋ chen wɛr yuo pɔ ɩn na wiil fʋ.'
"A wʋ yi a Chaldea wɛr pɔ na wʋ chen tɩ jɩ̃nɛ a Haran wɛr pɔ. A wʋ sãa na wa kpi baar lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn waan wʋ a kana yɩn ben kpɩɛrɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn ba kʋ wʋ bon jaa a kana ɛ, waa kʋ wʋ jibile jaa gba ɛ, bɩɩ gbɛr nɛfʋ jie ɛ. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn tɩr nɛɛ kʋ wʋ ɩka 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ yɔn lɛ na so a jie, tɩ waa tara bie gba ɛ.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ a Abraham, 'A fʋ yɔn na ɩ naa sãanba paal sãan pɔ, na ba ɩ gbãgbaar ka ba ge ba yuom kɔɔr anaar (400).
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa, ɩka wʋn yaa naa a sãn a paal 'lɔ na maal ba a gbãgbaar. A anyã puor lɛ ban wa puor ma a jie nyãna.'
Nãaŋmɩn tɩr nɛɛ kʋ a Abraham a yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ yele. Abraham na wa dɔɔ a Isaakɩ, wʋ ŋmaa wʋn a yʋɔr a ber aniin daar. Ka a Isaakɩ mɩ dɔɔ a Jekɔb, ka a Jekɔb mɩ dɔɔ a sɩ sãamɩne pie nɩ ayi.
"A sɩ sãamɩne banyãna na tara nɩ a ba yɛbile Josefʋ nɩ nyuur jũu, na ba nyɔɔ wʋ da kʋ a Ijipitɩ dẽme. Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn be a wʋ sɛ̃.
Na wʋ faa wʋ yin a wʋ wõm a jaa pɔ. Wʋ kʋ naa a Josefʋ yɛ̃ na wʋ sʋ̃ʋ wʋ a wʋ nyɛ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ a Faaro na ɩ a Ijipitɩ nãa niem, na wʋ maal wʋ ka wʋ ɩ a Ijipitɩ nɩ a nãa jie wʋ jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ.
"Ka a kɔ̃ lo Ijipitɩ nɩ a Kanaan wɛr wʋ jaa waan dɔɔyɛ, ka a sɩ sãamɩne ba nyɛrɛ bʋ̃diir ɛ.
Jekɔb na wa wõ ɩka bʋ̃diir ben a be Ijipitɩ, wʋ tʋ̃n a sɩ sãamɩne ka ba chen.
A gbɛɛ ayi sʋɔ ban chen lɛ a Josefʋ wiil a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ ba, ka a Faaro mɩ pãa bɔ̃ɔ a Josefʋ yir nɩbɛ.
A anyã puor lɛ a Josefʋ tʋ̃ bʋɔl a wʋ sãa Jekɔb nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme, a ba jaa ɩ nɩbɛ lɩjaata nɩ pie nɩ anũu (75).
Jekɔb chen a be a Ijipitɩ nɩ a sɩ sãamɩne be lɛ ba jaa tɩ kpi.
Ba tuo naa a ba ɩ̃gãma waan a Sekem wa ũu ba a yaa 'lɔ pɔ a Abraham na da a Hamor bibiir sɛ̃ a be a Sekem.
"A sɔ̃ɔ na wa gbʋr ka a Nãaŋmɩn na maal a lɛ wʋn tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ a Abraham, a sɩ nɩbɛ na be a Ijipitɩ dɔɔn paal.
Ala lɛ ka a nãyuo wa di na wʋ kaara a Ijipitɩ na waa bɔ̃ɔ a Josefʋ yele ɛ.
Wʋ maal naa a sɩ nɩbɛ putuyele na wʋ ge ba, na wʋ ma fɩr a pɔɔ pʋʋr ka bala wa dɔɔ bipɩlɛ ba lɔb ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a kʋ̃ɔ pɔ a ba kpi.
"A sɔ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ ba dɔɔ a Mosesɩ, ka wʋ ɩ bivɩla a Nãaŋmɩn niem. A ba guol wʋ ŋmɛrsɩ ata be a wʋ sãa yir.
Ban wa yin wʋ tɩ bar a yõo, Faaro bipɔɔ de wʋn guol ka wʋ ɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ bidaba.
Ba jãn naa Mosesɩ a Ijipitɩ tẽe yɛ̃ a jaa, ka wʋ kpɛ̃mɛ a wʋ 'yɛr nɩ a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ.
"A lɛ a Mosesɩ na wa ta yuom lɩjaayi (40), wʋ tɩɛr naa a wʋ yɛɛr Isɩral nɩbɛ na wʋ ɩka wʋ chen tɩ piir ba kaa.
Wʋ tɩ nyɛn a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ a Ijipitɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na gere ka wʋ ŋmaa de na wʋ kʋ a Ijipitɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ.
Mosesɩ tɩɛr lɛ ɩka a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩbɛ na bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na de faan ba, tɩchɛ baa tɩɛrtɔ a lɛ ɛ.
A wɛr na wa chaar, wʋ tɩ nyɛn a Isɩral nɩbɛ ayi mɩ na jɛɛrɛ taa. Ka wʋ 'maal ba tɩ sʋrɔ ba, 'Yɩn yɛɛr nara, bo lɛ so a yɩ jɛɛrɛ taa?'
Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ sʋɔ na tʋ̃ɔ a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ daan a Mosesɩ bar tɩ sʋʋr wʋ, 'An tʋ̃ fʋ ɩka fʋ wa kaara sɩ na fʋ tɔɔrɔ a sɩ 'yɛr?
Fʋ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka fʋ mɩ kʋ ma nɩtãa lɛ fʋn kʋ a Ijipitɩ nɩrɛ a jãa wɛ?'
Mosesɩ na wõ a 'yɛr nyãna ka wʋ jo chen tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a Midiyan, be lɛ wʋ be na wʋ wa dɔɔ dabil ayi.
"Yuom lɩjaayi (40) na wa po, malaka wa lɩɛb bũu lɩrɛ tɩbile pɔ, na wʋ dũu a Mosesɩ be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ na gbʋr a Sinai tɔ̃ɔ par.
Wʋn wa nyɛ a lɛ ka a nɛ'maa wʋ, a wʋ tɔɔ gbʋr ɩka wʋ kaa. Be lɛ wʋ wõ a Soro kɔkɔr na 'yɛr,
''Maa lɛ ɩ a fʋ sãamɩne Nãaŋmɩn, Abraham, Isaakɩ nɩ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn.' Ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a Mosesɩ waa lɛ 'lara na kaa ɛ.
"Ka a sɩ Soro pãa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, 'Yaa a fʋ nafɔɔr bar, a jie fʋn ara ɩ naa jichɛchɛ.
N nyɛ naa a n nɩbɛ be a Ijipitɩ pɔ ban gere, n wõ naa ba hʋ̃ʋnfʋ naa suu ɩka n wa faa ba. Wa, ka n tʋ̃ fʋ a be a Ijipitɩ.'

"A Mosesɩ nyãna nɩ wʋ ju ban tɔr bar tɩ sʋʋr wʋ, 'An lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ fʋ ɩka fʋ kaara sɩ na fʋ tɔɔrɔ a sɩ 'yɛr?' 'Lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ tʋ̃ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a malaka na wa dũu wʋ 'lɩrɛ a bũu a tɩbile pɔ, ɩka wʋ tɩ ɩ a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a ba fafaara.
'Lɔ lɛ tɩ de ba nie na wʋ tʋ̃ tʋ̃ yɔɔ be a Ijipitɩ tẽe pɔ, nɩ a Man Jɩɛ par nɩ a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ ban be a yuom lɩjaayi (40).
A Mosesɩ nyãna nɩ wʋ ju lɛ 'yɛr kʋ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ɩka, 'Nãaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ naa a 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ a maa kaar ka wʋ yi a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ nɩbɛ pɔ.'
Wʋ dɔ̃ɔ pʋɔ a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ, 'matãan a sɩ sãakpãmɩne ka a malaka 'yɛr 'yɛr kʋ wʋ be a Sinai Tɔ̃ɔ par na ɩ nyɛvʋr 'yɛr ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ sɩ.
"Tɩchɛ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne tɔr wʋ naa, na baa tu a wʋ nɛɛ ɛ. Ba tɔr wʋn bar ka a ba tɩɛr lɩɛb chen be a Ijipitɩ.
Ba 'yɛr kʋ a Aaron, 'Maal ŋmɩmɛ kʋ sɩ ka a ma de sɩ nie, a Mosesɩ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na yin sɩ a Ijipitɩ saa bɔ̃ɔ bo nɩ tara wʋ ɛ.'
A ba mɛ bʋtɩɩ a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ka wʋ nyɛtãan nele, na ba waan bomo wa lon bɔɔr a jie na ba dɩ̃ɛn 'yɔ̃ɔn a ba nũu bʋ̃maalaa nyãna.

Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ ba, na wʋ bar ba ka ba puoro a saaju bomo. Ka anyãna tɩ tuor a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb, wʋ sʋʋr naa, 'A yɩn Isɩral nɩbɛ, yɩn be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ a yuom lɩjaayi (40) na yɩ dɔ̃ɔ waan a bɔɔrlo bomo maa lɛ yɩ wa kʋ bɩɩ?
Kai, tɩ a bʋtɩbɛ ala yɩn kaara lɛ a Molokɩ nɩ ŋmɛrbir ŋmɩn Arefan, a tɩbɛ anyãna lɛ yɩ dɔ̃ɔ maal puoro. A lɛ jũu, ɩn vɛ̃ naa ka ba nyɔɔr yɩ chiin a Babilon puor ka yɩ tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a be.'
"A sɩ sãakpãmɩne dɔ̃ɔ maal gãma yir be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ ka a ɩ dãasɩɛ, ba maal wʋ naa nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na man wiil a Mosesɩ ka wʋ nyɛ.
A gãma yir nyã lɛ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne tara ka a Josua de ba a nie ka ba waan, a ba wa faa a wɛr nyã pɔ a nɩyor na dɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn dii ba bar. A gãn yir nyã ben be lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ tãn a Nãa David sɔ̃ɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn maal vɩla kʋ wʋ ka wʋ ɩka wʋn mɛn yir kʋ a Jekɔb Nãaŋmɩn.
Tɩchɛ Solomon lɛ wa mɛ a yir kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn.
"Fʋ̃ʋ kaa, a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a saaju sʋɔ, ba kpɩɛrɛ a yie anyã nɩbɛ na mɛ ɛ. Nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr,
'Saaju lɛ ɩ a maa nakɔɔ, ka a tẽe ɩ a n gbɛɛ dɔɔlfʋ jie. Ka a sɩ Soro sʋʋr, yir bo tɔ lɛ yɩn mɛ kʋ ma? Bɩɩ nyɩnɛ lɛ na ɩ a n pɛ̃nfʋ jie?
A ba ɩ a maa nũu lɛ maal anyãna a jaa ɛ?'
"Yɩn nyãkpɩ̃ɛn dẽme na ɩ nɩbɛ na ba wõnõ 'yɛr ɛ, yɩ kaara a yɩ sãamɩne kaar. Yɩ maa sɔɔ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɔr ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ jaa ba be be ka a yɩ sãamɩne ba ge wʋ ɛ. Ba gba kʋ naa bala na de nie mʋɔl 'yɛr a Torfʋ Sʋɔ 'lɔ waa 'yɛr. A pʋ̃pãanyã, yɩn gba lɛ gar 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ na yɩ kʋ wʋ.
Yɩn lɛ de a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ wʋn kʋ a malaka a wʋ wa kʋ yɩ ka yɩ de tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ, tɩchɛ a yɩ tɔr bar."
A 'yɛr nyãna ban wa wõ, ka ba suur ir a ba kpar kparaa jur 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʋ.
Tɩchɛ a Sɩteven a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na sɛɛ a wʋ dʋl kaa saaju na wʋ nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr, ka a Yesu ara a Nãaŋmɩn nũsʋ̃ɔ jie.
Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Yɩ nyɛ ka, n nyɛ naa saaju na yuo ka a Nɩsaal Bie ara a Nãaŋmɩn nũsʋ̃ɔ jie."
A anyãna ban wõ ba pɔɔn a tobo tɩ ŋme chɛlma na ba tɩ mɩl wʋ,
na ba tɔɔ wʋ yin a tẽe chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ tɩ piel lɔɔrɔ wʋ nɩ kʋsɩbɛ. Ka a bala na di dãasɩɛ yaar a ba fuusɩ bin pɔlbile kɔ̃ɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Sɔɔl sɛ̃.
Ban lɔɔrɔ wʋ a lɛ nɛ na kʋ ka wʋ sʋɔr Yesu, "N Soro Yesu de a n sɩ̃ɛ."
Wʋ lon gbur dumo tɩ pãa ŋme chɛlma 'yɛr, "N Soro taa ɩrɛ wa yaara ba sãn ɛ." A anyãna lɛ wʋ 'yɛr baar tɩ ŋmaa vʋʋr.

A Sɔɔl mɩ dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ ɩka ba kʋ a Sɩteven. A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa lɛ ba piel gere a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo be a Jerusalɛm. Ka ba jaa ŋma yaar a bamɩne chen Judiya a bamɩne mɩ chen Samariya tɩchɛ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ tɛɛ be a Jerusalɛm.
Nɩbɛ bamɩne na joro a Nãaŋmɩn 'mɔɔn a Sɩteven ũu tɩ na ba kõ a kuor.
Tɩchɛ ka a Sɔɔl mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir bur buro a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ bara, na wʋ yʋɔrɔ kpɩɛrɛ a yie nyɔɔrɔ dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ.
A bala na jo ŋma a dẽdẽme chɛnɛ na mʋɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr jie jaa ban chen.
Filip chen Samariya tẽe pɔ, na wʋ tɩ 'yɛr ɩka Yesu lɛ a Nɩ-iraa a be.
A nɩyɔɔ na wa wõ a lɛ a Filip na 'yɛr tɩ mɩ nyɛ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ wʋn tʋ̃, a ba yuo toor chɛlɛ a lɛ wʋn 'yɛrɛ.
A sɩdɛbɛ ala na dɔ̃ɔ pɔɔrɔ a nɩbɛ ŋmen chɛlsɩ wa yin a nɩbɛ pɔ, ka a gbɛkũn nɩ a gbɛrsɩ yɔɔ jaa sa.
Ka a tẽe 'lɔ dẽme ba jaa chɩlɛ.
Daba kɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ be be ban bʋɔlɔ Simon na wʋ ma tʋ̃nɔ̃ tɩ̃sɔɔ tʋ̃mɔ̃ ka a 'maa a Samariya nɩbɛ nɛɛ, na wʋ ma wile a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩka nɩkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ wʋ ɩ.
A nɩbɛ ba jaa, a bɛrɛ nɩ a bil ba jaa ma yuon toor chɛlɛ wʋ tɩ 'yɛrɛ, "A daba nyã 'lɔ kpɛ̃ɔ ɩ naa a gãdaa sʋɔ kpɛ̃ɔ."
Ba turo wʋ naa bojũu a kor naa wʋn tʋ̃nɔ̃ a tɩ̃sɔɔ tʋ̃mɔ̃ ka a 'maa ba nɛɛ.
Tɩchɛ a lɛ ban wa sɔɔ de a lɛ a Filip na 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr, nɩ a Yesu na ɩ a Nɩ-iraa yuor, dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ ba jaa son a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ.
A Simon mɩ sɔɔ naa ka ba so wʋ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ a wʋ turo a Filip yʋɔrɔ, a nɛ'maa tʋ̃yɔɔ wʋn nyɛ wʋn tʋ̃.
A nɩtʋ̃nsɩ na be a Jerusalɛm na wa wõ ɩka a Samariya nɩbɛ mɩ sɔɔn de a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, ba tʋ̃n Pita nɩ Jɔɔn a ba sɛ̃.
Ban tɩ ta, ba sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʋ a nɩbɛ ka ban nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ba kpɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa sɛrɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ lɛ ba so ba, nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor.
Ka a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn pãa dɔɔl ba a nuur a ba nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
Simon na nyɛ a lɛ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ na dɔɔl ba a nũu ka ba nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, a wʋ de libie kʋ ba,
tɩ 'yɛr, "Yɩ mɩ kʋ ma a kpɛ̃ɔ nyãna ka maa wa dɔɔl nɩrɛ jaa a n nũu, a wʋ mɩ ma nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ."
Ka a Pita 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a fʋ libie jaa yɩ wɛ, bojũu fʋ tɩɛr ɩka fʋn tʋ̃ɔ da a Nãaŋmɩn kʋfʋ nɩ libie.
Faa tara sɔr na lɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃n sɩ ɛ, bojũu a fʋ nyãa ba tor a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ.
Lɩɛb a fʋ pututɩɛr nyãna na fʋ sʋɔr a sɩ Soro amɩne sɛ̃ wʋn vɛ̃n kʋ fʋ a fʋ tɩɛr dɛɛr nyãna fʋn tara.
N nyɛn bɔ̃ɔn fʋn ɩ pubier sʋɔ ka a yelbier nyɔɔ fʋ pɔɔ."
A Simon pãa 'yɛr, "Yɩ sʋɔr a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ ma ka ala yɩn 'yɛr taa waara a n sɛ̃ ɛ."
A lɛ Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn na wa man 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr baar, ba lɩɛb kulo a Jerusalɛm ba 'yɛrɛ naa a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna a tẽbil ala na chɛɛl a Samariya.
Nãaŋmɩn malaka 'yɛr kʋ a Filip, "Ir suu de a sɔr 'lɔ na yi a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ tu a Jerusalɛm chen a Gaja."
Lɛ lɛ wʋ ir chiine, na wʋ tɩ tuor a Etiyopiya daba ɩ̃sʋɔ ban maal ka wʋ ab na wʋ ɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kaara a Etiyopiya nãpɔɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Kandasɩ libie. Jerusalɛm lɛ wʋ chen tɩ puor,
na wʋ lɩɛb kulo jɩ̃nɛ a wʋ wii torko pɔ na wʋ kara a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Isaiya gãn.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr a Filip, "Chen tɩ gbʋr a torko par."
A Filip jo chen a be a torko par na wʋ wõ a daba na kara a Isaiya gãn a wʋ sʋʋr wʋ, "Fʋ bɔ̃ɔ naa lɛ par fʋn kara ɔ?"
Ka a daba 'yɛr, "Ŋmɩnɛ ɩn ɩrɛ wa bɔ̃ɔ a par, ka nɩrɛ baa wiil ma ɛ?" Tɩ na wʋ bʋɔl a Filip ka wʋ do jɩ̃nɛ a torko pɔ.
A anyãna lɛ a da-abbaa 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ dɔ̃ɔ kara a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Ba nyɔɔ wʋn chiine fɩka pɛr na tɩ kʋ, Wʋ ɩn jaa gbul fɩka pele ban põnõ a kɔɔl na waa haa nɛɛ ɛ.
Wʋ siir a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a lɛ ban ba tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr kaa tor ɛ. An lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr a wʋ bal nɩbɛ 'yɛr? A wʋ nyɛvʋr ba tal tɛɛr a ka a wɛr pɔ ɛ."
Ka a da-abbaa nyã sʋɔr a Filip, "Yãayãabɩlɛ, 'yɛr kʋ ma, an 'yɛr lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ nyã 'yɛrɛ? Wʋ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr lɛ wʋ 'yɛrɛ bɩɩ nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr lɛ wʋ 'yɛrɛ?"
A Filip pãa piel na wʋ de a Nãaŋmɩn gãn 'yɛr nyãna man a Yesu 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ wʋ.
Ban 'mataa chiine tɩ ta kʋ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ par a sɔr pɔ, ka a da-abbaa 'lɔ 'yɛr, "Nyɛ kʋ̃ɔ, bãa lɛ so ka fʋ kʋ̃ so ma a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ ɛ?"
Tɩ na wʋ tɔɔ a torko a wʋ ara, ka a 'lɔ nɩ a Filip 'mataa kpɛ a kʋ̃ɔ pɔ, ka a Filip so wʋ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ.
Ban wa yi a kʋ̃ɔ pɔ, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa jaa naa a Filip chiin ka a da-abbaa 'lɔ ba lɛ nyɛ wʋ go ɛ. Tɩ de wʋ sɔr chɩlɛ kulo.
Tɩchɛ ka a Filip tɩ yi naa Ajotusɩ na wʋ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a tẽn ala a jaa tɩ tãn Sisariya.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Sɔɔl chɛnɛ pʋrɔ a sɩ Soro poturbo ju, na wʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ kʋ ba. Wʋ chen naa a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃,
na wʋ tɩ sʋɔr sɔr de gãn na chiin a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir ala na be a Damaskus ɩka 'lɔ wa tɩ nyɛ nɩrɛ na turo a Sɔr nyã, ka pɔɔ lɛ bɩɩ daba lɛ wʋ tʋ̃ɔ nyɔɔr ba waan a Jerusalɛm.
Ala lɛ wʋ de a sɔr chiine tɩ gbʋrɔ a Damaskus ka chãa yi be a saaju ajienaa wa nyɩɩr jil wʋ.
Ka wʋ lo tẽe tɩ wõ kɔkɔr na bʋɔlɔ wʋ sʋrɔ, "Sɔɔl, Sɔɔl, bo lɛ so a fʋ gere ma a lɛ?"
Ka a Sɔɔl sʋʋr, "An lɛ fʋ ɩ Soro?" Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Maa lɛ ɩ a Yesu fʋn gere.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, ir na fʋ kpɛ be a tẽe pɔ, ban wiil fʋ naa a lɛ fʋn na ɩ."
Ka a dɔɔr bala nɩ a Sɔɔl na 'mataa chiine gĩe ara, na ba wõ a dɔɔn, tɩchɛ baa nyɛ nɩrɛ ɛ.
Ka a Sɔɔl ir a tẽe ara na wʋ yuo a nɩbie tɩ waa lɛ nyɛrɛ ɛ. A ba nyɔɔ wʋ a nũu tɔɔ kpɛ̃n be a Damaskus.
Wʋ maal ber ata waa lɛ nyɛrɛ ɛ, waa di bʋ̃diir bɩɩ nyũ kʋ̃ɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a poturo ɩ̃sʋɔ ben a be Damaskus a ba bʋɔlɔ wʋ Ananias ka a sɩ Soro wa bʋɔl wʋ a jãna pɔ, "Ananias." A wʋ sɔɔ, "Ɔ̃ɔ, n Soro."
Ka a Soro 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Ir de a Sɔr Dẽdẽe chiine na fʋ tɩ ta a Judas yir sʋʋr daba na yi Tasusɩ a ba bʋɔlɔ Sɔɔl, be lɛ wʋ be sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn.
A wʋ jãna pɔ, wʋ nyɛn daba ban bʋɔlɔ Ananias na dɔɔl wʋ nũu ka wʋ lɛ nyɛrɛ."
A Ananias 'yɛr, "N Soro, n wõn a daba nyã yelyɔɔ a lɛ wʋn ge a fʋ nɩsʋ̃n a be a Jerusalɛm.
A ka mɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ mɩ kʋ wʋn sɔr ɩka wʋ wa nyɔɔr a bala jaa na bʋɔlɔ a fʋ yuor."
Tɩchɛ ka a Soro 'yɛr kʋ a Ananias, "Chen, a daba nyãna lɛ ɩ a n bʋ̃-iraa ka wʋn tuo a maa yuor chiin a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ, nɩ a ba nãmɩne sɛ̃, lɔ̃ɔn a Isɩral nɩbɛ.
Ɩ̃n wiil wʋ naa a lɛ wʋn na di dɔɔyɛ a n yuor jũu."

Be lɛ a Ananias ir chen tɩ kpɛ be a yir, na wʋ tɩ dɔɔl wʋ a nũu tɩ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "N yɛbɛ Sɔɔl, a sɩ Soro Yesu na yi fʋ be a sɔr pɔ fʋn waara lɛ tʋ̃ ma a fʋ sɛ̃ ka fʋn lɛ nyɛrɛ go, na fʋ sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ."
Ajienaa ka bʋ̃nyɩnsɩ 'lɔɔr a Sɔɔl nɩbie pɔ lo a wʋ lɛ nyɛrɛ go. Wʋ ir naa a ba tɔ̃ɔ so wʋ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ.
Wʋn wa di a bʋ̃diir baar wʋ lɛ nyɛn kpɛ̃ɔ, na wʋ jɩ̃nɛ a poturbo bala sɛ̃ a be a Damaskus bɩ̃lãa.
Ajienaa, wʋ piel 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr be a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir, na wʋ 'yɛrɛ ɩka a Yesu ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn Bie.

Bala jaa na wõ a wʋ 'yɛr ka a 'maa ba nɛɛ a ba sʋrɔ, "A ba ɩ a daba nyãna lɛ ir gere a bala a be a Jerusalɛm na bʋɔlɔ a yuor nyãna ɛ? Na wʋ wa a ka mɩ ɩka wʋ wa nyɔɔr a bala mɩ chiin tɩ kʋ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ ɛ?"
Tɩchɛ ka a Sɔɔl kpɛ̃ɔ chɛnɛ pʋɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ka wʋ 'yɛr tʋ̃ɔ a Juu nɩbɛ na kpɩɛrɛ a Damaskus na wʋ wiil ba ɩka a Yesu lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
Ber yɔɔ na wa po, a Juu nɩbɛ guor taa ɩka ba kʋ a Sɔɔl,
tɩchɛ kaa a Sɔɔl bɔ̃ɔn a ba guorfʋ. Mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ jaa lɛ ba mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir guro wʋ a tẽe dɔ̃dɔɩ nɛɛr, bʋɔrɔ a wʋ kʋ̃ fʋ.
Tɩchɛ ka a bala na turo wʋ 'mɔɔ wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ pɩɛ pɔ tɩ̃sɔɔ na ba tur wʋ bar ka wʋ tu a dãpuor dachin pɔ suu.
Wʋn tɩ ta Jerusalɛm, wʋ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a poturbo tɩchɛ a ba joro wʋ dãbɩ̃ɛ, baa sɔɔ ɩka wʋ ɩ naa a poturo ɩ̃sʋɔ ɛ.

Tɩchɛ ka a Banabasɩ tara wʋ chiin be a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ sɛ̃. 'Lɔ lɛ pãa man kʋ ba a lɛ a Sɔɔl na nyɛ a sɩ Soro a sɔr pɔ, ka a Soro 'yɛr 'yɛr kʋ wʋ. Wʋ 'yɛr ɩka a be a Damaskus wʋ mʋɔl 'yɛr a Yesu yuor 'yɛr, na wʋ ta jo dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
A Sɔɔl jɩ̃nɛ a be a ba sɛ̃ na wʋ so wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yʋɔrɔ be a Jerusalɛm na wʋ mʋɔlɔ a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor 'yɛrɛ ba joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Wʋ ma 'yɛrɛ naa ka a 'lɔ nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bala ban dɔɔ a paal yuo pɔ ka baa tʋɔrɔ 'yɛrɛ a Juu kɔkɔr ɛ, ma chɩrɛ taa, ka ba bʋɔrɔ a wʋ kʋfʋ.
A poturbo na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃ ba tara wʋn chiin a Sisariya tɩ bar ka wʋ chen Tasusɩ.
Damfʋ ba lɛ be a bala na puoro be a Judiya, Galilee nɩ a Samariya, ka a nyã'maar. Ba kpɛ̃mɛ naa ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ ka ba nʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ na ba joro a sɩ Soro dãbɩ̃ɛ.
Ka a Pita yʋɔrɔ a tẽn na wʋ wa chen Lida ɩka wʋ tɩ piir a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo kaa.
Be lɛ wʋ tɩ nyɛ daba ban bʋɔlɔ Ainɩyas na gbɛr gã yuomo aniin.
Ka a Pita bʋɔl wʋ, "Ainɩyas, Yesu yuor pɔ, sa. Ir saaju na fʋ pilʋ̃ a fʋ bʋ̃gãnaa." Ajienaa lɛ a Ainɩyas ir saaju.
Ka a Lida nɩbɛ ba jaa nɩ a Saron nɩbɛ na nyɛ a lɛ, a ba lɩɛb puoro a sɩ Soro.
Pɔɔ kɔ̃ɔ mɩ na dɔ̃ɔ puoro ben a be Jopa, ka ba bʋɔlɔ wʋ Tabita, a yo bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ba lɩɛb bʋɔlɔ Dɔɔkas. Wʋ ma maala na vɩla na wʋ sʋ̃nɔ̃ a nɔ̃n dẽme.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ wʋ ɩ baal na wʋ kpi, a ba so wʋ a kʋ̃ɔ don gaal be a bɔɔpɩɛ pɔ.
Lida nɩ a Jopa mɩ ba jãa ɛ, kaa a pupuorbo wõ ɩka a Pita ben a Lida, a ba tʋ̃ nɩbɛ ayi ka ba tɩ sʋɔr wʋ, "Yãayãabɩlɛ a wʋ wa fɔɔ."
Ka bala naa Pita jaa 'mataa chen, wʋn wa ta ba de wʋn don be a bɔɔpɩɛ die pɔ. A pɔɔkɔɛ ba jaa ara na jilʋ̃ wʋ kõnõ na ba wile a Pita a fuusɩ nɩ a fɔɔr a Dɔɔkas na maal wʋn dɔ̃ɔ chɛnɛ be a ba sɛ̃.
Pita diin ba jaa a ba yi a be a die pɔ, tɩ na wʋ gbur dumo sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn, na wʋ lɩɛb tor a kũu tɩ 'yɛr, "Tabita ir." A wʋ yuo a nɩbie nyɛ a Pita na wʋ ir jɩ̃nɛ.
Ka a Pita nyɔɔ wʋ a nũu sʋ̃ʋ wʋ a wʋ ir ara, tɩ pãa bʋɔl a bala na sɔɔ nɩ a pɔɔkɔɛ ka ba kpɛ wa nyɛ a wʋ ɩ nɩ nɩbir.
Ka a yele nyãna yaar a Jopa wʋ jaa ka a nɩbɛ yɔɔ jie wa sɔɔ a sɩ Soro.
A Pita jɛ̃n be a Jopa bɩ̃lãa a daba kɔ̃ɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Simon na ma nɔ̃nɔ̃ gãma yir.
Be a Sisariya, daba kɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ be be a ba bʋɔlɔ wʋ Konɩlɩyɔs, wʋ be naa a sojasɩ gbul 'lɔ pɔ a Itali nɩbɛ na bʋɔlɔ a sojasɩ kɔbaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ.
'Lɔ naa wʋ yir dẽme ba jaa puoro naa na ba joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbɩ̃ɛ, na wʋ ma kʋrɔ a nɩbɛ bala an wõnõ pɔrɔ, na wʋ mɩ ma sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn ba gala ɛ.
Bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wa bal, a wʋ gã jãn jaa chɛchɛ nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn malaka a wʋ wa ara a wʋ sɛ̃ tɩ bʋɔl wʋ, "Konɩlɩyɔs."
Ka wʋ chaal a lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ tɩ sʋʋr, "Bo lɛ N Soro?" Ka a malaka 'yɛr, "A fʋ puorfʋ nɩ a kʋfʋ fʋn kʋrɔ a nɔ̃n dẽme don tɩ pɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn ka wʋ tara a fʋ tɩɛr.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, tʋ̃ nɩbɛ ka ba chen a Jopa tɩ tara daba kɔ̃ɔ na di Simon tɩ ba bʋɔlɔ wʋ Pita a wʋ wa.
Wʋ kpɩɛrɛ naa a daba na nɔ̃nɔ̃ gãma mɩ na di a Simon yir, ka a wʋ yir gbʋr a man kpɛ̃ɛ gogoro."
A malaka na wa chen baar, Konɩlɩyɔs bʋɔl naa a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ ayi nɩ a soja ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ na puoro na ma sʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ.
Wʋ man a lɛ jaa na ɩ tɩ tʋ̃ ba a Jopa.
A wɛr na wa chaar mɔ̃tɔ̃tuo sʋ̃ɔ, ka ba be a sɔr pɔ chiine tɩ gbʋrɔ a tẽe, a Pita mɩ don a gar ju Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ jie.
Ka a kɔ̃ kpɛ wʋ a wʋ bʋɔrɔ bʋ̃kɔ̃ɔ na di, ban chɛnɛ maala a bʋ̃diir ka a dedee kpɛ wʋ.
A wʋ nyɛ saaju na yuo a wʋ nyɛ bʋ̃kɔ̃ɔ fɩka fɔkpɛ̃ɛ na gbũ jiir anaar ka wʋ suro wa gbʋrɔ a tẽe.
Ka a dʋ̃gbɛɛ anaar a jaa bʋrɔ be be nɩ a tẽe bʋ̃vʋʋrsɩ nɩ a lubilɔɔrsɩ a jaa.
Be lɛ a kɔkɔr pãa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Pita, ir kʋ 'wɔb."
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita 'yɛr, "Sɩrɛ jaa, kai. N Soro, n ba 'wɔb a dʋ̃dɛbɛ anyãna nɩ a dʋ̃chiirsɩ anyãna ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɛ."
Ka a kɔkɔr lɛ 'yɛr go, "Ta bʋɔl bon jaa bʋ̃dɛɛr 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na maal a wʋ ɩ bʋ̃sʋ̃ ɛ."
Gbɛɛ ata lɛ a ɩ, tɩchɛ ka a fɔbaa lɛ jaa a lɛ nɛ don a saaju ajienaa.
Lɛ a Pita na chɛnɛ pɛrɛ a nyɛfʋ nyã par, ka a dɔɔr bala a Konɩlɩyɔs na tʋ̃ mɩ nyɛn a Simon yir na ba ara a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ.
Ba bʋɔl sʋʋr, "Daba na di Simon tɩ ba bʋɔlɔ wʋ Pita ka lɛ wʋ kpɩɛrɛ ɔ?"
Lɛ a Pita na chɛnɛ tɩɛrɛ a nyɛfʋ nyãna ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Simon, dɔɔr ata lɛ bʋɔrɔ fʋ sʋrɔ.
Ir suu a ba sɛ̃, taa ɩrɛ wa baala fʋn na lɔ̃ɔ chiin ba ɛ, maa lɛ tʋ̃ ba."
Ka a Pita ir suu tɩ nyɛ a nɩbɛ na wʋ 'yɛr, "Maa lɛ ɩ a nɩrɛ yɩn bʋɔrɔ, bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ wa?"

A ba 'yɛr, "Konɩlɩyɔs na ɩ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ lɛ sɩ yi. A wʋ yele tor naa ka wʋ ɩ nɩrɛ na joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbɩ̃ɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʋ. A Nãaŋmɩn malaka wa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ ɩka wʋ bʋɔl fʋ a fʋ wa be a wʋ yir a wʋ wõ lɛ jaa fʋn na man."
A Pita pãa tara ba kpɛ̃n tɩ gaal. Ka a wɛr chaar, a bala nɩ a Pita nɩ a pupuorbiir bamɩne na yi a Jopa pʋɔ ba a ba 'mataa chen.
Ba chen ka a wɛr tɩ chaar a ba ta a Sisariya, ka a ɩ a Konɩlɩyɔs mɩ chɛlɛ ba naa na wʋ bʋɔl a wʋ yir dẽme nɩ a wʋ barmɩne ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa a ba jɛ̃ gu.
Lɛ a Pita na ta kpɩɛrɛ a Konɩlɩyɔs yir wʋ ir tuor a Pita gbur dumo a wʋ niem na wʋ puor wʋ nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita nyɔɔ wʋ a wʋ ir, ka wʋ 'yɛr, "Ara, a maa mɩ nɩsaal lɛ n mɩ ɩ."
Wʋ 'yɛr wʋ naa lɛ tɩ kpɛ a die pɔ tɩ nyɛ nɩyɔɔ na duo.
A wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa an ba tara sɔr ɩka a sɩn Juu nɩbɛ ba lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a yɩn bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn wiil ma naa ɩka n taa bʋɔl nɩrɛ jaa nɩdɛɛr ɛ, bɩɩ nɩsɔ̃ɔ naa ɛ.
Ala lɛ so yɩn wa bʋɔl ma n ba baala ɛ, bɩɩ 'yɛr ɩka n kʋ̃ wa ɛ, bo 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ bʋɔl ma?"
Ka a Konɩlɩyɔs 'yɛr, "Ber anaar nɩ dɩna ɩn be a die pɔ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na bal baar. Ajienaa lɛ ka a ɩ daba na su fuu ka wʋ nyɩlɛ wa ara a n sɛ̃,
tɩ na wʋ bʋɔl ma, 'Konɩlɩyɔs, Nãaŋmɩn wõn a fʋ sʋɔrfʋ na wʋ tɩɛr a fʋ kʋfʋ fʋn kʋrɔ a nɔ̃n dẽme.
Tʋ̃ nɩrɛ a wʋ chen a Jopa tɩ bʋɔl Simon ban lɛ bʋɔlɔ Pita, wʋ be naa a daba ban bʋɔlɔ a Simon na nɔ̃nɔ̃ gãma ka a yir gbʋr man gogoro.'
Ala lɛ so ka n mɩ tʋ̃ a fɔɔ a lɛ nɛ bʋɔl fʋ, a fʋ mɩ pɛl pʋɔ tɩ wa. Pʋ̃pãanyã, Nãaŋmɩn niem lɛ sɩ jaa jɩ̃nɛ tɩ na chɛl bon jaa a sɩ Soro na tʋ̃n fʋ ɩka fʋ wa 'yɛr kʋ sɩ."
Ka a Pita pãa piel na wʋ 'yɛrɛ, "Pʋ̃pãanyã n pãa bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn ba ooro ɛ.
Tɩchɛ wʋ ma den nɩbʋrɔ ba jaa na joro wʋ dãbɩ̃ɛ tɩ maal a lɛ na tor.
A 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩr kʋ a Isɩral nɩbɛ nɩ a nyã'maar 'yɛr na tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a bon jaa Soro sɛ̃.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ala na ɩ a Judiya paal wʋ jaa na piel a Galilee a lɛ a Jɔɔn na wa mʋɔl a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ sofʋ 'yɛr baar.
Lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ir a Yesu na yi Najaretɩ na wʋ de a wʋ Sɩɛ nɩ a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ kʋ wʋ. Wʋ yɔn a ka wʋ jaa jilʋ̃ na wʋ maala vɩla sãana nɩ baalsɩ nɩ a bala jaa a dɛɛr sʋɔ na tara, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn ben a wʋ sɛ̃.
"Sɩn lɛ nyɛn nɩbir, a ala a jaa wʋn tʋ̃ a Juu nɩbɛ tẽn pɔ, nɩ a Jerusalɛm. Ba nyɔɔ wʋn kpa yɔɔl a daa ju ka wʋ kpi.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn sɩ̃ɩ wʋ naa a kũu pɔ, a ber ata daar a wʋ ir ɩ vʋr na wʋ vɛ̃ a ba nyɛ wʋ.
Nɩbɛ ba jaa ba lɛ nyɛ wʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩn na ɩ a dãasɩɛ dẽme a Nãaŋmɩn na de nie ir, sɩn nɩ 'lɔ 'mantaa di tɩ nyũ wʋn wa ir a kũu pɔ baar.
'Lɔ lɛ kpãkpãan sɩ ɩka sɩ mʋɔl 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn ir ka wʋ ɩ a vʋɛ nɩ a kpĩisɩ 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ.
'Lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ba jaa 'yɛr a wʋ 'yɛr ɩka, nɩrɛ jaa wa sɔɔ de wʋ, wʋn nyɛn yelbier vɛ̃ kʋfʋ tu a wʋ yuor pɔ."
Lɛ a Pita na chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ a anyãna, ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa kpɛ a bala jaa na wõnõ a 'yɛr nyãna.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bala na sɔɔ de na tu a Pita wa, nɛɛ 'maa ba naa a lɛ ban nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na pʋr a wʋ Sɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
A ba wõ ban 'yɛrɛ kɔkɔyor na ba pɛɛrɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn. Ka a Pita pãa 'yɛr,
"Nɩrɛ na tʋ̃ɔ ŋmaa a nɩbɛ banyãna sɔr ka ba ta so a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ ɛ? Ba mɩ nyɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩtãa a sɩn."
Wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba naa ka ba so a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ nɩ Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor, a ba pãa sʋɔr a Pita ka wʋ be a ba sɛ̃ bɩ̃lãa.
A nɩtʋ̃nsɩ nɩ a yɛɛr na be a Judiya wõ naa ɩka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, mɩ sɔɔn a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
Lɛ a Pita na wa lɩɛb chen a Jerusalɛm a bala na ŋmaa a yʋɔr tɩ sɔɔl mii 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ 'yɛrɛ,
"Fʋ ben chen a bala na ba ŋmaa a yʋɔr yir tɩ lɔ̃ɔ din ba wɛ?"
Ka a Pita pãa piel mana a lɛ jaa na ɩ na wʋ kʋ ba,
"N ben a Jopa tẽe pɔ naa sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka a wa ɩ ma jaa de dee, ka n nyɛ nyɛfʋ kɔ̃ɔ. N nyɛn bʋ̃kɔ̃ɔ fɩka fɔkpɛ̃ɛ ban tur bar ka wʋ yi saaju suu na wʋ gbũ jiir anaar ka wʋ suu wa ara a be ɩn be.
Be lɛ n muul kaa naa nyɛ dʋ̃gbɛɛ anaar jaa bʋrɔ na be ka a wɛr pɔ, mɔdʋ̃n, bʋ̃vʋʋrsɩ lɔ̃ɔn a lubil.
Ka n wõ kɔkɔr na 'yɛr, 'Pita ir na fʋ kʋ 'wɔb.'
Ka n haa 'yɛr, 'Kai, n Soro bon jaa na ɩ dɛɛr na ba vɩɛlɛ ɛ, ba kpɛ n nɛɛ pɔ jaa ɛ.'
Ka a kɔkɔr lɛ 'yɛr yi a saaju go, 'Ta bʋɔl bon jaa Nãaŋmɩn na maal a wʋ vɩɛlɛ bʋ̃dɛɛr ɛ.'
A anyãna ɩ naa nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ gbɛɛ ata tɩ lɛ tɔɔ a jaa don be a saaju go.
"Ajienaa, ka a ɩ a nɩbɛ ata ban tʋ̃ a n sɛ̃ na yi Sisariya mɩ tãn a yir 'lɔ pɔ ɩn kpɩɛrɛ dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ.
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr kʋ ma ka n tu ba chen naa taa baala ɛ. Maa nɩ a yɛɛr ayʋɔb banyãna lɛ 'mataa chen na sɩ tɩ kpɛ a daba yir.
A wʋ man kʋ sɩ a lɛ a malaka na wa a wʋ yir wa 'yɛr, 'Tʋ̃ nɩbɛ a Jopa ka ba tɩ bʋɔl daba na di Simon ban lɛ bʋɔlɔ Pita.
'Lɔ lɛ na waan 'yɛr wa 'yɛr kʋ fʋ ka a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a fʋ yir dẽme ba jaa tu a 'yɛr 'lɔ pɔ nyɛ faafʋ.'
Ala lɛ ka n piel a 'yɛr naa 'yɛrɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa a ba sɛ̃ a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ wa a sɩ sɛ̃ a pielfʋ.
Ka n pãa tɩɛrtɔ a lɛ a sɩ Soro na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, 'Jɔɔn den kʋ̃ɔ son, tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ Nãaŋmɩn na den a wʋ Sɩɛ son yɩ.'
Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʋ ba, a kʋfʋ bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ kʋ sɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto, maa mɩ nɩ ana, na ŋmaa Nãaŋmɩn sɔr?"
Ban wõ a anyãna, baa lɛ haa nɛɛ ɛ, tɩ pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ, "Nãaŋmɩn pãa yuon sɔr kʋ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka ban lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr nyɛ nyɛvʋr."
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ban kʋ a Sɩteven ka a pupuorbo bamɩne yɛ̃yɛl tɩ yi Fonisiya, Sipurusɩ nɩ Antiok, na ba mana a 'yɛr kʋrɔ a Juu nɩbɛ tɛɛ.
Ka a pupuorbo bamɩne na yi a Sipurusɩ nɩ a Sirenɩ, chen a Antiok na ba mɩ tɩ piel 'yɛrɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã kʋrɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
A sɩ Soro nũu dɔ̃ɔ pʋɔ ba ka a nɩyɔɔ dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ de na ba lɩɛb turo a sɩ Soro.
Ka a 'yɛr nyã lo a pupuorbo na be a Jerusalɛm toor pɔ, a ba ir Banabasɩ tʋ̃ a be Antiok.
Wʋn tɩ ta nyɛ a lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na wɩ̃ɛ ba, nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ wʋ naa ka wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ tɩ 'yɛr, ka ba ara nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a ba nyãa wʋ jaa kʋ a sɩ Soro.
Banabasɩ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ nɩsʋ̃ na sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na wʋ tara sɔɔfʋ na wʋ mɩ tɔɔ nɩyɔɔ waan a ba wa turo a sɩ Soro.
Ala puor lɛ ka a Banabasɩ pãa yɩ a be tu Tasusɩ tɩ bʋɔrɔ a Sɔɔl.
Wʋn tɩ nyɛ wʋ, ba lɩɛb wa Antiok na ba be be yuon gbul, ka a Banabasɩ naa Sɔɔl wile a nɩyɔɔ bala. Be a Antiok lɛ a pupuorbo nyɛ a yuor, "Kɩrɩsɩto turbo."
A sɔ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ yi be a Jerusalɛm wa Antiok.
A ba ɩ̃sʋɔ yuor na di Agabus ir ara, ka Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɛ wʋ a wʋ 'yɛr, "Kɔ̃kpɛ̃ɛ na lon a Worom wɛr wʋ jaa." A kɔ̃ nyãna wa lo naa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Kɩlaudiyus na di a nãa.
A poturbo banyãna mɔ̃ naa na ba ir bʋ̃kɔ̃ɔ lɛ a ba fɔ̃ɔ na jɩ̃ na ba sʋ̃ʋn a yɛɛr bala na be a Judiya.
Ban wa ir a kʋfʋ anyãna, Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɔɔl lɛ ba tʋ̃n a ba tɩ kʋ a nɩbɛrɛ.
A sɔ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ a Nãa Hɛrɔd nyɔɔr a pupuorbo bamɩne na wʋn ge.
Wʋ vɛ̃ naa ka ba ŋmaa Jemesɩ na ɩ a Jɔɔn yɛbɛ ju.
A Hɛrɔd nyɛn a lɛ ka a pɛl a Juu nɩbɛ pʋɔ, ka wʋ nyɔɔ a Pita mɩ. A anyãna ɩ naa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban tara a Paanʋ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʋ.

Wʋn nyɔɔ a Pita a lɛ, a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ lɛ wʋ tɩ pɔɔ wʋ, tɩ na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ sojasɩ jiir anaar ka ba jʋrɔ taa kaara nɩ wʋ. Bojũu wʋ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka a Gõl Bar Difʋ wʋ po baar tɩchɛ ka wʋ tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr ka nɩrɛ jaa nyɛ.
Lɛ lɛ ba gu a Pita be a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a pupuorbiir mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ wʋ.

A tɩ̃sɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a wɛr na chaar ka a Hɛrɔd na vɛ̃ ka ba waan a Pita ka wʋ tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr, bɔ̃jɔrsɩ ayi lɛ ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a Pita gbɛb sojasɩ ayi ka wʋ be a ba sãlsɔɔ gã guro, ka a sojasɩ bamɩne ara a pɔɔfʋ die dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ gu.

Ajienaa lɛ a sɩ Soro malaka wa kpɛ ara a wʋ sɛ̃ be a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, ka a die wʋ jaa chaar. Ka a malaka ŋme a Pita jaa 'mɛ 'mɛ 'mɛ, sɩ̃ɩ wʋ 'yɛr, "Pɔɔ fɔɔ jaa ir," ka a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ for a Pita nũ'yɔ̃ɔ pɔ lo.
Be lɛ a malaka 'yɛr kʋ a Pita, "Su a fuu nɩ a nafɔbɔ na fʋ 'mɔɔ a fɔbaa vaar na fʋ turo nɩ ma." Ka a Pita ɩ a lɛ a malaka na 'yɛr.
Pita tu wʋn a lɛ tɩ yin a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, tɩchɛ nɩbir ba yuo wʋ a wʋ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a lɛ a malaka na 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ maala ɩn sɩrɛ ɛ, wʋ tɩɛr man tãa jãn lɛ wʋ jãna.

Ba tɩ yin a dɔ̃dɔr dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ pɔ, na ba lɛ tɩ yi a dɔ̃dɔr ayi sʋɔ pɔ, tɩ pãa ta a yõo dɔ̃dɔr a kur pãn na pɔɔ. Ban wa ta a wʋ yuo wʋ yõ a ba yi. A malaka tara na a Pita den a sɔr dẽdẽe ɩ̃sʋɔ chiin bɩ̃lãa tɩ bar wʋ tɩ chen ajienaa.
Ka Pita tɩɛr pãa yuo a wʋ 'yɛr, "Pʋ̃pãanyã n bɔ̃ɔn naa an ba ɩ baal ɛ, ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn lɛ tʋ̃ a wʋ malaka a wʋ wa 'loo ma faa a Hɛrɔd nũu pɔ, nɩ a lɛ jaa a Juu nɩbɛ na tɩɛr ɩka ba ge ma."
A anyãna wʋn wa tɩɛr yuo, wʋ chen a Mɛɛr na ɩ a Jɔɔn Maakɩ ma yir, be lɛ a pupuorbiir yɔɔ lɔ̃ɔ taa sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ wʋ.
Pita wa kpoor a yõo dɔ̃dɔr pãn, ka a gbãgbaa pɔɔbile ban bʋɔlɔ Woroda chen a pãn yuofʋ jie.
Wʋn wa wõ ka a ɩ Pita kɔkɔr lɛ ka a nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ wʋ tɩ põn bar, waa yuo a pãn ɛ, tɩ lɩɛb jo kpɛ a die pɔ tɩ 'yɛrɛ, "Pita lɛ be a yõo dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ!"
A ba tãn wʋ pĩpĩi bar tɩ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Gelfʋ baal lɛ kpɛ fʋ!" Tɩ wʋ chɛnɛ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir 'yɛrɛ ɩka sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, ka ba 'yɛr, "A wʋ malaka tɔ̃ɔ lɛ."
Tɩchɛ ka a Pita chɛnɛ kpooro a pãn, ka ba tɩ yuo nyɛ ka a ɩ 'lɔ lɛ ka a nɛɛ 'maa ba.
Ka a Pita wɩlwɩl ba a nũu a ba bar gɔ̃n tɩchɛ ka wʋ man a lɛ a sɩ Soro na yin wʋ a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ. Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba ɩka ba tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a Jemesɩ nɩ a yɛɛr, na wʋ bar ba tɩ yi chen jiyuo.
A wɛr na chaar bibio, ka a sojasɩ ɩ chĩcham na ba sʋrɔ taa, "Bo lɛ na tara a Pita?"
Hɛrɔd vɛ̃n ka ba yɔbɔ wʋ faa na baa nyɛ wʋ ɛ, na wʋ kpãkpãan a sojasɩ mɩ faa tɩ 'yɛr ɩka ba kʋ ba. Ka a Hɛrɔd pãa yi a Judiya na wʋ chen a Sisariya na wʋ tɩ jɩ̃nɛ a be bɩ̃lãa.

A Hɛrɔd dɔ̃ɔ tara a Tire nɩbɛ nɩ a Sidon nɩbɛ nɩ jɛɛr, ka ba nyɛtaa nɛɛ na wa a nãa 'maalfʋ jie. Blastus na ɩ a nãa gbãgbaa wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sɛ̃ lɛ ba tʋ̃ ɩka wʋ 'maal a nãa kʋ ba bojũu a wʋ wɛr pɔ lɛ ba nyɛrɛ a ba bʋ̃diir.
Bɩbir kɔ̃ɔ, a Nãa Hɛrɔd sun a wʋ nafɔɔr jɩ̃nɛ nɩ a nãa dakɔɔ ju, na wʋn 'yɛr 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ.
Ka a nɩbɛ ŋmiere chɛlsɩ 'yɛrɛ, "Ŋmɩn kɔkɔr lɛ a nyãna na 'yɛrɛ, nɩrɛ ba lɛ ɛ."
Ajienaa lɛ ka a sɩ Soro malaka wa 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ baal bojũu waa de a 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, ka a bufulo 'wɔb a nyaba ŋma ka wʋ kpi.
Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr chɛnɛ yaara.
Lɛ a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɔɔl na wa tʋ̃ a ba tʋ̃mɔ̃ baar a Jerusalɛm, ba tara naa Jɔɔn Maakɩ 'mataa chiin.

A Nãaŋmɩn puorbo bala na be a Antiok, ba tara naa bamɩne ka ba 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ka a bamɩne mɩ ɩ wiwiilbe, Banabasɩ nɩ Simeon ban bʋɔlɔ Nɩsɔɔlaa, Lusiyusɩ na yi a Sirenɩ tẽe pɔ, nɩ Manayen ban dɔ̃ɔ 'mataa guol a Nãa Hɛrɔd, nɩ a Sɔɔl.
A lɛ ban gal a kɔ̃ na ba sʋɔrɔ a sɩ Soro, ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ ir a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɔɔl kʋ ma ka ba tʋ̃ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɩn bʋɔl ba."
A lɛ ban gal a kɔ̃ ba di bon jaa ɛ, ba dɔɔl ban a nuur sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʋ ba tɩ bar ba sɔr ka ba chen.
A nɩbɛ ayi banyãna den a sɔr ka a Nãaŋmɩn de ba nie suun be a Selusiya na ba tɩ kpɛ a gboro chiine a Sipurusɩ.
Lɛ ban tɩ ta a Salamis, ba mʋɔl a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a be a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir. Ka a Jɔɔn Maakɩ be a ba sɛ̃ na wʋ sʋ̃nɔ̃ ba.
Ba yɔn a man dõdol wʋ jaa tɩ ta Pafos, be lɛ ba tuor a Juu nɩrɛ jɩbʋrɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ na ma ŋmara jirsɩ ka a wʋ yuor di Bar-Yesu.
Wʋ dɔ̃ɔ be a Segiyusɩ Pɔɔlusɩ na kaara a dõdol na ɩ yɛ̃ sʋɔ, a tẽkaara nyãna lɛ bʋɔl a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɔɔl bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ wõ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ a Elimasɩ na ɩ a jɩbʋrɔ a wʋ yuor par lɛ a lɛ nɛ, ŋmaan a Banabasɩ nɩ a Sɔɔl sɔr ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka a tẽkaara nyãna wʋ sɔɔ a Yesu ɛ.
Ka a Sɔɔl nyãna ban bʋɔlɔ a Pɔɔl na sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kaara a Elimasɩ jaa tɩ̃ɩɩ tɩ wa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ.
"Fʋ ɩn Satan bie na fʋ ɩ bʋ̃sʋ̃n a jaa dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃. A fʋ pʋɔ sɛɛn naa bɛlfʋ nɩ bɛlfʋ 'yɛr bie, fʋ kʋ̃ bar a jir fʋn bʋɔrɔ ɩka fʋ sɔ̃ɔn a sɩ Soro sɔr dẽdẽe bar ɛ?
Pʋ̃pãanyã a sɩ Soro na ŋme fʋ naa ka fʋ jɔ̃ɔ tɩ tãn sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ, fʋ kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ chãa ɛ." Ajienaa lɛ a Elimasɩ nɩbie de, ka a libe pɔɔ wʋ, ka wʋ bɔɔlɔ bʋɔrɔ nɩrɛ na nyɔɔ wʋ nũu.
A lɛ a tẽkaara na nyɛ a lɛ na ɩ, wʋ sɔɔn de, bojũu nɛɛ 'maa wʋ naa a lɛ ban wile a sɩ Soro yele.
Pɔɔl nɩ a wʋ taaba kpɛ̃n a gboro yi a Pafos chen be a Perga na be a Pamfiliya be lɛ a Jɔɔn Maakɩ tɩ bar ba tɩ lɩɛb chen a Jerusalɛm.
Ka ba yi a Perga chen Antiok na gbʋr a Pisidiya, a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir daar ba kpɛ̃n a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie na ba tɩ jɩ̃nɛ.
Ban wa kar a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ nɩ a ala a Nãaŋmɩn 'Yɛ'yɛrbɛ na sɛb baar, a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie nɩbɛrɛ sʋʋr naa Pɔɔl nɩ a wʋ taaba, "Yɛɛr, yɩn tara 'yɛr na sʋ̃ʋn a nɩbɛ sɩ kʋ yɩn sɔr, yɩ 'yɛr."
Ka a Pɔɔl vaa ir wɩlwɩl ba a nũu tɩ 'yɛrɛ, "Isɩral nɩbɛ woɩ, nɩ a yɩn na ba ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ɛ, na puoro a Nãaŋmɩn, yɩ chɛlɛ a lɛ ɩn 'yɛrɛ.
A Nãaŋmɩn nyã a sɩn Isɩral nɩbɛ na puoro lɛ dɔ̃ɔ chɛl ir a sɩ sãakpãmɩne na wʋ vɛ̃ ka ba dɔɔ paal be a Ijipitɩ pɔ. Kpɛ̃ɔ lɛ wʋ de faan ba yin a paal 'lɔ pɔ,
na wʋ bɔ̃ɔ tara ba be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ yuom lɩjaayi (40).
Paal bʋrsɩ ayopõi lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn dii bar be a Kanaan tɩ de a wɛr 'lɔ kʋ a wʋ nɩbɛ ka a ɩ ba sofʋ.
"A anyãna a jaa lɔ̃ɔn taa ɩ yuom kɔɔr anaar dɔɔl lɩjaayi nɩ pie (450). A anyã puor, Nãaŋmɩn kʋ ban 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ tɩ tãn a Samuwɛl na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ sɔ̃ɔ.
Be lɛ ka a nɩbɛ pãa wa sʋɔr Samuwɛl a wʋ bɔ nãa kʋ ba, ka Nãaŋmɩn de a Sɔɔl na ɩ a Kɩsɩ bidaba kʋ ba na ɩ a Benjamin bal nɩrɛ a wʋ ɩ a ba nãa yuom lɩjaayi (40).
Wʋn wa ir a Sɔɔl bar, wʋ den a David ka wʋ ɩ a ba nãa. Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa, 'N nyɛn a David na ɩ a Jesɩ bidaba ka a n ɩ̃gãn 'maa, wʋn maal yele a jaa ɩn bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ ɩ.'
"A Nãa David nyãna bal par pɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn ir a Fafaara Yesu kʋ a Isɩral nɩbɛ nɩtãa lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ.
Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka a Yesu wa, Jɔɔn mʋɔlɔ naa a tɩɛr lɩɛbfʋ 'yɛr na wʋ suoro a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ.
Lɛ a Jɔɔn na wa baaraa a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃, wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, 'An lɛ yɩ tɩɛr ɩka n ɩ naa? N ba ɩ a 'lɔ yɩn tɩɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ ben a n puor waara, n ba sɛɛ ɩka n for a wʋ nafɔbɔ ɛ.'
"Maa yɛɛr na ɩ Abraham yɔn nɩ a yɩn na joro a Nãaŋmɩn dãbɩ̃ɛ na ɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, sɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a faafʋ nyãna wa.
Bojũu, a nɩbɛ na be a Jerusalɛm nɩ a ba nɩbɛrɛ ba chɛl a Yesu ɛ, na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ 'yɛr ka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na sɛb a ba ma kara a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir jaa ɩ.
Ba gban ba dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ yele jaa na wiil ɩka wʋ sɛɛn kũu ɛ, tɩ ba sʋɔr a Pilate ɩka wʋ vɛ̃ ka ba kʋ a Yesu.
Ban wa maal a lɛ jaa ban sɛb a wʋ yele baar, a wʋ poturbo yɔɔ wʋn a daa ju na ba tɩ ũu a yaa pɔ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn ir wʋ a kũu pɔ.
A ber yɔɔ na wa po, a bala wʋn dɔ̃ɔ lɔ̃ɔ yɔn yin a Galilee tɩ tãn a Jerusalɛm, ba nyɛ wʋ naa, bala lɛ ɩ a dãasɩɛ dẽme a pʋ̃pãanyã kʋ a sɩ nɩbɛ.
"Sɩn 'yɛrɛ naa a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna kʋrɔ yɩ, a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne.
Nãaŋmɩn maal kʋ a sɩn na ɩ a yɔn a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne, na wʋ sɩ̃ɩ a Yesu yin a kũu pɔ. Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Yiel Gãma ayi pɔ, 'Fʋ ɩ naa a maa bie, dɩna n lɩɛb a fʋ sãa.'
Lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na sɩ̃ɩ wʋ a kũu pɔ nɩ nyã, wʋ kʋ̃ lɛ kpi pʋ̃ɔ go ɛ, a 'yɛr nyãna lɛ wʋ 'yɛr, 'Ɩn kʋ yɩ naa a yelsʋ̃n nɩ a sʋ̃ʋfʋ 'lɔ ɩn tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ a David.'
A jie ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ 'yɛr ɩka, 'Fʋ kʋ̃ vɛ̃ ka a fʋ Chɛchɛ Sʋɔ kpɛ pʋ̃ɔfʋ jie ɛ.'
"A Nãa David na wa tʋ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ a wʋ sɔ̃ɔ, wʋ kpi naa ka ba ũu wʋ be a wʋ sãamɩne yar par, ka a wʋ ɩ̃gãn pʋ̃ɔ.
Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na sɩ̃ɩ a kũu pɔ, ba kpɛ pʋ̃ɔfʋ jie ɛ.
"A lɛ jũu n yɛɛr, n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ka a tu naa a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba mʋɔl yelbier vɛ̃ kʋfʋ kʋ yɩ.
A tu naa a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɩka nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ de, Nãaŋmɩn na faa wʋn yin a ala a jaa a Mosesɩ Nɛɛ na kʋ̃ naa tʋ̃ɔ faa wʋ ɛ.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃, ka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr taa wa a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.
'Nyɛ a yɩn na kpɛrɛ, yɩ bʋ̃bʋr na yɩ wɛ, bojũu ɩn maal yele kɔ̃ɔ a yɩ sɔ̃ɔ yɩn ba be na sɔɔ de ɛ, ala ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ gba 'yɛr kʋ yɩ.' "
Lɛ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ na wa yire a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie, a nɩbɛ lɛ sʋɔr ba naa ɩka ba lɛ wa a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar wa 'yɛr a 'yɛr nyãna go.
Lɛ a lɔ̃ɔfʋ dẽme na wa yaar, a Juu nɩbɛ yɔɔ jie nɩ a bala na lɩɛb a Juu nɩbɛ turo naa Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ na ba bʋrɔ nɩ ba kpãkpãana ba 'yɛrɛ ka ba mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ nyã pɔ.
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir na lɛ wa ta, a tẽdẽme yɔɔ jie tɩ lɔ̃ɔn taa na wõ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr.
Lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ na nyɛ a nɩyɔɔ ba nyãna, nyuur kpɛ ba naa ka ba tʋrɔ chɩrɛ nɩ lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛrɛ.

Ka a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ ba jo ba dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Sɩn 'lɔ, sɩn den nie 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ yɩ. Tɩchɛ yɩn ben tɔr bar na yaa kaa a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɩka yɩ sɛɛn naa a nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ sɩn lɩɛb chen a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ sɛ̃.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a sɩ Soro kpãkpãan sɩ ɩka sɩ ɩ, 'Ɩn maal fʋ naa ka fʋ ɩ chãa kʋ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka fʋn chiin a faafʋ 'yɛr tɩ tãn a tẽe baaraa.' "
A lɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na wõ a 'yɛr ba pʋɔ pɛl naa ka ba de 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr, ka a bala jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na ir ɩka ba nyɛ a nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, sɔɔ de.
Ka a sɩ Soro 'yɛr yaar a paal 'lɔ wʋ jaa.
Tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ dam a pɔbɔ bala na turo a Juu nɩbɛ puorfʋ tɩ ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nɩ a tẽe nɩdierbe 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba dii a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ bar a paal 'lɔ pɔ.
Ka ba pɩ̃pɩ̃ a ba gbɛɛ tã-uul 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ka a wiil ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na ge ba naa tɩ na ba chen a Ikoniyum.
Ka a nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ a poturbo bala ka ba sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
Be a Ikoniyum lɛ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ ma chen a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie, be lɛ ba man a 'yɛr jaa nɛ nɛ nɛ ka a nɩyɔɔ bamɩne na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, sɔɔ de a 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bala na ba sɔɔ de ɛ, dam a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, sɔ̃ɔ a ba tɩɛr ka baa bara a yɛɛr ɛ.

Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ jɛ̃n a be na ba kor bɩ̃lãa, na ba 'yɛrɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr ba joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, ka a sɩ Soro mɩ̃ɛ wiil ɩka a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ 'yɛr ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ na wʋ sʋ̃ʋ ba a ba tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃ yelwiilsɩ nɩ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Ka a tẽdẽme ŋma jiir ayi, a bamɩne pʋɔ a Juu nɩbɛ, ka a bamɩne mɩ pʋɔ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ.
Nɛchɩrɛ lon a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ nɩ a ba nɩbɛrɛ chara pɔ, ka ban maal Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ dɛɛr lɔb ba nɩ kʋsɩbɛ.
Tɩchɛ a ba bɔ̃ɔn na ba jo chen a tẽn anyãna na be a Likoniya paal pɔ, Lɩstɩra nɩ a Debi nɩ a tẽn ala na jilʋ̃ a be.
Be lɛ ba chɛnɛ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir na ba mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ.
A be a Lɩstɩra, dagbɛrɛ kɔ̃ɔ ben be ban lɔ̃ɔ dɔɔn ka waa chen kaa jaa ɛ.
Wʋ chɛlɛ naa lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛrɛ ka a Pɔɔl kaa wʋ jaa tɩ̃ɩɩ nyɛ na wʋ bɔ̃ɔn wʋn tara sɔɔfʋ na sa.
A wʋ bʋɔl a daba 'yɛr, "Ir ara naa fʋ gbɛɛ." Ka a daba vaa ir na wʋ piel chiine.
Lɛ a nɩbɛ na wa nyɛ a lɛ a Pɔɔl na ɩ, ka ba ŋme chɛlma nɩ a Likoniya kɔkɔr pɔ, "A ŋmɩmɛ lɩɛb nɩbɛ suu wa a sɩ sɛ̃!"
Ba bʋɔlɔ naa a Banabasɩ "Jeyusɩ," na ba bʋɔlɔ a Pɔɔl mɩ "Hɛmɩsɩ," bojũu 'lɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a 'yɛ'yɛrɛ.
Ka a Jeyusɩ nyã puorfʋ yir na dɔ̃ɔ ara a tẽe kõkoor bɔɔrloro waan nɩ nadai nɩ a vapuulsɩ bojũu 'lɔ nɩ a nɩyɔɔ bala bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka ba lo bɔɔr kʋ ba.
Tɩchɛ lɛ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ, Banabasɩ nɩ a Pɔɔl na wa wõ a lɛ, ba tɔɔn a ba fuusɩ chɩɛr tɩ jo kpɛ be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ tɩ tãna,

"Nɩbɛ, bãa lɛ yɩ maala a lɛ? Sɩn mɩ ɩn nɩbɛ, nɩsaalba a yɩ kaar. Sɩn waan naa a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã wa kʋ yɩ, na sɩ 'yɛrɛ yɩ ɩka, yɩ lɩɛb yi a yelpɔrsɩ anyãna pɔ, tɩ turo a Nãaŋmɩn vʋr. 'Lɔ lɛ maal a saaju, nɩ a tẽe, nɩ a man kpɛ̃ɛ, nɩ bon jaa na be be.
A kõr jaa wʋ dɔ̃ɔ bar ka nɩrɛ jaa turo a wʋ sɔr.
Tɩchɛ wʋ ma wiil a lɛ wʋn ɩ maal vɩla sʋɔ, na wʋ ma wiil a wʋ maal vɩla vɛ̃ ka a saa yi saaju waara, ka a bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ sɔ̃ɔ mɩ be be. Wʋ ma kʋ yɩn a bʋ̃diir yɔɔ ka yɩ pʋɔ pɛl."
A 'yɛr nyãna gba ban 'yɛr, tɩchɛ a chɛnɛ na ɩ tuo ka ban ŋmaa a nɩbɛ sɔr ka ban bar a bɔɔr lofʋ.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne na pãa yi a Antiok nɩ a Ikoniyum wa tɔ̃n a nɩyɔɔ bala 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba lɔb a Pɔɔl nɩ kʋsɩbɛ vu yin bar a tẽe kõkoor tɩɛr man tãa wʋ kpi naa.
Tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo tɩ ŋmaa jilʋ̃ wʋ ara nɩ ka wʋ ir kpɛ a tẽe pɔ. A wɛr na wa chaar ka 'lɔ naa Banabasɩ chen a Debi.
Be lɛ ba tɩ mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ, ka a nɩyɔɔ jaa sɔɔ turo a Yesu. A ba pãa lɩɛb chen a Lɩstɩra, Ikoniyum nɩ a Antiok,
tɩ mʋlɔ a pupuorbiir 'yɔ̃ɔn ba ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn ka ba ara nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ a sɔɔfʋ pɔ, na ba 'yɛrɛ, "Dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ pɔ lɛ sɩn tu tɩ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ."
Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ ir nɩdierbe kʋ ba a ba kaara a puorfʋ dẽme ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa. Ba gal kɔ̃ na ba sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn tɩ de ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro ban sɔɔ nũu pɔ.
Ba kpɛ̃n tala a Pisidiya, ba wa ta naa Pamfiliya,
ban wa mʋɔl a 'yɛr a Perga, ba suun chen be a Ataliya.
Be a Ataliya lɛ ba yi tɩ kpɛ a gboro chen a Antiok. Be lɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ de ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nũu pɔ ka wʋ sʋ̃ʋ ba, a ba tʋ̃ɔ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ a be tʋ̃ baar.
Ban tɩ tara jaa lɛ ba bʋɔl a pupuorbiir lɔ̃ɔ taa na ba man a lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na de ba tʋ̃n nɩ a lɛ mɩ wʋn yuo sɔr kʋ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka ba tʋ̃ɔ sɔɔ de.
Ba jɛ̃n a be kor bɩ̃lãa nɩ a poturbo.
Nɩbɛ bamɩne yin be a Judiya suun wa a Antiok wa wile a yɛɛr 'yɛrɛ, "Yɩn baa sɔɔ ka ba ŋmaa yɩ a yʋɔr nɩtãa lɛ a Mosesɩ na bin ɛ, yɩ kʋ̃ nyɛ faafʋ ɛ."

A anyãna vɛ̃ naa ka a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ nɩ a nɩbɛ mĩi 'yɔ̃ɔ taa ka a ɩ nɛchɩrɛ. Be lɛ a ba ir Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ nɩ a pupuorbiir bamɩne 'yɔ̃ɔ ɩka ba chen a Jerusalɛm tɩ nyɛ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a 'yɛr nyãna.
A pupuorbiir na wa bar ba a sɔr, ba chen tɩ yi a Fonisiya nɩ a Samariya na ba man a lɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na lɩɛb puoro a Nãaŋmɩn. Ka a yɛɛr ba jaa pʋɔ pɛl nɩ a 'yɛr nyã.
Ban wa ta Jerusalɛm, a pupuorbiir nɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ de ban nuur ayi, ka ba man a lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na de ba tʋ̃n.
Ka a pupuorbiir bamɩne na chɛnɛ tara a Farasee wiilfʋ ir ara tɩ 'yɛr, "A nɩyor banyãna, a sɛɛ naa ka ban ŋma a ba yɔɩ na ba tu a lɛ a Mosesɩ na bin."
A nɩtʋ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ lɔ̃ɔn taa na ban guor a 'yɛr nyãna.

A lɛ ban mana taa tɩ ta sɔ̃ɔ, Pita ir 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɛɛr, yɩ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ir man a yɩ pɔ, ka a bala na ba sɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, mɩ na wõ a faafʋ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr yi a n nɛɛ pɔ, na ba sɔɔ de.
Nãaŋmɩn na bɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ jaa nyãa lɛ wiil ɩka wʋ sɔɔn de ba na wʋ kʋ ba a wʋ Sɩɛ nɩtãa lɛ wʋn kʋ sɩ.
Waa maal a sɩn nɩ a bala ka sɩ tɛɛ taa ɛ, wʋ pɛɛn a ba nyãa ban sɔɔ jũu.
A lɛ jũu, bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ mʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ bɛɛr Nãaŋmɩn kaa, na yɩ tuo a poturbo tuor a sɩ sãakpãmɩne na ba dɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃ɔ tuo ɛ?
Kai, sɩn sɔɔ naa ɩka a tu naa a sɩ Soro Yesu wɩ̃ɛfʋ jũu lɛ sɩ nyɛ faafʋ nɩtãa a bala kaar."
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na duo ɩ jaa gbulo, tɩ chɛlɛ a lɛ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ na mana a yelfɛrsɩ nɩ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn na de ba tʋ̃n a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bala pɔ.
Ban wa 'yɛr baar ka a Jemesɩ mɩ 'yɛr, "Yɛɛr, yɩ chɛlɛ ka.
Simon man kʋ sɩ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ tɩɛrtɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ ɩka wʋn ir nɩbɛ a ba pɔ, kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
Ka a lɛ na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ nɩ a 'yɛr nyã ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ.
'A anyã puor, ɩn lɩɛb tɩ mɛ a Nãa David yir 'lɔ na lo. Ɩn mɛn a 'lɔ na ŋmɛr, naa lɛ maal wʋ.
Ka a nɩbɛ bala na chɛ pãa na yɔ bɔ a Soro nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ na bʋɔlɔ a n yuor, lɛ lɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr na maal a yele anyãna,'
ka ba bɔ̃ɔn a kõr jaa jaa.
"Maa 'yɛr nɩ nyã ɩka sɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a ɩ tuo kʋ a nɩyor banyãna na lɩɛrɛ waara a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ ɩ a sɩ sɛb kʋ ba ɩka yaa, ba taa dire tɩɩ bon ɛ, na ba taa sɛ̃nɛ ɛ, dʋ̃ɔ na var kpi ba taa ɔɔrɔ ɛ, na ba taa ɔɔrɔ jɩ̃ɩ ɛ.
Bojũu, lɛ lɛ a Mosesɩ bin a nɛɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ ma mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr nyãna a tẽn a jaa ka ba mɩ ma kar naa a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar jaa."

Ka a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ lɔ̃ɔn a pupuorbiir ba jaa pãa kaa ir nɩbɛ a ba pɔ, ka ban 'matãan a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ tʋ̃ ka ba chen a Antiok. Judas ban bʋɔlɔ Basabasɩ nɩ Silasɩ lɛ ba ir, a nɩbɛ ayi banyãna mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ nɩbɛrɛ pʋɔ a yɛɛr.
Bala lɛ ba tʋ̃n a gãn nyãna, "A sɩn nɩtʋ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ na ɩ a yɩ yɛɛr puor naa a yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na ɩ a sɩ yɛɛr be a Antiok nɩ a Siriya nɩ a Sɩlɩsɩya paal pɔ.
Sɩ wõn a bamɩne na yi a sɩ sɛ̃ sɩn ba kʋ ba sɔr ɛ, tɩ vuro yɩ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ yɩ 'yɛrɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka sɩ jaa sɔɔ ir nɩbɛ bamɩne tʋ̃ ka ban wa a yɩ sɛ̃, 'matãan a sɩ barmɩne Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ,
a nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ sɔɔ kũu a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor jũu.
A lɛ jũu lɛ sɩ tʋ̃n a Judas nɩ a Silasɩ ka ban tɩ man a ba nɛɛ a lɛ sɩn sɛb.
A vɩɛlɛ na kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩ a sɩn mɩ sɛ̃, ka sɩ kʋ̃ lɛ tuo yɩ tuor dɔɔl a anyãna ju ɛ.
Yɩ taa dire tɩɩ bon ɛ, yɩ taa ɔɔrɔ jɩ̃ɩ ɛ, na yɩ taa ɔɔrɔ dʋ̃ɔ na var kpi nʋ̃n ɛ, bɩɩ sɛ̃nɛ ɛ. Yɩ mɔ̃ na yɩ nyɔɔ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a yelsɩ anyãna pɔ. Yɩ jɛ̃ vɩla."
Ban wa bar a Pɔɔl, nɩ a Banabasɩ, nɩ a Judas nɩ a Silasɩ sɔr, ka ba suu chen be a Antiok, be lɛ ba tɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa a bala na puoro ba jaa na ba de a gãn kʋ ba.
A nɩbɛ na wa kar a gãn a 'yɔ̃ɔ ban ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn ka ba pʋɔ pɛl.
Judas nɩ a Silasɩ mɩ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ 'yɛr 'yɛr yɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔn a yɛɛr ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn.
Ban wa jɛ̃ a be kor bɩ̃lãa, ka a yɛɛr lɛ bar ba sɔr nɩ nyã'maar ka ba lɩɛb chen a bala na tʋ̃ ba sɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl nɩ a Banabasɩ jɛ̃ be a Antiok, be lɛ a bala nɩ a ba taaba bamɩne wile tɩ mʋɔlɔ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr.
A mɩn lɛ wa kor bɩ̃lãa ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr kʋ a Banabasɩ, "Vɛ̃ ka sɩ lɛ chen tɩ piir a yɛɛr kaa a tẽn ala pɔ sɩn mʋɔl a sɩ Soro 'yɛr na sɩ kaa ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ba irɛ."
Ka a Banabasɩ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ de a Jɔɔn Maakɩ ka ba 'mataa chen.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl ba tɩɛr ɩka a ba tara sɔr ɛ, bojũu wʋ dɔ̃ɔ bar ba be a Pamfiliya ba lɛ pɔɔ ba chen a tʋ̃mɔ̃ jie ɛ.
Be lɛ ba tãn tãn taa na ba ŋma dẽdẽme, ka a Banabasɩ de a Jɔɔn Maakɩ na wʋ kpɛ̃n a gboro chiin be a Sipurusɩ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl mɩ ir a Silasɩ ka a yɛɛr de ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro nũu pɔ, ka wʋn sʋ̃ʋ ba.
Wʋ tun a Siriya nɩ a Sɩlɩsɩya 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bala na puoro ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn.
Pɔɔl tɩ chen a Debi na wʋ tɩ po chen a Lɩstɩra, be lɛ wʋ tɩ nyɛ a pupuoro ɩ̃sʋɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Timoti ka a wʋ ma ɩ Juu nɩrɛ na wʋ puoro, tɩchɛ ka a wʋ sãa ba ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ.
Ka a yɛɛr na be a Lɩstɩra nɩ a Ikoniyum pʋr a Timoti yovɩla.
A Pɔɔl bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ tara wʋ 'mataa chiine na wʋ ŋmaa wʋ a yʋɔr, bojũu a Juu nɩbɛ na kpɩɛrɛ a be bɔ̃ɔn naa a Timoti sãa na ba ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ.
A lɛ ban lʋɔrɔ a tẽn, lɛ mɩ lɛ ba mana kʋrɔ ba lɛ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ nɩ a nɩdierbe na be a Jerusalɛm na 'yɛr bin ka nɩbɛ ba turo.
Ba 'yɔ̃ɔn a pupuorbiir ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn ka a nɩbɛ mɩ waara pʋɔrɔ bɩbir jaa.
Pɔɔl nɩ a wʋ taaba tun a Fɩrgɩya nɩ a Galatiya paal pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ŋmaa ba sɔr a ba taa mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr a be a Asɩya ɛ.
Ban wa gbʋr a Misiya wɛr pɔ, ba ta mʋɔrɔ naa ɩka ba chen a Bitiniya tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ba kʋ ba sɔr ɛ.
A ba vɩɛ a Misiya bar tɩ suu chen be a Toroyas.
A tɩ̃sɔɔ lɛ a Pɔɔl nyɛ jãna pɔ, daba na yi Masedonɩya ara sʋɔrɔ wʋ 'yɛrɛ, "Gɔ̃ɔ wa ka a Masedonɩya wa sʋ̃ʋ sɩ."
Pɔɔl na nyɛ a nyɛfʋ nyãna, sɩ ir chɔɔr a lɛ nɛ na sɩ chen a Masedonɩya, na sɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ bʋɔl sɩ a sɩ tɩ mʋɔl a wʋ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ ba.
A Toroyas sɩn yi tɔ̃ɔ kpɛ a gboro a dẽdẽe a lɛ nɛ chen a Samotɩrasɩ, ka a wɛr na wa chaar, sɩ tãn a Neapolis.
Be lɛ sɩ yin gbɛɛ chiin a Filipai, Worom dẽme lɛ dɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ a be na wʋ mɩ ɩ a Masedonɩya jikpɛ̃ɛ, be lɛ sɩ jɩ̃nɛ maal ber aŋmɩnɛ jaa.
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar, sɩ yin a tẽe pɔ suu a põn pɔ, be lɛ sɩ tɩɛr ɩka sɩn nyɛn jie ban ma sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn. Sɩ jɩ̃nɛ naa be na sɩ piel 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr kʋrɔ pɔbɔ na lɔ̃ɔ a be.
A pɔbɔ banyãna na chɛlɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ yuor din Lidiya na yara fɔjɩɩr, na wʋ yi a Tayatira tẽe pɔ, wʋ mɩ puoro naa Nãaŋmɩn. A sɩ Soro yuon a wʋ tɩɛr ka wʋ sɔɔ de a lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛr.
'Lɔ nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme ba jaa na wa so a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, wʋ bʋɔl sɩ naa a sɩ wa a wʋ yir a wʋ wa 'yɛr, "Ala ɩ yɩ sɔɔ naa ɩka n sɔɔn de a sɩ Soro, sɩrɛ jaa yɩ wa jɛ̃ a n yir." Lɛ lɛ wʋ mʋlɔ sɩ.
Daar kɔ̃ɔ sɩn lɛ chiine a jie 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ jie, sɩ tuor gbãgbapɔɔbile na tara a sɩdɛɛr na wʋ ma 'yɛrɛ yele na ɩ daar kɔ̃ɔ. A lɛ wʋn 'yɛrɛ na wʋ nyɛrɛ libiyɔɔ kʋrɔ a bala na so wʋ.
Ka a pɔɔbile nyãna turo a Pɔɔl na wʋ turo sɩ tãna 'yɛrɛ, "A nɩbɛ banyãna ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na be saaju tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ na ba wile yɩ a faafʋ sɔr."

Lɛ lɛ a pɔɔbile mar bɩbir jaa ka a Pɔɔl wa vʋʋr faa tɩ lɩɛb 'yɛr kʋ a sɩɛ 'lɔ na be a pɔɔbile pɔ ɩka, "Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor pɔ, n 'yɛr kʋ fʋ ɩka fʋ wa yi a pɔɔbile pɔ." Ajienaa ka a sɩɛ yi tɩchɛ wʋ bar.
A pɔɔbile sorbo na wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka baa lɛ nyɛrɛ tɔ̃nɔ̃ a pɔɔbile sɛ̃ ɛ, ba nyɔɔn a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ tɔɔ chiin be a daa pɔ a nɩbɛrɛ niem.
Ba chiin ban tɩ kʋ a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ tɩ 'yɛr, "A nɩbɛ banyãna ɩ naa a Juu nɩbɛ na ba wa kpɛ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sɩ a tẽe.
Ba tara na yelsɩ kɔ̃ɔ an ba tara sɔr kʋ a sɩn Worom nɩbɛ a sɩn sɔɔ bɩɩ maal ɛ."
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala ir pʋɔ na baa bara a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ ɛ, ka a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ vɛ̃ ka ba yaar a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ fuusɩ bar tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba fɔb ba.
A lɛ ban wa fɔb ba sɛɛ, ba nyɔɔr ban 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a 'lɔ na guro a pɔɔfʋ die, a wʋ bɔ̃ɔ kaara ba.
Wʋn wõ a nɩtɔ̃, wʋ tɩɛ ban 'yɔ̃ɔ a die 'lɔ na be a sãlsɔɔ tɩ lũ a ba gbɛɛ mar daa.
A tɩ̃sɔɔ bɩ̃ɩn lɛ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn, na ba yiele nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn yiel, ka a ba taaba ban lɔ̃ɔ pɔɔn ba chɛlɛ.
Ajienaa ka a tẽe dam kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, ka a pɔɔfʋ yir par kparaa mɩ dam. Ka a pɔɔfʋ der dɔ̃dɔɩ yuo yuor a jaa, ka nɩrɛ jaa bɔ̃jɔrma ban lũn wʋ for for.
Ka a 'lɔ na guro a pɔɔfʋ die jɛɔ ir na wʋ nyɛ a lɛ a pɔɔfʋ der dɔ̃dɔɩ na yuor, ka wʋ vʋ̃ɔ sɔɔ ɩka wʋ kʋ̃n wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, bojũu wʋ man tãa a pɔɔfʋ dẽme yin jo.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl tãn, "Ta ge fʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, sɩ jaa ben ka."
A wʋ bʋɔl a ba waan fɩ̃tɩn wa kʋ wʋ a wʋ pɔɔ kpɛ̃n be a die pɔ, na wʋ tɩ lo gbur dumo mɩrɛ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ niem.
Tɩ pãa ir tara ba yin tɩ sʋʋr, "Nɩbɛrɛ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn ɩrɛ wa nyɛ faafʋ?"
A ba 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro Yesu, fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a fʋ yir dẽme na nyɛn faafʋ."
Be lɛ ba pãa 'yɛr a sɩ Soro 'yɛr kʋ wʋ nɩ a bala jaa na be a wʋ yir.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a pɔɔfʋ die guguro de ba yin a tɩ̃sɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na wʋ tɩ pɛɛ a ba natɩɛ tɩchɛ a ba mɩ tɔ̃ɔ so a 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ.
Ka a pɔɔfʋ die guguro tara ba kpɛ̃n a wʋ yir tɩ maal bʋ̃diir kʋ ba, ka nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ a wʋ yir dẽme, bojũu 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme ba jaa sɔɔn de a Nãaŋmɩn.
Wɛr na wa chaar a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ ir a ba tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ tʋ̃ na ba 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ chen tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a 'lɔ na guro a pɔɔfʋ die ɩka, a wʋ yuo a dɔɔr bala bar."
Ka a pɔɔfʋ die guguro 'yɛr kʋ a Pɔɔl, "A 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ tʋ̃n ɩka n yuo a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a Silasɩ bar. A lɛ pʋ̃pãanyã yɩn tʋ̃ɔ chiine, yɩ chiine nɩ nyã'maar."

Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr kʋ a bala ban tʋ̃, "Chãa pɔ jaa lɛ ba vɛ̃ a ba fɔb sɩ, baa tɔɔr a sɩ 'yɛr ɛ, sɩ gba ɩ naa a Worom dẽme tɩ ba 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ. Pʋ̃pãanyã a ba lɛ bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba sɔɔl yuo sɩ bar? Bala mɩ̃ɛ ba wa yuo sɩ bar."
A tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ na tɩ man a lɛ kʋ a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ, ban wa wõ ɩka a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ ɩ naa Worom dẽme, dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba naa.
Ka a bala mɩ̃ɛ pãa chen tɩ 'maal ba yin a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, tɩ sʋɔr ba ɩka ba yi a tẽe 'lɔ pɔ.
Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ na wa yi a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, ba chen a Lidiya yir, be lɛ ba tɩ tuor a yɛɛr ka ba 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn tɩ pãa yi a be chen.
Ba tun a Amfipolis nɩ Apoloniya na ba wa a Tɛsalonika, be lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir be.
Lɛ a Pɔɔl na ma irɛ lɛ wʋ chen be a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir, Pɛ̃nfʋsɩ gbɛɛ ata jaa lɛ wʋ kpɛ a be ka a 'lɔ nɩ a bala vɩɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma.
Wʋ mana na wile a lɛ an sɛɛ a Nɩ-iraa na di dɔɔyɛ tɩ na wʋ ir a kũu pɔ ɩ vʋr, "A Yesu nyãna ɩn ben 'yɛrɛ a wʋ 'yɛr, lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa."
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne sɔɔ a lɛ na ba pʋɔ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ, 'matãan a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ puoro a Nãaŋmɩn lɔ̃ɔn pɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ.

Tɩchɛ ka a nyuur kpɛ a Juu nɩbɛ, ka ba bɔ a ba taaba nɩbomo be a daa pɔ lɔ̃ɔ taa, na ba piel gɔ̃mɔ̃ be a tẽe pɔ. Ba tɩ sɛɛn a Jason yir bʋɔrɔ a Pɔɔl nɩ a Silasɩ ɩka ba yin chiin ba a nɩyɔɔ bala niem.
Tɩchɛ ban ba wa tɩ nyɛ ba ɛ, ba nyɔɔn a Jason nɩ a yɛɛr bamɩne chiin a tẽe nɩbɛrɛ niem tɩ tãna 'yɛrɛ. "A dɔɔr banyãna lɛ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wɛr wʋ jaa, ba wa tãn ka pʋ̃pãanyã
ka a Jason tuor de ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ yir. Ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa a Nãa Siisa chire na ba 'yɛrɛ ɩka nãa ɩ̃sʋɔ ben be ban bʋɔlɔ Yesu."
A lɛ a tẽe nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a nɩyɔɔ bala na wõ a 'yɛr nyãna, a dam ba naa.
A ba pãa 'yɔ̃ɔ a Jason nɩ a yɛɛr bala a ba yab libie tɩ ba bar ba sɔr.
A lɛ a wɛr na wa tɔ̃ɔ sɔb, ka a yɛɛr bar a Pɔɔl nɩ Silasɩ sɔr ka ba chen be a Beriya. Ban tɩ ta, ba chen be a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir.
A Juu nɩbɛ bala na be a Beriya ɩn chɛchɛlbɛ gar a bala na be a Tɛsalonika, bojũu ba den a 'yɛr nɩ chɩlfʋ na ba vɩɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma kaara bɩbir jaa ɩka ba kaa lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛrɛ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ bɩɩ.
A Juu nɩbɛ yɔɔ jie sɔɔn de a 'yɛr lɔ̃ɔn a bala na ba ɩ Juu nɩbɛ dɔɔr yɔɔ jie, nɩ a pɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ bamɩne yɔɔ jie.
A Juu nɩbɛ na be a Tɛsalonika na wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Pɔɔl ben a Beriya mʋɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, ba chen a be tɩ chãgbala a nɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ ba.
Ka a yɛɛr mɩ tɔ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Pɔɔl a man sɔr a wʋ chen, tɩchɛ ka a Silasɩ nɩ a Timoti 'lɔ jɛ̃ be a Beriya.
A nɩbɛ bala na bɩɛl a Pɔɔl ba tɩ tãn wʋn a Atensɩ, bala lɛ wʋ lɩɛb tʋ̃ ɩka a Silasɩ nɩ a Timoti a ba wa fɔɔ a wʋ sɛ̃.
A lɛ wʋn chɛnɛ chɛlɛ ba be a Atensɩ, suur wa tɩ kpɛ wʋ naa a lɛ wʋn nyɛ a tẽe na sɛɛn a tɩbɛ.
Lɛ lɛ 'lɔ nɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a Greek bala na puoro a Nãaŋmɩn ma mana taa be a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir, nɩ a bala wʋn ma pɔɔ a daa pɔ bɩbir jaa nɩ nɩrɛ jaa wʋn tuor.

Ka a bɔ̃bɔ̃ɔnbɔ bamɩne na yi a Epikuriya nɩ a Sɩtoyik gbul pɔ piel chɩrɛ nɩ a Pɔɔl. Ka a bamɩne sʋrɔ, "Bo lɛ a dabʋlɔbʋlɔ nyãna ara 'yɛrɛ?" Ka a bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ, "Ŋmɩn sãansɩ kɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr lɛ wʋ 'yɛrɛ." Ba 'yɛrɛ naa nɩtɔ̃ bojũu, Pɔɔl mʋɔlɔ naa a Yesu 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nɩ a kũu pɔ irfʋ 'yɛr.
Be lɛ ba pãa bʋɔl wʋ chiin be a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie a Areyopagusɩ na ba 'yɛr, "Fʋn tʋ̃ɔ wiil sɩ a fʋ wiil paalaa nyãna fʋn wile a sɩ bɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ?
'Yɛr sãan lɛ a nyã fʋn waan a sɩ wõnõ na sɩ bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par."
Atensɩ dẽme ba jaa lɔ̃ɔn a sãanba na kpɩɛrɛ a be, baa tara tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ pʋɔ a 'yɛr paalaa ban ma 'yɛrɛ na ba chɛlɛ nɩ yelpaalaa na ɩrɛ.
Lɛ lɛ a Pɔɔl pãa ir a nɩbɛ na lɔ̃ɔ a Areyopagusɩ na wʋ 'yɛr, "Atensɩ dɔɔr, n nyɛn bɔ̃ɔn yɩn nʋ̃ ŋmɩmɛ puorfʋ.
Bojũu ɩn yʋɔrɔ kaara a yɩ tɩbɛ jiir, n tɩ nyɛn a bɔɔr lofʋ jie ɩ̃sʋɔ yɩn sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ, ŊMƖN 'LƆ SƖN BA BƆ̃Ɔ Ɛ. A Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ gba yɩn mɩ̃ɛ na puoro tɩ ba bɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ n waan ɩka n wa mʋɔl kʋ yɩ.
"A Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ na maal a wɛr nɩ a bomo a jaa na be a pɔ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a saaju nɩ a tẽe jaa Soro, na waa gãna a yie ala a nɩbɛ na mɛn a ba nuur kʋ wʋ ɛ.
Waa dɩɛl nɩrɛ nũu tʋ̃mɔ̃ ala ɩ wʋ bʋɔrɔ na bon kɔ̃ɔ ɛ, bojũu 'lɔ mɩ̃ɛ lɛ kʋ nɩrɛ nyɛvʋr, ka wʋ vʋrɔ nɩ bon jaa.
Dabʋ̃'yen pɔ lɛ wʋ tu na wʋ maal a nɩbʋrsɩ, ka ba kpɩɛrɛ a wɛr wʋ jaa. A wʋ man a sɔ̃ɔsɩ kʋ ba, nɩ a jiir ala ban na kpɩɛrɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn maal naa nɩtɔ̃ ka nɩrɛ na tʋ̃ɔ yɔbɔ wʋ, amɩne sɛ̃ ban nyɛ wʋ naa, bojũu waa jãan a sɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɛ.
'Bojũu, a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩ chɛnɛ na sɩ be ka a tẽe pɔ,' na sɩ yʋɔrɔ nɩtãa lɛ a yɩn mɩ̃ɛ nɩbɛ bamɩne na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, 'A wʋ bibiir lɛ sɩ ɩ.'
"Sɩn ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir jũu, yɩ taa ɩ a sɩ tɩɛr ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nyã kaara naa fɩka bon nɩrɛ na de wʋ yɛ̃ bɩɩ bɔ̃ɔfʋ mɛn, sɛlma, bɩɩ libipɩla, bɩɩ kʋsɩr kaar ɛ.
A kõr jaa 'lɔ, Nãaŋmɩn lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ ba bɔ̃ɔfʋ, tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, wʋ kpãkpãana na nɩrɛ jaa jie jaa ɩka, ba lɩɛb ba tɩɛr.
Bojũu wʋ ir bɩbir bin wʋn na de a daba 'lɔ wʋn ir, na wʋ tɔɔr a wɛr 'yɛr nɩ yeltorsɩ pɔ. Wʋ vɛ̃n ka a chaar kʋ nɩrɛ jaa wʋn sɩ̃ɩ wʋ a kũu pɔ."
Ban wa wõ a kũu pɔ irfʋ 'yɛr, bamɩne lan wuol, tɩchɛ ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛr, "Sɩn bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka sɩ lɛ wõ a 'yɛr nyã nɩdaar."
A lɛ, Pɔɔl bar ba naa a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie.
Tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ bɩ̃lãa turo a Pɔɔl na ba sɔɔ de a 'yɛr, a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ Diyonɩsɩs na ɩ a Areyopagusɩ lɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩrɛ, ka a pɔɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ na pʋɔ yuor di Damarisɩ nɩ bamɩne mɩ na pʋɔ.
A anyã puor, Pɔɔl yin a Atensɩ na wʋ chen be a Korɩntɩ.

Be lɛ wʋ tuor a Juu nɩrɛ na di Akuila na wʋ ɩ Pontus bal nɩrɛ, 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ pɔɔ Pɩrɩsɩla na yi a Itali wa a ba kor ɛ, bojũu a Nãa Kɩlaudiyus 'yɛr naa ɩka a Juu nɩrɛ jaa wʋ yi a Worom. Ka a Pɔɔl chen ɩka wʋ piir ba kaa.
Wʋ tɩ jɛ̃n a be a ba 'mataa tʋ̃nɔ̃ bojũu ba jaa bɔ̃ɔn a gãma tʋ̃mɔ̃.
A Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar jaa Pɔɔl ma chen a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir ma tɩ 'yɛrɛ a 'yɛr bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ lɩɛb a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ tɩɛr.
Lɛ a Silasɩ nɩ a Timoti na wʋ yi a Masedonɩya wa a Korɩntɩ, Pɔɔl den a wʋ sɔ̃ɔ wʋ jaa na wʋ mʋɔlɔ mana kʋrɔ a Juu nɩbɛ ɩka a Yesu lɛ a Nɩ-iraa.

Tɩchɛ ka Juu nɩbɛ 'yɛrɛ a Pɔɔl kpõkpoor 'yɛr, a wʋ pɩ̃pɩ̃ a fɔbaa 'yɔ̃ɔ ba tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A yɩ jɩ̃ɩ a lɩɛb dɔɔl a yɩ ju, a ba lɛ ɩ maa 'yɛr ɛ, an yi dɩna chiine, n chiine naa a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ jie."
Pɔɔl yin be a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir na wʋ gʋɔr a daba ɩ̃sʋɔ na di Titiyusɩ Jusɩtusɩ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ na puoro ka a wʋ yir gbʋr a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir.
Ka a Kɩrɩsɩpusɩ na ɩ a lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir nɩdiere nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme ba jaa sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro 'yɛr nɩ a Korɩntɩ dẽme yɔɔ na wõ a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr, a ba sɔɔ a wʋ so ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ.
A tɩ̃sɔɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ, a sɩ Soro 'yɛr 'yɛr kʋ a Pɔɔl jãna pɔ ɩka, "Taa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr ta pɔɔ nɛɛ ɛ.
Bojũu, ɩn pʋɔ fʋ naa, nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ nyɔɔ fʋ bɩɩ maal fʋ dɛɛr ɛ, bojũu n chɛnɛ na tara nɩyɔɔ a tẽe nyã pɔ."
Be lɛ a Pɔɔl jɛ̃ a be a Korɩntɩ yuon gbul nɩ bʋ̃ŋmaa na wʋ wile ba a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Galio ɩ a Akaya nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, ka a Juu nɩbɛ guor taa na ba nyɔɔ a Pɔɔl chiin be a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie.
Be lɛ ba tɩ 'yɛr, "A daba nyãna lɛ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ lɩɛb a nɩbɛ tɩɛr ka ba puoro Nãaŋmɩn na ba tu a lɛ a sɩ nɛbinsɩ na 'yɛr ɛ."
Ka a Pɔɔl haa nɛɛ ɩka wʋ 'yɛr 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ka a Galio 'yɛr kʋ a Juu nɩbɛ, "A yɩn, ala ta ɩ yeldɛɛr bɩɩ yelbier kɔ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ, ɩn taa 'maan ɩ̃gãn chɛlɛ.
Tɩchɛ an ben wa lɔ̃ɔ taa nɩ a yɩ 'yɛr bie nɩ yoe 'matãan a yɩ nɛbinãa yɩn mɩ̃ɛ yɩ maal, maa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ a 'yɛr nyãna tɔɔr ɛ."
Lɛ lɛ wʋ vɛ̃ a ba dii ba bar be a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie.
A ba lɩɛb nyɔɔ a Sosetenesɩ na ɩ a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na ba ŋme be a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ yir dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ, tɩchɛ a Galio baka ba be be ɛ.

Pɔɔl jɛ̃n be a Korɩntɩ tẽe kor bɩ̃lãa, tɩ pãa bar a yɛɛr na wʋ kpɛ a gboro chiine a Siriya ka a Pɩrɩsɩla nɩ a Akuila pɔɔ wʋ. Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka wʋ chen, wʋ vɛ̃n ka ba põ wʋ a ju be a Senkereya, bojũu wʋ dɔ̃ɔ põl 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
Ba tãn be a Efesus tẽe pɔ, ka a Pɔɔl bar a Pɩrɩsɩla nɩ a Akuila tɩ na wʋ mɩ̃ɛ chen be a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie ka a 'lɔ naa Juu nɩbɛ tɩ mana taa.
A ba sʋɔr wʋ ka wʋ jɩ̃nɛ a be bɩ̃lãa tɩ waa sɔɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ wʋn wa chiine wʋ tɩr nɛɛ kʋ ba, "Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn wa sɔɔ naa, ɩn lɩɛb wa." Be lɛ wʋ kpɛ a gboro yi a be a Efesus tẽe pɔ.
Wʋn tɩ ta a Sisariya wʋ don be a Jerusalɛm na wʋ tɩ puor a bala na puoro, tɩ pãa suu chen a Antiok.
Pɔɔl na tɩ jɛ̃ a be a Antiok kor bɩ̃lãa, wʋ pãa yin yʋɔrɔ a Galatiya paal 'lɔ wʋ jaa nɩ a Fɩrgɩya na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a poturbo ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn.
Ka a Juu nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ yuor na di Apolosɩ yin be a Aleksandiriya na wʋ wa a Efesus tẽe pɔ. Wʋ ɩ naa nɩrɛ na jãn na wʋ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma tɩ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr sʋ̃.
Apolosɩ nyã dɔ̃ɔ jãn a sɩ Soro sɔr defʋ, na wʋ 'yɛrɛ nɩ nɩbijɩɛ na wʋ wile nɩ Yesu yele ka a tor, tɩchɛ ka a ɩ Jɔɔn Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ sofʋ tɛɛ lɛ wʋ bɔ̃ɔ.
Wʋ piel na wʋ 'yɛrɛ nɩ nyãa be a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔfʋ yir. A Pɩrɩsɩla nɩ a Akuila na wa wõ a wʋ 'yɛr, ba bʋɔl wʋn be a ba yir na ba pãa wiil wʋ a Nãaŋmɩn sɔr jaa dẽ dẽ.
Apolosɩ wa bʋɔrɔ naa Akaya chenfʋ, ka a yɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ tɩ sɛb gãn kʋ a bala na puoro a be a ba de wʋ. Wʋn tɩ ta a be a ɩn sʋ̃ʋfʋ kpɛ̃ɛ kʋ a bala a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ na vɛ̃ ka ba sɔɔ de a Yesu.
Wʋ 'yɛr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa lɔb a Juu nɩbɛ chãa pɔ, na wʋ chɩrɛ ba yuoro nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn gãma wile ba ɩka a Yesu lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa.
Lɛ a Apolosɩ na chɛnɛ be a Korɩntɩ, Pɔɔl den a mɔgɔ̃ɔ sɔr na wʋ tɩ ta a Efesus tẽe pɔ. Be lɛ wʋ nyɛ a poturbo bamɩne,
na wʋ sʋʋr ba, "A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn sɔɔ de a Yesu, yɩ nyɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bɩɩ?" Ka ba 'yɛr, "Kai, saa gba wõ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ben be ɛ."
Ka a Pɔɔl sʋʋr ba, "Tɩ kɔ̃buor lɛ yɩ so?" Ka ba 'yɛr, "Jɔɔn kʋ̃ɔ lɛ sɩ so."
A Pɔɔl 'yɛr kʋ ba, "A bala na lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr lɛ a Jɔɔn so ba Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ ɩka ba sɔɔ de a 'lɔ na waara a wʋ puor, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Yesu."
A nɩbɛ na wa wõ a anyãna ba sɔɔ naa ka wʋ so ba a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor.
Ka a Pɔɔl dɔɔl ba a wʋ nuur ka Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wa kpɛ ba a ba 'yɛrɛ kɔkɔyor, na ba ma piel 'yɛrɛ lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na wiil ba.
Ban ɩn dɔɔr pie nɩ ayi.
Ŋmɛrsɩ ata lɛ wʋ be a be na wʋ ma kpɩɛrɛ a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie na wʋ ma kpɩrkpɩrɛ ba wile ba a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ a bamɩne kpɛ̃mɛ naa a ba nyãa na ba tɔr baa sɔɔ ɛ, tɩ na ba kpɛrɛ a Sɔr. Ka a Pɔɔl bar ba, tɩ na wʋ ma tara a bala na sɔɔ de, ma kpɛ̃n be a Tiranusɩ jãnfʋ diyal 'lɔ pɔ, a ba ma tɩ mana taa.
Lɛ lɛ wʋ tara tɩ tãn yuom ayi, ka a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ, bala jaa na be a Asɩya paal pɔ wõn a sɩ Soro 'yɛr.
Nãaŋmɩn den a Pɔɔl tʋ̃n nɛ'maa tʋ̃yɔɔ.
A Pɔɔl fɔbile wʋn ma fɩɛlɛ nɩ nyĩe nɩ a wʋ pẽpele ala wa sɩɩr baalaa, a baalsɩ ba jaa ma sa naa, ka a sɩdɛbɛ ma yire a nɩbɛ pɔ.

Ka a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne mɩ yi yʋɔrɔ na dii a sɩdɛbɛ ka a yi na ba fere de a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a bala na tara a sɩdɛbɛ, "A Yesu 'lɔ a Pɔɔl na mʋɔlɔ, a wʋ yuor pɔ lɛ sɩ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, yɩ wa yi."
A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na di Sekeva dabil ayopõi lɛ dɔ̃ɔ maala a lɛ nɛ.
Daar kɔ̃ɔ a sɩdɛɛr sʋʋr ba naa, "N bɔ̃ɔn Yesu naa bɔ̃ɔ Pɔɔl, tɩchɛ a yɩn mɩ ba boo yɩ ɩ?"
Ka a daba 'lɔ na tara a sɩ dɛɛr pãa ɔɔ nyɔɔr ba jaa, na wʋ ŋme ba jaa pɩrpɩr tɔɔr a ba bonsɩ chɩɛr ka ba jo yi a die pɔ nɩ sal'mɔi.
A Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ, na kpɩɛrɛ a be Efesus tẽe pɔ, ba jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa a yele nyãna, ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba a baa lɛ tara a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor dɩ̃ɛnɛ nɩ ɛ.
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na sɔɔ de, yi chãa pɔ, na ba 'yɛrɛ a ba maal dɛbɛ.
A jɩbʋʋrbɔ bala mɩ na sɔɔ, waan naa a ba jɩbʋʋrgãma wa chʋm a nɩbɛ ba jaa niem, ban wa sɔr a gãma ala ban chʋm libie ka a ɩ libipɩla turo ayi dɔɔl lɩjaayi nɩ pie (50,000).
A sɔr nyãna lɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr yaar de jie wʋ jaa nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ.
A anyãna a jaa na wa ɩ, Pɔɔl ŋmen nyãa ɩka wʋn chen a Jerusalɛm na wʋn tu a Masedonɩya nɩ Akaya, "Maa wa ta a be baar, ɩn chen a Worom mɩ."
Wʋ tʋ̃ naa a nɩbɛ ayi a bala na sʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ Timoti nɩ Erastus ka ba chen a Masedonɩya, tɩchɛ ka a 'lɔ jɩ̃nɛ be a Asɩya paal pɔ kor bɩ̃lãa.
A sɔ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ a damfʋ ir a Sɔr tʋfʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Sãa kuro kɔ̃ɔ yuor na di Demetirus, wʋ ma den a kpãna na wʋ kur a Atemisɩ puorfʋ yirbil ka a bala na ɩ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ nyɛrɛ libie.
A Demetirus bʋɔl a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa nɩ a bala jaa mɩ na bɔ̃ɔ a maalfʋ na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɛɛr, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa tɔ̃nɔ̃ sɩn nyɛrɛ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ nyã pɔ.
Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ nyɛ naa na yɩ wõ a lɛ a Pɔɔl nyãna na 'yɛrɛ na wʋ lɩɛrɛ a nɩyɔɔ tɩɛrsɩ a ka Efesus tẽe pɔ, nɩ a Asɩya wɛr wʋ jaa. Wʋ 'yɛr naa ɩka a ŋmɩmɛ ala ban maal nuur ba ɩ ŋmɩmɛ ɛ.
A ba ɩ a sɩ yara na lo tɛɛ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ ba kʋ̃ lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Atemisɩ puorfʋ yir kpɛ̃ɛ go ɛ. Ka a Asɩya nɩ a wɛr wʋ jaa kʋ̃ lɛ puoro a ŋmɩn pɔɔ nyã go ɛ."
Ban wõ lɛ a Demetirus na 'yɛr, ka a suur nyɔɔ ba a ba tãna 'yɛrɛ, "A sɩn Efesus ŋmɩn Atemisɩ bɛrma naa."
Ajienaa lɛ a tẽe wʋ jaa pɔɔn gɔ̃mɔ̃, ka a nɩbɛ nyɔɔ a Gayus nɩ Aristakus, Pɔɔl tʋ̃tʋ̃taaba lɛ a ba 'mataa yi a Masedonɩya na ba ŋmʋr ba a lɛ chiin a jie 'lɔ a tẽe nɩbɛ na ma lɔ̃ɔ dɩ̃ɛnɛ.
Ka a Pɔɔl mɩ ta bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ daa yi a be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a poturbo ba sɔɔ ɛ.
A nɩbɛrɛ bamɩne gba na yi a paal 'lɔ pɔ na ɩ a Pɔɔl barmɩne, tʋ̃n nɩbɛ ka ba sʋɔr wʋ ɩka wʋ taa ɩrɛ wa yire be a dɩ̃ɛn jie ɛ.
Burbur kpɛ̃n a nɩyɔɔ bala na duo a be, ka bamɩne 'yɛrɛ turo nɩ ka sɛn, ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ turo nɩ jɩ̃ yuo, ka bamɩne mɩ gba ba bɔ̃ɔ bo 'yɔ̃ɔ ban be be ɛ.
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ daa Aleksanda 'yɔ̃ɔ be a niem, ka a nɩyɔɔ bala tãna mana wʋ lɛ wʋn na 'yɛr. Wʋ wɩlwɩl ban nuur ɩka, ba bar gɔ̃n tɩ wʋ 'yɛr a ba kaa.
Tɩchɛ ban wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Juu nɩrɛ lɛ wʋ ɩ, ba jaa ŋmen chɛl bʋ̃'yen lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ na ba 'yɛrɛ, "A sɩn Efesus ŋmɩn Atemisɩ bɛrma naa."
A tẽe gãn sɛɛrɛ vɛ̃n ka a nɩyɔɔ bala ŋmaa vʋʋr tɩ wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Efesus dẽme woɩ, a wɛr wʋ jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Efesus tẽe lɛ kaara a Atemisɩ kpɛ̃ɛ nyã puorfʋ yir a wʋ kʋsɩr 'lɔ na yi a saaju lo.
A nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ jũu, nɩrɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ chɩɩr ɛ, yɩ ɩ jaa gbul na yɩ ta pɔɔrɔ yelsɩ ɛ.
A nɩbɛ banyãna yɩn waan a kana ba ju bon jaa a puorfʋ yir ɛ, bɩɩ 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛɛr jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ ŋmɩn pɔɔ nyã ɛ.
Ala ɩ a Demetirus nɩ a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ wa tara nɩrɛ nɩ 'yɛr, a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ bɩbie ben be nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ban tʋ̃ɔ chen a be tɩ bʋɔl taa.
Ala ɩ yele kɔ̃ɔ mɩ ben be a yɩ bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ 'yɛr, ban tʋ̃ɔ maal a be a nɩyɔɔ ba jaa niem.
A lɛ an sɩ ben 'yɛr pɔ, a damfʋ nyã na dam a dɩna jũu. A 'yɛr nyãna jũu, saa be jaa na tʋ̃ɔ wiil a par ɛ, bojũu a ba tara par ɛ."
A anyãna wʋn 'yɛr baar tɩ na wʋ wɛl a nɩyɔɔ bala bar.
Lɛ a gɔ̃mɔ̃ na wa baar, Pɔɔl tʋ̃n bʋɔl a poturbo ka ba wa, a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn tɩ bar ba tɩ chen a Masedonɩya.
Be lɛ wʋ tu a tẽn ala pɔ na wʋ 'yɛr 'yɛr yɔɔ 'yɔ̃ɔn a bala na puoro ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn na wʋ tɩ tãn a Greek wɛr pɔ,
wʋ jɛ̃n a be ŋmɛrsɩ ata. Bojũu a Juu nɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔ guoro taa a wʋ yele, ala lɛ so waa lɛ kpɛ a gboro chen a Siriya ɛ, tɩ na wʋ lɩɛb tu a Masedonɩya sɔr nɩ gbɛɛ.

Ka a bala na pʋɔ wʋ a ba 'mataa chen lɛ, Sopater a wʋ sãa lɛ Pirihusɩ na yi Beriya, Aristakus nɩ Sekundusɩ mɩ na yi Tɛsalonika, Gayus na yi Debi nɩ Timoti nɩ Tɩchɩkusɩ nɩ a Torofimusɩ na yi a Asɩya paal pɔ.
A nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ de nie tɩ chɛlɛ sɩ be a Toroyas.
Tɩchɛ a Paanʋ̃kõo Lɔ̃ɔfʋ di na wa baar, sɩ kpɛ̃n a gboro yi be a Filipai tẽe pɔ na sɩ maal ber anũu tɩ na sɩ pɔɔ ba a be Toroyas jɩ̃nɛ a be ber ayopõi.
A Pɛ̃nfʋ divɩɛ bio daar jãanʋɔr, sɩ jaa lɔ̃ɔn taa na sɩn 'mataa di. Pɔɔl 'yɛrɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋrɔ a nɩbɛ bojũu wɛr wa chaar, wʋn chen naa. Wʋ 'yɛr kor jaa ka wɛr tɩ põ.
A be a bɔɔpɩɛ pɔ sɩn lɔ̃ɔ ba chʋm fɩ̃tɩnsɩ yɔɔ bin.

Pɔlbile kɔ̃ɔ yuor na di Yutikus jɩ̃nɛ naa a tokoro nɛɛ ka a gʋ̃ɔ kpɛ wʋ. Lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛr kor a wʋ gur jaa chɩ̃ɩɩ na wʋ yi a be a saaju faa lo a be tẽe, bojũu ba mɛn a bɔɔpɩɛ dɔɔl taa ata ka ba suu 'mɔɔ ka ɩ wʋ kpi naa.
A Pɔɔl suun tɩ lo bib a kũu tɩ kõr wʋ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ, "Yɩ ta kõnõ ɛ, wʋ chɛnɛ na vʋrɔ."
Wʋ pãa don be a bɔɔpɩɛ pɔ, ka wʋ tɩ ŋma a paanʋ̃ɔ ka ba 'mataa di tɩ wʋ lɛ 'yɛr lɛ̃ɛɛ ka wɛr tɩ chaar ka wʋ yi a be chen.
Tɩchɛ ka pɔlbile ir kpɛ̃mɛ ka ba ɩ̃gãn 'maa a ba tara wʋ kul a yir.
Sɩn den nie kpɛ a gboro na sɩ chiine a Asosɩ, be lɛ sɩn tɩ 'mɔɔ a Pɔɔl, lɛ lɛ wʋ dɔ̃ɔ man sɩ tɩ chiine nɩ gbɛɛ a be.
Lɛ wʋn tɩ tuor sɩ a be Asosɩ, sɩ 'mɔɔ wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ a gboro pɔ na sɩ chiine be a Mitilene.
Wɛr na wa chaar, sɩ yin a be tɩ ta Kiyosɩ ka a wɛr lɛ bɔ̃ɔ chaar sɩ go kaa ɩ sɩ vɩɛn Samosɩ bar. A ber ata daar lɛ sɩ pãa ta a Miletusɩ.
Pɔɔl bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ po a Efesus tẽe bar na wʋ ta gã be a Asɩya paal pɔ ɛ, bojũu wʋ bʋɔrɔ na fɔɔ ɩka 'lɔ tʋ̃ɔ, wʋ ta a Jerusalɛm a Pentikosɩ bɩbir daar.
Pɔɔl na chɛnɛ be a Miletusɩ lɛ wʋ tʋ̃ bʋɔl a bala na puoro a be a Efesus, a ba nɩdierbe ka ba wa.
Ban wa ta, wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ bɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɩn be dɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ a yɩ sɛ̃, yi a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa ɩn wa a Asɩya paal pɔ.
Mɩ̃ɛ siirfʋ nɩ nɩbikʋ̃ɔ lɛ n tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a sɩ Soro tʋ̃mɔ̃, bojũu a Juu nɩbɛ ba maal ma vɩla ɛ.
Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka n ba sɔɔl yɩ yele jaa na sʋ̃ʋ yɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ n wile yɩn chãa pɔ, nɩ a yɩ yie pɔ.
N kpãkpãan naa a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ɩka ba lɩɛb wa a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, na ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro Yesu.
"Pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr man ka n chiine a Jerusalɛm, n ba bɔ̃ɔ lɛn na tɩ pɔɔ ma a be ɛ.
Yelbʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ n bɔ̃ɔ ɩka, tẽe jaa pɔ, a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma vɛ̃n ka n bɔ̃ɔn ɩka die pɔ pɔɔfʋ, nɩ wõm lɛ ɩn tɩ tuor.
Tɩchɛ a anyãna maa bã ma ɛ, ala ɩ ɩn tʋ̃ɔ jo ta a baaraa naa tʋ̃ a lɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu na kʋ ma a tʋ̃mɔ̃, ɩka n 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ.
"Yɩ nyɛ, pʋ̃pãanyã a yɩn bala jie ɩn yɔ naa mʋɔl a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr, yɩ kʋ̃ lɛ nyɛ ma go ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ a dɩna ɩka ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa bɔr, n nũu ba pʋɔ be ɛ.
Bojũu n ba dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔl yɩ yele jaa ɛ, tɩ man a lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ kʋ yɩ.
Yɩ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ bala 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na maal yɩ a yɩ ɩ a nɩdierbe. Yɩ kaara a Nãaŋmɩn pupuorbiir bala wʋn dãn a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ jɩ̃ɩ.
N bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka maa wa chen baar, nɩbɛ na lɩɛb gbõgboi kpɛ a yɩ pɔ, ba kʋ̃ bar yɩ ɛ.
Bamɩne na yin a yɩn mɩ̃ɛ pɔ gba, na ba jɛr a yelmɩ̃ɛ bɛl nɩbɛ ka ba turo ba.
A lɛ jũu yɩ guro yɩ mɩ̃ɛ na yɩ tɩɛr kaa, yuom ata nɩ nyã ɩn ba vɛ̃ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wiilfʋ ɛ, nɩbikʋ̃ɔ lɛ n wile nɩ yɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ.
"Pʋ̃pãanyã, n de yɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nũu pɔ, nɩ a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ 'yɛr bie pɔ, a yɩ na tʋ̃ɔ nʋ̃ɔ a wʋ kʋ yɩ a bʋ̃sʋ̃n ala wʋn tara kʋ a wʋ nɩbɛ.
N ba tara nyuur nɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa libir, bɩɩ sɛlma, bɩɩ a fɔɔr ɛ.
Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a n bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ, a n nũu pɔ lɛ a yi, naa sʋ̃ʋ a bala ɩn lɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ.
