Bon jaa ɩn maal, n wiil yɩ naa ɩka a tʋ̃kpɩ̃ɛn a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ lɛ, sɩn tu na sɩ sʋ̃ʋ a nɩbaalsɩ, yɩ tɩɛrɛ a lɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, 'An ɩn bɔɔsʋ̃n kʋ a 'lɔ na de bon kʋ nɩrɛ, gar a 'lɔ na de.' "
Wʋn 'yɛr a anyãna baar, wʋ gbur dumo ka ba jaa 'mataa sʋɔr a Nãaŋmɩn.
Ba jaa ŋman nɩbikʋ̃ɔ tɩ na ba kõr kõr wʋ.
A lɛ na maal sɔ̃ɔ a ba pʋɔ nɩ nyã, a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr ɩka ba kʋ̃ lɛ nyɛ wʋ go ɛ, tɩ na ba bɩɛl wʋ suun a gboro jie.
Sɩn wa bar taa baar, sɩ kpɛ̃n a gboro na sɩ tor a Kos a dẽdẽe a lɛ nɛ, a wɛr na wa chaar ka a ɩ sɩ tãn a Worodesɩ yi a be chen a Patara.
Sɩ nyɛn a gboro ɩ̃sʋɔ na chiine a Fonisiya ka sɩ kpɛ chiine.
Sɩn wa nyɛrɛ a Sipurusɩ tẽe sɩ lan wʋn bar a guba jie tɩ ta a Siriya tẽe pɔ. Tire lɛ sɩ ta ara an ɩ be lɛ a gboro na wɛl a tuor wʋn tuo.
Be lɛ sɩ nyɛ a poturbo bamɩne na sɩ jɩ̃nɛ a ba sɛ̃ ber ayopõi. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tu a ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba 'yɛr kʋ a Pɔɔl ɩka wʋ taa chiine a Jerusalɛm ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a sɩ bɩbie na wa ta, sɩ yin de a sɩ sɔr. Ka a poturbo bala ba jaa nɩ a ba pɔbɔ nɩ a ba bibiir ba jaa bɩɛl sɩ yin a tẽe pɔ, tɩ tãn a man gogoro nɛɛ, ka sɩ gbur dumo sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn.
Sɩn wa bar taa baar, sɩ kpɛ̃n a gboro pɔ, tɩ ba mɩ lɩɛb kulo a yir.
A Tire sɩn be yi, a man pɔ lɛ sɩ chen bɩ̃lãa tɩ ta a Tolemaisɩ be lɛ sɩ puor a yɛɛr bamɩne na be be na sɩ gã a be bɩbir bʋ̃'yen.
Sɩn ir a be chiine sɩ tãn be a Sisariya na sɩ chen a Filip na mʋɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ na wʋ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ ayopõi bala ɩ̃sʋɔ ban dɔ̃ɔ ir be a Jerusalɛm yir.
Wʋ dɔ̃ɔ tara pɔɔsarsɩ anaar na ba kul sɩrbɛ ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn ma kʋ ba a wʋ 'yɛr a ba 'yɛrɛ.
Sɩ jɛ̃n a be kor bɩ̃lãa ka a Agabus yi be a Judiya na,

wʋn wa a sɩ sɛ̃. Wʋ den a Pɔɔl sɩɛ gãn na wʋ lũn a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nuur nɩ a gbɛɛ tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr. "A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr naa, 'Nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ na be a Jerusalɛm na lũ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na so a sɩɛ gãn nyãna, na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nuur pɔ.' "
A lɛ sɩn wõ a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ ka a sɩn nɩ a nɩbɛ bala na be a be 'mataa sʋɔr a Pɔɔl ɩka wʋ taa chiine a Jerusalɛm ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, "Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩ kõnõ na yɩ chɩrɛ ma a ɩ̃gãn a lɛ? N sɔɔ naa, a ta ɩ a lũfu tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ n kpi be a Jerusalɛm a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor jũu."
A lɛ sɩn sʋɔr wʋ faa sɩ mɩ bar naa tɩ 'yɛr "A sɩ Soro bɔfʋ a ɩ."
A anyã puor lɛ sɩ chɔɔr na sɩ do be a Jerusalɛm.
Ka a poturbo bala na be a Sisariya bɩɛl sɩ na ba waan sɩ a daba 'lɔ na di a Minason yir be lɛ sɩn wa kpɩɛrɛ, Sipurusɩ tẽe pɔ lɛ wʋ yi tɩ na wʋ ɩ a poturo kor.
A lɛ sɩn wa ta a Jerusalɛm, a yɛɛr de sɩn nuur ayi.
Ka a wɛr na wa chaar, sɩn nɩ a Pɔɔl jaa 'mantaa chen ɩka sɩ tɩ nyɛ a Jemesɩ ka a ɩ be lɛ a nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa.
Pɔɔl na puor ba jaa baar, wʋ man naa yele a jaa kʋ ba, a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na de wʋ tʋ̃n be a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ.
A lɛ ban wõ anyãna ba jaa pɛɛn Nãaŋmɩn tɩ na ba pãa 'yɛr kʋ a Pɔɔl, "Yɛbɛ faa nyɛ, a Juu nɩbɛ turo turo na sɔɔ de, tɩchɛ ba chɛnɛ na tara nɩbijɩɛ nɩ a nɛbinãa.

Ba man kʋ ba ɩka fʋ̃ʋ lɛ wile a Juu nɩbɛ bala na kpɩɛrɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ, ka ba taa turo a Mosesɩ ɛ, na fʋ lɛ wile ɩka ba taa ŋmara a ba bibiir yɔɩ ɛ, na ba taa ɩrɛ a lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ na ma ɩrɛ ɛ.
Ban wõn ɩka fʋ wan a ka, ŋmɩnɛ sɩn ɩ?
Fʋ̃ʋ bʋɔrɔ fʋ tu a lɛ sɩn na 'yɛr. Dɔɔr anaar ben ka a sɩ sɛ̃ na ba põl 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ.
De a nɩbɛ banyãna na fʋ pʋɔ ba, a yɩ tɩ pɔl a fʋ yab a ba jur põfʋ sãma. Ka nɩrɛ jaa na pãa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a lɛ ban man 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ ba ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ mɩ turo naa a nɛbinãa.
Tɩchɛ a nɩyor bala na sɔɔ de, sɩ sɛb gãn kʋ ba a lɛ sɩn 'yɛr ɩka, ba taa dire tɩbɛ bomo ɛ, bɩɩ ɔɔrɔ jɩ̃ɩ ɛ, bɩɩ 'wɔb dʋɔ na var kpi ɛ, na ba taa sɛ̃nɛ ɛ."

Wɛr na wa chaar, Pɔɔl den a dɔɔr anaar bala ka ba 'mataa tɩ pɔl a ba mɩ̃ɛ. Tɩ na wʋ pãa chen be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir na tɩ 'yɛr a bɩbie ala a ba pɔlfʋ na baar nɩ a bɔɔrlo bomo ala a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na ir.
A lɛ a ber ayopõi na wa gbʋrɔ a baarfʋ, a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a Asɩya paal pɔ nyɛn a Pɔɔl a be Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir, na ba dam a nɩyɔɔ bala a ba nyɔɔ wʋ.

Ba gboolo naa, "Isɩral nɩbɛ woɩ, yɩ wa sʋ̃ʋ sɩ yooo. A daba lɛ anyãna na wile a nɩbɛ jie jaa ka ba kpɛrɛ a sɩ nɩbɛ nɩ a nɛbinãa lɔ̃ɔn a jie nyãna. Lɛ tɛɛ gba ba lɛ ɛ, wʋ tara na a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, kpɛ̃n ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir na wʋ sɔ̃ɔ a jivɩla nyãna."
Ba dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ a Torofimusɩ na yi a Efesus nɩ a Pɔɔl a ba tɩɛr man tãa a Pɔɔl tara wʋn kpɛ̃n be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir.
A tẽdaa wʋ jaa kab, ka a nɩbɛ yire a tẽe wʋ jaa joro waara na ba wa nyɔɔ a Pɔɔl. Ba nyɔɔ wʋn a lɛ tɔɔ yin a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir jie tɩ pɔɔ a pãma ajienaa.
Ka ba ta bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba kʋ a Pɔɔl ka a yele tɩ ta a Worom sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɩka a Jerusalɛm wʋ jaa dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa.
A wʋ vaa ir a lɛ na wʋ tara a nɩbɛrɛ bamɩne nɩ a sojasɩ na wʋ suu chiin be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ. Lɛ ban wa nyɛ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a wʋ sojasɩ a ba bar a Pɔɔl ŋmefʋ.
Lɛ a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na wa ta wʋ tɩ nyɔɔn a Pɔɔl na wʋ vɛ̃ ka ba gbãr wʋ nɩ bɔ̃jɔrsɩ ayi. Tɩ pãa sʋʋr ɩka nɩ ana lɛ, nɩ bo lɛ wʋ maal.
Bamɩne na be a nɩyɔɔ bala pɔ 'yɛrɛ na turo nɩ jiyuo ka bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ turo nɩ jiyuo a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na ba nyɛ a yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ, a gɔ̃mɔ̃ jũu, wʋ vɛ̃n ka ba tara a Pɔɔl gʋɔr be a sojasɩ kpɛfʋ jie.
Lɛ a Pɔɔl na wa ta a dofʋ jie a nɩbɛ pir pirfʋ jaa waa naa ka a sojasɩ 'mɔɔ a Pɔɔl.
Ka a nɩyɔɔ bala na turo tãna 'yɛrɛ, "Yɩ kʋ wʋ."
Lɛ a sojasɩ na wa ɩka ba kpɛ̃n a Pɔɔl a be a ba kpɛfʋ jie wʋ sʋɔr naa a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɩka, "N 'yɛr 'yɛr kɔ̃ɔ kʋ fʋ bɩɩ?" Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sʋʋr wʋ, "Fʋn tʋ̃ɔn 'yɛr a Greek kɔkɔr bɩɩ?
A ba ɩ fʋ̃ʋ lɛ a Ijipitɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ ŋmaa a jɛɛr na fʋ tɔɔ dɔɔr turo anaar (4,000) kpɛ̃n be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ ɛ?"
Ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, "N ɩ naa Juu nɩrɛ naa yi a Tasusɩ na be a Sɩlɩsɩya paal pɔ, naa yi a tẽe nyãna pɔ nɩrɛ jaa na bɔ̃ɔn, yãayãabɩlɛ sɔɔ ka n 'yɛr 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ."
A sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kʋn a Pɔɔl sɔr, ka a wʋ ir ara a dofʋ jie, na wʋ wɩlwɩl a nɩyɔɔ bala a nuur ka ba bar gɔ̃mɔ̃. A lɛ ban wa ŋmaa a vʋʋr wʋ den a ba Juu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr na 'yɛrɛ nɩ.
"N yɛɛr nɩ n sãamɩne yɩ chɛlɛ a n 'yɛr ɩn 'yɛrɛ a pʋ̃pãanyã."
A lɛ ban wa wõ wʋn 'yɛrɛ nɩ a ba mɩ̃ɛ Juu nɩbɛ kɔkɔr ka ba jaa ŋma vʋrɔ, tɩ a Pɔɔl pãa 'yɛrɛ,

"Maa ɩn Juu nɩrɛ ka ba dɔɔ ma a Tasusɩ na be a Sɩlɩsɩya paal pɔ, tɩchɛ a kana a Jerusalɛm lɛ ba guol ma. A wiwile Gamaliel pĩlem lɛ n jɩ̃nɛ ka wʋ wiil ma a nɛɛr ala a sɩ sãakpãmɩne na dɔ̃ɔ turo ka n mɩ turo a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a n nyãa wʋ jaa, nɩtãa a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na be turo a dɩna.
N gen a nɩbɛ bala na turo a Sɔr nyãna naa kʋ, n nyɔɔr dɔɔr nɩ pɔbɔ jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ.
A bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ na tʋ̃ɔn di ma dãasɩɛ, ba sɛ̃ lɛ n de gãma na chiin a ba yɛɛr sɛ̃ be a Damaskus, n chen ɩka n tɩ nyɔɔr a nɩbɛ banyãna waan a Jerusalɛm ka ba kpãa ba.
"Mɔ̃tɔ̃tuo sɔ̃ɔ lɛ n chiine tɩ gbʋrɔ a Damaskus, ajienaa ka ɩ chãa yin be a saaju na wʋ wa chaar jilʋ̃ ma.
Ka a n tɔ̃ɔ lo a tẽe a lɛ nɛ tɩ naa wõ kɔkɔr na sʋrɔ ma, 'Sɔɔl, Sɔɔl, bo lɛ fʋ gere ma a lɛ?'
Ka n sʋʋr, 'Soro, an lɛ fʋ ɩ?' Ka a kɔkɔr 'yɛr, 'Maa lɛ a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ a 'lɔ fʋn gere.'
A maa nɩ a bala na lɔ̃ɔ chiine ba nyɛn a chãa, tɩchɛ baa bɔ̃ɔ a nɩnyɩnɛ kɔkɔr lɛ wʋn 'yɛrɛ nɩ ma par ɛ.
Ka n sʋʋr, 'Soro, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ɩn ɩ?' Ka a Soro 'yɛr, 'Ir na fʋ kpɛ be a Damaskus tẽe pɔ, be lɛ ban tɩ man fʋ a lɛ ɩn bʋɔrɔ ɩka fʋ ɩ.'
Ka n lɔ̃ɔturbo bala nyɔɔ ma a nũu tɔɔ kpɛ̃n be a Damaskus tẽe pɔ, bojũu a chãa 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na chaar 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a lɛ nɛ n ba lɛ nyɛrɛ ɛ.
"Daba kɔ̃ɔ yuor na di Ananias wan ɩka wʋ wa nyɛ ma, wʋ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn puoro na wʋ turo a nɛbinãa ka a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa na kpɩɛrɛ a be 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʋ.
Wʋ wa ara na gbɛb ma tɩ 'yɛr, 'N yɛbɛ Sɔɔl, lɛ nyɛrɛ,' ka a ɩ ajienaa ka a ɩ n nyɛ wʋ naa.
Be lɛ wʋ pãa 'yɛr kʋ ma, 'A sɩ sãakpãmɩne Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ir fʋ ɩka fʋ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ, na fʋ lɛ nyɛ a chɛchɛ sʋɔ 'lɔ, na fʋ wõ a 'yɛr bie yi a wʋ nɛɛ pɔ.
Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ na ɩ a dãasɩɛ sʋɔ na fʋ kʋ a nɩbɛ ba jaa, a ala fʋn nyɛ, nɩ a ala fʋn wõ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, bo lɛ fʋ lɛ chɛlɛ go? Ir a ba so fʋ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, ka a na pɛɛ a fʋ yeldɛbɛ bar a fʋ bʋɔlɔ a sɩ Soro yuor.'
"A lɛ ɩn lɩɛb wa a Jerusalɛm naa tɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn be a puorfʋ yir, ka a wa kaara ma jãna kaar.
Ka n nyɛ a sɩ Soro na 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr kʋrɔ ma. Wʋ 'yɛr naa, 'Pɔɔ fɔɔ na fʋ yi ka a Jerusalɛm ajienaa, bojũu nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ sɔɔ a lɛ fʋn na 'yɛr a n 'yɛr ɛ.'
Ka n 'yɛr sɔɔ wʋ, 'N Soro a nɩbɛ banyãna bɔ̃ɔn naa a lɛ ɩn yʋɔrɔ a lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir naa nyɔɔrɔ ba pɔɔrɔ tɩ ŋmiere a bala na sɔɔ de fʋ.
A daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ban kʋrɔ a fʋ dãasɩ dire Sɩteven maa nɩ bala jaa ɩn nɛbʋ̃'yen ka n kaara a ba fuusɩ tɩ ba kʋ wʋ.'
Ka a sɩ Soro pãa 'yɛr kʋ ma, 'Chen, ɩn tʋ̃ fʋn tɛɛr jaa be a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ.' "
A nɩyɔɔ bala chɛlɛ naa lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛrɛ wa tãn a jie wʋn 'yɛr a nɩyor pɔ chenfʋ 'yɛr, a ba pãa tãna 'yɛrɛ, "Yɩ ŋmaa wʋ ju, a ba sɛɛ ɩka wʋ lɛ chɛnɛ vʋrɔ ɛ."
Lɛ lɛ ba pɔɔrɔ a gɔ̃mɔ̃ tɩ lɔɔrɔ a ba fɔɔr ɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a tãna lɔɔrɔ a saaju.
Ka a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ vɛ̃ ka ba tara a Pɔɔl kpɛ̃n be a sojasɩ yir. Wʋ 'yɛr ɩka ba fɔb a Pɔɔl a wʋ wiil ba bãa lɛ so a nɩbɛ pɔɔrɔ a gɔ̃mɔ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʋ a lɛ.
A lɛ ban lũ a Pɔɔl ɩka ba fɔb, ka wʋ sʋʋr a sojasɩ nɩdier na ara a be, "A tara na sɔr ka yɩn fɔb a Worom nɩrɛ na yaa sʋʋr kaa a yelnyɩnɛ wʋn ɩ ɛ?"
Lɛ a sojasɩ nɩdier na wa wõ a nɩtɔ̃ wʋ chen a ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ fʋn ɩ? A daba nyã ɩn Worom nɩrɛ."
Ka a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ chen a Pɔɔl sɛ̃ tɩ sʋʋr wʋ, "'Yɛr kʋ ma, Worom nɩrɛ lɛ fʋ ɩ ɔ?" Ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr ɩka, "Ɔ̃ɔ."
A sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ pãa 'yɛr, "Maa 'lɔ, libiyɔɔ lɛ n yab tɩ jɩ̃nɛ a ka." Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, "Maa 'lɔ, ka lɛ ba dɔɔ ma."
Ka a bala na ara gu a wʋ fɔbfʋ mɩ tɔɔ yaar ajienaa. Dãbɩ̃ɛ mɩ kpɛ̃n a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a lɛ wʋn wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Pɔɔl ɩn Worom nɩrɛ tɩchɛ ka wʋ vɛ̃ a ba lũ wʋ.

A wɛr na wa chaar, a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ bɔ̃ɔ bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ ba bara a Pɔɔl ɛ. Wʋ for wʋn bar tɩ bʋɔl a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ nɩbɛrɛ ka ba jaa lɔ̃ɔ taa. Tɩ wʋ pãa suu waan a Pɔɔl a wʋ wa ara a ba niem.
Pɔɔl kãan a nɩbɛrɛ a lɛ a dẽdẽe tɩ 'yɛr, "N yɛɛr, n tʋ̃n a lɛ na sɛɛ kʋ Nãaŋmɩn wa ta a dɩna tɩ n nyãa ba dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ."
A anyãna wʋn 'yɛr ka a Ananias na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr kʋ a bala na ara gbʋr a Pɔɔl ɩka ba 'ma wʋ a nɛɛ pɔ.
Ka a Pɔɔl pãa 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Nãaŋmɩn na 'ma fʋ naa a fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a tãpɩɛl dachin nyã. Fʋ jɛ̃n a be ɩka fʋ tɔɔr a n 'yɛr a lɛ a nɛɛ na bin tɩ na fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ lɛ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nɛɛ, na fʋ 'yɛr ɩka ba 'ma ma."
A bala na ara gbʋr a Pɔɔl 'yɛr kʋ, "Aa! Bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ fʋ tʋrɔ ɔ?"
Ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, "Yɛɛr n ba bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ wʋ ɩ ɛ, bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, 'Taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʋ nɩbɛ nɩdier ɛ.' "

Pɔɔl na wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Saduseemɩne jɛr naa Faraseemɩne pɔ ka wʋ tãn kpɛ̃ɔ jaa be a nɩbɛrɛ pɔ na wʋ 'yɛr, "N yɛɛr, Farasee lɛ n ɩ, ka a Farasee nɩrɛ dɔɔ ma. N ara naa kana a ban tɔɔr a n 'yɛr, bojũu n sɔɔ naa ɩka kũu pɔ irfʋ ben be."
A lɛ wʋn wa 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ ka a nɛchɩrɛ lo a Faraseemɩne nɩ a Saduseemɩne chara pɔ, ka a lɔ̃ɔfʋ ŋma jiir ayi.
Saduseemɩne 'yɛr ɩka kũu pɔ irfʋ ba be be ɛ, malakasɩ nɩ a nɩsɩɩr mɩ ba be be ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a Faraseemɩne 'lɔ sɔɔn ɩka a jaa ben be.

A gɔ̃mɔ̃ pɔɔfʋ tɩ gar naa ka a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wiwiilbe bamɩne na ɩ a Faraseemɩne ir ara tɩ chɩɩr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa ɩka, "Sɩn 'lɔ ba nyɛ a daba nyã chɛfʋ jie ɛ, tɩ ala wa ɩ sɩɛ kɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ malaka lɛ 'yɛr 'yɛr kʋ wʋ?"
A nɛchɩrɛ wa tɩ gar naa, ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a wʋ man tãa ban wa tɔɔr a Pɔɔl 'mɛl, ala lɛ so ka wʋ vɛ̃ a sojasɩ suu tɩ faa a Pɔɔl don be a sojasɩ yir.
A tɩ̃sɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, a sɩ Soro wa ara na gbʋr a Pɔɔl tɩ 'yɛr, "Nyɔɔ nyãa, a lɛ fʋn man a n yelmɩ̃ɛ a ka a Jerusalɛm mɩ tɩ man a lɛ nɛ a be a Worom tẽe pɔ."
Wɛr na wa chaar bibio, a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne jɛ̃n guor taa na ba pɔ'yɔ̃ɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛrɛ ɩka ba kʋ̃ di bon jaa ɛ, bɩɩ nyũ bon jaa ɛ, ka bala baa kʋ a Pɔɔl ɛ.
Ba gar dɔɔr lɩjaayi na guor a guorfʋ nyãna.
Ba chen a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃, na ba tɩ 'yɛr, "Sɩ bin nɛɛ ɩka sɩ kʋ̃ di bon jaa ɛ, ka sɩn baa kʋ a Pɔɔl baar ɛ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, yɩn nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ nɩbɛrɛ yɩ tʋ̃ 'yɛr a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a wʋ waan a Pɔɔl a yɩ sʋʋr yele kɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par. Sɩn na var gu be a sɔr pɔ kʋ wʋ ka waa ta a be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ."
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl arbile wõ a guorfʋ nyã na wʋ chen be a sojasɩ yir na wʋ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a Pɔɔl.
Ka a Pɔɔl bʋɔl a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na wʋ 'yɛr, "Tara a pɔlbile nyãna chiin a yɩ jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ wʋ tara na 'yɛr na 'yɛr kʋ wʋ."
Lɛ lɛ wʋ tara a pɔlbile chiin a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ na wʋ tɩ 'yɛr, "A Pɔɔl na be a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ lɛ tʋ̃ bʋɔl ma na wʋ 'yɛr ɩka n tara a pɔlbile nyãna waan a fʋ sɛ̃, ka wʋ tara na 'yɛr na 'yɛr kʋ fʋ."
Ka a sojasɩ ba jaa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyɔɔ a pɔlbile nũu tɔɔ yin chɛ̃chɛ̃ɛ tɩ sʋʋr wʋ, "Baa lɛ fʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka fʋ 'yɛr kʋ ma?"
A wʋ 'yɛr, "A Juu nɩbɛ guor taa na ban sʋɔr fʋ ka fʋn waan a Pɔɔl a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ sɛ̃ a bio ka a kaara fɩka ba bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka ba sʋʋr wʋ yele kɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par.
Ta sɔɔ ɛ, bojũu ba gar nɩbɛ lɩjaayi na var gu wʋ, ba pɔn 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ ɩka ba kʋ̃ di bon ɛ, bɩɩ nyũ bon jaa ɛ, ka bala ba kʋ wʋ ɛ. Bala ben chɔɔr baar a pʋ̃pãanyã tɩ chɛlɛ a fʋ nɛɛ."
Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ bar a pɔlbile sɔr tɩ kpãa wʋ 'yɛr, "Taa ɩrɛ wa vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka fʋ wan a n sɛ̃ ɛ."

Tɩ pãa bʋɔl a wʋ nɩbɛrɛ ayi na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ chɔɔr sojasɩ kɔɔr ayi (200) na yɩ lɛ chɔɔr a sojasɩ lɩjaata nɩ pie (70) na bɔ̃ɔ wiisɩ dofʋ, nɩ sojasɩ kɔɔr ayi (200) mɩ na bɔ̃ɔ a pɩ̃ɩ woor ala lɔbfʋ ka yɩ chen a Sisariya a tɩ̃sɔɔ nyãna.
Yɩ bɔ a wii ɩ̃sʋɔ kʋ a Pɔɔl a wʋ do jɩ̃nɛ a yɩ chiin wʋ vɩla tɩ kʋ a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Feliksɩ."
A gãn wʋn sɛb 'lɔ nɩ nyã,
"Maa Kɩlaudiyus Lisiyasɩ lɛ sɛɛrɛ a gãn nyãna kʋrɔ a fʋ̃ʋ Feliksɩ a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ naa, n puor fʋ naa.
A daba nyãna lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ nyɔɔ na ba ta ɩka ba kʋ, tɩchɛ ɩn wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Worom nɩrɛ lɛ wʋ ɩ, n chiin naa a n sojasɩ tɩ faan wʋ.
N ta bʋɔrɔ na ɩka n bɔ̃ɔ a yele 'lɔ jũu ban ba bara wʋ ɛ, naa de wʋ chiin be a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ nɩbɛrɛ sɛ̃.
Naa tɩ nyɛ ka ɩ a yele ɩ naa a ba nɛbinãa yele lɛ. Tɩchɛ saa lɛ nyɛ yele jaa wʋn maal na wʋ sɛɛn kũu bɩɩ die pɔ pɔɔfʋ ɛ.
Lɛ ban wa man kʋ ma ban guoro a daba nyã yele, ala lɛ so ka n vɛ̃ ka ba tara wʋ a fɔɔ a lɛ nɛ waan a fʋ sɛ̃. N mɩ 'yɛr kʋ a bala na tuoro wʋ a yele ɩka ba wa a fʋ sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr a fʋ mɩ kaa."
A sojasɩ tun a lɛ a ba nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na 'yɛr na ba de a Pɔɔl a tɩ̃sɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa na ba tɩ tãn Antɩpatɩrsɩ tẽe pɔ.
Wɛr na wa chaar, ba vɛ̃n ka a wiir dẽme tara a Pɔɔl chiine, tɩchɛ ka a gbɛɛ dẽme lɩɛb wa a sojasɩ yir.
Lɛ ban tɩ ta a Sisariya tẽe pɔ ba den a gãn na ba kʋ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ tɩ de a Pɔɔl mɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ nũu pɔ.
Ka a paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kar a gãn tɩ na wʋ sʋʋr a Pɔɔl a tẽbuor wʋn yi, wʋn wa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Sɩlɩsɩya lɛ wʋ yi.
Ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛr, "A bala na tuo fʋ a yele wa ta ala lɛ ɩn wõ a fʋ 'yɛr." Wʋ vɛ̃n ka ba tara a Pɔɔl kpɛ̃n be a yir kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ pɔ a Nãa Hɛrɔd na dɔ̃ɔ mɛ tɩ guro wʋ.
A ber anũu puor lɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Ananias suun chen be a Sisariya nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ bamɩne, ka a Tɛtulusɩ na ɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ pʋɔ ba a ba 'mataa chen na tɩ 'yɛr a Pɔɔl 'yɛr a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ niem.
Ban bʋɔl a Pɔɔl kpɛ̃n ka a Tɛtulusɩ na man a wʋ yele kʋ a Feliksɩ na wʋ 'yɛrɛ, "Sɩ din nʋ̃ɔ kor a fʋ jũu, ka a fʋ yɛ̃ lɩɛr yelvɩɛlsɩ kʋ a fʋ paal.
Jie jaa nɩ sɔr jaa pɔ fʋ ɩn nɩkpɛ̃vɩla, a sɩ sɔɔ de fʋ nɩ nuur ayi nɩ pʋpɛl.
Tɩchɛ n ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka n dam fʋ yɔɔ ɛ, yelbʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ n bʋɔrɔ ɩka n sʋɔr jaa bɩ̃lãa ka fʋ di kãnyir kʋ sɩ.
Sɩ nyɛn a daba nyãna ka wʋ ɩ gɔ̃bʋɔrɔ, a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa lɛ wʋ ma tɔ a ba jur gbõtaa a wɛr wʋ jaa, na wʋ ɩ a nɩbɛ bala na turo a Najaretɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ nɩdiere.
Na wʋ bʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir sɔ̃ɔ barfʋ, ala lɛ so ka sɩ nyɔɔ wʋ.
Fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ fʋ sʋʋr wʋ kaa fʋn nyɛn bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a ala sɩn 'yɛrɛ dɔɔlɔ wʋ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ."
Ka a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa na be be 'yɛr ɩka a lɛ a Tɛtulusɩ na 'yɛr ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ.
A paal nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kʋn a Pɔɔl sɔr a wʋ 'yɛr, ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, "N bɔ̃ɔn naa an ɩ yuom yɔɔ lɛ fʋ kaa a paal nyãna, a nʋ̃mɔ̃ ma naa ka n na 'yɛr a n 'yɛr.
Fʋ̃ʋ sʋʋr ban 'yɛr ɩka a ba gar ber pie nɩ ayi ɩn chen be a Jerusalɛm ɩka n tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn ɛ.
Ba ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba nyɛ ma ka n chɩrɛ nɩ nɩrɛ jaa be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir ɛ, bɩɩ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩyɔɔ be a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir ɛ, bɩɩ a tẽe pɔ jie jaa ɛ.
A anyãna ban 'yɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ wiil ma a yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ.

Tɩchɛ n sɔɔ naa ɩka n puoro naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne na dɔ̃ɔ puoro naa lɛ turo a Sɔr 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a sɔr yuo. N sɔɔn de a ala a jaa, na a sɔɔ lɛ a nɛɛ na sɔɔ nɩ a ala a jaa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb.
N mɩ tara naa a tɩɛrtɔ bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩtãa a ba kaar ɩka nɩsʋ̃n nɩ a putudẽme na ir ɩ vʋɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka n mʋɔrɔ sɔ̃ɔ jaa ɩka a n pʋtɩɛr wʋ chaar Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a nɩrɛ niem.
"N yin kor, tɩ naa lɛ lɩɛb wa a Jerusalɛm nɩ libie ɩka n wa kʋ a nɔ̃n dẽme tɩ naa mɩ lo bɔɔr kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn.
N dɔ̃ɔ pɔl a n mɩ̃ɛ baar a lɛ ban nyɛ ma a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ. Nɩyɔɔ ba dɔ̃ɔ pʋɔ ma ɛ, n mɩ ba dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ damfʋ jaa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a Asɩya paal pɔ wa, bala mɩ lɛ a ta sɛɛ ɩka ba be ka na ba 'yɛr a n 'yɛr.
Bɩɩ a banyãna na be ka a ba wiil a yelnyɩnɛ ban nyɛ ɩn maal, a lɛ ɩn ara a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ niem.
Ala ba ɩ a 'yɛr bir bʋ̃'yen nyãna tɛɛ ɩn 'yɛr kpɛ̃ɔ jaa a lɛ ɩn ara a ba niem naa 'yɛr, 'A kũn na ir ɩ vʋɛ, naa be ara a yɩ niem a yɩn tɔɔr a n 'yɛr a dɩna.' "
A Feliksɩ na wa pãa bɔ̃ɔn a Sɔr yele wʋ wɛl a nɩbɛ bar tɩ 'yɛr, "A Lisiyasɩ na ɩ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ wa wa ala lɛ ɩn 'yɛr a fʋ 'yɛr."
Wʋ den a Pɔɔl kʋ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ tɩ 'yɛr ɩka a wʋ ma kʋ wʋ sɔr tɩ sɔɔ ka a Pɔɔl barmɩne ma sʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ nɩ a wʋ bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ.
A maal ber aŋmɩnɛ jaa tɩchɛ ka a Feliksɩ tara a wʋ pɔɔ Durusila na ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ waan. Wʋ tʋ̃n ka ba waan a Pɔɔl a wʋ chɛlɛ a lɛ wʋn mana a lɛ fʋn na sɔɔ de a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
Pɔɔl 'yɛr naa a lɛ nɛ wa pʋr yeltorsɩ yuor nɩ mɩ̃ɛ nyɔɔfʋ nɩ lɛ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ na waara. Ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a Feliksɩ a wʋ 'yɛr, "Pʋ̃pãanyã a sɛɛn lɛ, chiine maa wa tara jaa ɩn tʋ̃n bʋɔl fʋ."
Wʋ tɩɛr man taa Pɔɔl na kʋ wʋn libie, na wʋ ma bʋɔlɔ a Pɔɔl jaa tɔ̃tɔ̃ ma 'yɛrɛ nɩ wʋ.
Yuom ayi na wa po Pɔsɩyusɩ Festus den a Feliksɩ jie, tɩchɛ a Feliksɩ na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ pɛl a Juu nɩbɛ pʋɔ jũu, wʋ bar a Pɔɔl a be a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ.
Festus na de a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ maal ber ata wʋ yin be a Sisariya chen a Jerusalɛm.
Be lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a ba nɩdierbe man a 'yɛr ala ban tara nɩ, a Pɔɔl kʋ wʋ.
Ba sʋɔr a Festus nɩbijɩɛ jaa ɩka a lɛ ban sʋɔrɔ wʋ a wʋ sɔɔ na wʋ vɛ̃ a ba tara a Pɔɔl waan be a Jerusalɛm an ɩ ba chɔɔr ũu gu na kʋ a Pɔɔl a be a sɔr pɔ.
Ka a Festus 'yɛr, "A Pɔɔl ben a be a Sisariya a maa mɩ̃ɛ a kʋ̃ kor ɛ, tɩchɛ ka n chen a be.
Yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ nɩbɛrɛ bamɩne pʋɔ ma a sɩ 'mataa chen, ala ɩ wʋ maal yeldɛɛr a yɩ 'yɛr n kaa."
Wʋn wa maal a be ber aniin bɩɩ pie wʋ chen a Sisariya, wʋn tɩ gã ir wʋ jɩ̃nɛ naa a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr ɩka ba waan a Pɔɔl.
Ban wa waan a Pɔɔl a Juu nɩbɛ bala na yi a Jerusalɛm wa ara na jilʋ̃ wʋ ŋmara jir kara dɔɔlɔ wʋ tɩchɛ ba maa tʋ̃ɔ wiil a par ɛ.
A Pɔɔl pãa 'yɛr, "Maa ba maal dɛɛr jaa ɛ, naa sɔ̃ɔ a Juu nɩbɛ nɛbinãa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir ɛ, bɩɩ 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa ɛ."
Festus bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ pɛl a Juu nɩbɛ pʋɔ na wʋ sʋʋr a Pɔɔl, "Fʋ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka fʋ do a Jerusalɛm ka a 'yɛr anyãna ban 'yɛr dɔɔl fʋ ka n tɩ tɔɔr a be bɩɩ?"
A Pɔɔl 'yɛr, "Pʋ̃pãanyã, n ben ara a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie a be an sɛɛ ɩka ba tɔɔr a n 'yɛr. N mɩ ba maal yeldɛɛr jaa a Juu nɩbɛ sɛ̃ ɛ, a lɛ a fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ na bɔ̃ɔn.

Maa ta maal dɛɛr naa sɛɛn kũu n kʋ̃ naa tɔr ɩka n kpi ɛ. Tɩchɛ a 'yɛr anyãna a Juu nɩbɛ na 'yɛr dɔɔl ma na ba ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa ba tara sɔr na fɩr ma kʋ ba ɛ. Siisa sɛ̃ lɛ ɩn chen ka wʋ tɩ tɔɔr a n 'yɛr."
Lɛ a Festus nɩ a wʋ nɩbɛrɛ na wa man taa baar wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a Pɔɔl, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ sʋɔr ɩka a Siisa sɛ̃ lɛ fʋn chen, be lɛ fʋn chen."
A kor bɩ̃lãa ka a Nãa Agripa nɩ a wʋ yɛpɔɔ Bernisɩ wa be a Sisariya ɩka ba wa puor a Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Festus.
An ɩ ban jɛ̃n a be kor jũu, Festus mana naa a Pɔɔl yele kʋrɔ a Nãa Agripa 'yɛrɛ, "Daba kɔ̃ɔ lɛ be a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ a Feliksɩ na pɔɔ.
A lɛ ɩn chen a Jerusalɛm, a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a ba nɩdierbe den yelyɔɔ dɔɔl wʋ na ba sʋɔr ma ɩka n tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr ge wʋ.
"Ka n 'yɛr kʋ ba a Worom nɩbɛ maa tɔɔr nɩrɛ 'yɛr ala ɩ a nɩnyɩnɛ ban 'yɛr a 'yɛr dɔɔl ba wa ara a bala na tara nɩ wʋ a 'yɛr niem na wʋ 'yɛr a wʋ nɛɛ 'yɛr ɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka ba pɔɔ ma a sɩ 'mataa wa a ka, n ba wa jɛ̃n a 'yɛr ɛ, a wɛr na wa chaar n jɛ̃ naa na tɔɔr a 'yɛr naa vɛ̃ ka ba waan a daba.
A bala na tara nɩ wʋ a 'yɛr na wa ir ara na 'yɛr, baa 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa na ɩ dɛɛr nɩtãa lɛ ɩn tɩɛr ban taa 'yɛr ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a ba 'yɛr tɩ ɩ naa a ba puorfʋ yele lɛ nɩ daba kɔ̃ɔ na di Yesu na kpi ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr ɩka wʋ ir naa na wʋ ɩ vʋr.
Ka a yele nyã sɔb ma nɩbir, n ba bɔ̃ɔ ŋmɩnɛ ɩn na ɩ vɩɛr a yele nyã ɛ, ala lɛ so ka n sʋʋr wʋ ala ɩ wʋn bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ chen a Jerusalɛm ka ba tɩ tɔɔr a 'yɛr anyãna a be.
Pɔɔl 'lɔ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa wʋ tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr, n vɛ̃n a ba tara wʋ tɩ tãn a lɛ ɩn na bar sɔr ka ba tara wʋ chiin a Siisa sɛ̃."
Ka a Nãa Agripa pãa 'yɛr kʋ a Festus, "Maa mɩ̃ɛ naa bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n wõ a daba mɩ kɔkɔr." Ka a Festus 'yɛr, "Bio fʋn wõn a wʋ kɔkɔr."

A wɛr na wa chaar, a Nãa Agripa nɩ a Bernisɩ wa naa ka a nɩbɛ de 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋ ba ka ba tɩ kpɛ̃n be a dikpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ pɔ ban ma lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a sojasɩ nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a tẽe nɩbɛrɛ. Ka a Festus vɛ̃ a sojasɩ tara a Pɔɔl waan.

Ka a Festus 'yɛr, "Nãa Agripa nɩ a yɩn bala jaa na be ka a sɩ sɛ̃, yɩ nyɛ a daba nyãna, a Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa 'yɛr a wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ma be a Jerusalɛm nɩ a ka a Sisariya tãna 'yɛrɛ ɩka a ba sɛɛ ka wʋ lɛ chɛnɛ go ɛ.
N mɩ ba nyɛ yele jaa wʋn ɩ ka a tara sɔr ka sɩn kʋ wʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ bojũu wʋ sʋɔr sɔr ɩka wʋ chen a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa sɛ̃, n mɩ na bar wʋn sɔr ka wʋ chen a Worom.
Tɩchɛ n ba tara a wʋ yele ala na sɛɛ ka n na sɛb kʋ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ ɛ. A lɛ jũu n waan wʋ naa a yɩ jaa niem nɩ a fʋ̃ʋ Nãa Agripa niem a fʋ mɩ jʋʋr a wʋ yele kaa, ka n bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ɩn na sɛb.
Bojũu, a ba sɛɛn ma ɛ, ka n na vɛ̃ ka ba tara nɩrɛ ban pɔɔ chiine naa ba wiil a yelnyɩnɛ wʋn maal ɛ."
Kaa Agripa pãa 'yɛr kʋ a Pɔɔl, "Fʋ tara na sɔr na 'yɛr a fʋ nɛɛ 'yɛr." Pɔɔl tur naa a nũu tɩ piel mana a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yele,
"Nãa Agripa, a ɩ man bɔɔsʋ̃n ɩn ara a fʋ niem a dɩna naa na man a n yele ala a jaa a Juu nɩbɛ na 'yɛr dɔɔl ma.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ, a fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa a Juu nɩbɛ yelbinsɩ a jaa nɩ a ba nɛchɩrɛ, a lɛ jũu n sʋɔr fʋ naa ka fʋ di kãnyir chɛlɛ ma.
"A Juu nɩbɛ ba jaa bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ ɩn be a bibile daar jaa, a maa paal pɔ nɩ a ka a Jerusalɛm mɩ.
Ba bɔ̃ɔ man kor na ban tʋ̃ɔ di a lɛ dãasɩɛ ala ɩ ba bʋɔrɔ naa. Ba bɔ̃ɔn ma naa ɩn turo yele jaa nɛ nɛ nɛ a sɩ puorfʋ pɔ, naa ɩ a Farasee nɩrɛ.
A pʋ̃pãanyã a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne ka n tara a tɩɛr jũu lɛ so ka n 'yɛr be tɔɔrɔ a dɩna.
A nɛ tɩra anyãna jũu lɛ a sɩn bʋrɔ pie nɩ ayi ɩ a sɩ tɩɛrtɔ fʋ jie, ka a na wa ɩ a sɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir puoro a Nãaŋmɩn mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ. A fʋ̃ʋ nãa a tɩɛrtɔ nyãna jũu, a Juu nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma a 'yɛr.
Bo lɛ so ka yɩ tɩɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ sɩ̃ɩ kũu ɛ?
"A maa mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ŋme nyãa naa ɩka ɩn ɩ naa lɛ jaa ɩn na tʋ̃ɔ naa sɔ̃ɔ a Yesu na yi a Najaretɩ yuor.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ n ɩ be a Jerusalɛm. A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ kʋ man sɔr ka n nyɔɔr a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo yɔɔ naa pɔɔ, bala wa kʋrɔ ba n ma sɔɔ naa.
Sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ jaa, n ma chen a be a ba lɔ̃ɔfʋ jiir naa tɩ ge ge ba, naa ma fɩrɛ ba 'yɛr 'yɛr dɛbɛ tɩchɛ a maa tʋ̃ɔ ɩ a lɛ ɛ. A lɛ a ba yele na dire ma a suur n ma chen a wɛr yuo pɔ tɩ ge ba a be.
"Ala jũu lɛ a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ dɔ̃ɔ kʋ ma a sɔr ka n chiine a Damaskus.
Mɔ̃tɔ̃tuo sɔ̃ɔ lɛ fʋ̃ʋ nãa, a lɛ ɩn be a sɔr pɔ, n nyɛn chãa na yi saaju chaar mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na wʋ jilʋ̃ ma nɩ a bala ɩn lɔ̃ɔ chiine.
Sɩ jaa lon tẽe tɩchɛ ka n wõ nɩrɛ na sʋrɔ ma nɩ a Heburu kɔkɔr, 'Sɔɔl, Sɔɔl bo lɛ fʋ gere ma a lɛ? Fʋ wõn tuo fʋn tɛb a dakʋra.'
Be lɛ n pãa sʋʋr, 'Fʋ̃ʋ nɩ ana, Soro?' A wʋ 'yɛr, 'Maa lɛ a Yesu 'lɔ fʋn gere.
Pʋ̃pãanyã ir ara, n yi fʋ naa, naa ir fʋ a fʋn ɩ a n tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ na fʋ mʋɔlɔ a ala fʋn nyɛ a dɩna nɩ a ala ɩn na wiil fʋ.
Ɩn faa fʋ naa a fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩbɛ nuur pɔ, nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nuur pɔ. Maa lɛ tʋ̃nɔ̃ fʋ,
tɩ yuo a ba nɩbie na fʋ tɔɔ ba yin a libe pɔ, waan a chãa pɔ, na fʋ yin a Satan kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ, waan a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, a wʋ vɛ̃ a ba yelbier kʋ ba ka ba mɩ nyɛ jie nɩ a bala na sɔɔ de ma, ka n faa ba.'
"A lɛ jũu, Nãa Agripa, n ba tɔr a nyɛfʋ nyã na yi a saaju ɛ.

N den nie man kʋ a Damaskus dẽme, nɩ a Jerusalɛm dẽme, nɩ a Judiya wɛr wʋ jaa, nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ. N mʋɔl kʋ ba ɩka ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr, na ba lɩɛb wa Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, na ba vɛ̃ ka ba tʋ̃mɔ̃ wiil ɩka ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr.
Ala lɛ so a Juu nɩbɛ nyɔɔ ma a ba puorfʋ yir bɛchaar pɔ bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba kʋ ma.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ sʋ̃ʋ ma wa tãn a dɩna, ka n be ara na man kʋ nɩrɛ jaa. N ba 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa tɩ põn a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ na 'yɛr ɩka an ɩ naa ɛ,
ɩka a Nɩ-iraa na din dɔɔyɛ na wʋ mɩ ɩ nɩrɛ na de nie ir a kũu pɔ, na wʋ man a chãa 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ."
Kana lɛ a Pɔɔl ta ka a Festus kpɛ tãn wʋ tɩ 'yɛr, "Pɔɔl a tɩɛr bɔr fʋ naa, a jãn yɔɔ vɛ̃n ka fʋ gele."
Ka a Pɔɔl 'yɛr, "Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ Festus n ba gele ɛ, ala ɩn 'yɛrɛ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ yɛ̃ 'yɛr.
A nãa bɔ̃ɔn a yele anyãna ala lɛ so ka n lɔb yãan bar tɩ 'yɛrɛ nɩ wʋ. N sɔɔ naa ɩka a yele anyãna ba sɔɔl wʋ ɛ, bojũu a yele nyã ba ɩ libe pɔ ɛ.
Nãa Agripa, fʋ sɔɔn a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ bɩɩ? N bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka fʋ sɔɔ naa."
Ka a Nãa Agripa pãa sʋʋr a Pɔɔl, "Fʋ tɩɛr man tãa a dɩna tɛɛ lɛ fʋn lɩɛb ma ka n ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto turo bɩɩ?"

A Pɔɔl 'yɛr, "Ka dɩna tɛɛ lɛ bɩɩ daar kɔ̃ɔ lɛ yo, n sʋɔrɔ naa Nãaŋmɩn ɩka a ta ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩ nɩrɛ jaa na chɛlɛ a 'yɛr nyãna a dɩna ka yɩ kaara a n kaar tɩ na ba taa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ yɩ a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ anyãna ɛ."
Ka a nãa vaa ir nɩ a wʋ nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a Bernisɩ lɔ̃ɔn a bala wʋn 'mataa jɩ̃nɛ nɩ.
Ba yin a die pɔ, pãa 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr kʋrɔ taa na ba 'yɛrɛ, "A daba nyãna ba maal yele jaa na sɛɛn kũu bɩɩ pɔɔfʋ ɛ."
Ka a Agripa 'yɛr kʋ a Festus, "Fʋn taa tʋ̃ɔ bar a daba nyãna ala ɩ waa ta sʋɔr sɔr ɩka wʋn chen a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa sɛ̃ ɛ."
An wa ta ɩka sɩn chen a Itali, ba den a Pɔɔl nɩ a bamɩne ban pɔɔ kʋ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ban bʋɔlɔ Julius, wʋ ɩ naa a nãkpɛ̃ɛ soja kpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ.
Sɩ kpɛ̃n a gboro kpɛ̃ɛ na yi a Adɩramatiyum ka wʋ ir an ɩ Asɩya kõkoor lɛ wʋn lana. Aristakus na ɩ a Masedonɩya paal nɩrɛ na wʋ yi a Tɛsalonika pʋɔ sɩ naa.
A wɛr na wa chaar, sɩ tãn a Sidon tẽe pɔ, ka a Julius maal a Pɔɔl vɩla na wʋ bar wʋ sɔr ka wʋ chen a wʋ barmɩne sɛ̃ ka ba tɩ sʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ.
Be lɛ sɩ lɛ yin a gboro lana a Sipurusɩ bojũu a sɛsɛbɛ furo na tuoro sɩ.
A lɛ sɩn wa gɔ̃ɔ a man sãlsɔɔ Sɩlɩsɩya nɩ a Pamfiliya kõkoor lɛ sɩ wa ara nɩ a Mira na be a Lisiya wɛr pɔ.
Be lɛ a soja nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyɛ a Aleksandiriya gboro kpɛ̃ɛ na chiine a Itali ka wʋ wɛl sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.

A ber waa naa sɩn maal a sɔr pɔ, jaa vɛ̃ nɛ nɛ nɛ lɛ sɩ chiine ka a wõ sɩ tɩ sɩ tɩ ta a Sɩnidusɩ tẽe pɔ. Lɛ a sɛsɛbɛ na ba sɔɔrɔ a sɩ chiine a dẽdẽe ɛ, a gboro tun sɩ naa a Kɩrete a Salmone tẽe puor.
A man kõkoor lɛ sɩ lana ka a wõ sɩ tɩ tãn a jie ban bʋɔlɔ a Gboro Juvɩla Ara A Jie na gbʋr a Lasea tẽe.
Sɩ sɔ̃ɔn sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ a sɔr pɔ a sɛsɛbɛ na furo jũu, ka a gboro chenfʋ mɩ kʋrɔ dãbɩ̃ɛ bojũu Kɔ̃ Galfʋ sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ mɩ po naa, ka a Pɔɔl kpãana ba 'yɛrɛ,
"Nɩbɛ, n kãan nyɛ ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ be a sɩ chenfʋ pɔ, yelyɔɔ na sɔ̃ɔ naa, a gboro tuor nɩ a sɩn mɩ̃ɛ mɩ."
Tɩchɛ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ba chɛlɛ a lɛ a Pɔɔl na 'yɛrɛ ɛ, tɩ sɔɔ a lɛ a gboro mɔ̃nɔ̃ nɩ lɛ a gboro sʋɔ na 'yɛr.

A gboro ara a jie ba sɛɛn ban na ara a be a ɔɔr sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a ba yɔɔ jaa 'yɛr naa ɩka ba po chiine, tɩɛrɛ ɩka ban tãn a Fonɩksɩ na ba ara a be. A Kɩrete gboro ara a jie lɛ na tor a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʋ jie guba nɩ a nũsʋ̃ɔ jie.
Lɛ a sɛsɛbaalʋ̃ʋ na wa furo yire a guba jie, ba tɩɛr ɩka ba nyɛn a lɛ ban bʋɔrɔ, ba for a kur nɛbie bara tɩ lana nɩ a gboro a Kɩrete gogoro.
An wa kor bɩ̃lãa, ka a sɛsɛbɛ kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʋ jie guba sɛsɛbɛ fun yi a be wa.
A sɛsɛbɛ tʋ̃ɔn a gboro a waa lɛ tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ chiine a niem ɛ, ka a sɛsɛbɛ pãa tara sɩ chiine.
A lɛ sɩn wa pɩ̃ a dõdolbile ɩ̃sʋɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Kawuda, a ɩn tuo kʋ sɩ ka sɩn 'mɔɔ a gborbile.
Lɛ a nɩbɛ na wa 'mɔɔ a gborbile ka wʋ do, ba den miir lũ gbɛb a gborkpɛ̃ɛ. Sɩ joro na dãbɩ̃ɛ ɩka sɩ taa ɩrɛ wa tɩ mʋr a Sirtisɩ bire pɔ ɛ, ka ba bar a kur nɛbie ka a gboro pãa tɔɔrɔ.
A sɛsɛkpɛ̃ɛ nyã mɔ̃n sɩn jaa ka wɛr wa chaar ka ba piel wɛlɛ a tuor lɔɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a kʋ̃ɔ pɔ.
A ber ata daar a gboro dẽme mɩ̃ɛ foro naa a gboro bomo nɩ a ba mɩ̃ɛ nuur lɔɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a kʋ̃ɔ pɔ.
Lɛ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ a ŋmarbie na ba lɛ wa nyɩr ɛ, a ber waa naa tɩchɛ ka a sɛkpɛ̃ɛ chɛnɛ ire ka a sɩ chɩ̃ɛfʋ tɩɛrtɔ jie baar.
A ber wa po naa tɩ baa di bon jaa ɛ, ka a Pɔɔl ir ara a ba sãlsɔɔ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Nɩbɛ, yɩn ta sɔɔ tu a n nɛɛ ka sɩ ta chɛnɛ be a be Kɩrete a wõm nyãna kʋ̃ naa pɔɔ sɩ ɛ, ka a bonsɩ be wɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ n sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa, yɩ nyɔɔ nyãa bojũu ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa kʋ̃ bɔr ɛ, a gboro tɛɛ lɛ na wɛ.
Jãa tɩ̃sɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na so ka n tʋ̃nɔ̃ a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ tʋ̃n a wʋ malaka ka wʋ wa ara a n lõboor,
na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ma, 'Pɔɔl taa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, fʋn nyɛn a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa nɩ nɩbir ka wʋ tɔɔr a fʋ 'yɛr. Ka a bala jaa fʋn lɔ̃ɔ chiin Nãaŋmɩn den a ba nyɛvʋr 'yɔ̃ɔ a fʋ nũu pɔ.'
A lɛ jũu yɩ nyɔɔ nyãa nɩbɛ, n sɔɔn de Nãaŋmɩn ɩka wʋn ɩ naa a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr kʋ ma.
Tɩchɛ sɩn don dõdol kɔ̃ɔ ju ara."
A ber pie nɩ anaar daar, a sɛsɛbɛ chɛnɛ na mʋɔrɔ nɩ sɩ be a Adiriya man yal pɔ, a tɩ̃sɔɔ bɩ̃ɩn ka a bala na kaara a gboro tɩɛr man tãa ba gbʋrɔ na gogoro.
Ba den a bon 'lɔ ban ma mana nɩ a kʋ̃ɔ, man ka a man yulʋ̃fʋ ɩ gbɛɛ kɔbaa dɔɔl lɩjɛr (120). Ban wa chen bɩ̃lãa ba lɛ man kaa ka a yulʋ̃fʋ lɛ ɩ gbɛɛ lɩjaanaar nɩ pie (90).
Ba joro na dãbɩ̃ɛ ɩka a gboro wʋ taa tɔ̃n sɩ kʋsɩr ɛ, a ba wɛl a nɛbie ala anaar na ma nyɔɔ a gboro lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ a man pɔ tɩ pãa sʋɔrɔ ɩka wɛr wʋ chaar fɔɔ.
Ka a gboro dẽme bʋɔrɔ sɔr ban na yi a gboro pɔ jo na ba for a gborbile bar ka wʋ suu a man pɔ tɩ maala fɩka a nɛbinyɔɔrsɩ ala lɛ ba foro bara a niem.
A Pɔɔl pãa 'yɛr kʋ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a sojasɩ, "Yɩn baa vɛ̃ ka a gboro dẽme banyãna be a gboro pɔ ɛ, sɩ wɛ naa a lɛ nɛ."
Ka a sojasɩ ŋmaa a miir 'lɔ na nyɔɔ a gborbile taa lɛ ka wʋ lo.
Lɛ a wɛr na ɩrɛ a wa lalala, Pɔɔl sʋɔr ba jaa na wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩ di a bʋ̃diir bojũu ber pie nɩ anaar nɩ nyã yɩn jɛ̃n baal na yaa di bon jaa ɛ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, n sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa ɩka yɩ di a bʋ̃diir na yɩ tara kpɛ̃ɔ, a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa jukɔɔlbir kʋ̃ vʋ̃ɔ a wʋ ju pɔ ɛ."
A anyãna lɛ wʋ 'yɛr baar tɩ na wʋ de a paanʋ̃ɔ amɩne puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan a ba jaa niem, tɩ pãa ŋmaa na wʋ ɔɔrɔ.
Ka a 'yɔ̃ɔ ba jaa ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɛ ka a ba mɩ̃ɛ di a bʋ̃diir amɩne.
A sɩn bala na be a gboro pɔ ɩ naa nɩbɛ kɔɔr ayi dɔɔl lɩjaata nɩ pie nɩ ayʋɔb (276).
Lɛ ban wa di tɩɩ baar, ba wɛl a bʋ̃diir ala na chɛ lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ a man pɔ tɩchɛ ka a gboro ɩ dẽfere.
Lɛ a wɛr na wa chaar, baa bɔ̃ɔ a jie ban be ɛ, tɩchɛ na ba nyɛ a jie na gɔr ka a bire be be a ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka ala ɩ ba tʋ̃ɔ naa a ba tɩ ara.
Ba ŋman a mibe ala na nyɔɔr a nɛbinyɔɔrsɩ ala bar, na ba mɩ lɛ for a vuulsɩ ala na ma dɛnɛ a gboro tɩ pãa yɛr a fɔbaa bar a gboro niem ka a sɛsɛbɛ pãa tɔɔrɔ ba chiine a bire pɔ.
Tɩchɛ ka a gboro tɩ tɔ a bire na duo a jie ɩ̃sʋɔ, ka a gboro niem mʋr wʋ jaa na wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ chen ɛ. Ka a kɔ̃sɛbɛ ŋmiere a gboro pãa wɛlɛ.
Ka a sojasɩ ɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba kʋ a bala ban pɔɔ ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa taa dũu yi jo ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a sojasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ faa a Pɔɔl jũu, waa sɔɔ ɩka ba ɩ a lɛ ɛ. Wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ naa a bala na bɔ̃ɔ a dũufʋ ka ba ɔɔ lo a kʋ̃ɔ pɔ de nie dũu do a gogoro ju.
Ka a bala na chɛ mɩ nyɔɔr a gboro daar bɩɩ a gboro da'mɛlɛ ala, nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ba ɩ ka ba ɩ̃sʋɔ tɩ jaa do a gogoro ju ka yele ba tara ba ɛ.
Sɩ jaa na wa do baar, ba 'yɛr ɩka a dõdol yuor din Malta.
A nɩbɛ bala na be a be maal sɩn vɩla, ba gbɔɔn bũu na ba bʋɔl sɩ a sɩ tɩ uoro, bojũu saa lɛ waara ka ɔɔr kʋrɔ.
Ka a Pɔɔl mɩ vaar delsɩ wa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bũu pɔ, ka a dʋ̃pãn na be a delsɩ pɔ, a bũu tʋl kpɛ ka wʋ yi dʋ̃ a Pɔɔl nũu mar taalɛ.
Lɛ a gogoro dẽme bala na wa nyɛ a lɛ a waa na mar a Pɔɔl nũu pɔ jɔ̃jɔlɔ, ka ba 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa, "A daba nyãna na ɩn nɩkʋrɔ, a man na ba di wʋ gba ɛ, tɩchɛ yeltorsɩ kʋ̃ sɔɔ ka wʋ be be ɛ."
Tɩchɛ ka a Pɔɔl mɩr a waa 'yɔ̃ɔ a bũu pɔ tɩ yele jaa ba tara wʋ ɛ.
A nɩbɛ tɩɛr man tãa a nũu na mɔr wʋ naa bɩɩ a wʋ vaa lo kpi. Tɩchɛ ban chɛl lɛ̃ɛɛ wa faa ka a yele jaa ba ɩrɛ ɛ, ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa, "Ŋmɩn lɛ wʋ ɩ."
A dõdol 'lɔ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ban bʋɔlɔ Pubilusɩ tara na jie na gbʋr a be a wʋ de sɩ sãan, na wʋ kʋ sɩ bʋ̃diir ber ata.
A Pubilusɩ sãa bɩɛrɛ na gã, ɩ̃gãn tʋl nɩ masʋmɔ̃ lɛ wʋ nyɩɛrɛ. Pɔɔl kpɛ̃n tɩ nyɛ wʋ, wʋn wa sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn baar wʋ dɔɔl wʋ naa nũu sãa wʋ.
Lɛ a anyãna na wa ɩ, baalsɩ bala jaa na be a jie 'lɔ mɩ wa naa ka Pɔɔl sãa ba jaa baalsɩ.
Ba den 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋ sɩ sɔɩ jaa pɔ, a lɛ sɩn wa chɔɔr na yi, ba kʋ sɩn bon jaa sɩn na bʋɔrɔ.
Sɩ maal a be ŋmɛrsɩ ata tɩ na sɩ lɛ kpɛ a gboro ɩ̃sʋɔ na ara a be a sɩ̃ɛ. A gboro yin Aleksandiriya na wʋ tara ŋmɩn yɩbɛ Kasɩtor nɩ Poluksɩ.
Sɩ tɩ ara naa Sɩrakusɩ maal ber ata a be.
Be lɛ a gboro yin sɩ tãn a be a Wuregiyum. Wɛr na wa chaar ka a ɩ a guba jie sɛsɛbɛ furo naa, a ber ayi daar ka sɩ ta a be Puteyoli na sɩ suu a be.
Be lɛ sɩ pɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo bamɩne ka ba bʋɔl sɩ ka sɩ tɩ maal daa gbul a ba sɛ̃. Lɛ lɛ a ɩ tɩ sɩ pãa wa ta a Worom.

A Nãaŋmɩn puorbo na be a Worom na wa wõ ɩka sɩ waara naa, ba yin tuor sɩ tɩ ta Apiyusɩ Daa pɔ na ba pɔɔ sɩ a Sãanba Kpɛfʋ Jiir Ata. A lɛ a Pɔɔl na wa nyɛ a nɩbɛ banyãna wʋ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan ka a 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ.
Lɛ sɩn wa ta a Worom, ba sɔɔ naa ka a Pɔɔl kpɩɛrɛ a wʋ yõ tɩchɛ ka a soja kaara wʋ.

Pɔɔl na wa maal ber ata, wʋ bʋɔl naa a Juu nɩbɛ nɩdierbe lɔ̃ɔ taa. Lɛ ban wa duo ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "N yɛɛr, n gba na ba maal yele jaa bɔr a sɩ nɩbɛ sɛ̃ ɛ, bɩɩ 'mab a sɩ sãakpãmɩne yel-ɩrsɩ ɛ, tɩ ba nyɔɔ ma naa be a Jerusalɛm na ba kʋ a Worom nɩbɛ.
Ba chɛ̃pɛ̃n a yele faa na ba ta bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba bar ma bojũu n ba maal yele jaa na sɛɛn kũu ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ka a Juu nɩbɛ na ba sɔɔ ɛ, ka n faa tɩ sʋɔr sɔr ka ba chiin ma a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa sɛ̃. A ba ɩ n tara na yele kɔ̃ɔ na de dɔɔl a n nɩbɛ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu lɛ so ka n bʋɔrɔ ɩka n nyɛ yɩ naa 'yɛr yɩ. Bojũu a Isɩral nɩbɛ tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie jũu lɛ ba gbar ma nɩ a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ anyãna."
Ka ba 'yɛr, "Saa nyɛ gãn jaa yi a Judiya dẽme sɛ̃ ɛ, ka a sɩ yɛɛr bala mɩ na yi a be wa ba 'yɛr a fʋ 'yɛrdɛɛr jaa kʋ sɩ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ sɩn bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ fʋn nyɔɔ, bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka jie jaa nɩbɛ 'laar naa a yele nyãna."

Ba 'yɔ̃ɔn bɩbir ban lɛ wa a Pɔɔl sɛ̃, a bɩbir na wa vɩɛ ba wan yɔɔ jaa a be wʋn kpɩɛrɛ. An yi a bibio tɩ tãn a jãanʋɔr na wʋ mana a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ kʋrɔ ba, na wʋ de a Mosesɩ nɛɛ nɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na sɛb bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr ka ba sɔɔ a Yesu.
Bamɩne lɩɛb ba tɩɛr a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ka a bamɩne ba sɔɔ de ɛ.
Ba chɩrɛ nɩ taa na ba piel yire lɛ a Pɔɔl na wa 'yɛr a wʋ 'yɛr baaraa na wʋ 'yɛr, "A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr yelmɩ̃ɛ kʋ a yɩ sãakpãmɩne a lɛ wʋn de a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Isaiya nɛɛ
'yɛr, 'Chen a nɩbɛ banyãna sɛ̃ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ba, "Yɩn wõn lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ yɩ kʋ̃ wa bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, yɩn fur nɩbir 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩ yɩ kʋ wa nyɛ bon jaa ɛ."
Bojũu a nɩbɛ banyãna nyãn kpɛ̃mɛ naa, baa wõnõ ɛ, ba ma ũun a ba nɩbie, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, ban taa nyɛn naa ba nɩbie na ba wõn a ba tobo bɔ̃ɔ a par na ba lɩɛb wa a n sɛ̃ ka n sãa ba.'
A lɛ jũu, n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn den a wʋ faafʋ 'yɛr tɩ kʋ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ na chɛlɛ naa."
Pɔɔl yab a yir 'lɔ pɔ wʋn kpɩɛrɛ yuom ayi, tɩ ma de nɩrɛ jaa na ma wa a wʋ sɛ̃.
Yele jaa ba ŋmaa wʋ sɔr ɛ, ka wʋ 'lara na wʋ mʋɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ 'yɛr na wʋ wile ba nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr.
Maa Pɔɔl na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto gbãgbaa, Nãaŋmɩn na kaa ir bʋɔl ka n ɩ a wʋ nɩtʋ̃nãa naa ɩ a wʋ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ, lɛ sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ a yɩn na be a Worom.
A 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã wʋn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr nɛɛ a kõr jaa tu a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ sɛ̃ ka ba sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ,
na ɩ a wʋ Bie 'yɛr, ban dɔɔ ka wʋ ɩ a Nãa David bal nɩrɛ.
A tu naa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pɔ wiil kpɛ̃ɔ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn Bie lɛ, na wʋ ir yi a kũn pɔ ɩ vʋr, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Soro.
A tun a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩ a wʋ yuor jũu, sɩ nyɛn wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ na sɩn bʋɔl nɩrɛ jaa, ka ba wa wõnõ a wʋ toor nɩ sɔɔfʋ.
Yɩn mɩ pʋɔn a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔl ka yɩ ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sofʋ.
N sɛɛrɛ na kʋrɔ a yɩn bala jaa na be a Worom a Nãaŋmɩn na nʋ̃, na wʋ bʋɔl yɩ a yɩ ɩ a wʋ nɩbɛ. Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jie a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
N den nie puor a maa Nãaŋmɩn yãan a yɩ jaa jũu tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, bojũu a yɩ sɔɔfʋ ŋmen yaar a wɛr wʋ jaa.
A Nãaŋmɩn nyã ɩn tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ nɩ a n nyãa wʋ jaa, naa mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã na ɩ a wʋ Bie 'yɛr, di man dãasɩɛ lɛ ɩn ma tɩɛrɛ a yɩ yele.
N ma sʋɔrɔ naa Nãaŋmɩn ba gala ɛ, naa sʋɔrɔ ɩka a wʋ bɔfʋ a ɩ, ka wʋ yuo sɔr a pʋ̃pãanyã kʋ ma ka n wa a yɩ sɛ̃.
N bʋɔrɔ naa yɩ nyɛfʋ naa na tʋ̃ɔ wiil yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋfʋ amɩne ka a 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ.
Lɛ lɛ, a yɩn nɩ maa na pãa nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ̃mɛ a sɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ.

N yɛɛr, n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ɩn mʋɔrɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ jaa, ɩka n wa a yɩ sɛ̃ tɩchɛ ka a sɔr pɔɔ wa tãn dɩna. Ɩn taa nyɛn a yɩ bamɩne a ba puoraa nɩtãa lɛ ɩn nyɛ a yɩ bamɩne na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩ puoro.
N din a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala mɩ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nɩ a yɛ̃ dẽme nɩ a jɔlɔ sãn.
Ala lɛ so ka n mʋɔrɔ ɩka n mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ a yɩn mɩ na be a Worom.
Vɩ̃ ba kʋrɔ ma nɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna 'yɛrfʋ ɛ, bojũu a ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ wʋn de faara nɩ nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ, a Juu nɩbɛ lɛ de nie, ka bala mɩ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, mɩ tu.

Bojũu a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã na wiil nɩrɛ lɛ wʋn na tor Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, torfʋ 'lɔ na yi sɔɔfʋ pɔ, yi a pielfʋ tɩ tãn a baaraa nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara sɔɔfʋ, tor naa, wʋn tara na nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ."
Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃n ka a wʋ suur yele yi a saaju gã chãa pɔ, ɩka wʋ nyɛn suur 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na ba puoro ɛ, nɩ putudẽme bala na pɔɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a ba putuyele.
An ɩ a ala ban na de bɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn gãn chãa pɔ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ ir wiil ba.
Bojũu, an yi a lɛ daar jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na mɛ a wɛr, nɩbɛ na tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, ka wʋ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a bonsɩ ala wʋn maal, a lɛ jũu, tu yifʋ jie ba lɛ be be go ɛ.
Bojũu, ban sɔɔ bɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃, tɩ baa kʋ wʋ tɩɩr ɛ, bɩɩ dãna wʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ a ba tɩɛrsɩ ɩn burbur, ka a ba jɔl nyãn ala pãa lii.
Ban sɔɔ 'yɛr ɩka yɛ̃ bɔ̃ɔnbɔ lɛ ba ɩ, ba ɩn jɔlɔ,
an ɩ ba lɩɛb a tɩɩr 'lɔ ban taa kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ba kpire ɛ, na ba kʋ a bʋtɩbɛ ala ban pɛ̃n, ka a kaara a nɩbɛ kaar na kpire, nɩ lubil, nɩ dʋ̃n, nɩ dʋ̃gbɛɛ anaar jaa bʋrɔ.
Ala lɛ so ka Nãaŋmɩn ir nũu tɩchɛ ba bar be a ba vɔldɛɛr pɔ, ka ba bʋ̃nɔ̃ gãna nɩ taa, sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa nɩ a ba ɩ̃gãma.
Ba den a Nãaŋmɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ tɛɛn jire, na ba puoro tɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ a bonsɩ ala a Nãaŋmɩn na maal, tɩ bar a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a ma maala 'lɔ a pɛɛfʋ na sɛɛn bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
A anyãna jũu, Nãaŋmɩn de ban bar be a vɩ̃ vɔlaa pɔ. Ka a ba pɔbɔ gba ma lɩɛb gãna nɩ a ba pɔɔ taa ba.
A lɛ nɩ wʋ ju lɛ a dɔɔr mɩ bar a pɔbɔ bɔfʋ, ka a vɔlaa vɛ̃ ka ba lɩɛb bʋɔrɔ a ba taa dɔɔr. Dɔɔr na lɩɛb tʋ̃nɔ̃ a vɩ̃ tʋ̃mɔ̃ nyãna nɩ a ba taa dɔɔr ba nyɛn a ba tʋ̃dɛɛr toor tɔɔfʋ.
Baa nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔfʋ a wʋ sɛɛn ba ɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn bar ba a be a ba tɩɛr sɔ̃ɔnaa pɔ, ka ba maala a ala na ba sɛɛn maalfʋ ɛ.
Ba sɛɛn naa putuo jaa bʋrɔ, bier ɩfʋ, bɔgar dẽme, nɩ bier maalfʋ. Nyuur sɛɛn ba naa, na ba ɩ nɩkʋrbɔ, bʋɔrɔ jɛɛr, na ba bɛlɛ taa, na ba tɩɛrɛ taa sɔ̃ɔfʋ. Ba ɩn gagarsɩ,
sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ taa yoe, 'laar Nãaŋmɩn, kpɛrɛ taa, mɩ̃ɛ 'mɔɔfʋ nɩ yobɔyele. Ba bɔ̃ɔn sɔɩ ban ma tu maal bier, baa turo a nɩbɛ bala na dɔɔ ba nɛɛ ɛ.
Baa tara tɩɛr ɛ, baa tara yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ, baa tara nʋ̃fʋ ɛ, baa kaara nɩrɛ nɩbaal ɛ.
Ban sɔɔ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn toraa nyãna binfʋ, ɩka a nɩbɛ bala na maala a anyãna sɛɛn nɩ kũu, bala mɩ̃ɛ tɛɛ ba lɛ maala a anyãna ɛ, tɩchɛ ba ma sɔɔ naa a bala na tʋ̃nɔ̃ a anyãna.

Yɩn a lɛ jũu, yaa mɩ tara tu yifʋ jie ɛ, a yɩn bala na ma tɔɔrɔ a bamɩne 'yɛr. Yele jaa pɔ fʋn tɔɔr a fʋ tɔ sʋɔ 'yɛr fʋ mɩ 'yɔ̃ɔn fʋ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr, bojũu fʋ mɩ ɩn a yele 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a fʋ tɔ sʋɔ na ɩ, a fʋ tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, sɩ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na tɔɔr naa a bala na ɩrɛ a yelsɩ anyãna 'yɛr tun yelmɩ̃ɛ sɔr pɔ.
A lɛ a fʋ̃ʋ nɩsaal mɩ na tɔɔrɔ nɩbɛ 'yɛr, tɩ na fʋ mɩ maal a yele ala nɩ a ju, fʋ tɩɛr ɩka fʋn pɔl yi a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ pɔ ɔ?
Bɩɩ yɩ nyɛ naa Nãaŋmɩn yɛ̃ bɔ̃ɔn yɔɔ jũu, nɩ a wʋ maalvɩla, nɩ a wʋ kãnyir, na yaa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn maalvɩla wile yɩn tɩɛr lɩɛb fʋ sɔr ɛ?
Tɩchɛ a yɩ nyãkpɩ̃ɛn nɩ yɩn ba lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr jũu, yɩ guoro naa a Nãaŋmɩn sutuo bine kʋrɔ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ guro nɩ a wʋ suur bɩbir 'lɔ wʋn na tɔɔr nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr nɩ torfʋ.
Nãaŋmɩn "na yab nɩrɛ jaa lɛ wʋn tũ jɩ̃."
Bala na mar ara na ba tʋ̃nɔ̃ vɩla bʋɔrɔ tɩɩr, nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, nɩ a ala na ba pʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ, wʋn kʋ ban nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ bala na bʋɔrɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ bɔb, na ba tɔr a yelmɩ̃ɛ tɩ turo dɛɛr, Nãaŋmɩn suur nɩ a wʋ kpãafʋ gãn kʋ ba.
Wõm nɩ tuo difʋ na ben be kʋ nɩsaal jaa na ɩrɛ yelbier. An piel naa a Juu nɩbɛ sɛ̃, tɩ mɩ lʋ̃ɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ tɩɩr nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na ben be kʋ nɩrɛ jaa na maala vɩla, a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn ba tara kaa gar taa ɛ.
Bala jaa na ba bɔ̃ɔ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ tɩ tʋ̃ dɛɛr, mɩn wɛ naa ban ba bɔ̃ɔ a nɛɛ jũu, ka bala jaa mɩn bɔ̃ɔ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ tɩ tʋ̃ a dɛɛr Nãaŋmɩn na den a nɛɛ nyã tɔɔr a ba 'yɛr.
Bojũu a ba ɩ a bala na wõnõ a nɛɛ lɛ tor a Nãaŋmɩn niem ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala na turo a lɛ a nɛɛ na 'yɛr bala lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr ɩka ba tor naa.
Sɩrɛ jaa a bala jaa na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na baa tara a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa ɛ, ba gba ma ɩ naa a yelsɩ a nɛɛ na 'yɛr, bojũu bala mɩ̃ɛ ɩn a nɛɛ ban sɔɔ ba tara a nɛɛ ɛ.
Ba wiil ɩka a lɛ a nɛɛ na bʋɔrɔ sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ be a ba nyãa pɔ, ka a ba tɩɛr mɩ di dãasɩɛ ma gɔ̃nɔ̃ ba bɩɩ 'yɛrɛ pʋɔrɔ ba.
A anyãna na ɩ naa a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn na tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ na wʋ tɔɔr nɩrɛ jaa yelsɔɔlsɩ nɩtãa lɛ ɩn 'yɛrɛ a n 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã a fʋ̃ʋ, ala ɩ fʋ bʋɔlɔ na a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ Juu nɩrɛ, na fʋ dɩɛl a Mosesɩ nɛɛ na fʋ jɩrɛ lɛ fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn na tara nɛbʋ̃'yen,
ala ɩ fʋ bɔ̃ɔ naa a wʋ bɔfʋ na fʋ bɔ̃ɔ a 'lɔ na gar a jaa bojũu a nɛɛ lɛ wiil fʋ,
ala ɩ fʋ chɛn nyãa ɩka jɔ̃tɔɔrɔ lɛ fʋ ɩ, na fʋ ɩ chãa chaara a bala na be a libe pɔ,
na fʋ wile a jɔlɔ, na fʋ wile a bibiir, bojũu a Mosesɩ nɛɛ pɔ lɛ fʋ nyɛ a bɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Fʋ̃ʋ nyã na wile a fʋ taaba, faa wiil a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ? Fʋ̃ʋ nyã na ma 'yɛrɛ ɩka jufʋ ba ɩ ɛ, fʋ ma ju naa ɔ?
Fʋ̃ʋ na ma 'yɛrɛ ɩka nɩbɛ ba ta sɛ̃nɛ ɛ, fʋ ma sɛ̃n bɩɩ? Fʋ̃ʋ nyã na kpɛrɛ a tɩbɛ tɩ fʋ ma juro naa a tɩbɛ der bonsɩ bɩɩ?
Fʋ̃ʋ nyã na jɩrɛ nɩ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ nyã, fʋ ma 'yɔ̃ɔn Nãaŋmɩn vɩ̃ fʋn sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nɛɛ ɔ?
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "A yɩ jũu lɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a n yuor."
Yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ tara na tɔ̃nɔ̃ ala ɩ fʋ turo naa lɛ a nɛɛ na 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ baa turo a nɛɛ ɛ, fʋn kaara fɩka faa ŋmaa yʋɔr ɛ.
Ala ɩ a bala na ba ŋmaa a yʋɔr ɛ, turo na lɛ a nɛɛ na bin, ba kʋ̃ kaara fɩka yɔŋmarba lɛ ba ɩ ɛ?
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba ŋmaa a yʋɔr a ɩ̃gãn pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ na wʋ turo a nɛɛ jaa nɛ nɛ nɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩn 'yɛr, a yɩn bala gba na tara a nɛbinsɩ gãn na fʋ ŋmaa a yʋɔr tɩ faa turo a nɛbinsɩ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ na ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ba ɩ a ɩ̃gãn nyã yele tɛɛ lɛ ɛ, bɩɩ a yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ na ɩ a ɩ̃gãn yele ɛ.
Kai, wʋ ɩn a Juu nɩrɛ na be a pʋɔm, ka a wʋ yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ŋmaa a wʋ nyãa yʋɔr a ba yi a nɛbinsɩ gãn pɔ ɛ. A nɩrɛ nyãna pɛɛfʋ ba yire nɩbɛ sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yin Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Bo tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a Juu nɩrɛ tara, bɩɩ bo tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ be be a yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ pɔ?
Sɔr jaa pɔ, ala na de nie lɛ ɩka bala lɛ Nãaŋmɩn de nie kʋ a wʋ 'yɛrbie.
Bo lɛ na ɩ ala ɩ bamɩne ba tara sɔɔfʋ ɛ? A ba ba sɔɔfʋ na tʋ̃ɔn sɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ bar bɩɩ?
Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ! Vɛ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ, tɩchɛ ka a nɩrɛ jaa ɩ jir ŋmara. Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Lɛ lɛ na wiil ɩka fʋ tor naa a fʋ 'yɛrbie pɔ, na fʋ tʋ̃ɔ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie."
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a sɩ ba torfʋ vɛ̃n ka Nãaŋmɩn torfʋ gã chãa pɔ, sɩ lɛ 'yɛr bo? Sɩ 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn ba tor ɛ, wʋn vɛ̃ ka a wʋ sutuo dire sɩ ɔ? Nɩsaal nɛchɩrɛ lɛ a nyãna.
Sɩrɛ jaa ba lɛ ɛ. Ala ɩ lɛ lɛ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ tɔɔr a wɛr nɩbɛ 'yɛr?
Nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na chɩrɛ na, "Ka ala ɩ a n ba torfʋ wiil naa ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ ka a wʋ tɩɩr pʋɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma 'yɛr ɩka yelbe-ɩrɛ lɛ n ɩ?"
Bo lɛ so ka sɩ kʋ̃ 'yɛr nɩtãa lɛ a yosɔ̃ɔnbɔ na 'yɛr ka a bamɩne mɩ 'yɛrɛ ɩka sɩ 'yɛr ɩka, "Yɩ ɩ a sɩ maala dɛɛr tɩ ka a lɩɛrɛ vɩla?" A ba sɔ̃ɔfʋ sɛɛn ba naa.
Bãa lɛ sɩn pãa de baar? Sɩn lɛ sa ba bɩɩ? Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ. Sɩ den nie 'yɛr ɩka a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ba jaa nyɛntaa na ba be a yelbier pɔ.
Nɩtãa lɛ ban sɛb a ba yele 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Nɩtoraa jaa ba be be ɛ, nɩbʋ̃'yen gba ba be be ɛ.
Nɩbʋ̃'yen jaa ba be be bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ 'yɛr par ɛ, nɩbʋ̃'yen jaa ba yʋɔrɔ bʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ.
Ba jaa lɩɛb puor, ka ba jaa lɩɛb ɩ nɩsɔ̃ɔnsɩ. Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba maala vɩla ɛ, nɩbʋ̃'yen gba ba be be ɛ."
"A ba kɔkɔbɔɔr yuon fɩka yar, ka a ba jãlbie bɔ̃ɔ bɛlfʋ." "Dʋ̃pãn lɔɔ jɛlaa a ba nɛgãma."
"Pɔ'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ 'yɛr bitor lɛ ma yire a ba nɛɛr pɔ."
"A ba gbɛɛ ma pɔɔrɔ naa jɩ̃ɩ kpaarfʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Sɔr jaa ban de, sɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ dɔɔyɛ lɛ ma ɩ a jɩ̃nɛ.
Baa bɔ̃ɔ nyã'maar sɔr ɛ."
"A ba nɩbie ba joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ."
Pʋ̃pãanyã, sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka lɛ jaa a Mosesɩ nɛɛ na 'yɛr, wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a bala na be a nɛɛ pɔ ɩka, a kpal nɩrɛ jaa nɛɛ, ka a wɛr nɩbɛ ba jaa wa man a ba nɛɛ 'yɛr kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn.
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ ɩ nɩtor a Nãaŋmɩn niem wʋn turo a nɛɛ jũu ɛ, an ɩ a tun a nɛɛ nyã pɔ, ka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ bier.
Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã, a chaar naa ɩka a torfʋ na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ba yi a Mosesɩ nɛɛ pɔ ɛ, ala lɛ a nɛɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ di dãasɩɛ.
A torfʋ nyã na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ɩn a sɔɔfʋ na tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, kʋ a bala jaa na sɔɔ de. Tɛɛ taa jaa ba be be ɛ.
Bojũu nɩrɛ jaa maal dɛɛr na baa ta a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr ɛ.
A Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ jũu, wʋ vɛ̃n ka sɩ tor na wʋ 'yɛrfaa sɩ pɔrɔ tu a faafʋ 'lɔ na yi a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃.

Nãaŋmɩn de wʋn a wʋ ɩ a bɔɔrlo bon, a wʋn de a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ pɛɛn nɩrɛ jaa tu a sɔɔfʋ jũu. Nãaŋmɩn maal a anyã na wʋ wiil a wʋ torfʋ, bojũu a wʋ kãnyir vɛ̃ naa ka wʋ bar a ba yeldɛbɛ ala ban dɔ̃ɔ maal gefʋ.
Wʋ maal naa lɛ na wiil a wʋ torfʋ a pʋ̃pãanyã, na wʋ ma vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ de a Yesu yele, tor.
Nyɩnɛ lɛ a yobɔyele lɛ be? A ba pʋɔ be ɛ. Yelbuor jũu? A Mosesɩ nɛɛ ban turo jũu bɩɩ? Kai, sɔɔfʋ jũu lɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka sɩn chɛnɛ sɔɔ ɩka nɩrɛ yele ma tor naa wʋn tara sɔɔfʋ a ba ɩ wʋn turo a nɛbinãa jũu ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn ɩn a Juu nɩbɛ tɛɛ Nãaŋmɩn bɩɩ? Waa ɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ? Ɔ̃ɔ, wʋ ɩn a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ tʋɔr.
An ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ be be, 'lɔ lɛ na vɛ̃ ka a yɔŋmarba yele tor sɔɔfʋ jũu, na wʋ mɩ vɛ̃ ka a bala na ba ŋmaa a yʋɔr ɛ, yele mɩ tor a sɔɔfʋ jũu.
Sɩ pãa den a sɔɔfʋ nyã sɔ̃ɔn a nɛbinãa bar bɩɩ? Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ. Sɩn lɛ pãa bɔ̃ɔ turo wʋ.
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ sɩn pãa 'yɛr a sɩ sãakpã Abraham 'yɛr, a yele nyãna pɔ?
Ala ɩ sɩrɛ jaa Abraham yele dɔ̃ɔ tor a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ jũu, wʋn taa tara na yele kɔ̃ɔ bʋɔrɔ nɩ yuor, tɩchɛ a kʋ̃ naa ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn niem lɛ ɛ.
Bo lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn 'yɛr? Wʋ 'yɛr ɩka, "Abraham sɔɔn de Nãaŋmɩn ka a lɛ vɛ̃ ka wʋ ɩ nɩtor."
Pʋ̃pãanyã nɩrɛ wa tʋ̃tʋ̃mɔ̃, a wʋ sãyar ba ɩ kʋfʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ sãyar lɛ.
Ala lɛ so nɩrɛ 'lɔ an ba ɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋn sɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ na ma vɛ̃ ka a putudẽme yele tor, a wʋ sɔɔfʋ lɛ ma vɛ̃ ka wʋ ɩ a nɩtor.
A Nãa David mɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a 'yɛr bir nyãna nɩ wʋ ju, na wʋ 'yɛr ɩka, bɔɔsʋ̃n sʋɔ lɛ a 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ a wʋ ɩ nɩtor ka tʋ̃mɔ̃ ba pʋɔ ɛ.
"Bɔɔsʋ̃n dẽme lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ a ba bɔrfʋsɩ kʋ ba, ka a ba yelbebe ala pɔɔ.
Bɔɔsʋ̃n lɛ a 'lɔ a sɩ Soro na ba lɛ sɔrɔ a wʋ yelbier dɔɔlɔ wʋ ɛ."
A bɔɔsʋ̃n nyãna ɩn a yɔŋmarba tɛɛ bon bɩɩ, a mɩ ɩn a bala na ba ŋmaa a yʋɔr ɛ, bon? Sɩ 'yɛr ɩka Abraham sɔɔfʋ vɛ̃n ka wʋ ɩ nɩtor.
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ anyãna dɔ̃ɔ ɩ kʋ wʋ? Wʋn ŋmaa a yʋɔr baar lɛ bɩɩ wʋn ba ŋmaa sɛrɛ lɛ? A ba ɩ wʋn ŋmaa baar ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ ba ŋmaa sɛrɛ lɛ.

Nãaŋmɩn wa bɩɛr man wʋ a yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ yele, ka a ɩ jɩ̃nɛ ɩka a wʋ yele tor naa a wʋ sɔɔfʋ jũu wʋn dɔ̃ɔ ba ŋmaa a yʋɔr sɛrɛ ɛ. Lɛ lɛ wʋ pãa ɩ a bala jaa na sɔɔ de sãa, tɩchɛ na baa ŋmaa a ba yɔɩ ɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ a ba ɩ nɩtorsɩ.
Wʋ mɩ ɩ naa bala jaa na ŋma a yɔɩ sãa. A ba ɩ yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ tɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ ban tara a sɔɔfʋ na ba turo nɩ a lɛ a sɩ sãa Abraham na dɔ̃ɔ turo tɩ wa ŋmaa a yʋɔr.
A ba ɩ a nɛbinãa jũu lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ a Abraham nɩ a wʋ yɔn ɩka bala lɛ na so a wɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋn ɩ nɩtor a wʋ sɔɔfʋ jũu lɛ.
Ala ɩ a bala na turo a nɛbinãa lɛ so a wɛr ɛ, sɔɔfʋ ba lɛ tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ wʋn tɩr mɩ ɩ pɔrɔ.
Bojũu a nɛbinãa waara nɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn suur. A jie 'lɔ mɩ a nɛbinãa na ba be ɛ, a nɛɛ bɔrfʋsɩ mɩ ba be be ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, a nɛtɩraa wa naa a sɔɔfʋ jũu, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ na sʋ̃ʋ a Abraham yɔn ba jaa, a ba ɩ a bala na turo a nɛɛ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala na tara a Abraham sɔɔfʋ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a sɩ jaa sãa.

Nɩtãa an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "N maal fʋ naa a fʋ ɩ a paal yɔɔ sãa." 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ a sɩ sãa a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, a 'lɔ wʋn sɔɔ de, a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ma vɛ̃ ka kũn ɩ vʋɛ, na wʋ ma bʋɔl bonsɩ ala na ba dɔ̃ɔ be be ɛ, ka a be be.
Tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie ba lɛ be be ɛ, tɩ Abraham tara tɩɛrtɔ jie, na wʋ sɔɔ de ka a lɛ vɛ̃ ka wʋ ɩ a paal yɔɔ sãa, nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Lɛ lɛ a fʋ yɔn na wa be."
Waa bal a wʋ sɔɔfʋ pɔ ɛ, wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nyɛn bɔ̃ɔn a wʋ ɩ̃gãn na kor jʋɔl, bojũu yuom kɔbaa lɛ wʋ nyɛ ka a Saara mɩ ab.
Tɩchɛ Abraham ba tara baal a wʋ sɔɔfʋ pɔ, nɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a wʋ nɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ nyɛn kpɛ̃ɔ a wʋ sɔɔfʋ pɔ, na wʋ de tɩɩr kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn.
Wʋ sɔɔn de nuur ayi ɩka Nãaŋmɩn tara na kpɛ̃ɔ na maal a lɛ wʋn tɩr a wʋ nɛɛ.
A anyãna lɛ so ka a Nãaŋmɩn, vɛ̃ a wʋ ɩ nɩtor.
A 'yɛrbir na 'yɛr ɩka, Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃n a wʋ ɩ nɩtor, a ba sɛb a 'lɔ tɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ,
tɩchɛ a mɩ ɩn a sɩ bon, Nãaŋmɩn mɩ na vɛ̃n a sɩ yele ka a tor, sɩn bala jaa na sɔɔ ɩka, 'lɔ lɛ sɩ̃ɩ a Yesu na ɩ a sɩ Soro a kũu pɔ.
A sɩ yelbebe jũu lɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ kʋn wʋ, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn sɩ̃ɩ wʋ a kũu pɔ a wʋ ɩ vʋr, na wʋ vɛ̃ ka sɩ tor.
Wʋn ben vɛ̃ a sɩ tor a sɩ sɔɔfʋ jũu, sɩ tara na nyã'maar Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ tu a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩ tu nyɛ sɔr a sɩ sɔɔfʋ jũu kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ nyã pɔ sɩn ben ara a pʋ̃pãanyã, na sɩ chɩlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr tɩɛrtɔ nyã jũu.
A ba ɩ lɛ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ mɩ chɩlɛ na a sɩ dɔɔyɛ pɔ, bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a dɔɔyɛ lɛ na waan kãnyir,
ka a kãnyir wiil a lɛ fʋn be, ka a lɛ fʋn be mɩ waan tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie.
Ka a tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie kʋ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ vɩ̃ ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn kpaar naa a wʋ nʋ̃fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ nyãn pɔ, tu a wʋ Sɩɛ 'lɔ wʋn de kʋ sɩ.
Yaa nyɛ, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na sɛɛ lɛ, sɩn sɔɔ chɛnɛ ba tara kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ Kɩrɩsɩto kpin kʋ a bala na ba puoro ɛ.
An kpɛ̃mɛ naa ɩka nɩrɛ na sɔɔn kpi kʋ nɩrɛ yele na tor, amɩne nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na tʋ̃ɔn sɔɔ kpi kʋ nɩrɛ na ɩ nɩsʋ̃.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn wiil a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nʋ̃fʋ a nɩtɔ̃ kʋ sɩ, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn chɛnɛ ɩ yelbe-ɩrbɛ, Kɩrɩsɩto kpin kʋ sɩ.
An ben ɩka pʋ̃pãanyã wʋ ben vɛ̃ a sɩ tor a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ jũu, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an pãa kaara wʋn faa sɩ yin a Nãaŋmɩn suur pɔ.
Bojũu ala ɩ a lɛ sɩn dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃dẽme, ka a wʋ Bie kũu wa 'maal wʋ kʋ sɩ, a lɛ wʋn ben 'maal sɩ, wʋn faa sɩ naa tu a wʋ nyɛvʋr pɔ.
A ba ɩ anyã tɛɛ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ chɩlɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ tu a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, tu a 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩn ben nyɛ a 'maalfʋ a pʋ̃pãanyã.
Nɩtɔ̃ jũu lɛ a yelbier kpɛ a wɛr pɔ tu nɩbʋ̃'yen 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a kũu mɩ tu a yelbier 'yɔ̃ɔ mɩ wa, sɔr nyã lɛ a kũu mɩ tu pɔɔ nɩrɛ jaa, bojũu ba jaa maal yelbier.
Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka a Mosesɩ wa bin a nɛɛ, yelbier den nie be ka a wɛr pɔ, tɩchɛ lɛ a nɛbinãa na ba dɔ̃ɔ be be ɛ, ba maa de yelbier maal bon ɛ.
Tɩchɛ kũu din nãa yi a Adama sɔ̃ɔ tɩ tãn a Mosesɩ sɔ̃ɔ, na wʋ gba mɩ tʋ̃ɔ a bala na ba maal a yelbier sɔ̃ɔ a nɛɛ a Adama kaar ɛ, Adama lɛ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a 'lɔ na wa wa gãagiel.
Tɩchɛ a kʋfʋ ba kaara a bɔrfʋ kaar ɛ, bojũu ala ɩ nɩyɔɔ kpi naa nɩbʋ̃'yen bɔrfʋ jũu, Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ a wʋ kʋfʋ ala na wa tu a nɩbʋ̃'yen Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ jũu, na yaar kʋ nɩyɔɔ gar a lɛ.
A Nãaŋmɩn kʋfʋ gba ba nyɛtãan a nɩbʋ̃'yen yelbier 'lɔ ɛ. 'Yɛr tɔɔrfʋ tun a yelbe bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ na wʋ waan sɔ̃ɔfʋ, tɩchɛ a kʋfʋ mɩ tun a bɔrfʋsɩ yɔɔ pɔ, naa waan torfʋ.

Bojũu ala ɩ a nɩbʋ̃'yen bɔrfʋ jũu kũu din nãa tu a nɩbʋ̃'yen 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a bala na nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ a kʋfʋ 'lɔ na ɩ a torfʋ, na din nãa a ba nyɛvʋr pɔ tu a nɩbʋ̃'yen Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
An ɩ nɩbʋ̃'yen bɔrfʋ jũu lɛ waan sɔ̃ɔfʋ wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ ba jaa, lɛ lɛ so nɩbʋ̃'yen mɩ na maal ka a tor, mɩ lɛ vɛ̃ ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa tor na ba nyɛ nyɛvʋr.
Nɩtãa lɛ a bawõno bʋ̃'yen na vɛ̃ ka a nɩyɔɔ ɩ yelbe-ɩrbɛ, lɛ mɩ lɛ a tu nɩbʋ̃'yen na tu Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ mɩ vɛ̃, ka a nɩyɔɔ mɩ ɩ nɩtorsɩ.
A nɛɛ pʋɔn 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a bɔrfʋsɩ mɩ waa. Tɩchɛ jie 'lɔ a yelbier na pʋɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ ma pʋɔn 'yɔ̃ɔ gar a lɛ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a yelbier na di nãa a kũu pɔ, lɛ mɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ na di a nãa tu a yeltorsɩ pɔ, na wʋ waan nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Sɩ pãa 'yɛr ɩka bo? Sɩ chɛnɛ ɩrɛ a yelbier tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ pʋɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃?
Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ! Sɩ kpin kʋ yelbier, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a ɩ a sɩn lɛ chɛnɛ be a pɔ?
Bɩɩ yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a sɩn bala jaa na so a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, wʋ pɔl sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, a sɩ lɔ̃ɔ kpin wʋ nɩ a wʋ kũu pɔ ɛ?
A lɛ jũu, ba ũu sɩ naa a kʋ̃ɔ pɔ, a kũu kaar, ka a lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto na dɔ̃ɔ ir a kũu pɔ, tu a Sãa tɩɩr pɔ, ka sɩ mɩ na be be tara nyɛvʋr paalaa.
Ala ɩ sɩn nɩ 'lɔ 'mantaa a wʋ kũu pɔ, sɩn nɩ 'lɔ na 'mantaa ir a kũu pɔ.
Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a sɩ ɩ̃gãn koraa pʋɔ naa a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, a ba kpan wʋ a be a daa ju, ka a yelbier ɩ̃gãn ba lɛ tara kpɛ̃ɔ a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, saa lɛ ɩ a yelbier gbãgbaar ɛ.
Bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na kpi, wʋ yin yelbier pɔ.
Ala ɩ sɩn nɩ Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ 'mataa kpi, sɩ sɔɔ naa ɩka sɩn nɩ 'lɔ lɛ na 'mataa be be tara a nyɛvʋr.
Bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Kɩrɩsɩto na ir a kũu pɔ, wʋ kʋ̃ lɛ kpi go ɛ, kũu ba lɛ tʋ̃ɔ wʋ ɛ.
A kũu wʋn kpi, wʋ kpin kʋ yelbier gbɛbʋ̃'yen kʋ nɩrɛ jaa, tɩchɛ a wʋ nyɛvʋr pɔ wʋn be, wʋ ben be kʋ Nãaŋmɩn.
A lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ ɩka, yɩ kaa a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɩka, yɩ kpin kʋ yelbier, tɩ be be kʋ Nãaŋmɩn, Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ta sɔɔ ka yelbier lɛ di nãa a yɩ ɩ̃gãn nyãn na kpi ka yɩ turo a wʋ dɛɛr bɔfʋ ɛ.

Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa diere a yɩ ɩ̃gãn jie ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa kʋrɔ yelbier maalfʋ ɛ, ka a ɩ putuyele tʋ̃tʋ̃bomo ɛ. Tɩchɛ yɩ sɔɔ de a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn, nɩtãa nɩbɛ na yi kũu pɔ tara nyɛvʋr, na yɩ sɔɔ de a yɩ ɩ̃gãn jiir kʋ wʋ, ka a ɩ yeltorsɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃bomo.
Bojũu, yelbier ba lɛ ɩ a yɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɛ, bojũu yaa chɛnɛ be a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa pĩlem ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ben a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ pĩlem.
Ka bo go? Sɩ chɛnɛ ɩrɛ a yelbier bojũu sɩn ba lɛ chɛnɛ be a nɛɛ pĩlem ɔ, tɩ be a wɩ̃ɛfʋ pĩlem bɩɩ? Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ!

Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka ala ɩ fʋ wa den fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ nɩrɛ na fʋ turo a wʋ nɛɛ gbãgbaa kaar, fʋ ɩn gbãgbaa kʋ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ nɛɛ fʋn turo, ka yelbier gbãgbaa lɛ fʋ ɩ a 'lɔ na chiine a kũu pɔ, bɩɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ tufʋ 'lɔ mɩ na chiine nɩ fʋ a yeltorsɩ jie.
Tɩchɛ n puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, yɩn dɔ̃ɔ gba ɩ a yelbier gbãgbaar, tɩ yɩ wa sɔɔn naa a yɩ nyãa wʋ jaa na yɩ de a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wiilfʋ nyã pɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn faa yɩn yin a yelbier pɔ a yɩ so yɩ mɩ̃ɛ, na yɩ lɩɛb yeltorsɩ gbãgbaar.

Nɩsaal 'yɛr lɛ n de man a yɩ ɩ̃gãma yɩn ba tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ nyɔɔrɔ jũu. Nɩtãa lɛ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ ma de a yɩ ɩ̃gãn jiir ka a ɩ gbãgbaar kʋ a ala na ba vɩɛl ɛ, naa ma pʋɔrɔ putuyele 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃, pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, yɩ de a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ka a ɩ yeltorsɩ nɩ chɛchɛ ɩfʋ gbãgbaar.
Yɩn dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a yelbier gbãgbaar, a yeltorsɩ ba so yɩ ɛ.
Tɔ̃nɔ̃ buor lɛ yɩ nyɛ yin a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a yelsɩ ala na ben ɩ vɩ̃ a pʋ̃pãanyã? A bomo ala baarfʋ daar ɩn kũu.
Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã, Nãaŋmɩn na ben faa yɩ yin a yelbier pɔ a yɩ ɩ a wʋ gbãgbaar, a tɔ̃nɔ̃ yɩn nyɛ ɩn chɛchɛ ɩfʋ ka a baaraa ɩ nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.
Bojũu yelbier sãyar ɩn kũu, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn kʋfʋ ɩ nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Yaa be bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, yɛɛr, n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ a bala na bɔ̃ɔ a nɛbinãa ɩka a nɛbinãa ma tʋ̃ɔn nɩrɛ na chɛnɛ nɩ nɩbir ɛ?
De man pɔɔ na kul sɩrɛ, a nɛɛ lũ wʋn mar a sɩrɛ ka wʋ chire dayuo na gãn wʋ, a sɩrɛ na chɛnɛ ba kpi ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩrɛ wa kpi, a kul taa nɛɛ 'lɔ ba lɛ lũ wʋ go ɛ.
'Lɔ wa tɩ ir dayuo a sɩrɛ na chɛnɛ vʋrɔ, ban 'yɛr naa ɩka wʋ sɔ̃ɔ naa. Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a sɩrɛ kpi naa, a nɛɛ ba lɛ lũ wʋ go ɛ, ala ɩ wʋ gba na kul dayuo, waa sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Lɛ lɛ, n yɛɛr yɩ mɩ kpin kʋ a nɛbinãa tu a Kɩrɩsɩto ɩ̃gãn pɔ, ka yɩn be be kʋ nɩyuo, a 'lɔ na ir a kũu pɔ ka sɩn tʋ̃ɔ wɔ̃ wɔ̃mɔ̃ kʋ Nãaŋmɩn.
Bojũu a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a yelbier ɩ̃gãn na so sɩ, ka a yelbier vɔlaa ma de a nɛbinãa tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ a sɩ ɩ̃gãn pɔ a sɩ wɔ̃nɔ̃ kũu wɔ̃mɔ̃.
Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã, sɩ kpin kʋ a 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ lũ sɩ, sɩ son sɩ mɩ̃ɛ yi a nɛbinãa 'lɔ pɔ, na sɩ pãa tʋ̃nɔ̃ a sɔpaalaa nyã pɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ba ɩ a sɔkoraa ban sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a gãn pɔ ɛ.

Bo lɛ sɩn lɛ 'yɛr go? A nɛbinãa ɩn yeldɛɛr bɩɩ? Kai, sɔr ba be be ɛ! Waa ɩ yeldɛɛr ɛ. Sɩrɛ jaa n kʋ̃ naa bɔ̃ɔ yelbier ɛ, ala ɩ a nɛbinãa ba be be ɛ. Bojũu n kʋ̃ naa bɔ̃ɔ jɩɛlfʋ ɛ, ala ɩ a nɛbinãa ba ta 'yɛr ɩka, "Taa jɩɛlɛ nɩrɛ bon ɛ."
Tɩchɛ a yelbier far kpɛ na wʋ nyɛ sɔr a nɛbinãa sɛ̃ vɛ̃ ka n wɔ̃ jɩɛlfʋ jaa bʋrɔ vɔlaa. A nɛbinãa baa be be ɛ, yelbier ɩn bʋ̃kũu.
Ɩn dɔ̃ɔ be be ba bɔ̃ɔ a nɛbinãa ɛ, tɩchɛ a nɛbinãa na wa wa, yelbier faan a nyɛvʋr, ka a kũu kʋ ma.
Be lɛ n nyɛ ɩka a nɛbinãa 'lɔ naa waan nyɛvʋr, kũu lɛ wʋ bar tɩ waan.
Bojũu a yelbier nyɛn sɔr a nɛbinãa na kʋ wʋ, a wʋ far kpɛ na wʋ bɛl ma, ka a tu a nɛbinãa nyã pɔ, ka a kũu kʋ ma.
A lɛ jũu, a nɛbinãa ɩn chɛchɛ, ka a nɛbinãa 'yɛr mɩ ɩ chɛchɛ, naa tor ɩ vɩla.
Bon 'lɔ na ɩ bʋ̃vɩla pãa lɩɛb kũu wa kʋ ma? A ba ɩ lɛ lɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ n bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a ɩn yelbier, na a lɩɛb kũu kʋ ma tu a bon 'lɔ na ɩ vɩla pɔ. A tu naa 'yɛr binãa pɔ, ka bier na ɩ yelbier sɩrɛ jaa.
Sɩn bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a nɛbinãa ɩn Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bon lɛ, tɩchɛ ka a maa ɩ ɩ̃gãn yelbier na da ka n ɩ a wʋ gbãgbaa.
N maa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ɩn maala ɛ, bojũu a ala ɩn bʋɔrɔ ɩka n maal n maa maal ɛ, tɩchɛ a ala ɩn 'laar lɛ n ma maala.
Ala ɩ n ma maala naa ala ɩn ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka n maala ɛ, n sɔɔ naa ɩka a nɛbinãa ɩn vɩla.
An ben be a lɛ, a ba ɩ maa mɩ̃ɛ lɛ bɔ̃ɔn tɩ ɩrɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yelbier 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na be a n pɔ lɛ ɩrɛ.
N bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka yelvɩla jaa ba be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a maa yelbier ɩ̃gãn tɛɛ lɛ. Bojũu n ma bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n maal vɩla tɩ naa maa tʋ̃ɔ maal ɛ.
Bojũu a ala ɩn maala ba ɩ a vɩla ala ɩn bʋɔrɔ a maalfʋ ɛ. Kai, a bier ala ɩn ba bʋɔrɔ a maalfʋ lɛ, ala lɛ n ma maala.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, ala ɩ n maala naa a ala ɩn ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka n maal ɛ, a ba lɛ ɩ maa lɛ lɛ maala go ɛ, tɩchɛ a yelbier 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ maala.
Lɛ lɛ, n nyɛn a lɛ a nɛbinãa na tʋ̃nɔ̃, maa wa bʋɔrɔ ɩka n maal vɩla, a yelbier lɛ ma tɔɔ gbʋr ma jaa yɛ̃ yɛ̃.
N bʋɔrɔ naa Nãaŋmɩn nɛbinãa nɩ a n pʋɔ wʋ jaa,
tɩchɛ n nyɛ naa a nɛbinãa ɩ̃sʋɔ na tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a n ɩ̃gãn jiir amɩne. Wʋ jɛɛrɛ nɩ naa a n tɩɛr na wʋ maal ma ka n ɩ a yelbier nɩpɔɔraa a n ɩ̃gãn jiir pɔ.
Nɩjarma lɛ n pãa ɩ! An lɛ na faa ma yin a yelbier ɩ̃gãn nyã na chiine ma a kũu jie?
Nãaŋmɩn son puorfʋ tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ! A maa mɩ̃ɛ a n tɩɛr pɔ, n ɩn a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ gbãgbaa, tɩchɛ a n yelbier ɩ̃gãn mɩ ɩ gbãgbaa kʋ a yelbier nɛɛ.
A lɛ jũu pʋ̃pãanyã, yele ba pɔɔrɔ a bala na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
A tun a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ jũu, a nɛɛ 'lɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nyɛvʋr faa man yin a nɛɛ 'lɔ na ɩ yelbier nɩ kũu pɔ.

Bojũu a bon 'lɔ a Mosesɩ nɛɛ na ba dɔ̃ɔ tara kpɛ̃ɔ na maal ɛ, a sɩ yelbier ɩ̃gãn na bal bar, Nãaŋmɩn maal naa na wʋ tʋ̃ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ Bie a wʋ nyɛtãan a sɩn na maala a yelbier kaar a wʋ wa ɩ a yelbier bɔɔrlo bon. Lɛ lɛ wʋ sɔ̃ɔ yelbier a nɩsaal pɔ bar,
ka a lɛ a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa na bʋɔrɔ ka a sɛɛ a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a sɩ kʋ̃ lɛ turo a lɛ a yelbier ɩ̃gãn na bʋɔrɔ ɛ, tɩ turo a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na bʋɔrɔ.
A bala na turo a ba yelbier ɩ̃gãn, ba den a ba tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a ala na ɩ a ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa pɔ, tɩchɛ a bala mɩ na turo a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na bʋɔrɔ, mɩ den a ba tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a ala a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na bʋɔrɔ.
Yelbier sʋɔ tɩɛr ɩn kũu, tɩchɛ a tɩɛr 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na so ɩn nyɛvʋr nɩ nyã'maar.
A yelbe-ɩrɛ tɩɛr ma 'laar Nãaŋmɩn, wʋ maa siir wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ ɛ, wʋ mɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɩ ɛ.
Bala na turo a lɛ a ba ɩ̃gãn na bʋɔrɔ, kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ pɛl Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ ɛ.

Yɩn 'lɔ ba lɛ turo a lɛ a yelbier ɩ̃gãn na bʋɔrɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ turo naa a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na bʋɔrɔ, ala ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ben a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ. Ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba wa tara a Kɩrɩsɩto Sɩɛ ɛ, waa ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto tʋɔr ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ Kɩrɩsɩto ben a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a yɩ ɩ̃gãn kpi naa a yelbier jũu, tɩchɛ ka a yɩ sɩɩr tara nyɛvʋr a yeltorsɩ jũu.
Ala ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'lɔ na sɩ̃ɩ a Yesu a kũu pɔ, ben a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, 'lɔ na sɩ̃ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto a kũu pɔ, na kʋn a yɩ ɩ̃gãn kũn nyɛvʋr tu a wʋ Sɩɛ pɔ, a 'lɔ na be a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A lɛ jũu n yɛɛr, sɩ din sãn, tɩchɛ a ba ɩ a sɩ yelbier ɩ̃gãn nyã lɛ ɛ, a sɩn turo a lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ ɛ.
Bojũu ala ɩ yɩ turo naa a lɛ a yɩ yelbier ɩ̃gãn na bʋɔrɔ, yɩn kpi naa, tɩchɛ ala ɩ yɩ den a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋ̃n a ɩ̃gãn ma maal bidɛbɛ bar, yɩ ben a nyɛvʋr sɔr pɔ.
Bojũu bala jaa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na chiine, bala lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir.
A ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wʋn kʋ yɩ, waa maala yɩ gbãgbaar ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kʋrɔ yɩ go ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ kʋ yɩn a wʋ Sɩɛ a yɩ lɩɛb a wʋ bibiir. A Sɩɛ nyã lɛ sɩ ma de bʋɔlɔ wʋ, "N Sãa Nãaŋmɩn."
A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mɩ̃ɛ din dãasɩɛ nɩ a sɩ sɩɩr ɩka sɩ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn bibiir.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, ala ɩ sɩ ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn bibiir, sɩn lɛ so a bʋ̃sʋ̃n ala a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a wʋ nɛɛ, 'matãan a Kɩrɩsɩto. Ala ɩ sɩrɛ jaa, sɩ lɔ̃ɔn wʋn di a wʋ dɔɔyɛ, lɛ lɛ sɩ mɩn 'matãan wʋ põ a wʋ tɩɩr.
N man nyɛ a sɩ dɩna dɔɔyɛ ka waa jɩ̃ bon ɛ, ɩn de man a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr 'lɔ na wa nyɩr a sɩ sɛ̃.
A bʋ̃maalsɩ a jaa nyʋnyʋlɔ naa chɩlɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir wʋn wa vɛ̃ a ba nyɩrɛ.
Bojũu a bʋ̃maalsɩ a jaa ben a ɩ̃gãn sal pĩlem an ba ɩ a ba mɩ̃ɛ bɔfʋ ɛ,
tɩ ɩ a 'lɔ na maal ba bɔfʋ, na wʋ chɛnɛ tara ba nɩ tɩɛr sʋ̃, ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn na wa faa ban yin a gbãgbaa 'lɔ na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ kpɛ a mɩ̃ɛ sofʋ 'lɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir tɩɩr pɔ.
Bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa a bʋ̃maalsɩ a jaa na hʋ̃nɔ̃, ka a ɔɔrɔ ba fɩka pɔɔ na dɔɔrɔ yi a lɛ daar jaa wa tãn a dɩna.
A ba ɩ lɛ tɛɛ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋfʋ bidɔ̃ɔ, mɩ ʋrɔ a sɩ pʋɔm na sɩ nyʋnyʋlɔ chɛlɛ nɩ wʋn wa lɩɛb sɩ a wʋ bibiir, nɩ a faafʋ wʋn wa faan a sɩ ɩ̃gãma.
A tɩɛrtɔ nyãna jũu lɛ sɩ nyɛn a faafʋ. Tɩchɛ bon fʋn nyɛn nɩbir, fʋ maa lɛ tara a wʋ tɩɛr go ɛ. An lɛ ma tɩɛrɛ bon wʋn tara baar?
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ sɩ tɩɛrɛ na bon sɩn ba tara sɛrɛ ɛ, sɩ ma din kãnyir chɛlɛ.
A lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma sʋ̃nɔ̃ sɩ a sɩ balfʋ pɔ. Saa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ sɩn taa ma sʋɔr a Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mɩ̃ɛ lɛ ma de hʋ̃ʋnfʋ 'lɔ sɩn kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ man a 'yɛrbie ɛ, na wʋ ma sʋɔrɔ kʋrɔ sɩ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ma chɛl a sɩ nyãa bɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tɩɛr, bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nyãna lɛ sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ a wʋ nɩbɛ nɩ a lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ.
Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a yele a jaa pɔ, Nãaŋmɩn ma tʋ̃n ka a ɩ sʋ̃ kʋ a bala na nʋ̃ wʋ, a bala wʋn tu a wʋ tɩɛr pɔ bʋɔl.
Bojũu bala a Nãaŋmɩn na de nie bɔ̃ɔn na wʋ chɛl ir ka ba lɩɛb kaara a wʋ Bie kaar, ka wʋn ɩ a yɛɛr ba jaa pɔ Bidadɔ̃ɔ.
A bala wʋn de nie ir, bala lɛ wʋ bʋɔl, a bala wʋn bʋɔl, bala lɛ wʋ vɛ̃ ka a ba yele tor, a bala mɩ wʋn vɛ̃ ka a ba yele tor, bala mɩ lɛ wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩɩr.
Bo lɛ sɩn pãa 'yɛr nɩ a yele nyãna? Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn ben a sɩ sɛ̃, an lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ jɛb sɩ?
A 'lɔ na ba mɔ̃ɔ sɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ bie ɛ, tɩchɛ na wʋ sɔɔ bar sɔr ka ba kʋ wʋ a sɩ jũu, bo lɛ na ŋmaa wʋ sɔr ka wʋ kʋ̃ de a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ 'matãan a bomo a jaa kʋ sɩ ɛ?
An lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr 'yɛr dɔɔl a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na ir? Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ maal ba a ba tor.
An 'lɔ lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba 'yɛr? Nɩrɛ jaa ba be be ɛ. A Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nyã na kpi, 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn mɩ sɩ̃ɩ ka wʋ ir ɩ vʋr na wʋ ara Nãaŋmɩn nũsʋ̃ɔ jie, 'lɔ lɛ sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ sɩ.
An lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ tɔɔ sɩ yin a Kɩrɩsɩto nʋ̃fʋ nyã pɔ? Wõm, bɩɩ wʋʋr, bɩɩ gefʋ, bɩɩ kɔ̃, bɩɩ sal'mʋɔr, bɩɩ dɔɔyɛ, bɩɩ ban na kʋ sɩ nɩ sʋɔ?
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "A yɩ jũu, sɩ ma tuor kũu bɩbir jaa. Ba ma kaa sɩn fɩka piir ban chiine nɩ kɔkɔɛ ŋmafʋ jie."
Kai, a anyãna a jaa pɔ, sɩ ɩ naa tʋ̃tʋ̃ɔnbɔ tu a 'lɔ na nʋ̃ sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Bojũu n bɔ̃ɔn sɩrɛ jaa ɩka kũu, bɩɩ nyɛvʋr, bɩɩ malakasɩ, bɩɩ a sɩdɛbɛ, bɩɩ ka dɩna lɛ, bɩɩ nɩdaar, bɩɩ ka kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme lɛ,
ka dofʋ lɛ, bɩɩ suufʋ lɛ, bɩɩ bon jaa na be a bʋ̃maalsɩ pɔ lɛ, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ tɔɔ sɩ yin a nʋ̃fʋ a Nãaŋmɩn na nʋ̃ sɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, n ba ŋmara jirsɩ ɛ, a n tɩɛr mɩ din dãasɩɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pɔ.
Nɩbaal kpɛ man tɩ põn bar, ka wʋʋr sɛɛ ma a nyãa.
An taa nʋ̃mɔ̃ ma naa ɩka n ben pɔ'yɔ̃ɔfʋ pɔ naa ba lɛ pʋɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ ɛ, a n yɛɛr Isɩral nɩbɛ jũu, bala lɛ ɩ a n mɩ̃ɛ nɩbɛ.
A Isɩral nɩbɛ bala lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn de ka ba ɩ a wʋ bibiir, na wʋ kʋ ba a wʋ tɩɩr nɩ a nɛtɩrsɩ wʋn pɔn ba, na wʋ kʋ ba a nɛbinãa, nɩ a lɛ ban na puoro wʋ a wʋ puorfʋ yir nɩ a nɛɛr wʋn tɩr kʋ ba.
Bala lɛ ɩ a sãakpãmɩne, a ba pɔ lɛ ba bɩɛr a Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ na ɩ a nɩsaal yi, na wʋ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kaara a bomo a jaa, 'lɔ lɛ ban pɛɛrɛ bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
A ba ɩ fɩka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɩn faa ɛ, bojũu a ba ɩ a bala jaa ban dɔɔ a Isɩral nɩbɛ pɔ, ba jaa lɛ ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ɛ.
A ba ɩ baa yi a wʋ par pɔ ɛ, ba jaa baa ɩ Abraham bibiir ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr nɛɛ kʋ a Abraham ɩka, "Isaakɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a fʋ yɔn na yi."
A ba ɩ a ɩ̃gãn vaar bibiir lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir ɛ, tɩchɛ a bibiir bala a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ a wʋ dɔɔ, bala lɛ wʋ kaa a ba ɩ Abraham bibiir.
Bojũu nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ 'yɛr, "A daar wa ta, ɩn lɩɛb wa ka a Saara dɔɔ dabile."
A ba ɩ anyã tɛɛ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a Worbɛka dɔɔn dabil ayi ka ba sãa ɩ bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ na ɩ a sɩ sãakpã Isaakɩ.
Sɛrɛ tɩ ka wʋ wa dɔɔ a yɩbɛ banyãna, baa mɩ maal yele jaa vɩla bɩɩ dɛɛr ɛ, tɩ nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a ɩ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ pɔ lɛ wʋ ma tu ir a nɩrɛ.
A kʋ̃ ɩ a fʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ jũu ɛ, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na bʋɔl fʋ. Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ a Worbɛka, "A yɛkarma na tʋ̃nɔ̃ na kʋrɔ a yɛbile."
Lɛ mɩ lɛ a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "N nʋ̃n Jekɔb tɩchɛ naa 'laar a Esau."
Bo lɛ sɩn pãa lɛ 'yɛr? Nãaŋmɩn ɩn nɩfɩlefɩle bɩɩ? Kai. Sɔr ba be be ɛ!
Bojũu wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a Mosesɩ, "Nɩrɛ 'lɔ ɩn na kaa nɩbaal lɛ ɩn na kaa nɩbaal, naa maal vɩla kʋ a 'lɔ ɩn na maal vɩla kʋ."
A lɛ jũu a ba ɩ lɛ nɩrɛ na bʋɔrɔ ɛ, bɩɩ na tʋ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yin Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal kaafʋ pɔ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ a Ijipitɩ nãa Faaro ɩka yaa, "Maa lɛ bin fʋ a yele nyãna jũu, ɩka n wiil a n kpɛ̃ɔ a fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka ban bʋɔl a n yuor a wɛr wʋ jaa."
A lɛ jũu, Nãaŋmɩn ma kãan nɩrɛ 'lɔ wʋn bʋɔrɔ nɩbaal, a 'lɔ wʋ mɩn bʋɔrɔ, wʋ ma vɛ̃n ka a wʋ nyãa kpɛ̃mɛ.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ na sʋʋr ma naa ɩka, "Bo lɛ so ka a Nãaŋmɩn na de yele dɔɔl sɩ? Bojũu nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ tɔr a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ ɛ?"
Tɩchɛ fʋ̃ʋ mɩ nɩ ana, nɩsaal na fʋn 'yɛr lɩɛr Nãaŋmɩn? "Laa na tʋ̃ɔn sʋʋr a 'lɔ na mɛ wʋ ɩka, 'Bo lɛ fʋ mɛ ma a nɩtɔ̃ ɔ?' "
A lamɩɛrɛ ba tara sɔr ɩka wʋ de a yɔɔr bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ mɛn bʋ̃ʋdʋʋ tɩchɛ mɛn ladiraa ɛ?
Bo lɛ, ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kaa ir ɩka wʋ wiil a wʋ suur na wʋ vɛ̃ a ba bɔ̃ɔn a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ, tɩ na wʋ chɛnɛ tara kãnyir nɩ a bonsɩ ala wʋn chɔɔr gun a sɔ̃ɔ barfʋ?
Bo lɛ, ala ɩ wʋ maal a nɩtɔ̃ ɩka a bonsɩ ala na ɩ a wʋ nɩbaal bomo, ka a bɔ̃ɔn a wʋ tɩɩr tɔ̃nɔ̃, a bala wʋn de nie chɔɔr gun a wʋ tɩɩr,
a sɩn gba wʋ mɩ na bʋɔl, na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ na wʋ bʋɔl a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ?
Nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ ka a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrɛ Hosea sɛb a wʋ gãn pɔ, "Ɩn bʋɔl ban a maa nɩbɛ, a bala na ba ɩ a n nɩbɛ ɛ, naa bʋɔl wʋ a n nɩ nʋ̃ naa, 'lɔ na ba dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a n nɩ nʋ̃ naa ɛ."
Ka wʋ sɛb a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ an ɩ a jie 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ wʋn 'yɛr ɩka, "Yaa ɩ a n nɩbɛ ɛ, bala naa lɛ ban lɛ bʋɔl a Nãaŋmɩn vʋr bibiir."
Isaiya mɩ dɔ̃ɔ mʋɔl a Isɩral nɩbɛ na wʋ 'yɛr, "Ala ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ gba waan fɩka man nɛɛ bire, a bɩ̃lãa bala na wa chɛ, lɛ na nyɛ faafʋ.
Bojũu a sɩ Soro na pɔɔn naa a wʋ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ na wʋ ŋmaa a ju."
Isaiya dɔ̃ɔn de nie 'yɛr, "Ala ba ɩ a sɩ Soro na ɩ a gãdaa jaa gãdaa sʋɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ bar a sɩ par ŋmaa ɛ, sɩn taa mɩ nyʋɔl kaara a Sodom nɩ a Gomora tẽn kaar."
Bo lɛ sɩn pãa lɛ 'yɛr? A bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na ba dɔ̃ɔ turo a yeltorsɩ ɛ, bala lɛ be tara yaa. A ba yele tor naa ban tara sɔɔfʋ jũu.
Tɩchɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ na turo a yeltorsɩ ba tara yaa ɛ,
Bo lɛ so? Bojũu baa turo nɩ sɔɔfʋ ɛ, tɩ turo nɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃, na ba bãr a kʋsɩr bãraa.
Nɩtãa lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ a wʋ 'yɛr, "Nyɛ, n bin a kʋsɩr be a Jiyon ka nɩbɛ na bãra nɩ a pie 'lɔ na vɛ̃ ka ba loro, ka nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de wʋ, vɩ̃ kʋ̃ kpɛ wʋ ɛ."
N yɛɛr, lɛ a n nyãa na bʋɔrɔ ka n sʋɔrɔ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ɩka, a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba nyɛ faafʋ.
Bojũu ɩn tʋ̃ɔn di a ba dãasɩɛ ɩka ba tara na nɩbijɩɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn yele, tɩchɛ bɔ̃ɔfʋ lɛ ba pʋɔ a ba nɩbijɩɛ pɔ ɛ.
Ban ba bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yeltorsɩ ɛ, tɩ na ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba bin a ba mɩ̃ɛ yeltorsɩ, baa siir ba mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn yeltorsɩ ɛ.
Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ ɩ a nɛbinãa tɛɛfʋ jie, ka nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ de wʋ, wʋn vɛ̃n ka a nɩnyɩnɛ yele tor.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Mosesɩ man a lɛ a nɛbinãa na ma vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ yele tor, "A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na maala a lɛ a nɛbinãa na 'yɛr, na tara na nyɛvʋr."
Tɩchɛ a yeltorsɩ ala na yire a sɔɔfʋ pɔ 'yɛr naa, "Ta tɩɛr a fʋ nyãa pɔ sʋʋr ɩka, 'An lɛ na do a saaju?' Ka a lɛ wiil ɩka, tɩ tara a Kɩrɩsɩto suu waan.
Bɩɩ sʋʋr a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩka, 'An lɛ na chen a kpĩi tẽe?' " Ka a lɛ wiil ɩka, tɩ ir a Kɩrɩsɩto a kũu pɔ waan.
Tɩchɛ bo lɛ a 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ? "A 'yɛr gbʋr fʋ naa, a ben a fʋ nɛɛ pɔ, naa be a fʋ nyãa pɔ." Ala lɛ ɩ a sɔɔfʋ 'yɛr nyã sɩn mʋɔlɔ.
Ala ɩ fʋ haan a fʋ nɛɛ chiir a fʋ pʋɔ 'yɛr ɩka, "A Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ ɩ a Soro," na fʋ sɔɔn a fʋ nyãa wʋ jaa ɩka, Nãaŋmɩn ir wʋn a kũu pɔ, fʋn nyɛn faafʋ.
Bojũu a fʋ nyãa 'lɔ fʋn sɔɔ den lɛ na vɛ̃ ka a fʋ yele tor, ka a fʋ nɛɛ 'lɔ fʋn haan 'yɛr lɛ na faafʋ.
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de wʋ, vɩ̃ kʋ̃ kpɛ wʋ ɛ."
Bojũu tɛɛ taa ba be a Juu nɩrɛ nɩ a 'lɔ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ. A Soro bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ɩ ba jaa Soro, na wʋ sʋ̃nɔ̃ a bala jaa na bʋɔlɔ a wʋ yuor.
Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Bala jaa na bʋɔlɔ a Soro yuor ɩka wʋ sʋ̃ʋ ba, na nyɛn faafʋ."
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ban ɩrɛ wa bʋɔl a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ ban ba sɔɔ ɛ? Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ban ɩ wa sɔɔ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ ban ba wõ a wʋ 'yɛr ɛ? Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ban ɩrɛ wa wõ a wʋ 'yɛr ka nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ ba wa mʋɔl a wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba ɛ?
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ ban ɩrɛ wa mʋɔl ka baa tʋ̃ ba ɛ? Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Nyɛ lɛ a bala na waara nɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ gbɛɛ na vɩɛlɛ ka."
Tɩchɛ a ba ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba jaa lɛ lɩɛb kaa a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã ɛ. Bojũu Isaiya dɔ̃ɔ sʋʋr, "Sɩ Soro, an lɛ sɔɔ de a sɩ 'yɛr?"
Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ ɩka 'yɛr fʋn ma wõ pɔ lɛ fʋ ma sɔɔ, ka a 'yɛrbie ala ban wõ ɩn a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr.
Tɩchɛ ka n sʋʋr, a mɔ̃ baa wõ naa ɛ? Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ ba wõ naa naa. "A ba kɔkɔr yin de jie wʋ jaa, ka a ba 'yɛr tɩ ta a wɛr tɛɛfʋ jie."
N lɛ sʋʋr kaa go, a mɔ̃ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ? Mosesɩ dɔ̃ɔ de nie 'yɛr, "A bala na ba ɩ paal ɛ, ɩn maal ba naa ka nyuur kpɛ yɩ, naa lɛ maal a paal 'lɔ na ba bɔ̃ɔ bon jaa ɛ, ka suur kpɛ yi."
Ka Isaiya mɩ ba dɔ̃ɔ jo dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛr ɩka, "A bala na ba dɔ̃ɔ yʋɔrɔ bʋɔrɔ ma ɛ, ba nyɛ ma naa, n wiil naa n mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a bala na ba dɔ̃ɔ sʋrɔ ma ɛ."
Tɩchɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ 'lɔ, nɩtɔ̃ lɛ wʋ 'yɛr, "Bɩbir jaa lɛ n ma tur a n nuur bʋɔlɔ a bibawõnsɩ nɩ a nɩdɛbɛ, na turo a sɔɩ ala na ba vɩɛlɛ ɛ bʋɔrɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ tɩɛrsɩ bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ."
N pãa sʋʋr naa, a Nãaŋmɩn ben tɔr a wʋ nɩbɛ bar bɩɩ? Kai! A maa mɩ̃ɛ ɩn a Isɩral nɩrɛ, naa ɩ a Abraham yɔ̃ɔ yi a Benjamin bʋrɔ pɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn ba tɔr a wʋ nɩbɛ bar ɛ, bala lɛ wʋ de nie bɔ̃ɔ. Yaa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr, lɛ a Elaija na dɔ̃ɔ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn waala dɔɔlɔ a Isɩral nɩbɛ,
"N Soro, ba kʋn a fʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ, na ba wɛl a fʋ bɔɔr lofʋ jiir bar. Maa tɛɛ lɛ chɛ, tɩ a ba bʋɔrɔ a n kʋfʋ."
Bo lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ a Elaija? Wʋ 'yɛr naa, "N chɛnɛ na tara nɩbɛ tur ata kɔɔr anũu (7,000) na ba gbur dumo puor a tɩɩ Baal ɛ."
Lɛ mɩ lɛ a dɩna, nɩbɛ bamɩne chɛ naa ka Nãaŋmɩn na ir ba a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ jũu.
Ala be ɩ a wɩ̃ɛfʋ jũu lɛ, a ba lɛ ɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ go ɛ, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, a wɩ̃ɛfʋ kʋ̃ lɛ ɩ wɩ̃ɛfʋ lɛ go ɛ.
Bo pãa lɛ? A ala a Isɩral nɩbɛ na bʋɔrɔ nɩbijɩɛ baa nyɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na ir lɛ nyɛ. Ka a bala na chɛ kpɛ̃mɛ a ba nyãa.
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃n ka ba ɩ jaa bũrtũm wa tãn a dɩna. A ba nɩbie ala maa tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ bon ɛ, ka a ba tobo ala maa tʋ̃ɔ wõ 'yɛr ɛ."
A Nãa David mɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a ba 'yɛr a wʋ gãn pɔ, "Vɛ̃ ka a ba bʋ̃diir difʋ jie ka a lɩɛb bʋ̃nyɔɔrsɩ nɩ chɛɛr, ka a ɩ a ba bãr lofʋ jie nɩ a ba sãyar.
A ba nɩbie a jɔ̃ɔ, a ba kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ jaa ɛ, na ba kab gʋ̃mɔ̃ kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ dɔl ɛ."
N lɛ sʋʋr go, ba ben bãr na lo na ba kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ir jaa ɛ? A ba ɩ lɛ ɛ. A ba maal bɔrfʋ jũu, a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nyɛn faafʋ ka nyuur na kpɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a ba maal bɔrfʋ vɛ̃n ka a wɛr wʋ jaa le, ka a ba bɔrfʋ mɩ le a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, a bala mɩ̃ɛ wa pʋɔ ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an kaara!
Yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ, an ben ɩka maa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn ir tʋ̃ a yɩ pɔ, ka n ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nãa a yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ. N mʋ̃ɔn nɩbir nɩ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ nyã.
A maa tɩɛr lɛ ɩka nyuur wʋ kpɛ a maa mɩ̃ɛ nɩbɛ ka n tʋ̃ɔ a bamɩne faa.
Bojũu ala ɩ a ba tɔr barfʋ ɩn 'maalfʋ kʋ a wɛr, ka a Nãaŋmɩn lɛ wa de ba, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an kaara, a kʋ̃ kaara fɩka nɩrɛ na yi kũu pɔ tara nyɛvʋr ɛ?
Ala ɩ fʋ den a paanʋ̃dɔ̃ɔ kʋ Nãaŋmɩn, a paanʋ̃ɔ ala na chɛ, a jaa ɩn chɛchɛ. Ala ɩ fʋ den a tɩɛ nyɩɩr kʋ Nãaŋmɩn, a tɩɛ wilsɩ mɩ ɩn chɛchɛ.
Ala ɩ ba 'mɛl a tɩɛ mɩ̃ɛ wile ɩ̃sʋɔ bar tɩ ŋmaa a yɩn na ɩ a mʋɔ pɔ tɩɛ wile wa mar ka yɩ 'mataa tɔɔrɔ nyuro a kɔ̃bʋ̃'yen yire a tɩɛ ɩ̃gãn pɔ nʋ̃ɔnɔ̃,
taa tɩɛr ɩka fʋ sa naa a wilsɩ ala ɛ. Fʋ̃ʋ wa 'mɔɔrɔ fʋ mɩ̃ɛ, lɩɛb tɩɛr kaa ɩka a ba ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a wile lɛ tuo a nyɩbɛ ɛ, tɩ a nyɩbɛ lɛ tuo a fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a wile.
Yɩn 'yɛr yɩn pãa na 'yɛr nɩ nyã, "Ba 'mɛl a wilsɩ ala bar tɩ pãa na de ma mar."
A lɛ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ, tɩchɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ 'mɛl ba bar a ba ba sɔɔfʋ jũu, tɩchɛ ka a yɩn ara nɩ sɔɔfʋ. Yɩ ta bʋɔrɔ yuor ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ joro dãbɩ̃ɛ.
Bojũu ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn ba dɔ̃ɔ bar a tɩɛ mɩ̃ɛ wilsɩ ɛ, wʋ kʋ̃ bar a yɩn mɩ ɛ.

Yɩ tɩɛr kaa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a maal vɩla sʋɔ ka a wʋ yele mɩ kpɛ̃mɛ, a wʋ yele kpɛ̃mɛ na kʋ a bala na lo, tɩchɛ na wʋ maal vɩla kʋ a yɩn, ala ɩ yɩ chɛnɛ na chiine a wʋ maal vɩla pɔ. Ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, wʋn ŋmaa yɩn bar.
Ala wa ɩ ba tɛɛn a ba baal bar, Nãaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ɔn de ba lɛ mar a tɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ, Nãaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ɔn lɛ de ba mar a lɛ go.
Yɩ kaa, ala ɩ a yɩn ban ŋmaa yin a mʋɔ pɔ tɩɛ pɔ wa mar a yir tɩɛ ban sɛl, an lɛ ɩn tuo a yir tɩɛ wilsɩ ala ban dɔ̃ɔ 'mɛl bar marfʋ bɩɩ?

N ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka n vɛ̃ ka a yelsɔɔlaa nyã sɔɔl a yɩn na ɩ a n yɛɛr tɩ ba ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ɛ, ka yɩ taa bʋɔrɔ yuor nɩ a yele nyã ɛ. A Isɩral nɩbɛ tara na a nyãkpɩ̃ɛn a lɛ nɛ na tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a bala na ba ɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ɛ, na wa tɩ nyɛ a faafʋ baar.
Lɛ lɛ na ɩ tɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba jaa pãa nyɛ faafʋ nɩtãa lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Fafaara na yin be a Jiyon wa, na wʋ wa lɩɛb tɩɛr jaa na ba vɩɛlɛ ɛ, yin a Jekɔb bal nɩbɛ pɔ bar.
A nɛtɩraa lɛ a nyãna ɩn na tara nɩ ba, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn wa de a ba yeldɛbɛ a jaa bar."
Fʋ̃ʋ kaa, a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã vɛ̃n ka ba ɩ Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃dẽme a yɩn na sɔɔ de jũu. Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a irfʋ pɔ mɩ lɛ, bala lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃ yɔɔ a ba sãakpãmɩne jũu.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn kʋfʋ nɩ a wʋ bʋɔlfʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb jaa ɛ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a yɩn mɩ na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, na yaa dɔ̃ɔ wõnõ a Nãaŋmɩn toor ɛ, tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã yɩ nyɛn a wʋ nɩbaal a ba bawõfʋ jũu.
Lɛ lɛ a bala mɩ na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ, ba mɩ lɩɛb ɩ bawõnsɩ, na ba pãa mɩ na nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal a pʋ̃pãanyã, nɩtãa lɛ a sɩn mɩ na nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn pɔɔn a nɩbɛ ba jaa a bawõnsɩ die pɔ, na wʋn tʋ̃ɔ kaa ba jaa nɩbaal.
Nyɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn lefʋ na suu jɩ̃. A wʋ yɛ̃ nɩ a wʋ bɔ̃ɔfʋ ba gbʋr ɛ! A wʋ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ ba be bɔ̃ɔfʋ ɛ. A wʋ sɔɩ mɩ ba be bɩɛrfʋ ɛ!
"An lɛ dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro tɩɛr? Bɩɩ an lɛ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a wʋ 'yɛr sʋ̃nɔ̃."
"An lɛ dɔ̃ɔ de nie kʋ Nãaŋmɩn bon, ka wʋ pãa wa yara a sãn?"
Bojũu wʋ jie lɛ a bomo a jaa yi. 'Lɔ lɛ maal a jaa, na wʋ so a bonsɩ a jaa. 'Lɔ lɛ so a tɩɩr bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
A lɛ jũu, n sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa yɛɛr, a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal nyã jũu, yɩ de a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ na ɩ bʋ̃nɩbie lon bɔɔr kʋ Nãaŋmɩn. A ɩn chɛchɛ naa pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ. Lɛ lɛ ɩ a puorfʋ na tara par.

Yɩ taa lɛ wa lɩɛrɛ maala a lɛ a wɛr nɩbɛ na maala go ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ maala a lɛ na lɩɛrɛ yɩ a tɩɛr paalaa nyã yɩn nyɛ. Yɩn pãa tʋ̃ɔn bɛɛr na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ, a ala na ɩ vɩla naa pɛlɛ a wʋ pʋɔ naa ɩ chɛchɛ.

A Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ nyã wʋn wɩ̃ɛ ma jũu, n sʋɔrɔ naa a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɩka, ta tɩɛr a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ tɩ põn bar a lɛ yɩn taa tɩɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ma tɩɛr a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ nɩbijɩɛ jaa jɩ̃ a sɔɔfʋ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ yɩ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a sɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na tara ɩ̃gãn tɩ ka a tara jidẽdẽme, a jidẽdẽme anyãna ba tʋ̃nɔ̃ tʋ̃bʋ̃'yen ɛ.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, a sɩn bala na ɩ yɔɔ tɩ lɔ̃ɔ ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen pɔ, a jidẽdẽme anyã a jaa 'mantaa tʋ̃nɔ̃.
Sɩ jaa tara na kʋfʋsɩ na tɛɛ taa, tu a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ wʋn wɩ̃ɛn sɩ. Ala ɩ a ɩ̃sʋɔ kʋfʋ ɩn a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʋ lɛ, wʋ ma 'yɛrɛ jɩ̃ a lɛ a wʋ sɔɔfʋ na ta.
Ka ala ɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ tʋ̃fʋ mɩ lɛ, vɛ̃ ka wʋ ma tʋ̃nɔ̃, ala ɩ wiilfʋ mɩ lɛ, vɛ̃ ka wʋ ma wile.

Ala ɩ ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ lɛ, vɛ̃ ka wʋ ma 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn. Ka ala ɩ a wʋ kʋfʋ lɛ nɩbaalsɩ sʋ̃ʋfʋ, vɛ̃ ka wʋ ma sʋ̃nɔ̃ ba nɩ pʋpɛl. Ala ɩ nɩdiere tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ, vɛ̃ a wʋ ma mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a tʋ̃mɔ̃. Ala wa ɩ nɩbɛ 'maalfʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ, wʋ ma maala a lɛ nɩ chɩlfʋ.
Nʋ̃fʋ wʋ ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ nʋ̃fʋ. 'Laar bon 'lɔ na ɩ dɛɛr, tɩ 'mar bon 'lɔ na ɩ sʋ̃.
Yɩ chɛlɛ taa yele, na yɩ de a yɛɛr nʋ̃fʋ nʋ̃n taa. Yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yɩ taaba gar a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ.
Yɩ ta ɩ nɩ tũtũlsɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ vɛ̃ ka a nʋ̃mɔ̃ yɩ a yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a sɩ Soro tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Yɩ chɩlɛ nɩ a yɩ tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie, na yɩ tara kãnyir a yɩ wõm pɔ, na yɩ tara yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a yɩ Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ pɔ.
Yɩ ma lɔ̃ɔ põn a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ bala na ba tara bon jaa ɛ, na yɩ ma diere sãanba a yɩ yie pɔ.
Na yɩ 'yɛrɛ nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bala na gere yɩ, na yɩ 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ ba, yɩ ta pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ɛ.
Yɩ chɩlɛ nɩ a bala na chɩlɛ, na yɩ mɩ pʋɔ a bala na kõnõ na yɩ kõnõ.
A yɩn nɩ a bala na kpɩɛrɛ, yɩ tara tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen. Yɩ ta kaara ba pɔrɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ sɔɔ 'matãan a nɩbɛ bala na ba jɩ̃ yɩ ɛ. Yɩ ta kaa ɩka yɩn ɩn yɛ̃ dẽme ɛ.
Yɩ ta de bier yãan bier sãn ɛ. Yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃, na yɩ maala a ala na vɩɛlɛ nɩrɛ jaa niem.
Ala ɩ an tʋ̃ɔ naa, an ɩ yɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ, yɩ tara nyã'maar nɩ a bala jaa yɩn lɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ nɩ.
N barmɩne, yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa yaara taa sãn ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ baraa kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn suur. Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Maa lɛ so a sãn yaafʋ, ɩn lɩɛb yaa a sãn." Lɛ lɛ a Soro 'yɛr.
Lɛ an na ɩ lɛ ɩka, "Ala ɩ kɔ̃ kpɛ̃n a fʋ dɔ̃sʋɔ, kʋ wʋ bʋ̃diir a wʋ di. Ala ɩ kɔ̃nyũur wa kpɛ wʋ naa, kʋ wʋ kʋ̃ɔ a wʋ nyũ. Fʋ̃ʋ be maala a nɩtɔ̃, an kaara fɩka bũu saalbie lɛ fʋ mʋ̃ɔ dɔɔl wʋ a jum."
Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka bier tʋ̃ɔ yɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ de vɩla tʋ̃ɔn bier.
A yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ ma siir a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a paal nɩbɛrɛ, bojũu kpɛ̃ɔ jaa ba be be ka a ba ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ bin ɛ. Kpɛ̃ɔ sʋɔ jaa ba be be ka Nãaŋmɩn ba lɛ bin wʋ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na chɩrɛ nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme ba nyãna, a Nãaŋmɩn na bin ba lɛ wʋ chɩrɛ nɩ, ka a bala na ɩrɛ a lɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔn ba mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr.

Bojũu a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme maa diere bier dɔɔlɔ a bala na maala vɩla ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala na maala a dɛɛr lɛ ba ma de yele dɔɔlɔ. Fʋ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka fʋ ta joro a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme dãbɩ̃ɛ bɩɩ? Fʋ pãa maala a lɛ na vɩɛlɛ, ban dãna fʋ naa.

Bojũu wʋ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ ɩka wʋ maal fʋ vɩla. Tɩchɛ fʋ̃ʋ wa maal dɛɛr 'lɔ, vɛ̃ ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kʋrɔ fʋ, a ba ɩ pɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ wʋ tara a sʋɔ ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ lɛ wʋ ɩ na ara kʋ yeltorsɩ ɩka wʋ kpãana a bala na maala dɛɛr.
A lɛ jũu, a tara na sɔr ka yɩ siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme, a ba ɩ ban na kpãa yɩ tɛɛ jũu ɛ, tɩchɛ an ɩ a yɩn mɩ̃ɛ mɩ bɔ̃ɔ nyɔɔfʋ jũu.
A anyãna jũu lɛ so yɩn yara lõpoo kʋrɔ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ na de a ba sɔ̃ɔ wʋ jaa tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ.
Nɩrɛ jaa sãn fʋn wa di, yab wʋ. Ka ala ɩ lõpoo lɛ faa yab ɛ, yab. Ka tẽmaal libie yabfʋ lɛ bɩɩ, yɩ ma yab, na yɩ joro a 'lɔ a jofʋ na sɛɛn, tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a 'lɔ mɩ a 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ na sɛɛn.
Yɩ taa pɛ̃nɛ taa libie ka sãn ma gã a yɩ chara pɔ ɛ, a sãn 'lɔ tɛɛ na gã a yɩ chara pɔ lɛ, nʋ̃fʋ yɩn na nʋ̃ nʋ̃ taa, bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na nʋ̃ a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ tun a lɛ a nɛbinãa na 'yɛr a jaa.

A 'yɛrbinsɩ lɛ a anyãna, "Ta sɛ̃ ɛ." "Ta kʋ nɩrɛ ɛ." "Ta ju nɩrɛ bon ɛ." "Ta jɩɛlɛ nɩrɛ bon ɛ." A 'yɛrbinsɩ ala a jaa nɩ pãa chɛ, ba den a jaa 'yɛr 'yɛr bir bʋ̃'yen ɩka, "Nʋ̃ a fʋ tɔ sʋɔ nɩtãa a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ."
Fʋ̃ʋ wa nʋ̃ nɩrɛ, faa maala wʋ bier ɛ. Ala lɛ so, fʋ̃ʋ wa tara nʋ̃fʋ, fʋ tu naa a lɛ jaa a Mosesɩ nɛɛ na 'yɛr.
Yɩ maala a nɩtɔ̃, bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa lɛ a dɩna sɔ̃ɔ nyã na kaara. A sɔ̃ɔ ta naa ɩka yɩ jɛɔ ir a yɩ gʋ̃ɔ pɔ, bojũu a sɩ faafʋ gbʋr jaa yɛ̃yɛ̃ gar a bɩbir 'lɔ sɩn dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ de.
A chɛn bɩ̃lãa ka a tɩ̃sɔɔ baar, tɩchɛ ka a ɩ a wɛr mɩ tɔ̃ɔ chaar a lɛ nɛ. Yɩ ɩ a sɩ yaar a tɩ̃sɔɔ bomo bar tɩ de a chãa bomo su.
Yɩ ɩ a sɩ kpɩɛrɛ jaa kãkar fɩka a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩbɛ, na sɩ ir sɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin dɩ̃ɛn bɔyuor pɔ, dãa buufʋ pɔ, sɛ̃sɛ̃yele pɔ, nɩ folaa ɩfʋ pɔ, bɩɩ gɔ̃mɔ̃ bɔfʋ nɩ nyuur pɔ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ de a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na yɩ su pɔɔ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ, na yɩ ta lɛ tɩɛrɛ ɩka yɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ a yɩ ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa na bʋɔrɔ go ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ sɔɔfʋ na ba jɩ̃ bon ɛ, yɩ ma sɔɔ de wʋ na yɩ ta tɔɔrɔ a wʋ yelbil 'yɛr ɛ.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ sɔɔfʋ ma vɛ̃n ka waa chire bon jaa ɛ, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ sɔɔfʋ mɩ na bal ka 'lɔ mɩ dire jɛvai tɛɛ.
A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba chire bon jaa ɛ, wʋ ta kaara a 'lɔ na ba dire a jaa pɔrɔ ɛ, a fʋ̃ʋ nyã mɩ na ba dire a jaa ɛ, ta kpɛrɛ a 'lɔ na dire a jaa ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn de wʋ naa.
Fʋ̃ʋ mɩ nɩ ana na fʋn tɔɔr nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ 'yɛr? A wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ sɛ̃ ka wʋ ara na bɩɩ wʋ lo naa, wʋn lɛ ara na, bojũu a wʋ Soro na tʋ̃ɔn maal wʋ a wʋ ara.
Nɩrɛ ma kãan a bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ a wʋ gar ɩ̃sʋɔ, ka ɩ̃sʋɔ kaa a bɩbie a jaa ka a ɩ bʋ̃'yen. Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ ma tɩɛr kaa a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɩɛr pɔ.

Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na de a bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ a wʋ gar a jaa, wʋ ɩrɛ a lɛ a sɩ Soro jũu. 'Lɔ na ɔɔrɔ a nʋ̃n, wʋ ɔɔrɔ a sɩ Soro jũu, bojũu wʋ ma sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ. A 'lɔ mɩ na ba ɔɔrɔ ɛ, wʋ mɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ a sɩ Soro jũu, wʋ mɩ ma puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan.
Bojũu nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba be be kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ. Nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa mɩ ba kpi kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɛɛ ɛ.
Ala ɩ sɩ ben ka, sɩ ben be kʋ a sɩ Soro. Ala ɩ sɩ mɩ kpi naa, sɩ kpin kʋ a sɩ Soro. Ka sɩ chɛnɛ na vʋrɔ, bɩɩ sɩ kpi naa, a sɩ Soro lɛ so sɩ.
A anyãna jũu lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto kpi tɩ na wʋ lɛ ir ɩ vʋr, ɩka a wʋ ɩ a kũn nɩ a vʋɛ ba jaa Soro.
Fʋ̃ʋ mɩ, baa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ fʋ tɔɔrɔ a fʋ yɛbɛ 'yɛr, bɩɩ bo lɛ so ka fʋ kaara a fʋ yɛbɛ pɔrɔ? Bojũu sɩ jaa lɛ na ara a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ dakɔɔ par.
