A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "A sɩ Soro lɛ 'yɛr, ɩn ɩ vʋr jũu, a gbɛdumo a jaa na gbur a n niem, ka a kɔkɔr jaa haa 'yɛr ɩka maa lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn."
Be lɛ a sɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na pãa 'yɛr a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ɩ a sɩ bar a sɩ taaba 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ, na sɩ lɩɛb a sɩ tɩɛr na sɩ ta ɩrɛ kʋsɩr bãraa kʋrɔ a sɩ taaba sɔɩ pɔ a ba ŋmiere loro ɛ.
A maa na be a sɩ Soro Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ, n sɔɔn sɩrɛ jaa ɩka bʋ̃diraa jaa ba ɩ dɛɛr a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa kãan bon ɩka wʋ ɩn bʋ̃dɛɛr, a bʋ̃nyɩnɛ ɩn bʋ̃dɛɛr kʋ wʋ.
Ala wa ɩ a chɛn a fʋ yɛbɛ bʋ̃diraa kɔ̃ɔ fʋn di jũu, faa maala wile nɩ nʋ̃fʋ ɛ. Ta vɛ̃ ka a fʋ bʋ̃dirsɩ sɔ̃ɔ a fʋ yɛbɛ 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto na kpi ɛ.
Ta vɛ̃ ka a bon 'lɔ fʋ̃ʋ na bʋɔlɔ bʋ̃vɩla, ka nɩrɛ bʋɔl wʋ bʋ̃dɛɛr ɛ.
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ yele ba ɩ bʋ̃diir nɩ bʋ̃nyursɩ yele ɛ, tɩchɛ a ɩn torfʋ, nɩ nyã'maar nɩ a pʋpɛl na yi a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pɔ yele lɛ,
bojũu nɩrɛ jaa na tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto tu a sɔr nyã pɔ, wʋ maala na a lɛ na pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ, ka a nɩbɛ mɩ 'yɛrɛ a nɩnyɩnɛ 'yɛr vɩla.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ɩ a sɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir, na sɩ maala a lɛ na waan nyã'maar a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔn taa ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn.
Yɩ ta de bʋ̃diir yele sɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃mɔ̃ bar ɛ. Bʋ̃diraa a jaa vɩɛlɛ naa, tɩchɛ a ɩn dɛɛr ala ɩ nɩrɛ din bon na vɛ̃ ka a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ lo.
A lɛ a sɛɛ naa ka nɩrɛ ta 'wɔb nʋ̃n ɛ, bɩɩ nyũ dãa ɛ, bɩɩ maal yele kɔ̃ɔ na vɛ̃ ka a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ lo ɛ.
Lɛ jaa fʋn bɔ̃ɔ a yelsɩ anyãna pɔ, bar ka a be a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn chara pɔ. Pʋpɛl sʋɔ lɛ a 'lɔ tɩɛr na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ yele nɩ a bonsɩ ala a 'lɔ mɩ̃ɛ na 'yɛr ɩka a ɩ naa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na dire nɩ baal, 'yɔ̃ɔn a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr, bojũu waa dire nɩ sɔɔfʋ ɛ. Bon jaa mɩ na ba wa yi sɔɔfʋ pɔ ɛ, a ɩn bier.
Sɩn bala na kpɛ̃mɛ, a sɛɛ naa ka sɩ tuo a bala na ba kpɛ̃mɛ ɛ, na loro tuor, na sɩ ta pɛlɛ a sɩn mɩ̃ɛ pʋʋr ɛ.
A sɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ ma pɛlɛ a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ pʋɔ, na sɩ sʋ̃ʋ wʋ a wʋ mɩ ba nyɩbɛ.
Bojũu a Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ̃ɛ gba mɩ ba dɔ̃ɔ pɛl a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ pʋɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ a lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "A tʋbie ala a bala na tʋfʋ, a wa dɔɔl a n ju."
Bojũu a ala a jaa na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, a kõr jaa bin, a sɛb a sɩn wiilfʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a gãma anyãna kʋ sɩ kãnyir 'yɔ̃ɔn sɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn ka sɩ tara tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie.
A Nãaŋmɩn na kʋrɔ yɩ a kãnyir na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ yɩ a ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn, wʋ kʋ yɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen ka yɩ turo nɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
Ka yɩ jaa 'mataa tara tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen na yɩ de nɛbʋ̃'yen 'yɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr na ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto Sãa.
Yɩ sɔɔ diere taa nɩtãa lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ na sɔɔ de yɩ, ka yɩn tʋ̃ɔ waan pɛɛfʋ wa kʋ Nãaŋmɩn.
N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, a Kɩrɩsɩto wa lɩɛb naa a Juu nɩbɛ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ jũu, na wʋ vɛ̃ ka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ a sɩ Sãakpãmɩne ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Ka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, mɩ na tʋ̃ɔ kʋ Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr a wʋ nɩbaal jũu. Nɩtãa lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "A lɛ jũu, ɩn dãnfʋ naa a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ sɛ̃, naa yiel yiel kʋ a fʋ yuor."
A lɛ sɛb go, "A yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, yɩ 'matãan a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ chɩlɛ."
A lɛ sɛb go, "A yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, yɩ pɛɛrɛ a sɩ Soro, na yɩ yiele pɛɛfʋ yiel kʋrɔ wʋ, a yɩn nɩbɛ ba jaa."
Isaiya gba mɩ lɛ 'yɛr go a wʋ gãn pɔ, "A Jesɩ nyɩɩr na lɛ tɔ naa. 'Lɔ lɛ na ir na wʋ kaara a paalsɩ a jaa, na wʋ mɩ ɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie."
A Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a yɩ tɩɛrtɔfʋ sʋɔ, wʋ sɛɛ a yɩ nyãn nɩ chɩlfʋ, nɩ nyã'maar a lɛ yɩn sɔɔ wʋ, ka a yɩ tɩɛrtɔfʋ pãa ŋme yaar nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ.
N yɛɛr, maa mɩ̃ɛ sɔɔ naa ɩka yɩ sɛɛn naa vɩla maalfʋ, na yɩ tara yɛ̃ na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ taa wiilfʋ.
N sɛb a da sɛɛr amɩne 'yɔ̃ɔ kʋ yɩ, ka a kaara fɩka n lɛ bɔ̃ɔ tɩɛr yɩ go, a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ wʋn kʋ ma

ka n ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ naa tʋ̃nɔ̃ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ jũu, naa sʋ̃nɔ̃ mʋɔlɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ. Lɛ lɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, puorfʋ na tara par ka a Nãaŋmɩn sɔɔ de na wʋ oon ba nɩ a wʋ Sɩɛ.
Ɩn be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ jũu, a tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɩn tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yin yuor.
N kʋ̃ wa 'la 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa ɛ, ka a ala a Kɩrɩsɩto na maal baar ba lɛ ɛ, tu a n 'yɔ̃ɔ ka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, lɩɛrɛ wa wõnõ a Nãaŋmɩn toor, tu a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr nɩ a lɛ ɩn tʋ̃,
wʋ den kpɛ̃ɔ tʋ̃n nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ nɩ tʋ̃fɛrsɩ tun a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ. Lɛ lɛ, n yin a Jerusalɛm chen lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ gʋɔr a Ilirikum tẽe naa man a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna jaa nɛ nɛ nɛ.
Maa nɩbijɩɛ yele lɛ ɩka n mʋɔl 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ jie 'lɔ jaa ban ba wõ a Kɩrɩsɩto yele ɛ, naa ta ɩrɛ wa mɛ dɔɔl nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ dachin par kparaa ju ɛ.
Nɩtãa lɛ an dɔ̃ɔ sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "A bala ban ba dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ɛ, na nyɛ naa, ka a bala mɩ na ba dɔ̃ɔ wõ naa ɛ, na bɔ̃ɔn a par."
A yele nyãna lɛ var ma a sɔr ka n ba tʋɔrɔ waara a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, n ba lɛ tara jipaalaa ka a paalsɩ anyã pɔ na lɛ tʋ̃ go ɛ, n mɩn dɔ̃ɔ bʋɔrɔ a yɩ nyɛfʋ a yuon yɔ̃ɔ na po jũu.
N guor naa ɩka n chen Sɩpẽen, maa wa tala ɩn ara na piir yɩ kaa, naa jɛ̃ a yɩ sɛ̃ bɩ̃lãa a yɩ sʋ̃ʋ ma ka n chen.
Pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, Jerusalɛm lɛ n chiine nɩ a sʋ̃ʋfʋ ɩka n tɩ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo a be.
Bojũu a Masedonɩya dẽme nɩ a Akaya dẽme man taa ɩka ba chɩɛr chɩɛrfʋ sʋ̃ʋn a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo bamɩne na be a Jerusalɛm na ba tara bon jaa ɛ.

Ba nyɛn a lɛ ka a ɩ sãn kʋ ba a ba de a lɛ dɔɔl a ba mɩ̃ɛ. Ala ɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, põn naa a Juu nɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn sʋ̃ʋfʋsɩ, ala lɛ so ka a mɩ sɛɛ ɩka ba mɩ lɔ̃ɔn a Juu nɩbɛ põn a ba bʋ̃tarsɩ.
Maa wa tʋ̃ a nɩtɔ̃, naa de a chɩɛrfʋsɩ anyã kʋ ba baar, ala lɛ ɩn chen a Sɩpẽen naa tɩ 'lɔɔ piir yɩ kaa.
N bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka maa wa waara, ɩn waan naa a Kɩrɩsɩto sʋ̃ʋfʋ na bɛrma.
N sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa n yɛɛr, nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nʋ̃fʋ ɩka, yɩ pʋɔ ma a n mɔ̃fʋ nyã pɔ, sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ ma.
Yɩ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn, a wʋ faa ma yin a bala na ba sɔɔ be a Judiya, ka a lɛ mɩ ɩn chiine a Jerusalɛm ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo mɩ tɩ sɔɔ de,
ka ala ɩka Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ lɛ, ka n wa a yɩ sɛ̃ nɩ pʋpɛl a sɩ 'mataa 'yɔ̃ɔ taa ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn.
Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a nyã'maar sʋɔ, wʋ be a yɩ jaa sɛ̃. A ɩ a lɛ.
N pʋrɔ naa a sɩ yɛpɔɔ Fiibi yovɩla kʋrɔ yɩ, a pɔɔ nyã ɩn tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ be a Kenkɩrya tẽdẽme pupuorbiir pɔ.
N sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa ɩka 'lɔ wa tɩ, yɩ de wʋ nɩ a sɩ Soro yuor, na yɩ maal wʋ a lɛ na sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn puoro, na yɩ mɩ kʋ wʋ sʋ̃ʋfʋ jaa wʋn na bʋɔrɔ yi a yɩ sɛ̃. Bojũu wʋ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ sʋ̃ʋ nɩyɔɔ nɩ a maa mɩ̃ɛ.
Yɩ puor a Pɩrɩsɩla nɩ Akuila kʋ ma. Ba ɩ naa a n tʋ̃tʋ̃taaba a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ.
Ba tʋ̃n kũu tʋ̃mɔ̃ kʋ ma. A ba ɩ maa tɛɛ gba lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a pupuorbo bala ba jaa na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ɩ̃gãn mɩ 'maan ba naa.
Puor a pupuorbiir bala na ma lɔ̃ɔ puor a ba yir. Puor a n badaba Epainɩtʋsɩ, 'lɔ lɛ de nie turo a Kɩrɩsɩto be a Asɩya paal pɔ.
Yɩ puor a Mɛɛr mɩ na ir nyãa 'yɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ yɩ,

na yɩ mɩ puor a Andirunɩkasɩ nɩ a Junɩyasɩ. Ba ɩn a n bʋr nɩbɛ ka maa nɩ bala jaa mɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'mataa be a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ. A nɩtʋ̃nsɩ bɔ̃ɔ ban jaa chɛchɛ, bala mɩ lɛ de nie turo a Kɩrɩsɩto tɩchɛ ka a maa wa bɩɛr.
Yɩ puor Ampɩlatusɩ kʋ ma, n nʋ̃ wʋ naa a Kɩrɩsɩto tufʋ jũu,
na yɩ mɩ puor Urbanusɩ na pʋɔ sɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ nɩ a n badaba Sɩtachɩsɩ.
Yɩ puor Apelesɩ nɩrɛ jaa na sɔɔ ɩka wʋ turo naa a Kɩrɩsɩto sɔr jaa nɛ nɛ nɛ, na yɩ mɩ puor Aristobulus nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme ba jaa.
Yɩ puor a Hɛrɔdiyɔn na ɩ a n bʋr nɩrɛ, na yɩ mɩ puor a Narsɩsusɩ nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme ba jaa na turo a sɩ Soro.
Yɩ puor a Tɩrafaina nɩ Tɩrafosa, a pɔbɔ ba nyãna mʋ̃ɔn nɩbir nɩ a sɩ Soro tʋ̃mɔ̃, na yɩ puor a Persis mɩ na ɩ a pɔɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ na mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a sɩ Soro tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Yɩ puor a Worofʋs ban ir a sɩ Soro pɔ nɩ a wʋ ma, a wʋ ma mɩ ɩn a n ma.
Yɩ puor Asɩnkirtusɩ, nɩ Filegon, nɩ Hɛmɩsɩ nɩ Patrobas nɩ Hermasɩ nɩ a yɛɛr bala jaa na be a ba sɛ̃.
Yɩ puor a Filologusɩ nɩ Juliya nɩ Nereyus nɩ a wʋ yɛpɔɔ nɩ Olinpasɩ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo ba jaa na be a ba sɛ̃.
Yɩ puor puor taa nɩ pʋpɛl. A pupuorbiir ba jaa puor yɩ naa nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto yuor.
N kpãkpãana yɩ naa yɛɛr ɩka yɩ guro yɩ mɩ̃ɛ sʋ̃ nɩ a bala na ma waara nɩ a ootaa, na ba ma vɛ̃ ka yɩ bãra loro a wiilfʋ nyã yɩn jãn pɔ. Yɩ tɔɔ 'laa tɩ bar ba.

Bojũu a nɩbɛ ba nyãna a ba ɩ a sɩ Soro Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ ba tʋ̃nɔ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala mɩ̃ɛ vɔlaa bomo lɛ ba tʋ̃nɔ̃ bʋɔrɔ. Ba ma 'yɛrɛ na jaa hɛ lɛ lɛ lɛ na ba de nɛnʋ̃ɔ bɛl a nɩbɛ bala tɩɛr na ba chen niem ɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa wõn a lɛ yɩn turo a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nɛ nɛ nɛ, ka nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ sɩ a yɩ yele jũu. Tɩchɛ n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ maala vɩla nɩ yɛ̃, na yɩ ta bɔ̃ɔ yelbier maalfʋ ɛ.
A Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a nyã'maar sʋɔ, a kʋ̃ lɛ kor ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a wʋ ŋmɩ̃ɛ a Satan a yɩ gbɛɛ pĩlem. A wɩ̃ɛfʋ na yi a sɩ Soro Yesu sɛ̃ a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Timoti na ɩ a n tʋ̃tʋ̃tɔ sʋɔ puor yɩ naa, ka a Lusiyusɩ nɩ Jason nɩ Sosipater na ɩ a n bʋr nɩbɛ mɩ puoro yɩ naa.
Maa mɩ na ɩ Tɛrtɩyɔsɩ na sɛɛrɛ a Pɔɔl gãn nyã mɩ puoro yɩ naa nɩ a sɩ Soro yuor.
Gayus yir maa nɩ pupuorbiir na kpɩɛrɛ a wʋ kaara sɩ mɩ puoro yɩ naa. Erastus na ɩ a tẽe libikaara nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a sɩ yɛbɛ Kuwartusɩ mɩ puoro yɩ naa.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, tɩɩr wʋ ta a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na sʋ̃ʋ yɩ a yɩ tʋ̃ɔ ara tu a n 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã ɩn mʋɔl na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto, naa chaar a yelsɔɔlaa nyãna na sɔɔl a kõr jaa na po.
Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã, a yelsɔɔlaa chaar naa tu a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn vʋr nyã na 'yɛr ba, ka a paalsɩ ba jaa na sɔɔ de, na ba turo wʋ.
A Nãaŋmɩn nyã tɛɛ lɛ ɩ a yɛ̃ sʋɔ, wʋ nyɛrɛ tɩɩr bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ. A ɩ a lɛ.
Maa Pɔɔl a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔl a wʋ bɔfʋ pɔ ɩka n ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nãa nɩ a sɩ yɛbɛ Sosetenesɩ,

lɛ sɛɛrɛ a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a yɩn na puoro a Nãaŋmɩn be a Korɩntɩ tẽe pɔ. A yɩn na oo be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ na yɩ ɩ a wʋ nɩ chɛchɛsɩ lɔ̃ɔn a bala na be jie jaa na bʋɔlɔ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor na ɩ a sɩn nɩ a ba jaa Soro.
Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃ a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
N ma puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan kʋ yɩ bojũu wʋ wɩ̃ɛ yɩ naa tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A wʋ jũu lɛ yɩ le yele a jaa pɔ, a yɩ 'yɛrbie nɩ a yɩ bɔ̃ɔfʋ a jaa pɔ,
bojũu a Kɩrɩsɩto dãasɩɛ sɩn di, yɩ sɔɔn de.
A lɛ jũu, yaa faa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋfʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɛ, na yɩ pãa mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir chɛlɛ a lɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na lɛ lɩɛb wa.
Wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩn ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn tɩ tãn a baaraa, ka yɩ kʋ̃ tara chɛfʋ ɛ, tɩ tãn a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto waa bɩbir.
A Nãaŋmɩn nyã na bʋɔl yɩ wa lɔ̃ɔn a wʋ Bie Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Soro ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ.
N yɛɛr, n den a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor naa sʋɔrɔ nɩ yɩ ɩka yɩ jaa yɩ ta ŋma dẽdẽ ka ootaa be a yɩ pɔ ɛ, a lɛ na vɛ̃ naa ka yɩ pãa tara nɛbʋ̃'yen nɩ tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen.
N yɛɛr, nɩbɛ bamɩne na yi a Kɩloe yir wa man kʋ ma ɩka nɛchɩrɛ ben a yɩ chara pɔ.
A lɛ par lɛ ɩka, a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ma 'yɛr ɩka, Pɔɔl lɛ maa turo, ka ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ 'yɛr, Apolosɩ lɛ maa turo, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ 'yɛr, Sɩfasɩ lɛ n turo, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ 'yɛr ɩka, Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ n turo.
A Kɩrɩsɩto ŋman dẽdẽme bɩɩ? Pɔɔl lɛ ba kpa a daa ju bɩɩ? Bɩɩ Pɔɔl yuor lɛ yɩ son a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ?
N pʋɔ pɛl naa ɩn ba so a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ ɛ, ka ala ba ɩ Kɩrɩsɩpusɩ nɩ Gayus tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ,
ka nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩka maa yuor lɛ n son yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ ɛ.
Ɔ̃ɔ, n mɩ dɔ̃ɔ so a Sɩtɛfanas nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme ba jaa a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ. A anyã puor n ba tɩɛr nɩrɛ jaa ɩn lɛ so a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ ɛ.
Bojũu Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ba tʋ̃ ma ɩka n tɩ suoro nɩbɛ Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ n tɩ mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ na ba ɩ nɩsaal yɛ̃ 'yɛr ɛ. Ka a Kɩrɩsɩto kũu wʋn kpi a daa taa ɩ pɔrɔ ɛ.
Bojũu a daa 'yɛr ɩn dãbol 'yɛr kʋ a bala na wɛrɛ, tɩchɛ a ɩn Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ kʋ a sɩn bala na nyɛ a faafʋ.
Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Ɩn sɔ̃ɔ naa a yɛ̃ dẽme yɛ̃ bar, naa bʋ̃bʋr a bɔ̃ɔfʋ dẽme bɔ̃ɔfʋ bar."
Nyɩnɛ lɛ a yɛ̃ dẽme be? Nyɩnɛ lɛ a bɔ̃ɔfʋ sʋɔ be? Nyɩnɛ lɛ chɩbɛ dẽme mɩ be a dɩna? A ba ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɩɛb a wɛr nyã yɛ̃ a wʋ ɩ jɔl ɛ?
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn yɛ̃ kʋ vɛ̃ ka a wɛr de a wʋ yɛ̃ bɔ̃ɔn wʋ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ pɛl naa nɩ a jɔl mʋɔl ban mʋɔl ka a na faa a bala na sɔɔ de.
A Juu nɩbɛ ma bʋɔrɔ naa nɛ'maa yele, ka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, mɩ bʋɔrɔ yɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ sɩn mʋɔl naa Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ban kpa a daa ju, ka a ɩ gbɛr bãrfʋ kʋ a Juu nɩbɛ tɩ mɩ ɩ jɔl yele kʋ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na lɔ̃ɔ bʋɔl a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn yɛ̃.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn jɔlʋ̃ ɩn yɛ̃ gar a nɩrɛ yɛ̃, ka a Nãaŋmɩn balfʋ tara kpɛ̃ɔ gar a nɩrɛ kpɛ̃ɔ.
N yɛɛr, yɩ tɩɛr a lɛ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ be tɩ a Nãaŋmɩn wa bʋɔl yɩ, nɩsaal kaafʋ pɔ, a yɩ yɔɔ ba dɔ̃ɔ ɩ yɛ̃ dẽme ɛ, a yɩ yɔɔ ba dɔ̃ɔ ɩ yuor dẽme ɛ, yaa ɩ nãmɩne bibiir ɛ.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn ir naa a wɛr nyã jɔl bon 'yɔ̃ɔn a yɛ̃ dẽme vɩ̃, Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ir naa a wɛr nyã bʋ̃balaa na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔn a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme vɩ̃.
Nãaŋmɩn ma ir naa a wɛr bon ba 'yɔ̃ɔnaa, a ala a nɩbɛ na kaara pɔrɔ, nɩ a nɩbɛ bala gba nɩrɛ jaa na ba 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ, wʋ ɩ naa nɩtɔ̃ ka a bon 'lɔ a wɛr na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ka wʋ ɩ pɔrɔ,
ka nɩrɛ jaa taa bʋɔrɔ yuor a wʋ niem ɛ.
A wʋ jũu lɛ yɩ be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a yɛ̃ yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ kʋ sɩ, na wʋ ɩ a sɩ torfʋ nɩ chɛchɛ nɩ a faafʋ.
A lɛ jũu, nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Vɛ̃ ka a 'lɔ na bʋɔrɔ yuor, wʋ bʋɔrɔ a yuor a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ."
N yɛɛr, ɩn dɔ̃ɔ wa a yɩ sɛ̃, n ba waan nɛbɔ̃ɔn bɩɩ yɛ̃ 'yɛr naa wa man a Nãaŋmɩn dãasɩɛ kʋ yɩ ɛ.
Bojũu a lɛ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ be a yɛ sɛ̃, n ba lɛ bɔ̃ɔ bon jaa pʋɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ban kpa a daa ju ɛ.
Balfʋ, dãbɩ̃ɛ nɩ mĩifʋ lɛ n dɔ̃ɔ ben a yɩ sɛ̃.
A n 'yɛr nɩ a n mʋɔlfʋ ba ɩ yɛ̃ 'yɛrbie ɛ, tɩchɛ a ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ wiilfʋ lɛ,
ka a yɩ sɔɔfʋ taa dɩɛl a nɩrɛ yɛ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ a dɩɛl a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ.
Faa nyɛ, sɩn ma 'yɛr a sɩ 'yɛr nɩ yɛ̃ kʋ a bala na nʋ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn sɔr pɔ, a ba ɩ a wɛr nyã bɩɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme yɛ̃ na wa ɩ pɔrɔ daar kɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Kai, sɩn 'yɛrɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn yɛ̃ sɔɔlaa, a yɛ̃ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔl a Nãaŋmɩn na kaa ir a sɩ daar kɔ̃ɔ tɩɩr jũu sɛrɛ na wʋ wa maal a wɛr.
A wɛr nyã kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme ba dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, ala ɩ bala ta bɔ̃ɔ ba kʋ̃ naa kpa a tɩɩr Soro a daa ju ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Nɩbir jaa ba nyɛ ɛ, toor jaa ba wõ ɛ, tɩɛr jaa mɩ ba bɔ̃ɔn a ala a Nãaŋmɩn na chɔɔr kʋ a bala na nʋ̃ wʋ ɛ."
Tɩchɛ anyãna lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wiil kʋ sɩ, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma bɩɛr naa a yelsɩ a jaa, na wʋ gba ma bɔ̃ɔ a ala na be a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔm.
Nɩbuor lɛ bɔ̃ɔ lɛ na be a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ tɩɛr pɔ, ka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ̃ɛ ba lɛ ɛ? A lɛ mɩ lɛ nɩrɛ ba bɔ̃ɔ lɛ na be a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɛr pɔ ɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ Sɩɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
A ba ɩ a wɛr nyã sɩɛ lɛ sɩ tara ɛ, tɩchɛ a Sɩɛ 'lɔ na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ a sɩ de bɔ̃ɔn a ala a Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ sɩ a pɔrɔ.
A anyãna lɛ sɩ 'yɛrɛ, a ba ɩ nɩrɛ 'yɛrbie sɩn jãn ɛ, tɩchɛ 'yɛrbie ala sɩn jãn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛ̃ na sɩ wile nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a Sɩɛ 'yɛrbie.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ba tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɛ, maa sɔɔ a ala na yi a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛ̃ ɛ, bojũu a ɩn dãbol yele kʋ wʋ a wʋ maa bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, bojũu nɩrɛ na tʋ̃ɔn bɔ̃ɔ ala ɩ wʋ tara naa Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma vɩɛr naa a yele a jaa kaa, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɛ, wʋ kʋ̃ bɔ̃ɔ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ tɩɛr ɛ.
Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "An lɛ bɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro tɩɛr, na wʋn kpãa wʋ?" Tɩchɛ sɩn lɛ tara a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tɩɛr.
N yɛɛr, n kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ nɩ yɩ fɩka nɩbɛ na tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ n 'yɛrɛ nɩ yɩ naa fɩka a wɛr nɩbɛ na yɩ ɩ bibiir a Kɩrɩsɩto sɔr pɔ.
Bɩrkʋ̃ɔ tɛɛ lɛ n kʋ yɩ a ba ɩ saa yɩn ba ta na tʋ̃ɔ di ɛ. Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ yɩ chɛnɛ ba ta ɛ.
Yɩ chɛnɛ na ɩrɛ fɩka nɩbɛ na ba bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, bojũu nyuur nɩ nɛchɩrɛ chɛnɛ na be a yɩ pɔ, yaa chɛnɛ ɩ a wɛr nɩbɛ ɛ? Na yɩ maala a lɛ ban maala ɛ?
A yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ na ma 'yɛr, maa turo na Pɔɔl, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ 'yɛr ɩka, maa turo na Apolosɩ. Yaa chɛnɛ ɩrɛ fɩka nɩbɛ na ba bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ?
A anyãna a jaa pɔ, Pɔɔl nɩ a Apolosɩ, bo ba ɩ? Tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ lɛ sɩn ɩ a yɩ tu a be wa sɔɔ de ka a sɩ Soro kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa nɩ wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Maa lɛ bʋr ka a Apolosɩ mɩ chɔr a kʋ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ so an nʋ̃ɔ.
Lɛ a 'lɔ na bʋr, nɩ a 'lɔ na chɔr a kʋ̃ɔ, ba ɩ bon jaa ɛ, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ tɛɛ na vɛ̃ ka a bonsɩ a jaa nʋ̃ɔ.
A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bʋr nɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na chɔr a kʋ̃ɔ ba jaa tara na tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na nyɛ a lɛ wʋn tʋ̃ sãyar.
Bojũu, sɩn ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋ̃taaba, yɩn mɩ lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puo, a Nãaŋmɩn yir wʋn mɩɛrɛ.
A wɩ̃ɛfʋ a Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ ma lɛ so ka n kpar a dachin par kparaa nɩtãa bɔ̃ɔ mɩɛrɛ, ka a bamɩne mɩ mɩɛrɛ dɔɔlɔ. Tɩchɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ bɔ̃ɔ kaara a lɛ wʋn mɩɛrɛ dɔɔlɔ.
A yele lɛ ɩka, nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ kpar a dachin par kpar yuo lɛ pʋɔ a 'lɔ na be be ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ den sɛlma, kpãna, kʋsɩr kpɩ̃ɛn, daar, mʋɔr bɩɩ kakɩɛ,
nɩrɛ jaa na nyɛ naa a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃, bojũu a bɩbir 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a jaa na gãn chãa pɔ. Bũu lɛ na vuul nɩrɛ jaa tʋ̃mɔ̃ na wʋ bɛɛr ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa tʋ̃mɔ̃ kaa.
Ala ɩ a lɛ wʋn mɛ dɔɔl ba sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, wʋn nyɛn a wʋ sãyar.
Ala ɩ a wa di naa a nɩnyɩnɛ kʋ̃ nyɛ bon jaa ɛ, wʋn nyɛn faafʋ, tɩchɛ wʋn kaara naa fɩka nɩrɛ bũu na vuul.
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka yɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir ka a wʋ Sɩɛ kpɩɛrɛ a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ?
Ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa sɔ̃ɔ naa a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir nyã, Nãaŋmɩn na sɔ̃ɔ naa a nɩnyɩnɛ, bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir ɩn chɛchɛ. Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ a puorfʋ yir nyã.
Yɩ ta bɛlɛ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Ala ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ tɩɛr naa ɩka wʋ ɩ naa yɛ̃ sʋɔ a wɛr nyã pɔ, wʋ lɩɛb ɩ "Jɔl" na wʋ pãa tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb yɛ̃ sʋɔ.
Bojũu a wɛr nyã yɛ̃ ɩ naa jɔl yele a Nãaŋmɩn niem, nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Wʋ ma nyɔɔ naa a yɛ̃ sʋɔ a wʋ yɛ̃ yele pɔ."
A lɛ sɛb go, "A Soro bɔ̃ɔ naa a yɛ̃ dẽme tɩɛr ka a ɩ pɔrɔ."
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ wʋ ta lɛ 'mɔɔrɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ nɩrɛ yele ɛ! Yɩn lɛ so a bonsɩ a jaa,
ka maa Pɔɔl lɛ bɩɩ, Apolosɩ lɛ bɩɩ, Sɩfasɩ lɛ bɩɩ, a wɛr lɛ bɩɩ, nyɛvʋr lɛ bɩɩ, kũu lɛ bɩɩ, dɩna lɛ bɩɩ, ka daar kɔ̃ɔ lɛ, yɩn lɛ so a jaa.
A Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ so yɩ, ka Nãaŋmɩn mɩ so a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ma kaa sɩ a sɩ ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na de a wʋ yelsɔɔlsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ nuur pɔ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a lɛ na gã lɛ ɩka a bala ban de bon 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba nuur pɔ, ba tara yelmɩ̃ɛ.
A ba bã ma ɛ, ala ɩ ka yɩn lɛ bɩɩ a wɛr nɩrɛ lɛ tɔɔrɔ a n 'yɛr sɩrɛ jaa a maa mɩ̃ɛ kʋ̃ tɔɔr a n 'yɛr ɛ.
N ba tɩɛr yele jaa ɩn ɩ bɔr ɛ, tɩchɛ a ba wiil ɩka n ba tara yele ɛ. A sɩ Soro lɛ na tɔɔr a n 'yɛr.

A lɛ jũu, yɩ ta de nie tɔɔrɔ a 'yɛr ka a bɩbir ba ta ɛ. Yɩ chɛlɛ ka a sɩ Soro wa. 'Lɔ lɛ na yin yele a jaa na sɔɔl a libe pɔ, chãa pɔ, na wʋ mɩ wiil a ala na sɔɔl a nɩbɛ tɩɛr pɔ. A bɩbir 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na nyɛ a wʋ pɛɛfʋ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.

Pʋ̃pãanyã, n yɛɛr, a yɩn jũu lɛ n de a yele anyãna naa man a maa nɩ a Apolosɩ, ka yɩn jãn a par yi a sɩ sɛ̃ a lɛ ban 'yɛr ɩka, "Taa ɩrɛ wa chen po a lɛ ban sɛb ɛ." Ka a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa taa pãa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩbɛ gara taa ɛ.
Ana lɛ maal yɩ a yɩ be yɩ yõ gar nɩrɛ jaa? Bo yɩ tara, ka a ba ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʋ yɩ ɛ? Ala ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʋ yɩ, ŋmɩnɛ a ɩ a yɩ bʋɔrɔ yuor fɩka yaa ɩ lɛ ɛ?
Yɩ ben tara bon jaa yɩn bʋɔrɔ! Na yɩ be ɩ taraa dẽme! Yɩ ben lɩɛb nãmɩne ka sɩn ba ɩ ɛ! Maa bɔfʋ lɛ fɩka yɩ ta ɩ a nãmɩne sɩrɛ jaa, ka a sɩ mɩ ta pʋɔ yɩ ɩ a nãmɩne.
Bojũu maa sɛ̃, a kaara naa fɩka a Nãaŋmɩn den a sɩn na ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ a sɩ pii a nɩyɔɔ puor, a ban kʋ sɩ chãa pɔ. Ka a sɩ ɩ bʋ̃manãa kʋ a wɛr nɩ a malakasɩ nɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
Sɩn ɩn jɔlɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu tɩchɛ ka a yɩn ɩ yɛ̃n dẽme a wʋ pɔ. Sɩn ɩn nɩbaalsɩ tɩchɛ ka a yɩn ɩ kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme. Ba 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ yɩ naa tɩ kpɛrɛ sɩn.
Wa tãn dɩna gba, kɔ̃ nɩ kɔ̃nyũur lɛ sɩ ma chiine, ka a sɩ bʋ̃sursɩ chɩɛr chɩɛr ka ba pɔɔrɔ sɩ, saa tara yir kpɩɛrɛ ɛ.
Tʋ̃ kpɩ̃ɛn lɛ sɩ ma tʋ̃n a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ nuur, bala wa tʋ sɩ, sɩ ma 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ ba, bala sɔɔ gere sɩ, tɩ sɩ ma tara na kãnyir.
Bala wa sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a sɩ yuor, sɩ maa 'yɛr tuo ɛ, wa tãn dɩna, baa bʋɔlɔ sɩ bon jaa ɛ, ka a sɩ ɩ a wɛr wʋ jaa tãpuor ju sɔɔr.
N ba sɛɛrɛ a anyãna ɩka n su yɩ vɩ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka n kpãa yɩ maa mɩ̃ɛ bi'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ kaar.
Yɩn gba tara nɩbɛ turo pie (10,000) na kaara yɩ a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ, tɩ yaa tara sãamɩne yɔɔ ɛ, maa na wa mʋɔl a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ yɩ lɛ ɩ a yɩ sãa.
Ala lɛ so ka n pãa sʋɔrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩ turo a lɛ ɩn turo.

A anyãna jũu mɩ lɛ so ka n tʋ̃nɔ̃ a Timoti na ɩ a n bie ɩn nʋ̃, wʋ tara na yelmɩ̃ɛ a sɩ Soro pɔ. Wʋn tɩ jɛɔ yɩ naa a lɛ a n befʋ na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, na n mɩ wile nɩ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ a jiir a jaa.
A yɩ bamɩne chɩɛrɛ nɩ nyãa ɩrɛ fɩka n kʋ̃ lɛ wa be go ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a kʋ̃ lɛ kor ɛ, ala ɩ a sɩ Soro sɔɔ naa, ɩn wan a yɩ sɛ̃, naa tɩ kaa a ba ɩ a bala na chɩɛrɛ a nyãa 'yɛrɛ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka n tɩ kaa a kpɛ̃ɔ buor ban tara.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ yele ba ɩ nɛɛ 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ ɩn kpɛ̃ɔ.
Buor sʋɔ lɛ yɩ bʋɔrɔ? Maa wa tɩrɛ, n tɩn kpaara bɩɩ nʋ̃fʋ nɩ jomm sɩɛ?
Ba wa man kʋ ma sɩrɛ jaa ɩka sɛ̃sɛ̃yele ben a yɩ pɔ, a lɛ gba na ba ɩrɛ a bala na ba puoro pɔ ɛ. Bie na na gãn a wʋ sãa pɔɔ.
Tɩ a yɩ chɛnɛ bʋɔrɔ yuor, vɩ̃ kʋ̃ naa nyɔɔ yɩ ka yɩ dii a nɩrɛ nyãna na maal a nɩtɔ̃ bar a yɩ pɔ ɛ?
A maa mɩ̃ɛ gba na ba be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ a maa tɩɛr wʋ jaa ben a yɩ sɛ̃, naa gba tɔɔr a daba 'yɛr fɩka n ben be.
Yɩn wa lɔ̃ɔn a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor, a n tɩɛr mɩ ben a yɩ sɛ̃, ka a sɩ Soro Yesu kpɛ̃ɔ mɩ be be,
yɩ de a daba nyãna 'yɔ̃ɔ Satan nũu pɔ, ka wʋ sɔ̃ɔ a wʋ ɩ̃gãn bar, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn faa a wʋ sɩɛ a sɩ Soro bɩbir daar.
A yɩ yuor bɔfʋ nyã ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ. Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a dãbɩl jaa pʋʋr lɛ ma vɛ̃ ka a paanʋ̃ɔ vʋ̃ a yɔɔ ɛ?
Yɩ kpaar a dãbɩl koraa bar, tɩ na yɩ ɩ paanʋ̃ɔ paalaa na ba tara a dãbɩl ɛ. Lɛ lɛ yɩ kaara sɩrɛ jaa. Bojũu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Gõl Bar Pɛɛraabile lon a sɩ bɔɔr.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ta ɩ a sɩ dire a Gõl Bar Difʋ nɩ a dãbɩl koraa ɛ, a dãbɩl koraa na ɩ yosɔ̃ɔ nɩ putuyele, tɩchɛ a ɩ a paanʋ̃ɔ na ba tara a dãbɩl ɛ. A paanʋ̃ɔ na ɩ chɛchɛ ɩfʋ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ tarfʋ.
A gãn 'lɔ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ sɛb kʋ yɩ, n 'yɛr ɩka yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a sɛ̃sɛ̃nbɛ ɛ,
n ba 'yɛrɛ a bala na ba puoro na sɛ̃nɛ ɛ, bɩɩ a bɔgar dẽme, bɩɩ a nɩfɔlbɔ bɩɩ a tɩpuorbo ɛ. Ala ɩ lɛ lɛ, yɩ kʋ̃ naa yi a ka a wɛr nyã pɔ.

Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã, n sɛɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ, a lɛ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ ɩ nɩ nyã. Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a 'lɔ na bʋɔlɔ, a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a yɩ yɛbɛ tɩ na wʋ sɛ̃nɛ, nɩ bɔgar sʋɔ, na wʋ puoro tɩbɛ, nɩ yosɔ̃ɔnɔ̃, na wʋ ɩ dãburo, nɩ nɩfɔlɔ. A nɩrɛ nyãna tɔ sʋɔ, yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa 'mataa wʋ gba dire ɛ.
N tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ ɩka n tɔɔrɔ a bala na puoro 'yɛr, tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ yɩ kpãa a nɩbɛ bala yɩn 'mataa puoro nɩ na tʋ̃nɔ̃ a yelsɩ anyãna.
Nãaŋmɩn lɛ na tɔɔr a bala na ba puoro ɛ 'yɛr. "Yɩ dii a putusʋɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ bar a yɩ pɔ."
Ala ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ nɩ a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ wa nyɛn 'yɛr, ŋmɩnɛ a ɩ a wʋ na tara a 'yɛr chiin a 'yɛr tɔɔrbɔ bala na ba puoro ɛ jie, tɩ bar a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo jie?
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo lɛ na wa tɔɔr a bala na ba puoro 'yɛr ɛ? Ka ala ɩ yɩn lɛ na wa tɔɔr a bala na ba puoro 'yɛr, ŋmɩnɛ a yɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ maal a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yelbil ɛ?
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka sɩn lɛ na tɔɔr a malakasɩ gba 'yɛr ɛ? Wa 'yɛrɛ nɩ a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ yelbil?
A lɛ jũu, yɩn wa tara a 'yɛrbil anyãna taaba, yɩ ma ir a pupuorbo bamɩne gba yɛ̃ na ba tal tɛɛr ɛ, ka ba tɔɔr a 'yɛr.
N 'yɛr naa anyãna na 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ vɩ̃, a ɩn sɩrɛ ɩka a yɩ pɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba tara yɛ̃ jaa pʋʋr na wʋn maal a wʋ taaba 'yɛr ɛ?
Tɩchɛ ka a yɛbɛ ma tara a yɛbɛ chiin a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie, a bala na ba ɩ a Yesu turbo sɛ̃.
Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ ɩka yɩ ben maal bɔr, bojũu yɩ ma nyɔɔr taa chiin a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie. Bo lɛ so ka yɩ kʋ̃ naa sɔɔ ka a nɩbɛ maal yɩ dɛɛr ɛ? Bɩɩ sɔɔ ka ba fɔl yɩ ɛ?
Tɩchɛ a yɩn mɩ̃ɛ fɔlɔ nɩ taa na yɩ maala taa dɛbɛ, na yɩ maala a anyãna kʋrɔ a yɩ yɛɛr.
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a putudẽme kʋ̃ kpɛ be a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ ɛ? Yɩ ta bɛlɛ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Sɛ̃sɛ̃nbɛ, tɩpuorbo, a bala na fol bɩɩ a dɔɔr na lɩɛb gãna nɩ taa,
bɩɩ nãnyisɩ, bɩɩ a bɔgar dẽme, bɩɩ a dãburbo, bɩɩ a yosɔ̃ɔnbɔ, bɩɩ a nɩfɔlbɔ, ba ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa kʋ̃ kpɛ be a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ ɛ.
Lɛ lɛ a yɩ bamɩne mɩ dɔ̃ɔ kaara, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn pɛɛ yɩ bar, na wʋ oo yɩ ka yɩ ɩ chɛchɛ tu a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor nɩ a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pɔ.
A yɩ bamɩne 'yɛr naa ɩka, n ba chire bon jaa maalfʋ ɛ. Yele jaa ba chɩre maalfʋ ɛ. Tɩchɛ a ba ɩ yele a jaa lɛ vɩɛlɛ maalfʋ ɛ. Maa kʋ̃ sɔɔ ka bon jaa so ma ɛ.

Bamɩne mɩ ma lɛ 'yɛr naa ɩka, bʋ̃diir ben be puor 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a puor mɩ be be a bʋ̃diir 'yɔ̃ɔ. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn na sɔ̃ɔn a jaa ayi bar. Sɛ̃sɛ̃yele jũu ba lɛ a ɩ̃gãn be be ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩ Soro jũu lɛ, ka a sɩ Soro mɩ be be a ɩ̃gãn jũu.
A kpɛ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn sɩ̃ɩn a sɩ Soro a kũu pɔ, ka wʋ mɩ na sɩ̃ɩ sɩ a kũu pɔ.
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a yɩ ɩ̃gãma ɩn bʋ̃'yen nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto ɩ̃gãn ɛ? N pãa de a n ɩ̃gãn na ɩ bʋ̃'yen nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto ɩ̃gãn naa tɩ 'mar pɔɔ baa pɔ? N kʋ̃ ɩ a lɛ ɛ.
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka nɩrɛ 'lɔ na de a wʋ ɩ̃gãn tɩ 'mar a pɔɔ baa pɔ, ɩn bʋ̃'yen nɩ a wʋ ɩ̃gãn ɛ? Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Ka ba jaa ayi ɩ ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen."
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na de wʋ mɩ̃ɛ 'mar a sɩ Soro, 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ Sɩɛ ɩn bʋ̃'yen.
Yɩ tɔɔ yi a sɛ̃sɛ̃yele pɔ. Yelbier jaa nɩrɛ na ɩrɛ ma ben a wʋ ɩ̃gãn yõo, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na sɛ̃nɛ, a wʋ ɩ̃gãn lɛ wʋ maala a yelbier 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a yɩ ɩ̃gãn ɩn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ puorfʋ yir ɛ? A 'lɔ na be a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ. A 'lɔ yɩn nyɛ yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɔ? Yaa so yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn da yɩn so. A lɛ jũu, yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a yɩ ɩ̃gãma.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a yele ala yɩn sɛb kʋ ma, an taa vɩɛlɛ na ka daba ta kul pɔɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ an ɩ a sɛ̃sɛ̃yele na be be jũu, daba jaa wʋ kul a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ pɔɔ, ka a pɔɔ jaa mɩ kul a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ sɩrɛ.
Ka a sɩrɛ nɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ pɔɔ na ma lɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃ɔ, lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ a pɔɔ nɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ sɩrɛ mɩ ma lɔ̃ɔ a sɔ̃ɔ.
A pɔɔ tɛɛ ba lɛ so a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃gãn ɛ, tɩchɛ a wʋ sɩrɛ lɛ so. A lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ, a daba tɛɛ mɩ ba so a wʋ ɩ̃gãn ɛ, tɩchɛ a wʋ pɔɔ lɛ so.

Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa mɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa a gaa jie ɛ, ka ala ba wa ɩ yɩ man taa na yɩ kʋ taa sɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ jũu ɛ. Ka yɩn wa sʋɔr a Nãaŋmɩn baar, a yɩ lɛ lɔ̃ɔ taa go, ka a Satan taa nyɛ yɩn kʋ̃ lɛ wa tʋɔrɔ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ nyɔɔrɔ bɛl yɩ ɛ.
N 'yɛr naa ɩka anyã tara na sɔr, a ba ɩ binfʋ lɛ ɛ.
N naa bʋɔrɔ naa fɩka a dɔɔr ba ta be a n kaar. Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa tara na a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ wʋ, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa bon ma tɛɛ naa a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ bon.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a yɩn bala na ba kul taa ɛ, nɩ a pɔɔkɔɛ, a vɩɛlɛ naa ba taa kulo taa ɛ, na ba jɩ̃nɛ nɩtãa lɛ ɩn jɩ̃nɛ.
Tɩchɛ bala ba wa tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ nyɔɔrɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, ba kul taa. Ala ɩ ba kul taa, a sãn ban jɛ̃ ka a vɔlaa kʋrɔ ba.
A bala na kul taa, a nɛbinãa lɛ a nyã, a ba ɩ maa lɛ 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩ Soro lɛ 'yɛr. A pɔɔ wʋ taa ɩrɛ wa bara a wʋ sɩrɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ 'lɔ wa bar a wʋ sɩrɛ, wʋ taa lɛ kulo daba go ɛ, bɩɩ wʋ lɩɛb tɩ 'maal a wʋ sɩrɛ. Daba mɩ wʋ taa dire a wʋ pɔɔ bara ɛ.
A anyã 'lɔ, maa lɛ 'yɛrɛ, a ba ɩ a sɩ Soro lɛ ɛ. Ala ɩ a Yesu turo ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔɔ ba ɩ a Yesu turo ɛ, tɩ sɔɔ ɩka wʋn jɛ̃n wʋ naa wʋ taa ɩrɛ wa dire wʋ bara ɛ.
Ala ɩ a pɔɔ mɩ lɛ ɩ a Yesu turo, tɩchɛ ka a wʋ sɩrɛ ba ɩ a Yesu turo ɛ, tɩ mɩ sɔɔ ɩka wʋn jɛ̃n wʋ naa, a pɔɔ nyɩnɛ mɩ wʋ taa bara a sɩrɛ ɛ.

Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn kãan a danyɩnɛ na ba ɩ a Yesu turo ɛ, ka wʋ ɩ nɩsʋ̃ a wʋ pɔɔ na ɩ a Yesu turo jũu, ka a pɔɔ mɩ na ba ɩ a Yesu turo ɛ, mɩ ɩ nɩsʋ̃ a sɩrɛ na ɩ a Yesu turo jũu. Ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, a ba bibiir na ɩn bidɛbɛ, tɩchɛ a lɛ jũu ba ɩn bisʋ̃n.
Tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na ba ɩ a Yesu turo ɛ, 'lɔ wa chiine wʋ chiine. Fʋn ɩ a Yesu turo, ka daba lɛ, bɩɩ pɔɔ lɛ, ta ŋmaa wʋ sɔr ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn bʋɔl sɩ naa ka sɩ kpɩɛrɛ nɩ nyã'maar.
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a ɩ a fʋ̃ʋ pɔɔ, ba bɔ̃ɔ ɩka fʋn tʋ̃ɔ faa a fʋ sɩrɛ ɛ? Bɩɩ a daba, faa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka fʋ mɩn tʋ̃ɔ faa a fʋ pɔɔ ɛ?
Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ mɔ̃ be a jie 'lɔ a sɩ Soro na bin wʋ, nɩ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔl wʋ. A binfʋ nyãna lɛ n bin kʋ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ba jaa.
Nɩrɛ ŋmaan yʋɔr tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa bʋɔl wʋ bɩɩ? Wʋ taa ɩrɛ wa sɔɔlɔ a wʋ yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ ɛ. Nɩrɛ mɩ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔl, ba ŋmaa a wʋ yʋɔr bɩɩ? Wʋ taa lɛ ŋmaara go ɛ.
Yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ ɩn pɔrɔ, ka a yʋɔr ba ŋmaafʋ mɩ ɩ pɔrɔ, Nãaŋmɩn yelbinsɩ fʋn turo lɛ ɩ yelkpɛ̃ɛ.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ chɛnɛ a lɛ nɛ wʋn be tɩ a Nãaŋmɩn wa bʋɔl wʋ.
Gbãgbaar lɛ yɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn bʋɔl yɩ bɩɩ? Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a ɩ tuo kʋ yɩ ɛ, ala ɩ yɩ tara na sɔr na so yɩ mɩ̃ɛ, yɩn tʋ̃ɔ ɩ a lɛ.
Bojũu ala ɩ nɩrɛ ɩn gbãgbaa tɩchɛ ka a sɩ Soro wa bʋɔl wʋ, a nɩnyɩnɛ son wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a sɩ Soro jũu. Lɛ mɩ lɛ, nɩrɛ na so wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɩchɛ ka a sɩ Soro wa bʋɔl wʋ, a nɩnyɩnɛ mɩ ɩ naa Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto gbãgbaa.
Nãaŋmɩn da yɩn da tuo, yɩ ta ɩ nɩrɛ jaa gbãgbaa ɛ.
Yɛɛr, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ben Nãaŋmɩn niem, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ chɛnɛ a lɛ nɛ wʋn be tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa bʋɔl wʋ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã a bala na ba kul taa sɛrɛ ɛ, n ba tara yele jaa a sɩ Soro na kʋ ma ɩka n 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ n tara na 'yɛr ɩn na 'yɛr an ɩ a sɩ Soro nɩbaal jũu, n sɔɔ naa ɩka n ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ ka yɩn sɔɔ de.
A dɩna yelwõnsɩ jũu, n tɩɛraa ɩka a ɩn vɩla ka nɩrɛ jaa kpɩɛrɛ wʋ yõ.
Fʋ kul pɔɔ bɩɩ? Taa ɩrɛ wa dire wʋ bara ɛ. Dakʋɔr lɛ fʋ ɩ bɩɩ, pɔɔ kʋɔr lɛ fʋ ɩ? Taa tɩɛrɛ pɔɔ bɩɩ sɩrɛ kulfʋ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala wa ɩ fʋ kul pɔɔ, faa maal yelbier ɛ, ka ala ɩ pɔɔsaraa mɩ kul sɩrɛ, waa maal yelbier ɛ. Tɩchɛ a bala na kul taa na kpɛ̃n yelwõnsɩ pɔ ka n kʋ̃ sɔɔl yɩ a yele nyãna ɛ.
Yɛɛr, bon ɩn 'yɛrɛ lɛ ɩka, a sɔ̃ɔ ɩn jaa ŋmaa. An yi a dɩna chiine, bala na tara pɔbɔ, ba maala fɩka baa tara pɔbɔ ɛ.
Bala na kõnõ, ba maala fɩka baa kõnõ ɛ, bala mɩ pʋɔ na pɛl, ba mɩ maala fɩka ba pʋɔ ba pɛl ɛ. Ka bala mɩ na da bon, ba maala fɩka a ba ɩ bala lɛ so bin ɛ.
Bala mɩ na tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a wɛr nyã bonsɩ, ba ta de ba mɩ̃ɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a ala pɔ ɛ, bojũu a wɛr nɩ a wʋ bonsɩ a jaa poro na chiine.
Maa bɔfʋ lɛ ɩka yɩ ta tara yele jaa tɩɛr ɛ. An ɩ daba baa tara pɔɔ ɛ, a sɩ Soro yele lɛ wʋ ma tɩɛrɛ, lɛ wʋn na ɩ pɛl a sɩ Soro pʋɔ.
Tɩchɛ daba na tara pɔɔ a wɛr nyã yelsɩ lɛ wʋ ma tɩɛrɛ, lɛ wʋn na ɩ pɛl a pɔɔ pʋɔ.

Ka a wʋ tɩɛr maa gã jibʋ̃'yen ɛ. Ka a pɔɔ mɩ na ba kul sɩrɛ ɛ, bɩɩ pɔɔsarbile ma tɩɛrɛ a sɩ Soro yele. A wʋ bɔfʋ lɛ ɩka wʋ de a wʋ ɩ̃gãn nɩ a wʋ sɩɛ kʋ a sɩ Soro. Tɩchɛ pɔɔ na tara sɩrɛ, a wɛr nyã bonsɩ tɩɛr lɛ wʋ ma tara, lɛ wʋn na pɛl a wʋ sɩrɛ pʋɔ.
Yɩ mɩ̃ɛ sʋ̃ʋfʋ jũu lɛ n 'yɛrɛ nɩ a anyãna, a ba ɩ yele lɛ n bine kʋrɔ yɩ ɛ. N bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ kpɩɛrɛ a lɛ na tor na yɩ tara tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen kʋ a sɩ Soro.
Ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa tɩɛr ɩka waa maal a lɛ na sɛɛ nɩ a pɔɔsarbile wʋn ŋmaan a bara ɛ, ka a pɔɔbile mɩ jɛ̃ kor, ka a sɛɛ ɩka ba kul taa, wʋ ɩ a lɛ wʋn tɩɛr, a ba ɩ bier ɛ. Ba kul taa.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ tɩɛr na ba vavire ɛ, a wʋ tɩɛr ba fɩrɛ wʋ ka wʋ tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ a tɩɛr nyɔɔrɔ na wʋ 'yɛr a wʋ tɩɛr pɔ ɩka wʋ kʋ̃ kul a pɔɔsarbile ɛ, a nɩrɛ nyã mɩ maal a lɛ na tor.
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na kul a pɔɔsarbile wʋ maal vɩla, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na ba kul ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ maal vɩla gar.
Pɔɔ wa kul sɩrɛ, 'lɔ nɩ a sɩrɛ ben taa, tɩchɛ a sɩrɛ wa kpi wʋ tara na sɔr ɩka wʋ kul daba 'lɔ jaa wʋn bʋɔrɔ, tɩchɛ a danyɩnɛ wʋ ɩ Yesu turo.
Lɛ ɩn nyɛ lɛ ɩka, ala ɩ waa kul sɩrɛ ɛ, tɩ na wʋ jɩ̃nɛ, wʋn ɩn bɔɔsʋ̃n sʋɔ. N tɩɛr ɩka n mɩ tara na a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a bomo ala ban ma lon bɔɔr kʋ a tɩbɛ 'yɛr lɛ n bʋɔrɔ ɩka n 'yɛr. Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka sɩ jaa tara na bɔ̃ɔfʋ, ka a bɔ̃ɔfʋ ma wile wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, tɩchɛ nʋ̃fʋ ma vɛ̃n ka sɩ baa.
Nɩrɛ na tɩɛr ɩka wʋ bɔ̃ɔn bon kɔ̃ɔ, waa bɔ̃ɔ bon jaa sɛrɛ ɛ, a lɛ wʋn tɩɛr ɩka wʋ bɔ̃ɔ naa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na nʋ̃ Nãaŋmɩn, Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔn naa nɩnyɩnɛ.
A bomo ala ban lon a tɩbɛ bɔɔr nʋ̃nɔ̃ 'wɔfʋ yele. Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a tɩɩ ba ɩ bon jaa a ka a wɛr pɔ ɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn ba lɛ be be go ɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃'yen nyã tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Ka ba gba bʋɔlɔ ŋmɩnsɩ, ka saaju lɛ, bɩɩ a ka a tẽe lɛ, sɩrɛ jaa lɛ ɩka ŋmɩn yɔɔ ben be, nɩ sorbo yɔɔ.

Tɩchɛ sɩn sɛ̃ 'lɔ, Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃'yen, na ɩ a Sãa bʋ̃'yen, 'lɔ sɛ̃ lɛ a bonsɩ a jaa yi, 'lɔ jũu lɛ sɩ be be, Soro bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto, a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ bonsɩ a jaa tu wa, ka sɩ mɩ be be a wʋ jũu.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ jaa ba lɛ bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna ɛ. Nɩbɛ bamɩne chɛnɛ na mɩlʋ̃ nɩ a tɩbɛ, bala wa ɔɔrɔ nʋ̃n jaa, ba ma tɩɛr ɩka tɩɩ nʋ̃n lɛ, ka a ba tɩɛr na bal a lɛ jũu, ba ma sɔ̃ɔ naa.
Tɩchɛ bʋ̃diir kʋ̃ vɛ̃ ka sɩ gbʋr Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, sɩn di yele jaa ba ɩrɛ sɩ ɛ. Sɩn mɩ baa di ɛ, yele jaa ba ɩrɛ sɩ mɩ ɛ.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃ ka a lɛ yɩn maala nɩ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ sofʋ taa lɩɛb kʋsɩr bãraa kʋ a bala na ba kpɛ̃mɛ a ba sɔɔfʋ pɔ ɛ.
Ala wa ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na ba kpɛ̃mɛ a wʋ sɔɔfʋ pɔ ɛ, wa nyɛ naa a fʋ̃ʋ na tara a bɔ̃ɔfʋ nyãna a fʋ tɩ dire a tɩɩ yir, a mɩ kʋ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ ka wʋ tɩ dire a ala ban lon a bɔɔr kʋ a tɩbɛ ɛ?
Ka a fʋ yɛbɛ nyã a wʋ sɔɔfʋ na ba kpɛ̃mɛ ɛ, 'lɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto na kpi kʋ, fʋ sɔ̃ɔ wʋ naa nɩ a fʋ bɔ̃ɔfʋ nyã bar.
Fʋ̃ʋ wa maal a bier nyã tɔ kʋ a fʋ yɛɛr, fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔn a ba tɩɛrsɩ baal, Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ̃ɛ lɛ fʋ maal a bier a lɛ nɛ.
A lɛ jũu, ala ɩ bon ɩn na di na vɛ̃n ka a n yɛbɛ lo yelbier pɔ, n kʋ̃ lɛ 'wɔb nʋ̃n jaa ɛ, na n taa wa vɛ̃ ka wʋ lo ɛ.
N ba so n mɩ̃ɛ bɩɩ? N ba ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nãa ɩ̃sʋɔ bɩɩ? N mɩ ba nyɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu nɩ nɩbir bɩɩ? A ba ɩ yɩn lɛ ɩ a sɩ Soro tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɩn tʋ̃, tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ?
Ala ɩ gba, n ba ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nãa bamɩne sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩ yɩn sɛ̃ 'lɔ, sɩrɛ jaa n ɩ naa! Bojũu yɩn lɛ ɩ a jɩ̃nɛ wiil sɩrɛ jaa ɩka n ɩ naa a nɩtʋ̃nãa a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A anyãna lɛ na ɩ a maa 'yɛr ɩn na 'yɛr kʋ a bala na wa bɛrɛ ma a nɛɛ.
A mɔ̃ sɩn tɛɛ lɛ ba tara sɔr ɩka yɩ kʋ sɩ bʋ̃diir nɩ bʋ̃nyursɩ ɛ?
Sɩn tɛɛ lɛ ba tara sɔr ɩka sɩ ma tara a sɩ pɔbɔ 'mataa yʋɔrɔ nɩ nɩtãa lɛ a sɩ Soro yɛɛr nɩ a Sɩfasɩ na ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ ɛ?
Bɩɩ maa nɩ Banabasɩ tɛɛ lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka sɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ tɩ yɩ kʋ̃ kʋ sɩ bon jaa ɛ?
Nɩbuor lɛ ba de soja tɩ wʋ lɩɛb yara wʋ mɩ̃ɛ? An lɛ ma sɛl tɩɛ tɩ ba dire a wʋ wɔ̃mɔ̃ ɛ? Bɩɩ an lɛ ɩ nachĩnɛ tɩ maa pɛ̃ a bɩr di ɛ?
Nɩsaal kaafʋ pɔ 'yɛr lɛ a nyã ɩn 'yɛr bɩɩ? A Mosesɩ nɛbinãa ba 'yɛr a lɛ nɩ wʋ ju ɛ?
Bojũu nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, "Ta lũ a nadar 'lɔ fʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ vara fʋ a chi nɛɛ pɔɔ ɛ." A nadai yele lɛ fɛr a Nãaŋmɩn bɩɩ?
Sɩrɛ jaa a ba ɩ sɩn jũu lɛ wʋ 'yɛr a anyãna ɛ? Ɔ̃ɔ, sɩn jũu lɛ ba sɛb a yelsɩ anyãna, bojũu a bala na kʋɔrɔ nɩ a bala na vara tara na tɩɛr ɩka ban nyɛn bon kɔ̃ɔ.
Ala ɩ sɩ bʋr a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bʋ̃bʋrɔ a yɩ sɛ̃, an ɩn tuo ala ɩ yɩ mɩ kʋ sɩ naa a yɩ bʋ̃tarsɩ bɩɩ?
Ala ɩ bamɩne tara na sɔr ka yɩ ma sʋ̃ʋ ba, sɩn ba lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka sɩ nyɛ gar ba ɛ? Tɩchɛ sɩn ba kpãkpãana nɩ a yele nyãna ɛ. Sɩ ma bar yele jaa ka a po, a sɩ taa pɔɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna sɔr ɛ.
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a bala na tʋ̃nɔ̃ a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir, a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir pɔ lɛ ba dire ɛ? Ka a bala mɩ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔrlorbo mɩ dire a bɔɔrlo bomo ala ɛ?
A lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr ɩka a bala na mʋɔlɔ a wʋ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ, ba mɩ dire yire a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ mʋɔlfʋ pɔ.
Tɩchɛ maa ba dɩɛl a anyãna ɛ, n mɩ ba sɛɛrɛ a anyãna tɩ tara tɩɛr ɩka yɩ maal a lɛ kʋ ma ɛ. Maa kpin kɔ̃ a sa naa nɩrɛ na wa kaa a n yo bɔ yele nyãna pɔrɔ.
Tɩchɛ maa wa mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã, n kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ bɔ yuor ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma ɩka n mʋɔl. Yele na pɔɔ ma naa ala ɩ n ba wa mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã ɛ.
Maa mʋɔl a 'yɛr nyã pɔrɔ, n tara na sãyar, ala ba ɩ pɔrɔ gba lɛ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na kaa ir ma 'yɛr lɛ n 'yɛrɛ.
Bo lɛ ɩ a n sãyar? Ala lɛ a anyã ɩka, n mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ pɔrɔ kʋ a nɩbɛ, naa taa bʋɔrɔ tɔ̃nɔ̃ yin a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã mʋɔlfʋ pɔ ɛ.
N gba na so n mɩ̃ɛ ka nɩrɛ jaa ba so ɛ, tɩ n maal n mɩ̃ɛ gbãgbaa kʋ nɩrɛ jaa lɛ an na ɩ ka n tʋ̃ɔ nɩyɔɔ tɔɔ wa kʋ Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
Maa wa ta a Juu nɩbɛ sɛ̃, n ma lɩɛb n mɩ̃ɛ a Juu nɩrɛ, na tʋ̃ɔ ba nyɛ. A bala na be a nɛbinãa pɔ, n ma lɩɛb a ba kaar, n gba na ba be a nɛbinãa pɔ ɛ, lɛ ɩn na ɩ tʋ̃ɔ ba tɔɔ wa kʋ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.

A bala mɩ na ba be a nɛbinãa pɔ ɛ, maa wa ta a ba sɛ̃, n mɩ ma maal fɩka n ba be a nɛbinãa pɔ ɛ, ka n na tʋ̃ɔ ba tɔɔ wa kʋ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto. N gba na ba so n mɩ̃ɛ yi a Nãaŋmɩn nɛbinãa pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ n be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɛbinãa pɔ.
Maa wa ta a bala sɔɔfʋ na ba kpɛ̃mɛ ɛ, n ma lɩɛb a ba kaar lɛ ɩn na ɩ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn. N ma lɩɛb bon jaa kʋ nɩrɛ jaa, ala ɩ n tʋ̃ɔ naa ka n faa a bamɩne.
A 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna jũu lɛ n maala nɩ a anyãna, naa mɩ na tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ a sʋ̃ʋfʋ.
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ ka a bala na ma joro dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa a joa pɔ, tɩchɛ nɩbʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ ma jo na wʋ nyɛ bon ɛ? Yɩ mɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir joro a lɛ na yɩ nyɛ bon.

Nɩrɛ jaa na pʋɔ a jo dɔ̃ɔtaa nyã pɔ, wʋ ma nyɔɔrɔ naa a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yele a jaa pɔ sʋ̃. Ba ma ɩn a lɛ na ba de a vaar ban maal nãa jupil na maa kor ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩn ɩrɛ naa na nyɛ a nãa jupil 'lɔ na ba tara sɔ̃ɔfʋ ɛ.
Ala lɛ so, n ba joro fɩka nɩrɛ na bʋ̃n joro ɛ, ŋmetaa kaar, n ba bʋ̃n lɔɔrɔ a n nuur ɛ.
Kai, n ma ŋmen a n ɩ̃gãn na n maal wʋ a wʋ lɩɛb a n gbãgbaa, ka n taa 'yɛr Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ka a nɩyɔɔ wa nyɛ tɔ̃nɔ̃ tɩchɛ ka Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɩka maa ba sɛɛ ɛ. N ba bʋɔrɔ a lɛ ɛ.
Bojũu n ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka a yele nyã wʋ sɔɔl yɩ ɛ, n yɛɛr. A julõjuur dɔ̃ɔ geru pɔɔ a sɩ sãakpãmɩne ba jaa ka ba jaa tɩ kpɛ a man jɩɛ pɔ gɔ̃ɔ.
Ba jaa tun a Mosesɩ puor ka a julõjuur geru pɔɔ ba, a ba tɩ kpɛ a man jɩɛ gɔ̃ɔ.
Ba jaa lɛ di a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bʋ̃dibʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃,
na ba nyũ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bʋ̃nyũ bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, bojũu ba jaa nyũn yi a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a kʋsɩr pie 'mataa chiine ba, a kʋsɩr pie 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
A anyã a jaa pɔ, tɩ Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ ba pɛl ba ɛ, na wʋ nyɛ suur kʋn ba, ka a ba kũn yɛ̃yɛl be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a yele anyãna ɩn kpãafʋ gã, ɩka sɩ taa de a sɩ tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ yelbier pɔ ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ ban dɔ̃ɔ ɩ ɛ.
Yɩ taa puoro tɩbɛ nɩtãa lɛ a bamɩne na dɔ̃ɔ puor a tɩɩ ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "A nɩbɛ jɛ̃n na ba di na ba nyũ, tɩ pãa ir sɛ bɩ̃nɛ."
Yɩ taa vɛ̃ nɛ ka sɩ wa sɛ̃nɛ nɩtãa lɛ a bamɩne na dɔ̃ɔ sɛ̃ kaar ɛ. A ba nɩbɛ turo lɩjaata (23,000) dɔ̃ɔ lo kpi bɩbir bʋ̃'yen.
Yɩ taa vɛ̃ nɛ ka sɩ wa bɛɛrɛ a sɩ Soro kaara nɩtãa lɛ a bamɩne na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ, a wʋ vɛ̃ ka a waba dʋ̃ ba kʋ ɛ,
na yɩ taa vʋ̃ nɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ a bamɩne na dɔ̃ɔ vʋ̃n wʋ a nɛɛ ka wʋ vɛ̃ ka kũu malaka wa sɔ̃ɔ ba jaa.
A yele anyãna pɔɔ ba naa, naa ɩ kpãafʋ gã, ka ba sɛb bin ka a na ɩ kpãafʋ kʋ sɩ. Bojũu a ber baaraa gbʋrɔ sɩ naa.
A lɛ jũu, ala ɩ fʋ tɩɛr ɩka fʋ bɔ̃ɔn ara, bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃, na fʋ taa lo ɛ.

Bɛɛrkaa tuo jaa ba wa a yɩ sɛ̃, ka a ba ɩ a ala mɩn ma wa a nɩrɛ jaa sɛ̃ lɛ ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ, wʋ kʋ̃ sɔɔ ka a bɛɛrkaa tuo 'lɔ yɩn kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɛ, wa nyɔɔ yɩ ɛ. Tɩchɛ bɛɛrkaa wa nyɔɔ yɩ, wʋn wiil yɩn a sɔr ka yɩ tu yi, na yɩ tʋ̃ɔ ara.
A lɛ jũu n taa Yesu turbo, yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa puoro tɩbɛ ɛ.
N bɔ̃ɔn naa yɩn ɩ yɛ̃ dẽme ka n 'yɛrɛ a nɩtɔ̃ kʋrɔ yɩ, yɩn mɩ̃ɛ yɩ pɛkaa a lɛ ɩn 'yɛr.
A ŋmele 'lɔ sɩn ma de puor a Nãaŋmɩn yãan, a Yesu kũu bʋ̃diir sɔ̃ɔ ma vɛ̃n ka sɩ lɔ̃ɔ põ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jɩ̃ɩ. Ka a paanʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩ mɩn ma ŋma, ma vɛ̃ ka sɩ lɔ̃ɔ põ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ɩ̃gãn.
Bojũu paanʋ̃ɔ bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ, sɩn sɔɔ waa tɩ sɩ ɩn ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen, sɩ jaa lɛ a paanʋ̃ɔ bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ma ta.
Yɩ tɩɛr kaa a Isɩral nɩbɛ pɔ. A ba ɩ a bala na ma di a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔrlo bomo ma pʋɔn a bɔɔr lofʋ jie ɛ?
N pãa 'yɛrɛ na ɩka a bomo ban lon bɔɔr kʋ a tɩɩ ɩn bon bɩɩ a tɩɩ ɩn bon?
Kai, tɩchɛ a bɔɔrlo bomo ala a tɩbɛ dẽme na ma lon a ba bɔɔr, a sɩdɛbɛ lɛ ba ma lon a bɔɔr kʋ a ba ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ɛ, ala lɛ so n ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ 'matãan a sɩdɛbɛ ɛ.
Yɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ lɔ̃ɔn a sɩ Soro nyũn a wʋ ŋmele, tɩ lɛ lɔ̃ɔn a sɩdɛbɛ nyũn a ba ŋmele ɛ. Yɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ lɔ̃ɔn a sɩ Soro a wʋ bʋ̃diir difʋ jie, tɩ lɛ 'mataa lɔ̃ɔn a sɩdɛbɛ bʋ̃diir difʋ jie go ɛ.
Sɩ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka a ɩrɛ a sɩ Soro nyuur bɩɩ? Bɩɩ sɩn lɛ tara kpɛ̃ɔ gar wʋ?
Yɩ ma 'yɛr ɩka, saa chire yele jaa maalfʋ ɛ. Tɩchɛ a ba ɩ yele a jaa lɛ vɩɛlɛ maalfʋ ɛ. Yele jaa ba chire ɛ, tɩchɛ a ba ɩ yele jaa lɛ sʋ̃nɔ̃ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa wʋ ta bʋɔrɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɛɛ vɩla ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ mɩ ma bʋɔrɔ a wʋ taaba vɩla.
Nʋ̃n jaa ban daara a daa pɔ, fʋ̃ʋ wa da ɔɔrɔ ta sʋʋr ɛ, ka a taa ɩ fʋ tɩɛr ɛ.
Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "A sɩ Soro lɛ so a tẽe nɩ bon jaa na be a pɔ."
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ ba ɩ Yesu turo ɛ, wa maal bʋ̃diir bʋɔl fʋ, a fʋ bʋɔrɔ a chenfʋ, fʋ̃ʋ wa chen, bon jaa wʋn wa bin a fʋ niem, dire, ta sʋʋr ɛ, ka a taa ɩ fʋ tɩɛr ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa 'yɛr kʋ fʋ ɩka tɩɩ nʋ̃n lɛ, ta lɛ di a bʋ̃diir ala ɛ, a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a nɩnyɩnɛ tɩɛr jũu.
A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛr kʋ fʋ tɩɛr lɛ n 'yɛrɛ, a ba ɩ fʋ̃ʋ tɩɛr ɛ. Bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ nɩbɛ na jɛ̃ kporo ma nɩ a maa mɩ̃ɛ so fʋ?
Ala ɩ n puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan 'yɔ̃ɔ a bʋ̃diir ala ɩn dire, bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ nɩrɛ na lɛ kporo ma a bon ɩn puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan tɩ dire?
A lɛ jũu ka yɩ nyuro na bɩɩ yɩ dire naa, bon jaa yɩn maala, yɩ maala a jaa kʋrɔ Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr.
Yɩ taa wa maala ka ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa bãr lo ɛ, ka Juu nɩrɛ lɛ bɩɩ waa ɩ Juu nɩrɛ ɛ, bɩɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo ɛ.
Lɛ gba lɛ n mʋɔrɔ naa maala pɛlɛ nɩrɛ jaa pʋɔ yele a jaa pɔ. Bojũu n ba bʋɔrɔ a maa mɩ̃ɛ vɩla ɛ, tɩchɛ a lɛ mɩ na ɩ vɩla kʋ a nɩyɔɔ ka ban tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ faafʋ.
Yɩ kaara ma na yɩ turo nɩtãa lɛ ɩn mɩ na kaara a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto naa turo wʋ.
N ma kpir yɩn jaa a lɛ yɩn chɛnɛ tara a n tɩɛr na yɩ turo a yele ala a jaa ɩn dɔ̃ɔ wiil yɩ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka, daba jaa ju lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto, ka a pɔɔ jaa ju mɩ ɩ a wʋ sɩrɛ, ka a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ju mɩ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn.
Daba jaa wa sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn bɩɩ 'yɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɩ na wʋ pɔɔ a ju wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔn a ju vɩ̃.
Ka pɔɔ jaa mɩ wa sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn bɩɩ 'yɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɩ mɩ ba pɔɔ a wʋ ju mɩ 'yɔ̃ɔn a ju vɩ̃, a kaara fɩka wʋ põn jukpãakpol.
Ala ɩ a pɔɔ kʋ̃ pɔɔ a ju ɛ, wʋ ŋma a ju, ala ɩ a mɩ ɩn vɩ̃ pɔɔ na põ jukpãakpol wʋ ma pɔɔ a ju.
Daba ba sɛɛ ɩka wʋ pɔɔ a wʋ ju ɛ, bojũu 'lɔ lɛ nyɛtãan a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a wʋ tɩɩr. Tɩchɛ ka a pɔɔ mɩ ɩ a sɩrɛ tɩɩr.
Bojũu daba baa dɔ̃ɔ yi a pɔɔ pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ pɔɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ yɩ a daba pɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn mɩ ba dɔ̃ɔ mɛ daba pɔɔ jũu ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ mɛn pɔɔ daba jũu.
A nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ jũu nɩ a malakasɩ jũu, a pɔɔ sɛɛn ɩka wʋ tara a tʋ̃ɔfʋ jɩ̃nɛ a wʋ ju pɔ.
A sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ, pɔɔ ba so wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, daba mɩ ba so wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Bojũu daba pɔ lɛ a pɔɔ yi, ka pɔɔ mɩ ma dɔɔ daba. Tɩchɛ a yele a jaa yin Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ yɩ pɛkaa. A sɛɛn ka pɔɔ na sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn tɩ ba pɔɔ a ju bɩɩ?
A befʋ nyãna mɩ ba wiil yɩ ɩka ala ɩ daba mɩ tur jukɔɔl, a ɩn vɩ̃ kʋ wʋ ɛ?
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ pɔɔ lɛ wa bar a wʋ jukɔɔl ka a wooro a ba ɩ wʋ danʋ̃ɔ lɛ ɛ? Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʋ wʋ a jukɔɔl ka a ɩ a wʋ bʋ̃pɔɔraa.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa chɩrɛ na a yele anyãna, sɩn nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo ba lɛ tara yele jaa go ɛ.
A ala na tu ka ɩn wiil yɩ, tɩ n kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ dãn yɩ ɛ, bojũu a yɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa ma maal yɩn dɛɛr gar a vɩla.
A yeldɔ̃ɔ nɩ nyã, n wõn ɩka yɩn ma wa lɔ̃ɔ taa na puor, yɩ ma ooro nɩ taa, ka n sɔɔ de ɩka, a lɛ ben be sɩrɛ jaa.
A sɛɛ naa ka tɛɛ taa na be a yɩ pɔ, ka a wiil buor sʋɔ na sɔɔ Nãaŋmɩn.
Yɩn ma wa lɔ̃ɔ taa, a ba ɩ a Yesu kũu bʋ̃diir lɛ yɩ ma dire ɛ.
Bojũu yɩn ma wa dire, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ma bʋ̃n dire na yɩ maa gu taa ɛ. Ka a bamɩne ma wa jɛ̃n kɔ̃, tɩchɛ ka a bamɩne mɩ ma nyũ buu.
A mɔ̃ yaa tara yie yɩn na ma di tɩ nyũ a be ɛ? Bɩɩ yɩ kaara naa a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo pɔrɔ na yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bala na ba tara bon jaa vɩ̃? N 'yɛr bo kʋ yɩ? A mɔ̃ n dãn yɩ nɩ a yele nyã ɔ? N kʋ̃ ɩ lɛ ɛ!
Bojũu a wiilfʋ 'lɔ ɩn nyɛ yi a sɩ Soro sɛ̃, lɛ mɩ lɛ ɩn wiil yɩ. A tɩ̃sɔɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa ban na gar yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro Yesu, wʋ den a paanʋ̃ɔ, tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan.
Wʋn wa puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan baar, wʋ ŋmaan a paanʋ̃ɔ tɩ 'yɛr, "Nyã lɛ ɩ a n ɩ̃gãn na wʋ kʋ yɩ, yɩ ma maala a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ tɩɛrɛ nɩ ma."

A lɛ nɩ wʋ ju lɛ ban wa di baar, wʋ den a ŋmel nyuraa na wʋ 'yɛrɛ, "A dãa na be a ŋmele nyãna pɔ lɛ ɩ a n jɩ̃ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn na de bin a nɛtɩr paalaa, yɩ ma maala a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ yɩn ma wa nyuro na yɩ tɩɛrɛ nɩ ma."
Sɔ̃ɔ jaa yɩn ma wa ɔɔrɔ a paanʋ̃ɔ nyãna, na yɩ nyuro nɩ a ŋmele nyãna, yɩ mʋɔlɔ 'yɛrɛ a sɩ Soro kũu 'yɛr tɩ tãn a wʋ waa daar.
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ nyã na ɔɔrɔ a paanʋ̃ɔ nyã, na wʋ nyuro nɩ a ŋmele nyã nɩ ba bãma, wʋ maal yelbier nɩ a sɩ Soro ɩ̃gãn nɩ a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ.
Nɩrɛ jaa wʋ ma bɛɛr a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kaa tɩ pãa 'wɔb a paanʋ̃ɔ nyã, na wʋ nyũn a ŋmele nyã.
Bojũu nɩrɛ jaa na ɔɔrɔ na wʋ nyuro tɩ ba bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a sɩ Soro ɩ̃gãn lɛ ɛ, wʋ 'wɔb nyũn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
Ala lɛ so ka a yɩ yɔɔ bal na yɩ bɩɛrɛ, ka a yɩ yɔɔ jie mɩ kpire.
Ala ɩ sɩ tɔɔr a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr, a sɩ Soro kʋ̃ lɛ tɔɔr a sɩ 'yɛr go ɛ.
A sɩ Soro wa tɔɔr a sɩ 'yɛr, toor lɛ wʋ tɔɔ sɩ, na wʋ taa wa lɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃ɔn sɩ nɩ a bala na ba puoro ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, n taa Yesu turbo, yɩn ma wa lɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa ɩka yɩ di, yɩ ma gu taa.
Ala ɩ kɔ̃ kʋrɔ na ɩ̃sʋɔ, wʋ ma di be a wʋ yir, ka a yɩn wa lɔ̃ɔ taa dire, a ta wa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ kʋ yɩ ɛ. Maa wa tʋ̃ɔ tɩ, ɩn man yɩ naa a ala na chɛ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, n yɛɛr, n ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋfʋsɩ yele a sɔɔl yɩ ɛ.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa a lɛ daar yɩn dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a tɩbɛ dẽme, a tɩbɛ anyãna na ba tara nyɛvʋr ɛ, tɔɔ yɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ bɛlfʋ pɔ.

A lɛ jũu, n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, nɩrɛ jaa ba be na wa 'yɛrɛ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na wʋ 'yɛr ɩka Yesu lɛ wʋ pɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa mɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩka, Yesu lɛ ɩ a sɩ Soro ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ba be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
A kʋfʋsɩ tɛɛn taa, tɩchɛ a jaa yin a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛ̃.
Tʋ̃tʋ̃nsɩ mɩ tɛɛn taa, tɩchɛ a jaa tʋ̃nɔ̃ na kʋrɔ a sɩ Soro.
Tʋ̃tʋ̃nsɩ tʋ̃fʋ mɩ tɛɛn taa, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃'yen nyã lɛ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a jaa a nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã a Nãaŋmɩn den a wʋ Sɩɛ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa a wʋn tʋ̃ɔ de sʋ̃ʋn a wʋ taaba.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ a Sɩɛ bʋ̃'yen nyãna lɛ ma kʋ wʋ a yɛ̃ 'yɛr, na wʋ mɩ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ yɛ̃ bɔ̃ɔfʋ, a Sɩɛ bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ kʋrɔ a jaa.
A Sɩɛ bʋ̃'yen nyã lɛ ma kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ sɔɔfʋ, na wʋ mɩ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ kpɛ̃ɔ, a wʋ sãana nɩ baalsɩ.

Na wʋ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ kpɛ̃ɔ, a wʋ mɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃, na wʋ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ a wʋ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, na wʋ mɩ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ jʋ̃mɔ̃ a wʋ bɔ̃ɔ a 'lɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɩ a 'lɔ na ba ɩ ɛ, na wʋ mɩ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ a wʋ ma tʋ̃ɔ dɩ̃gɩl a 'yɛrsɩ, na wʋ chɛnɛ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ ka wʋ ma tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb a 'yɛr dɩ̃gɩlsɩ anyãna.
A anyãna a jaa ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bʋ̃'yen tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ, a wʋ de kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa a lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ.
A ɩ̃gãn ɩn bʋ̃'yen, bʋ̃yɔɔ na sɔɔ mar mar, a bʋ̃marsɩ anyã na sɔɔ waa, tɩ ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ wʋ ɩ. Lɛ lɛ a mɩ kaara a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.

Bojũu sɩ jaa son a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, nɩ a wʋ Sɩɛ bʋ̃'yen 'yɔ̃ɔ a ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen pɔ, ka Juu nɩrɛ lɛ fʋ ɩ bɩɩ, faa ɩ Juu nɩrɛ ɛ. Ka gbãgbaa lɛ fʋ ɩ bɩɩ, sumɩne lɛ fʋ ɩ, Nãaŋmɩn den a wʋ Sɩɛ bʋ̃'yen nyã kʋ sɩ jaa.
Pʋ̃pãanyã a ba ɩ jibʋ̃'yen lɛ a ɩ̃gãn tara ɛ, tɩchɛ jiyɔɔ lɛ wʋ tara.
Ala ɩ gbɛr wa 'yɛr naa ɩka, n ba ɩ nũu ɛ, a lɛ jũu n ba pʋɔ a ɩ̃gãn pɔ ɛ. A lɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ vɛ̃ a waa ɩ a ɩ̃gãn jie ɩ̃sʋɔ ɛ.
Ka ala ɩ toor mɩ 'yɛr naa, n ba ɩ nɩbir ɛ, a lɛ jũu n ba pʋɔ a ɩ̃gãn pɔ ɛ. A lɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ vɛ̃ a waa ɩ a ɩ̃gãn jie ɩ̃sʋɔ ɛ.
Ala ɩ a ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa ɩn nɩbir, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʋn taa ma ɩ wõ 'yɛr? Ka ala ɩ a ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa mɩ ɩn toor, ŋmɩnɛ wʋn ɩ mɩ wa wõ nyũu.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ choo taa a jidẽdẽme anyãna ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa a ɩ̃gãn pɔ, a lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ ba.
Ala ɩ a jaa ɩn bʋ̃'yen, nyɩnɛ lɛ a ɩ̃gãn mɩn taa be?
Jiyɔɔ lɛ be a ɩ̃gãn pɔ, tɩchɛ a wʋ ɩ ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen.
Ala lɛ so ka a nɩbir kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ a nũu, n ba bʋɔrɔ fʋ ɛ. A ju mɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ gbɛr, n ba bʋɔrɔ fʋ ɛ.
Yɩ kaa, a ɩ̃gãn jiir ala na ba kpɛ̃mɛ ɛ, ala lɛ sɩ ma mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir kaara.
A jiir ala sɩn ma tɩɛr ɩka a ba tara 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ ɛ, ala lɛ sɩ ma bɔ̃ɔ kaara. Ka a jiir ala mɩ na ba be yõo yi fʋ ɛ, ala lɛ sɩ ma bɔ̃ɔ chɔɔr.
Ka a ala mɩ na be a yõo yifʋ, sɩ maa chɔɔr a ala ɛ. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ de a jiir anyãna 'mataa a ɩ̃gãn pɔ, na wʋ de 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋ a jiir amɩne na ba dɔ̃ɔ tara ɛ.
Ka a lɛ na vɛ̃ a dẽdẽme ɩfʋ kʋ̃ lɛ be a ɩ̃gãn pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a jaa ma sʋ̃nɔ̃ taa.
Ala ɩ a ɩ̃gãn jie ɩ̃sʋɔ wa bɩɛrɛ naa, a ɩ̃gãn jiir a jaa mɩ ma bɩɛrɛ naa. Ala ɩ a ɩ̃gãn jie ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa mɩ wa nyɛn 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, a ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa mɩ ma chɩlɛ naa.
Pʋ̃pãanyã yɩn lɛ lɔ̃ɔ taa ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ɩ̃gãn, ka yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɩ a jie ɩ̃sʋɔ.

A pupuorbiir banyãna pɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn de nie ir a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ, na wʋ lɛ tu ir a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ, na wʋ lɛ tu ir a wʋ wiwiilbe, na wʋ lɛ ir a bala mɩn na tʋ̃nɔ̃ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃, na wʋ ir a bala mɩn na sãana baalsɩ, na wʋ ir bamɩne ka ba sʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩbɛ, na wʋ lɛ ir bamɩne na kaara a tʋ̃mɔ̃, nɩ a bala mɩ na bɔ̃ɔ a kɔkɔɛ dɩ̃gɩlfʋ.
A mɔ̃ ba jaa lɛ ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ bɩɩ? Bɩɩ ba jaa lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ɔ? Ba jaa lɛ ɩ a wiwiilbe ɔ? Ba jaa lɛ ma tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ bɩɩ?
Ba jaa lɛ wʋ kʋ a baal sãafʋ bɩɩ? Ba jaa lɛ ma tʋ̃ɔ dɩ̃gɩl a ba kɔkɔɛ ɔ? Bɩɩ ba jaa lɛ ma tʋ̃ɔ a kɔkɔr dɩ̃gɩlaa lɩɛb ɔ?
Tɩchɛ yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir bɔ a kʋfʋsɩ 'lɔ na gar a jaa. Pʋ̃pãanyã, ɩn wiil yɩn a sɔr 'lɔ na gar a jaa.
Ala ɩ n ma tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr a nɩbɛ kɔkɔ bʋrsɩ a jaa, naa tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr a malakasɩ kɔkɔɛ, tɩchɛ naa ba tara nʋ̃fʋ ɛ, ɩn kaara naa fɩka kur ban ŋmiere a wʋ pɔɔrɔ gɔ̃mɔ̃.
Ala ɩ n tara naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʋ kʋfʋ, naa bɔ̃ɔ a yelsɔɔlsɩ a jaa, naa bɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃ jaa bʋrɔ, ka ala ɩ n mɩ tara na sɔɔfʋ naa ma 'yɛr tɔ̃n ka a ir, tɩchɛ naa ba tara nʋ̃fʋ ɛ, n ɩn bʋ̃pɔrɔ.
Ala ɩ n den a n bʋ̃tarsɩ a jaa põ nɔ̃n dẽme, naa sɔɔ ɩka ba de a n ɩ̃gãn 'yɔ̃ɔ bũu 'lɩraa pɔ, tɩchɛ naa ba tara nʋ̃fʋ ɛ, n ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ.
Nʋ̃fʋ ma tara na kãnyir, nʋ̃fʋ ma maala na vɩla, waa jɩɛlɛ nɩrɛ bon ɛ, waa bʋɔrɔ yuor ɛ, waa 'mɔɔrɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Nʋ̃fʋ ba tara nɛtuo ɛ, waa bʋɔrɔ wʋ yõ tɛɛ bomo ɛ, wʋ maa nyɛ suur fɔɔ ɛ, waa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩrɛ pʋ̃ɔm ɛ.
Nʋ̃fʋ ba nʋ̃ yelbier jie ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ ma nʋ̃n yelmɩ̃ɛ jie.
Nʋ̃fʋ ma gun taa lɛ sɔ̃ɔ jaa, wʋ ma sɔɔn yele a jaa, waa baala ɛ, nʋ̃fʋ ma sɔɔn ka a wõ wʋ.
Nʋ̃fʋ maa ɩ faa ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʋ na wa ŋmaa naa, ka a kɔkɔ dɩ̃gɩlsɩ 'yɛrfʋ mɩ wa tɛɛ, ka a bɔ̃ɔfʋ mɩ wa po chen.
Bojũu a bɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋfʋ ɩn ŋmaa, ka a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʋ mɩ ɩ ŋmaa,
tɩchɛ a bʋ̃mɩ̃ɛ wa wa, a bʋ̃gãagiel na bɔr naa.
A lɛ daar ɩn ɩ a bibile, bibi'yɛr lɛ n ma 'yɛrɛ, naa tara a bibiyɛ̃ naa ma tɩɛrɛ a bibitɩɛr. Tɩchɛ ɩn wa ɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ baar, n lɔb a bibiyele a jaa bar.
Pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, chãana pɔ lɛ sɩ kaara jaa tũfuru, tɩchɛ sɩn wa tuor taa nɩ gbie. Pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ ŋmaa lɛ n bɔ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ ɩn pãa wa bɔ̃ɔ wʋn baar nɩtãa lɛ wʋ mɩn bɔ̃ɔ ma.
Pʋ̃pãanyã a yelsɩ ata anyãna lɛ ba tɛɛrɛ ɛ, sɔɔfʋ, tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie nɩ nʋ̃fʋ. Tɩchɛ a anyãna a jaa pɔ, nʋ̃fʋ lɛ gar a jaa.
Yɩ turo a nʋ̃fʋ sɔr, na yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir bʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋfʋsɩ, na yɩ kaa ir a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʋ kʋfʋ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ.
Bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bɔ̃ɔ a kɔkɔr dɩ̃gɩlaa 'yɛrfʋ nɩrɛ ba lɛ wʋ 'yɛrɛ nɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ wʋ ma 'yɛrɛ nɩ. Yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩrɛ jaa maa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ wʋn 'yɛrɛ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ lɛ wʋ ma de 'yɛrɛ nɩ a yelsɔɔlsɩ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, nɩbɛ lɛ wʋ ma 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ ka ban kpɛ̃mɛ, na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ba ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn na wʋ 'maala ba.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ma 'yɛrɛ a kɔkɔr dɩ̃gɩlaa sʋ̃nɔ̃ naa a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɛɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr mɩ sʋ̃nɔ̃ naa a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo a ba baa.

Maa bɔfʋ lɛ ɩka a yɩ jaa yɩ ma tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ a kɔkɔr dɩ̃gɩlaa nyã, tɩchɛ lɛ ɩn bʋɔrɔ yɔɔ lɛ ɩka yɩ jaa yɩ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr. 'Lɔ na 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, gar a 'lɔ na 'yɛrɛ a kɔkɔr dɩ̃gɩlaa, ala ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ ba be be na tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb na wʋ wiil a par kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo ka a sʋ̃ʋ ba ɛ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, n yɛɛr, ala ɩ n ben wa a yɩ sɛ̃, wa dɩ̃gɩl a kɔkɔr baa tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ yɩn nyɛ? Ka yelwiilaa kɔ̃ɔ ba lɛ n waan ɛ, bɩɩ bɔ̃ɔfʋ kɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, bɩɩ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, bɩɩ kpãafʋ 'yɛr kɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɛ?
De man a bʋ̃ŋmiersɩ kõn, ka wele lɛ bɩɩ kõrõjom lɛ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ nɩrɛ na ɩrɛ wa bɔ̃ɔ a sʋkpa nyɩnɛ wʋn ŋmiere bɩɩ pɛɛlɛ ala ɩ a ba tara nɛkpɛ̃ɛ nɩ kɔkɔbile ɛ?
Ala ɩ baa wa pɛɛl wɛraa a jɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ nɩrɛ na ɩrɛ wa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka jɛɛr lo na ba chɔɔr chen?
Lɛ lɛ yɩn mɩ, a yɩ jãlbir ba wa tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ a 'yɛrbie ala na tor ɛ, an lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ yɩn 'yɛrɛ par? 'Yɛr vor lɛ yɩn 'yɛrɛ.
Baal jaa ba be be ɛ, kɔkɔ bʋrsɩ lɛ ba 'yɛrɛ ka a wɛr pɔ, tɩchɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba be be na ba tara par ɛ.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa 'yɛrɛ nɩ ma naa a wʋ 'yɛr ka n ba wõ naa ɛ, n ɩn sãan a wʋ sɛ̃ ka wʋ mɩ ɩ sãan a n sɛ̃.
Lɛ lɛ a yɩn mɩ, yɩ ben mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir bʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋfʋsɩ, yɩ mɔ̃ na yɩ nyɛ a kʋfʋsɩ ala na sʋ̃ʋ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo ka ba baa.
A yele nyãna jũu, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ma tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr a kɔkɔr dɩ̃gɩlaa nyã wʋ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn a wʋ sʋ̃ʋ wʋ, a wʋ tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb wiil a lɛ wʋn ma 'yɛr.
Ala ɩ n dɩ̃gɩlaa a kɔkɔr sʋɔrɔ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn, a n sɩɛ mɩ sʋɔrɔ naa tɩchɛ a n tɩɛr a wʋ ɩ pɔrɔ.
N pãa ɩ ŋmɩnɛ? Maa nɩ a n sɩɛ na lɔ̃ɔn sʋɔr a Nãaŋmɩn naa lɛ 'matãan a n tɩɛr mɩ sʋɔr. Maa nɩ a n sɩɛ na 'mataa yiel a Nãaŋmɩn yiel naa mɩ lɛ 'matãan a n tɩɛr yiel.
Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ yɩ dãna nɩ a yɩ sɩɛ, ka a jɛ̃gumo mɩ wa lɔ̃ɔn yɩ na waa wõnõ a lɛ yɩn 'yɛrɛ ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ wʋn ɩrɛ wa 'yɛr ɩka, a ɩ a lɛ, yɩn dãna Nãaŋmɩn, wʋn ba bɔ̃ɔ a par a lɛ yɩn 'yɛrɛ ɛ?
A yɩ Nãaŋmɩn dãnfʋ na vɩɛlɛ na jaa kper, tɩchɛ a ba sʋ̃ʋ a yɩ tɔ sʋɔ 'lɔ ɛ.
N puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan an ɩ n ma tʋ̃ɔn 'yɛr a kɔkɔr dɩ̃gɩlaa nyã gar yɩ jaa.
Tɩchɛ maa wa kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo pɔ, n ma 'yɛr 'yɛrbie anũu ban na tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par gar ɩn na 'yɛr 'yɛrbie turo pie (10,000) ban kʋ̃ bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ.
N yɛɛr, yɩ tɛɛ a bibitɩɛr bar. Ala ɩ yelbier maalfʋ lɛ, yɩ ɩ bipɩlɛ, tɩchɛ ka a yɩ yɛ̃ pɔ 'lɔ nʋ̃ɔ bɩ nɩbɛrɛ.
A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Ɩn den kɔkɔr sãan naa tu a sãanba nɛɛ pɔ 'yɛr 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ banyãna, tɩchɛ ba gba kʋ̃ chɛlɛ a lɛ ɩn 'yɛrɛ ɛ." Lɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.

Ala lɛ so, a kɔkɔr dɩ̃gɩlaa 'yɛrfʋ ba ɩ jɩ̃nɛ kʋ a Yesu turbo ɛ, tɩchɛ a ɩn jɩ̃nɛ kʋ a bala na ba ɩ a Yesu turbo. A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʋ, a bala na ɩ a Yesu turbo mɩ lɛ so, a ba ɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Yesu turbo ɛ.
Ala ɩ a pupuorbiir wa lɔ̃ɔn taa ka ba jaa dɩ̃gɩl a kɔkɔɛ, na ba 'yɛrɛ, ka a jɛ̃gumo ɩ̃sʋɔ be a yɩ pɔ bɩɩ nɩbɛ na ba ɩ a Yesu turbo ɛ, wa kpɛ nyɛ a lɛ yɩn 'yɛrɛ, ba kʋ̃ 'yɛr ɩka yɩ gele naa ɛ?

Tɩchɛ ala ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na ba ɩ a Yesu turo ɛ, bɩɩ nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ mɩ na ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, 'lɔ wa kpɛ nyɛ ka a ɩ yɩ jaa 'yɛrɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a wʋ wõ naa bɔ̃ɔn wʋn ɩ yelbe-ɩrɛ, a ala wʋn wõ na tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr ka wʋ lɩɛb a wʋ tɩɛr.
Wʋn chiir a wʋ pʋɔ a ba niem tɩ lo kpa tẽe puor Nãaŋmɩn, tɩ 'yɛr ɩka yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa Nãaŋmɩn ben a yɩ sɛ̃.

N pãa lɛ 'yɛr bo, n yɛɛr? Yɩn ma wa lɔ̃ɔ taa, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ma tara naa yiel na yiel, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ tara kpãafʋ 'yɛrbir na 'yɛr, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ tara yelwiilaa na yi Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ na wʋn 'yɛr, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ tara a kɔkɔr dɩ̃gɩlaa na 'yɛr ka ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb wiil a par. Yɩ maala a anyãna a jaa ka a sʋ̃ʋ yɩ a yɩ kpɛ̃mɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ pɔ.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ na wa 'yɛrɛ naa a kɔkɔr dɩ̃gɩlaa, ba ɩ ayi bɩɩ ata, ba ta gar ata ɛ, na ba 'yɛrɛ tɩ chɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa. Ka nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ be be ma tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb wiil a par.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ ba be be na tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb na wʋ wiil a par ɛ, a nɩnyɩnɛ wʋ ɩ jaa gbul a puorfʋ jie, tɩ bʋlɔ kʋrɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn.
Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ba ɩ ayi bɩɩ ata na ba 'yɛrɛ, tɩchɛ ka a bala na chɛ jʋrɔ kaara a lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ.
Ka ala wa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn ir yele wiil a bala na jɩ̃nɛ, a 'lɔ na de nie 'yɛrɛ wʋ mɩ pɔɔ a wʋ nɛɛ.
Yɩn 'yɛrɛ tɩ chɛrɛ kʋrɔ taa an kpãa yɩ naa tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr wʋ nyɔɔrɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn ba ɩ nyɔ̃ nyɔ̃ɔfʋ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, a wʋ bʋɔl sɩ a sɩn kpɩɛrɛ nɩ nyã'maar nɩtãa lɛ an kaara a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ba jaa jie.
Pɔbɔ ba ma ɩ jaa gbulo a puorfʋ jie, baa tara sɔr na haa nɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ ba siir ba mɩ̃ɛ nɩtãa lɛ a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa na 'yɛr.
Ala ɩ ba bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka ba sʋʋr yele kɔ̃ɔ kaa, ba kul a yir tɩ sʋʋr a ba mɩ̃ɛ sɩrbɛ kaa. Bojũu a ɩn vɩ̃ pɔɔ na 'yɛr 'yɛr a puorfʋ jie.
Yɩn sɛ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr de nie yi bɩɩ? Bɩɩ yɩn tɛɛ lɛ ɩ a nɩbɛ a 'yɛr na de nie ta?
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ tɩɛr ɩka wʋ ɩn a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrɛ bɩɩ tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kʋfʋsɩ, vɛ̃ ka a nɩnyɩnɛ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a anyãna ɩn sɛb ɩ naa lɛ a sɩ Soro na bin.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ ba wa sɔɔ anyãna ɛ, yɩ mɩ ta sɔɔ wʋ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, n yɛɛr, yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʋ, tɩ na yɩ taa tɔrɔ a 'yɛr dɩ̃gɩlaa 'yɛrfʋ bara ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ ma maala yele jaa na sɛɛ naa ɩ nɛ nɛ nɛ sɔr jaa pɔ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, n yɛɛr, n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n lɛ jɛɔ yɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ mʋɔl kʋ yɩ a yɩ sɔɔ de na yɩ be ara a pɔ.
A 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna ɩn mʋɔl faa yɩ naa ala ɩ yɩ chɛnɛ na ara a pɔ, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, a yɩ sɔɔfʋ ɩn pɔrɔ.
Bojũu a 'yɛr ɩn dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ lɛ n mɩ de nie man kʋ yɩ ɩka, a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto kpin a sɩ yelbier jũu, nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr,
ka ba ũu wʋ, a wʋ lɛ ir a kũu pɔ, a ber ata daar nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr.
Wʋ vɛ̃ naa ka Pita nyɛ wʋ, na wʋ lɛ vɛ̃ ka a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ pie nɩ ayi mɩ nyɛ wʋ.
A anyã puor, wʋ vɛ̃n ka a yɛɛr na gar kɔɔr anũu (500) mɩ 'mataa nyɛ wʋ, bamɩne na sɔɔ kpi, tɩchɛ a ba yɔɔ jie lɛ chɛnɛ.
Wʋ vɛ̃n ka a Jemesɩ nyɛ wʋ, na wʋ lɛ vɛ̃ ka a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ ba jaa nyɛ wʋ,
ka a baaraa jaa ka maa mɩ na kaara fɩka nɩrɛ ban dɔɔ kpalka ka wʋ ir a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ wiil ma.
Bojũu maa lɛ ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ ba jaa pɔ bʋ̃bile naa ba sɛɛn ɩka ba gba bʋɔl ma a nɩtʋ̃nãa ɛ, bojũu n gen a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo.

Tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ wʋn wɩ̃ɛ ma lɛ so ka n ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nãa a dɩna. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ ba ɩ pɔrɔ ɛ. Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa n tʋ̃n gar a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ ba jaa, tɩ a ba ɩ maa mɩ̃ɛ lɛ tʋ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ 'lɔ wʋn de wɩ̃ɛn ma lɛ.
Ka maa lɛ bɩɩ bala lɛ, a 'yɛr lɛ anyã sɩn mʋɔl, ka anyãna lɛ yɩ mɩ sɔɔ de.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ yɩ wõn a mʋɔl ɩka a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ir naa a kũu pɔ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a yɩ bamɩne 'yɛrɛ ɩka kũu pɔ irfʋ ba be be ɛ?
Ala ɩ a kũu pɔ irfʋ ba be be ɛ, ka a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ gba ba ir a kũu pɔ ɛ.
Ka ala ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ba ir a kũu pɔ ɛ, a sɩ mʋɔl ɩn pɔrɔ, ka a yɩ sɔɔfʋ mɩ ɩ pɔrɔ.
A sɩ pãa ŋmara jirsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn, bojũu sɩ din dãasɩɛ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn sɩ̃ɩn a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto a kũu pɔ. Tɩchɛ waa sɩ̃ɩ wʋ ɛ, ala ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa kũusɩ ba ire ɛ.
Bojũu ala ɩ a kũu pɔ irfʋ ba be be ɛ, ka lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ gba ba ir a kũu pɔ ɛ.
Ka ala ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ba ir a kũu pɔ ɛ, a yɩ sɔɔfʋ ɩn pɔrɔ, na yɩ chɛnɛ be a yɩ yelbebe pɔ.
Ka a bala mɩ na pãa sɔɔ de a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tɩ kpi, mɩ wɛ.
Ala ɩ a dɩna tɛɛ tɩɛr lɛ sɩ tara a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, nɩbaal nɩbɛ lɛ sɩ ɩ, na sɩ gar a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn sɩ̃ɩn a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto a kũu pɔ yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa, ɩ a bir dɔ̃ɔ, ka a wiil ɩka a bala na kpi mɩ na ir a kũu pɔ.
Bojũu kũu tun nɩbʋ̃'yen 'yɔ̃ɔ wa, ka a kũu pɔ irfʋ mɩ tu a nɩbʋ̃'yen 'yɔ̃ɔ mɩ wa.
Adama jũu, nɩrɛ jaa na kpi naa, lɛ mɩ lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu, nɩrɛ jaa na ir tara nyɛvʋr.
Tɩchɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa nɩ wʋ irfʋ daar lɛ, Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ ɩ a bir dɔ̃ɔ, 'lɔ pãa wa lɩɛb waara, ka bala jaa na sɔɔ de wʋ mɩ ir.
Ka a baaraa pãa wa, a wʋ de a yele a jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nũu pɔ, an ɩ wʋ tʋ̃ɔn a tʋ̃ɔfʋ dẽme, nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme ba jaa.
Bojũu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka wʋ di a nãa lɛ̃ɛɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn wa de a wʋ dɔ̃dẽme ba jaa bin a wʋ gbɛɛ pĩlem.
A dɔ̃ baaraa wʋn na sɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɩ a kũu.
Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Nãaŋmɩn den a yele a jaa bin a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto gbɛɛ pĩlem." Wʋn ben 'yɛr ɩka, a yele a jaa, a Nãaŋmɩn na de a yele a jaa bin a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto gbɛɛ pĩlem ba pʋɔ ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn wa ɩ a nɩtɔ̃ baar, a 'lɔ na de a yele a jaa bin a wʋ gbɛɛ pĩlem, a Bie mɩ̃ɛ mɩ na siir wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ wʋ, ka Nãaŋmɩn pãa so a jaa.
Nɩyɔɔ ba sɔɔ ɩka a bala na kpi na lɛ ir tara nyɛvʋr go ɛ, tɩchɛ bamɩne sɔɔ naa na ba ma so Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ kʋ ba.
Ka a sɩn mɩ, bãa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a dɔɔyɛ ma pɔɔ sɩ sɔ̃ɔ jaa?
Yɛɛr, bɩbir jaa lɛ n ma tuoro kũu, jɩɩrfʋ kpɛ ma naa a yɩ jũu. A nyɛvʋr sɩn tara a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ vɛ̃ ka n 'yɛrɛ a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃.
Ala ɩ n jɛb naa a mɔdʋ̃ bier a ka Efesus nɩsaal jũu, bo tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ n nyɛ? Ala ɩ a kũu kʋ̃ lɛ ir ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ a nɩbɛ na ma 'yɛrɛ. "Yɩ vɛ̃ ka sɩ di ti nyũ, bojũu bio sɩn kpi naa."
Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka nɩbɛ bɛl yɩ ɛ. Fʋ̃ʋ lɔ̃ɔn nɩgãlsɩ ba ma sɔ̃ɔn a fʋ tɩɛr vɩla bar.
Yɩ lɩɛb de a yɩ yɛ̃, na yɩ tɛɛ bier ɩfʋ bar, bojũu a yɩ bamɩne ba bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, ka n 'yɛr a nɩtɔ̃ ka vɩ̃ kpɛ ba.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na sʋʋr naa, "Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a kũu na ɩrɛ wa ir? Ɩ̃gãn buor lɛ ban lɛ iru?"
Nyɛ dãbol ka. A ala yɩn ma bʋr a ba ɩ a ma bulaa tɩ a bʋ̃koraa pʋ̃ɔ ɛ.
Yɩn wa bʋr, a ba ɩ a vaar lɛ yɩ bʋr ɛ, tɩchɛ a bʋ̃bir tɛɛ lɛ yɩ ma bʋr. Ka chi lɛ bɩɩ bon bir lɛ.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ma kʋ a ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɩ̃gãn 'lɔ jaa wʋn bʋɔrɔ. Bʋ̃bir ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa nɩ wʋ vaar lɛ.
Ɩ̃gãn nʋ̃nɔ̃ a jaa baa ɩ bʋ̃'yen ɛ. Nɩrɛ ɩ̃gãn nʋ̃n tɛɛ naa nɩ dʋ̃n ɩ̃gãn nʋ̃n, ka a lubil nʋ̃n be wʋ yõ, ka a jɩ̃mɛ nʋ̃n mɩ be a yõ.
Saaju ɩ̃gãma mɩ ben be, ka a tẽe ɩ̃gãma mɩ be be. A saaju ɩ̃gãma vɩɛl ben a yõ, ka a tẽe ɩ̃gãma vɩɛl mɩ be a yõ.
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ vɩla ben wʋ yõ, ka a ŋmɛraa vɩla mɩ be wʋ yõ, ka a ŋmɛrbir ɩ̃sʋɔ vɩla mɩ tɛɛ a ŋmɛrbir ɩ̃sʋɔ.
Lɛ lɛ an be a kũn wa ir a kũu pɔ. A ɩ̃gãn 'lɔ ban ũu ɩn bʋ̃sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩchɛ 'lɔ wa ir a kũu pɔ, waa lɛ pʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ go ɛ.
Bala wa ũu a kũu wʋ ma ɩn bʋ̃dɛɛr ba lɛ tara kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn wa ir wʋ a kũu pɔ, wʋn vɩɛlɛ naa na wʋ tara kpɛ̃ɔ.
A tẽe ɩ̃gãn nyã lɛ ba ũun wʋ, 'lɔ wa ir a kũu pɔ, a sɩɛ ɩ̃gãn lɛ wʋn tara. Nɩtãa lɛ a tẽe ɩ̃gãn na be be, lɛ mɩ lɛ a sɩɛ ɩ̃gãn mɩ be be.
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Adama a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ de nie mɛ ɩn bʋ̃nɩbir." A Adama bɩɛraa sʋɔ lɛ ɩ a sɩɛ.
A sɩɛ sʋɔ ba lɛ de nie ɛ, tɩchɛ a ɩ̃gãn sʋɔ lɛ, ala puor ka a sɩɛ sʋɔ pãa wa.
A nɩdɔ̃ɔ yin ka a tẽe pɔ, Nãaŋmɩn na mɛn a tã-uul, tɩchɛ a nɩbɩɛraa 'lɔ yin saaju.
Bala na yi ka a tẽe pɔ, kaara na fɩka, a 'lɔ ban mɛn a tã-uul, ka bala mɩ na yi a saaju mɩ kaara na, fɩka a 'lɔ na yi a saaju.
A lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju sɩn ben nyɛtãan a nɩrɛ nyã a Nãaŋmɩn na mɛn a tã-uul, lɛ mɩ lɛ sɩn su a ɩ̃gãn 'lɔ nyɛtãan a 'lɔ na yi a saaju kaar.
N yɛɛr, n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n 'yɛr chã kʋ yɩ ɩka, a ɩ̃gãn nɩ a jɩ̃ɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ be a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ ɛ. Bɩɩ ka a bʋ̃sɔ̃ɔ naa pʋɔ a 'lɔ na ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ pɔ ɛ.
Yɩ chɛlɛ ka n 'yɛr 'yɛr sɔɔlaa kɔ̃ɔ kʋ yɩ. Sɩ jaa baa na kpi ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ jaa lɛ na lɩɛb,
fɩka a nɩbir na ma wa va a pere kaar, ka a iil baaraa wa pɛɛl. Bojũu a iil wa pɛɛl a bala na kpi na ir naa, ba kʋ̃ lɛ kpi go ɛ, ka a sɩn bala na ba kpi sɛrɛ ɛ, mɩ lɩɛb.
Ka a ɩ̃gãma anyã na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃, ka a lɩɛb de a ɩ̃gãma ala na ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ su, ka a 'lɔ na kpire kʋ̃ lɛ kpi go ɛ.
A bʋ̃sɔ̃ɔ naa wa de a 'lɔ na ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ, su, ka a 'lɔ na kpire kʋ̃ lɛ kpi go ɛ, ka a lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãma pɔ ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ, "Kũu a fʋ tʋ̃ɔfʋ baar naa."
"Kũu, nyɩnɛ lɛ a fʋ tʋ̃ɔfʋ be? Kũu, nyɩnɛ lɛ a fʋ fɩlɩlɩlɩ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na ma kʋ be?"
A kũu fɩlɩlɩlɩ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na ma kʋ ɩn a yelbier maalfʋ, ka a yelbier maalfʋ mɩ nyɛ a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ yi a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa pɔ.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn son puor fʋ, wʋn kʋ sɩ tʋ̃ɔfʋ tu a lɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na maal.
A lɛ jũu, n yɛɛr, yɩ ara chɩ̃chɩ̃, yɩ taa vɛ̃ ka a bon jaa wa dam yɩ ɛ. Yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a sɩ Soro tʋ̃mɔ̃, yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a ala yɩn tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ a sɩ Soro, kʋ̃ wa ɩ pɔrɔ ɛ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n 'yɛr a chɩɛrfʋ yɩn bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ chɩɛr sʋ̃ʋn a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ. Yɩ mɩ maal a lɛ ɩn man kʋ a Galatiya paal pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ɩka ba maal.
A Pɛ̃nfʋ divɩɛ bio daar jaa, a bɩbir 'lɔ na de nie ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ ma ir a libie jɩ̃ a lɛ wʋn ma nyɛ na yɩ bine, ka maa wa tɩ a ta lɛ ɩ chɩɛrfʋ go ɛ.
Maa wa tɔ̃ɔ ta n de a gãma kʋ a nɩbɛ bala yɩn mɩ̃ɛ na ir naa tʋ̃n nɩ a libie ala yɩn chɩɛr ka ba chiin a Jerusalɛm.
Ka ala wa ɩ fɩka a maa mɩ̃ɛ sɛɛn mɩ na chen go, ba kʋ̃ bɩɛl ma.
Maa wa chen tɩ yi a Masedonɩya baar, ɩn wan a yɩ sɛ̃, bojũu be lɛ ɩn tu.
Amɩne sɛ̃ ɩn jɛ̃n a yɩ sɛ̃ kor bɩ̃lãa, bɩɩ ka n jɩ̃nɛ a be ka a uon wa baar, ka yɩ sʋ̃ʋ ma ka n chiine a n chenfʋ jie.
N ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka n tɔ̃ɔ tɩ nyɛ yɩ a lɛ nɛ a pʋ̃pãanyã tɩ po ɛ, n tɩɛr naa ɩka n jɛ̃ a yɩ sɛ̃ kor ala ɩ a sɩ Soro sɔɔ naa.
Tɩchɛ ɩn jɛ̃n a Efesus tẽe pɔ tɩ tãn a Pentikosɩ bɩbir.
Bojũu sɔr yuon kʋ ma ka ɩn tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃ tʋ̃mɔ̃, tɩchɛ ka a nɩyɔɔ mɩ kpɛrɛ ma.
Ala ɩ a Timoti wa tɩ naa, yɩ kaa ka yele jaa taa kʋrɔ wʋ dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, bojũu a sɩ Soro tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ wʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a n kaar.
Yɩ taa vɛ̃ ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa kaa wʋ pɔrɔ ɛ. Yɩ bar wʋ sɔr nɩ nyã'maar ka wʋ lɛ lɩɛb wa a n sɛ̃. Maa nɩ a yɛɛr jaa chɛlɛ wʋ naa.
A sɩ yɛbɛ Apolosɩ, n sʋɔr wʋn gbɛɛ a ŋmɩnɛ jaa ɩka wʋ tɩ a yɩ sɛ̃ 'matãan a yɛɛr bamɩne. Tɩchɛ waa sɔɔ a be tɩfʋ a pʋ̃pãanyã sɛrɛ ɛ, 'lɔ wa nyɛ sɔr wʋn tɩ naa.
Yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ jʋ̃mɔ̃, na yɩ ara chɩ̃chɩ̃ a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ, na yɩ ɩ nɩbɛ na tara nyãa na yɩ kpɛ̃mɛ.
Na yɩ ma maala yele jaa nɩ nʋ̃fʋ.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa a Sɩtɛfanas nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme, bala lɛ dɔ̃ɔn a puorfʋ be a Akaya paal pɔ, na ba mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ. N sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa yɛɛr ɩka,
yɩ siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a nɩbɛ banyãna taaba nɩ nɩrɛ jaa na pʋɔ ba bala, a ba kaar.
Nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ma naa ɩn wa nyɛ a Sɩtɛfanas nɩ Fortunatus nɩ a Akaikus na wa ta a n sɛ̃, bojũu bala lɛ sʋ̃ʋ ma yɩn ba be ka ɛ.
Bojũu bala lɛ 'maa ma ɩ̃gãn nɩtãa lɛ ban mɩn 'maa a yɩ ɩ̃gãn, a nɩbɛ banyãna sɛɛn pɛɛfʋ.
A pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ba jaa na be a Asɩya paal pɔ puor yɩ naa. Akuila nɩ a Pɩrɩsɩla mɩ den a sɩ Soro yuor puor yɩ, nɩ a pupuorbiir bala na ma lɔ̃ɔ a ba yir, mɩ puoro yɩ naa.
A yɛɛr ba jaa na be a ka mɩ puor yɩ naa. Yɩ mɩ puor puor taa nɩ pʋpɛl.
Maa Pɔɔl mɩ̃ɛ nũu lɛ n sɛb a puorfʋ nyãna.
Ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa baa nʋ̃ a sɩ Soro ɛ, pɔ'yɔ̃ɔfʋ ben a wʋ sɛ̃. Pa sɩ Soro, wa.
A sɩ Soro Yesu wɩ̃ɛfʋ a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
A n nʋ̃fʋ wʋ be a yɩn bala jaa na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ. A ɩ a lɛ.
Maa Pɔɔl na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nãa Nãaŋmɩn na chɛl ir nɩ a sɩ yɛbɛ Timoti, lɛ sɛɛrɛ a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a pupuorbiir na be a Korɩntɩ tẽe pɔ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ba jaa mɩ na be a Akaya paal pɔ.
Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃ a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Pɛɛfʋ wʋ ta Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto Sãa, a Sãa nyã nɩbir na bal nɩ Nãaŋmɩn nyã na tara a 'maalfʋsɩ a jaa.
'Lɔ lɛ ma 'maal sɩ a sɩ wõm a jaa pɔ, ka sɩ mɩ na tʋ̃ɔ 'maal a bala mɩ na be wõm jaa pɔ, nɩ a 'maalfʋ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ sɩn nyɛ yin a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Nɩtãa lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto dɔɔyɛ difʋ na yaar dɔɔl sɩ jaa, lɛ mɩ lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'maalfʋ yaar dɔɔl sɩ jaa.
Ala ɩ sɩ ben wõm pɔ, a yɩ 'maalfʋ nɩ a yɩ faafʋ jũu lɛ, ala ɩ sɩ mɩ nyɛn 'maalfʋ a mɩ ɩn a yɩ 'maalfʋ lɛ, a yɩn tʋ̃ɔ ara nɩ kãnyir a dɔɔyɛ bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ sɩn mɩ na dire.
Sɩ bar tɩɛr a yɩ jũu, bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a lɛ yɩn lɔ̃ɔn sɩ dire a dɔɔyɛ, a lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ yɩn pʋɔ sɩ a sɩ 'maalfʋ pɔ.
N yɛɛr, saa bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ sɔɔl yɩ a wõm 'lɔ tɔ sʋɔ na dɔ̃ɔ pɔɔ sɩ be a Asɩya paal pɔ bar ɛ. Wõm jaa jel lɛ dɔ̃ɔ pɔɔ sɩ naa gar a sɩ kpɛ̃ɔ, saa lɛ dɔ̃ɔ tara baarfʋ tɩɛr ɛ.
Sɩrɛ jaa a sɩ tɩɛr pɔ, a kũu lɛ sɩ tɔ̃ɔ kaara a tɩ̃ɩɩ a lɛ nɛ. Tɩchɛ a nɩtɔ̃ ɩ naa ka sɩ ta dɩɛl a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ dɩɛl Nãaŋmɩn nyã na sɩ̃nɛ a kũn.
A Nãaŋmɩn lɛ faa sɩ yin a kũu tuo nyã pɔ, 'lɔ lɛ chɛnɛ faara sɩ. 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ a sɩ tɩɛrtɔ jie ɩka wʋn chɛnɛ na faara sɩ,
nɩtãa lɛ yɩn sʋ̃ʋ sɩ nɩ a yɩ Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ. Yɔɔ mɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan a sɩ jũu tu a wʋ maal vɩla 'lɔ wʋn maal sɩ na wʋ sɔɔ a yɩ yɔɔ sʋɔrfʋ.

Pʋ̃pãanyã a sɩ nyãa chɛfʋ jie lɛ a nyã. A sɩ tɩɛr din dãasɩɛ a lɛ sɩn be a wɛr dẽme sɛ̃, nɩ a lɛ a sɩn nɩ a yɩn mɩ na be taa, chɛchɛ ɩfʋ pɔ, nɩ nɛ nɛ tufʋ pɔ, ka a jaa yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃. A ba ɩ a wɛr nyã bɔ̃ɔfʋ lɛ sɩ maal a lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ lɛ.
Bojũu saa sɛb bon jaa kʋ yɩ yɩn kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kar ɛ, bɩɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ. N tɩɛr ɩka,
nɩtãa lɛ yɩn wõ a sɩ 'yɛr ŋmaa na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par, yɩn wa wõn a jaa na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par, na yɩn tʋ̃ɔ chɛ nyãa a sɩ jũu nɩtãa lɛ sɩn mɩ na chɛ nyãa a yɩ jũu a sɩ Soro Yesu bɩbir daar.
Bojũu ala lɛ so ka n bar tɩɛr, naa guor ɩka n tɩ piir yɩ kaa ka yɩ nyɛ tɔ̃nɔ̃ gbɛɛ ayi.
N guor ɩka maa wa chiine a Masedonɩya n yi a yɩ sɛ̃, maa wa lɩɛb waara ka n lɛ yi a yɩ sɛ̃ go, ka yɩ pãa sʋ̃ʋ ma ka n chen a Judiya.
Ɩn guor a anyã, n mɩ 'yɛr bar bɩɩ? Bɩɩ a wɛr nɩbɛ guorfʋ kaar lɛ? Ka a nɛbʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ma 'yɛr, ɔ̃ɔ, ɔ̃ɔ nɩ kai, kai?
Tɩchɛ sɩrɛ jaa a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ, a sɩ 'yɛr sɩn 'yɛr kʋ yɩ ba ɩ ɔ̃ɔ nɩ kai ɛ.
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn Bie Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr a maa nɩ a Silasɩ nɩ a Timoti na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ yɩ ba ɩ ɔ̃ɔ nɩ kai ɛ, tɩchɛ a wʋ pɔ, a ma ɩn ɔ̃ɔ.
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn nɛtɩryɔɔ ala wʋn tɩr ɩn ɔ̃ɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ. A tun a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a ma 'yɛrɛ ɩka, a ɩ a lɛ, kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn yuor tɩɩr.
Pʋ̃pãanyã a Nãaŋmɩn nyã lɛ maal sɩ nɩ a yɩn a sɩ ara kpɛ̃ɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, na wʋ oo sɩ.
Wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ naa a wʋ sofʋ jɩ̃nɛ, na wʋ de a wʋ Sɩɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ nyãa pɔ, wile sɩ a yele ala na waara.
N bʋɔl Nãaŋmɩn a wʋ ɩ a n dãasɩɛ sʋɔ ɩka a tara na sɔr ka n bar yɩ, naa ba lɩɛb wa be a Korɩntɩ ɛ,
n ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka a ɩ wõm kʋ yɩ ɛ. A ba ɩ sɩ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka sɩ fɩr yɩ a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩ 'mataa tʋ̃n yɩ a yɩ wõ nʋ̃ɔ, bojũu a yɩ sɔɔfʋ vɛ̃n ka yɩ ara kpɛ̃ɔ.
N tɩɛr ɩka n kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ wa piir yɩ kaa, ka a ɩ tuo kʋ yɩ ɛ.
Bojũu maa sɔ̃ɔ a yɩ pʋɔ an lɛ na maal ka n pʋɔ pɛl, ka a yɩn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ?
Ala lɛ so ka n dɔ̃ɔ sɛb a lɛ ɩka maa wa tɩ, n pʋɔ taa sɔ̃ɔn a bala na maal ma ka nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ma ɛ. N bar tɩɛr ɩka yɩ jaa na lɔ̃ɔn man chɩlɛ.
Bojũu n sɛb a anyã kʋ yɩ nɩ pʋsɔ̃ɔ nɩ hʋ̃ʋnfʋ nɩ a n nyãa nɩ nɩbikʋ̃ɔ yɔɔ ɩka n taa sɔ̃ɔ a yɩ pʋɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka n vɛ̃ ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka n nʋ̃ yɩn yɔɔ jaa.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ maal ka a chɛ, a ba ɩ maa tɛɛ pʋɔ lɛ wʋ sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, yɩ jaa pʋɔ mɩ sɔ̃ɔ naa ka a lɛ na tu lɛ ɩka n taa vɛ̃ ka a ɩ tuo 'yɔ̃ɔ jaa kʋ wʋ ɛ.
A toor tɔɔfʋ 'lɔ wʋn nyɛ yi a yɩ yɔɔ jaa jie sɛɛ wʋ naa.
Pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, a sɛɛ naa ɩka yɩ vɛ̃ kʋ wʋ, na yɩ lɛ 'maal wʋ ka a wʋ pʋsɔ̃ɔ taa chen niem ɛ.
A lɛ jũu n sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa ɩka yɩ de wʋ na yɩ wiil a yɩ nʋ̃fʋ kʋ wʋ.
A lɛ jũu ɩn sɛb kʋ yɩ lɛ ɩka n kaa, yɩn sɔɔn tu a nɛɛ a yele a jaa pɔ bɩɩ.
Ala ɩ yɩ wa vɛ̃n kʋ nɩrɛ, n mɩ vɛ̃n kʋ a nɩnyɩnɛ. A ala ɩn vɛ̃ kʋ a nɩnyɩnɛ, ala ɩ amɩne chɛn ka n na vɛ̃ bar, n vɛ̃n kʋ a nɩnyɩnɛ, a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto niem a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Lɛ an na ɩ ka a Satan taa ŋmɩɩn sɩ 'mataa ɛ, bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn a wʋ guorfʋsɩ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a lɛ ɩn chen a Toroyas tɩ mʋɔlɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ, n nyɛn lɛ a sɩ Soro na yuo sɔr kʋ ma,
n ba chɛnɛ tara ɩ̃gãn 'maar sɛrɛ ɛ, bojũu n ba nyɛ a n yɛbɛ Titusɩ a be ɛ. Lɛ lɛ n puor ba tɩ po chen a Masedonɩya.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn son puorfʋ wʋn ma tɔɔ sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃ɔfʋ pɔ yi a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, tu a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ ka a yɛ̃ nyũunʋ̃ɔ yaar de a jie wʋ jaa.
Bojũu sɩn lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nyũunʋ̃ɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ kʋ a bala na nyɛ faafʋ, nɩ a bala na wɛrɛ.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ nyuro na kũu nyũu, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ nyuro nyɛvʋr nyũu. Tɩ an lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ nyã tʋ̃?
Sɩn ba kaara bamɩne kaar ɛ, saa maal a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɔ̃nɔ̃ bon ɛ. A Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, sɩ 'yɛrɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ an ɩ 'lɔ lɛ tʋ̃ sɩ.
Sɩ piel naa ɩka sɩ dãn sɩ mɩ̃ɛ go bɩɩ? Bɩɩ sɩ bʋɔrɔ na gãma nɩbɛ na sɛb ka a dãna sɩ yi a sɩ sɛ̃ bɩɩ yi a yɩ sɛ̃?
Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ ɩ a sɩ gãn, na sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ nyãa pɔ ka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ yaa, ka nɩrɛ jaa mɩ kara.

Yɩn lɛ wiil ɩka yɩn lɛ ɩ a gãn na yi a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃, na yɩ ɩ a sɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ tɔ̃nɔ̃, a ba ɩ ba den a tɩ̃ɩ sɔɔlaa sɛb ɛ, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ lɛ sɛb. A ba ɩ a kʋsɩr pɛ̃rsɩ pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩsaal nyãn pɔ.
A tɩɛr nyãna sɩn bar ɩn a sɩ bon tu a Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, a Nãaŋmɩn niem.
A ba ɩ fɩka sɩ ɩn yɛ̃ dẽme na sɩn tʋ̃ɔ tɔɔr a lɛ sɩn maal 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩ yɛ̃ yin a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
'Lɔ lɛ sʋ̃ʋ sɩ a sɩ mʋɔl a nɛtɩr paalaa nyã 'yɛr, a ba yi a ala ban dɔ̃ɔ sɛb jie ɛ, tɩchɛ a yin a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛ̃. A sɛbie ala ɩn kũu, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ nyɛvʋr.

Pʋ̃pãanyã, ala ɩ a 'yɛr bie ala ban sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a kʋsɩr pɛ̃rsɩ pɔ waan nɩ kũu tɩ 'matãan Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr, ka a tɩɩr a Isɩral nɩbɛ na ba tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ kaara a Mosesɩ nie a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr jũu, a wʋ tɩɩr gba na wa baar.
A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛrbie tɩɩr kʋ̃ gar a lɛ ɛ?
Ala ɩ a 'yɛrbie ala na 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩbɛ 'yɛr tɩɩr bɛrma naa, a 'yɛr bie ala na waara nɩ a torfʋ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ wʋn jɩ̃!
Bojũu a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa ba lɛ tara tɩɩr a pʋ̃pãanyã ɛ, fʋ̃ʋ de man a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ, wʋ gar wʋ naa.
Ka ala ɩ a 'lɔ gba na wa baar waan na tɩɩr, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a tɩɩr 'lɔ na ba baaraa ɛ, na jɩ̃!
A lɛ jũu, a sɩ tɩɛrtɔ nyãna lɛ vɛ̃ ka saa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ,
Sɩn ba kaara fɩka a Mosesɩ na dɔ̃ɔ vil a fɔbaa pɔɔ a wʋ nie ka a Isɩral nɩbɛ ta kaa ɛ, na ba nyɛ a nyɩlfʋ 'lɔ na baar ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a ba nyãa pɔɔ naa wa tãn dɩna, a fɔpɔɔraa chɛnɛ naa bala wa kara a nɛtɩr koraa jie. Baa for bar sɛrɛ ɛ, bojũu Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ wʋn tʋ̃ɔ for.
A dɩna gba, bala wa kar a Mosesɩ nɛbinãa yele, a fɔbaa ma pɔɔn a ba nyãa.
Tɩchɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa lɩɛb wa a sɩ Soro sɛ̃, wʋ ma for wʋn a fɔbaa 'lɔ bar.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a sɩ Soro lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, ka a jie 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na be, mɩ̃ɛ sofʋ mɩ ben be.
Ka a sɩn bala nie na ba pɔɔ ɛ, pãa nyɩlɛ a sɩ Soro tɩɩr, naa lɩɛrɛ ka a tɩɩr pʋɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ na yire a sɩ Soro sɛ̃ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ.
A lɛ jũu, an ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal lɛ wʋ kʋn sɩ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ nyã sɩn tʋ̃nɔ̃, a lɛ jũu saa baala ɛ.

Tɩchɛ sɩ lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩ̃sɔɔ yele nɩ vɩ̃ yele, saa tara bɛlfʋ ɛ, bɩɩ lɩɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Sɩ ma man a Nãaŋmɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ ka a gã chãa pɔ, na sɩ wiil a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ ka nɩrɛ jaa tɩɛr bɔ̃ɔ ɩka yelmɩ̃ɛ dẽme lɛ sɩ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn niem.
Ala ɩ gba a sɩ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ sɩn 'yɛr sɔɔl naa, a sɔɔl kʋ a bala na wɛrɛ.
A ŋmɩn 'lɔ na be be a dɩna jɔ̃ɔn a bala na ba sɔɔ de a sɩ 'yɛr ɛ tɩɛrsɩ, ka ba kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ chãa na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tɩɩr ɛ, na wile a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ na be ɛ.
Bojũu a ba ɩ sɩ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr lɛ sɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ 'yɛrɛ naa a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Soro, a sɩn mɩ ɩ a yɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ a wʋ jũu.
A Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, "Vɛ̃ ka a chãa chaar libe pɔ," 'lɔ lɛ maal a chãa chaar 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ nyãn pɔ, na wʋ kʋ sɩ a bɔ̃ɔfʋ chãa, na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto niem.
Tɩchɛ sɩn kaara naa yɔɔraa dʋʋr kaar Nãaŋmɩn na de a bʋ̃sʋ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a kpɛ̃ɔ wʋ jaa yi Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, a ba yi a sɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.
Yele ma chɩm sɩ naa a lõbobo a jaa ayi, tɩchɛ a maa ŋmɛr sɩ ɛ, ka a ma ɩ sɩ vɩ̃re vɩ̃re, tɩchɛ a sɩ tɩɛr maa yɛ̃yɛl ɛ.
Ba ma ge sɩ naa, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn ma ben a sɩ sɛ̃, na ba ma ŋme sɩ gaal tẽe, tɩchɛ baa sɔ̃ɔ sɩ ɛ.
Bɩbir jaa lɛ sɩ wõnõ a Yesu kũu tuo a sɩ ɩ̃gãma pɔ, ka a nɩbɛ mɩ na tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ a Yesu nyɛvʋr a sɩ ɩ̃gãma pɔ.
Ka a sɩn banyã na vʋrɔ be kũu nũu pɔ, a Yesu jũu, ka a nɩbɛ tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ a wʋ nyɛvʋr a sɩ ɩ̃gãma anyã na kpi pɔ.
Ala lɛ so ka a kũu tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ sɩn, tɩchɛ ka a nyɛvʋr tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ yɩn.
A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "N sɔɔn de ala lɛ so ka n 'yɛr." A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nyã lɛ sɩ mɩ tara nɩ a sɔɔfʋ na sɩ mɩ 'yɛrɛ.
Bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a 'lɔ na sɩ̃ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto a kũu pɔ, mɩ na sɩ̃ɩ sɩ naa nɩ a Yesu 'matãan a yɩn a sɩ wa ara a wʋ niem.
A anyãna a jaa ɩrɛ naa a yɩ sʋ̃ʋfʋ jũu, ka a wɩ̃ɛfʋ 'lɔ na tara a nɩyɔɔ, na lɩɛb dãnfʋ kʋrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yuor tɩɩr.
Ala lɛ so ka saa baala ɛ. A sɩ ɩ̃gãn vaar gba na suoro, tɩchɛ a sɩ sɩɩr 'lɔ, bɩbir jaa lɛ a ma lɩɛrɛ bʋ̃paalaa.
Bojũu a wõm anyãna sɩn nyɛrɛ ɩn dẽfere naa waara nɩ a nyɛvʋr 'lɔ na ɩ tɩɩr gar a jaa wa kʋrɔ sɩ.
Lɛ lɛ, saa fur nɩbir 'yɔ̃ɔ a ala sɩn nyɛrɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ fur nɩbir 'yɔ̃ɔ a ala sɩn ba nyɛrɛ ɛ. A anyã sɩn nyɛrɛ, a kʋ̃ kor ɛ, tɩchɛ anyã sɩn ba nyɛrɛ ɛ, ala lɛ na kor.
Sɩrɛ jaa, sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a sɩ ɩ̃gãma anyãna kaara naa fɩka a tãn yie anyãna sɩn kpɩɛrɛ, ala wa kpi, sɩ tara na yir Nãaŋmɩn na mɛ, yir nyã na be a saaju an ba ɩ nɩrɛ nũu lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Sɩ ʋrɔ na bʋɔrɔ ɩka, a saaju yir 'lɔ pɔ, sɩ tɩ kpɛ a be.
Sɩn wa kpɛ a be, sɩ kʋ̃ lɛ ɩ sal'mʋɔr ɛ.
Bojũu a ɩ̃gãn tãn nyã pɔ sɩn be, sɩ ʋrɔ na ka a ɩ tuor kʋ sɩ, bojũu saa bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ ɩ sal'mʋɔr ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩ de a saaju jikpɩɛraa 'lɔ su pɔɔ, ka a 'lɔ na ɩ a bʋ̃kũu ka a nyɛvʋr vɔl wʋ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ maal sɩ a lɛ a yele nyãna 'yɔ̃ɔ, na wʋ kʋ sɩ a wʋ Sɩɛ, ka a ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ an na wa.
A lɛ jũu, sɩ ma bar tɩɛr, na sɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka sɩn chɛnɛ be a ɩ̃gãn pɔ, sɩ jãan naa a sɩ Soro.
A nyɛvʋr sɩn tara, sɔɔfʋ lɛ, a ba ɩ nyɛfʋ lɛ ɛ.
Sɩ bar tɩɛr, ka a mɩ ɩ sɩ bɔfʋ ɩka sɩ yi a ɩ̃gãn nyã pɔ, na sɩ chen tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a sɩ Soro yir.
Ala lɛ so ka sɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir pɛlɛ a wʋ pʋɔ, ka a ɩ̃gãn nyã pɔ lɛ sɩ be, bɩɩ ka sɩ yin a wʋ pɔ.
Bojũu a sɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na wa ara na Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ dakɔɔ par, ka wʋ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa lɛ wʋn de a wʋ ɩ̃gãn tʋ̃n, ka vɩla lɛ fʋ tʋ̃, bɩɩ dɛɛr lɛ.
A lɛ jũu, an yi a lɛ daar jaa sɩ bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ a sɩ Soro dãbɩ̃ɛ jofʋ na be, a sɩ pãa mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir ɩka sɩ lɩɛb a nɩbɛ tɩɛr. Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔn lɛ sɩn be, ka a yɩ tɩɛr gba mɩ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ sɩn be.
Saa bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ dãn a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ yɩ go ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩ kʋ yɩ sɔr ka yɩ chɛ nyãa a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, na yɩ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr a bala na ma chɩɛrɛ a nyãa nɩ a ala ban nyɛn nɩbir, tɩ bar a ala na be a nyãa pɔ.
Ala ɩ sɩ gele naa, Nãaŋmɩn jũu lɛ. Ala ɩ saa lɛ gele mɩ ɛ, a yɩ jũu lɛ.
Bojũu a Kɩrɩsɩto nʋ̃fʋ lɛ fɩrɛ sɩ, bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a nɩbʋ̃'yen lɛ kpi kʋ a nɩbɛ ba jaa, a lɛ jũu nɩrɛ jaa lɛ kpi.
'Lɔ lɛ kpi kʋ ba jaa, ka a bala na chɛnɛ a nɩbir, ba kʋ̃ lɛ be be kʋ a ba mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ ban ben be kʋ a 'lɔ na kpi kʋ ba na wʋ lɛ ir ɩ vʋr go.
An yi a dɩna chiine, saa lɛ kaara nɩrɛ a wɛr nɩbɛ kaafʋ kaar ɛ. Lɛ nɩ wʋ ju lɛ sɩ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ kaa a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto, saa lɛ chɛnɛ maala a lɛ go ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, ala ɩ nɩrɛ jaa wa ben a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, wʋ lɩɛb nɩpaalaa, a nɩkoraa chen naa, tɩchɛ ka wʋ lɩɛb nɩpaalaa.
A anyãna a jaa yin a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, 'lɔ lɛ 'maal sɩ kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, na wʋ pãa kʋ sɩ a 'maalfʋ 'yɛrbie.
Nãaŋmɩn 'maal a wɛr kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ. Waa lɛ sɔrɔ a nɩbɛ yeldɛbɛ ban maal ɛ. A 'maalfʋ 'yɛrbie anyã lɛ wʋ de tʋ̃n sɩ.
A lɛ jũu, sɩn lɛ ara kʋ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ka a wɛr pɔ, sɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tu sʋɔrɔ yɩ. Sɩ den a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor sʋɔrɔ nɩ yɩ ɩka, yɩ tɔɔ wa gbʋr a Nãaŋmɩn.
Nãaŋmɩn den a 'lɔ na ba maal dɛɛr jaa ɛ, ka wʋ lo a sɩ dɛɛr bɔɔr kʋ sɩ, ka a wʋ jũu a sɩ lɩɛb nɩtorsɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
An ɩ sɩn nɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ 'mataa tʋ̃nɔ̃, sɩ sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa ɩka yɩ ta kaa a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ pɔrɔ ɛ.

Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "A n maal vɩla sɔ̃ɔ, n wõn a fʋ 'yɛr, ka a faafʋ bɩbir daar, n sʋ̃ʋ fʋ naa." N 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, a pʋ̃pãanyã lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn maal vɩla sɔ̃ɔ, pʋ̃pãanyã lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn faafʋ bɩbir.
Saa ŋmaara nɩrɛ jaa sɔr ɛ, ka ba taa wa kpɛrɛ a sɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yele jaa pɔ, sɩ ma maal a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ wiil ɩka Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ lɛ sɩ ɩ. A anyãna lɛ a mɩ̃ɛ nyɔɔfʋ pɔ, wõm nɩ tuo nɩ nɩbaal yele pɔ,
ba ma ŋme sɩ naa nyɔɔr sɩ pɔɔ tɩ ma dam nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ, ka sɩ ma tʋ̃ tʋ̃kpɩ̃ɛn na sɩ gal gʋ̃ɔ tɩ jɛ̃n kɔ̃,
a sɩ chɛchɛ ɩfʋ nɩ a sɩ bɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ a sɩ kãnyir nɩ a sɩ maal vɩla, nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wʋn kʋ sɩ pɔ, nɩ a nʋ̃fʋ sɩn tara sɩrɛ jaa,
na sɩ ma 'yɛrɛ yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ, torfʋ ɩn a sɩ tãjɛbon na ma be a sɩ nũsʋ̃n nɩ a gʋʋr pɔ,
na ba ma kʋ sɩ tɩɩr tɩ lɛ kpɛ sɩ, na ba ma bʋɔl sɩ yovɩla nɩ a yodɛɛr. Sɩ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ dẽme tɩ ba maal sɩ nɩbɛlbɛ.
Sɩ ɩn nɩbɔ̃ɔnsɩ tɩchɛ a ba maal sɩ fɩka baa bɔ̃ɔ sɩ ɛ. Sɩ ma kpire naa tɩchɛ na sɩ ma chɛnɛ vʋrɔ. Ba ma ŋme sɩn nɛ nɛ nɛ tɩ baa kʋ ɛ.
Nɩbaal yele lɛ ba ma maal sɩ, tɩ sɩ chɛnɛ chɩlɛ. Nɔ̃ɔ ma kʋrɔ sɩ naa, tɩ sɩ maala nɩyɔɔ a ba lere. Saa tara bon jaa ɛ, tɩ so bomo a jaa.
Saa 'mʋr 'mʋr yele jaa bar a yɩn Korɩntɩ dẽme sɛ̃ ɛ. Sɩ yuon a sɩ nyãn kʋ yɩ.
Saa ɩ nɩbikuon dẽme kʋ yɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩn lɛ nɩɩ ɩ nɩbikuon dẽme kʋ sɩ.
A pãa kaara naa fɩka bʋʋr, naa 'yɛrɛ nɩ yɩ fɩka n bibiir. Yɩ yuo a yɩ nyãn mɩ.
Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa gbɛɛrɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Yesu turbo ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a yeltorsɩ nɩ a putuyele na ɩrɛ wa 'mataa? Bɩɩ ŋmɩnɛ lɛ chãa nɩ libe na ɩrɛ wa 'mataa be jibʋ̃'yen?
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩ a Satan na ɩrɛ wa tara guor taa? Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a nyã na ɩ a Yesu turo, nɩ a 'lɔ na ba ɩ a Yesu turo ɛ, na ɩrɛ mɩ wa tara man taa?

Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ fʋn ɩrɛ wa nyɛ tɩbɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir? Bojũu sɩn lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ba kpire ɛ, puorfʋ yir. Nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr, "Ɩn ben a ba sɛ̃ 'mataa chiine nɩ ba, naa ɩ a ba Nãaŋmɩn, ka ba mɩ ɩ a n nɩbɛ."
"Ala lɛ so ka a sɩ Soro 'yɛr, yɩ tɔɔ yi a ba pɔ, tɩ chɛ ba bar, na yɩ oo yɩ yõ. Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa sɩrɛ bʋ̃dɛɛr jaa ɛ, ɩn de yɩ naa."
"Ɩn ɩ naa a yɩ Sãa, ka a yɩn mɩ ɩ a n dabil nɩ a n pɔɔbil. Lɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ 'yɛr."
An ɩ sɩn lɛ be tara a nɛtɩraa nyãnaa jũu, n barmɩne, yɩ ɩ a sɩ pɔl sɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin yele jaa na sɔ̃ɔ a sɩ ɩ̃gãma nɩ a sɩ sɩɩr pɔ, na sɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir na sɩ ɩ chɛchɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn.
Yɩ yuo a yɩ nyãa kʋ sɩ. Saa maal a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa dɛɛr ɛ, saa fɔl a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa mɩ ɛ, saa mɩ ŋma a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɛ.
N ba 'yɛrɛ a anyãna ɩka n tʋ yɩ ɛ, n dɔ̃ɔ de nie 'yɛr kʋ yɩ ɩka yɩ ben a sɩ nyãa pɔ, ka ala ɩ nyɛvʋr lɛ, bɩɩ kũu lɛ tɩ sɩn nɩ yɩn lɛ.
N bar tɩɛr ka a 'yɔ̃ɔ ma ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ, a sɩ wõm a jaa pɔ, tɩ nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ma tɩ põn bar.
Bojũu sɩn ben wa ta a Masedonɩya, a sɩ ɩ̃gãma anyãna ba tara pɛ̃nfʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ tuor dɔɔyɛ ka jɛɛr ma be a yõo ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ mɩ ma nyɔɔ sɩ.
Tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ma 'maala a nɩtɔr barsɩ, wʋ 'maal sɩ naa a lɛ a Titusɩ na wa wa a sɩ sɛ̃.
A ba ɩ a wʋ waa tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a lɛ yɩn 'maal wʋ. Wʋ mɩ man kʋ sɩ a lɛ an dɔ̃ɔ kpɛ yɩ ka yɩ pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ, nɩ lɛ mɩ yɩn tara a n tɩɛr, ala lɛ so ka nʋ̃ɔ pãa kpɛ ma tɩ põn bar.
Ala ɩ a gãn ɩn sɛb kʋ yɩ, sɔ̃ɔn yɩ pʋɔ gba, tɩ maa pʋɔ ba sɔ̃ɔ ɛ. A sɔ̃ɔn n pʋɔ 'lɔ ɩn wa nyɛ ɩka a gãn ɩn sɛb kʋ yɩ sɔ̃ɔn a yɩ pʋɔ bɩ̃lãa.
Pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ, n pʋɔ pɛl naa, a ba ɩ a yɩ pʋɔ na sɔ̃ɔ jũu ɛ, tɩchɛ a yɩ pʋsɔ̃ɔ na vɛ̃ ka yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr. Bojũu a yɩ pʋsɔ̃ɔ ɩn a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ, ala lɛ so ka yelbier ba pɔɔ yɩ tu a sɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn pɔ pʋsɔ̃ɔ ma waan na tɩɛr lɩɛbfʋ chiine faafʋ jie, a ba ɩ waalfʋ ɛ. Tɩchɛ a wɛr pɔ pʋsɔ̃ɔ ma waan na kũu.

Yɩ nyɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pɔ pʋsɔ̃ɔ na waan a yɩ sɛ̃. Nyɛ lɛ yɩn ɩ nɩbijɩɛ, na yɩ ma 'yɛr wiil a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ, nyɛ lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ dɔɔl yɩ, ka a dãbɩ̃ chɛlma ŋme, nyɛ lɛ yɩn bʋɔrɔ taa, nyɛ lɛ yɩn tara taa tɩɛr, na yɩ chɔɔr gu ɩka yeltorsɩ a ɩ. Sɔr jaa pɔ, yɩ wiil yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɩka yaa tara chɛfʋ ɛ.
N gba na sɛb a nɩtɔ̃ kʋ yɩ, a ba ɩ a 'lɔ na maal a dɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ bɩɩ a bala na pʋɔ wʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn niem yɩn mɩ̃ɛ yɩ kaa nyɛ lɛ sɩn ma ɩrɛ yɩ a vɔlaa.
A anyãna a jaa lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn, naa pʋɔ a sɩn mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn sɩn dɔ̃ɔ tara. A nʋ̃mɔ̃ sɩ naa a lɛ sɩn wa nyɛ a Titusɩ ka wʋ pʋɔ pɛl, bojũu yɩ jaa lɛ sʋ̃ʋ wʋ ka a wʋ nyãa 'maa.
N dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a yɩ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, ka yaa mɩ su ma vɩ̃ ɛ. Tɩchɛ a lɛ jaa sɩn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a yɩ 'yɛr mɩ ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ. Ka a lɛ sɩn dɔ̃ɔ dãn yɩ kʋ a Titusɩ a wʋ tɩ nyɛ ka a ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ.
Ka a wʋ bɔfʋ wʋn bʋɔrɔ yɩ pãa pʋɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, 'lɔ wa tɩɛr a lɛ yɩn wõnõ a wʋ toor na yɩ de wʋ nuur ayi nɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ nɩ mĩifʋ.
Nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ma naa ka n pãa bar tɩɛr a yɩ jũu.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, n yɛɛr, sɩ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a wɩ̃ɛfʋ nyã a Nãaŋmɩn na wɩ̃ɛ a Masedonɩya pupuorbiir gbulsɩ.
A bɛɛr kaa tuo na nyɔɔ ba, ka ba ɩ nɔ̃n dẽme, tɩ a chɛnɛ na nʋ̃mɔ̃ ba, ka a nɔ̃ɔ kʋrɔ ba, a ba kʋ tɩ põn bar.
Bojũu maa mɩ̃ɛ din dãasɩɛ ɩka ba kʋn a lɛ ban na tʋ̃ɔ, ba gba kʋn tɩ põn bar. Bala mɩ̃ɛ wʋɔ pɔ lɛ a yi.
Ba sʋɔr sɩn yãayãabɩlɛ ɩka, sɩ de a kʋfʋ anyãna tɩ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ka ɩ ba mɩ nyɛn sɔr pʋɔ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ.
Baa maal a lɛ a sɩn mɩ̃ɛ na dɔ̃ɔ tɩɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ ba den nie de a ba mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a sɩ Soro nɩ a sɩn lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ.
Ala lɛ so a sɩ sʋɔr a Titusɩ an ɩ 'lɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ piel, wʋ baar baar a wɩ̃ɛfʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ nyã a yɩ jie.
Tɩchɛ nɩtãa lɛ yɩn ma maal yele jaa tɩ põn bar, a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ, a yɩ 'yɛr pɔ, nɩ a yɩ bɔ̃ɔfʋ pɔ, nɩ a yɩ nɩbijɩɛ pɔ, nɩ a lɛ yɩn nʋ̃ sɩ, yɩ kaa na yɩ mɩ kʋ tɩ põn bar a wɩ̃ɛfʋ nyã pɔ.
N ba fɩrɛ yɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n bɛɛr a yɩ nʋ̃fʋ kaa naa mɩ de man a bamɩne mɩ maal vɩla yele kaa.
Bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa a lɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ na be. Wʋ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ taraa sʋɔ, tɩchɛ a yɩ jũu, wʋ wa lɩɛb nɔ̃ɔ sʋɔ, ka yɩn tu a wʋ nɔ̃ɔ pɔ, mɩ lɩɛb taraa dẽme.
A lɛ ɩn tara na 'yɛr a yele nyãna pɔ nɩ nyã, dɩyɛ̃, yɩn lɛ ɩ nɩbɛ na de nie na ba ɩ a kʋfʋ tɛɛ pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a ɩrɛ yɩ vɔlaa ɩka, yɩ ɩ a lɛ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã yɩ baar tʋ̃, ka a lɛ na ɩ a yɩ bɔfʋ ɩka, yɩ maal ka a tu taa a yɩ tɩ baar jɩ̃ a lɛ yɩn tara.
Bojũu ala ɩ a kʋfʋ vɔlaa ben be, Nãaŋmɩn ma sɔɔn de bon jaa wʋn tara, a ba ɩ a bon 'lɔ wʋn ba tara ɛ.
A sɩ bɔfʋ ba lɛ ɩka bamɩne ba pɛ̃nɛ, tɩchɛ ka a bamɩne 'lɔ bala ɛ, tɩchɛ jɩ̃taa a be be.
Ka a dɩna a yɩ bʋ̃yɔɔ na sʋ̃ʋ ba a lɛ ban bʋɔrɔ, ka a lɛ mɩ a ba bʋ̃yɔɔ mɩ na lɩɛb sʋ̃ʋ yɩ, ka a jɩ̃taa pãa be be.
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "A 'lɔ sʋɔ na wob yɔɔ, wʋ maa tara yɔɔ ɛ, ka a 'lɔ mɩ na wob bɩ̃lãa maa tara bɩ̃lãa ɛ."
N puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, 'lɔ lɛ de a tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩn tara kʋ yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Titusɩ tɩɛr mɩ pɔ.
Bojũu a Titusɩ ba sɔɔ de a lɛ sɩn 'yɛr tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ kaa ir ŋme nyãa waara a yɩ sɛ̃.
Sɩ mɩ tʋ̃n a yɛbɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ ka wʋn pʋɔ ka ba 'mataa tɩ, 'lɔ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ba jaa na dãna wʋ, a wʋ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr 'yɛrfʋ pɔ.
