Ala lɛ so ka a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ir wʋ ɩka wʋ pʋɔ sɩ, a sɩ 'mataa tuo a kʋfʋ anyãna chiin, na sɩn tʋ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔn a sɩ Soro mɩ̃ɛ na sɩ mɩ wiil a lɛ sɩn bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ sʋ̃ʋ.
Saa bʋɔrɔ hũhũfʋ nɩ a kʋfʋsɩ anyãna yele ɛ.
Sɩ sɔɔ naa ɩka sɩ maal a lɛ na tor, a ba ɩ a lɛ na tor a sɩ Soro niem tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a lɛ mɩ na tor a nɩbɛ niem.
Sɩ mɩ lɛ sʋɔr a sɩ yɛbɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ sɩn jʋʋr kaa a wʋ tara yelmɩ̃ɛ, sɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ naa ka ban 'mataa tɩ, wʋ mɩ gba bar tɩɛr a yɩ jũu.
A Titusɩ 'lɔ, n tʋ̃tʋ̃tɔ sʋɔ lɛ, ka sɩ 'mataa tʋ̃nɔ̃ a yɩ pɔ. Tɩchɛ a sɩ yɛɛr banyã 'lɔ, a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ lɛ ir ba tʋ̃nɔ̃ ka a ɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
A lɛ jũu yɩ maal a yɩ nʋ̃fʋ wiil ba, nɩ a lɛ jũu sɩn ma chɩɛrɛ nyãa a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ na be jie jaa ka ba nyɛ.
A ba lɛ sɛɛ ɩka n lɛ sɛb gãn kʋ yɩ a lɛ sɩn na sʋ̃ʋ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo go ɛ.
Bojũu n bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ yɩn bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ sʋ̃ʋ, n pɛɛ yɩ naa na n kʋ a Masedonɩya dẽme, naa 'yɛr kʋ ba ɩka, dɩyɛ̃ jaa lɛ be a Akaya yɩ chɔɔr ɩka yɩ kʋ, ka a yɩ vɔlaa dam nɩbɛ yɔɔ jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba mɩn ɩ.
Tɩchɛ n tʋ̃nɔ̃ naa a yɛɛr ba nyãna ka a lɛ sɩn chɩɛrɛ a nyãa a yɩ jũu, taa lɩɛb 'yɛr pɔrɔ ɛ. Tɩchɛ ka a ɩ yɩ chɔɔr baar nɩtãa lɛ ɩn 'yɛr ɩka yɩ ɩ naa.
Bojũu ala be ɩ a Masedonɩya nɩrɛ ben pɔɔ ba tɩ, na wʋ tɩ nyɛ a yaa chɔɔr ɛ, sɩn be lɛ 'yɛr a yɩ 'yɛr, an ɩn vɩ̃ a lɛ sɩn ma bar tɩɛr a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A lɛ n nyɛn an tara sɔr ka n sʋɔr a yɛɛr ka ba dɔ̃ɔ nie tɩ piir yɩ kaa, na ba mɩ kaa a yɩ chɔɔr baar a yɩ pʋtɩɛr kʋfʋ yɩn tɩr a nɛɛ. Ka a pãa ɩ pʋpɛl kʋfʋ naa ta ɩ fɩrfʋ kʋfʋ ɛ.
Yɩ tɩɛr a anyã ɩka, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba 'yɔ̃ɔ bʋ̃bʋrɔ yɔɔ a bɔɔ pɔ ɛ, wʋ maa chɛ yɔɔ ɛ. Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bʋr yɔɔ, wʋ mɩ na chɛn yɔɔ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa mɩ na bʋr vɩla kʋfʋ, a vɩla kʋfʋ mɩ lɛ wʋn wa chɛ.
Nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ ma kʋ lɛ a wʋ nyãa na tɩɛr ka a ta wa ɩ pʋsɔ̃ɔ, bɩɩ ŋmʋrfʋ ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃n nɩrɛ na kʋrɔ nɩ pʋpɛl.
Nãaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ɔn vɛ̃ ka a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ ɩ yɔɔ kʋ yɩ, ka a lɛ a yele a jaa pɔ, nɩ sɔ̃ɔ jaa ka yɩ ma nyɛrɛ a ala jaa yɩn bʋɔrɔ na yɩ ma tʋ̃n tʋ̃sʋ̃n jaa tɩ põn bar.
Nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Wʋ ma yaar a jiir a jaa kʋ a nɔ̃n dẽme, ka a wʋ torfʋ ba tara baarfʋ ɛ."
A 'lɔ na ma kʋ a kʋɔraa a bʋ̃bʋrɔ na wʋ ma vɛ̃ ka a bʋ̃diir waa, wʋn kʋ yɩ naa na wʋ vɛ̃ ka a bʋ̃bie binfʋ jie waa, na wʋ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ torfʋ ŋmafʋ bɛrmɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn na maal yɩ naa ka yɩ ɩ taraa dẽme ka yɩ ma kʋrɔ nɩ pʋpɛl sɔ̃ɔ jaa, naa tu a sɩ sɛ̃ ka a yɩ pʋpɛl kʋfʋ lɩɛb vɛ̃ ka nɩbɛ puoro Nãaŋmɩn yãan.
A yɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ nyã yɩn tʋ̃ a ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ an wõnõ tɛɛ lɛ a sʋ̃ʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yaar ta nɩrɛ jaa, ka ba puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan.
A tʋ̃mɔ̃ nyã yɩn tʋ̃ jũu wiil a lɛ a yɩn mɩ̃ɛ na be, nɩbɛ pɛɛn Nãaŋmɩn, bojũu a yɩ nɛɛ tufʋ 'mantãan a lɛ yɩn sɔɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ, nɩ a yɩ pʋpɛl kʋfʋ 'lɔ yɩn lɔ̃ɔ põn ba nɩ nɩrɛ jaa.
Ka a ba Nãaŋmɩn ban ma sʋɔrɔ kʋrɔ yɩ, a ba tɩɛr wʋ jaa ma ben a yɩ sɛ̃, bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ bɛrmɛ naa na be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Nãaŋmɩn son puorfʋ nɩ sɩn kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ man a wʋ kʋfʋ wʋn kʋ sɩ ɛ.
Maa Pɔɔl den a Kɩrɩsɩto hɛ lɛ lɛ lɛ nɩ a wʋ 'maar ɩfʋ lɔb nũu kʋ yɩ. N maa 'lara ɛ, maa wa tuor yɩ nɩ gberaa tɩ maa mɩ baa be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ, n ba ɩ lɛ ɛ.
N sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa ɩka maa wa wa, n taa wa ɩ a ba ɩ lɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a nɩbɛ bamɩne jie ɛ, ba tɩɛr man taa a wɛr nɩbɛ kaar lɛ sɩ be.
Bojũu sɩn nɩ a wɛr nɩbɛ lɛ 'mataa kpɩɛrɛ tɩ saa ŋmaara jɛɛr a ba kaar ɛ.
A sɩ tãjɛ bomo ba ɩ a wɛr nyã tãjɛbomo ɛ, a sɩ tãjɛbomo tara na Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ sɩn ma de wɛl a gãdaar jiir bar.
Sɩ ma sɔ̃ɔn a ba nɛchɩrɛ nɩ tɩɛr dɛɛr 'lɔ jaa ban ma de vara nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔfʋ bara, na sɩ ma 'yɛr nyɔɔr nɩbɛ tɩɛrsɩ ka ba lɩɛb wõnõ a Kɩrɩsɩto toor.
Sɩ mɩ chɔɔr naa ɩka sɩ kpãa a bawõnsɩ, yɩn wa ba gbɛr baar.
Yɩn kaara a anyã tɛɛ yɩn nyɛn nɩbir. Ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ bar tɩɛr ɩka wʋ ɩn a Kɩrɩsɩto tʋɔr, wʋ mɩ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ tɩɛr kaa ɩka a sɩn mɩ ɩn a Kɩrɩsɩto tʋɔr a wʋ kaar.
Bojũu maa gba sɔɔ chɩɛrɛ nyãa nɩ a lɛ, a sɩ Soro ba kʋ sɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ ɩka sɩ wɛl yɩ bar ɛ, tɩ sɩ guol yɩ. Vɩ̃ ba kʋrɔ ma nɩ a yele nyã ɛ.
N ba bʋɔrɔ fɩka a n gãma a kʋrɔ yɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Bojũu bamɩne 'yɛr ɩka, "A Pɔɔl gãma 'yɛrbie tɩrɛ naa, naa ɩ 'yɛrbikpɩ̃ɛn, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ mɩ̃ɛ wa be a sɩ sɛ̃, wʋ ma bal naa ka a wʋ 'yɛr mɩ maa ɩ bon ɛ."
A nɩbɛ bala, yɩ vɛ̃ a ba bɔ̃ɔn ɩka, a lɛ a sɩ 'yɛrbie na kaara a gãma pɔ, sɩn ba be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ. Lɛ lɛ a sɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ na kaara sɩn wa be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Sɩn ba 'lara diere a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ mana nɩ a bamɩne na ma pɛɛrɛ a ba mɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Ba ma den a ba mɩ̃ɛ na ba man a ba mɩ̃ɛ, baa tara yɛ̃ ɛ.
Sɩn 'lɔ, sɩ kʋ̃ sɔɔ dãn a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ a lɛ tɩ põn bar ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩn nyɔ̃ɔn sɩ mɩ̃ɛ jɩ̃ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr ɩka sɩ tʋ̃, ka sɩ gba na tʋ̃ tãn a yɩ sɛ̃.
Sɩ kʋ̃ dãn a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ chiin tɛɛr ɛ, ka a na kaara fɩka saa wa a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ, bojũu sɩ tãn naa a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Bɩɩ dãn sɩ mɩ̃ɛ tɩ põn a tʋ̃mɔ̃ a nɩbɛ bamɩne na tʋ̃ ɛ. Sɩn tɩɛr lɛ ɩka, a yɩ sɔɔfʋ na ben nʋ̃ɔnɔ̃, a sɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ mɩ na yal 'yɔ̃ɔ
ka sɩ pãa tʋ̃ɔ mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ be a paalsɩ ala na be a yɩ niem. Bojũu saa dãna a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ paal pɔ, ban tʋ̃ baar ɛ.
Tɩchɛ, nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Vɛ̃ ka a 'lɔ na dãna a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, wʋ de a sɩ Soro dãna nɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ."
Bojũu a ba ɩ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na pɛɛ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ lɛ ɩ a nɩsʋ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ a sɩ Soro na pɛɛ lɛ.
N tɩɛr ɩka yɩn tara nɩ ma naa a n dãbol yele pɔ bɩ̃lãa, tɩchɛ yɩ gba den nie ɩ a lɛ.
N tara na nɩ yɩn nyuur a wʋ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn nyuur. N tɩr nɛɛ kʋ yɩ ɩka yɩ kul dabʋ̃'yen, na ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto, ka n na de yɩ fɩka pɔɔsarbile na ba ta daba ɛ, na n kʋ wʋ.
Tɩchɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ kʋrɔ ma naa, nɩtãa lɛ a waa na dɔ̃ɔ de a wʋ yɛ̃ yele bɛl a Hawa, wʋ taa mɩ wa lɩɛb a yɩ nyãa yin a yelmɩ̃ɛ yɩn tara turo nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto dẽ dẽ dẽ pɔ ɛ.

Bojũu ala ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ wan wa mʋɔl 'yɛr Yesu yuo 'yɛr kʋ yɩ, bɩɩ ka yɩ nyɛ a sɩyuo na ba ɩ a 'lɔ sɩn mʋɔl na ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'lɔ yɩn nyɛ ɛ, bɩɩ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ yuo na ba ɩ a 'lɔ yɩn sɔɔ ɛ, yɩ ma sɔɔn jaa kayaan.
Tɩchɛ n ba tɩɛr ɩka n ɩn pʋʋr a nɩtʋ̃n kpɩ̃ɛn bala jie ɛ.
Amɩne sɛ̃ n ba jãn a 'yɛr 'yɛrfʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ n tara na bɔ̃ɔfʋ. Sɩ ma vɛ̃n ka a anyã chaar kʋ yɩ yele jaa pɔ.
N maal dɛɛr a lɛ ɩn siir a n mɩ̃ɛ naa mʋɔl a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã kʋ yɩ a pɔrɔ bɩɩ?
N faan a pupuorbiir bamɩne ban dɔ̃ɔ sʋ̃ʋ ma ka n tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃ a yɩ jie.

Ka a lɛ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ be a yɩ sɛ̃, n bʋɔrɔ na bon, tɩ n ba ɩ tuor kʋ yɩ ɛ, bojũu a yɛɛr bala na dɔ̃ɔ yi a Masedonɩya wa ba kʋ man bon jaa ɩn bʋɔrɔ. N ba vɛ̃ ka n yele ɩ tuor kʋ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɛ, n kʋ̃ wa vɛ̃ ka a n yele dɔɔl yɩ jaa ɛ.
A lɛ a Yesu yelmɩ̃ɛ na faa be a n sɛ̃ baar, nɩrɛ jaa ba be a be a Akaya paal pɔ, na ŋmaa ma sɔr nɩ a n nyãa chɛfʋ nyã pɔ ɛ.
Baa 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ n tʋ̃nɔ̃ a lɛ? Bojũu n ba nʋ̃ yɩ bɩɩ? Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩn nʋ̃ yɩ.
Ɩn chɛnɛ na maala a lɛ ɩn ben maala naa tʋ̃ɔ ŋmaa a yobʋɔrbɔ sɔr, bala na bʋɔrɔ sɔr ɩka ba de a ba mɩ̃ɛ mana nɩ sɩ.
Bojũu a nɩbɛ ba nyãna ɩn jir ŋmarba nɩtʋ̃nsɩ na ba ɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ na bɛlɛ nɩbɛ, na ba maal a ba mɩ̃ɛ nɩtãa a Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nsɩ.
A ba ɩ nɛ'maa yele ɛ, bojũu a Satan mɩ̃ɛ mɩ na tʋ̃ɔn maal a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ fɩka, a chãa malaka.
A mɩ kʋ̃ ɩ nɛ'maa yele ɛ, ala ɩ a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ pãa maal a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a tʋ̃tʋ̃ toraa kaar ɛ. A ba baarfʋ daar, ban nyɛn a ba sãyar lɛ ban tʋ̃.
Ɩn lɛ maal 'yɛr go. Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa bʋɔl ma jɔl ɛ. Tɩchɛ ala ɩ yɩ gba wa bʋɔl man jɔl, yɩ chɛnɛ sɔɔ de ma fɩka lɛ yɩn na de a jɔl ka a n mɩ tʋ̃ɔ bɔ yuor bɩ̃lãa.
N bar tɩɛr nɩ a n yobɔyele nyã pɔ, n ba 'yɛrɛ fɩka nɩtãa lɛ a sɩ Soro na ma 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩtãa lɛ jɔl na ma 'yɛrɛ.
Yɔɔ jie jaa lɛ bʋɔrɔ yuor a wɛr nyã pɔ, n mɩn bɔn a yuor.
Yɩ ma sɔɔn de jɔl vɩla jaa, yɩn ɩ yɛ̃ dẽme jũu.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ, yɩ gba ma den nɩrɛ na maal yɩ gbãgbaa bɩɩ na yɩ ɩ tɔ̃nɔ̃ ka wʋ dire, bɩɩ dara ba mɩ̃ɛ yire nɩ a yɩ niem bɩɩ ma 'mara yɩ a tʋkpala pɔrɔ jaa.
Vɩ̃ kʋrɔ ma naa ka n 'yɛr ɩka sɩn bal naa nɩ a yele nyã. A ala a nɩbɛ bamɩne na ma de bʋɔrɔ nɩ yuor, maa 'lɔ ma 'yɛr naa jɔl kaar, n mɩ na pãa 'lan bɔ yuor.
Baa ɩ Heburu nɩbɛ ɛ? Lɛ lɛ n mɩ ɩ a ɩ̃sʋɔ. Baa ɩ Isɩral nɩbɛ ɛ? N mɩ ɩn a Isɩral nɩrɛ. A ba ɩ Abraham bal nɩbɛ lɛ ba ɩ ɛ? Lɛ lɛ n mɩ ɩ a ɩ̃sʋɔ.

Baa ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ ɛ? N sʋrɔ naa anyãna fɩka nɩrɛ na ba tara tɩɛr ɛ. N ɩn a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ gar ba. Naa tʋ̃ tʋ̃kpɩ̃ɛn gar ba jaa. Ka ba ma pɔɔrɔ ma die pɔ jaa tɔ̃tɔ̃. Ba ma ŋme man kpɛ̃ɛ gar ba. N ma nyuro na kũu bɩbir jaa.
Gbɛɛ anũu jaa lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ fɔb ma nɩ a ba kpaara nɛɛr lɩjaayi for bir (39).
Gbɛɛ ata jaa lɛ ba pɔb ma nɩ dakʋrsɩ, na ba lɔb ma nɩ kɔsɩbɛ gbɛbʋ̃'yen. Gbɛɛ ata mɩ lɛ a gbor kpɛ̃ɛ ŋmɛr wɛl sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ be a man kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ. Tɩ̃sɔɔ gbul nɩ a mɔ̃tɔ̃gbul jaa lɛ n ma be a man kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ.

Ɩn ba gala a yɔfʋ ɛ, n bɔ̃ɔn lɛ a põn kʋ̃ɔ dɔɔyɛ na be, naa tuor nãnyisɩ, ka a maa mɩ̃ɛ paal nɩbɛ ge ma, ka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ ge ma. N din dɔɔyɛ a tẽe pɔ. Naa di dɔɔyɛ a mʋ̃ɔ pɔ. Naa di dɔɔyɛ a man pɔ. Naa di dɔɔyɛ a yɛɛr bala na ŋmara a jirsɩ sɛ̃.
Tʋ̃kpɩ̃ɛn nɩ wõm pɔ, naa ma gal gʋ̃ɔ. N bɔ̃ɔn kɔ̃ nɩ kɔ̃nyũur naa ma gãna kɔ̃ tɔ̃tɔ̃. Ka ɔɔr ma kpɛ ma ka n ɩ sal'mʋɔr.
A anyã a jaa puor, bɩbir jaa lɛ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ba jaa yele ma ɩ ma tɩɛr.
An lɛ bal, ka n mɩ ba bal ɛ? A bala na faa maal yelbier, a ba lɩɛb bũu dire ma bɩɩ?
Ala ɩ n mɩn bɔn yuor, ɩn bɔn yuor nɩ a yelsɩ ala na maal ma ka n bal.
Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Sãa, 'lɔ lɛ a pɛɛfʋ wʋ ta bɩbir jaa, bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka n ba ŋmara jirsɩ ɛ.
A be a Damaskus tẽe pɔ, a nãa 'lɔ na turo a nãkpɛ̃ɛ Aretas, wʋ vɛ̃ naa ka ba gu a Damaskus tẽe wʋ jaa ɩka ba nyɔɔ ma.
Ka ba 'mɔɔ ma 'yɔ̃ɔ pɩɛ pɔ tur bar tokoro pɔ ka n fʋɔl yi a wʋ nuur pɔ.
N kʋ̃ wa bar a yobɔyele nyã jaa ɛ, ala ɩ n gba kʋ̃ nyɛ tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ. A nyɛfʋsɩ nɩ a yelwiilsɩ ala ɩn nyɛrɛ yire naa a sɩ Soro sɛ̃.

N bɔ̃ɔn nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ na sɔɔ Kɩrɩsɩto a wʋ yuom pie nɩ anaar (14) lɛ a dɩna, Nãaŋmɩn 'mɔɔ wʋn don be a saaju 'lɔ na tu a ata sʋɔ pɔ. Ka wʋ chɛnɛ na tara ɩ̃gãn bɩɩ waa lɛ tara ɩ̃gãn ɛ, n ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ.
N bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a daba nyãna ɩn ben 'yɛrɛ, ka wʋ ben ɩ̃gãn pɔ, bɩɩ waa be ɩ̃gãn pɔ ɛ, n ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔ naa.
Nãaŋmɩn 'mɔɔ wʋn don be a wʋ tẽe. Be lɛ wʋ wõnõ yelsɩ wʋn kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ man nɛɛ ɛ, yelsɩ nɩrɛ na ba tara sɔr ɩka wʋ man ɛ.
A nɩrɛ nyãna tɔ sʋɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ n bʋɔrɔ a yuor, n kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ bɔ a n mɩ̃ɛ yuor ɛ, ka maa balfʋsɩ tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Maa ɩka ɩn bɔn yuor gba, n kʋ̃ ɩ jɔl ɛ, bojũu yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ ɩn 'yɛrɛ. Tɩchɛ n bar a lɛ, ka nɩrɛ taa tɩɛrɛ a n yele gar a ala ɩn maala bɩɩ a ala ɩn ma 'yɛrɛ ɛ.
Lɛ an na ɩ ka n pɔɔ a n mɩ̃ɛ 'mɔɔfʋ sɔr, a yelwiilbɛrɛ anyã jũu, ka a pãa kaara fɩka gʋɔ na chɔɔrɔ ma a ɩ̃gãn pɔ, ka a kaara a Satan 'yɛ'yɛrɛ kaar, ka a ge ma.
Gbɛɛ ata jaa lɛ n sʋɔr a n Soro ɩka wʋ vʋ̃ɔ a gʋɔ nyã bar ma.
Tɩchɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ma, "A n wɩ̃ɛfʋ sɛɛ fʋ naa, bojũu a n kpɛ̃ɔ ma sɛɛn kʋ a nɩrɛ na bɔ̃ɔn ɩka wʋ bal naa." A lɛ jũu, ɩn bɔn yuor gar bon jaa a n balfʋsɩ pɔ, ka a Kɩrɩsɩto kpɛ̃ɔ pãa pɔɔ ma.
Ala lɛ so a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu, n pʋɔ pɛl naa, a n balfʋsɩ pɔ, tʋbie pɔ, tuo pɔ, gefʋ pɔ, nɩ wõmsɩ a jaa pɔ. Bojũu maa wa bal, lɛ lɛ n pãa ma kpɛ̃mɛ.
N maal n mɩ̃ɛ jɔl, tɩchɛ a yɩn yele lɛ tɩɛ ma 'yɔ̃ɔ. Yɩ gba sɛɛn nɩ naa bʋɔlɔ ma yovɩla, bojũu n ba ɩ pʋʋr a nɩtʋ̃n kpɩ̃ɛn bala sɛ̃ ɛ, ala ɩ n gba ba ɩ bon jaa ɛ.
A yelsɩ ala na ma ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ jɩ̃nɛ lɛ jɩ̃nsɩ, tʋ̃fɛrsɩ nɩ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃. A anyãna lɛ n mɩ dɔ̃ɔ tara kãnyir tʋ̃n a yɩ sɛ̃.
Pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ba boo lɛ dɔ̃ɔ gar yɩ, ka a ba ɩ ɩn ba dɔ̃ɔ ɩ tuor kʋ yɩ lɛ ɛ? Yɩ vɛ̃ a n dɛɛr nyã kʋ ma.

Pʋ̃pãanyã, n chɔɔr baar ɩka n tɩ piir yɩ kaa, a gbɛɛ ata sʋɔ lɛ a nyã, n kʋ̃ tɩ ɩ tuor kʋ yɩ ɛ. Bojũu a ba ɩ a yɩ bʋ̃tarsɩ lɛ n bʋɔrɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ n bʋɔrɔ. Fʋ̃ʋ kaa bibiir maa bɔ gun a ba sãamɩne ɛ, tɩchɛ sãamɩne lɛ ma bɔ gun a ba bibiir.
A lɛ n pʋɔ na pɛl naa ka n sɔ̃ɔ bon jaa ɩn tara a yɩ nyɛvʋr jũu, 'matãan a maa mɩ̃ɛ wʋ jaa. Ala ɩ n nʋ̃ yɩn yɔɔ jaa, yɩn 'lɔ na nʋ̃ man bɩ̃lãa bɩɩ?
A lɛ an be, lɛ a chɛnɛ be, n ba dɔ̃ɔ ɩ tuor kʋ yɩ jaa ɛ. Tɩchɛ ɩn ɩ yɛ̃ sʋɔ jũu, n den a yɛ̃ yele nyɔɔn yɩ.
N den a yɩ bʋ̃kɔ̃ɔ tu a nɩbɛ bala ɩn dɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃ a ba wa a yɩ sɛ̃ bɩɩ?
N sʋɔr Titusɩ ɩka wʋ tɩ a yɩ sɛ̃, naa 'mataa tʋ̃n a sɩ yɛbɛ ɩka ba 'mataa tɩ. Titusɩ den a yɩ bon kɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ? A ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩbʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ sɩ jaa tara na sɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a tʋ̃bʋ̃'yen ɛ?
Yɩ tɩɛr man tãa sɩ 'yɛrɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ a yɩ sɛ̃ bɩɩ? Nãaŋmɩn niem lɛ sɩ 'yɛrɛ na sɩ be a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, bon jaa sɩn maala, sɩ barmɩne a yɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ jũu lɛ.

Bojũu dãbɩ̃ɛ kʋrɔ ma naa ɩka maa wa tɩ, n kʋ̃ tɩ nyɛ a yɩ be a lɛ ɩn bʋɔrɔ ɛ. Ka yɩ mɩ kʋ̃ nyɛ ma ka n be a lɛ yɩn bʋɔrɔ ɛ. Dãbɩ̃ɛ chɛnɛ na kʋrɔ ma ɩka, jɛɛr, nyuur, suur nyɛfʋ, ootaa, yobɔyele, gagar yele, mɩ̃ɛ 'mɔɔfʋ nɩ buburfʋ be a yɩ pɔ ɛ.

N lɛ joro na dãbɩ̃ɛ ɩka maa wa lɩɛb waara, Nãaŋmɩn wʋ maal ma ka n siir n mɩ̃ɛ a yɩ niem. Ka n tara pʋsɔ̃ɔ nɩ a nɩyɔɔ bala na dɔ̃ɔ maal a yeldɛɛr tɩ ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr yin a yele anyãna pɔ ɛ. Ban bʋ̃nɔ̃ gãna nɩ taa nɩ a ba pepe yelsɩ pɔ.
Gbɛɛ ata nɩ nyã ɩn ben tɩrɛ a yɩ piir kaa jie. Nɩtãa lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ, "Nɩbɛ ayi bɩɩ ata dãasɩɛ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ."

A lɛ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ tɩ a gbɛɛ ayi sʋɔ, n dɔ̃ɔ gɔ̃ yɩ. A 'yɛr bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ n chɛnɛ gɔ̃nɔ̃ yɩ ɩn ba be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ. Maa wa lɩɛb tɩ 'lɔ, n kʋ̃ bar a bala na dɔ̃ɔ maal a yelbier bɩɩ a bala na wa bɩɛr maal ɛ,
bojũu yɩn ben bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ tu a n 'yɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ. Waa bal na wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ maal yele jaa faa a yɩ jie ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ tara na kpɛ̃ɔ a yɩ pɔ.

Bojũu yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ, ban dɔ̃ɔ kpa wʋ a daa ju, wʋ bal naa, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ lɛ vɛ̃ naa ka wʋ nyɛ nyɛvʋr. Lɛ mɩ lɛ, sɩn mɩ bal naa a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ jũu, sɩn ben be na sɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ yɩ.
Yɩ bɛɛr a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kaa ɩka yɩ ben a sɔɔfʋ pɔ? Yɩ jʋʋr a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kaa. Yaa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ben a yɩ pɔ ɛ? Ka ala ba ɩ yɩ ɩn faa ɛ!
N bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa sɩn ba ɩ faa ɛ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, Nãaŋmɩn lɛ sɩ sʋɔrɔ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩ taa maala yeldɛɛr jaa ɛ. A ta ɩ ka a nɩbɛ nyɛ fɩka sɩn ba tara chɛfʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a ɩ yɩn lɛ maala a lɛ na tor, ala ɩ gba fɩka nɩbɛ tɩɛr ɩka sɩ ɩn faa.
Bojũu sɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ maal yele jaa tɩ põn a yelmɩ̃ɛ bar ɛ, tɩchɛ a yelmɩ̃ɛ yele tɛɛ lɛ sɩ ma maal.
Sɩ pʋɔ pɛl naa, a sɩn na bal, tɩchɛ ka a yɩn kpɛ̃mɛ, na sɩ sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩ ta tara chɛfʋ ɛ.

A anyãna jũu lɛ so ɩn ba be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ, naa sɛɛrɛ a yele nyã kʋrɔ yɩ. Maa wa tɩ, ka n taa ɩrɛ wa de a n kpɛ̃ɔ tãna nɩ yɩ ɛ, a kpɛ̃ɔ a n Soro na kʋ ma, wʋ ɩka n de sʋ̃ʋn yɩ waa 'yɛr ɩka n de sɔ̃ɔn yɩ bar ɛ.
Yɛɛr, yɩ chɩlɛ, na yɩ mʋɔrɔ chiine niem. A baaraa lɛɛ. A n sʋɔrfʋ ɩn sʋɔrɔ yɩ nɩ nyã. Yɩ tara tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen, na yɩ kpɩɛrɛ nɩ nyã'maar. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a nʋ̃fʋ sʋɔ nɩ a nyã'maar sʋɔ, na ben a yɩ sɛ̃.
Yɩ puor puor taa nɩ pʋpɛl.
A Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ba jaa puoro yɩ naa.
A sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ, nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃fʋ, nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɛbʋ̃'yen, a be a yɩ jaa jaa sɛ̃.
Maa Pɔɔl na ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nãa, a ba ɩ nɩsaal lɛ ir ma bɩɩ nɩsaal kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yin a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩ a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, na sɩ̃ɩ wʋ a kũu pɔ.
A yɛɛr bala na be a ka a n sɛ̃, sɩ jaa lɛ sɛɛrɛ a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ bala na be a Galatiya paal pɔ.
Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ a be a yɩ jie.
'Lɔ lɛ de a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɩr a sɩ yelbier jũu ɩka wʋ faa sɩ a dɩna yelbier pɔ tun a lɛ na ɩ a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ.
Wʋ nyɛrɛ tɩɩr bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
A 'maa man nɛɛ nɩ a lɛ yɩn lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bʋɔl yɩ tun a Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ pɔ, tɩ na yɩ lɛ lɩɛb turo 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ yuo.
A 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ yuo jaa ba lɛ be be go ɛ, tɩchɛ bamɩne nyɔ̃nyɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa a yɩ tɩɛr na ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba nyɔɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb ka wʋ be wʋ yõ.
Ala sɔɔ ɩ sɩn gba lɛ, bɩɩ ka malaka lɛ wa yɩ saaju wa mʋɔl kʋ yɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ na ba tu a lɛ sɩn mʋɔl kʋ yɩ ɛ, a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ wɛ naa!
Nɩtãa lɛ sɩn dɔ̃ɔ de nie 'yɛr kʋ yɩ, pʋ̃pãanyã n lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ go. Ala nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa mʋɔlɔ na 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ yuo kʋrɔ yɩ, na ba tu a lɛ sɩn mʋɔl kʋ yɩ a yɩ sɔɔ ɛ, a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ wɛ naa.
Nɩsaal lɛ n bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ kʋ ma sɔr bɩɩ Nãaŋmɩn? Bɩɩ nɩsaal pʋʋr lɛ n bʋɔrɔ ɩka n pɛl? Maa ta chɛnɛ bʋɔrɔ ɩka n pɛlɛ nɩsaal pʋɔ, n kʋ naa ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ ɛ.
N yɛɛr, n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par ɩka a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn mʋɔl kʋ yɩ ba yi nɩsaal sɛ̃ ɛ.
A ba ɩ nɩsaal pɔ lɛ n tu tɩ nyɛ wʋ ɛ, bɩɩ nɩsaal lɛ jãn ma ɛ, tɩchɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ ir wiil ma.
Yɩ wõn a lɛ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ chɛnɛ puoro a Juu nɩbɛ puorfʋ, naa mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir gere a bala na turo a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto, naa bʋɔrɔ ɩka n sɔ̃ɔ ba bar.
N bɔ̃ɔ gar a Juu nɩbɛ bala ɩn 'mataa pɔl, tɩchɛ ka a ɩ ma nɩbijɩɛ nɩ a n sãakpãmɩne puorfʋ.
Tɩchɛ an ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ dɔ̃ɔ de nie kaa ir ma tɩchɛ ka ba wa dɔɔ ma, na wʋ bʋɔl ma tun a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ pɔ, a ɩ wʋn pʋpɛl,
ka wʋ ir a wʋ Bie wiil ma, ka na mʋɔl a wʋ 'yɛr a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ. N ba sʋʋr nɩrɛ jaa kaa ɛ,
bɩɩ do be a Jerusalɛm a bala na dɔ̃ɔ ma nie ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ n tɔ̃ɔ tor chen Arabɩya a dẽdẽe a lɛ nɛ, a lɛ puor lɛ n pãa lɩɛb chen a Damaskus.
Yuom ata na wa po, n pãa don be a Jerusalɛm ɩka n tɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Pita, naa jɛ̃ a be a wʋ sɛ̃ maal ber pie nɩ anũu (15).
Tɩchɛ n ba nyɛ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɛ, ka Jemesɩ na ɩ a sɩ Soro yɛbɛ tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn niem ɩka, a yele nyã ɩn sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ba ɩ jir ɛ.
A lɛ puor, n lɛ chen Siriya nɩ Sɩlɩsɩya paal pɔ.
A pupuorbiir gbulsɩ bala na be a Judiya a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, ba bɔ̃ɔ ma ɛ.
A n yele tɛɛ lɛ ba wõ ɩka, a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ gere sɩ, pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ mɩ̃ɛ lɛ pãa mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr 'lɔ wʋn ta dɔ̃ɔ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ sɔ̃ɔ bar,
na ba pɛɛ Nãaŋmɩn yuor a maa jũu.
Yuom pie nɩ anaar (14) na wa po, maa nɩ Banabasɩ lɛ don be a Jerusalɛm naa tara Titusɩ mɩ pʋɔ.

N don be a Jerusalɛm bojũu Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ir wiil ma ɩka n tɩ man kʋ ba a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn mʋɔl kʋ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala na ɩ a nɩdierbe tɛɛ lɛ n dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔl man a yele anyãna kʋ. A n dãbɩ̃ɛ lɛ ɩka n taa wa jo pɔrɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a Titusɩ gba mɩ na dɔ̃ɔ be a n sɛ̃, na waa ɩ a Juu nɩrɛ ɛ, baa fɩr wʋ ɩka wʋ ŋmaa a yʋɔr ɛ.
A yele nyã lo naa bojũu a yɛɛr bamɩne na ɩ jir ŋmarba fʋɔl kpɛ ɩka ba tɩ jʋʋr kaa a lɛ sɩn so a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka ba na maal sɩ ka sɩ ɩ gbãgbaar.
Saa sɔɔ ba bɩ̃lãa jaa ɛ, ka a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã na ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ na be a yɩ sɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ jaa.

A bala a nɩbɛ na tɩɛr ɩka bala lɛ ɩ a nɩyɔ̃ɔnsɩ, tɩchɛ a lɛ ban be maa ba nyɛ a ba tɛɛ taa ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn ba kaara nɩsaal nie tɩ tɔɔrɔ a wʋ 'yɛr ɛ. A nɩdierbe bala ba 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa lɛ pʋɔ a maa 'yɛr 'lɔ pɔ ɛ.

Tɩchɛ ban wa bɔ̃ɔn an ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ de a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã kʋ ma ɩka n mʋɔl kʋ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na de a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã kʋ a Pita ɩka wʋ mʋɔl kʋ a bala na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn lɛ tʋ̃ a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ tu a Pita pɔ maal wʋ ɩka wʋ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ nɩtʋ̃nãa, 'lɔ lɛ mɩ tʋ̃ a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ tu a maa pɔ tʋ̃ ma ɩka n chen a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ.

A Jemesɩ nɩ a Pita nɩ a Jɔɔn ban dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔn fɩka lue, ban wa nyɛ bɔ̃ɔn a wɩ̃ɛfʋ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ ma, ba de sɩn nuur ayi nɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen maa nɩ a Banabasɩ, na ba wiil ɩka sɩ tara na nɛbʋ̃'yen, na ba sɔɔ ɩka sɩ chen a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ tɩchɛ ka ba mɩ chen a bala na ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ pɔ.
Yele bʋ̃'yen ban 'yɛr kʋ sɩ lɛ ɩka sɩ tɩɛrɛ a nɔ̃n dẽme. A yele nyã nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ n mɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir ɩka n maal.
A Pita na wa tɩ wa a Antiok, n gɔ̃ wʋ̃n a nɩyɔɔ niem bojũu wʋ maal bɔr chãa pɔ.
Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka a nɩbɛ bamɩne yi a Jemesɩ sɛ̃ wa, 'lɔ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ma 'mantaa dire. Tɩchɛ ban wa wa baar, wʋ oon wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yin a ba pɔ, bojũu wʋ joro na a bala na ɩ a yɔŋmarba dãbɩ̃ɛ.
A Juu nɩbɛ bamɩne pʋɔ wʋ naa a nɛɛr ayi yele nyãna pɔ, ka a Banabasɩ gba tɩɛr mɩ bũbur a ba yele nyãna jũu.

Ɩn wa nyɛ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka baa maala a lɛ na tor nɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna ɛ, n 'yɛr kʋ a Pita a ba jaa niem, "A fʋ̃ʋ ɩn Juu nɩrɛ, tɩ na fʋ kpɩɛrɛ fɩka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ kaar ɛ. Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ fʋn ɩ fɩr a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka ba kpɩɛrɛ fɩka a Juu nɩbɛ?
A sɩn ban dɔɔ ka sɩ ɩ Juu nɩbɛ, saa ɩ nɩyor na ɩ yelbe-ɩrbɛ kaar ɛ.

Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka, nɩrɛ yele kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ tor wʋ̃n turo a nɛbinsɩ jũu ɛ, tɩchɛ a wʋ yele na tor a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wʋ̃n sɔɔ de jũu. Lɛ lɛ a sɩn mɩ gba sɔɔ de a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ka a sɩ yele tor, ka a kʋ̃ ɩ a nɛbinãa sɩn turo jũu ɛ. Ala ɩ a nɛbinãa tufʋ jũu lɛ, nɩrɛ jaa yele kʋ̃ tor Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ.
"Ala ɩ sɩ mʋɔrɔ naa ɩka a sɩ yele a tor a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ ka a ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ ɩka a sɩn mɩ̃ɛ ɩn yelbe-ɩrbɛ, ka ala be a lɛ, a Kɩrɩsɩto pʋɔrɔ naa a yelbier 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ bɩɩ? Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa, a ba ɩ lɛ lɛ ɛ!
Ala ɩ n lɛ mɛn a bonsɩ ala ɩn sɔ̃ɔ bar, n maal a lɛ wiil ɩka n ɩn a nɛbinãa sɔ̃sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
Bojũu a tu naa a nɛbinãa pɔ, ka n kpi kʋ a nɛbinãa, ka a lɛ na sʋ̃ʋ ma ka n be be kʋ Nãaŋmɩn.

Ba 'mantaa kpa maa nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto a daa ju. A ba lɛ ɩ maa lɛ lɛ be be go ɛ, tɩchɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ be a n 'yɔ̃ɔ. A nyɛvʋr nyã ɩn pãa ben a ɩ̃gãn pɔ, n ben be nɩ a sɔɔfʋ ɩn sɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, 'lɔ lɛ nʋ̃ ma, na wʋ de a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ ma.
N ba 'yɛr ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ ba ɩ ɛ, bojũu ala ɩ nɩrɛ na tʋ̃ɔn 'yɛr faa a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a nɛbinãa jũu, ka lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto kũu ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa ɛ!"
A yɩn Galatiya jɔlɔ dẽme. An lɛ bɛl yɩ ka a nʋ̃mɔ̃ yɩ? A yɩ nɩbir lɛ ba nyɔɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yin a nɩyɔɔ niem kpa a daa ju.
Yele bʋ̃'yen lɛ n bʋɔrɔ ɩka n bɔ̃ɔ yi a yɩ sɛ̃. Yɩ nyɛn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ a nɛbinãa yɩn turo bɩɩ a lɛ yɩn wõ na yɩ sɔɔ?
Yɩ lɛɛ bɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃ ɔ. Yɩn piel a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, yɩ pãa bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ baar yɩn kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ bɩɩ?
A yɩ dɔɔyɛ difʋ ba lɛ tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ bɩɩ? Yelmɩ̃ɛ a ba ɩ pɔrɔ ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn kʋ yɩn a wʋ Sɩɛ tɩ tʋ̃ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ a yɩ pɔ, yɩn sɔɔ a nɛbinãa jũu bɩɩ yɩn sɔɔ a lɛ yɩn wõ?
De man a Abraham kaa, wʋ "Sɔɔn de Nãaŋmɩn, ka a lɛ vɛ̃ ka wʋ ɩ nɩtor."
Bɔ̃ɔ a par ɩka a bala na sɔɔ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ɩ a Abraham bibiir.
A Nãaŋmɩn gãn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr faa a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, a ba sɔɔfʋ jũu. Nãaŋmɩn den nie 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ a Abraham ɩka, "A paalsɩ ba jaa na nyɛn sʋ̃ʋfʋ tu a fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ."
A lɛ jũu, a bala jaa na sɔɔ de na nyɛn sʋ̃ʋfʋ pʋɔ a Abraham pɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ a nɩrɛ na tara sɔɔfʋ.
Bala jaa na dɩɛl a nɛbinãa tufʋ ben pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ pɔ, bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ turo na a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba turo a yelsɩ a jaa a nɛbinãa gãn pɔ ɛ."
A ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ ɩka nɩrɛ jaa kʋ nyɛ faa fʋ a Nãaŋmɩn niem a nɛbinãa 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, bojũu "A nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara sɔɔfʋ tor naa, wʋn tara na nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ."
A nɛbinãa ba be sɔɔfʋ pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ "Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na maala a lɛ a nɛbinãa na 'yɛr, na tara na nyɛvʋr."
Kɩrɩsɩto faa sɩ naa a nɛbinãa pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ pɔ, na wʋ lɩɛb ɩ pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋ sɩ, bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ turo na a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na yɔɔl tɩɛ ju."
Wʋ faa sɩ naa ka a sʋ̃ʋfʋ ala a Abraham na nyɛ, ka a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ mɩ na nyɛ tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a sɔɔfʋ jũu, ka sɩ nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ nɛtɩraa.
N yɛɛr, vɛ̃ ka n de man a bɩbir jaa nyɛvʋr pɔ, nɩrɛ wa faa 'yɛr 'yɛr bin baar, nɩrɛ jaa maa lɛ 'yɛr 'yɛr dɔɔl ɛ, bɩɩ ŋmaa bar ɛ. Lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ a nɛtɩraa.
Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a wʋ nɛɛ kʋ Abraham nɩ a wʋ bir. A Nãaŋmɩn gãn ba 'yɛr ɩka bʋ̃bie ɛ, naa wiil fɩka biyɔɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ 'yɛr ɩka, "A fʋ bir," Nɩbʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto.
Maa 'yɛr nɩ nyã ɩka a nɛbinãa na wa a yuom kɔɔr anaar dɔɔl lɩjɛr nɩ pie (430) puor ba sɔ̃ɔ a nɛtɩraa 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɛ, na wʋ sɔ̃ɔ a nɛtɩraa ɛ.
Ala ɩ a bonsɩ ala sɩn wa nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɩ naa a nɛbinãa tufʋ jũu lɛ, a ba lɛ ɩ a nɛtɩraa yele lɛ go ɛ, tɩchɛ an ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ lɛ wʋ de tɩr nɛɛ kʋ a Abraham.

Bo lɛ so Nãaŋmɩn na wa bɩɛr tɩr a nɛbinãa? Wʋ pʋɔn 'yɔ̃ɔ ban ba sɔɔ jũu tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Bir 'lɔ wʋn tɩr a nɛɛ na wa. A malakasɩ lɛ waan a nɛbinãa nyã, tɩchɛ Mosesɩ na ɩ a 'ma'maala lɛ be a ba chara pɔ.
'Ma'maala maa ara kʋ gbul bʋ̃'yen ɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ ɩn bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ.
Ka a lɛ wiil ɩka a nɛbinãa sɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn nɛtɩraa ala bar bɩɩ? Kai. Ala ɩ a nɛbinãa kʋrɔ na nɩrɛ nyɛvʋr, nɩrɛ jaa na ɩn nɩtor tu a nɛbinãa jũu.
Tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn 'yɛr ɩka a yelbier nyɔ̃ɔn a wɛr nɩbɛ ba jaa pɔɔ die pɔ, ka a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ a bala na sɔɔ de a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na nyɛ.
Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka a sɔɔfʋ wa wa, sɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a nɛbinãa nɩpɔɔrsɩ, naa pɔɔ sɩ tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a sɔɔfʋ na wa nyɩr.
Nãaŋmɩn kʋn a nɛbinãa sɔr ka wʋ na de sɩ nie chiin a Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃, ka sɩ na nyɛ faafʋ tu a sɔɔfʋ pɔ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã a sɔɔfʋ na wa tɩ wa, saa lɛ chɛnɛ be a nɛbinãa pĩlem ka wʋ kaara sɩ ɛ.
Yɩ jaa ɩn Nãaŋmɩn bibiir yɩn sɔɔ Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu,
bojũu ba so yɩn a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, ka wʋ pɔɔ yɩ fɩka fɔbaa.
Ka bamɩne ba lɛ ɩ Juu nɩbɛ bɩɩ baa ɩ Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka bamɩne mɩ ɩ gbãgbaar bɩɩ ka bamɩne ɩ sumɩne ɛ, ka bamɩne ba lɛ ɩ dɔɔr bɩɩ mɩ ɩ pɔbɔ ɛ. Bojũu yɩ jaa ɩn bʋ̃'yen a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Ala ɩ yɩ ɩn a Kɩrɩsɩto sofʋ, yɩ pãa ɩn a Abraham bir, na yɩ pʋɔ a Abraham na di a Nãaŋmɩn nãbonsɩ ala wʋn tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ wʋ.
A maa 'yɛr nɩ nyã, a bʋ̃dire bie gba wʋn ɩ bibile, tɩchɛ waa be wʋ yõ nɩ a gbãgbaa ɛ, an sɔɔ ɩ 'lɔ lɛ so a bonsɩ a jaa.
Gugurbo nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme ma pire naa bie nyãna tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a sãa na 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ, sɩn dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a bibiir, sɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a wɛr gbãgbaar be kpɩ̃ɛn bonsɩ pĩlem.
Tɩchɛ a sɔ̃ɔ na wa ta, Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃n a wʋ Bie ka pɔɔ dɔɔ wʋ tun a nɛbinãa pɔ,
ka wʋ na faa a bala na be a nɛbinãa pĩlem, ka sɩ tara sɔr ɩ a wʋ bibiir.
Yɩn ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir jũu, Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃n a wʋ Bie Sɩɛ ka wʋ wa kpɛ a sɩ nyãn pɔ a sɩ ma bʋɔlɔ wʋ, sɩ Sãa.
A lɛ jũu, yaa lɛ chɛnɛ ɩ gbãgbaar ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ɩn a wʋ bibiir. Yɩn ɩ a wʋ bibiir baar, yɩ ɩn a wʋ bʋ̃dirbe.
A kõro yɩn ba dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, yɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ gbãgbaar kʋ a tɩbɛ ala yɩn ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.

Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã yɩn bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn bɩɩ Nãaŋmɩn na wa bɔ̃ɔ yɩ baar, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a lɛ ɩ ka yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a bonsɩ ala na bal ka a ba turfʋ ɩ pʋ̃sɔ̃ɔ? Yɩ chɛnɛ na bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ lɛ ɩ a ba gbãgbaar bɩɩ?
Yɩ tara na bɩbir pɛ̃nsɩ, nɩ chuur pɛ̃nfʋsɩ nɩ sɔ̃ɔsɩ nɩ yuomo pɛ̃nfʋsɩ.
Dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ma naa, ka n tɩɛr ɩka a maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɩn tʋ̃ a yɩ pɔ ɩn pɔrɔ.
N yɛɛr, n sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa, yɩ be a lɛ ɩn be, bojũu n mɩ dɔ̃ɔ be a lɛ yɩn be. Yaa maal ma yelbier jaa ɛ.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa an ɩ baal jũu lɛ so ka n dɔ̃ɔ nie mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ yɩ.
A maa baal gba na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ bɛɛr kaa kʋ yɩ tɩchɛ yaa tɔr ma bar ɛ, yɩ sɔɔn de ma Nãaŋmɩn malaka kaar, fɩka Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
Bo lɛ ɩ a yɩ chɩlfʋ? Ɩn tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr yelmɩ̃ɛ ɩka ala ɩ yɩn taa tʋ̃ɔ maal a lɛ, yɩn taa loor a yɩ nɩbie kʋ ma.
Pʋ̃pãanyã n ɩn a yɩ dɔ̃sʋɔ ɩn 'yɛr a yelmɩ̃ɛ kʋ yɩ bɩɩ?
A nɩbɛ bala na bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ wa a ba sɛ̃, a ba tɩɛr ba vɩɛl ɛ. A lɛ ban bʋɔrɔ lɛ ɩka yɩ ŋmaa yi na yɩ ɩ sʋ̃ʋfʋ kʋ ba.
A vɩɛl na ɩka yɩ tara sʋ̃ʋfʋ sɔ̃ɔ, ala ɩ a lɛ yɩn tɩɛr vɩɛlɛ na, na yɩ ma maala a lɛ sɔ̃ɔ jaa, tɩchɛ ata ɩ fɩka maa wa be a yɩ sɛ̃ tɛɛ ɛ.
N yɛɛr, a yɩ yele wõnõ ma naa fɩka pɔɔ na dɔɔrɔ bie kaar, tɩ ta a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn be a lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na be.
N ta bʋɔrɔ naa fɩka n be a yɩ sɛ̃ a pʋ̃pãanyã naa ta lɩɛb a n kɔkɔr bojũu a yɩ yele wõnõ ma naa.
Yɩ 'yɛr kʋ ma, a yɩn bala na bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ ɩ a nɛbinãa turbo, yaa bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ a nɛbinãa na 'yɛrɛ bɩɩ?
A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, Abraham tara na bibiir ayi, a gbãgbaa pɔɔ lɛ dɔɔ a ɩ̃sʋɔ, ka a sumɩne mɩ dɔɔ a ɩ̃sʋɔ.
A bie 'lɔ na ɩ a gbãgbaa pɔɔ bie, ba dɔɔ wʋn tu a lɛ nɩsaal na guor, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ mɩ na ɩ a sumɩne bie, ba dɔɔ wʋn tun a Nãaŋmɩn nɛtɩraa pɔ.
Sɩn tʋ̃ɔ de a pɔbɔ banyãna ayi man nɛtɩrsɩ ayi. Haga lɛ dɔɔ a gbãgbaa bibiir. 'Lɔ lɛ ara kʋ a nɛtɩraa 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na maal a Sinai Tɔ̃ɔ ju.
Haga ara na kʋ a Sinai Tɔ̃ɔ na be a Arabɩya fɩka a dɩna Jerusalɛm, bojũu 'lɔ lɛ dɔɔ a wʋ bibiir ka ba ɩ a nɛbinãa gbãgbaar.
Tɩchɛ a Jerusalɛm 'lɔ na be a saaju son wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a sɩ ma.

Bojũu a sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Tara pʋpɛl, a fʋ̃ʋ pɔɔ abbaa, na ba dɔɔ bibiir ɛ. Yiele ŋmiere nɩ chɛlsɩ, fʋ̃ʋ nyã na ba wõ bie dɔɔfʋ tuo ɛ. A pɔɔ nyã na ba dɔ̃ɔ dɔɔ ɛ, bojũu a wʋ bibiir waan gar a pɔɔ 'lɔ na kul sɩrɛ."
Pʋ̃pãanyã, yɩn a n yɛɛr, yɩ kaara fɩka a Isaakɩ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛtɩraa bibiir.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban dɔɔ a bie 'lɔ a ɩ̃gãn pɔ, wʋ ge naa a bie 'lɔ ban dɔɔn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ. Lɛ mɩ lɛ a pʋ̃pãanyã.
Tɩchɛ bo lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn 'yɛr? "Dii a gbãgbapɔɔ nɩ a wʋ bie bar, bojũu a bie 'lɔ na ɩ a gbãgbapɔɔ bie kʋ 'mataa din a Nãaŋmɩn nãbonsɩ nɩ a bie 'lɔ a sumɩne na dɔɔ ɛ."
A lɛ jũu n yɛɛr, saa ɩ a gbãgbaa pɔɔ bibiir ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ ɩn a pɔɔ sumɩne bibiir.
A Kɩrɩsɩto faa sɩ naa, ala lɛ so ka sɩ so sɩ mɩ̃ɛ. A lɛ jũu, yɩ pãa ara kpɛ̃ɔ na yɩ ta lɛ de yɩ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ gbãgbaa tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ ɛ.
Yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a n 'yɛrbie jɩ̃nɛ. Maa Pɔɔl lɛ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka ala ɩ yɩ ŋman a yɩ yɔɩ, a Kɩrɩsɩto kʋ tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʋ yɩ ɛ.
N lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa ɩka nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ŋmaa yʋɔr tara na sɔr ɩka wʋ sɔɔ a Juu nɩbɛ nɛbinsɩ a jaa.
A yɩn bala na bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ nyɛ faafʋ tu a nɛbinãa 'yɔ̃ɔ, ŋmaan yi a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, yɩ ŋmaan yi a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ pɔ.
Tɩchɛ a sɔɔfʋ jũu, sɩ chɩlɛ na nɩbijɩɛ ɩka sɩn nyɛn a Sɩɛ tɩɛrtɔ jie yeltorsɩ.
A Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka nɩrɛ ŋmaan yʋɔr bɩɩ ka waa ŋmaa yʋɔr ɛ, a ba wiil yele jaa ɛ. A yele 'lɔ na fɛr lɛ ɩka sɔɔfʋ na wile wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tun nʋ̃fʋ pɔ.
Yɩ dɔ̃ɔ joro jovɩla, an lɛ ŋmaa yɩ sɔr ɩka yɩ ta sɔɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ?
A sʋɔrfʋ nyã bʋrɔ ba yi a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bʋɔl yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.
Fɩka dãbɩl bɩ̃lãa na ma vɛ̃ ka jɔ̃ vʋ̃, lɛ lɛ yele jaa pʋʋr bile ma sɔ̃ɔ yelyɔɔ.
N tara na sɔɔfʋ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ ɩka yɩ kʋ tɩɛr tɩɛr yuo ɛ. A nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na vɛ̃ ka a yɩ tɩɛr va vire na nyɛn gefʋ.
N yɛɛr, ba kʋ̃ ge ma ɛ, ala ɩ n 'yɛr yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ 'yɛr. A lɛ wiil ɩka a Yesu daa suur difʋ baar naa.
Ɩn naa bʋɔrɔ na ɩka a bala na ba vɛ̃ ka a yɩ tɩɛr gãna jibʋ̃'yen nɩ a ba yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ yele ɛ, ba ŋme a ba mɩ̃ɛ lãma.
Yɩn a n yɛɛr Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔl ka yɩ so yɩ mɩ̃ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ta de a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ sofʋ nyãna maala nɩ yelbier ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ de a mɩ̃ɛ sofʋ nyã, na yɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ taa nɩ nʋ̃fʋ.
A Nãaŋmɩn nɛbinsɩ a jaa, ba den sɛb 'yɛrbibʋ̃'yen tɛɛ, "Nʋ̃ a fʋ tɔ sʋɔ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kaar."
Yɩn maa wa sɔɔ dʋ̃nɔ̃ taa na yɩ ɔɔrɔ taa, yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃, na yɩ taa sɔ̃ɔ taar ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, n 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩ kpɩɛrɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na wile, na yɩ ta maala a lɛ a ɩ̃gãn na bʋɔr ɛ.

Bojũu bon 'lɔ a ɩ̃gãn na bʋɔrɔ ba ɩ a bon 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na bʋɔr ɛ. Bon 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mɩ na bʋɔrɔ ba ɩ a bon 'lɔ a ɩ̃gãn mɩ na bʋɔr ɛ. A ma jɛɛrɛ nɩ taa na a na ŋmaa yɩ sɔr ka yɩ kʋ tʋ̃ɔ maal a lɛ yɩn bʋɔr ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ben a yɩ pɔ, yaa lɛ chɛnɛ ɩ a nɛbinãa gbãgbaar ɛ.
A ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ ma gãn chãa pɔ, ala lɛ a anyãna sɛ̃fʋ, nɩ dɛɛr maalfʋ, nɩ jɔl dɩ̃ɛn,
nɩ tɩbɛ puorfʋ, nɩ sɔyele, nɩ 'laarfʋ, nɩ nɛchɩrɛ, nɩ nyuur, nɩ suur, nɩ mɩ̃ɛ 'mɔɔfʋ, nɩ ootaa,
nɩ nyuur, nɩ dãa buufʋ, nɩ dãnyugbulo, nɩ a ala na nyɛtãan a anyãna. N kpãana yɩ naa nɩtãa a lɛ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ de nie kpãa yɩ ɩka, a bala na maala a anyãna, kʋ̃ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ anyã lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wɔ̃mɔ̃, nɩ nʋ̃fʋ, nɩ chɩlfʋ, nɩ nyã'maar, nɩ kãnyir, nɩ nɩbaal kaafʋ, nɩ vɩla maalfʋ, nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ,
nɩ jomm ɩfʋ, nɩ mɩ̃ɛ nyɔɔfʋ. Nɛɛ jaa ba be be gar a anyãna ɛ.
A bala na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ kpan a ba ɩ̃gãn nɩ a wʋ vɔlaa a daa ju.
Ala ɩ sɩn nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ lɛ 'mataa kpɩɛrɛ, yɩ vɛ̃ ka sɩn nɩ a 'lɔ 'mataa chiine.
Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka sɩ wile sɩ mɩ̃ɛ na sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa suur, tara taa nɩ nyuur ɛ.
N yɛɛr, ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ wa maal yelbier bɔr a sɔɔfʋ sɔr pɔ, fʋ̃ʋ nyã na tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ, tɔɔ wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɔr pɔ nɩ mɩ̃ɛ siirfʋ. Tɩchɛ gu a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ na fʋ mɩ taa lo a bɛɛr kaa pɔ ɛ.
Yɩ tuoro taa a yelwõnsɩ. Yɩn wa ɩrɛ a lɛ, yɩ turo naa a Kɩrɩsɩto nɛɛ.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa tɩɛr ɩka wʋ ɩn bon kɔ̃ɔ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋn ba ɩ bon jaa ɛ, wʋ mɩ̃ɛ lɛ wʋ bɛlɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa wʋ ma bɛɛr a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tʋ̃mɔ̃ kaa tɩ na wʋ pãa chɩɛrɛ a nyãa na wʋ ta de a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ mana nɩ a wʋ taaba tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɛ.
Bojũu ɩ̃sʋɔ na ma tuon a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tuor.
A bala ban wiil, ba mɩ põ a ba bʋ̃tarsɩ kʋ a bala na wile ba.
Yɩ ta bɛlɛ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, nɩrɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ la Nãaŋmɩn ɛ. A bon 'lɔ fʋn bʋr, 'lɔ lɛ fʋn ŋma.
Fʋ̃ʋ nyã na bʋr a ala na ɩ a ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa, fʋn ŋman bʋ̃dɛbɛ. Ala ɩ fʋ bʋr a ala na pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pʋɔ, na tun a Sɩɛ pɔ ŋma nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.
Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka sɩ bal nɩ vɩla maalfʋ ɛ, bojũu sɩn ŋma naa a ŋmafʋ sɔ̃ɔ, sɩn baa wa tɛɛ bar ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, sɩn wa nyɛ vuo, yɩ vɛ̃ a sɩ de maal vɩla kʋ nɩrɛ jaa, na sɩ mɔ̃ maal yɔɔ jaa kʋ a bala na be a sɔɔfʋ pɔ.
Maa wa sɛɛrɛ nɩ a maa mɩ̃ɛ nũu, nyɛ lɛ a sɛbie na ma ɩ a bɛrɛ jɩ̃.
A bala na bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba wile a ba mɩ̃ɛ a ɩ̃gãn pɔ, bala lɛ bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba fɩr yɩ ka yɩ ŋma a yɔɩ. A yele 'lɔ yɔɔ ban ɩrɛ a lɛ, baa bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba nyɛ gefʋ a Kɩrɩsɩto daa jũu ɛ.
A bala gba mɩ na ŋma a yɔɩ ba turo a nɛbinãa ɛ, tɩchɛ ba bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩn yɩ ŋma a yɩ yɔɩ ka ba na chɩɛrɛ nyãa ɩka bala lɛ ŋma yɩ.
N taa ɩrɛ wa chɩɛrɛ nyãa bon jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ala ba wa ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto daa ba lɛ ɛ. A lɛ jũu lɛ so, ka a wɛr nyã ju ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʋ ma ɛ, ka mɩ ba ɩ bon jaa kʋ a wɛr ɛ.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ ŋmaan yʋɔr bɩɩ ka 'lɔ ba ŋmaa yʋɔr ɛ, a ba wiil yele jaa ɛ, tɩchɛ a lɛ na sɛɛ lɛ ɩka nɩrɛ wʋ nyɛ dɔɔ paalaa.
A bala jaa na turo a sɔr nyãna, nyã'maar nɩ nɩbaal kaafʋ wʋ be a ba sɛ̃. Ba la lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kaa ir.
An yi a pʋ̃pãanyã chiine, nɩrɛ jaa wʋ ta lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma yele go ɛ, bojũu a Yesu fɛlsɩ ben a n ɩ̃gãn pɔ.
N yɛɛr, ka a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ, a be a yɩ sɩɩr pɔ. A ɩ a lɛ.
Maa Pɔɔl a Nãaŋmɩn na sɔɔ ka n ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nãa lɛ sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ a yɩn na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ be a Efesus na yɩ sɔɔ de a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃ a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Pɛɛfʋ wʋ ta a Nãaŋmɩn, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto Sãa. Wʋn de a Sɩɛ yelsʋ̃n a jaa na be a saaju na wʋ sʋ̃ʋn sɩ, sɩn be a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ jũu.
Bojũu wʋ dɔ̃ɔ ir sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, tɩ na wʋ wa maal a wɛr ka sɩ na ɩ chɛchɛ na sɩ kʋ̃ tara chɛfʋ a wʋ niem ɛ, a wʋ nʋ̃fʋ jũu.
Nãaŋmɩn den nie ir sɩ ka sɩ ɩ a wʋ bibiir tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ. A ɩ naa a wʋ bɔfʋ naa pɛl a wʋ pʋɔ.
Ala lɛ so a sɩ pɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn maal vɩla kpɛ̃ɛ nyã wʋn maal sɩ na wʋ kʋ sɩ a wʋ Binʋ̃nãa.
A wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩ nyɛ faafʋ tu a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ jũu. Sɩ nyɛn vɛ̃ kʋfʋ, an ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ bɛrma naa.
Wʋ maal sɩn vɩla tɩ põn bar, na wʋ kʋ sɩ par bɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ yɛ̃ a jaa.
An ɩ wʋ vɛ̃n ka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ a yelsɔɔlaa na be a wʋ tɩɛr pɔ, a ala wʋn bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ maal a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Ka a ɩ sɩrɛ ɩka, wʋn kaal a bonsɩ a jaa na be a saaju nɩ ala na be ka a tẽe lɔ̃ɔ taa ka a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ bʋ̃'yen kaara ba, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto.
A wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ Nãaŋmɩn ir sɩ, wʋ kãan ir sɩ a lɛ na ɩ a wʋ pʋtɩɛr na wʋn maal yele a jaa ka a ɩ a lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ.
A ɩ naa lɛ, ka a sɩn na ɩ a nɩdɔ̃ɔ na tara a Yesu a sɩ tɩɛrtɔ jie ka ban pɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn.
A yɩn mɩ dɔ̃ɔ pʋɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn wõ a yelmɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ, a 'yɛr nyã na ɩ a yɩ faafʋ 'yɛr. Yɩn wa sɔɔ de wʋ, Nãaŋmɩn den a wʋ Sɩɛ 'lɔ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ 'yɔ̃ɔn yɩ jɩ̃nɛ.
A Sɩɛ nyã lɛ ɩ a tɛlma ɩka sɩn nyɛ naa ala Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a wʋ nɛɛ na wʋ faa a bala na ɩ a wʋ nɩbɛ a sɩ pɛɛrɛ wʋ.
A nyã jũu lɛ so, maa na wõ a yɩ yele a lɛ yɩn sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro Yesu nɩ a lɛ yɩn nʋ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ.
N ma dãna na Nãaŋmɩn a yɩ jũu, naa sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ yɩ.
Naa chɛnɛ sʋɔrɔ a tɩɩr Sãa, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na turo a wʋ nɛɛ ɩka wʋ kʋ yɩ a Sɩɛ yɛ̃, na wʋ wiil yɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yelwiilsɩ, ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ wʋ jaa chɛchɛ.
N sʋɔrɔ na Nãaŋmɩn ɩka wʋ chɩlʋ̃ a yɩ tɩɛr, ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a tɩɛrtɔ 'lɔ jũu wʋn bʋɔl yɩ, ka yɩ kʋ̃ tara baal ɛ, tɩ na yɩn tɩ de a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nãbomo wʋn tɩr nɛɛ kʋ a wʋ nɩbɛ.
A wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ na gar a jaa kʋ a sɩn na sɔɔ de wʋ, a kpɛ̃ɔ nyãna lɛ wʋ tʋ̃n a kpɛ̃ɔ tʋ̃mɔ̃.
'Lɔ lɛ wʋ de sɩ̃ɩn a Kɩrɩsɩto a kũu pɔ, na wʋ vɛ̃ ka wʋ jɩ̃nɛ a wʋ nũsʋ̃ɔ jie be a saaju.
Wʋ gar a tʋ̃ɔfʋ a jaa, nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme, nɩ a sɩgãdaar ba jaa, nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa, a ba ɩ a bala na be be a dɩna tɛɛ ɛ, tɩ a bala na wa be be daar kɔ̃ɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn den a bomo a jaa bin a wʋ gbɛɛ pĩlem, na wʋ ir wʋ ka wʋ ɩ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ba jaa ju,
na ɩ a wʋ ɩ̃gãn, ka ba sɛɛn wʋ jaa, 'lɔ lɛ sɛɛ ba jaa, a jiir a jaa.
Yɩn 'lɔ, yɩ dɔ̃ɔ kpi be a yɩ maal dɛbɛ nɩ a yɩ yeldɛbɛ pɔ,
ala pɔ lɛ yɩ dɔ̃ɔ be, na yɩ turo a wɛr nyã sɔɩ nɩ a 'lɔ na di a sɛsɛbɛ nãa Satan. A sɩɛ nyã lɛ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a bawõnsɩ pɔ.
Sɩ jaa mɩ dɔ̃ɔ be a lɛ a ba kaar maala a lɛ a ɩ̃gãn na bʋɔrɔ, na sɩ turo a sɩ tɩɛr nɩ a ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn suur mɩ dire nɩ sɩ a ba kaar.
Tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal na waa jũu, ka wʋ nʋ̃ sɩ yɔɔ jaa.
Wʋ maal sɩn ka sɩ 'mataa ir a Kɩrɩsɩto a kũu pɔ an ɩ sɩ dɔ̃ɔ kpi a yeldɛbɛ pɔ, a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ lɛ wʋ faan sɩ.
Nãaŋmɩn 'mantaa sɩ̃ɩn sɩ nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto ka sɩ 'mataa jɩ̃nɛ nɩ wʋ be a saaju.
A ɩ naa nɩtɔ̃ ɩka a ber ala na waara ka wʋ na wiil sɩ a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ na bɛr ma nɩ a wʋ maal vɩla a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Bojũu a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ lɛ so yɩn nyɛ faafʋ tu a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ, a ba yi a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ sɛ̃ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn kʋfʋ lɛ.
A ba ɩ yɩn tʋ̃mɔ̃ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ ka ɩ̃sʋɔ na chɛ nyãa ɛ.
Sɩ ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn nũu bʋ̃maalsɩ wʋn mɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka sɩn tʋ̃nɔ̃ tʋ̃sʋ̃n ala wʋn de nie chɔɔr bar ka sɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ tɩɛr kaa a kõro a yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka a Juu nɩbɛ bʋɔlɔ yɩ a, yɔrwʋʋr dẽme, tɩ bʋɔlɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ a yɔrŋmaar dẽme, na ɩ a ɩ̃gãn nyã tɛɛ yele.

Yɩ tɩɛr kaa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩka yaa bɔ̃ɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto ɛ, ka yɩn yaa mɩ pʋɔ a Isɩral nɩbɛ pɔ ɛ, na yaa pʋɔ a nɛtɩrsɩ ala a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a wʋ nɛɛ kʋ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ. Yaa tara tɩɛrtɔ jie ɛ, na yaa lɛ bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ.
Yɩn bala na dɔ̃ɔ jãa tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã, yɩ wa gbʋr a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na yɩ be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ jũu.
Bojũu, a Yesu mɩ̃ɛ lɛ ɩ a sɩ nyã'maar, na wʋ maal a nɩbʋrsɩ ayi ka ba ɩ bʋ̃'yen, na wʋ ŋmɛr a dachin 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ var a sɩ ɩ a dɔ̃dẽme.
A Juu nɩbɛ nɛbinãa tara na chire yɔɔ, tɩchɛ Kɩrɩsɩto kũu sɔ̃ɔn a jaa. A wʋ bɔfʋ lɛ ɩka wʋ vɛ̃ ka a Juu nɩbɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɩ nɩpaalaa bʋ̃'yen, lɛ lɛ wʋ maal a nyã'maar.
Wʋ 'maal Nãaŋmɩn kʋ ba ka ba ɩ bʋ̃'yen. A kũu wʋn kpi a daa ju lɛ wʋ de kʋn a ba 'laar taa.
Wʋ wa mʋɔl naa a nyã'maar 'yɛr kʋ yɩn bala na jãa nɩ a bala na gbʋr.
Bojũu a tu naa a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ka sɩ tara sɔr na ta a Sãa sɛ̃ nɩ a Sɩɛ bʋ̃'yen 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
A lɛ jũu, yaa lɛ chɛnɛ ɩ sãanba nɩ nɩyʋɔrsɩ go ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩn nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔn tẽe na yɩ ɩ a wʋ yir dẽme.
Ba mɩ mɛn dɔɔl a dachin par kparaa na ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ nɩ a 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ, ka a Yesu ɩ a sãlsɔɔ wɛɛ.
A wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a yir wʋ jaa choo taa na wʋ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir chɛchɛ 'lɔ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Bojũu yɩ jaa ɩ naa a Kɩrɩsɩto tʋɔr, ka wʋ mɩ mɛ yɩ 'matãan a yir nyã pɔ, ka Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ kpɩɛrɛ.
Bon nɩ so ka n sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ yɩ lɛ ɩka, n ben pɔɔfʋ die pɔ bojũu ɩn mʋɔl a Yesu yele kʋ a yɩn na ba ɩ Juu nɩbɛ ɛ.
Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ yɩ wõ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ wʋn kʋ ma a tʋ̃mɔ̃ nyãna a yɩ jũu.
A yelsɔɔlaa nyã lɛ wʋ wiil ma ka n bɔ̃ɔ naa de nie sɛb a ŋmaa kʋ yɩ.
Yɩn wa kar a ala, yɩn pãa bɔ̃ɔn naa a lɛ ɩn bɔ̃ɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto yelsɔɔlaa ala nɩrɛ na ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn ba dɔ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka a kõr dẽme bɔ̃ɔ a anyãna ɛ, tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã wʋ wiil kʋ a wʋ nɩtʋ̃nsɩ chɛchɛsɩ nɩ a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ chɛchɛsɩ tu a wʋ Sɩɛ pɔ.

A yelsɔɔlaa nɩ nyã ɩka a tu naa a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã pɔ, ka a yɩn na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nɩ a Isɩral nɩbɛ na lɔ̃ɔn ŋmabʋ̃'yen, na ba 'mataa a ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen pɔ, ka ban 'mataa põ a nɛɛ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
N lɩɛb a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ tu a kʋfʋ nyã a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ na wʋ kʋ ma tu a wʋ tʋ̃kpɩ̃ɛn pɔ.
An ɩ maa lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ba jaa bɩr baaraa tɩchɛ ka a wɩ̃ɛfʋ nyã kʋ ma sɔr ɩka n mʋɔl a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, nɩrɛ na kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ ɛ,
ka n vɛ̃ ka a yelsɔɔlaa nyã chaar kʋ nɩrɛ jaa an ɩ a dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔl a kõr jaa a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ na maal a bonsɩ a jaa.
A wʋ bɔfʋ lɛ ɩka a pʋ̃pãanyã, wʋ tu a pupuorbiir pɔ wiil a wʋ yɛ̃ ka a tʋ̃ɔfʋ dẽme, nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme na be a saaju bɔ̃ɔn.
A anyãna lɛ wʋ tɩɛr a kõr jaa na wʋ wa de a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto a sɩ Soro na wʋ maal a wɛr.
Tu a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩn sɔɔ de wʋ jũu, sɔr gãn kʋ sɩ a sɩn 'la chen a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
A lɛ jũu n sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka yɩ ɩ̃gãn sal ɩn dire dɔɔyɛ a yɩ jũu ɛ, a ɩ naa a yɩ tɩɩr yele lɛ.
A anyãna jũu lɛ n ma de gbur dumo a Sãa niem.
'Lɔ lɛ a balsɩ ba jaa Sãa, a bala na be a saaju nɩ a ba nyã na be ka a wɛr pɔ.
N sʋɔrɔ wʋ naa ɩka a yi a wʋ tɩɩr pɔ, ka wʋ de a wʋ Sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔn yɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn, a yɩ kpɛ̃mɛ a ɩ̃gãn pʋɔm,
ka a Kɩrɩsɩto kpɩɛrɛ a yɩ nyãa pɔ, yɩn sɔɔ de wʋ jũu. A n sʋɔrfʋ lɛ ɩka, yɩ ba nyɩbɛ ara jaa chɩ̃chɩ̃ a nʋ̃fʋ pɔ,
a yɩn nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ na 'mataa nyɛ a lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto nʋ̃fʋ na yalʋ̃, nɩ a wʋ wõo, nɩ a dofʋ, nɩ a lɛ wʋn suu a pĩlem,
na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a nʋ̃fʋ na gar a bɔ̃ɔfʋsɩ a jaa, a yɩ pãa be a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na be.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a 'lɔ na ma tʋ̃ɔ maal yele a jaa gar a lɛ sɩn sʋɔr wʋ, bɩɩ a lɛ sɩn tɩɛr nɩtãa lɛ a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ na tʋ̃nɔ̃ a sɩ pɔ,
'lɔ lɛ so a tɩɩr a pupuorbiir pɔ, nɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
Ala lɛ so a maa ban pɔɔ a die pɔ a sɩ Soro jũu kpãkpãana yɩ ɩka, yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ kpɛfʋ vɩɛlɛ nyɛtãan lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔl yɩ.
Yɩ siir a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ na yɩ bal yɩ mɩ̃ɛ, na yɩ tara kãnyir, na yɩ diere taa nɩ nʋ̃fʋ.
Yɩ mɔ̃ na yɩ vɛ̃ ka a Sɩɛ bʋ̃'yen ɩfʋ 'lɔ pɔ, a yɩ tara taa nɩ nyã'maar.
Bojũu ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen lɛ be be, nɩ a Sɩɛ bʋ̃'yen, nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔl yɩ, ka yɩ tara tɩɛrtɔ jie bʋ̃'yen.
Soro bʋ̃'yen lɛ be be, sɔɔfʋ bʋ̃'yen nɩ Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ sofʋ bʋ̃'yen.
Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ, na wʋ ɩ a sɩ jaa Sãa, na wʋ kaara nɩrɛ jaa, na wʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a ba jaa jie, na wʋ be a ba jaa pɔ.
Tɩchɛ a sɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa nyɛn a wɩ̃ɛfʋ kʋfʋ dẽdẽme nɩtãa lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto na põ.
A anyãna lɛ so an sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ naa 'yɛr, "A lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ do, a wʋ sãma dẽme wʋn nyɔɔr turo wʋ naa, ka wʋ de bomo kʋ nɩbɛ."
A dofʋ par nɩ bo? Wʋ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ de nie suu a tẽe pɔ.
A 'lɔ na suu, 'lɔ nɩ wʋ ju lɛ do gar a saaju wʋ jaa, na wʋ sɛɛ a bonsɩ a jaa.
'Lɔ lɛ põ a nɩbɛ a tʋ̃mɔ̃, ka bamɩne ɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ, ka bamɩne ɩ a 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ, ka a bamɩne ɩ a 'yɛr mʋɔlbɔ, ka bamɩne mɩ kaara a nɩbɛ na ba wile ba.
Wʋ maal a nɩtɔ̃ ɩka wʋ chɔɔr a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ gun a tʋ̃mɔ̃, ka a Kɩrɩsɩto ɩ̃gãn na tʋ̃ɔ mɛ.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ na vɛ̃ ka sɩ jaa na ɩ bʋ̃'yen a sɔɔfʋ pɔ, na sɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, na sɩ baa tɩ ta a lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto na be.
Sɩ kʋ̃ lɛ pãa chɛnɛ ɩ nɩtãa bibiir vavire yʋɔrɔ kɔ̃sɛbɛ kaar ɛ. Na sɩ ma dãdaal chen a puor nɩ a niem wiilfʋ jaa bʋrɔ nɩbɛ na de a ba yɛ̃ na ba bɛlɛ nɩ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ sɩn 'yɛrɛ na yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ nʋ̃fʋ na sɩn nʋ̃ɔn a yele a jaa pɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ a ju na ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto.
A wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa choofʋ jiir choo taa, naa tʋ̃ɔ nʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nʋ̃fʋ pɔ, ka ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa tʋ̃nɔ̃ a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Lɛ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ naa de a sɩ Soro yuor kpãkpãana ɩka, yɩ ta lɛ chɛnɛ maala fɩka a bala na ba bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na maala turo nɩ a ba tɩɛr bur bur ɛ.
A ba tɩɛr lĩi naa ka baa pʋɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nyɛvʋr pɔ ɛ, bojũu a ba ba bɔ̃ɔfʋ yin a ba nyãkpɩ̃ɛn ban tara.
Ba ɩ naa ba bãma dẽme, na ba de a ba mɩ̃ɛ kʋ pepe yele, na ba pãa irɛ a ala a jaa na ba vɩɛl ɛ, tɩ chɛnɛ bʋɔrɔ yaa.
Yɩn 'lɔ, a ba ɩ a sɔr nyã lɛ yɩ de bɔ̃ɔn a Kɩrɩsɩto ɛ.
Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ ɩka yɩn wõ a wʋ 'yɛr, ba wiil yɩ naa a yelmɩ̃ɛ na be a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Ba wiil yɩ naa a lɛ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ maala ɩka, yɩ yaa a kõr maalfʋ 'lɔ bar na bɛl yɩ nɩ a wʋ vɔlaa,
tɩ na yɩ ɩ nɩpaalaa a yɩ befʋ nɩ a yɩ tɩɛr pɔ.
Yɩ de a be paalaa 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na maal a wʋ kaar na yɩ su, a ɩ naa yelmɩ̃ɛ torfʋ nɩ chɛchɛ.
A lɛ jũu, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ bar jir ŋmaafʋ tɩ 'yɛrɛ yelmɩ̃ɛ kʋrɔ a wʋ taaba, bojũu sɩ jaa ben a ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen pɔ,
"Fʋ̃ʋ wa nyɛ suur taa maal dɛɛr ɛ." Ta vɛ̃ ka a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ mʋr pɔɔ fʋ nɩ a suur ɛ.
Yɩ taa yuoro sɔr kʋrɔ a Satan a wʋ bɛl yɩ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ juro, wʋ ta ma lɛ juro ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ ma tʋ̃nɔ̃ tʋ̃mɔ̃ ala na tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a wʋ nuur na wʋ nyɛ bʋ̃kɔ̃ɔ, na wʋ ir sʋ̃ʋn a nɔ̃n dẽme.
Yɩ taa vɛ̃ ka a 'yɛr sɔ̃ɔnsɩ yire a yɩ nɛɛr pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ 'yɛrsɩ ala na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yɩ taaba ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn ala ɩ yele kɔ̃ɔ fɛr ba naa, naa mɩ ɩ sʋ̃ʋfʋ kʋ a bala na chɛlɛ.
Na yɩ taa vɛ̃ ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, 'lɔ wʋn de 'yɔ̃ɔn yɩ a jɩ̃nɛ gun a faafʋ bɩbir.
Yɩ ir putuo, pʋɔm 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, nɩ suur, tãn taa, nɩ tʋfʋ, nɩ 'laarfʋ 'yɛrbie.
Yɩ maala vɩla na yɩ kaara taa nɩbaal, na yɩ vɛ̃nɛ kʋrɔ taa nɩtãa lɛ Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃ kʋ yɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto jũu.
Yɩ tɔɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn an ɩ yɩ ɩ naa a wʋ binʋ̃nsɩ,
na yɩ kpɩɛrɛ nɩ nʋ̃fʋ nɩtãa lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto na nʋ̃ sɩ na wʋ de a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ maal a sɩ bɔɔrlo bon na nyuro vɩla lon a bɔɔr ka a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ pɛl.
Tɩchɛ a yɩ pɔ, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka ba wa pʋr sɛ̃sɛ̃yele, bɩɩ folaa ɩfʋ, bɩɩ bɔgarfʋ ɛ, bojũu a anyãna ba sɛɛn a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ chɛchɛsɩ ɛ.
Yɩ taa lɛ 'yɛrɛ vɩ̃ 'yɛrbie ɛ, bɩɩ jɔl 'yɛr, bɩɩ jɔl dɩ̃ɛn ɛ, ala po naa, tɩchɛ yɩ dãna Nãaŋmɩn.
Bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a anyãna sɩrɛ jaa ɩka nɩrɛ na sɛ̃nɛ, nɩfolaa, bɔgar sʋɔ, wʋ ɩ naa nɩrɛ na puoro tɩbɛ, na wʋ kʋ̃ nyɛ jie be a Kɩrɩsɩto nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ ɛ.
Yɩ taa vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa bɛl yɩ nɩ 'yɛr pɔrsɩ ɛ, bojũu anyãna lɛ so ka Nãaŋmɩn su tuo waara a bawõnsɩ jie.
A lɛ jũu yɩ taa mara ba ɛ.
Bojũu yɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ libe, tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã yɩ ɩ naa chãa a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ. Yɩ kpɩɛrɛ nɩtãa a chãa bibiir.
A chãa wɔ̃mɔ̃ ɩ naa vɩla maalfʋ, yeltorsɩ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Yɩ mɔ̃ na yɩ jãn a ala na pɛlɛ a sɩ Soro pʋɔ.
Na yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa pʋɔrɔ a libe tʋ̃mɔ̃ na ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ yin naa chãa pɔ.
Bojũu a gba ma ɩrɛ na vɩ̃ a ala a bawõnsɩ na ma maala a libe pɔ manfʋ.
Tɩchɛ bon jaa wa yi chãa pɔ, fʋ ma nyɛn wʋn chaar.
Bojũu chãa lɛ ma vɛ̃ ka fʋ nyɛ bon jaa chɛchɛ. Ala lɛ so a ba 'yɛr, "A fʋ̃ʋ gʋ̃ɔ sʋɔ, jɛɔ ir a kũu pɔ, ka a Kɩrɩsɩto chaar 'yɔ̃ɔ fʋ."
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃ a lɛ yɩn kpɩɛrɛ, ka a ta ɩ jɔl kpɛfʋ tɩchɛ ka a ɩ yɛ̃ kpɛfʋ.
Na yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir yɩn wa nyɛ jie ka wʋ ta sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, bojũu a bɩbie anyãna ba vɩɛlɛ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ta ɩ jɔlɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a ala a sɩ Soro na bʋɔrɔ.
Yɩ ta nyũ dãa buu ɛ, an sɔ̃ɔ yɩn ju, tɩ yɩ vɛ̃ ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛɛ yɩ.
Na yɩ yiele a Nãaŋmɩn yiel nɩ a ala na ɩ a Sɩɛ yiel kʋrɔ taa, na yɩ yiele dãnfʋ yiel nɩ a yɩ nyãa wʋ jaa kʋrɔ a sɩ Soro.
Yɩ ma dãna a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn yele a jaa pɔ, nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor.
Yɩ siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ taa a Kɩrɩsɩto yɩn 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ jũu.
Pɔbɔ, yɩ siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a yɩ sɩrbɛ, nɩtãa lɛ yɩn siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a sɩ Soro.
Bojũu an ɩ a sɩrɛ lɛ ɩ a pɔɔ ju, nɩtãa lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a pupuorbiir ju, na ɩ a wʋ ɩ̃gãn na wʋ ɩ a Fafaara.
A lɛ jũu, lɛ a pupuorbiir na siir a ba mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Kɩrɩsɩto, lɛ lɛ a pɔbɔ mɩ, yɩ siir a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a yɩ sɩrbɛ yele a jaa pɔ.
Sɩrbɛ, yɩ nʋ̃ a yɩ pɔbɔ, nɩtãa lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto na nʋ̃ a pupuorbiir na wʋ de a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ ba,
wʋ maal ban a lɛ ka ban ɩ chɛchɛ, na wʋ de kʋ̃ɔ pɛɛn ba ka ba vɩɛlɛ nɩ a 'yɛr.
Wʋ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ de a pupuorbiir banyã na vɩɛlɛ kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, na waa tara jɩ̃nɛ ɛ, 'mabfʋ jie ɛ, bɩɩ dɛɛr jie jaa ɛ, tɩchɛ a ba ɩ chɛchɛ ba tara yele jaa ɛ.
A lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ a yɩn sɩrbɛ, yɩ nʋ̃ a yɩ pɔbɔ, nɩtãa lɛ yɩn nʋ̃ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃gãma. A 'lɔ na nʋ̃ a wʋ pɔɔ nʋ̃n a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa ba be na 'laar a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɩ̃gãn ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ ma kʋrɔ wʋn bʋ̃diir na wʋ kaara wʋ, lɛ lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto kaara a pupuorbiir.
Bojũu sɩ ɩ naa a wʋ ɩ̃gãn jiir,
"A lɛ jũu, daba na bar a wʋ sãa nɩ a wʋ ma, tɩchɛ ka 'lɔ nɩ a wʋ pɔɔ ɩ bʋ̃'yen, ka ba jaa ayi ɩ ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃'yen."
A anyã ɩ naa a 'yɛr sɔɔlaa, tɩchɛ maa 'yɛrɛ naa a Kɩrɩsɩto nɩ a pupuorbiir 'yɛr.
A yɩn mɩ gba, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ ma nʋ̃ a wʋ pɔɔ nɩtãa lɛ wʋn nʋ̃ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, ka a pɔɔ mɩ ma 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wʋ sɩrɛ.
Bibiir, yɩn be a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ, yɩ wõnõ a yɩ dɔɔrbɔ toor, a lɛ lɛ tor.
A lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ kʋ a wʋ nɛɛ, a nɛɛ nyã lɛ ɩ a nɛdɔ̃ɔ wʋn tɩr, "'Yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʋ sãa nɩ a fʋ ma,
an ɩn vɩla kʋ fʋ, a fʋ wõ nʋ̃ɔ kor ka a wɛr pɔ."
Sãamɩne yɩ taa maala a yɩ bibiir ka ba nyɛrɛ suur ɛ, tɩ yɩ guolo ba, na yɩ jãna ba, wile nɩ ba a ala na yi a sɩ Soro sɛ̃.
Gbãgbaar yɩ wõnõ a yɩ sorbo toor na yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ba tɩ joro ba nɩ a yɩ pʋpɛl nɩtãa lɛ yɩn wõnõ a Kɩrɩsɩto toor.
Yɩ wõnõ a ba toor ka a ta ɩ ban fur nɩbir 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ir nyãa 'yɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ yɩn ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto gbãgbaar na yɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ.
Yɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ pʋpɛl fɩka a sɩ Soro Yesu yɩn tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ, a ta ɩ nɩsaal lɛ ɛ.
Bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a sɩ Soro na yab ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa lɛ wʋn tʋ̃ a vɩla jɩ̃, ka gbãgbaa lɛ wʋ ɩ bɩɩ waa ɩ gbãgbaa ɛ.
A yɩn sorbo, yɩ mɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ nɛ kʋrɔ a yɩ gbãgbaar. Yɩ ta pirpire ba ɛ, na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka a 'lɔ na ɩ a ba Soro mɩ lɛ ɩ a yɩ Soro na wʋ be a saaju, 'lɔ lɛ ba turo nʋ̃nɔ̃ ɛ.
A baaraa lɛ ɩka yɩ kpɛ̃mɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩ a wʋ tʋ̃ɔfʋ kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ.
Yɩ de a Nãaŋmɩn tãjɛbonsɩ a jaa su na yɩ tʋ̃ɔ ara jɛb a tɩɩ nɛbɛr.
Bojũu a ba ɩ sɩn nɩ nɩsaal lɛ jɛɛrɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ jɛɛrɛ nɩ naa a sɩɩr tʋ̃ɔfʋ dẽme, nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme, nɩ a wɛr nyã libe kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme, nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ ala na be a saaju.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ de a Nãaŋmɩn tãjɛbonsɩ a jaa su, ka a bɩbir bier 'lɔ wa vɩɛ, ka yɩ ba gbɛr, na yɩ tʋ̃ɔ jɛb a jɛɛr baar tɩ na yɩ chɛnɛ ara.
Yɩ pãa ara kpɛ̃ɔ, na yɩ de a yelmɩ̃ɛ ka wʋ ɩ a sɩɛ gãn a yɩ sɛ, na yɩ de torfʋ ka wʋ ɩ a nyãa wɩɛ,
na yɩ 'mi'mine a nyã'maar 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ 'yɛrfʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a ɩ a yɩ gbɛɛ nafɔɔr.
A 'lɔ na pʋɔ a jaa pɔ nɩ nyã ɩka, yɩ de a yɩ bʋ̃piiraa na ɩ a yɩ sɔɔfʋ na yɩ tʋ̃ɔ de kpĩin a dɛɛr sʋɔ pĩme na 'lɩrɛ.
Yɩ de a kur jupil su, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a yɩ faafʋ, nɩ a sɔkpɛ̃ɛ na yi a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɛ̃, na wʋ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr.
Na yɩ sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn lɛ a wʋ Sɩɛ na wiil yɩ sɔ̃ɔ jaa, nɩ sʋɔrfʋ jaa bʋrɔ. Yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir jʋrɔ na yɩ sʋɔrɔ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ a wʋ nɩbɛ ba jaa.
Yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ ma, ka maa wa haara a nɛɛ, ka Nãaŋmɩn kʋ ma a wʋ 'yɛrbie ka n taa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩ na n 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã yelsɔɔlaa.
A Yesu 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã ɩn ara kʋ jũu lɛ so, ka ba 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ. Yɩ sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ ma ka n taa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩ 'yɛrɛ a lɛ na sɛɛ.
Tɩchɩkusɩ na ɩ a yɛbɛ nʋ̃ naa na wʋ tara yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a sɩ Soro tʋ̃mɔ̃. Wʋn man yele jaa kʋ yɩ, ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ɩn be nɩ a lɛ ɩn ma maala.
A anyãna jũu lɛ n tʋ̃n wʋ a yɩ sɛ̃, ka yɩn bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ sɩn be tɩ na wʋ mɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn.
Nyã'maar wʋ be a yɩn na ɩ a yɛɛr sɛ̃, nɩ nʋ̃fʋ lɔ̃ɔn sɔɔfʋ na yi a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃.
Wɩ̃ɛfʋ wʋ be a bala jaa na nʋ̃ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃ nɩ nʋ̃fʋ 'lɔ na ba baaraa ɛ.
Maa Pɔɔl nɩ Timoti na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ, lɛ sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ be a Filipai, lɔ̃ɔn a pupuorbiir nɩdierbe nɩ a sʋ̃sʋ̃nbɔ.
Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃, a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
N ma puor a n Nãaŋmɩn yãan, maa wa tɩɛr yɩ sɔ̃ɔ jaa.
N ma sʋɔrɔ na Nãaŋmɩn nɩ pʋpɛl kʋrɔ a yɩ jaa a n Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ pɔ,
bojũu yɩ mɩ pʋɔ man mʋɔl a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrbir tɔtaa a bɩbir dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, tɩ tãn a pʋ̃pãanyã.
A nɩtɔ̃ jũu, n tara na sɔɔfʋ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na piel a tʋ̃vɩla a yɩ pɔ, na kãan ka a tɩ baar a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto waa bɩbir.
A tara na sɔr ɩka n tɩɛr a nɩtɔ̃ a yɩ jaa jũu, ɩn tara a yɩ tɩɛr jũu, ka ba lũ man nɩ bɔ̃jɔrsɩ bɩɩ, baa lũ ma ɛ, n chɛnɛ na mana a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɩka a ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ, yɩ jaa lɔ̃ɔ põn ma a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ.
Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ɩ a n dãasɩɛ sʋɔ a lɛ ɩn tara a yɩ tɩɛr fɩka a lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na tara a yɩ tɩɛr.
Maa Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ nɩ nyã ɩka, a yɩ nʋ̃ taa wʋ lɛ pʋɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ jaa, nɩ yɛ̃ nɩ par bɔ̃ɔfʋ.
Yɩn wa ɩrɛ a lɛ, an sʋ̃ʋ yɩ na ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ bon 'lɔ na ɩ bʋ̃sʋ̃, ka a Kɩrɩsɩto waa bɩbir, ka yɩ ɩ chɛchɛ tɩ na yɩ ta tara chɛfʋ jaa ɛ,
na yɩn sɛɛn yeltorsɩ wɔ̃mɔ̃ tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ, ka nɩbɛ pɛɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn yuor tɩɩr.
N yɛɛr, n bʋɔrɔ na ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par ɩka a lɛ na ɩ a n sɛ̃, sʋ̃ʋ ma naa ka n mʋɔl a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrbir.
A lɛ na ɩ jũu, a chaar kʋ a bala na guro a nãa yir nɩ nɩrɛ jaa ɩka, ba 'yɔ̃ɔ ma naa a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto jũu.
A maa ban 'yɔ̃ɔ a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ jũu, a yɛɛr yɔɔ jie na tara sɔɔfʋ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ chɛnɛ na tara ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ mʋɔlɔ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nɩ nyãa ba joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
A ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ ɩka, nɩbɛ bamɩne mʋɔlɔ na a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yele ban tara nɩ ma nyuur nɩ nɛchɩrɛ jũu, tɩchɛ bamɩne 'lɔ, mʋɔlɔ na a Kɩrɩsɩto yele na sʋ̃ʋn ma.
Banyãna lɛ mʋɔlɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto yele yin nʋ̃fʋ pɔ, na ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɩka ba pɔɔ ma naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrbir mʋɔlfʋ jũu.
A bala ɩn de nie 'yɛr a ba 'yɛr na mʋɔl a 'yɛr nɩ nyuur, maal a lɛ ɩka a n dɔɔyɛ wʋ lɛ pʋɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ be a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ.
Tɩchɛ bo lɛ an ɩ? A lɛ na ɩ nɩbijɩɛ lɛ ɩka ba mʋɔl a Yesu yele sɔr jaa pɔ, ka ba sɔɔn ɩka yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ bɩɩ, jire lɛ bɩɩ, a nɩtɔ̃ vɛ̃ naa ka n pʋɔ pɛl. Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa ɩn chɛnɛ na tara pʋpɛl.
Bojũu n bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka tu a yɩ Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ nɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto Sɩɛ sʋ̃ʋfʋ jũu, a lɛ na ɩ a n sɛ̃ ɩn nyɛn faafʋ.
Bon 'lɔ na ɩ ma nɩbijɩɛ nɩ a n tɩɛrtɔ jie lɛ ɩka, vɩ̃ wʋ ta kpɛ ma sɔr jaa pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka n tara ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ ka a Kɩrɩsɩto na nyɛ tɩɩr a n 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a n nyɛvʋr pɔ lɛ, bɩɩ a n kũu pɔ lɛ.
Bojũu maa 'lɔ, maa chɛnɛ nyɛvʋr pɔ, n ben be kʋ a Kɩrɩsɩto, ka maa mɩ kpi, ka a ɩ tɔ̃nɔ̃.
Ala ɩ n chɛnɛ na nyɛvʋr pɔ, ɩn tʋ̃n tʋ̃vɩɛl yɔɔ, tɩchɛ n kaa ir buor? N ba bɔ̃ɔ a 'lɔ ɩn na kaa ir ɛ.
A yelsɩ ayi anyã lũ ma naa, maa bɔfʋ lɛ ɩka n yi a ka tɩ be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃. A lɛ lɛ vɩla,
tɩchɛ a chɛnɛ na fɛr kʋ yɩ, ala ɩ ɩn chɛnɛ na a nyɛvʋr pɔ.
Ɩn be na bɔ̃ɔn a nɩtɔ̃, n bɔ̃ɔn na yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa ɩka ɩn chɛnɛ na be a yɩ jaa sɛ̃ naa sʋ̃nɔ̃ yɩ ka yɩ sɔɔ Nãaŋmɩn, na yɩ tara pʋpɛl a yɩn sɔɔ wʋ jũu.
A lɛ ɩn lɛ lɛ be a yɩ sɛ̃ go, ka a yɩ pʋpɛl yɩn tara a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ pʋɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ jũu.

Yele jaa wa ɩ, yɩ nyɔɔ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ vɩla a lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ na wile. Ka n wan wa nyɛ yɩ bɩɩ, maa ba wa be a yɩ sɛ̃ tɩ wõ a yɩ yele, ɩn bɔ̃ɔn ɩka yɩ ara na kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen, na yɩ tara tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen a sɔɔfʋ nɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ pɔ,
na yɩ ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ nɩ a bala na 'yɛr ɩka a ba ɩ lɛ lɛ ɛ. A nyã ɩn jɩ̃nɛ kʋ ba ɩka ban din dɔɔyɛ, tɩchɛ ka Nãaŋmɩn faa yɩ.
'Lɔ lɛ kʋ yɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ jũu, a ba ɩ a Yesu yɩn sɔɔ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩn lɔ̃ɔn wʋ dire a dɔɔyɛ jũu.
Ka a dɔɔyɛ nyã yɩn be na dire ɩn a dɔɔyɛ 'lɔ yɩn nyɛ ɩn di, nɩ a dɔɔyɛ yɩn be na chɛnɛ wõnõ ɩn dire.
Ala ɩ yɩ tara na ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ, bojũu yɩ ɩn bʋ̃'yen nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto, na yɩ tara ɩ̃gãn 'maar a wʋ nʋ̃fʋ pɔ, na yɩ tara nɛbʋ̃'yen nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na yɩ nyɛ vɩla nɩ nɩbaal,
yɩ pãa vɛ̃n ka a n pʋpɛl sɛɛ, yɩn tara tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen, na yɩ tara nʋ̃fʋ bʋ̃'yen, na yɩ tara Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bʋ̃'yen nɩ tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen.
Yɩ ta maal yele 'lɔ na ɩ nyuur yele bɩɩ na yɩ wile yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩbɛ gar a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ ta bʋɔrɔ a wʋ pʋpɛl bonsɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ ala nɩ na pɛlɛ a yɩ taaba pʋʋr.
Yɩ tara a tɩɛr nyã nɩ wʋ ju a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na dɔ̃ɔ tara.
Wʋn sɔɔ jɩ̃taa nɩ Nãaŋmɩn ka ba ɩ bʋ̃'yen, tɩchɛ waa de a jɩ̃taa nyã mana nɩ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, wʋ den bar,
tɩchɛ na wʋ siir wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, na wʋ maal wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃, ka ba dɔɔ wʋ ka wʋ tara nɩsaal ɩ̃gãn, na wʋ ɩ nɩsaal.
Wʋ siir wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩsaal kaar tu a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ kpin a daa ju.
A lɛ jũu, Nãaŋmɩn 'mɔɔ wʋn ka wʋ do gar bon jaa, na wʋ kʋ wʋ yuor na gar a yoe a jaa.
Nãaŋmɩn maal a nɩtɔ̃ ka a Yesu yuor jũu, gbɛdumo jaa na gbur naa a saaju nɩ a wɛr pɔ, nɩ a tẽe par,
ka a jãlbie a jaa 'yɛr ɩka, Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ ɩ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn yuor tɩɩr.

A lɛ jũu, n yɛɛr, nɩtãa a lɛ jaa yɩn ma sɔɔ ma, a ba ɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn maa wa be a yɩ jie tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ sɔɔ ma gar a lɛ ɩn sɔɔ ba be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ. Yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir tʋ̃nɔ̃ a yɩ faafʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ nɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ nɩ mɩrfʋ.
Bojũu yɩn tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃ a lɛ an ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ sʋ̃nɔ̃ yɩ ka yɩ tara ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ na yɩn tʋ̃ a lɛ wʋ̃n bʋɔrɔ.
Yɩ ma maal bon jaa tɩ na yɩ ta ma ɩrɛ gbʋrɔ̃ gbʋrɔ̃ bɩɩ chɩrɛ taa ɛ.
Ka yɩ kʋ̃ tara chɛfʋ nɩ yele jaa ɛ, na yɩ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bibiir banyã na ba tara chɛfʋ jaa ɛ, na yɩ kpɩɛrɛ wɛr nyã pɔ tʋ̃dɛbɛ nɩ yelbe-ɩrbɛ na be na yɩ chaar ŋmɛrbie kaar a wɛr pɔ.
A lɛ yɩn sɔɔ a nyɛvʋr 'yɛr lɛ na sʋ̃ʋ ma ka a Yesu waa bɩbir ka n na tʋ̃ɔ wiil a n mɩ̃ɛ ɩka n ba jo pɔrɔ ɛ, bɩɩ a n tʋ̃mɔ̃ ba ɩ pɔrɔ ɛ.
Ala sɔɔ ɩ ɩn din dɔɔyɛ naa pʋɔ a yɩ dɔɔyɛ pɔ yɩn dire yɩn sɔɔ Nãaŋmɩn jũu, n pʋɔ pɛl naa nɩ yɩ jaa.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ mɩ pʋɔ ma ka sɩ chɩlɛ.
Ala ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu wa sɔɔ naa, ɩn tʋ̃n Timoti ka wʋ wa a yɩ sɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ ka n wõ a yɩ yele ka a ɩ̃gãn 'maa ma.
N ba tara nɩrɛ jaa na kaara a wʋ kaar ɛ, ka wʋ na tara a yɩ bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ jaa ɛ.
Ba jaa bʋɔrɔ naa a ba pʋpɛl bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ, na baa bʋɔrɔ ala na pɛlɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pʋɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ Timoti tɩɛr 'lɔ yɩn bɔ̃ɔn fɩka sãa nɩ wʋ bie, wʋ pʋɔ ma naa ka sɩ mʋɔl a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ.
A lɛ jũu, n bʋɔrɔ na ɩka n tʋ̃ wʋ a yɩ sɛ̃, maa wa nyɛ lɛ yelsɩ na ɩrɛ kʋrɔ ma.
N sɔɔ naa ɩka a sɩ Soro na yuon sɔr kʋ ma ka maa mɩ̃ɛ wa nyɛ yɩ fɔɔ jaa.
Bojũu n nyɛn ka a ɩ fɛrfʋ kʋ ma ɩka n tʋ̃ Epafaroditusɩ na ɩ a n yɛbɛ nɩ a n tʋ̃tʋ̃tɔ sʋɔ, na wʋ mɩ dire a n dɔɔyɛ tɔ sʋɔ. Wʋ mɩ ɩn a yɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ yɩn tʋ̃ ka wʋ wa maal a n bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ kʋ ma.
Bojũu wʋ bʋɔrɔ na ɩka wʋ nyɛ yɩ jaa tɩchɛ ka a wʋ pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ jaa, bojũu yɩ wõn an ɔɔrɔ wʋ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ, a ɔɔrɔ wʋn nɩbijɩɛ ka wʋ chɛ bɩ̃lãa naa kpi. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn wa kãan a wʋ nɩbaal, a ba ɩ 'lɔ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ mɩ kãan a n nɩbaal, ka n ta tara pʋsɔ̃ɔ yɔɔ ɛ.
Bojũu maa lɛ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir ɩka n tʋ̃ wʋ a yɩ sɛ̃, ka a yɩ pʋɔ na pɛl ala ɩ yɩ lɛ nyɛ wʋn go, ka a n ɩ̃gãn na 'maa.
Yɩ sɔɔ de wʋ nɩ pʋpɛl a sɩ Soro jũu, na yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nɩbɛ banyã taaba,
bojũu wʋ din dɔɔyɛ a wʋ nyɛvʋr pɔ, na wʋ ta ɩrɛ na kpi a Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃mɔ̃ jũu ɩka wʋ tʋ̃ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ ala yɩn ba tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃ kʋ ma ɛ.
N yɛɛr, a baaraa nɩ nyã ɩka yɩ tara pʋpɛl a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ. A ba ɩ tuo kʋ ma ɩn lɛ sɛɛrɛ a yelsɩ ala nɩ a ju kʋrɔ yɩ go ɛ, an ɩn sʋ̃ʋfʋ kʋ yɩ.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃ nɩ a baar banyãna, ba ɩn yelbe-ɩrbɛ na ba ma ŋmara nɩbɛ yɔɩ pɔrɔ.
Bojũu sɩn lɛ ɩ a yɔŋmarba sɩrɛ jaa, na sɩ puoro a Nãaŋmɩn a Sɩɛ pɔ, na sɩ tara tɩɩr a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, na saa kaara a ɩ̃gãn ɛ.
Maa gba tara na mana na tʋ̃ɔ man tu a ɩ̃gãn pɔ. Ala ɩ nɩrɛ mɩ tara na yelsɩ amɩne na man, ka a lɛ na vɛ̃ ka wʋ tara sɔɔfʋ a ɩ̃gãn pɔ, maa tara na gar wʋ.
Ba ŋmaan a n yʋɔr a ber aniin daar, ka n ɩ a Isɩral nɩrɛ naa ɩ a Benjamin bal nɩrɛ, naa ɩ Heburu, ka ba dɔɔ ma ka ɩ Heburu nɩrɛ. A nɛɛ tufʋ jũu, ka ɩ Farasee.
N dɔ̃ɔn mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir naa gere a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ, a nɛbinãa yeltorsɩ jũu, n ba tara chɛfʋ jaa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a ala a jaa ɩn dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ tɩɛr ɩka a tara na tɔ̃nɔ̃, n wa nyɛn ka a ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa kʋ ma ɛ, a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu.

Bo lɛ gar a nɩtɔ̃, n nyɛn ka bon jaa ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ, maa de man ala na tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ala ɩ n bɔ̃ɔ naa a n Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a tɩɩr sʋɔ. A wʋ jũu lɛ n bar bonsɩ a jaa. A ɩn sɔ̃sɔɔr kʋ ma, ɩn bʋɔrɔ ɩka n bɔ̃ɔ Kɩrɩsɩto,
tɩ naa bʋɔrɔ ɩka n be a wʋ pɔ, naa ta bʋɔrɔ a maa mɩ̃ɛ yeltorsɩ ala na yi a nɛbinãa pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yeltorsɩ ala na yi a Kɩrɩsɩto sɔɔfʋ pɔ. A yeltorsɩ anyã lɛ yi Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ naa ɩ sɔɔfʋ.
N bʋɔrɔ na ɩka n bɔ̃ɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto nɩ a wʋ kũu pɔ lɩɛb irfʋ kpɛ̃ɔ, naa lɔ̃ɔn wʋ di a dɔɔyɛ wa kaara a wʋ kaar a wʋ kũu pɔ,
ka n mɩ wa pʋɔ a bala mɩ na wa lɩɛb ir a kũu pɔ.
A ba ɩ n tara na a anyãna a jaa ɛ, bɩɩ n ɩn chɛchɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ n mʋ̃ɔn nɩbir ɩka n nyɔɔ kpɛ̃ɔ, ka Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ nyɔɔ ma kpɛ̃ɔ.
N yɛɛr, n ba 'yɛr ɩka n nyɔɔn yele jaa baar ɛ. Tɩchɛ yele bʋ̃'yen ɩn ɩ lɛ ɩka, n ĩin a ala na be a puor bar, tɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir tɩɛrɛ a ala na be a niem.
N mʋ̃ɔn nɩbir ɩka n tɩ de a saaju kʋfʋ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔl ma tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A sɩn bala na baa a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pɔ, sɩ mɩ ma tara a bonsɩ a nyãna tɩɛr. Tɩ yɩn wa tɩɛr yelyuo yele jaa pɔ, Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃n ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a yelnyɩnɛ.
Yɩ vɛ̃ ka sɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a bonsɩ anyãna sɩn ben tara.
N yɛɛr, yɩ pʋɔ a yɩ taaba na yɩ turo a lɛ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ maal wiil yɩ, na yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a bala na kpɩɛrɛ a lɛ sɩn wiil yɩ.
Bojũu n dɔ̃ɔ de nie 'yɛr kʋ yɩ, tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã nɩbikʋ̃ɔ pɔ lɛ n 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, bamɩne kpɩɛrɛ na fɩka a Kɩrɩsɩto daa ɩn 'laarfʋ kʋ ba.
A ba baaraa ɩn sɔ̃ɔfʋ, a ba ŋmɩn lɛ ɩ a ba ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ. Ba wile na ba mɩ̃ɛ nɩ yelsɩ ala na ɩ vɩ̃ nɩ ɩfʋ, a ba tɩɛrsɩ ɩn a wɛr nyã ju bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ tɛɛ tɩɛr.
Tɩchɛ sɩn 'lɔ ɩn saaju Nãaŋmɩn bibiir, be lɛ sɩ chɛlɛ a Fafaara na ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ka wʋ na yi wa.
A 'lɔ na tara kpɛ̃ɔ tʋ̃ɔ bon jaa na wʋ pire, wʋn den a kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ lɩɛb a sɩ ɩ̃gãma ka a kaara a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɩɩr ɩ̃gãn kaar.
A lɛ jũu, n yɛɛr yɩn ɩn nʋ̃, naa pãa bʋɔrɔ ɩka n nyɛ yɩ, yɩn lɛ ɩ a n pʋpɛl nɩ a nãa jupil, yɩ ara kpɛ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro pɔ n barmɩne.
N 'maal a Yuodiya nɩ Sɩntachi ɩka ba tara a tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen nyãna a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Ɔ̃ɔ, n mɩ lɛ sʋɔrɔ fʋ naa, n baraa ɩka fʋ sʋ̃ʋ a pɔbɔ banyãna, ba lɔ̃ɔn man di dɔɔyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ mʋɔlfʋ pɔ 'matãan Kɩlɛmɛntɩ, na ɩ a n tʋ̃tʋ̃taaba, a bala yoe na be a nyɛvʋr gãn pɔ.
Yɩ tara pʋpɛl a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃ɔ jaa. N lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ, yɩ tara pʋpɛl.
Vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa nyɛ lɛ yɩn siir a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ jɩ̃. A sɩ Soro waa ta naa.
Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka yele jaa wõnõ yɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yɩ Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ pɔ, yɩ ma puor wʋ yãan, na yɩ vɛ̃ ka Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔ a bon 'lɔ yɩn bʋɔrɔ.
A Nãaŋmɩn nyã'maar na gar a nɩsaal bɔ̃ɔfʋ, na gun a yɩ nyãn, nɩ a yɩ tɩɛrsɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.

N yɛɛr, a baaraa nɩ nyã ɩka bon 'lɔ jaa na ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ, nɩ bon 'lɔ jaa na ɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, nɩ bon 'lɔ jaa na tor, nɩ bon 'lɔ jaa na ɩ chɛchɛ, bon 'lɔ jaa na ɩ nʋ̃fʋ, nɩ bon 'lɔ jaa na ɩ pʋpɛl, ala ɩ bon 'lɔ jaa na ɩ vɩla, nɩ bon 'lɔ jaa na sɛɛn pɛɛfʋ, yɩ tɩɛrɛ a bonsɩ anyãna.
Bon jaa yɩn jãn tɩ na yɩ nyɛ, tɩ na yɩ wõ yi a n sɛ̃, yɩ maala yaa, ka a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ nyã'maar sʋɔ, na ben a yɩ sɛ̃.
N tara na pʋpɛl a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩ yɩn wiil ɩka yɩ chɛnɛ na tara a n tɩɛr. Yelmɩ̃ɛ yɩ dɔ̃ɔ tara a n tɩɛr tɩ na yaa tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ sɔr wiil ɛ.
N ba 'yɛrɛ wile ɩka n bʋɔrɔ na bon jaa ɛ, bojũu n dɔ̃ɔ jãn lɛ ɩn na tara bon ka wʋ sɛɛn ma.

N bɔ̃ɔn lɛ an sɛɛ ɩka nɩrɛ wʋ tara jaa pʋʋrbile, naa lɛ bɔ̃ɔ lɛ an sɛɛ ɩka nɩrɛ wʋ tara yɔɔ. A yelsɔɔlaa nyãna lɛ n jãn naa guolo nɩ a n mɩ̃ɛ, ka kɔ̃ kpɛ man bɩɩ, ka n tara na na di bɩɩ, ka bɩ̃lãa gba lɛ n tara na di, ka n tara na yɔɔ bɩɩ, n ba tara bon jaa ɛ.
Ɩn tʋ̃ɔ ɩ a anyãna a jaa tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na kʋ ma a kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ maal vɩla, yɩn sʋ̃ʋ ma a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn dire a dɔɔyɛ.
Yɩn Filipai nɩbɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa yɩn sɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa ɩn yi a Masedonɩya, pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba kʋ ma bon ɛ, ka yɩn tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ gba ɩn be a Tɛsalonika, yɩ sʋ̃ʋ man nɩ a n bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ gar gbɛbʋ̃'yen.
A ba ɩ tɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ n bʋɔrɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ n bʋɔrɔ na ɩka yɩ nyɛ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn wʋ yab yɩ na wʋ sʋ̃ʋ yɩ.

N nyɛn a n sãyar yɔɔ, naa gba nyɛ tɩ põn bar ka a sɛɛn ma, pʋ̃pãanyã n nũu kpɛ naa a kʋfʋ ala yɩn tʋ̃n a Epafaroditusɩ ka wʋ wa kʋ ma, ka a yɩ kʋfʋ anyãna kaar fɩka a bɔɔrlo bomo ala na nyuro nʋ̃ɔ naa pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ.
A n Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ yɩn a yɩ bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ a jaa tu a wʋ tɩɩr nãbonsɩ ala na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn wʋ nyɛrɛ tɩɩr bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
Yɩ puor a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ba jaa na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ. A n yɛɛr na be a ka mɩ puoro yɩ naa.
A Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ mɩ ba jaa puoro yɩ naa, ka a bala mɩ na be a nãkpɛ̃ɛ Siisa yir mɩ puoro yɩ.
A sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ a be a yɩ sɩɩr pɔ. A ɩ a lɛ.
Maa Pɔɔl na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nãa an ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ pɔ nɩ Timoti na ɩ a sɩ yɛbɛ,
sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ nɩ a yɛɛr na tara a sɔɔfʋ a Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ na be a Kolose. Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Sɩ ma puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan na ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto Sãa, sɩn wa sʋɔrɔ kʋrɔ yɩ,
bojũu sɩ wõn a yɩ sɔɔfʋ yɩn tara a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩ a nʋ̃fʋ 'lɔ yɩn tara kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ba jaa.
A yɩ sɔɔfʋ nɩ a nʋ̃fʋ na yi a tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie na gã gu yɩ be a saaju a 'lɔ yɩn de nie wõ, a yelmɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr na ɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ
'lɔ na wa a yɩ sɛ̃. A wɛr wʋ jaa, a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã wɔ̃nɔ̃ na wɔ̃mɔ̃ na a nʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩtãa lɛ an ben ɩrɛ a yɩ pɔ, an yi a bɩbir 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ daar jaa yɩn wõ naa na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ par a yelmɩ̃ɛ pɔ.
Yɩ jãn a nyã yin Epafaras sɛ̃ na ɩ a sɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃tɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ. Wʋ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ na de a sɩ jie mʋɔlɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr.
'Lɔ lɛ wa man kʋ sɩ a nʋ̃fʋ 'lɔ yɩn tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ pɔ.
A lɛ jũu, an yi a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa sɩn wõ naa, saa dɔ̃ɔ gal ɩka sɩ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʋ yɩ ɛ, na sɩ sʋɔrɔ ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn wʋ pʋɔ yɩ a wʋ bɔfʋ yɛ̃, a sɩɛ pɔ yɛ̃, a jaa nɩ par bɔ̃ɔfʋ.
A sɩ sʋɔrfʋ lɛ ɩka, a yɩ befʋ a vɩɛlɛ kʋ a sɩ Soro, ka a pɛlɛ a wʋ pʋɔ, na yɩ wɔ̃nɔ̃ bisʋ̃n tʋ̃vɩla jaa pɔ, na yɩ baa a Nãaŋmɩn yɛ̃ pɔ.
Sɩ mɩ ma sʋɔrɔ na ɩka Nãaŋmɩn wʋ maal yɩ ka yɩ kpɛ̃mɛ nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn ala a jaa na yi a wʋ tɩɩr kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ, na yɩ nyɔɔrɔ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ tara kãnyir yele jaa pɔ, nɩ pʋpɛl.
Na yɩ ma dãna a Sãa, 'lɔ lɛ kaa a yɩ sɛɛ, ka yɩ na põ a Nãaŋmɩn nãbonsɩ nɩ a wʋ nɩbɛ a chãa pɔ.
Bojũu 'lɔ lɛ faa sɩ yin a libe kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ, na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ a wʋ Binʋ̃nãa nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ.
A wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩ nyɛ faafʋ, na sɩ nyɛ yelbier vɛ̃ kʋfʋ.
A Yesu na wa tɩ wa a wɛr ju, 'lɔ lɛ wiil sɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã sɩn ba nyɛrɛ nɩ a nɩbir ɛ, a lɛ wʋn be. 'Lɔ lɛ tara kpɛ̃ɔ a bonsɩ a jaa pɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na maal.

Bojũu a wʋ pɔ lɛ a bonsɩ a jaa na be a saaju, nɩ a ala na be ka a wɛr pɔ maal, ala sɩn nyɛrɛ, nɩ a ala sɩn ba nyɛrɛ ɛ, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na tara kpɛ̃ɔ ɩ a tʋ̃ɔfʋ sʋɔ, nɩ a malakasɩ ala gba na tara kpɛ̃ɔ, nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn bonsɩ, a jaa maal tu a wʋ pɔ, ka a ɩ a wʋ sofʋ.
A 'lɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ a bonsɩ a jaa be be, a wʋ pɔ lɛ a bonsɩ a jaa 'mataa.
'Lɔ mɩ lɛ ɩ a ɩ̃gãn ju sʋɔ, a pupuorbiir. 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ a pielfʋ, nɩ a bidɔ̃ɔ na wʋ de nie ir a kũu pɔ, na waa lɛ kpi go ɛ, ka yele jaa pɔ, ka wʋ ɩ a ju sʋɔ.
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ pɛl wʋ naa ka wʋ befʋ wʋ jaa be a wʋ pɔ.
A tun a wʋ pɔ, ka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ 'maal a bonsɩ a jaa kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, ka a ala na be a saaju bɩɩ a ala na be ka a wɛr pɔ. Wʋ maal ka nyã'maar be be, nɩ a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ a daa ju wʋn kpi.
Yɩ dɔ̃ɔ jãan a Nãaŋmɩn na yɩ ɩ a wʋ dɔ̃dẽme, a yɩ yeldɛbɛ ɩfʋ jũu.
Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã, wʋ 'maal yɩn tun a Kɩrɩsɩto na wa ɩ nɩsaal na wʋ kpi. Nãaŋmɩn maal a nɩtɔ̃ ka yɩ ɩ chɛchɛ a wʋ sɛ̃, na yɩ kʋ tara chɛfʋ jaa ɛ, bɩɩ tara 'yɛr dɔɔl ɛ,
ala ɩ yɩ chɛnɛ na ba gbɛr a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ, na yɩ taa tɔɔ yi a tɩɛrtɔ 'lɔ na ɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã yɩn wõ ɛ. A 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã lɛ yɩ wõ ban mʋɔl kʋ nɩrɛ jaa ka a wɛr ju. Ala lɛ a maa Pɔɔl ɩ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, n pãa chɩlɛ naa a n dɔɔyɛ ɩn di a yɩ jũu, naa na di a dɔɔyɛ ala a jaa a Kɩrɩsɩto na bʋɔrɔ ɩka n di kʋ a wʋ ɩ̃gãn na ɩ a pupuorbiir jũu.
Nãaŋmɩn maal man ka n ɩ a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋ a pupuorbiir naa na man a wʋ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ jaa nɛ nɛ nɛ kʋ yɩ.
A yele nyãna lɛ sɔɔl a kõro jaa a sãakpãmɩne sɔ̃ɔ, tɩchɛ ka a pãa yi chãa pɔ a wʋ nɩbɛ sɛ̃.
Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kaa ir ɩka wʋ vɛ̃ ka a wʋ nɩbɛ bɔ̃ɔn sɩrɛ jaa a lɛ wʋ tara a tɩɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ ba jaa, ɩka a Kɩrɩsɩto ben a yɩ pɔ, na ɩ a tɩɩr tɩɛrtɔ jie.
A Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ sɩ mʋɔlɔ, na sɩ kpãana nɩrɛ jaa wile nɩ nɩrɛ jaa nɩ yɛ̃ jaa bʋrɔ, ka sɩ na de nɩrɛ jaa kʋ wʋ ka wʋ ɩ chɛchɛ.
A nyã jũu lɛ n tʋ̃nɔ̃ hãna dire dɔɔyɛ nɩ a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ wʋ jaa wʋn tʋ̃nɔ̃ tun a n 'yɔ̃ɔ.
N bʋɔrɔ na ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ ɩn mʋɔrɔ a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩ a bala na be a Laodisea, nɩ a bala jaa na ba nyɛ a maa mɩ̃ɛ nɩ nɩbir ɛ.
Maa bɔfʋ lɛ ɩka yɩ tara ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn a yɩ nyãn pɔ, na yɩ ɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen nʋ̃ taa, ka a lɛ na vɛ̃ ka yɩ tara par bɔ̃ɔfʋ yɔɔ jaa a nãbonsɩ a jaa pɔ, na yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yelsɔɔlsɩ, na ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto.
A wʋ pɔ lɛ a nãbonsɩ, nɩ a yɛ̃, nɩ a bɔ̃ɔfʋ a jaa sɔɔl.
N 'yɛrɛ na a nɩtɔ̃ kʋrɔ yɩ ka nɩrɛ jaa taa wa bɛl yɩ nɩ nɛchɩrɛ 'yɛr na nyɛtãan yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
An sɔɔ ɩ a maa mɩ̃ɛ na ba be a yɩ sɛ̃ gba ɛ, tɩchɛ n tara na a yɩ tɩɛr. N chɩlɛ na bʋɔrɔ ɩka n nyɛ a lɛ yɩn tara nɛbʋ̃'yen nɩ a lɛ a yɩ sɔɔfʋ na kpɛ̃mɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩn de a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ka wʋ ɩ a Soro, yɩ chɛnɛ be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Yɩ ba nyɩbɛ na yɩ baa a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, na yɩ nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ̃mɛ a sɔɔfʋ pɔ, fɩka a lɛ ban dɔ̃ɔ wiil yɩ, na yɩ ma puor wʋ yãan sɔ̃ɔ jaa.
Yɩ kaara sʋ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa ta wa de yɩ ka yɩ ɩ gbãgbaar tu a bɛlfʋ ala na ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ ɛ, nɩ nɩsaal yɛ̃ ɛ, na ɩ a ala na kaara a wɛr nyã ju ban taa kaara a Kɩrɩsɩto wiilfʋ.
A Nãaŋmɩn befʋ wʋ jaa ben a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Yɩ sɛɛ naa bojũu yɩ sɔɔn a Kɩrɩsɩto, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ tʋ̃ɔfʋ dẽme nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme ba jaa ju sʋɔ.
A wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ba mɩ ŋma yɩn a yɔɩ ka a yelbier 'lɔ na yi a yɩ pɔ, a ba ɩ yuor ŋmaafʋ 'lɔ nɩsaal na de wʋ nũu ŋmaan ɛ, tɩchɛ yʋɔr ŋmaafʋ 'lɔ Kɩrɩsɩto na ŋmaa.
Ban dɔ̃ɔ so yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ, ba ũu yɩn a Kɩrɩsɩto kaar, ka yɩ ir a kũu pɔ fɩka a Kɩrɩsɩto, bojũu yɩ sɔɔn de a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na sɩ̃ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto a kũu pɔ, na tara kpɛ̃ɔ.

Tɩchɛ a yɩn bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, sɛrɛ tɩ yɩ wa sɔɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto, yɩ dɔ̃ɔ kpi a yɩ sɩɩr pɔ, bojũu yɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ yelbe-ɩrbɛ, na yɩ jãan Nãaŋmɩn, bojũu yɩ sɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn nɛbinsɩ. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn kʋ yɩn a nyɛvʋr paalaa a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, na wʋ vɛ̃ kʋ yɩ.
Nãaŋmɩn fɔfɔn a sɩ yelbebe ala na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb bin bar. Ala lɛ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr 'yɛr dɔɔl sɩ. Ala lɛ dɔ̃ɔ fɩrɛ sɩ na a ŋmaa sɩ yin, wʋ den bar na wʋ kpa yaa a daa ju.
Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃ɔn a sɩdɛbɛ nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme, na wʋ maal ba ka a ɩ dãasɩɛ nɩyɔɔ jaa niem. Wʋ tʋ̃ɔ ba naa nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto daa ju kũu.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa tɔɔr a yɩ 'yɛr nɩ bon 'lɔ yɩn dire bɩɩ nyuro ɛ, bɩɩ tun a Juu nɩbɛ lɔ̃ɔ difʋ pɔ ɛ, bɩɩ Chuu Paalaa Dɩ̃ɛn pɔ ɛ, bɩɩ a Pɛ̃nfʋ Bɩbir Daar ɛ.
A anyã ɩ naa a yelsɩ ala nɩ taa dɔ̃ɔ wa gãagiel, tɩchɛ a yelmɩ̃ɛ ben a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.

Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa kpãkpãan yɩ nɩ jir 'yɛr ɩka, yɩ siir a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ na yɩ puoro a malakasɩ ɛ, a lɛ na vɛ̃ naa ka yɩ kʋ̃ nyɛ a sãyar ɛ. A nɩrɛ nyã tɔ sʋɔ ma vɩɛr kpɛ a yele pɔ tɩɛr ɩka wʋ tara na kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ a ala wʋn nyɛ. A wʋ yelbier tɩɛr ma vɛ̃n ka wʋ wile wʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
A nɩrɛ nyã ba nyɔɔ a 'lɔ na ɩ a ju ɛ. Nɩtãa a lɛ a ju na ma wile a ɩ̃gãn, ka a jile nʋ̃ɔ nyɔɔ a ɩ̃gãn 'mataa a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ.
An ɩ yɩn nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ 'mataa kpi, a wɛr nyã ju kpɩ̃ɛn bonsɩ, ba lɛ tara kpɛ̃ɔ a yɩ ju ɛ. Ŋmɩnɛ ka a yɩ kpɛfʋ chɛnɛ kaara fɩka yɩ chɛnɛ na ɩ a wɛr sofʋ?
Ta nyɔɔ bon nyã ɛ! Ta lɛm bon nyã kaa ɛ! Ta sɩɩr bon nyã kaa ɛ!
A nɛɛr anyãna a jaa tufʋ ɩn yelsɩ na ba lɛ tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ jaa ɛ, bojũu a ɩn nɩsaal nɛbinsɩ nɩ nɩsaal wiilfʋsɩ lɛ.
A nɛbinsɩ anyãna nyɛntãan fɩka yɛ̃ yele na ɩ a ba mɩ̃ɛ puorfʋ yele nɩ mɩ̃ɛ siirfʋ yele nɩ nɩbikõo ɩ̃gãn kaafʋ yele. Tɩchɛ a anyãna maa sʋ̃ʋ ba ka ba tʋ̃ɔ nyɔɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ a yelbier vɔlaa pɔ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, an ɩ yɩn nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'mataa sɩ̃ɩn a kũu pɔ, yɩ de a yɩ tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a bonsɩ ala na be a saaju, be a Kɩrɩsɩto na jɩ̃nɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nũsʋ̃ɔ jie.
Yɩ de a yɩ tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a saaju bonsɩ pɔ, tɩ na yɩ ta de a yɩ tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a wɛr ju bonsɩ pɔ ɛ.
Bojũu yɩ kpi naa, ka a pʋ̃pãanyã ka a yɩ nyɛvʋr sɔɔl a Kɩrɩsɩto a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ.
An ɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ kʋ yɩ a nyɛvʋr paalaa, 'lɔ wa nyɩr, yɩ mɩ na 'mantãan wʋ nyɩr, na yɩ nyɛ a wʋ tɩɩr.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ kʋ a ala na be a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ na ɩ a wɛr yele. A yelsɩ ala lɛ a anyãna, sɛ̃fʋ yele, dɛɛr yele, vɔldɛɛr, tɩɛr dɛɛr, nɩ bɔgar na nyɛtãan tɩbɛ puorfʋ.
A bonsɩ anyãna jũu, Nãaŋmɩn suur ire naa.
A sɔbie anyãna lɛ yɩ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ turo, a lɛ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ a nyɛvʋr 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ.
Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã, yɩ tɔɔ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin a yelsɩ anyãna pɔ, suur, putuyele, gefʋ, gagar yele, nɩ 'yɛrbidɛbɛ na ma yire a yɩ nɛgãma pɔ.
Yɩ ta ŋmara jirsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa ɛ. Yɩ ta maala a lɛ go ɛ, yɩ yaa a kõro yele nɩ a wʋ maalfʋsɩ bar,
tɩ na yɩ su a pʋ̃pãanyã yelpaalaa. Nãaŋmɩn maal yɩn ka yɩ ɩ nɩpaalaa, na wʋ maala yɩ, ka yɩ na kaara a wʋ kaar, ka yɩ na bɔ̃ɔ wʋ yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa.

Bamɩne ba lɛ chɛnɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ bɩɩ ka bamɩne mɩ ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka bamɩne ŋma yɔɩ bɩɩ ka bamɩne mɩ ba ŋma ɛ, ka bamɩne ɩ sãanba bɩɩ ka bamɩne mɩ ɩ nɩyʋɔrsɩ ɛ, ka bamɩne ɩ gbãgbaar bɩɩ ka bamɩne mɩ ɩ sumɩne ɛ, tɩchɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ ɩ a jaa na wʋ be a jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A lɛ jũu, an ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kaa ir yɩ, ka yɩ ɩ chɛchɛ na wʋ nʋ̃ yɩ, yɩ pɔɔ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ nɩbaal, vɩla maalfʋ, mɩ̃ɛ siirfʋ, jomm ɩfʋ nɩ kãnyir.
Yɩ ma tara kãnyir kʋ taa, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa tara nɩ a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ 'yɛr, yɩ ma vɛ̃ kʋ taa. Yɩ vɛ̃ bar nɩtãa a lɛ a sɩ Soro na ma vɛ̃ bar yɩ.
A yelkpɛ̃ɛ jaa lɛ ɩka, yɩ de nʋ̃fʋ su. 'Lɔ lɛ ma nyɔɔ bonsɩ a jaa 'mataa ka a tara nɛbʋ̃'yen.
Yɩ vɛ̃ ka a Kɩrɩsɩto nyã'maar pire a yɩ nyãn, yɩ jaa pʋɔn a ɩ̃gãn jiir pɔ, na wʋ bʋɔl yɩ ka yɩ tara nyã'maar. Yɩ ma puor wʋ yãan.
Yɩ vɛ̃ ka a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛrbir di nãa a yɩ pɔ, yɩn wa wile tɩ kpãana taa, nɩ a yɛ̃ wʋ jaa. Yɩ ma yiele Nãaŋmɩn pɛɛfʋ yiel, pʋpɛl yiel, nɩ a yiel na yi a yɩ nyãn pɔ, na yɩ kʋrɔ Nãaŋmɩn.
Bon 'lɔ jaa yɩn wa maala, ka 'yɛrbir lɛ bɩɩ, ka maalfʋ pɔ lɛ, yɩ ma maal bon jaa, nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor, na yɩ ma tu a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ puor a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn yãan.
Pɔbɔ, yɩ siir a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a yɩ sɩrbɛ, lɛ lɛ vɩɛlɛ kʋ a sɩ Soro.
Sɩrbɛ, yɩ nʋ̃ a yɩ pɔbɔ, na yɩ ta ma pirpire ba ɛ.
Bibiir, yɩ wõnõ a yɩ dɔɔrbɔ toor yele jaa pɔ, lɛ lɛ pɛlɛ a sɩ Soro pʋɔ.
Sãamɩne, yɩ ta ma maala ka a yɩ bibiir suur ire ɛ, a lɛ a ba tɩɛr kʋ̃ gã jibʋ̃'yen ɛ.
Gbãgbaar, yɩ sɔɔrɔ a yɩ nɩbɛrɛ nɛɛ yele jaa pɔ. Yɩ ta ma vɛ̃ ka ba wa fur nɩbir yɔ̃ɔ yɩ, ka yɩ pãa maala a lɛ ban bʋɔrɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ir a yɩ nyãa wʋ jaa 'yɔ̃ɔ, yɩn joro a sɩ Soro dãbɩ̃ɛ jũu.
Bon jaa yɩn wa maala, yɩ ir a yɩ nyãa 'yɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ ka a kaara fɩka a sɩ Soro lɛ yɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ, tɩchɛ a ta ɩ fɩka nɩsaal lɛ yɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ ɛ.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka yɩn tɩ den a yɩ nãbonsɩ a sɩ Soro sɛ̃ na ɩ a yɩ sãyar. A sɩ Soro Kɩrɩsɩto lɛ yɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ.
Nɩrɛ jaa wa maal yelbier, a yelbier sãyar lɛ wʋn tɩ nyɛ. Nãaŋmɩn ba turo nɩbɛ nʋ̃nɔ̃ ɛ.
Nɩbɛrɛ, yɩ ma kʋrɔ a yɩ gbãgbaar a lɛ na tor na a sɛɛn, bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka yɩ mɩ tara na nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na be a saaju.
Yɩ de a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ pɔ. Yɩ kaara sʋ̃ na yɩ ma puor wʋ yãan.
Na yɩ mɩ ma sʋɔrɔ kʋrɔ sɩ ka Nãaŋmɩn na yuo sɔr kʋ a sɩ mʋɔlfʋ ka sɩ na mʋɔl a Kɩrɩsɩto yelsɔɔlsɩ. A 'lɔ pɔ lɛ ba 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ.
Yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka n na mʋɔl jaa chɛ chɛ chɛ a lɛ an sɛɛn.
Yɩ ɩ yɛ̃n dẽme nɩ a lɛ yɩn maala a bala na ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo sɛ̃. Yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir, yɩn wa nyɛ jie.
Yɩ ma vɛ̃ ka a yɩ bʋʋr ma ɩ wɩ̃ɛfʋ 'yɛrbie tɩ nʋ̃mɔ̃ nyaar kaar. Ka yɩ na bɔ̃ɔ lɛ yɩn na 'yɛr sɔɔ nɩrɛ 'lɔ wa sʋʋr yɩ 'yɛr.
Tɩchɩkusɩ na man a maa 'yɛr a jaa kʋ yɩ. Wʋ ɩn a yɛbɛ ɩn nʋ̃ na wʋ mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ. Na wʋ ɩ a tʋ̃tʋ̃tɔ sʋɔ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ.
N tʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ naa a yɩ sɛ̃ ɩka wʋ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ yɩ a lɛ sɩn ɩrɛ a ka, na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩ nyãn ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn.
'Lɔ nɩ Onɩsɩmɔsɩ lɛ 'mataa waara. Wʋ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ na wʋ ɩ a yɛbɛ sɩn nʋ̃. Wʋ ɩn a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ. Ban man kʋ yɩ bon jaa na ɩrɛ a ka.
Aristakus mɩ ban 'mataa pɔɔn ma puoro yɩ naa, lɛ lɛ a Maakɩ mɩ na ɩ a Banabasɩ yɛbɛ mɩ puoro yɩ. Yɩ dɔ̃ɔ wõ a wʋ kpãafʋ yele, ala ɩ wʋ wa wan a yɩ sɛ̃, yɩ tuor de wʋ.
Yesu mɩ ban bʋɔlɔ Jusɩtusɩ mɩ puoro yɩ naa. A nɩbɛ banyãna tɛɛ lɛ ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ a n tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ pɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ jũu. Ba tara na ɩ̃gãn 'maar kʋ ma.
Epafaras na ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ na wʋ ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃, puoro yɩ naa. Wʋ ma sʋɔrɔ na Nãaŋmɩn nɩbijɩɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ka yɩ na ara kpɛ̃ɔ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ.
N din a wʋ dãasɩɛ ɩka wʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ na kʋrɔ yɩ nɩ a bala na be a Laodisea nɩ a Hɩrapolis tẽn pɔ.
A sɩ yɛbɛ sɩn nʋ̃, Luka na ɩ a tɩtɩlɛ nɩ Demas puoro yɩ naa.
Puor Nɩmfa nɩ a pupuorbiir bala na ma tuor a wʋ yir na be a Laodisea.
Bala wa kar a gãn nyãna kʋ a yɩn Kolose dẽme, yɩ mɔ̃ ka ba mɩ kar wʋ be a Laodisea pupuorbiir pɔ. Yɩ mɔ̃ na yɩ mɩ kar a gãn 'lɔ ɩn sɛb kʋ a Laodisea pupuorbiir.
'Yɛr kʋ Archipus, "Mɔ̃ tɩ na fʋ baa baar a tʋ̃mɔ̃ ala fʋn nyɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ."
Maa Pɔɔl lɛ sɛɛrɛ a puorfʋ nyã nɩ a maa mɩ̃ɛ nũu. Yɩ tɩɛr a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ ban 'yɔ̃ɔ ma. Wɩ̃ɛfʋ a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Pɔɔl, Silasɩ nɩ Timoti lɛ sɛɛrɛ a gãn nyã kʋrɔ Tɛsalonika pupuorbiir na be a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ. Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar wʋ be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Sɩ ma puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan sɔ̃ɔ jaa kʋ yɩ, tɩ ma tara a yɩ tɩɛr a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ pɔ.
Sɔ̃ɔ jaa lɛ sɩ ma tɩɛr a yɩ sɔɔfʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃, a yɩ nʋ̃fʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ nɩ a kãnyir yɩn tara chɛlɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩ a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn.
Bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka, n yɛɛr a yɩn a Nãaŋmɩn na nʋ̃, 'lɔ lɛ kaa ir yɩ.
Bojũu a sɩ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ na wa a yɩ sɛ̃, ba ɩ 'yɛrbir tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ tara na kpɛ̃ɔ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ba ɩ baal ɛ. Yɩ mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn a lɛ sɩn be a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn dɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ nɩ yɩ a yɩ jũu.
Yɩ ɩ naa a sɩn nɩ a Soro tɔtɔɔrbɔ, bojũu dɔɔyɛ kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ lɛ yɩ tu tɩ de a 'yɛrbie nɩ pʋpɛl a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na tɩr,
lɛ lɛ, yɩn ɩ bʋ̃mansɩ kʋ a bala na sɔɔ de a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ be a Masedonɩya nɩ a Akaya tẽn pɔ.
Yɩn lɛ yaar a sɩ Soro 'yɛrbie, a ba ɩ a Masedonɩya nɩ a Akaya tẽn pɔ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yaar jie jaa. A lɛ yɩn sɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yaar jie jaa.
Ba mɩ̃ɛ lɛ man a lɛ yɩn tuor de sɩ, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn wa a yɩ sɛ̃, nɩ a lɛ yɩn lɩɛb wa a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, tɩ bar a tɩbɛ tɩ wa puoro a nyɛvʋr nɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ Nãaŋmɩn,
tɩ chɛlɛ a wʋ Bie ka wʋ yi saaju wa, a 'lɔ wʋn vɛ̃ ka wʋ lɩɛb ir a kũu pɔ, Yesu a 'lɔ na faa sɩ yɩn a Nãaŋmɩn suur 'lɔ na waara pɔ.
N yɛɛr, yɩn mɩ̃ɛ jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a yɩ sɛ̃ waa ba ɩ pɔrɔ ɛ,
sɩn gba na dɔ̃ɔ di dɔɔyɛ a ba ge sɩ be a Filipai tẽe pɔ, nɩtãa yɩn mɩ̃ɛ na bɔ̃ɔn, tɩchɛ sɩ chɛnɛ na tara nyãa a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn pɔ, tɩ man a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ jaa chɛchɛ kʋ yɩ, an sɔɔ ɩ baa sɔɔ de a 'yɛr ɛ.
Bojũu a sɩ sʋɔrfʋ ba yi jir, bɛlfʋ nɩ tɩɛr dɛɛr pɔ ɛ,
tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kaa ir sɩ ka sɩ ɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ wiwiilbe. A lɛ jũu lɛ sɩ 'yɛr ɩka, a ba ɩ ka sɩ pɛl nɩsaal pʋɔ ɛ, tɩ sɩ pɛl Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ, a 'lɔ na ma kaara a sɩ pʋtɩɛr.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn na ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ɩ a sɩ dãasɩɛ sʋɔ, saa dɔ̃ɔ wa 'yɛr jir 'yɛr bɩɩ ŋmaa jir nyɛ bon ɛ.
Saa bʋɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩsaal sɛ̃ ɛ, a yɩn mɩ̃ɛ sɛ̃n bɩɩ a sɩ taaba sɛ̃ ɛ, bɩɩ bʋɔrɔ bonsɩ sɩn ɩ Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nsɩ jũu ɛ,
tɩchɛ sɩ siir a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ a yɩ pɔ, lɛ pɔɔ na ma kaara a wʋ bibiir.
A lɛ jũu, yɩn kaara sɩ lɛ so ka saa bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ põn yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ tɛɛ ɛ, na sɩ lɔ̃ɔn a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ jaa bojũu a sɩ nʋ̃fʋ ben a yɩ sɛ̃ yɔɔ jaa.
Sɩrɛ jaa n yɛɛr, yɩ tɩɛr a sɩ kãnyir tʋ̃mɔ̃ nɩ a dɔɔyɛ. Sɩ tʋ̃n tɩ̃sɔɔ gbulo, nɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃gbulo, ka sɩ ta kʋ nɩrɛ jaa tuor ɛ, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋrɔ yɩ ɛ.
Yɩn lɛ di dãasɩɛ, nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn mɩ na ɩ a Chɛchɛ Sʋɔ nɩ nɩtor tɩ ba tara yele jaa a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a sɩ maalfʋ chaar naa a yɩn na ɩ a sɔɔfʋ dẽme.
Bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka sɩ ma maal vɩla kʋ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa lɛ sãa na ma maal vɩla kʋ a wʋ bibiir,
na sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔn yɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn, 'maala yɩ tɩ sʋɔrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩ kpɩɛrɛ a lɛ na pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ, a 'lɔ na bʋɔl yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ tɩɩr pɔ.
Ala lɛ so ka sɩ ma puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan, bojũu yɩ sɔɔn de a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr yɩn wõ a sɩ sɛ̃, yaa sɔɔ de yaa nɩsaal 'yɛr kaar ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ sɔɔn de yaa Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kaar, ka a tʋ̃nɔ̃ a yɩ bala na sɔɔ de pɔ.
Bojũu n yɛɛr, yɩn 'lɔ, yɩ ɩ naa tɔtɔɔrbɔ a Nãaŋmɩn puorbo a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ a Judiya, yɩ din dɔɔyɛ a bonsɩ pɔ, a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yelsɩ pɔ, nɩtãa lɛ ban tʋ̃ kʋ a Juu dẽme,
a bala na kʋ a sɩ Soro Yesu nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ tɩ dii sɩ bar. Ba sɔ̃ɔn Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ tɩ ba sɔɔ nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr ɛ,
tɩ ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ 'yɛrɛ nɩ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, ka ban nyɛ faafʋ ɛ. Ba kpɛ̃n a yeldɛbɛ pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ kɔkɔɛ. Nãaŋmɩn suur ir naa ka wʋn ge ba.
Tɩchɛ n yɛɛr, a kor bɩ̃lãa sɩn ba lɛ nyɛ taa ɛ, tɩchɛ saa vɛ̃ a yɩ tɩɛr ɛ. Sɩ mʋ̃ɔn nɩbir ɩka sɩ nyɛ yɩ, na sɩ bʋɔrɔ ɩka a sɩn mɩ̃ɛ sɩ tɩ nyɛ yɩ.
A la lɛ so ka sɩ ta bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ wa a yɩ sɛ̃, tɩ maa Pɔɔl ta mʋɔrɔ na bʋɔrɔ, tɩchɛ ka Satan pii a sɩ sɔr.
Bo lɛ ɩ a sɩ tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie, bɩɩ a pʋpɛl bɩɩ a nyɛvʋr tɩɩr jupil kʋ sɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu waa daar? A ba ɩ yɩn lɛ ɛ?
Yelmɩ̃ɛ yɩn lɛ ɩ a sɩ tɩɩr nɩ a sɩ pʋpɛl.
Lɛ an wa gar sɩ a sɩ faa tɩ jɩ̃nɛ a be Atensɩ tẽe pɔ.
Sɩ tʋ̃n a sɩ yɛbɛ Timoti mɩ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ ɩ̃sʋɔ na wʋ mʋɔlɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ ɩka wʋ tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ,
a lɛ ka yɩ taa wa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ nɩ a bɛɛr kaa nyã pɔ ɛ. Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a dɔɔyɛ nyã lɛ sɩn di.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ, sɩn dɔ̃ɔ be a yɩ sɛ̃, lɛ lɛ sɩ 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka sɩn din dɔɔyɛ. Ka a lɛ mɩ ɩ.
A lɛ jũu, ɩn kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ lɛ so, ka tʋ̃ nɩrɛ ɩka wʋ tɩ kaa a lɛ a yɩ sɔɔfʋ na be, n dabɩ̃ɛ lɛ ɩka a bɛɛr kaa wʋ taa bɛɛr yɩ kaa, kaa sɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɩ pɔrɔ ɛ.

Tɩchɛ Timoti yin a yɩ sɛ̃ wa 'yɛr a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ sɩ, a lɛ yɩn tara a sɔɔfʋ nɩ a nʋ̃fʋ. Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ sɩ ɩka yɩ ma tara sɩn nɩ tɩɛr vɩla sɔ̃ɔ jaa na yɩ ma bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ nyɛ sɩ nɩtãa lɛ sɩn mɩ na ma bʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ nyɛ yɩ.
N yɛɛr, a lɛ jũu, a pʋsɔ̃ɔ nɩ a bɛɛr kaa anyã pɔ, yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩn ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ tun a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ yɩn tara jũu.
Bojũu pʋ̃pãanyã, sɩ pãa na ben be yɩn ara kpɛ̃ɔ kʋ a sɩ Soro.
Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ sɩn ɩrɛ wa puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan ka a sɛɛ, a pʋpɛl nyã sɩn nyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃?
Tɩ̃sɔɔ nɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ jaa lɛ sɩ ma sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɩka sɩ lɛ nyɛ yɩ go, na sɩ lɛ chɔɔr bon 'lɔ jaa na ba pʋɔ a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ ɛ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, sɩ sʋɔrɔ naa a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu ɩka, ba yuo sɔr ka sɩ lɛ wa nyɛ yɩ.
A sɩ Soro wʋ vɛ̃ ka yɩ waa na yɩ nʋ̃nɔ̃ taa, tɩ na yɩ nʋ̃ nɩrɛ jaa nɩtãa lɛ sɩn nʋ̃ yɩ.
Wʋ vɛ̃ ka yɩ ɩ nɩsʋ̃n na yɩ taa tara dɛɛr jaa a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩ na waan a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ.
N yɛɛr, a baaraa nɩ nyã, sɩ kpãana yɩ naa a lɛ a yɩ kpɛfʋ na tʋ̃ɔ pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ, nɩtãa lɛ yɩn ben kpɩɛrɛ. Pʋ̃pãanyã, sɩ sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa na sɩ kpãkpãana yɩ nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu ɩka yɩ maala a lɛ pʋɔrɔ.
Bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn wiilfʋ 'lɔ sɩn wiil yɩ tun a sɩ Soro Yesu pɔ.
A ɩn Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ lɛ wʋn ir yɩ ka yɩ ɩ nɩtorsɩ. A lɛ jũu, yɩ tɔɔ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin sɛ̃sɛ̃yele pɔ.
Ka nɩrɛ jaa tʋ̃ɔ nyɔɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ vɩla, na wʋ ɩ chɛchɛ tɩ tara 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ,
na yɩ ta bʋɔrɔ pʋpɛl bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ fɩka a nɩbɛ bala na ba bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa wʋ ta maal dɛɛr bɩɩ ŋmɔɔl a wʋ yɛbɛ anyã pɔ ɛ, a sɩ Soro na gen nɩrɛ jaa na maala a anyãna nɩtãa a lɛ sɩn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ yɩ, tɩ na sɩ kpãa yɩ.
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn ba bʋɔl sɩ ɩka sɩ tara vɔldɛɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ bʋɔrɔ na ɩka sɩ vɛ̃ ka a sɩ kpɛfʋ vɩɛlɛ.
A lɛ jũu, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na tɔr a wiilfʋ nyã, ba tɔr nɩsaal ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ tɔr a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ na kʋ sɩ a wʋ Sɩɛ.
A ba lɛ fɛr ɩka, sɩ lɛ sɛb kʋ yɩ a lɛ yɩn na nʋ̃ taa ɛ, bojũu yɩn mɩ̃ɛ jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka, Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa ɩka, yɩ nʋ̃ taa.
Sɩrɛ jaa yɩ nʋ̃n a yɛɛr na be a Masedonɩya paal pɔ, tɩchɛ sɩ chɛnɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ yɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn ɩka, yɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ sɔ̃ɔ jaa.
Yɩ vɛ̃ ka a ɩ yɩ nʋ̃ɔ ka a yɩ kpɛfʋ vɩɛlɛ, na yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ tʋ̃mɔ̃ na yɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a yɩ nuur nɩtãa a lɛ sɩn 'yɛr kʋ yɩ.
Yɩ maal a nɩtɔ̃ ka a yɩ kpɛfʋ na vɩɛlɛ kʋ a bala na ba puor ɛ, na yɩ taa bʋɔrɔ ɩka nɩbɛ ba guolo yɩ ɛ.
N yɛɛr, saa bʋɔrɔ ɩka a lɩɩ yɩ ɛ, nɩ a bala na gur ɛ, na yɩ taa wa tara pʋsɔ̃ɔ fɩka a bala na ba tara tɩɛrtɔ jie kaar ɛ.
Sɩ sɔɔn ɩka Yesu kpi naa, tɩ na wʋ lɩɛb ir a kũu pɔ. A lɛ lɛ sɩ sɔɔ, ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na 'mantaa waan a Yesu nɩ a bala na gur.
Sɩ den a sɩ Soro 'yɛrbie 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka, a sɩn bala na chɛnɛ vʋrɔ, tɩ tãn a sɩ Soro waa daar, kʋ̃ dɔ̃ɔ a bala na gur nyɛ wʋ ɛ.
Bojũu a sɩ Soro mɩ̃ɛ lɛ na yi a saaju wa tãna 'yɛrɛ, ka a malaka kpɛ̃ɛ bʋɔlɔ nɩ nɛkpɛ̃ɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn ɩlɛ pɛɛlɛ ɩrɛ gɔ̃mɔ̃, ka a bala na sɔɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto tɩ kpi, de nie ir.
A anyã puor, a sɩn bala na chɛnɛ vʋrɔ, a Nãaŋmɩn pãa 'mɔɔr sɩ, ka sɩ lɔ̃ɔtaa tuor a sɩ Soro be julõjuur pɔ, na sɩ tɩ be a wʋ sɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ jaa.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn naa 'yɛrbie anyãna.
Pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ n yɛɛr, a ba fɛr ɩka sɩ sɛb bon jaa 'yɛr kʋ yɩ a daar naa sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Bojũu yɩn mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a sɩ Soro Yesu bɩbir na wa naa fɩka nãnyie na ma wa tɩ̃sɔɔ kaar.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban wa 'yɛr ɩka, "Nyã'maar ben be, dãbɩ̃ɛ ba lɛ be be ɛ," sɔ̃ɔfʋ na pãa wa naa, a ba sɛ̃, fɩka pɔɔ pʋɔ dɔɔfʋ na dũu wʋ, tɩ ba kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ faa a ba mɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩn a n yɛɛr, yaa be libe pɔ ɛ, ka a bɩbir nyã na wa dũu yɩ a nãnyie kaar ɛ.
Yɩ jaa ɩ̃n chãa nɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ bibiir, saa ɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ bɩɩ, libe pɔ nɩbɛ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ pãa ta vɛ̃ a sɩ guro nɩbɛ bamɩne kaar ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ vɛ̃ a sɩ jɛɔ na sɩ nyɔɔrɔ sɩ mɩ̃ɛ.
Bojũu a bala na ma guro, ma gur tɩ̃sɔɔ, ka a bala na buu, mɩ ma buu tɩ̃sɔɔ.
Tɩchɛ an ɩ a chãa lɛ so sɩ, yɩ vɛ̃ ka sɩ nyɔɔrɔ sɩ mɩ̃ɛ, na sɩ de sɔɔfʋ nɩ nʋ̃fʋ su, fɩka a nyãa wɩɛ nɩ a sɩ tɩɛrtɔfʋ jie na ɩ a sɩ faafʋ kur jupil.
