Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn ba ir sɩ ɩka sɩ di dɔɔyɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka sɩ nyɛ faafʋ tu a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
'Lɔ lɛ kpi kʋ sɩ, a lɛ jũu, ka sɩ chɛnɛ na nɩbir bɩɩ, sɩ gur naa, sɩn nɩ 'lɔ na 'mataa be be.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔn taa ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn na yɩ sʋ̃nɔ̃ taa nɩtãa a lɛ yɩn ben tʋ̃nɔ̃.
Pʋ̃pãanyã n yɛɛr, sɩ sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa ɩka yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bala na ɩ a yɩ nɩbɛrɛ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a yɩ sɛ̃, bala lɛ sʋ̃nɔ̃ yɩ a sɩ Soro sɔr pɔ, na ba kpãana yɩ.
Yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ba nɩ nʋ̃fʋ a ba tʋ̃mɔ̃ jũu, na yɩ kpɩɛrɛ nɩ nyã'maar nɩ nɩrɛ jaa.
N yɛɛr n sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa ɩka, yɩ kpãana a bala na ɩ a yãan dẽme tɩ na yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bala na sɩɩr a ba mɩ̃ɛ, na yɩ sʋ̃nɔ̃ a nɩbaalsɩ tara kãnyir nɩ nɩrɛ jaa.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃, ka nɩrɛ jaa ta de yelbier yãan yelbier sãn ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ma maala vɩla kʋrɔ taa nɩ nɩrɛ jaa.
Yɩ ma tara pʋpɛl sɔ̃ɔ jãa.
Yɩ ma sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn sɔ̃ɔ jaa.
Na yɩ ma puor wʋ yãan yele jaa pɔ, bojũu anyã lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Yɩ ta kpĩin a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ bũu ɛ.
Yɩ ta kpɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ wiilfʋ ɛ.
Yɩ bɛɛr yele jaa kaa na yɩ nyɔɔ bon 'lɔ na vɩla.
Tɔɔ yi yele jaa na ɩ bier pɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ na ɩ a nyã'maar sʋɔ wʋ chɔɔr yɩ ka yɩ ɩ chɛchɛ. Wʋ maal a yɩ sɩɩr nɩ a yɩ kpɛfʋ nɩ a yɩ ɩ̃gãma ka a ɩ chɛchɛ tɩ ta tara chɛfʋ jaa ɛ, tɩ tãn a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto waa sɔ̃ɔ.
A Nãaŋmɩn nyã na bʋɔl yɩ tara na yelmɩ̃ɛ, wʋ̃n maal a lɛ.
N yɛɛr, yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ sɩ.
Yɩ puor a yɛɛr naa yɛpɔbɔ ba jaa nɩ nʋ̃fʋ puorfʋ.
N kpãkpãana yɩ naa a sɩ Soro yuor 'yɔ̃ɔ, ɩka yɩ kar a gãn nyã kʋ a yɛɛr ba jaa.
Ka a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ be a yɩ sɛ̃.
Pɔɔl, Silasɩ nɩ Timoti lɛ sɛɛrɛ a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a Tɛsalonika pupuorbiir na be a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jie, a be a yɩ sɛ̃.
N yɛɛr, sɩ ma puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan kʋ yɩ, a mɩ vɩɛl lɛ na a lɛ, bojũu a yɩ sɔɔfʋ nʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃, ka a yɩ nʋ̃fʋ yɩn nʋ̃ taa mɩ lɛ nʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
A lɛ jũu, sɩ ma wile na sɩ mɩ̃ɛ pɛɛrɛ yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn pupuorbiir gbulsɩ pɔ, lɛ yɩn tara kãnyir ara kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ a sɔɔfʋ yɩn tara a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ, nɩ a dɔɔyɛ yɩn nyɛrɛ.
A ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ tor naa, na wʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ maal yɩ ka yɩ sɛɛn a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ, a 'lɔ pɔ yɩn mɩ na dire a dɔɔyɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn tor naa. Wʋn lɩɛb yab a bala na 'yɛr 'yɛrdɛbɛ, 'yɔ̃ɔ ba gefʋ, tɩ kʋ a bala ban 'yɛr
'yɛrdɛbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ, pɛ̃nfʋ, nɩ a sɩn mɩ̃ɛ. A nɩtɔ̃ na ɩ naa, Nãaŋmɩn na wa ir a sɩ Soro Yesu wiil a saaju nɩ a wʋ kpɩ̃ɛn malakasɩ, fɩka bũu dagel.
Wʋn gen a bala na ba bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, na baa sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro Yesu 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ ɛ.
Bala lɛ na nyɛ gefʋ 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ. Wʋn oor ban yɩn a sɩ Soro niem, nɩ a wʋ tɩɩr kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ.
'Lɔ wa wa a bɩbir 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, wʋn nyɛn 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ a wʋ nɩbɛ pɔ. An ɩn nʋ̃ɔ kʋ a bala jaa na sɔɔ de wʋ. Yɩ mɩ pʋɔ naa, bojũu yɩ sɔɔn de a sɩ dãasɩɛ sɩn di a yɩ sɛ̃.
A anyã tɩɛr sɩn tara jũu, sɩ ma sʋɔrɔ na Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka wʋ vɛ̃ ka yɩ sɛɛn a wʋ bʋɔlfʋ, ka a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka a yi tɩɛr vɩɛlsɩ nɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ jaa na yi a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ.
A anyãna lɛ sɩ sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn ɩka a sɩ Soro Yesu yuor wʋ nyɛ tɩɩr a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka wʋ mɩ pɛɛ yɩ, a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ jũu.
A lɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto waa sɔ̃ɔ nɩ a lɛ sɩn na lɔ̃ɔ taa a wʋ sɛ̃, sɩ sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa, n yɛɛr,
ɩka yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a sɔb yɩ nɩbir a nɩbɛ bamɩne na 'yɛrɛ ɩka sɩn lɛ 'yɛr bɩɩ, sɛb ɩka a Yesu wan baar.
Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa bɛl yɩ a sɔr nyã pɔ ɛ, a bɩbir 'lɔ kʋ̃ wa ɛ, ka a bawõnsɩ ba de nie ir ɛ. Ka a 'lɔ na ba sɔɔ de a nɛbinãa mɩ yi chãa pɔ, 'lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na sɔ̃ɔ.
Wʋ ma chɩrɛ naa tɩ na wʋ ma 'mɔɔrɔ, wʋ mɩ̃ɛ gar Nãaŋmɩn, bɩɩ bon jaa ban puoro, a lɛ lɛ wʋ jɩ̃nɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir maal a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn.
Yaa lɩɛb tɩɛr ɩn 'yɛr kʋ yɩ a bonsɩ anyãna a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ?
Pʋ̃pãanyã yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa a bon 'lɔ na pii wʋ a sɔr a wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ yɩ chãa pɔ ɛ, a wʋ sɔ̃ɔ baa wa ta ɛ.
A wʋ yelsɔɔlaa tʋ̃nɔ̃ na tʋ̃mɔ̃, tɩchɛ a 'lɔ na pii a sɔr yi be.
Ka a bala na ba sɔɔ de a nɛbinãa ɛ na yin chãa pɔ, a bala a Soro Yesu nɩ naa sɔ̃ɔn a wʋ nɛɛ vʋʋr, sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yele 'lɔ na ɩrɛ a wʋ waa sɔ̃ɔ.
A bala na ba sɔɔ de a nɛbinãa ɛ, na wa naa an ɩ a Satan tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ, a 'lɔ na de kpɛ̃ɔ, jɩ̃nsɩ nɩ jire, nɛ'maa yelsɩ,
nɩ yelbier jaa bʋrɔ bɛlfʋ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a nɩbɛ bala na wɛrɛ, ba wɛrɛ naa, bojũu ba tɔr naa ɩka ba nʋ̃ a yelmɩ̃ɛ na ba nyɛ faafʋ.
A lɛ jũu, Nãaŋmɩn na sɔɔ naa ka yele kɔ̃ɔ bɛl ba, nɩ lɛ ban sɔɔ de bon 'lɔ na ɩ jire.
A lɛ jũu, bala jaa na ba sɔɔ de a yelmɩ̃ɛ a ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa jũu, nɩ a bon 'lɔ na ba tor ɛ, na nyɛn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ.
Tɩchɛ sɩn 'lɔ ma puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan kʋrɔ yɩ, n yɛɛr, a yɩn a sɩ Soro na nʋ̃, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn kãan ir yɩ a pielfʋ daar ka yɩn nyɛ faafʋ, ka a wʋ Sɩɛ pɛɛrɛ yɩ a yɩ sɔɔ de a yelmɩ̃ɛ.
'Lɔ lɛ bʋɔl yɩ a anyãna pɔ, a lɛ yɩn wõ sɩn mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ yɩ. Lɛ lɛ ka yɩn lɔ̃ɔ põn a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tɩɩr.
A lɛ jũu, n yɛɛr yɩ ara kpɛ̃ɔ na yɩ nyɔɔ a sɩ wiilfʋ sɩn wiil yɩ, ka 'yɛrbir lɛ bɩɩ, nɛɛ lɛ bɩɩ, gãn pɔ lɛ.
A sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ̃ɛ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a sɩ Sãa na nʋ̃ sɩ tun a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ pɔ, na 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩn ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, nɩ tɩɛrtɔ vɩla,
wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn a yɩ nyãa pɔ nɩ vɩla jaa nɩ a 'yɛrbie pɔ.
N yɛɛr, a baarfʋ nɩ nyã, yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ sɩ, ka a sɩ Soro 'yɛrbie tʋ̃ɔ yaar fɔɔ tɩ nyɛ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ jie jaa nɩtãa lɛ an be a yɩ pɔ.
Na yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn ka sɩ na tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ faafʋ yin a putudẽme nɩ a sɩdɛbɛ dẽme nuur pɔ, bojũu nɩrɛ jaa baa tara a sɔɔfʋ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a sɩ Soro ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ, wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩn ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ tɩ gu yɩ a dɛɛr sʋɔ nuur pɔ.
Sɩ tara na sɔɔfʋ a sɩ Soro yuor 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩ pɔ ɩka, yɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ na, na yɩn chɛnɛ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a ala sɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ.
A sɩ Soro wʋ vɛ̃ a yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃ yɩ naa nɩ lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto na tara nɩ yɩ a kãnyir.
A sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor pɔ, sɩ kpãana yɩ naa n yɛɛr ɩka yɩ tɔɔ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin a bala na ɩ koro dẽme pɔ, nɩ ban ba turo a lɛ sɩn wiil yɩ ɩka yɩ turo ɛ.
Yɩn mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a sɛɛ naa ɩka yɩ tɔɔrɔ sɩ, saa dɔ̃ɔ yʋɔrɔ pɔrɔ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn be a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ,
bɩɩ saa dɔ̃ɔ di nɩrɛ jaa bʋ̃diir tɩ na saa yab ɛ. Sɩ ma tʋ̃n tʋ̃kpɩ̃ɛn tɩ̃sɔɔ nɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ, ka sɩ ta tuo a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa tuor ɛ.
A nyã ba wiil ɩka saa tara sɔr na ɩ a lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ kaa ɩ wiilfʋ kʋ yɩ ka yɩ tɔɔrɔ.
Sɩ gba na dɔ̃ɔ be a yɩ sɛ̃, sɩ kpãkpãan yɩ naa a yele nyãna ɩka, nɩrɛ jaa ba wa tʋ̃nɔ̃ ɛ, wʋ taa dire ɛ.
Sɩ wõn ban 'yɛr ɩka nɩbɛ bamɩne ben a yɩ pɔ tara koro na ba yʋɔrɔ pɔrɔ, na baa tara tʋ̃mɔ̃ jaa ɛ, tɩ ma kpɩɛrɛ a ba taaba yelsɩ pɔ.
A nɩbɛ banyãna taa ba, sɩ 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor pɔ ɩka, ba tʋ̃ a ba tʋ̃mɔ̃ jaa jomm na ba nyɛ a ba mɩ̃ɛ bonsɩ.
N yɛɛr, yɩn 'lɔ yɩ taa wa bal nɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ 'lɔ na tor pɔ ɛ.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ ba wa sɔɔ de a lɛ sɩn 'yɛr a gãn nyã pɔ ɛ, yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wʋ yele sʋ̃ na yɩ taa tara nɩ wʋ nɛbʋ̃'yen ɛ, ka vɩ̃ kpɛ wʋ.
Yɩ ta de wʋ ka wʋ ɩ dɔ̃sʋɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ kpãa wʋ wʋn ɩ a yɩ wʋn ɩ a yɛbɛ jũu.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a sɩ Soro na ɩ nyã'maar sʋɔ wʋ kʋ yɩ nyã'maar sɔ̃ɔ jaa, a sɔɩ a jaa pɔ. A sɩ Soro wʋ be a yɩ jaa sɛ̃.
Maa Pɔɔl lɛ sɛb a puorfʋ nyã nɩ a maa mɩ̃ɛ nũu. A jɩ̃nɛ naa nyã ɩn ma 'yɔ̃ɔ gãn jaa pɔ ɩn ma sɛb.
A sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ a be a yɩ jaa sɛ̃.
Maa Pɔɔl na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nãa, nɩtãa lɛ a sɩ Fafaara Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr nɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ tɩɛrtɔ jie.
N sɛɛrɛ na kʋrɔ a Timoti na ɩ a n binʋ̃nãa sɔɔfʋ jũu. Wɩ̃ɛfʋ, nɩ nɩbaal, nɩ nyã'maar na yi a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃, a be a fʋ sɛ̃.
A lɛ ɩn chen a Masedonɩya, n kpãkpãan fʋ naa ɩka fʋ jɩ̃nɛ a Efesus na fʋ wile a nɩbɛ bamɩne a ba taa wile wiil yuo go ɛ.
Wiilfʋ ba ka ba ta de ba mɩ̃ɛ kʋ jir wiilfʋ ɛ, nɩ a sãakpãmɩne tutaa na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ. A anyãna lɛ waara nɩ nɛchɩrɛ, ban naa tʋ̃nɔ̃ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ nɩ sɔɔfʋ.
Tɩchɛ a wiilfʋ nyã lɛ waara nɩ nʋ̃fʋ na yi nyãvɩla pɔ, tɩɛr vɩla pɔ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ sɔɔfʋ pɔ.
Nɩbɛ bamɩne bar naa a anyã tɩ na ba 'yɛrɛ 'yɛr vorsɩ.
Ba bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka ba ɩ a nɛɛ wiwiilbe, na baa bɔ̃ɔ a par a lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ ɛ, bɩɩ na a bonsɩ ala ban 'yɛr ɩka a sɛɛ naa ɛ.
Faa nyɛ, sɩn bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a nɛbinãa vɩla na, ala ɩ nɩrɛ tun a lɛ an wile.

Sɩ mɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka, a nɛbinãa ba bin kʋ a nɩtorsɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ bin kʋ a bala na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nɛɛ, nɩ a bawõnsɩ, nɩ a bala na ba turo lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔr ɛ, yelbe-ɩrbɛ, nɩ a bala na ba puoro ɛ, na ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn yuor, nɩ a bala na kʋrɔ a ba sãamɩne, nɩ a ba mamɩne na ba ɩ nɩkʋrbɔ,
nɩ a sɛ̃sɛ̃nbɛ, nɩ a bala na lɩɛb bʋɔr taa, nɩ a bala na lɩɛb daara a ba taaba, nɩ a jir ŋmarba, nɩ a bala na ŋmara jir pɔrɔ nɩ, nɩ yele jaa na chɩrɛ nɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ wiilfʋ.
A wiilfʋ anyã yire na a dãnfʋ Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a tɩɩr sʋɔ 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ wʋn de kʋ ma sɛ̃.
N puor naa a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yãan, wʋn kʋ ma kpɛ̃ɔ bojũu wʋ nyɛn a n sɔɔfʋ, na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ.
N gba na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn yosɔ̃ɔnɔ̃, gere a nɩbɛ, naa ɩ jɛbʋɔrɔ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn wa kãan a n nɩbaal, bojũu n ɩn a lɛ ɩn ba sɔɔ de nɩ babɔ̃ɔfʋ jũu,
tɩchɛ a sɩ Soro wɩ̃ɛfʋ waa naa, nɩ a sɔɔfʋ, nɩ a nʋ̃fʋ ala na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A yelmɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr nɩ nyã, na a ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ ɩka nɩrɛ wʋ sɔɔ de. Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wan a wɛr pɔ ɩka wʋ wa faa yelbe-ɩrbɛ, tɩchɛ maa lɛ gar ba jaa.

Tɩchɛ a lɛ jũu lɛ so ka Nãaŋmɩn kaa n nɩbaal, ka a na tʋ a n pɔ, a maa na ɩ a yelbe-ɩrɛ gar ba jaa, ka Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wiil a wʋ kãnyir na ba tara baarfʋ kʋ ma, ka n ɩ wiilfʋ kʋ a bala na wa sɔɔ wʋ nyɛ nyɛvʋr na ba tara baar fʋ ɛ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã a Nãa 'lɔ na ba tara pielfʋ ɛ, a 'lɔ na ba kpire ɛ, a 'lɔ sɩn ba nyɛrɛ ɛ, a Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ, wʋ nyɛrɛ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ tɩɩr bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
N bie Timoti, n kʋrɔ fʋ naa a wiilfʋ anyãna tun a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a fʋ 'yɛr, ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ turo a lɛ, fʋn jɛb a jɛb vɩla 'lɔ.
Tara sɔɔfʋ nɩ pʋtɩvɩla, bojũu nɩbɛ bamɩne tɔr naa a vɩla 'lɔ maalfʋ bar ka a ba sɔɔfʋ bʋ̃bʋr.
A ba pɔ lɛ Hɩmɩnayas nɩ Aleksanda, bala lɛ n de kʋ a Satan ka ba na jãn ta fere sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn yuor ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, a ala na de nie nɩ nyã, n kpãkpãan yɩn ɩka yɩ sʋɔrɔ, Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ, na yɩ ma sʋɔrɔ kʋrɔ taa, tɩ na yɩ ma puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan kʋ nɩrɛ jaa.
Yɩ mɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ a nãmɩne nɩ a bala na ɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme, ka a lɛ na vɛ̃ ka sɩn jɛ̃n ɩ̃gãn 'maar nɩ nyã'maar na sɩ maala a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ.
A nyã lɛ tor, naa pɛlɛ a sɩ Fafaara Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ.
'Lɔ lɛ bʋɔrɔ ɩka nɩrɛ jaa wʋ nyɛ faafʋ, na wʋ wa bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ be be, nɩ 'ma'maala bʋ̃'yen na be a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a nɩsaalba chara pɔ, 'lɔ lɛ a nɩrɛ Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto.
'Lɔ lɛ de a wʋ nyɛvʋr yab faan nɩrɛ jaa. A 'yɛr nyã lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ sɩ ɩka sɩ mʋɔl a pʋ̃pãanyã.
A lɛ lɛ so ka Nãaŋmɩn ir ma ka ɩ mʋmʋɔlɔ nɩ a nɩtʋ̃nãa. Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ n 'yɛrɛ, n ba ŋmara jir ɛ, ɩka n ɩ a wiwile kʋ a bala na ba ɩ a Juu nɩbɛ ɛ, sɔɔfʋ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ pɔ.
Maa bɔfʋ lɛ ɩka jie jaa, a dɔɔr wa sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn, ba jɛɛr a ba nuur puoro, na ba maala a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ, na ba ta tara suur nɩ nɛchɩrɛ ɛ.
Lɛ lɛ a pɔbɔ mɩ, ba ma su bon pɔɔ a ɩ̃gãn, tɩ na ba ta ma mal pir a jukɔɔl nɩ a sɛlma nɩ a lɛrsɩ bɩɩ a fɔɔr ala daa na ɩ tuo ɛ,
tɩchɛ tʋ̃sʋ̃n lɛ sɛɛn a pɔbɔ bala na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn.
Pɔbɔ ba ma jãn ɩ gbul na ba siir ba mɩ̃ɛ chɛlɛ a lɛ a nɩdierbe na wile.
N ba bar sɔr ɩka pɔɔ jaa wʋ wile bɩɩ tara kpɛ̃ɔ daba ju ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ ma ɩ gbul.
Bojũu Adama lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn de nie mɛ tɩ na wʋ wa mɛ a Hawa tu.
Satan ba dɔ̃ɔ nie bɛl Adama ɛ, tɩchɛ a Hawa lɛ wʋ bɛl ka wʋ sɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ.
Tɩchɛ a pɔbɔ na nyɛn faafʋ tu bie dɔɔfʋ pɔ, ala ɩ ba chɛnɛ na tara sɔɔfʋ nɩ nʋ̃fʋ na ba ɩ chɛchɛ nyɔɔrɔ ba mɩ̃ɛ vɩla.
A 'yɛr ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ ɩka, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ ɩ a pupuorbiir nɩdiere, wʋ bʋɔrɔ na tʋ̃sʋ̃.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a pupuorbiir nɩdiere wʋ ta tara mabfʋ jaa ɛ, na wʋ tara pɔɔ bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ, na wʋ nyɔɔrɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, na wʋ ɩ nɩ'yɔ̃ɔ naa, na wʋ diere sãanba, na wʋ bɔ̃ɔ wiilfʋ.
Wʋ ta ɩ dãburo ɛ, wʋ ta ɩ gɔ̃bʋɔr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ siir a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, na wʋ ta ɩ jɛbʋɔrɔ ɛ, na wʋ ta nʋ̃ libie ɛ.
A sɛɛn ɩka wʋ tʋ̃ɔ kaara a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yir vɩla, ka a wʋ bibiir wõnõ a wʋ toor, na ba 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ wʋ.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yir kaa ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ wʋn ɩ tʋ̃ɔ kaa a pupuorbiir?
Wʋ ta ɩ nɩrɛ nyã na kpɛ a puorfʋ pɔ paal ɛ, na wʋn wa bʋɔrɔ yuor na wʋ mɩ faa lo a gefʋ pɔ nɩtãa a Satan.
Wʋ ɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ a bala na ba puoro ɛ, na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, ban 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋn vɩ̃ ka wʋ lo a Satan bɛraa pɔ.
A sʋ̃sʋ̃nbɔ, ba mɩ tara nɩbijɩɛ na ba ta tara nɛɛr ayi ɛ, na ba ta maal ba mɩ̃ɛ dãnyurbo ɛ, na ba ta ɩ nɩfɔlbɔ ɛ.
Ba nyɔɔ a sɔɔfʋ wiilfʋ yelsɔɔlaa kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ tɩɛr vɩla.
Yɩ de nie bɛɛr ba kaa. Ka bala pãa baa tara 'mabfʋ jaa ɛ, yɩ vɛ̃ ka ba ɩ a sʋ̃sʋ̃nbɔ.
A pɔbɔ mɩ, ba tara 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, na ba ta sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa yoe ɛ, tɩchɛ ba nyɔɔrɔ ba mɩ̃ɛ, tɩ tara yelmɩ̃ɛ yele jaa pɔ.
A sʋ̃sʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ tara pɔɔ bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ, na wʋ tʋ̃ɔ kaara a wʋ bibiir, na wʋ tʋ̃ɔ kaara a wʋ yir vɩla.
A sʋ̃sʋ̃nbɔ bala na tʋ̃ vɩla, na nyɛn 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋ a ba mɩ̃ɛ, nɩ a 'lafʋ nɩ sɔɔfʋ 'lɔ ban tara a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ.
N bʋɔrɔ na ɩka n wa a fʋ sɛ̃ a pʋ̃pãanyã, tɩchɛ n sɛɛrɛ na a kpãafʋ anyã kʋrɔ fʋ.
Lɛ lɛ, maa baa tʋ̃ɔ wa fɔɔ ɛ, ka fʋ bɔ̃ɔ lɛ an sɛɛ ɩka a pupuorbiir ba nyɔɔrɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ, bala lɛ puoro a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ vʋr na ba tɩɛ a yelmɩ̃ɛ a luur kaar.

Baal ba be be ɛ, a yelsɔɔlaa a sɩ puorfʋ pɔ bɛrma naa. Yesu nyɩr a ɩ̃gãn pɔ. Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ir wiil ɩka wʋ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn bie. A malakasɩ nyɛ wʋ naa. Ba mʋɔl 'yɛr a wʋ 'yɛr a paalsɩ pɔ, ka ba sɔɔ de wʋ a wɛr wʋ jaa. Nãaŋmɩn de wʋn don be a tɩɩr pɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr ka a gã chãa pɔ ɩka a baaraa, bamɩne na bar a ba sɔɔfʋ tɩ chɛlɛ a sɩdɛbɛ bɛlfʋ, nɩ a lɛ a sɩdɛbɛ na wile.
A wiilfʋ nyã yi naa a nɛɛr ayi dẽme na ma ŋmara a jirsɩ ka a sɔ̃ɔ a ba tɩɛr fɩka kur tʋl ban 'mon bon 'yɔ̃ɔ jɩ̃nɛ.
Ba wile na nɩbɛ ɩka ba ta kultaar ɛ, na ba wile ba ɩka ba chire bʋ̃diir amɩne. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn na maal a kultaa nɩ a bʋ̃diir a jaa ɩka a bala na sɔɔ tɩ bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ, ba ma de tɩ puor wʋ yãan.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃maalaa jaa vɩɛlɛ na, ka a ba sɛɛ ɩka nɩrɛ wʋ tɔr bon jaa bar ɛ, ala ɩ sɩ ma den nɩ yãan puorfʋ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrbir nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ maal yaa naa ka a ɩ bʋ̃sʋ̃.
Ala ɩ fʋ den a kpãafʋ nyã na fʋ wiil a yɛɛr, fʋn ɩn a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tʋ̃tʋ̃vɩla sʋɔ, na fʋn guolo a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nɩ a sɔɔfʋ wiil vɩla 'lɔ fʋn turo.
Tɔr a jirsɩ ala ban ma ŋmara nɩ a pɔɔnyɔ̃n fuolsɩ, tɩ na fʋ wile a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn sɔr pɔ.

Bojũu fʋ̃ʋ jãn a fʋ ɩ̃gãn ka wʋ kpɛ̃mɛ, a vɩla na, tɩ wʋ kʋ̃ kor ɛ, tɩchɛ a Nãaŋmɩn sɔr tufʋ vɩla na a sɔɩ a jaa pɔ, bojũu wʋ tɩr nɛɛ kʋ sɩ a nyɛvʋr nyã sɩn tara a dɩna nɩ a nyɛvʋr 'lɔ na waara daar kɔ̃ɔ.
A 'yɛr nyã ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ ɩka, nɩrɛ jaa wʋ sɔɔ de.
A lɛ jũu lɛ sɩ mʋɔrɔ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ tʋ̃kpɩ̃ɛn, bojũu a sɩ tɩɛrtɔ ben a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ vʋr pɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ a nɩbɛ bala jaa na sɔɔ wʋ Fafaara.
Kpãkpãana na fʋ wile ba a yelsɩ anyãna a jaa.
Ta vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa kaa fʋ pɔrɔ fʋn chɛnɛ ɩ pɔlbile jũu ɛ, tɩchɛ fʋ ɩ wiilfʋ kʋ a bala na tara sɔɔfʋ, nɩ a fʋ 'yɛr, nɩ a fʋ maalfʋ, nɩ a fʋ nʋ̃fʋ, nɩ a fʋ sɔɔfʋ, nɩ a fʋ chɛchɛ ɩfʋ pɔ.
Sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka n wa, mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir kara a Nãaŋmɩn gãn a nɩyɔɔ pɔ, na fʋ mʋɔlɔ tɩ wile nɩ ba.
Ta mel a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'lɔ wʋn kʋ fʋ ɛ, a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a nɩdierbe na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr tɩ dɔɔl fʋ a ba nuur.
De a yelsɩ a nyã tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃, na fʋ de fʋ mɩ̃ɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ, ka nɩrɛ jaa nyɛ lɛ a fʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ na chiine niem.
Bɔ̃ɔ nyɔɔ a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a wiilfʋ ɩrɛ a lɛ nɛ, na fʋ tara kãnyir. Fʋn faan a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩ a bala na chɛlɛ a fʋ 'yɛr.
Ta 'yɛr 'yɛrbikpɩ̃ɛn kʋ danyɔ̃n ɛ, tɩchɛ 'yɛr baalʋ̃ʋ kʋ wʋ fʋ sãa tɔ sʋɔ kaar, 'yɛr kʋ pɔlbil a fʋ yɛɛr kaar.
'Yɛrɛ nɩ a pɔɔnyɔ̃n a fʋ mamɩne kaar, nɩ a pɔɔsarbil a fʋ yɛpɔbɔ kaar, nɩ chɛchɛ ɩfʋ pɔ.
'Yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a pɔɔkɔɛ bala na ɩ pɔɔkɔɛ, tɩ ba tara bon jaa ɛ.
Ala ɩ a pɔɔkɔnyɩnɛ tara na bibiir bɩɩ yɔ̃n, bala lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka ba turo a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ, na ba kaara a ba dɔɔrbɔ a yie pɔ fɩka a lɛ a ba dɔɔrbɔ na dɔ̃ɔ kaa ba. Lɛ lɛ pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ.
Pɔɔkʋɔr 'lɔ na ba tara bon jaa ɛ, ma den a wʋ tɩɛr wʋ jaa kʋ Nãaŋmɩn, tɩ na wʋ ma sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn tɩ̃sɔɔ nɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ a wʋ bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ,
tɩchɛ a pɔɔkʋɔr 'lɔ na bʋɔrɔ ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa, wʋ kpin tɩ yʋɔrɔ.
Kʋ ba a kpãafʋ anyãna, ka nɩrɛ ta nyɛ a ba 'mabfʋ ɛ.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ baa sʋ̃ʋ a wʋ nɩbɛ ɛ, bɩɩ a wʋ yir dẽme ɛ, a kaara fɩka wʋ tɔr naa a sɔɔfʋ, tɩ ɩrɛ dɛɛr gar nyã na ba ɩ a Yesu turo ɛ.

A pɔɔkʋɔr 'lɔ na ba ta yuom lɩjaata sɛrɛ ɛ, taa ɩrɛ wa 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wʋ yuor a pɔɔkɔɛ gãn pɔ ɛ. Wʋ ɩ pɔɔkʋɔr 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ kul sɩr bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ, ka a sɩrɛ wa kpi tɩ chɛ wʋ bar, tɩ wʋ chɛnɛ nyɔɔrɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ba kul sɩrɛ go ɛ.
Nɩbɛ ba bɔ̃ɔ wʋ a wʋ tʋ̃ vɩla jũu, nɩ a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ guol a wʋ bibiir, na wʋ ma sɔɔ diere sãanba, na wʋ ma pɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ gbɛɛ, sʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a nɩbaalsɩ, tɩ maala vɩla jaa bʋrɔ.
Tɩchɛ ta 'yɔ̃ɔ pɔɔkɔ'yɔlɔ yuor a pɔɔkɔɛ gãn pɔ ɛ, bojũu sɩrɛ kulfʋ vɔlaa wa gar a lɛ ban nʋ̃ a Kɩrɩsɩto, ban bʋɔrɔ na sɩrɛ kulfʋ.
A lɛ ban lon Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ pɔ, bojũu ba sɔ̃ɔn a nɛɛ ban põl'yɔ̃ɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto bar.
A lɛ puor, ba ma bʋɔrɔ na ɩka ba yʋɔrɔ pɔrɔ tulo yie yʋɔrɔ, a ba ɩ yie tuulfʋ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩ ba ɩn gagarsɩ, na ba kpɩɛrɛ nɩbɛ 'yɛr 'yɛrsɩ pɔ 'yɛrɛ a lɛ na ba sɛɛ ɩka ba 'yɛrɛ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, n bʋɔrɔ na ɩka pɔɔkɔɛ na chɛnɛ kpɩ̃ɛn, ba kul sɩrbɛ, na ba dɔɔ bibiir, na ba tʋ̃ɔ ɩ pɔɔ mɩn kaara a ba yie, na ba ta kʋ a dɔ̃sʋɔ sɔr ka wʋ sɔ̃ɔ a sɩ yuor ɛ.
Bamɩne lɩɛb sɩrɛ jaa turo a Satan puor.
Ala ɩ pɔɔ nyã jaa na puoro tara yir dẽme ka ba ɩ pɔɔkɔɛ, wʋ kaara ba tɩ ta kʋ a pupuorbiir wõm ɛ. A pupuorbiir ba kaara pɔɔkɔɛ bala tɛɛ na ba tara nɩrɛ jaa, ka wʋn kaa ba ɛ.
A nɩdierbe bala na tʋ̃nɔ̃ vɩla, yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ba, tɩ sʋ̃nɔ̃ ba nɩ bonsɩ, bala lɛ mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr tɩ wile.
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn gãn 'yɛr ɩka, "Ta lũ a nadar nɛɛ 'lɔ wa vara a chi ɛ." A tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ jaa sɛɛn na a wʋ sãyar.
Taa ɩrɛ wa sɔɔrɔ nɩbʋ̃'yen 'yɛr wʋn 'yɛr dɔɔl a nɩdiere ju ka bala ba ta ayi bɩɩ ata ɛ.
A bala na ma maala a yeldɛbɛ, wiil ba a ba sɔ̃ɔnaa a nɩyɔɔ niem, ka a ba taaba na chɛ na joro dãbɩ̃ɛ.
N kpãana yɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩ a malakasɩ bala wʋn ir niem ɩka, yɩ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a kpãafʋ anyãna pɔ, na yɩ ta oor ɛ. Yɩ taa turo nɩbɛ nʋ̃nɔ̃ ɛ.
Ta pɔɔ ir nɩrɛ ka wʋ ɩ nɩdiere ɛ, ta pʋɔ a nɩbɛ bamɩne yeldɛbɛ pɔ ɛ, gu fʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
Ta nyuro kʋ̃ɔ tɛɛ ɛ, ma nyũ dãa bɩ̃lãa a fʋ pʋɔ baal jũu, a fʋn maa yaar tɩ ɩ baal ɛ.
Nɩbɛ bamɩne yeldɛbɛ gãn chãa pɔ, na a dɔ̃ɔ ba nie chen a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie, tɩchɛ ka bamɩne yeldɛbɛ ma tu ba chen a be.
Lɛ lɛ a tʋ̃vɩɛl amɩne ma gãn chãa pɔ, a ala gba na ba yi ɛ, kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ sɔɔl ɛ.
Bala jaa na be a gbãgbaar tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ, ba 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a bala na tʋ̃ɔ ba, ka nɩrɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn yuor 'yɛrdɛɛr ɛ, nɩ a sɩ wiilfʋ ɛ.
A gbãgbaar bala na tara a nɩbɛrɛ a ba ɩ Yesu turbo, ba ta vɛ̃ ba 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ ɛ, ban 'mataa puoro jũu ɛ, ba ir nyãa 'yɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ ba, bojũu ba puoro naa ka ba nʋ̃ ba. Wile a anyãna na fʋ kpãkpãana ba.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ wiil wiil yor na ba tu a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wiilfʋ ɛ, nɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrbie na 'yɛr ɛ,

a nɩbɛ nyã wile na wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, na waa bɔ̃ɔ bon jaa ɛ. Wʋ ma chɩrɛ na nɩ a 'yɛrbie, bojũu a nyɛntãan fɩka a wʋ tɩɛr sɔ̃ɔ naa. A lɛ vɛ̃ naa ka wʋ tara nyuur na wʋ ma jɛɛrɛ, na wʋ ma tʋrɔ a wʋ taaba, na wʋ ma tara tɩɛr dɛɛr nɩ a wʋ taaba.
Na ba pãa ma chɩrɛ taa nɩ tɩɛr sɔ̃ɔnsɩ. Baa bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ, na ba tɩɛr ɩka a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ ɩn lefʋ yele lɛ.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn sɔr tufʋ ɩn lefʋ bon, ala ɩ a ala fʋn tara sɛɛn fʋ naa.
Bojũu saa waan bon jaa a wɛr nyã pɔ ɛ, na sɩ kʋ̃ lɛ de bon jaa yin a wɛr pɔ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, ala ɩ sɩ tara na bʋ̃diir nɩ bʋ̃sursɩ, sɩ vɛ̃ ka a sɛɛn sɩ.
A bala na bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba ɩ tara dẽme, ma lon bɛɛr kaa chɛbaa pɔ, ka jɔl tɩɛr nɩ vɔldɛbɛ ma tɔɔ a nɩbɛ chiine sɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ a wɛfʋ jie.
Bojũu libie nʋ̃fʋ ɩ naa yelbier jaa bʋrɔ nyɩɩr, ka a bamɩne na bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba le, ba tɔɔn jãan a yelmɩ̃ɛ, na ba kpɛ wõm pɔ.
Tɩchɛ a fʋ̃ʋ 'lɔ na ɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩrɛ, tɔɔ yi a anyãna a jaa pɔ, na fʋ turo yeltorsɩ, na fʋ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩrɛ, tara sɔɔfʋ na fʋ tara nʋ̃fʋ, na fʋ tara kãnyir, na fʋ ɩ nɩ hɛ lɛ lɛ lɛ.
Jɛb a sɔɔfʋ jɛɛr na fʋ nyɔɔ a nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ taa lɛɛ. 'Lɔ pɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn bʋɔl fʋ a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ fʋn chiir a fʋ pʋɔ a nɩyɔɔ niem.
N kpãkpãana fʋ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na kʋrɔ a bonsɩ a jaa nyɛvʋr niem, nɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na 'yɛr a wʋ yelmɩ̃ɛ na wʋ chiir a wʋ pʋɔ a nãa Pontius Pilate niem,
n kpãkpãana fʋ naa ɩka fʋ bɔ̃ɔ tara a Nãaŋmɩn nɛbinsɩ ka a ta tara dɛɛr, bɩɩ 'mabfʋ ɛ, tɩ tãn a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto waa daar.
'Lɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na waan a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ. Nãaŋmɩn tɛɛ lɛ sɛɛn dãnfʋ nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ, na wʋ ɩ a nãmɩne ba jaa Nãa, nɩ a sorbo ba jaa Soro.
'Lɔ tɛɛ lɛ be be ba kpire ɛ, na wʋ be chãa 'lɔ pɔ nɩrɛ na kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ gbʋr ɛ, a 'lɔ nɩrɛ na ba nyɛrɛ ɛ, bɩɩ na tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ wʋ ɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ a 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ sɛɛn sɔ̃ɔ jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
A bala na ɩ a taraa dẽme a pʋ̃pãanyã, kpãa ba ɩka ba ta wile ba mɩ̃ɛ bɩɩ de a ba tɩɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a bʋ̃tarsɩ ala pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ ba dɩɛl Nãaŋmɩn nyã na kʋ sɩ a bʋ̃bʋrɔ bʋrɔsɩ a jaa a sɩ de chɩlɛ nɩ.
Kpãa ba a ba tʋ̃nɔ̃ vɩla na ba nʋ̃ɔ a vɩla tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ, na ba ɩ yɛ̃bɔ̃ɔnbɔ põnõ a ba bonsɩ.
A lɛ ban bine na nãbonsɩ guro nɩ a nɩdaar, ka ba na nyɛ a nyɛvʋr 'lɔ na ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ nyɛvʋr.
A fʋ̃ʋ Timoti, gu a ala ban de 'yɔ̃ɔ a fʋ nũu pɔ, na fʋ bar a 'yɛrvor nɩ a nɛchɩrɛ ala na ba tara par ɛ, ban bʋɔlɔ a bɔ̃ɔfʋ,
bamɩne na kpãkpãana nɩ a yelsɩ anyãna, ba bar a sɔɔfʋ sɔr. Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ wʋ be a fʋ sɛ̃.
Maa Pɔɔl na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nãa tu a Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ pɔ, nɩ a nɛɛ wʋn tɩr kʋ sɩ a nyɛvʋr nyã na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ,
sɛɛrɛ naa a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a fʋ̃ʋ Timoti na ɩ a n binʋ̃nãa. Wɩ̃ɛfʋ, nɩ nɩbaal, nɩ nyã'maar na yi a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jie wʋ be a fʋ sɛ̃.
N ma puor a Nãaŋmɩn nyã ɩn tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ yãan nɩ a n tɩɛr wʋ jaa nɩtãa a lɛ a n sãakpãmɩne na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ, n maa ĩin a fʋ yele ɛ, naa ma tɩɛr fʋ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ fʋ tɩ̃sɔɔ nɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ.
N ma lɩɛb tɩɛr a fʋ nɩbikʋ̃ɔ fʋn ŋma, naa bʋɔrɔ ɩka n nyɛ fʋ ka a n pʋɔ pɛl.
N lɩɛb tɩɛr a fʋ yelmɩ̃ɛ sɔɔfʋ, a 'lɔ a fʋ makʋ̃ma Loisɩ nɩ a a fʋ ma Yunɩsɩ na dɔ̃ɔ tara, lɛ lɛ n mɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka fʋ mɩ tara wʋ naa.
A lɛ jũu, n lɩɛb tɩɛr fʋ ɩka fʋ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir fire a Nãaŋmɩn kʋfʋ 'lɔ na be a fʋ pɔ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ dɔɔl fʋ a n nuur ka fʋ nyɛ.
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wʋn kʋ sɩ ba ɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ Sɩɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ Sɩɛ 'lɔ na kʋ sɩ kpɛ̃ɔ ka sɩ tara nʋ̃fʋ, nɩ mɩ̃ɛ nyɔɔfʋ.
Taa joro vɩ̃ nɩ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr mʋɔlfʋ ɛ, bɩɩ a maa ban pɔɔ a die pɔ a wʋ jũu ɛ, tɩchɛ pʋɔ ma a sɩ 'mataa dire a dɔɔyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ mʋɔlfʋ pɔ, na fʋ dɩɛl a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ.
'Lɔ lɛ faa sɩ na wʋ bʋɔl sɩ ɩka sɩ ɩ chɛchɛ, a ba ɩ a sɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ jũu lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a wʋ bɔfʋ nɩ a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ jũu lɛ. Sɩ nyɛn a wɩ̃ɛfʋ nyã a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ tɩchɛ ka a wɛr wa maal.
Tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã, Nãaŋmɩn wiil sɩn a wɩ̃ɛfʋ nyã tu a sɩ Fafaara Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na wa a wɛr pɔ, na wʋ wa tʋ̃ɔ kũu tɩ na wʋ de a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ wiil sɩ a nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.
A 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyãna jũu lɛ wʋ ir ma ɩka n ɩ mʋmʋɔlɔ nɩ nɩtʋ̃nãa nɩ wiwile.
A anyãna jũu lɛ n dire a dɔɔyɛ, tɩchɛ vɩ̃ ba kpɛ ma ɛ, bojũu n bɔ̃ɔn a nɩrɛ 'lɔ ɩn sɔɔ naa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka wʋn gu ma naa tɩ tãn a bɩbir 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a ala wʋn de 'yɔ̃ɔ a n nuur pɔ.
Nyɔɔ a 'yɛr sʋ̃ ala a lɛ nɛ fʋn wõ yi a n sɛ̃, a sɔɔfʋ nɩ a nʋ̃fʋ ala na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Gu a yelmɩ̃ɛ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na de 'yɔ̃ɔ a fʋ nuur pɔ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sʋ̃ʋfʋ 'lɔ na be a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Fʋ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a bala ba jaa na be a Asɩya tɔr man bar, Fɩgɛlusɩ nɩ Hɛmogɛnusɩ gba mɩ pʋɔ ba naa.
Nãaŋmɩn wʋ maal vɩla kʋ a Onesiforusɩ nɩ a wʋ yir dẽme, bojũu 'lɔ lɛ ma 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ma ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ, vɩ̃ ba kpɛ wʋ ɩn be a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ jũu ɛ.
Wʋ gba na wa wa a Worom, wʋ yɔ bɔ man nɩbijɩɛ tɩ nyɛ ma.
A sɩ Soro wʋ sʋ̃ʋ wʋ a wʋ nyɛ maal vɩla a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ bɩbir daar. Fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa a lɛ wʋn sʋ̃ʋ ma jɩ̃ be a Efesus.
Fʋ̃ʋ na ɩ a n bie, pãa kpɛ̃mɛ a wɩ̃ɛfʋ 'lɔ na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A lɛ fʋn wõ a n sɛ̃ a nɩyɔɔ bala niem, de wiil a yelmɩ̃ɛ dẽme mɩ nɩ na tʋ̃ɔ wiil a ba taaba.
A fʋ̃ʋ mɩ, pʋɔ sɩ dire a dɔɔyɛ nɩtãa Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto soja mɩ̃ɛ.
A soja 'lɔ na be a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ, ma bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka a wʋ maalfʋ a pɛlɛ a 'lɔ na de wʋ a tʋ̃mɔ̃, maa lɛ tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ bere a bɩbir jaa yelbʋɔrsɩ pɔ ɛ.
Ala ɩ a bala na joro chɩrɛ taa bʋɔrɔ na ɩka ba dɔ̃ɔ a ba taaba, ba ma jon tu a lɛ ban wile.
A kʋɔraa 'lɔ na ba joro yãan ɛ, lɛ ma de a bʋ̃dɔ̃ɔ.
Tɩɛr kaa a lɛ ɩn 'yɛrɛ, bojũu a sɩ Soro na kʋ fʋ naa a jaa par bɔ̃ɔfʋ.
Tɩɛr a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ir a kũu pɔ, na yi a David bala pɔ. A anyãna lɛ ɩ a maa 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ mʋɔlfʋ,
a pɔ lɛ n dire a dɔɔyɛ, a ba wa lũ ma nɩ bɔ̃jɔrsɩ nɩdɛɛr kaar. Tɩchɛ baa tʋ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr lũ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu lɛ so, ka nyɔɔ n mɩ̃ɛ a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na ir jũu ka ba mɩ na nyɛ a faafʋ 'lɔ na be a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr.
A 'yɛr na ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ nyã ɩka, ala ɩ sɩn nɩ 'lɔ lɛ 'mataa kpi, sɩn nɩ 'lɔ lɛ na 'mataa tara a nyɛvʋr.
Ala ɩ sɩ nyɔɔn sɩ mɩ̃ɛ, sɩn nɩ 'lɔ lɛ na 'mataa di a nãa. Ala ɩ sɩ chiir wʋ naa, wʋ mɩ na chiir sɩ naa.
Ala ɩ sɩn baa tara yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ 'lɔ chɛnɛ na tara yelmɩ̃ɛ, bojũu wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ chiir a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir tɩɛrɛ ba a anyãna, na fʋ kpãana ba a Nãaŋmɩn niem ɩka, ba ta chɩrɛ taa nɩ a 'yɛrbie ɛ. A ba maala vɩla jaa ɛ, tɩchɛ a ma sɔ̃ɔn a bala na chɛlɛ tɩɛr.
Mɔ̃ na fʋ de fʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ Nãaŋmɩn, an ɩ a 'lɔ mɩ̃ɛ lɛ pɛɛ fʋ, na fʋ ɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ 'lɔ na ba joro vĩ ɛ, na fʋ wile a yelmɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr na tor.
Bar a nɛchɩrɛ ala na ba tara par ɛ, bojũu a lɛ na jãn nɩbɛ bar ka ba kʋ̃ lɛ ɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ɛ.
A ba wiilfʋ na yɔɔn gbõtor kaar. Hɩmɩnayas nɩ Filetusɩ mɩ pʋɔ ba naa.
Ba bar a yelmɩ̃ɛ tɩ 'yɛr ɩka kũu pɔ ir fʋ po naa, na ba sɔ̃ɔn bamɩne sɔɔfʋ.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr par kparaa ara na, ka a sɛbie anyã sɛb a wʋ pɔ, "A sɩ Soro bɔ̃ɔn a bala jaa na ɩ a wʋ nɩbɛ." Na wʋ lɛ 'yɛr, "Vɛ̃ ka a bala jaa na bʋɔlɔ a sɩ Soro yuor, tɔɔ yɩ putuyele pɔ."
A yir kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ, bʋ̃dimaal bomo ma ben be, ka amɩne ɩ sɛlma, nɩ kpãna, tɩchɛ ka amɩne mɩ ɩ daar nɩ yɔɔraa, ka amɩne ɩ bʋ̃'yɔ̃ɔnsɩ, ka amɩne ɩ babãma bomo.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ jaa na pɛɛn wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a bonsɩ anyã ɩn bʋɔl kaar, wʋn kaara na bʋ̃dimaal bomo na tara 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ na wʋ oo wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʋ a yir sʋɔ, ka wʋn tʋ̃ɔ de maal tʋ̃vɩla jaa bʋrɔ.
Tɔɔ yɩ a pɔlbil ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ pɔ, na fʋ turo yeltorsɩ, na fʋ tara sɔɔfʋ, nɩ nʋ̃fʋ, nɩ nyã'maar, 'matãan a bala na puoro a sɩ Soro nɩ a nyã chɛchɛ.
Tɔr a jɔl yele nɩ a nɛchɩrɛ na ba tara par ɛ, bojũu a maa yaara tɩ waan jɛɛr ɛ.
A ba sɛɛ ɩka a sɩ Soro tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ bʋɔrɔ jɛɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ maala vɩla kʋrɔ nɩrɛ jaa, na wʋ tʋ̃ɔ wile, na wʋ tara kãnyir.
A bala na chɩrɛ, wiil ba jomm, amɩne Nãaŋmɩn na wa sɔɔ naa ka ba lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr, na ba wa bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Lɛ lɛ a ba tɩɛr na yuo a ba faa ba mɩ̃ɛ yin a Satan chɛbaa pɔ, a lɛ wʋn nyɔɔr ba a ba ɩrɛ a wʋ bɔfʋ.
Tɩchɛ bɔ̃ɔn a yele nyãna ɩka a bɩbir baaraa daar, dɔɔyɛ na ben be.
Nɩbɛ na nʋ̃n a ba mɩ̃ɛ, libinʋ̃nbɔ, mɩ̃ɛ 'mɔɔfʋ, ba kʋ̃ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩbɛ ɛ, na ba kʋ̃ wõnõ a ba dɔɔrbɔ toor ɛ, ka bon maa sɛɛ ba ɛ, na ba kʋ̃ ɩ chɛchɛ ɛ.
Ba maa tara nɩrɛ tɩɛr ɛ, ba maa vɛ̃ kʋ nɩrɛ ɛ, na ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa yoe, baa nyɔɔrɔ ba mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, na ba 'yɛrɛ 'yɛrbikpɩ̃ɛn, na ba chire yelvɩla.
Ban ɩn gagarsɩ, na ba ɩ jukpɩ̃ɛn dẽme, na ba bʋɔrɔ yuor, ban nʋ̃n bʋ̃vɩɛlsɩ gar ban nʋ̃ Nãaŋmɩn,
ba maal ba mɩ̃ɛ Nãaŋmɩn puorbo kaar, tɩ chiir a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ. Ta gbɛɛrɛ ba ɛ.
A ba pɔ lɛ a bamɩne ma fara kpɩɛrɛ a yie pɔ na ba yʋɔrɔ bɛlɛ a pɔbɔ bala na ba bɔ̃ɔ a ba tɩɛr gaa jie ɛ, ka a ba yeldɛbɛ dɔl taa, ka a yeldɛbɛ jaa vɔlaa ma nyɔɔ ba.
Ba ma jãna na bɩbir jaa tɩ ba maa tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Nɩtãa lɛ a Janɩsɩ nɩ Jãbɩrɛsɩ na ba sɔɔ a Mosesɩ ɛ, lɛ mɩ lɛ a nɩbɛ banyãna mɩ tɔr a yelmɩ̃ɛ, baa tara tɩɛr vɩla ɛ, a sɔɔfʋ yele jũu, ba ɩn faa.
A ba yele kʋ̃ chen tɛɛr ɛ, a lɛ an kaara a nɩbɛ ayi banyãna. Nɩrɛ jaa na nyɛn a lɛ ban jɔl jɩ̃.
Fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ gba jaa nyɛn a n wiilfʋ bɔ̃ɔ, lɛ a n beraa na kaara, bon 'lɔ ɩn bʋɔrɔ a n nyɛvʋr pɔ, a n sɔɔfʋ, a n kãnyir, a n nʋ̃fʋ lɛ ɩn ara kpɛ̃ɔ,
a dɔɔyɛ ɩn di, nɩ a lɛ ban ge ma. Fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa a lɛ na pɔɔ ma a Antiok, nɩ a Ikoniyum, nɩ a Lɩstɩra tẽn pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a sɩ Soro faa ma yin a jaa pɔ.
Sɩrɛ jaa, a bala jaa na bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba turo a Nãaŋmɩn sɔr, na ba pɛlɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pʋɔ, na nyɛn gefʋ,
tɩchɛ a putudẽme nɩ a bala na maal ba mɩ̃ɛ nɩmɩn kaar, na kpɛ̃n sɔ̃ɔnaa pɔ, na ba wɛ, ba bɛlɛ naa ba taaba, ka ba kpɛ taa bɛlfʋ pɔ.
Fʋ̃ʋ 'lɔ, mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nɩ a lɛ fʋn jãn na fʋ sɔɔ de, bojũu fʋ bɔ̃ɔn a nɩrɛ 'lɔ sɛ̃ fʋn jãn,
nɩ lɛ a fʋ bibile sɔ̃ɔ jaa fʋn bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn, na tʋ̃ɔ sʋ̃ʋ fʋ ka fʋ tara yɛ̃, nyɛ faafʋ, fʋn sɔɔ de a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu.
A Nãaŋmɩn gãma a jaa yi naa a wʋ sɛ̃, na a sɛɛ wiilfʋ, na a wile 'mabfʋ nɩ chɔɔrfʋ, naa na wiil nɩrɛ ka wʋ ɩ nɩtor.
Lɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩrɛ na bɔ̃ɔ na wʋ kpɛ̃mɛ kʋ tʋ̃vɩla jaa bʋrɔ.
N kpãana fʋ naa a Nãaŋmɩn niem nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na wa tɔɔr a kũn nɩ a vʋɛ 'yɛr, a wʋ waa daar, nɩ a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ.
Mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr sɔ̃ɔ jaa, ka sɔr yuon bɩɩ ka sɔr ba yuo ɛ, kpãana ba, na fʋ wile, na fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ba ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn, na fʋ tara kãnyir wile nɩ.
Bojũu sɔ̃ɔ waara ka nɩbɛ kʋ̃ lɛ chɛlɛ a wiilfʋ ala na tor ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a ba tobo jɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ba 'yɛryor wõfʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka ba bʋɔl wiwiilyɔɔ lɔ̃ɔtaar ka ba wile ba lɛ ban bʋɔrɔ.
Ban pãa lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ na ba chɛlɛ a wiilfʋ ala na ɩ jire.
Tɩchɛ fʋ̃ʋ 'lɔ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃, na fʋ tara kãnyir a fʋ dɔɔyɛ pɔ, na fʋ mʋɔlɔ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, na fʋ tʋ̃ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ.
Bojũu a n nyɛvʋr nɩ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ ma ben baaraa ka n kʋ̃ yaar tɩ kpi ɛ.
Maa jɛb a jɛbvɩla, naa jo baar tun a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ, naa tara a sɔɔfʋ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a sɩ Soro na ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ tɔ tɔɔrɔ bin naa a nyɛvʋr nãa jupil gun ma, wʋn na kʋ ma a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, maa tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala jaa na nʋ̃ a wʋ waa.
Mɔ̃ wa a n sɛ̃ fɔfɔɔ jaa.
Bojũu Demas na nʋ̃ a dɩna wɛr jũu tɔr ma naa tɩ chen a Tɛsalonika, ka a Kɩrɩsɩn mɩ chen Galatiya ka Titusɩ mɩ chen Dalmatiya.
Luka tɛɛ lɛ be a n sɛ̃. Yɔbɔ Maakɩ ka yɩ 'mataa wa, bojũu wʋ tara na tɔ̃nɔ̃ na wʋn sʋ̃ʋ ma a tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ.
N tʋ̃n Tɩchɩkusɩ be a Efesus.
Fʋ̃ʋ wa waara, de a fuuvɛɛ 'lɔ ɩn bar be a Toroyas be a Kapusɩ sɛ̃ nɩ a gãma na fʋ 'mataa den a sɛɛr ala ban sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɛr gãn pɔ waan.
Aleksanda na ɩ a sãakuro maal man dɛɛr, a sɩ Soro na yab wʋn a lɛ wʋn maal ma.
Fʋ̃ʋ mɩ, bɔ̃ɔ a wʋ yele sʋ̃, bojũu wʋ chɩrɛ naa a lɛ sɩn 'yɛrɛ.
A dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ n 'yɛr faa a n mɩ̃ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa ba wa pʋɔ ma ɛ, tɩchɛ ba jaa tɔr man bar. Nãaŋmɩn wʋ ta de a lɛ yãan ba sãma ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a sɩ Soro ara na gu ma na wʋ kʋ ma kpɛ̃ɔ, ka a na tu a n 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a 'yɛrbir tʋ̃ɔ mʋɔl, ka a bala na ba puor ɛ, wõ naa. Lɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn faa ma a jukpɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ pɔ.
A sɩ Soro na faa man yin yelbier a jaa pɔ, na wʋ chiin ma a wʋ saaju nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ so a tɩɩr bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
Puor Pɩrɩsɩla nɩ Akuila, nɩ a Onesiforusɩ yir dẽme ba jaa.
Erastus chɛnɛ na be Korɩntɩ. Torofimusɩ an ɔɔrɔ ka n bar wʋ be Miletusɩ.
Mɔ̃ tɩ na fʋ wa tɩchɛ ka ɔɔr daar ta. Yubulus puoro fʋ naa nɩ Pudɛnsɩ nɩ Linus nɩ Kɩlaudiya nɩ a yɛɛr ba jaa.
A sɩ Soro wʋ be a fʋ sɛ̃, ka a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ be a yɩ jaa sɛ̃.
Maa Pɔɔl na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nãa, Nãaŋmɩn ir man tʋ̃ ɩka n tɩ sʋ̃ʋ a wʋ nɩchɛl irsɩ sɔɔfʋ ka ba bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ tɩ turo a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba turo.
Ala lɛ ɩ a nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔn, a Nãaŋmɩn na ba ŋmaara jir ɛ, na tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ sɩ a nyɛvʋr nyã yele sɛrɛ tɩ bon jaa wa piel.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na sɛɛ na wa ta, Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ naa ka a wʋ 'yɛr gã chãa pɔ, ka n 'yɛrɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a sɩ Fafaara na de kʋ ma ɩka n 'yɛr.
N sɛɛrɛ na a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a fʋ̃ʋ Titusɩ na sɔɔ a Yesu jũu, fʋ ɩ naa a n bie. Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ sɩ Fafaara Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jie, a be a fʋ sɛ̃.
Lɛ na so ka n bar fʋ a Kɩrete paal nɩ nyã, ɩka fʋ baar maal a ala na chɛ ka a tor, tɩ na fʋ ir nɩbɛrɛ a tẽn ala nɩ tãa lɛ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ wiil fʋ.
A nɩdiere wʋ ta ɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ nɩbɛ na nyɛrɛ yeldɛbɛ a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, wʋ ɩ pɔɔ bʋ̃'yen sʋɔ, na wʋ ɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ a wʋ bibiir na sɔɔ Nãaŋmɩn, na ba ta ɩ bigãlsɩ nɩ bibawõnsɩ ɛ.
A nɩdiere an ɩ Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃mɔ̃ lɛ wʋ kaara jũu, wʋ ta ɩ tuor kʋ a nɩbɛ ɛ, wʋ ta ɩ nɩrɛ suur na ire fɔfɔɔ ɛ, na wʋ mɩ ta ɩ dãnburo ɛ, wʋ ta ɩ nɩrɛ na jɛɛrɛ, bɩɩ bʋɔrɔ libie na ba tu sɔr ɛ.
Wʋ ɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na diere sãanba, na wʋ nʋ̃ vɩla maalfʋ, na wʋ ɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na nyɔɔrɔ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, na wʋ ma ɩrɛ a lɛ na tor, na wʋ ɩ nɩchɛchɛ, tɩ kpãana wʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
Wʋ nyɔɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr nyã tara kpɛ̃ɔ nɩtãa lɛ an wiil. Lɛ lɛ wʋn tʋ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a bamɩne ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn nɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ wiilfʋ tɩ dɛn a bala na kpɛrɛ.
Bojũu a ba yɔɔ bala na ɩ a bawõnsɩ nɩ 'yɛr pɔrsɩ nɩ bɛ̃bɛlbɛ bala na yi a yɔŋmarba jie.
A sɛɛ naa ɩka fʋ ŋmaa ba sɔr, bojũu ba tu naa a ba bɔdɛbɛ bɛl yir gbulo nɩbɛ na ba wile yelsɩ ala na ba sɛɛ ɩka ba wile ɛ.
A ba yɛ̃ sʋɔ kɔ̃ɔ gba dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a ba 'yɛr, "Yɩn Kɩrete dẽme ɩn jir ŋmarba. Yɩ kaara fɩka dʋ̃dɛbɛ, koro dẽme na bʋɔrɔ bʋ̃diir tɛɛ."
A dãasɩɛ nyã ɩn sɩrɛ, a lɛ jũu, kpãa ba nɩbijɩɛ ka a ba sɔɔfʋ kpɛ̃mɛ a yelmɩ̃ɛ wiilfʋ pɔ,
ka ba ta chɛlɛ a Juu nɩbɛ fuolsɩ nɩ a bala na bar a yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Ba tɔr a ba wiilfʋ.
Bala jaa na tara pʋtɩvɩla, yele jaa vɩla na kʋ ba, tɩchɛ bala na tara pʋtɩdɛɛr, na baa sɔɔ de ɛ, yele jaa ɩn dɛɛr a ba sɛ̃. Sɩrɛ jaa lɛ, a ba pʋtɩɛrsɩ dɛɛ naa.
Ba mɩ ɩka ba bɔ̃ɔn Nãaŋmɩn tɩchɛ a ba maalfʋ pɔ, ba tɔr wʋ naa. Ba ɩn nɩ'laarsɩ, bawõnsɩ na ba sɛɛn vɩla maalfʋ ɛ.
Fʋ̃ʋ Titusɩ, wile a nɩbɛ a lɛ na ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ wiilfʋ.
Wile a danyɔ̃n ka ba bal nɩbir, lɛ na vɛ̃ naa ka nɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ba na ba nyɔɔrɔ ba mɩ̃ɛ, ka a ba sɔɔfʋ nɩ nʋ̃fʋ nɩ kãnyir tarfʋ chaar kʋ a nɩbɛ.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ, wile a pɔɔnyɔ̃n ka ba joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbɩ̃ɛ na ba ta ɩ gagarsɩ ɛ, bɩɩ de ba ju 'yɔ̃ɔ dãa pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka ba wile a lɛ na vɩla.
Bala wa be a nɩtɔ̃, ban tʋ̃ɔn wile a pɔɔbil nɩ yɛ̃ ka ba nʋ̃ a ba sɩrbɛ nɩ a ba bibiir,
tɩ nyɔɔrɔ ba mɩ̃ɛ nɩ pʋpɛl, tɩ ɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ a yir na ba maala vɩla, tɩ turo a ba sɩrbɛ nɛɛ, ka nɩrɛ jaa ta nyɛ yeldɛɛr a ba Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr pɔ ɛ.
Lɛ mɩ nɩ wʋ ju lɛ, 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔlbil ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn ka ba nyɔɔrɔ ba mɩ̃ɛ.
Yele jaa pɔ, vɛ̃ ka ba nyɛ a fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ maal vɩla jɩ̃nɛ. Vɛ̃ ka ba nyɛ a fʋ nɩbijɩɛ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ a fʋ wiilfʋ pɔ,
a fʋ 'yɛr na tor jũu, fʋ yuor kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ sɔ̃ɔ ɛ, ka a vĩ kpɛ a bala na kpɛrɛ fʋ, bojũu baa nyɛ 'yɛrdɛɛr jaa na 'yɛr a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Wiil a gbãgbaar ka ba turo a ba nɩbɛrɛ nɛɛ yele jaa pɔ, na yɩ pɛl a ba pʋʋr na yɩ ta lɩɛrɛ ba nɛɛ ɛ.
Ba tara yelmɩ̃ɛ yele jaa pɔ, na ba ta juro a ba puor ɛ. Yɩn be ɩrɛ a lɛ, yele jaa yɩn maala, ban nyɛ naa a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a sɩ yeldɛɛr Fafaara 'yɛr nʋ̃mɔ̃ a ba sɛ̃.
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn wiil sɩ naa a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ ka nɩrɛ jaa na tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ faafʋ.
A wile sɩ naa ka sɩ na tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ a ala Nãaŋmɩn na 'laar, bɩɩ vɛ̃ ka a wɛr nyã vɔlaa dib sɩ ɛ, tɩ kpɩɛrɛ nɩ mɩ̃ɛ nyɔɔfʋ nɩ yeltorsɩ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ a dɩna wɛr nyã pɔ.
A lɛ sɩn chɛnɛ chɛlɛ ka a wɛr nyã pɔ, sɩ chɛnɛ na chɛlɛ a bɩbir kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a sɩ Fafaara na lɩɛb wa nɩ a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ.
'Lɔ lɛ kpi a sɩ jũu na wʋ da sɩ faa sɩ yin a putuyele nyã pɔ, na wʋ pɛɛ a sɩ dɛbɛ bar ka sɩ ɩ wʋ mɩ̃ɛ nɩbɛ, ka vɩla maalfʋ ɩ sɩ vɔlaa.
Wile a anyãna, na fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔn ba ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn tɩ kpãana ba nɩbijɩɛ. Ta vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ jaa kaa fʋ pɔrɔ ɛ.
Tɩɛr a Yesu turbo ɩka ba turo a ba nɩbɛrɛ nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme nɛɛ tɩ turo a lɛ jaa ban 'yɛr, na ba chɔɔr gu vɩla jaa maalfʋ.
Ba ta ma ŋmara taa poe ɛ, tɩchɛ ba tara nyã'maar nɩ nɩrɛ jaa na ba tɩɛrɛ taa yele. Ba siir ba mɩ̃ɛ sɩrɛ jaa ka nɩbɛ nyɛ.
Sɩ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ jɔlɔ a ba kaar nɩ bawõnsɩ ka a Satan bɛl sɩ ka a wɛr nyã bonsɩ a jaa ma ɩrɛ sɩ vɔlaa, ka sɩ lɩɛb gbãgbaar, na sɩ pãa kpɩɛrɛ nɩ ger nɩ nyuur, ka ba 'laar sɩ, ka sɩ mɩ 'laar 'laar taa.
Tɩchɛ a sɔ̃ɔ na wa ta, a sɩ Fafaara Nãaŋmɩn maal vɩla nɩ a wʋ nʋ̃fʋ na wa wa,
wʋ faa sɩ naa, a ba ɩ a sɩ yelvɩɛl sɩn maal jũu ɛ, tɩchɛ a wʋ nɩbaal jũu lɛ. Wʋ faa sɩ naa na wʋ pɛɛ sɩ tu a dɔɔfʋ gbɛɛ ayi ka a wʋ Sɩɛ maal sɩ a sɩ ɩ nɩpaalaa,
a Sɩɛ nyã lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tu a Yesu na ɩ a sɩ Fafaara 'yɔ̃ɔ kʋ sɩ.
A lɛ lɛ, wʋn ben maal sɩ ka sɩ tor a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ jũu, sɩ ɩn a wʋ bʋ̃dirbe, na sɩ lɔb yãan bar guro nɩ a nyɛvʋr 'lɔ na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.

Yelmɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr nɩ nyã, n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka fʋ do ara a yelsɩ anyãna pɔ wile nɩbijɩɛ, a lɛn vɛ̃ naa ka a bala na sɔɔ Nãaŋmɩn, de a ba sɔ̃ɔ nɩ a ba tɩɛr ɩrɛ nɩ yelvɩɛlsɩ tɛɛ. A lɛ vɩɛlɛ naa tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʋ nɩrɛ jaa.
Tɩchɛ ta chɛlɛ a jɔl chiirfʋ nɩ lɛ a sãakpãmɩne na tu taa mana bɩɩ jɛɛrɛ a nɛɛ 'lɔ ban bin a kõro jaa ɛ, bojũu a anyãna ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ.
Kpãa nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ooro gbɛbʋ̃'yen, 'lɔ wa tɔr, lɛ kpãa wʋ a gbɛɛ ayi sʋɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ wa tɔr, fʋ ir nũu tɩchɛ wʋ bar.
Fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a nɩrɛ nyã tɔ sʋɔ lo naa, wʋ mɩ̃ɛ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka wʋ ɩn dɛɛr.
N bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n tʋ̃ Atɩmasɩ bɩɩ Tɩchɩkusɩ a fʋ sɛ̃, ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na wa tɩ, mɔ̃ tɩ na fʋ tuor ma a be a Nikopolis, bojũu be lɛ n bʋɔrɔ ɩka n chen a ɔɔr sɔ̃ɔ.
Mɔ̃ na fʋ sʋ̃ʋ a 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ Jenasɩ nɩ Apolosɩ ka ba ta faa bon jaa a sɔr pɔ ɛ.
Vɛ̃ ka a sɩ nɩbɛ jãn vɩla maalfʋ ka ban tʋ̃ɔ maal a ala ban bʋɔrɔ na ba ta ɩ nɩhayasɩ ɛ.
Bala jaa na be ka a n sɛ̃, puoro fʋ naa. Puor a bala na nʋ̃ sɩ a sɔɔfʋ jũu. A wɩ̃ɛfʋ a be a yɩ jaa sɛ̃.
Maa Pɔɔl ban pɔɔ die pɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu nɩ Timoti na ɩ a sɩ yɛbɛ, lɛ sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ a Filemon na ɩ a sɩ badatuo na wʋ ɩ a sɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃tɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ,
na sɩ mɩ sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ Afɩya na ɩ a sɩ yɛpɔɔ, nɩ Archipus na ɩ a sɩ soja ɩ̃sʋɔ, nɩ a pupuorbiir bala na ma 'lɔɔ a fʋ yir puor.
Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na yi a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃, a be a fʋ sɛ̃.
N ma puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan sɔ̃ɔ jaa, naa ma pʋrɔ a fʋ yuor a n Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ pɔ,
bojũu n wõn a fʋ sɔɔfʋ fʋn tara a sɩ Soro Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ, nɩ a nʋ̃fʋ fʋn tara nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ba jaa.
N sʋɔrɔ na Nãaŋmɩn ɩka fʋ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir fʋ̃ʋ wa mana a sɔɔfʋ 'yɛr, na fʋ tara par bɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ a yelvɩɛl ala sɩn tara a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
N yɛbɛ, a fʋ nʋ̃fʋ vɛ̃n ka n chɩlɛ, na a 'yɔ̃ɔ ma ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ, bojũu fʋ 'maan a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ nyãn.
A lɛ jũu, ɩn naa tʋ̃ɔ chɛ nyãa a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ gba naa kpãa fʋ ɩka fʋ tʋ̃ a lɛ an sɛɛ ɩka fʋ tʋ̃,
tɩchɛ n sʋɔrɔ fʋ naa a nʋ̃fʋ jũu. Maa Pɔɔl pãa ɩn danyɔ̃ɔ, naa ɩ nɩrɛ ban pɔɔ die pɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu.
N sʋɔrɔ fʋ naa a Onɩsɩmɔsɩ na ɩ a maa bie, 'lɔ lɛ lɩɛb a n bie a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ban 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ.
A sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ, waa dɔ̃ɔ tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʋ fʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã wʋ tara na tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʋ a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a maa.
N tʋ̃nɔ̃ wʋ naa, wʋ ɩn a maa mɩ̃ɛ nyãa ɩka wʋ lɩɛb wa a fʋ sɛ̃.
Ɩn taa nʋ̃n ɩka wʋ be a n sɛ̃ na wʋ ta de a fʋ jie sʋ̃nɔ̃ ma ban 'yɔ̃ɔ ma a bɔ̃jɔrsɩ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ mʋɔlfʋ jũu,
tɩchɛ n ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka n maal yele jaa ka maa ba sʋʋr fʋ kaa ɛ, ka a vɩla jaa na yi a fʋ nyãa pɔ naa taa ɩ fɩrfʋ ɛ.
Amɩne sɛ̃, ala lɛ tɔ̃ɔ so ka wʋ ŋmaa yi a fʋ sɛ̃ a bɩ̃lãa, tɩchɛ na wʋn lɛ wa be a fʋ sɛ̃ jaa kpo kpo.
Pʋ̃pãanyã waa lɛ chɛnɛ ɩ gbãgbaa ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ ɩn gar gbãgbaa, na wʋ ɩ yɛbɛ kʋ fʋ. Wʋ ɩn nɩrɛ ɩn nʋ̃ ka fʋ mɩ gba nʋ̃, wʋn ɩ nɩrɛ nɩ yɛbɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A lɛ jũu, ala ɩ fʋ nyɛ man ka n ɩ a fʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃tɔ sʋɔ, de wʋ nɩtãa a lɛ fʋn taa sɔɔ de ma.
Ala ɩ wʋ wa maal fʋn dɛɛr bɩɩ wʋ di fʋn sãn, de pʋɔ a maa sãn pɔ.
Maa Pɔɔl lɛ sɛɛrɛ a yele nyã nɩ a maa mɩ̃ɛ nũu. Ɩ̃n yab fʋ naa. N kʋ̃ 'yɛr 'yɛr jaa ɩka a fʋ̃ʋ mɩ̃ɛ gba mɩ di man sãn ɛ.
Ɔ̃ɔ, n yɛbɛ, vɛ̃ ka n nyɛ a tɔ̃nɔ̃ nyã yin a fʋ sɛ̃ a sɩ Soro 'yɔ̃ɔ, 'maa a n nyãa a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
N bar tɩɛr a fʋ nɛɛ tufʋ jũu, naa sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ fʋ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka fʋn maal gar a lɛ ɩn sʋɔr fʋ ɩka fʋ maal.
Yele bʋ̃'yen na chɛ, chɔɔr sãan gaa jie bar ma. A yɩ Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ jũu, n tɩɛr ɩka wʋn sɔɔ naa ka a nɩbɛ banyãna yuo ma a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, ka n wa a yɩ sɛ̃.
Epafaras na ɩ a n tɔ sʋɔ ban 'mataa pɔɔ a die pɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jũu, puoro fʋ naa.
Ka Maakɩ mɩ nɩ Aristakus nɩ Demas nɩ Luka na ɩ a n taaba tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ, mɩ puoro fʋ naa.
A sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ wʋ be a fʋ sɛ̃.
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ po, Nãaŋmɩn tun a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ sɛ̃ na wʋ 'yɛr 'yɛr dẽdẽme kʋ a sɩ sãamɩne sɔɩ yɔɔ jaa pɔ,
tɩchɛ a ber baaraa anyã 'lɔ, wʋ 'yɛr 'yɛr kʋ sɩ tun a wʋ Bie wʋn ir ka wʋn ɩ a bonsɩ a jaa bʋ̃dire. 'Lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ wʋ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ tu maal a wɛr wʋ jaa.

A Bie lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr chãa, na wʋ kaara a Nãaŋmɩn kaar jaa chɔ̃, ka a wʋ 'yɛr na tara kpɛ̃ɔ lɛ wʋ tɩɛn a bonsɩ a jaa taalɛ. A lɛ wʋn wa pɛɛ a yelbier baar, wʋ don tɩ jɩ̃nɛ a Tɩɩr Sʋɔ nũsʋ̃ɔ jie be a saaju.
Lɛ lɛ wʋ pãa gar a malakasɩ ba jaa, ka a yuor 'lɔ wʋn nyɛ, mɩ gar a ba bon.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn ba dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ a malaka ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ɩka, "Fʋ ɩn a n Bie, dɩna n lɩɛb a fʋ Sãa", bɩɩ 'yɛr go ɩka, "Ɩn ɩ naa a wʋ Sãa, ka wʋ mɩ ɩ a n Bie"?
A nɩ mɩ go, a lɛ wʋn waara nɩ a wʋ Bidadɔ̃ɔ ka a wɛr pɔ, wʋ 'yɛr naa, "Vɛ̃ ka a Nãaŋmɩn malakasɩ ba jaa gbur dumo puor wʋ."
A malakasɩ 'lɔ, nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn 'yɛr a ba 'yɛr, "Nãaŋmɩn maal a malakasɩ sɛsɛbɛ kaar. Ba ɩn a wʋ tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ kaara fɩka bũu 'lɩraa kaar."
Tɩchɛ, nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn gãn mɩ 'yɛr a Bie 'yɛr, "Nãaŋmɩn, a fʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ na ben be bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa, ka a torfʋ ɩ a fʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ dãgbal.
Fʋ nʋ̃n torfʋ tɩ na fʋ 'laar putuyele. A lɛ jũu, Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a fʋ Nãaŋmɩn, 'mɔɔ fʋ naa ka fʋ do gar a fʋ taaba ba jaa, a lɛ wʋn pʋr a pʋpɛl kãa 'yɔ̃ɔ fʋ."
A Nãaŋmɩn gãn lɛ 'yɛr naa, "A pielfʋ daar a fʋ̃ʋ Soro, fʋ̃ʋ lɛ kpar a tẽe par, ka a saaju wʋ jaa ɩ a fʋ nuur tʋ̃mɔ̃.
A jaa na wa sɔ̃ɔ naa, tɩchɛ ka fʋ̃ʋ 'lɔ be be, a jaa na wa koraa naa chɩɛr fɔbaa kaar.
Fʋn pilãa naa fɩka fuu, naa lɩɛb fɔɔr kaar. Tɩchɛ ka a fʋ̃ʋ 'lɔ chɛnɛ a lɛ nɛ, ka a fʋ yuomo ba tara baarfʋ ɛ."
Malaka buor sʋɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ wa 'yɛr kʋ ɩka, "Jɩ̃nɛ a n nũsʋ̃ɔ jie, ka n wa de a fʋ dɔ̃dẽme ka ba ɩ a fʋ gbɛɛ dɔɔlfʋ jie"?
A ba ɩ a malakasɩ ba jaa ɩ naa a sɩtʋ̃nsɩ a Nãaŋmɩn na ma ir tʋ̃, ka ba wa sʋ̃nɔ̃ a bala na nyɛ a faafʋ ɛ?
Sɩ bɔ̃ɔ chɛlɛ sʋ̃, a lɛ jũu ka a bon 'lɔ sɩn wõ, ka sɩ taa sal lo ɛ.
Bojũu ala ɩ a malakasɩ 'yɛr ban dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ, ka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na jɛb a 'yɛr bɩɩ tɔr a 'yɛr, ma nyɛn a toor tɔɔfʋ 'lɔ na tor,
ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a sɩn mɩ na ɩ chɩ̃ɛ, ala ɩ sɩ kaa naa a faa kpɛ̃ɛ nyã pɔrɔ? A sɩ Soro lɛ dɔ̃ɔ nie 'yɛr a faafʋ nyã 'yɛr, ka a bala na wõ naa pãa mɩ man jaa nɛ nɛ nɛ kʋ sɩ.
Nãaŋmɩn mɩ sɔɔ naa na wʋ de jɩ̃nsɩ, nɩ tʋ̃fɛrsɩ, nɩ nɛ'maa tʋ̃dẽdẽme, nɩ a lɛ wʋn kʋ sɩ a wʋ Sɩɛ, na wʋ kʋ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa a lɛ na ɩ a wʋ bɔfʋ.
A ba ɩ a malakasɩ lɛ na so a wɛr 'lɔ na waara ɛ, a 'lɔ 'yɛr sɩn ben 'yɛrɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a jie ɩ̃sʋɔ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ 'yɛr naa, "Bo lɛ nɩrɛ ɩ, ka fʋ tara a wʋ tɩɛr, bɩɩ nɩsaal bie mɩ ɩ ka fʋn tara a wʋ tɩɛr?
Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ maal wʋ, a wʋ ɩ jaa pʋʋr ka a malakasɩ gar wʋ, fʋ den tɩɩr nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋ wʋ.
Na fʋ de bonsɩ a jaa bin a wʋ gbɛɛ pĩlem." Nãaŋmɩn den bonsɩ a jaa kʋ wʋ, bon jaa ba be be ka waa tʋ̃ɔ wʋ ɛ. Tɩchɛ a pʋ̃pãanyã, saa nyɛ bonsɩ a jaa na siir ba mɩ̃ɛ kʋ wʋ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ sɩ nyɛn a Yesu wʋn vɛ̃ ka wʋ ɩ jaa pʋʋr ka a malakasɩ gar wʋ, wʋ den tɩɩr nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ kʋ wʋ, bojũu wʋ din a kũu dɔɔyɛ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ vɛ̃ a wʋ lɛm kũu kaa kʋ nɩrɛ jaa.
Wʋn waara nɩ dabil yɔɔ a wʋ tɩɩr pɔ, a sɛɛn kʋ Nãaŋmɩn, a 'lɔ na so bonsɩ a jaa, nɩ a 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ bon jaa na tu be be, ka wʋ maal a ba nɩdɔ̃ɔn 'lɔ na faara ba ka wʋ ɩ chɛchɛ tu a wʋ dɔɔyɛ difʋ pɔ.
Ka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na maala a nɩbɛ ka ba ɩrɛ chɛchɛ, nɩ a bala mɩ na ɩ a chɛchɛ ɩ sãa bʋ̃'yen bibiir. A lɛ jũu, vɩ̃ ba kʋrɔ a Yesu wʋn bʋɔlɔ ba yɛɛr ɛ,
na wʋ 'yɛrɛ, "Ɩn pʋr a fʋ yuor kʋ a n yɛɛr, naa yiel yiel pɛɛn fʋ a bala na duo puoro fʋ niem."
A nɩ mɩ go, "Ɩn dɩɛl a n Nãaŋmɩn." Na wʋ lɛ 'yɛr go, "Maa nɩ nyã nɩ a bibiir bala a Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ ma."
A bibiir na tara a ɩ̃gãn nɩ a jɩ̃ɩ jũu, ba mɩ dɔɔn a Yesu ka wʋ ɩ a ba ɩ̃sʋɔ, wʋ maal a lɛ, ka a wʋ kũu na tʋ̃ɔ sɔ̃ɔ a Satan nyã na tara a kũu kpɛ̃ɔ bar,
na wʋn faa a bala jaa bar ban dɔɔ, ka a kũu dãbɩ̃ɛ maal ba a ba lɩɛb gbãgbaar.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa a ba ɩ a malakasɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ wʋ waan a sʋ̃ʋfʋ nyã ɛ, tɩchɛ a Abraham yɔ̃n 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ.

Nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ jũu lɛ so, ka a Nãaŋmɩn maal wʋ a wʋ nyɛtãan a wʋ yɛɛr. Ka a lɛ vɛ̃ a wʋ ɩ nɩbaal kaara na wʋ ɩ a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na tara yelmɩ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ, na wʋn tʋ̃ɔ de a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ lon a bɔɔr ka a nɩbɛ yeldɛɛr baar.
Bojũu a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ mɩ din tuo a bɛɛr kaa pɔ, wʋ mɩ na tʋ̃ɔn sʋ̃ʋ a bala jaa a bɛɛr kaa na nyɔɔ.
A lɛ jũu, yɛɛr na ba tara chɛfʋ ɛ, na yɩ pʋɔ a saaju bʋɔlfʋ pɔ, yɩ yuo a yɩ tɩɛr kʋ a Yesu, a nɩtʋ̃nãa nɩ a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyã 'yɛr sɩn 'yɛrɛ.
Wʋ tara na yelmɩ̃ɛ kʋ a 'lɔ na ir wʋ, nɩtãa lɛ a Mosesɩ mɩ na dɔ̃ɔ tara yelmɩ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn yir wʋ jaa pɔ.
Yesu nyɛn 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ na sɛɛ na wʋ gar a Mosesɩ, nɩtãa lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na mɛ a yir na ma nyɛ a 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ gar a yir mɩ̃ɛ.
Bojũu a yir jaa, nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ lɛ ma mɛ, tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ mɛ a bonsɩ a jaa.
Mosesɩ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃ na tara yelmɩ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn yir wʋ jaa pɔ, na wʋ dire a ala wʋn wa 'yɛr daar kɔ̃ɔ dãasɩɛ.
Tɩchɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, wʋ tara na yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn yir. Sɩn lɛ ɩ a wʋ yir, ala ɩ sɩ nyɔɔn nyãa nɩ a tɩɛrtɔfʋ 'lɔ sɩn bʋɔrɔ nɩ a yuor.
Lɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, "Dɩna ala ɩ fʋ wõn a Nãaŋmɩn kɔkɔr,
yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa kpɛ̃mɛ a yɩ nyãa nɩtãa lɛ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ chɩɩr wʋ ɛ, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ bɛɛrɛ wʋ kaara be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ.
Be lɛ a yɩ sãakpãmɩne bɛɛr ma kaa na ba mɔ̃n ma lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩ tãn yuom lɩjaayi, na ba nyɛ a lɛ ɩn ɩ.
Ala lɛ so ka n nyɛn a nɩbɛ bala suur naa 'yɛr, 'A ba tɩɛrsɩ ma yɛ̃yɛlɛ naa. Baa bɔ̃ɔ a n sɔɩ ɛ.'
Lɛ lɛ, n nyɛn suur naa pɔ 'yɛr, 'Baa be jaa na wa kpɛ a n pɛ̃nfʋ pɔ go ɛ.' "
N yɛɛr, yɩ bɔ̃ɔ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ka ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa taa tara yeldɛɛr bɩɩ nyãa na ba sɔɔ de ɛ, na wʋ lɩɛb a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yin a Nãaŋmɩn na ba kpire sɛ̃ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn bɩbir jaa, nɩtãa a bɩbir na chɛnɛ ka ba bʋɔlɔ a dɩna, ka yelbier taa bɛl ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ka wʋ kpɛ̃mɛ a wʋ nyãa ɛ.
Sɩ wa naa ka a sɩn nɩ a Kɩrɩsɩto na wa lɔ̃ɔ põ, ala ɩ sɩ ban gbɛr tɩ tãn a baaraa, a lɛ sɩn dɔ̃ɔ bar tɩɛr,
fɩka a lɛ an ben 'yɛr, "Dɩna, yɩn wa wõ a Nãaŋmɩn kɔkɔr, yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa kpɛ̃mɛ a yɩ nyãa ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ chɩɩr wʋ ɛ."
Ba boo lɛ dɔ̃ɔ wõ tɩ chɩrɛ? A ba ɩ a bala Mosesɩ na dɔ̃ɔ tara yin a Ijipitɩ tẽe pɔ lɛ ɛ?
Ba boo mɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ nyɛn a suur a yuom lɩjaayi? A ba ɩ a bala na maal a dɛɛr ɛ, na ba lo kpi be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ lɛ ɛ?
Ba boo mɩ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pɔ 'yɛr ɩka ba kʋ̃ kpɛ a wʋ pɛ̃nfʋ jie ɛ, a ba ɩ a bala na dɔ̃ɔ tɔr a wʋ nɛɛ tufʋ bar lɛ ɛ?
Lɛ lɛ, sɩ nyɛn ban ba tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ɛ, bojũu baa tara sɔɔfʋ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, an ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩr a wʋ nɛɛ a wʋ pɛ̃nfʋ pɔ kpɛfʋ na chɛnɛ be be, yɩ ɩ a sɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa taa wa kpɛ faa ɛ.
Bojũu a sɩn mɩ, ba mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ sɩ, nɩtãa lɛ ban dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ ba. Tɩchɛ a 'yɛr ban dɔ̃ɔ mʋɔl kʋ ba, ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ, bojũu a 'yɛr tɛɛ lɛ ba wõ, baa de sɔɔfʋ pʋɔ ɛ.

Pʋ̃pãanyã, a sɩn bala na sɔɔ de kpɛ̃n a pɛ̃nfʋ nyã pɔ, nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, "N nyɛn suur naa pɔ 'yɛr, baa be jaa na wa kpɛ a n pɛ̃nfʋ pɔ go ɛ." Tɩchɛ wʋ tʋ̃n a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ baar yi a wɛr pielfʋ daar jaa.
Bojũu a jie ɩ̃sʋɔ wʋ 'yɛr naa a ber ayopõi daar 'yɛr, "A ber ayopõi daar, Nãaŋmɩn bar a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ a jaa tɩ pɛ̃n."
A 'yɛrbie anyãna nɩ a ju pɔ, wʋ lɛ 'yɛr naa, "Baa be jaa na wa kpɛ a n pɛ̃nfʋ pɔ ɛ."
Sɔr chɛnɛ na yuo ka bamɩne na kpɛ a pɛ̃nfʋ nyã pɔ, ka a bala ban de nie mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ nyã kʋ, ba tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ɛ, bojũu bawõnsɩ lɛ ba ɩ.

A lɛ jũu, Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ir bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ na wʋ bʋɔlɔ wʋ dɩna, a kor lɛ̃ɛɛ tɩchɛ a wʋ lɛ wa tu a Nãa David 'yɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a lɛ nɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, "Dɩna yɩn wa wõ a Nãaŋmɩn kɔkɔr, yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa kpɛ̃mɛ a yɩ nyãn ɛ."
Bojũu ala ɩ a Josua dɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃ɔn a nɩbɛ kpɛ̃n a pɛ̃nfʋ nyã pɔ, Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ naa lɛ 'yɛr bɩbir ɩ̃sʋɔ 'yɛr go ɛ.
A ber Ayopõi 'Lɔ Pɛ̃nfʋ chɛnɛ na be be kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ.
Bojũu nɩrɛ jaa na wa kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pɛ̃nfʋ nyã pɔ, wʋ mɩ ma pɛ̃n naa a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ, nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ na pɛ̃n a wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ɩ a sɩ mʋɔrɔ ɩka sɩ kpɛ a pɛ̃nfʋ nyã pɔ, ka nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa taa ɩ bawõno a ba kaar na wʋ bãr lo ɛ.

Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɩn bʋ̃nɩbir, na wʋ ma pɩlpɩlɛ, na wʋ dire gar sɔbʋraa. Wʋ ma ŋmaan jaa kpɛ tɩ gbem a sɩɛ, na wʋ 'mar a kɔɔr, na wʋ wɛl a choofʋ jiir tɩ tãn a kɔɔr kãa pɔ. Wʋ ma tɔɔr tɩɛr nɩ befʋsɩ a jaa na be nɩrɛ nyãa pɔ 'yɛr.
Bon jaa ba be ka a bʋ̃maalsɩ pɔ naa sɔɔl a Nãaŋmɩn niem ɛ. Bon jaa ba pɔɔ ɛ, a jaa dɩɛl a wʋ niem. 'Lɔ lɛ sɩn wa man a yele a jaa kʋ.
A lɛ jũu, sɩn ben tara a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ na gar a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ ba jaa a wʋ do a be a saaju, Yesu na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, yɩ ɩ a sɩ ba gbɛr a sɩ sɔɔfʋ nyã sɩn sɔɔ pɔ.
Bojũu, saa tara a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ na kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kaa a sɩ balfʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ tara na a 'lɔ mɩ a bɛɛr kaa bʋrɔ bʋrɔ na dɔ̃ɔ nyɔɔ a sɩn mɩ kaar, tɩchɛ waa ɩ yelbier ɛ.
Yɩ ɩ a sɩ daa yi a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ nãa dakɔɔ par nɩ nyãa, na sɩ tɩ de a wʋ nɩbaal na sɩ nyɛ wɩ̃ɛfʋ, ka a sʋ̃ʋ sɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ an wa wõnõ sɩ.
A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, ba ma kãan ir wʋ a nɩbɛ pɔ, na ba ir wʋ a wʋ ma ara kʋ ba nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sãlsɔɔ, na wʋ ma de a ba kʋfʋsɩ nɩ a ba bɔɔrlo bonsɩ loro nɩ a ba yeldɛbɛ bɔɔr.
Wʋ ma tʋ̃ɔn 'mʋ̃ɔn a bala na ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩ chiine a jiyuo, bojũu a 'lɔ mɩ̃ɛ mɩ ba tara kpɛ̃ɔ ɛ.
A anyãna jũu lɛ so a wʋ ma de nie lo a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tulfʋ bɔɔr baar, tɩ pãa 'matãan a nɩbɛ ba jaa yeldɛbɛ bɔɔr.
Nɩrɛ jaa maa bʋ̃n kaa ir a 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nyãna kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ma bʋɔl wʋ, nɩtãa lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ bʋɔl a Aaron.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ, a Kɩrɩsɩto ba de a 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nyã kʋ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ɛ, na wʋ wa lɩɛb a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn mɩ lɛ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a n Bie, dɩna n lɩɛb a fʋ Sãa."
A lɛ 'yɛr a jie ɩ̃sʋɔ go, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ a bɔɔrlo kpo kpo, nɩtãa a Melkijedek kaar."
A lɛ daar a Yesu na be ka a tẽe pɔ, wʋ den sʋɔrfʋ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn kõn nɩbikʋ̃ɔ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na tʋ̃ɔ faa wʋ a kũu pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn wõ a wʋ sʋɔrfʋ, bojũu wʋ den 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ siir a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
Wʋ gba na ɩ a bie, wʋ jãn nɛɛ tufʋ yi a wʋ wõm pɔ.
Wʋn wa maal a lɛ an sɛɛ ɩka wʋ maal baar, wʋ lɩɛb a faafʋ sʋɔ kʋ a bala jaa na sɔɔ tu a wʋ nɛɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ir wʋ a wʋ ɩ a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a Melkijedek kaar.
Sɩ tara na yɔɔ naa 'yɛr tun a yele anyãna pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a par wiilfʋ kpɛ̃mɛ, bojũu a yɩ bɔ̃ɔfʋ ba tal tɛɛr ɛ.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ, a sɛɛ naa a sɔ̃ɔ nyãna pɔ, ka yɩn taa ɩ wiwiilbe, tɩ yɩ chɛnɛ bʋɔrɔ nɩrɛ ɩka wʋ wiil yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrbidɔ̃ɔ ala go. Bɩr lɛ yɩ chɛnɛ bʋɔrɔ, yaa ta saa difʋ ɛ.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na chɛnɛ 'yɛnɛ bɩr, wʋ chɛnɛ na ɩ bipɩla. A wʋ yɛ̃ ba tal tɛɛr a wʋn tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a yeltorsɩ ban wile par ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩbɛrɛ bon lɛ saa, bala 'lɔ din nyɛ ka a mɩl ba, ka ba bɔ̃ɔ vɩla nɩ dɛɛr.

A lɛ jũu, yɩ ɩ a sɩ bar a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɛr pielfʋ yele, tɩ chiine niem lɩɛrɛ nɩbɛrɛ. Yɩ ta lɛ vɛ̃ ka sɩ pʋrɔ a tɩɛr lɩɛbfʋ yuor go ɛ, nɩ tʋ̃dɛɛr jaa bʋrɔ na chiine kũu pɔ ɛ, nɩ lɛ an sɛɛ ɩka fʋ tara a Nãaŋmɩn sɔɔfʋ,
nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ sofʋ wiilfʋ, nɩ nuur dɔɔlfʋ yele, nɩ kũu pɔ irfʋ nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ yele.
Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn sɔɔ naa, sɩn ɩn a lɛ.
An ɩn tuo kʋ a bala na dɔ̃ɔ nyɛ a chãa, a bala na lɛm a saaju kʋfʋ kaa, na ba 'mataa põn a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ,
a bala na lɛm a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr vɩla kaa, nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ na waara a baaraa daar.
Ala ɩ ba faan lo, an ɩn tuo ka ba lɛ waan ba a ba wa nyɛ tɩɛr lɩɛbfʋ, bojũu a ba bɔrfʋ lɛ kpara naa a Nãaŋmɩn Bie a daa ju go, na ba lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ ka a nɩyɔɔ lɛ wuolo wʋ.
A lɛ a tẽe na ma nyũ a sabie kʋ̃ɔ na ma loro na wʋ bul a bonsɩ ala na tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʋ a bala na kɔ, ma nyɛn a Nãaŋmɩn sʋ̃ʋfʋ.
Tɩchɛ a tẽe 'lɔ na ma bul a gʋʋr nɩ a mɔ-ur, waa tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ ɛ, tɩ na wʋ be pɔ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ pɔ. A baarfʋ daar bũu lɛ na di wʋ.
Sɩ gban 'yɛrɛ a anyãna, barmɩne, sɩ bar tɩɛr a yɩ jie, na sɩ bɔ̃ɔn yɩn tara bʋ̃sʋ̃n, bʋ̃sʋ̃n ala na lɔ̃ɔn a faafʋ.
Nãaŋmɩn ba ɩ nɩbur bur ɛ. Wʋ kʋ̃ ĩin a yɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ nɩ a yɩ nʋ̃fʋ yɩn wiil kʋ wʋ ɛ, na yɩ sʋ̃ʋ a wʋ nɩbɛ tɩ chɛnɛ sʋ̃nɔ̃ ba.
Sɩ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir maala a lɛ nɛ tɩ tãn a baaraa, na yɩ kʋ̃ baala a yɩ tɩɛrtɔ jie ɛ.
Saa bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ ɩ koro dẽme ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ tɔɔrɔ a bala na tu a sɔɔfʋ pɔ tara kãnyir nyɛn a bonsɩ ala a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ.
Lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩrɛ a nɛɛ kʋrɔ a Abraham, nɩrɛ jaa na ba be be gar wʋ a wʋn pɔn jũu, wʋ pɔn naa a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ,
na wʋ 'yɛrɛ, "Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ, ɩn sʋ̃ʋ fʋ naa, naa vɛ̃ ka a fʋ bal par paal."
Lɛ lɛ a Abraham tara a kãnyir na wʋ chɛl lɛ̃ɛɛ wa de a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ wʋ.
Nɩrɛ ma den a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na gar wʋ yuor pɔn, ka a lɛ wʋn ma tɩr a nɛɛ ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ, ka a wɩlɛwɩlɛ maa lɛ be be go ɛ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ maal a wʋ befʋ 'lɔ na ba lɩɛrɛ ɛ, ka a chaar kʋ a bala na wa de a ala wʋn tɩr a nɛɛ. Wʋ tɩr nɛɛ ɩka wʋn maal a lɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn maal a nɩtɔ̃ ɩka, a bonsɩ ayi anyã na ba tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ lɩɛrɛ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn mɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ŋmaa jire ɛ, ka a sɩn bala na jo tɩ nyɔɔ a tɩɛrtɔfʋ nyã wʋn kʋ sɩ a pɔrɔ taalɛ, ka a na 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn.
A tɩɛrtɔfʋ nyã lɛ sɩ tara, naa ɩ a nɛbikur na ma lũ a sɩ sɩɛ a wʋ chɩm ba dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ. Wʋ põn kpɛ be a diniem a fɔbaa 'lɔ ban lũ var puor.
Be lɛ a Yesu de nie chen a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, wʋ kpɛ naa a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ. Wʋ ɩ naa a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ kpo kpo nɩtãa a Melkijedek kaar.
A Melkijedek nyã lɛ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a Salem nãa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn na do gar a saaju bɔɔrloro. 'Lɔ lɛ tuor a Abraham na wʋ 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ, a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ jɛb a nãmɩne bala tʋ̃ɔ tɩ lɩɛb waara.
Ka a Abraham ir a bonsɩ ala wʋn waara nɩ a jaa pɔ pie, bʋ̃'yen kʋ wʋ. A wʋ yodɔ̃ɔ par nɩ nyã, torfʋ nãa, a nɩ mɩ, Salem nãa, a par lɛ, nyã'maar nãa.
Waa tara sãa ɛ, bɩɩ ma ɛ, nɩrɛ jaa ba bɔ̃ɔ a wʋ dɔɔfʋ daar ɛ, bɩɩ bɔ̃ɔ a wʋ bal par ɛ, bɩɩ a wʋ kũu daar ɛ. Wʋ kaara naa a Nãaŋmɩn Bie kaar, na wʋ ɩ a bɔɔrlo kpo kpo.
Yɩ tɩɛr kaa a lɛ wʋn bɛrma jɩ̃. A sɩ sãakpã Abraham gba mɩ dɔ̃ɔ kʋ wʋ a bonsɩ ala wʋn fa pɔ pie jaa pɔ bʋ̃'yen.

Pʋ̃pãanyã, a Mosesɩ nɛɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ bin 'yɛr naa ɩka, a Levi bal par pɔ lɛ a bɔɔrloro na ma yi, 'lɔ lɛ na ma de a pie jaa pɔ bʋ̃'yen yin a Isɩral nɩbɛ ba jaa sɛ̃, a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yɛɛr sɛ̃, a ba yɛɛr gba mɩ na ɩ a Abraham bal nɩbɛ sɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ a daba nyã baa gba bɩɛr a wʋ tɩ yi a Levi bal par pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ den a pie pɔ bʋ̃'yen yi a Abraham sɛ̃, na wʋ 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ a 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛr kʋ.
Baal ba be be ɛ, ɩka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na bɛrmɛ 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ a 'lɔ na ba jɩ̃ bon ɛ.
A yele ɩ̃sʋɔ nɩ nyã ɩka, a bala na kpire lɛ ma de a pie pɔ jaa bʋ̃'yen, tɩchɛ a sɔr ɩ̃sʋɔ pɔ, a Melkijedek 'lɔ na ba kpire ɛ, de naa.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ gba mɩ na 'yɛr ɩka, a Levi nɩrɛ na ma de a pie jaa pɔ bʋ̃'yen, ba yab a pie jaa pɔ bʋ̃'yen tu a Abraham sɛ̃,
bojũu a lɛ a Melkijedek na dɔ̃ɔ tuor a Abraham, a Levi chɛnɛ na be a wʋ sãakpã pʋɔm.

Ala ɩ a Levi bal nɩrɛ, a bɔɔrlo tʋ̃mɔ̃ ma ta vɛ̃n ka wʋ tor jaa dẽ dẽ, a nɛbinãa 'lɔ ban kʋ a nɩbɛ, bo lɛ so ka ba lɛ bʋɔrɔ a bɔɔrloro ɩ̃sʋɔ ɩka wʋ wa, na wʋ kaara a Melkijedek kaar na waa ɩ a Aaron kaar ɛ?
Bojũu bala wa lɩɛr a bɔɔrloro, ba mɩ ma lɩɛr a nɛbinãa.
A 'lɔ ban 'yɛrɛ na so a yele anyãna, wʋ ɩn bal yuo, ka nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba yi a bala nyãna pɔ na wʋ tɩ tʋ̃ tʋ̃mɔ̃ be a bɔɔr lofʋ jie ɛ.
Bojũu nɩrɛ jaa bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a sɩ Soro ɩn a Juda bal nɩrɛ, ka a bala nyã pɔ, Mosesɩ mɩ ba pʋr a yuor ɩka nɩrɛ na yin a bala nyã pɔ tɩ ɩ a bɔɔrloro ɛ.
Ka a lɛ sɩn 'yɛr gba gãn chãa pɔ, ɩka ala ɩ a bɔɔrloro ɩ̃sʋɔ na kaara a Melkijedek kaar wa wa naa,
a 'lɔ na wa ɩ a bɔɔrloro 'lɔ na ba tu a lɛ a nɛbinãa na 'yɛr tun a wʋ sãakpã loor ɛ, tɩchɛ a tun a lɛ a kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ na yi a nyɛvʋr na ba tara sɔ̃ɔfʋ pɔ.
Bojũu a sɛb ɩka, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a bɔɔrlo kpo kpo na ba tara tɛɛfʋ ɛ, nɩtãa a Melkijedek."
Ba tɔɔn a kõro binfʋ lan bar, bojũu wʋ bal naa na waa ɩ bʋ̃joraa go ɛ.
Bojũu a nɛbinãa nyã maa tʋ̃ɔ maal bon ka wʋ tor jaa dẽ dẽ ɛ, ka a tɩɛrtɔ yuo na ɩ gar wʋ wa, na wʋ vɛ̃ ka sɩ tɔɔ gbʋr Nãaŋmɩn.
A Nãaŋmɩn nɛtɩraa dɔ̃ɔ be be, bamɩne lɩɛb a bɔɔrlorbo ka a nɛtɩraa ba pʋɔ ɛ,
tɩchɛ 'lɔ lɩɛb a bɔɔrloro ka a nɛtɩraa pʋɔ, a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "A sɩ Soro pɔn 'yɛr, na wʋ kʋ̃ wa puur a kʋ̃ɔ bar jaa ɛ. Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a bɔɔrlo kpo kpo."
A pɔ binfʋ nyãna jũu, Yesu lɛ wʋ de bin a nɛɛ ka wʋ ɩ a nɛtɩraa na gar.
A kõro a bɔɔrlorbo bala ma dɔ̃ɔ ɩ yɔɔ, bojũu kũu maa sɔɔ ka ba be be a tʋ̃mɔ̃ pɔ kor ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a Yesu 'lɔ na ben be jaa kpo kpo, a wʋ bɔɔrlo tʋ̃mɔ̃ ba tara lɩɛrfʋ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, wʋ ma tʋ̃ɔn faa a bala na tu a wʋ jie waara a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃. Bojũu wʋ ma ben be sɔ̃ɔ jaa 'maala a Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ ba.
A bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyãna lɛ bɔ̃ɔ a lɛ sɩn bʋɔrɔ, wʋ ɩn chɛchɛ, waa tara chɛfʋ ɛ, waa bʋɔrɔ yeldɛɛr ɛ, na wʋ oo wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yin yelbe-ɩrbɛ pɔ, na wʋ do gar a saaju.

Waa kaara fɩka a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ banyã ɛ, naa ba lɛ sɛɛ ɩka wʋ loro a bɔɔr a bɩbie a jaa ɛ, na wʋn ma de nie lo a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tulo bɔɔr, tɩ pãa mɩ lo a nɩbɛ mɩ bon ɛ. Wʋ mɩ̃ɛ lɛ sɔɔ na wʋ lɩɛb a bɔɔrlo dʋ̃ɔ lo a ba yeldɛbɛ bɔɔr a dẽdẽe daa ka a baar.
Bojũu a nɛbinãa lɛ ma ir a bɔɔrlo nɩbɛrɛ, ka ba ɩ nɩbɛ na bal, tɩchɛ a pɔfʋ nyã na tu a nɛbinãa puor wa, a Bie lɛ Nãaŋmɩn ir, 'lɔ lɛ maal a lɛ jaa a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ maal.
A 'yɛrɛ sɩn 'yɛrɛ nɩ nyã, sɩn tara na a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyã na jɩ̃nɛ be a saaju kpɛ̃ɔ wʋ jaa sʋɔ nũsʋ̃ɔ jie.
Be lɛ wʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a dinie sʋɔ na ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir a sɩ Soro mɩ̃ɛ na maal, a ba ɩ a gãn yir 'lɔ a nɩrɛ na maal a wʋ nũu ɛ.
Bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ jaa ba ma ir wʋ naa ka wʋ ma diere a kʋfʋsɩ nɩ a bɔɔrlo bonsɩ loro nɩ a bɔɔr, ala lɛ so ka a nyã mɩ na de bon kɔ̃ɔ lon a bɔɔr.
Ala ɩ wʋ ta ben ka a tẽe pɔ, wʋ kʋ̃ naa ta ɩ bɔɔrloro ɛ, bojũu nɩbɛ den nie be ka, na ba ma diere a kʋfʋsɩ turo nɩ a lɛ a nɛbinãa na man.

Ban tʋ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir chɛchɛ nyã pɔ na ɩ a 'lɔ na be a saaju gãagiel ban tɔɔr maal. A anyãna jũu lɛ so ka a Nãaŋmɩn kpãkpãana a Mosesɩ a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ maal a gãn yir, na wʋ 'yɛr, "Kaara sʋ̃, na fʋ maal wʋ a lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju ɩn wiil fʋ be a tɔ̃ɔ ju."
Tɩchɛ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ 'lɔ a Yesu na nyɛ, gar a ba bon jaa bamm na ɩ a nɛtɩraa 'ma'maala na gar a bʋ̃koraa, bojũu a nɛbin paalaa na ɩ gar pɔ lɛ wʋ maal.
Bojũu ala ɩ a nɛtɩr koraa 'lɔ ba dɔ̃ɔ tara chɛfʋ ɛ, jie kʋ̃ naa be be a ba lɛ bʋɔrɔ bʋ̃yuo ɛ.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn nyɛn a lɛ a nɩbɛ na 'mab, na wʋ 'yɛr, nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr, "Bɩbir kɔ̃ɔ na wa vɩɛ naa, ka n tɩr nɛtɩr paalaa bin kʋ a Isɩral yir dẽme nɩ a Juda yir dẽme.

A kʋ̃ lɛ nyɛtãan a nɛɛ 'lɔ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ tɩr kʋ a ba sãakpãmɩne a daar 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩn nyɔɔ ba a nũu tɔɔ yin a Ijipitɩ tẽe pɔ ɛ. Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr, bojũu baa sɔɔ ara a lɛ ɩn tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ ba ɛ, ka n mɩ lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ ba.

A anyãna lɛ ɩ a nɛtɩraa ɩn na tɩr kʋ a Isɩral yir dẽme, a bɩbir 'lɔ wa vɩɛ baar. Lɛ lɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr. Ɩn de naa a n nɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba tɩɛrsɩ pɔ, na n sɛb dɔɔl a ba nyãn ju. Ka n ɩ a ba Nãaŋmɩn, ka ba mɩ ɩ a n nɩbɛ.
Nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ lɛ wiil a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ ɛ, bɩɩ ka nɩrɛ 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ yɛbɛ ɩka, 'Bɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro ɛ.' Bojũu ba jaa na bɔ̃ɔ ma naa, yi a bil pɔ tɩ tãn a bɛrɛ pɔ.
Ɩn vɛ̃n a ba putuyele bar. N kʋ̃ lɛ tɩɛr a ba yeldɛbɛ jaa go ɛ."
Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔlɔ a nɛtɩraa anyãna bʋ̃paalaa, wʋ maal a 'lɔ na de nie ka wʋ ɩ bʋ̃jʋɔlaa, ka bon mɩ na jʋɔl, wʋ maa yaara tɩ kpi ɛ.
Faa nyɛ, a nɛtɩr dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ tara na a puorfʋ chirsɩ nɩ a jichɛchɛ 'lɔ ban dɔ̃ɔ maal ka a tẽe pɔ.
A gãn yir nyã ban dɔ̃ɔ maal baar, a di yɛ̃yɛ̃ pɔ lɛ ba bin a fɩ̃tɩnsɩ dɔɔlfʋ jie nɩ a tɛɛbʋl 'lɔ ju ban ma dɔɔl a paanʋ̃chɛchɛ ala. A jie nyã lɛ ba bʋɔlɔ, Jichɛchɛ.
A dinie sʋɔ ban lũ a fɔbaa var, ba bʋɔlɔ naa a be, Chɛchɛ wʋ jaa Chɛchɛ Jie.

Be lɛ a bɔɔr lofʋ jie be na ɩ sɛlma a ba ma chʋnɔ̃ a tɩ̃ɩ nyũu vɩla ala nɩ a nɛtɩraa daka ban maal tɩ waar sɛlma pɔɔ. A daka nyãna pɔ lɛ a sɛlma dulo ban 'yɔ̃ɔ a maana nɩ a Aaron dãgbal 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ 'mʋr a puul nɩ a kʋsɩr pɛ̃rsɩ ala ban dɔ̃ɔ sɛb a nɛbinãa 'yɔ̃ɔ.

A daka nyã ju lɛ ba maal a malakasɩ bala na wile a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr ka ba ara kʋ a malakasɩ bala ban bʋɔlɔ a cherubim, ka ba ger pɔɔ a faafʋ bɔɔr lofʋ jie. Tɩchɛ sɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ man a yelsɩ anyãna tu tu taa a pʋ̃pãanyã ɛ.
Lɛ a yelsɩ anyãna ban wa chɔɔr a nɩtɔ̃ baar, a bɔɔrlorbo pãa ma kpɩɛrɛ na a di yɛ̃yɛ̃ sʋɔ pɔ, bɩbir jaa tʋ̃nɔ̃ a ba tʋ̃mɔ̃.

Tɩchɛ a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ tɛɛ lɛ ma kpɛ a dinie sɔɔ gbɛbʋ̃'yen yuon jaa, wʋ maa faa dʋ̃ɔ jɩ̃ɩ ɛ. Ala lɛ wʋ ma kpɛ̃n a be tɩ lon a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ bɔɔr, nɩ a nɩbɛ mɩ yeldɛbɛ ban ba bɔ̃ɔn ɛ, tɩ faa tul maal bɔɔr.
Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wiil a anyãna ɩka, a sɔr na kpɩɛrɛ a Jichɛchɛ 'Lɔ Wʋ Jaa Chɛchɛ Jie chɛnɛ na ba yuo ɛ, a gãn yir koro na chɛnɛ ara jũu.
A anyãna dɔ̃ɔ wile a dɩna sɔ̃ɔ, naa wile ɩka a kʋfʋsɩ nɩ a bɔɔrlo bonsɩ ala ban ma lon a bɔɔr, maa tʋ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka a 'lɔ na wa a puorfʋ jie tɩɛr chaar ɛ.
A ɩ naa bʋ̃diir tɛɛ yele, nɩ nyũfʋ yele, nɩ bʋ̃pɛɛrsɩ yelsɩ, ala lɛ ba mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir maala tɩ tãn a yelpaalaa na lɩɛr.

Lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na wa a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyã kaar, nɩ a yelsʋ̃n ala na de nie be ka, wʋ kpɛ̃n tu a jikpɛ̃ɛ nɩ a puorfʋ yir 'lɔ na ɩ chɛchɛ an ba ɩ nɩrɛ nũu lɛ maal ɛ, ka sɩ 'yɛr ɩka waa pʋɔ a bʋ̃mɩɛrsɩ pɔ ɛ.
Waa de bʋɔ bɩɩ narbil jɩ̃ɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ kpɛ naa a Jichɛchɛ Wʋ Jaa Chɛchɛ nyã pɔ, gbɛbʋ̃'yen kʋ nɩrɛ jaa nɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ jɩ̃ɩ, a sɩ tɔ̃ɔ nyɛ a faafʋ a kpo kpo.
A bʋʋr jɩ̃ɩ nɩ a nadai jɩ̃ɩ nɩ a nasarbil tãpɩɛl ban ma ɔ̃ɔ mɩr a bala na sɔ̃ɔ, ka a ba ɩ̃gãma yi ɩ bʋ̃sʋ̃n.

Ŋmɩnɛ pãa lɛ, a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto jɩ̃ɩ a 'lɔ na tu a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na ɩ nyɛvʋr, a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ na ba tara chɛfʋ ɛ, lon bɔɔr kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn na wʋ pɛɛ a sɩ tɩɛr nɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ jaa na chiine nɩ sɩ kũu pɔ, ka sɩn tʋ̃ɔ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn vʋr.

Bojũu a anyãna lɛ vɛ̃ ka a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ɩ a nɛtɩr paalaa 'ma'maala, ka a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔl, na nyɛ a bʋ̃sʋ̃n ala na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ. Pʋ̃pãanyã wʋ kpi naa na wʋ faa ba yin a yeldɛbɛ ala ban dɔ̃ɔ maal a nɛtɩr koraa 'lɔ pɔ.
Nɩrɛ wa tɩr nɛɛ ɩka 'lɔ wa kpi baar, a kũu lɛ wʋ ma wa kpi, ka a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr pãa yi chãa pɔ,
bojũu ala ɩ fʋ tɩr nɛɛ ɩka fʋ̃ʋ wa kpi baar. Fʋ̃ʋ wa chɛnɛ a ba ɩ yele ɛ, tɩchɛ fʋn wa kpi baar lɛ a pãa ɩ yele.
A anyãna jũu lɛ so gba, ka a nɛtɩr dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ maa ɩ bon jaa ka a jɩ̃ɩ ba pʋɔ ɛ.
Lɛ a Mosesɩ na wa man a nɛbinãa 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbɛ ba jaa baar, wʋ den a nelpɔlɔ jɩ̃ɩ na wʋ de kʋ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ, na wʋ de pɛr kɔɔl jɩɛ na wʋ vʋ̃ɔ urbanyũu na wʋ tun mɩr a gãn pilãa 'lɔ nɩ a nɩbɛ ba jaa.
Tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr, "A anyãna lɛ ɩ a nɛtɩraa jɩ̃ɩ, a Nãaŋmɩn na kpãkpãana yɩ ɩka yɩ turo."
Lɛ nɩ ju mɩ lɛ wʋ de a jɩ̃ɩ mɩr a gãn puorfʋ yir nɩ a bonsɩ a jaa ban ma de maala nɩ a be.
Yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa a nɛbinãa 'yɛr ɩka, ba ma de a jɩ̃ɩ mɩɩl a bonsɩ a jaa. Ka jɩ̃ɩ ba wa kpaar ɛ, yelbier vɛ̃ kʋfʋ ba be be ɛ.
A tara na sɔr ka ba chɔɔr a saaju bʋ̃tɔɔr maalaa nɩ a bɔɔrlo bonsɩ anyãna, tɩchɛ a saaju bonsɩ mɩ̃ɛ 'lɔ, a ba bɔɔrlo bon gar naa anyãna.
Bojũu Kɩrɩsɩto ba kpɛ a nɩrɛ nũu bʋ̃maalaa jichɛchɛ nyã pɔ, na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a saaju bon sʋ̃ 'lɔ ban dɔ̃ɔ tɔɔr maal ɛ. A saaju mɩ̃ɛ lɛ wʋ tɩ kpɛ, na wʋ tɩ ara a Nãaŋmɩn niem a pʋ̃pãanyã a sɩ jũu.
A ba ɩ wʋ kpɛ̃n be a saaju na wʋn lɛ tɩ loro a bɔɔr bɩbir jaa ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlo nãa na ma kpɛ a Jichɛchɛ 'Lɔ Wʋ Jaa Chɛchɛ pɔ, a yuon nɩ a jɩ̃ɩ na ba ɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ jɩ̃ɩ ɛ.

Ala ɩ lɛ lɛ a ta ɩ, Kɩrɩsɩto naa pãan din dɔɔyɛ sɔ̃ɔ jaa yi a wɛr pielfʋ daar jaa. Tɩchɛ a pʋ̃pãanyã, wʋ wa daan yi a bɩbir baaraa daar na wʋ maal yele a jaa baar, ɩka wʋ wa de a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ lɩɛb a bɔɔrlo bon diin a yelbier bar.
Nɩtãa lɛ ban dɔɔ nɩrɛ ka wʋn kpi daar kɔ̃ɔ, na wʋ tɩ tuor 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ,
lɛ lɛ, a Kɩrɩsɩto lon a bɔɔr kpo kpo kʋ nɩyɔɔ. Wʋn lɩɛb wa a gbɛɛ ayi sɔ̃ɔ, a ba ɩ fɩka a wʋ wa de a yelbier bar ɛ, tɩchɛ ka wʋ waan faafʋ wa kʋ a bala jaa na chɛlɛ wʋ.

A nɛbinãa dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a bʋ̃sʋ̃ 'lɔ na waara gãagiel, a ba ɩ a bon mɩ̃ɛ lɛ ɛ. A nɩtɔ̃ jũu, a kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ɩ a bɔɔrlo bʋ̃bʋ̃'yen ban ma lo yuon jaa ka a tʋ̃ɔ chɔɔr a bala na ma wa tɔɔ gbʋr a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Ala ɩ a ta tʋ̃ɔn chɔɔr ba, ba kʋ̃ naa bar a bɔɔrlo bomo ir fʋ ɛ? Bojũu a bala na ma ta wa a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ jie, a ba yelbier naa baar naa, ka ba kʋ̃ ma lɛ tɩɛr tɔ a ba yeldɛbɛ go ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a ba yuon jaa bɔɔrlo bonsɩ anyãna ma tɩɛrɛ ba naa a ba yeldɛbɛ,
bojũu a nadai nɩ a bʋʋr jɩ̃ɩ maa tʋɔrɔ ire a yeldɛbɛ bara ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, a Kɩrɩsɩto na waara ka a wɛr pɔ, nɩtɔ̃ lɛ wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn, "A bɔɔrlo bonsɩ nɩ a bʋ̃kʋrsɩ, faa bʋɔraa ɛ, tɩchɛ ɩ̃gãn lɛ fʋ chɔɔr kʋ ma.
A bɔɔrlo bonsɩ ban chʋnɔ̃ nɩ a ba 'mabfʋ bʋ̃kʋrsɩ, fʋ pʋɔ maa pɛl yaa ɛ.
Ka n pãa 'yɛr, maa nɩ nyã, nɩtãa lɛ an sɛb a n yele a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ. N Nãaŋmɩn, n wa naa ɩka n wa ɩ a fʋ bɔfʋ."
Wʋ den nie 'yɛr, "A bɔɔrlo bonsɩ nɩ a kʋfʋsɩ nɩ a dʋ̃n ala ban ma kʋ chʋm nɩ a ba tulo kʋfʋsɩ ala, faa bʋɔraa ɛ, fʋ pʋɔ ba pɛl ɛ," an sɔɔ ɩ ɩka a nɛbinãa lɛ 'yɛr ɩka ba ɩ a lɛ.
A wʋ pãa 'yɛr, "Maa nɩ nyã, n wa naa ɩka n wa ɩ a fʋ bɔfʋ." Wʋ tɔɔn a 'lɔ na de nie bar, tɩ de a ayi sʋɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a jie.
A nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ jũu lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn maal sɩ, a sɩ ɩ nɩsʋ̃n a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na de a wʋ ɩ̃gãn lon a bɔɔr kpo kpo kʋ sɩ.
A Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrloro, bɩbir jaa lɛ wʋ ma ara tɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ a ba puorfʋ tʋ̃bie. Waa gala a bɔɔr lofʋ nyã na maa tʋ̃ɔ de yelbier bar ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na wa lo a bɔɔr kpo kpo nyã baar a yelbier jũu, wʋ pãa tɩ jɩ̃nɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nũsʋ̃ɔ jie.
An yi a lɛ daar jaa, wʋ chɛlɛ naa a Nãaŋmɩn na wa de a wʋ dɔ̃dẽme kʋ wʋ a ba lɩɛb a wʋ gbɛɛ dɔɔlfʋ jie,
bojũu gbɛbʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ wʋ lo a bɔɔr, ka a sɛɛ kʋ a bala wʋn maal ka ba ɩ chɛchɛ.
A Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ mɩ 'yɛr yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa kʋ sɩ nɩ a yele nyã, wʋ den nie 'yɛr,
"Nyã lɛ ɩ a nɛtɩraa nyã ɩn wa tara nɩ ba, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wa po baar. Lɛ lɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr. Ɩn den a n nɛbinsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba nyãn pɔ, naa sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba tɩɛrsɩ pɔ."
Na wʋ pãa lɛ 'yɛr pʋɔ, "A ba yelbier nɩ a ba chɛfʋsɩ tʋ̃bie, n kʋ̃ lɛ tɩɛraa go ɛ."
Nãaŋmɩn na wa vɛ̃ a yelbier anyãna kʋ nɩrɛ, yelbier bɔɔr lofʋ ba lɛ be be go ɛ.
A lɛ jũu n yɛɛr, sɩn ben tara a 'lafʋ nyã na tɩ kpɛ a Jichɛchɛ Wʋ Jaa Chɛchɛ Jie a Yesu jɩ̃ɩ jũu,
na wʋ yuo a yelmɩ̃ɛ sɔr nɩbir paalaa na 'mar tu a fɔvaraa 'lɔ pɔ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a wʋ ɩ̃gãn,
na sɩ be tara a bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ nyã na kaara a Nãaŋmɩn yir,
yɩ ɩ a sɩ tɔɔ gbʋr Nãaŋmɩn nɩ nyãa nyã na vɩɛlɛ, nɩ a sɔɔfʋ na tɩrɛ. Bojũu wʋ mɩr a sɩ nyãn, na wʋ fɩɛl sɩ yin a tɩɛr sɔ̃ɔnaa pɔ, na wʋ pɛɛ a sɩ ɩ̃gãma nɩ a kɔ̃sʋ̃ɔ ala.
Yɩ vɛ̃ a sɩ nyɔɔ a sɩ tɩɛrtɔfʋ nyã sɩn sɔɔ jaa chɩ̃chɩ̃ tara, bojũu a 'lɔ na tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ sɩ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ.
Yɩ vɛ̃ a sɩ kpãkpãana taa mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir nʋ̃fʋ nɩ vɩla maalfʋ pɔ.
Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa vɛ̃ ka sɩ ma bara taa sɛ̃ lɔ̃ɔfʋ ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ a bamɩne na ma ɩrɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ vɛ̃ a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn, na sɩ ma maala a lɛ sɔ̃ɔ jaa, an ɩ a Bɩbir tɔɔrɔ na gbʋrɔ.
Ala ɩ sɩ chɛnɛ na bɔ̃ɔn jaa tɩ ma maala a yelbier sɩn wa bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ baar, yelbier bɔɔrlo bon jaa ba lɛ be be go ɛ,
tɩchɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ tɛɛ lɛ sɩ chɛlɛ nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ, nɩ a bũu dagel 'lɔ na wa di a Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃dẽme.
Nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa dɔ̃ɔ tɔr a lɛ a Mosesɩ na 'yɛr bin, ka a nɩbɛ ayi bɩɩ nɩbɛ ata wa di dãasɩɛ ɩka yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ wʋ ɩ a lɛ, ba ma kʋ naa a nɩnyɩnɛ tɩ maa kaa wʋ nɩbaal ɛ.

Ge buor lɛ yɩ tɩɛr Nãaŋmɩn na ge a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na nɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie nyã nɩ gbɛɛ, a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ na maal fɩka waa ɩ bʋ̃chɛchɛ ɛ, a jɩ̃ɩ nyã na ɩ a nɛtɩraa na maal wʋ a wʋ tor, ka wʋ tʋ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ Sɩɛ?
Bojũu sɩ bɔ̃ɔn a 'lɔ na 'yɛr, "Maa lɛ so a sãn yaafʋ, ɩn lɩɛb yaa a sãn," wʋ lɛ bɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr go, "A sɩ Soro na tɔɔr a wʋ nɩbɛ 'yɛr."
A ɩn dãbɩ̃yele, ala ɩ fʋ faan lo a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbir nyã nũu pɔ.
Yɩ tɩɛr kaa a lɛ daar yɩn dɔ̃ɔ be be, tɩ wa nyɛ a chãa, a lɛ yɩn ba gbɛr tuor a dɔɔyɛ yɔɔ ala.
Sɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃ɔ, chãa pɔ jaa lɛ ba ma tʋrɔ yɩ na ba gere nɩ yɩ. Daar kɔ̃ɔ, yɩ ma 'mantãan a bala mɩ ban gere a lɛ.

Yɩ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ tara nɩbaal nɩ a bala ban nyɔɔr pɔɔ a die pɔ, na yɩ mɩ tara pʋpɛl an ba bã yɩ ɛ, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban fa a yɩ bʋ̃tarsɩ, bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka yɩ mɩ̃ɛ tara naa bʋ̃tarsɩ na ɩ gar a anyãna na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ taa lɔb a tɩɛr sʋ̃ nyã bar ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na yab yɩn gar a lɛ.
Yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir tara kãnyir na yɩ maala a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ, yɩn wa nyɛn a lɛ wʋn tɩr a wʋ nɛɛ.
Bojũu a chɛn bɩ̃lãa ka a, "'Lɔ na waara, wʋn wa naa. Wʋ kʋ̃ kor ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a maa torfʋ sʋɔ 'lɔ, na kpɩɛrɛ naa nɩ sɔɔfʋ. 'Lɔ wa lɩɛb puor 'lɔ, n pʋɔ kʋ̃ pɛl wʋ ɛ."
Tɩchɛ sɩn ba ɩ a bala na lɩɛrɛ a puor sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ ɩn a bala na sɔɔ de, na sɩ nyɛ faafʋ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã, a sɔɔfʋ nyã vɛ̃ naa ka saa 'lɔɔrɔ gbɛr ɛ, yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa a bon 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩn tara a tɩɛr tɩ ba nyɛn nɩbir ɛ.
A sɔɔfʋ nyã lɛ a kõr dẽme dɔ̃ɔ tara, ka a Nãaŋmɩn dãn ba.
Sɔɔfʋ lɛ vɛ̃ a ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɩka Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ɔ de a wʋ nɛɛ 'yɛrbie maal a tẽe, nɩ a saaju wʋ jaa, ka a bonsɩ sɩn ben nyɛrɛ, a ba ɩ a dɔ̃ɔ be be ka wʋ de maal ɛ.

Sɔɔfʋ lɛ vɛ̃ ka a Abel bɔɔrlo bonsɩ wʋn de kʋ Nãaŋmɩn ɩ gar a Kain bɔɔrlo bonsɩ. Sɔɔfʋ lɛ vɛ̃ ka a Nãaŋmɩn dãn wʋ 'yɛr ɩka a wʋ yele tor naa, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a Abel kʋfʋsɩ nyã 'yɛr, wʋn sɔɔ kpi gba, tɩchɛ a sɔɔfʋ lɛ vɛ̃n ka wʋ chɛnɛ 'yɛrɛ.

Sɔɔfʋ lɛ vɛ̃ ka Nãaŋmɩn wa de a Enok bʋ̃nɩbir. 'Lɔ ba kpi bɔ̃ɔ kũu ɛ, baa lɛ wa nyɛ wʋ jaa go ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ wa de wʋ. Bojũu sɛrɛ tɩchɛ ka wʋ wa chen, Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr a ɩka a Enok yele nʋ̃mɔ̃ wʋ naa.
Nɩrɛ ba wa tara sɔɔfʋ ɛ, an ɩn tuo wʋn na tʋ̃ɔ pɛl Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ, bojũu nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa waara a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, wʋ sɔɔn ɩka wʋ ben be, na wʋ mɩ ma yara a bala na mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir bʋɔrɔ wʋ.

Sɔɔfʋ lɛ vɛ̃ ka a Nowa tu a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ tɩ ba nyɛn nɩbir ɛ, tɩ na wʋ de dãbɩ̃ɛ maal a daka bulomtum faan a wʋ yir dẽme nɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ. A wʋ sɔɔfʋ vɛ̃ naa ka wʋ 'yɛr nɛtuo 'yɔ̃ɔ a wɛr nɩbɛ ba jaa ban tɔr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr jũu, tɩ na wʋ lɩɛb a yeltorsɩ bʋ̃dire a wʋ sɔɔfʋ jũu.
Abraham sɔɔfʋ jũu, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ bʋɔl wʋ ɩka wʋ yi chen a jie 'lɔ na wa ɩ a wʋ sofʋ daar kɔ̃ɔ, wʋ tu naa a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ na wʋ chen, wʋn gba na ba bɔ̃ɔ a jie wʋn chiine ɛ.

Sɔɔfʋ vɛ̃ naa ka wʋ tɩ kpɩɛrɛ a nɛtɩraa tẽe 'lɔ pɔ ɩ sãan a be a paal 'lɔ pɔ. A gãma sɛɛr ala pɔ lɛ wʋ dɔ̃ɔ 'mataa kpɩɛrɛ nɩ a Isaakɩ nɩ a Jekɔb, na ba mɩ pʋɔ wʋ na wa so a jie 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a wʋ nɛɛ.
Bojũu wʋ dɔ̃ɔ kaara niem ɩka wʋ nyɛ yir par ban sʋ̃ɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ ɩ a mɩmɩɛrɛ.
Sɔɔfʋ lɛ vɛ̃ ka a Abraham na dɔ̃ɔ kor ɩ danyɔ̃ɔ, ka a wʋ pɔɔ Saara mɩ ab, tɩ ba chɛnɛ na dɔɔ bie. Wʋ tara na sɔɔfʋ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ wʋn tɩr kʋ wʋ.
Ka a dabʋ̃'yen nyã na kor bʋ̃tul ta kũu, tɩ wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔn par ka ba waa fɩka a ŋmɛrbie na be a saaju, na ba kaara man nɛɛ bire kaar fʋn kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ sɔr ɛ.
A nɩbɛ banyãna sɔɔn Nãaŋmɩn tɩ tãn a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban kpi. Baa nyɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ ba ɛ, nɩdaa lɛ ba gbã nyãa tɩ sɔɔ de, na ba sɔɔ ɩka sãanba nɩ nɩyʋɔrsɩ lɛ ba ɩ ka a wɛr pɔ.
A nɩbɛ banyãna na 'yɛr a anyãna, wiil ɩka ba kaara na bʋɔrɔ a tẽe 'lɔ na ɩ a ba mɩ̃ɛ tʋɔr.
Ala ɩ ba dɔ̃ɔ tɩɛrɛ a paal 'lɔ ban yi, ban taa tʋ̃ɔn lɛ lɩɛb kul a be.
Tɩ lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, ba dɔ̃ɔ tɩɛrɛ a paal 'lɔ na gar a be, na be a saaju. Ala lɛ so ka a vɩ̃ ba kʋrɔ wʋ wʋn ɩ a ba Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, bojũu wʋ chɔɔr a tẽe kʋ ba.

Sɔɔfʋ vɛ̃ naa ka Abraham, a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na bɛɛr wʋ kaa ka wʋ sɔɔ de a wʋ bidaba Isaakɩ ka wʋ ɩ a bɔɔrlo bon a wʋn lon a bɔɔr. 'Lɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ de a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ wʋ, tɩ na wʋ sɔɔ de a wʋ bidabʋ̃'yen tɛɛ nyã na lon a bɔɔr.
Nãaŋmɩn gba na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ ɩka, "Isaakɩ lɛ na 'yɔ̃ɔ a fʋ par, lɛ ɩn tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ fʋ."
Abraham tɩɛr bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na tʋ̃ɔn sɩ̃ɩ kũu, ka a nyɛtãan fɩka wʋ nyɛn a Isaakɩ na yi a kũu pɔ.
Sɔɔfʋ vɛ̃ naa ka Isaakɩ 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ Jekɔb nɩ a Esau a ba nɩdaar kɔ̃ɔ yele.
Sɔɔfʋ lɛ vɛ̃ ka a Jekɔb na ta a kũu, wʋ 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ a Josefʋ bibiir ba jaa tɩ na wʋ guun lan a wʋ dãgbal diiraa tɩ puor Nãaŋmɩn yãan.
Sɔɔfʋ vɛ̃ naa ka a Josefʋ kũu na wa gbʋrɔ, tɩ wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a Isɩral nɩbɛ a Ijipitɩ tẽe pɔ yifʋ 'yɛr kʋ ba, na wʋ man ba a lɛ ban na ɩ nɩ a wʋ kɔbɔ.
Sɔɔfʋ nyã vɛ̃ naa ka a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban dɔɔ a Mosesɩ a wʋ dɔɔrbɔ sɔɔl wʋn bar ŋmɛrsɩ ata. Bojũu ba nyɛn wʋn ɩ bivɩla, na baa joro a nãa binfʋ ɛ.
Sɔɔfʋ nyã vɛ̃n a lɛ a Mosesɩ na wa nʋ̃ɔ, waa sɔɔ ka ba bʋɔlɔ wʋ a nãkpɛ̃ɛ Faaro bipɔɔ bie ɛ.
Wʋ kãan ir ban na 'mataa gen wʋ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ gar wʋn na di a yelbier nʋ̃ɔ bɩ̃lãa tɛɛ.
Wʋ nyɛn wʋn na di dɔɔyɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto jũu ka a tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ gar a Ijipitɩ tẽe pɔ nãbomo. Bojũu daar kɔ̃ɔ sãyar lɛ wʋ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir kaara.
Sɔɔfʋ vɛ̃ naa ka a Mosesɩ yi be a Ijipitɩ tẽe pɔ, tɩ ba joro a nãa suur ɛ. Wʋ tara na kãnyir, bojũu wʋ nyɛn a 'lɔ a nɩbir na maa nyɛ ɛ.
Sɔɔfʋ lɛ wʋ de tun a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr a Gõl Bar Bɩbir 'yɛr, na wʋ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ka ba bol a jɩ̃ɩ a ba dɔ̃dɔ̃ ɛ, ka a sɔ̃ɔfʋ 'lɔ na waara ba tʋ̃ɔ sɩɩr a Isɩral nɩbɛ bidadɔ̃n ɛ.
Sɔɔfʋ vɛ̃ naa ka a Man Jɩɛ var lɩɛb sɔr, ka a Ijipitɩ dẽme mɩ na wa ta nyɛ a lɛ na ba kpɛ ka a man di ba jaa.
Sɔɔfʋ lɛ vɛ̃ ka a Jeriko dachin kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ wʋ jaa gel lo, a lɛ a Isɩral nɩbɛ na wa gʋɔr a tẽe wʋ jaa a ber ayopõi tuor.
Sɔɔfʋ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ faa a sɛ̃sɛ̃ pɔɔ 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a Worahab, bojũu wʋ dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ de a bala ban tʋ̃ ɩka ba tɩ jʋʋr a tẽe kaa. Waa dɔ̃ɔ pʋɔ a bawõnsɩ pɔ kpi ɛ.
N lɛ man bo go? N ba tara jaa na man lɛ a Gɩdɩyɔn nɩ Barakɩ nɩ Samson nɩ Jefeta nɩ a Nãa David nɩ Samuwɛl nɩ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na tʋ̃ 'yɛr ɛ,
bala lɛ de sɔɔfʋ jɛb na ba tʋ̃ɔn nãmɩne, tɩ maal a lɛ na sɛɛ, nyɛn a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ. Bala lɛ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ kpal a jubɛrɛ nɛɛr,
na ba kpĩin a bũu dagel, tɩ na ba jo faa a ba mɩ̃ɛ a sɔbɛrɛ ala ban taa kʋn ba. Bala lɛ dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a nɩbaalsɩ, na ba lɩɛb nɩkpɩ̃ɛn, na ba lɩɛb gãdaar a jɛɛr pɔ tʋ̃ɔ a ba dɔ̃dẽme.

Pɔbɔ mɩ lɛ nyɛn a ba nɩbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ kpi tɩ lɛ lɩɛb ir ɩ vʋɛ. Ba gen bamɩne putuger. Bala ta sɔɔ, ba kʋ̃ naa ge ba ɛ, tɩ ba tɔr tɩ chɛnɛ ara a ba sɔɔfʋ bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba wa nyɛ a kũu 'lɔ pɔ irfʋ na ɩ gar a nyã.
Ba lan bamɩne na ba fɔb ba, tɩ lũn bamɩne mɩ nɩ bɔ̃jɔrsɩ tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ pɔɔfʋ die pɔ.

Ba lɔb bamɩne nɩ kusɩbɛ kʋ, tɩ ma chɛ bamɩne mɩ var a yi, tɩ kʋn bamɩne mɩ naa sʋɔ. Piir gãma nɩ bʋʋr gãkpoor lɛ bamɩne mɩ ma dɔ̃ɔ su yʋɔrɔ nɩ na ba ɩ nɔ̃n dẽme, ka ba tara ba gere tɩ sɩlɛ ba a pɔrɔ jaa a lɛ nɛ.
Ka a wɛr nyã ba ta sɛɛ ɩka wʋ tara a nɩbɛ banyãna ɛ, ka ba bãra yʋɔrɔ be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ nɩ a tɔ̃n jur, kpɩɛrɛ a tɔ̃n bɔɔr pɔ nɩ a tũlotuursɩ bɔɔr ala ban ya a tẽe.
A nɩbɛ banyãna ba jaa nyɛn dãasɩvɩla a ba sɔɔfʋ jũu, tɩchɛ a bonsɩ ala a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ tɩr a nɛɛ ba ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba nyãa ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn guor yelvɩɛl na gar a anyã na wʋ gun sɩ, ka wʋ na de sɩ 'matãan ba maal yele a jaa ka a jɩ̃taa.

A lɛ jũu, a nɩyɔɔ banyãna na ŋmaa jil sɩ a julõjuur kaar dire a dãasɩɛ, yɩ ɩ a sɩ lɔb bon jaa na ŋmaa sɩ sɔr bar nɩ a yelbier ala na maa yaara tɩ bãr sɩ lɔb ɛ, tɩ na sɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir joro nɩ kãnyir tɩ ta a jie ban tʋ̃ɔ gun sɩ.

Yɩ ɩ a sɩ fur a sɩ nɩbie 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yesu na sɩ kaara wʋ jaa tɩ̃ɩɩ. 'Lɔ lɛ de a nie be a sɩ sɔɔfʋ sɔr pɔ, tɩ baar. 'Lɔ lɛ a pʋpɛl 'lɔ na be a wʋ niem, wʋ din kãnyir kpi be a daa ju, na wʋ sɔɔ a vɩ̃. Wʋ pãa tɩ jɛ̃n be a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ a nũsʋ̃ɔ jie.
Yɩ tɩɛr a wʋ yele a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ tara a kãnyir, nɩ a lɛ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ jɛɛrɛ nɩ wʋ, yɩ tɩɛr a lɛ, ka a yɩ ɩ̃gãma taa sal a yɩ tɩɛr sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
A yɩ mɔ̃fʋ pɔ, yɩn jɛɛrɛ nɩ a yelbier, yaa jɛb ta a jie 'lɔ sɛrɛ a yɩ jɩ̃ɩ na yi ɛ.
Yɩ ta ĩin a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ a ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn nɩtãa a wʋ bibiir ɛ, "N bie, ta de dekpele 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro kpãafʋ pɔ ɛ, na fʋ ta vɛ̃ ka a fʋ pʋɔ sɔ̃ɔ a lɛ wʋn gɔ̃nɔ̃ fʋ ɛ,
bojũu a sɩ Soro ma kpãana na a bala wʋn nʋ̃, na wʋ ma tɔɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa toor wʋn sɔɔ de maal a wʋ bie."
Yɩ tara kãnyir a kpãafʋ nyã pɔ. Nãaŋmɩn maala yɩ naa a wʋ bibiir. Bojũu bibuor lɛ be be, ka a wʋ sãa maa tɔɔ wʋ toor ɛ?
Ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa ba wa nyɛ a toor tɔɔfʋ a wʋ bibiir kaar ɛ, ka lɛ sãa yir bibiir lɛ ba ɩ.
Sɩ jaa lɛ tara a sãamɩne ka ba ma kpãa sɩ, tɩ sɩ chɛnɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ba. Ŋmɩnɛ lɛ a sɩ kʋ̃ pãa siir sɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a 'lɔ na ɩ a sɩ sɩɩr nɩ a nyɛvʋr Sãa gar a lɛ ɛ!
A sɩ sãamɩne ma kpãa sɩn jaa bɩ̃lãa tun a lɛ ban tɩɛr ɩka a ɩ naa. Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn ma kpãa sɩ naa, ka sɩ ɩ nɩsʋ̃n, a sɩn nɩ 'lɔ 'mataa põ a wʋ chɛchɛ.
Kpãafʋ ba be be na ɩ nʋ̃ɔ a pielfʋ daar ɛ, tɩchɛ a ma ɩn tuo. A puor lɛ a ma pãa wɔ̃ torfʋ, nɩ nyã'maar kʋ a bala na sɔɔ tu.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ir ɩ̃gãn sal yin a yɩ nuur nɩ a yɩ gbɛɛ pɔ bar,
"Tɩ na yɩ chɔɔr a sɔr a wʋ jaa jɩ̃taa a yɩ tufʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ," ka a gbɛrsɩ sa na ba tʋ̃ɔ chiine.
Yɩ mɔ̃ lɛ jaa yɩn na tʋ̃ɔ ɩ, ka yɩn nɩ nɩrɛ jaa kpɩɛrɛ nɩ nyã'maar, na yɩ ɩ chɛchɛ. Nɩrɛ ba wa ɩ chɛchɛ ɛ, wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ nyɛ a sɩ Soro ɛ.
Yɩ kaara sʋ̃, ka a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa taa vɩɛ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ bar ɛ, bɩɩ ka a nyɩɩr tuo kɔ̃ɔ taa tɔ yi na wʋ dam yele 'yɔ̃ɔ nɩbɛ ka a ba yɔɔ jie taa sɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Yɩ kaara ka a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa taa ɩ sɛ̃sɛ̃yele ɛ, bɩɩ kaara fɩka a Esau na ba dɔ̃ɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɛ, na wʋ de a wʋ kpɛ̃ɛ ɩfʋ nɩ a wʋ difʋ jie tɛɛn bʋ̃diraa gbɛbʋ̃'yen tɛɛ na wʋ di.
A ala puor, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka wʋ lɛ wa bʋɔrɔ naa a wʋ difʋ jie, ka a sãa tɔr wʋ bar, a wʋ mɩ kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb go ɛ. Wʋ gba wa kõn nɩbikʋ̃ɔ nɩ a yele nyã, tɩ waa lɛ nyɛ a sʋ̃ʋfʋ go ɛ.
Yɩn 'lɔ ba wa a tɔ̃ɔ nyã par yɩn na tʋ̃ɔ sɩɩr ɛ, a 'lɔ na ma dɔ̃ɔ lɩrɛ a bũu, bɩɩ ka a jie ma sɔb lii ka a sajakpuro furo,
bɩɩ ka ɩlɛ pɛɛlɛ 'yɛrɛ nɩ a nɩrɛ kɔkɔr, bɩɩ ban wõ a kɔkɔr nyã, ba sʋɔr naa ɩka a 'yɛrbie a ta lɛ 'yɛr go ɛ.
Bojũu baa dɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ tara a lɛ a 'yɛr na kpãkpãana ba 'yɛrɛ ɩka, "Ala ɩ dʋ̃ɔ gba wa sɩɩr a tɔ̃ɔ, ba lɔb wʋ nɩ kʋsɩbɛ kʋ."
Ka a jie dɔ̃ɔ ɩrɛ dãbɩ̃ɛ wʋ jaa, ka Mosesɩ wa tɩ 'yɛr, "N mɩrɛ naa nɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ."
Tɩchɛ, yɩn 'lɔ wa naa a Jiyon Tɔ̃ɔ par na ɩ a saaju Jerusalɛm, be lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbir nyã kpɩɛrɛ. Yɩ wa lɔ̃ɔn naa a malakasɩ turo turo na lɔ̃ɔ taa nɩ pʋpɛl,
nɩ a pupuorbiir bala na ɩ a bidɔ̃ɔ, bala yoe lɛ sɛb a be a saaju. Yɩn wa naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'lɔ na tɔɔr a nɩbɛ ba jaa 'yɛr sɛ̃, nɩ a 'lɔ na maal a torfʋ dẽme sɩɩr ka a ɩ chɛchɛ,
nɩ a Yesu na ɩ a nɛtɩr paalaa nyã 'ma'maala na mɩr a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ ka a 'yɛrɛ naa gar a Abel tʋɔr.
Yɩ kaara sʋ̃ na yɩ taa tɔr a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛrɛ ɛ. Ala ɩ a bala wʋn dɔ̃ɔ kpãa faa ka a wɛr pɔ ba chɩ̃ɛ ɛ, ŋmɩnɛ an kaara kʋ a sɩn, ala ɩ sɩ lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na kpãana sɩ yire a saaju?
A sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn kɔkɔr dam a tẽe wʋ jaa, tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã 'lɔ wʋ tɩr nɛɛ ɩka, "Daar kɔ̃ɔ go, a ba ɩ a tẽe lɛ ɩn dam ɛ, tɩchɛ ɩn dam a saaju wʋ jaa."
A 'yɛrbir nyã wʋn 'yɛr ɩka, daar kɔ̃ɔ go, a par lɛ ɩka wʋn ir a bonsɩ ala na ɩ a bʋ̃maalsɩ na dam bar, tɩchɛ a ala na kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ dam ɛ, ka ala ara.
A lɛ jũu, sɩn na ben tara a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ nyã na ba tara damfʋ ɛ, yɩ vɛ̃ ka a nʋ̃mɔ̃ sɩ, a sɩ dãna Nãaŋmɩn lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ dãbɩ̃ɛ,
bojũu a sɩ "Nãaŋmɩn nyã ɩn bũu na dire."
Yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir na yɩ nʋ̃nɔ̃ taa nɩtãa yɛɛr.
Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa ĩin sãanba defʋ bar ɛ, bojũu nɩbɛ bamɩne dɔ̃ɔ de sãanba maal ba vɩla, tɩ baa bɔ̃ɔn ɩka malakasɩ lɛ ɛ.
Yɩ tɩɛr a bala ban nyɔɔr pɔɔ a die pɔ fɩka yɩ mɩ pʋɔ ban be a pɔɔfʋ jie, nɩ a bala ban gere fɩka yɩ mɩ pʋɔ ban dire a dɔɔyɛ.
Yɩ jaa, yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a kultaa, ka a yɩ gaa jie taa tara chɛfʋ ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn na tɔɔr a bala jaa na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a kultaa nɩ a sɛ̃sɛ̃nbɛ 'yɛr.
Yɩ tɔɔ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin a libie nʋ̃fʋ pɔ, na yɩ vɛ̃ ka a bɩ̃lãa jaa yɩn tara sɛɛn yi, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa a wʋ gãn pɔ ɩka, "N kʋ̃ wa bar fʋ jaa ɛ, n kʋ̃ wa tɔr fʋ jaa bar ɛ."
Ka a sɩ pãa na 'la 'yɛr ɩka, "A n Soro lɛ ɩ a n sʋ̃nɔ̃, ka n kʋ̃ joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Bo lɛ nɩrɛ na ɩ ma?"
Yɩ tɩɛrtɔ a yɩ nɩdierbe na dɔ̃ɔ man a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr kʋ yɩ. Yɩ tɩɛr a lɛ ban dɔ̃ɔ be tɩ na yɩ jãn a ba sɔɔfʋ.
Lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na be a jãa, lɛ lɛ wʋ chɛnɛ a dɩna na wʋn chɛnɛ a lɛ nɛ bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa.
Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa vɛ̃ ka a wiil sãan jaa wa tɔɔ yɩ yin ka yɩ tɩ bɔr ɛ, a vɩɛlɛ naa kaa sɩ nyãa nyɛ kpɛ̃ɔ yi a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ pɔ, ka a ta ɩ a bʋ̃diir difʋ na ba tara tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʋ a bala na dire yaa ɛ.
Tɩchɛ sɩn tara na a bɔɔr lofʋ jie, be a Juu nɩbɛ bɔɔrlorbo bala na tʋ̃nɔ̃ a be ba tara sɔr na di ɛ.
A ba bɔɔrlo nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ma den a dʋ̃n ala jɩ̃ɩ kpɛ̃n be a dinie sʋɔ na ɩ a Chɛchɛ Wʋ Jaa Chɛchɛ Jie ka a tɩ ɩ a yelbier vɛ̃ kʋfʋ bon, tɩchɛ ka ba de a nʋ̃nɔ̃ yin a tẽe dãpuor tɩ chʋm bar kaa di.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ a Yesu di a dɔɔyɛ a tẽe yõo dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ, ka a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ maal a wʋ nɩbɛ ka ba ɩ chɛchɛ.
Yɩ mɩ ɩ a sɩ yi tɩ pʋɔ wʋ be a yõo na sɩ di a vɩ̃ 'lɔ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ di.
Bojũu a tẽe nyã sɩn kpɩɛrɛ kʋ̃ kor ɛ, tɩchɛ a sɩ kaara a tẽe 'lɔ na wa.
Tu a Yesu nyã jie, a lɛ jũu yɩ ɩ a sɩ ma pʋrɔ a wʋ yuor na ɩ pɛɛfʋ ma yire a sɩ nɛgãma pɔ, naa ɩ bɔɔrlo bonsɩ kʋrɔ Nãaŋmɩn.
Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa ĩin a vɩla maalfʋ bar ɛ, na yɩ ma lɔ̃ɔ põn a yɩ taaba, bojũu a bɔɔrlo bonsɩ anyãna lɛ pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ.

Yɩ turo a yɩ nɩdierbe nɛɛ, na yɩ siir a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ ba. Bala lɛ kaara yɩ, na ban wa man a yɩ yele kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn. Yɩ turo a ba nɛɛ ka a ba tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɩ nʋ̃ɔ naa ta ɩ tuor kʋ ba ɛ, naa ta mɩ ɩ pɔrɔ a yɩ sɛ̃ ɛ.
Yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ sɩ, sɩn sɔɔ naa ɩka yele jaa ba be a sɩ tɩɛr pɔ ɛ, a sɩ bɔfʋ lɛ ɩka sɩ kpɩɛrɛ a lɛ na tor sɔr jaa pɔ.
Maa 'lɔ, n sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa ɩka yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn kʋrɔ ma ka n nyɛ sɔr naa tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb fɔɔ tɩ a yɩ sɛ̃.
A Nãaŋmɩn nyã'maar sʋɔ na tu a jɩ̃ɩ ala wʋn de tɩr a nɛtɩraa na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, na wʋ sɩ̃ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto a kũu pɔ, 'lɔ na ɩ a pɛchiin gbɔɔraa,
wʋ sʋ̃ʋ yɩ nɩ vɩla jaa bʋrɔ ka yɩ tʋ̃ɔ maal a lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ, na wʋ mɩ tũ a sɩ pɔ a lɛ na pɛlɛ a wʋ pʋɔ tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto. 'Lɔ lɛ so a tɩɩr bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
N yɛɛr, n sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa ɩka yɩ tu a n kpãafʋ 'yɛrbie anyãna, bojũu a 'yɛrbie anyã ɩn sɛb ba ɩ yɔɔ ɛ.
N bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka ba yuon a sɩ yɛbɛ Timoti bar, 'lɔ wa tɔ̃ɔ ta fɔɔ, ɩn tara wʋn 'mataa tɩn ka yɩ tɩ nyɛ wʋ.
Yɩ puor a yɩ nɩdierbe ba jaa nɩ a pupuorbiir ba jaa jaa. Bala mɩ na yi a Itali mɩ puoro yɩ naa.
A wɩ̃ɛfʋ wʋ be a yɩ jaa sɛ̃.
Jemesɩ, na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto gbãgbaa, puoro naa a Isɩral bala pie nɩ ayi na yaar a wɛr wʋ jaa.
N yɛɛr, yɩ tara pʋpɛl, ala sɔɔ ɩ yelyɔɔ wõnõ yɩ naa.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka yɩn jãn naa tara kãnyir a yɩ bɛɛr kaa sɔ̃ɔ.
Yɩn jãn tʋ̃ɔ tara kãnyir, a lɛ na vɛ̃ naa ka yɩ tʋ̃ɔ baa, tɩ na yɩ taa wa faa bon jaa ɛ.
Ala ɩ yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa bʋɔrɔ naa yɛ̃, wʋ sʋɔr yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ na kʋrɔ nɩrɛ jaa pɔrɔ, wʋ ɩn nɩmɩ̃ɛ, wʋ kʋ̃ mɔ̃ɔ fʋ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩn wa sʋɔr bon jaa, yɩ tara sɔɔfʋ na yɩ ta baala ɛ. Nɩrɛ jaa na baala kaara nɩtãa man kʋ̃ɔ sɛsɛbɛ na furo dãdaala.
Ala ɩ fʋ ɩ naa a nɩrɛ nyã tɔ sʋɔ, ta tɩɛr ɩka, fʋn nyɛn bon jaa yi a sɩ Soro sɛ̃ ɛ.
A nɩrɛ na tara tɩɛr ayi, wʋ maa ba gbɛr ara yele jaa pɔ wʋn ɩrɛ ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn puoro nɔ̃ɔsʋɔ wʋ chɩlɛ, bojũu wʋ do naa.
Tɩchɛ a taraa sʋɔ mɩ wʋ chɩlɛ a wʋ suufʋ pɔ, bojũu wʋn suor naa fɩka mɔpuul.
Bojũu a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ ma nyãa naa ka a tʋl ŋme ka a ko suor, a vapuul ma suor naa ka a vɩla baar. Lɛ lɛ a taraa sʋɔ kaara, 'lɔ wa tʋ̃nɔ̃ a wʋ yar tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Pʋpɛl sʋɔ lɛ a 'lɔ na di kãnyir ara a bɛɛr kaa pɔ, tɩ na waa lo ɛ. Bojũu a nɩrɛ 'lɔ lɛ na nyɛ a nyɛvʋr nãa jupil 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ a bala na nʋ̃ wʋ.
Bɛɛr kaa wa wa nɩrɛ sɛ̃, wʋ ta 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ bɛɛr wʋ kaa ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ de bier bɛɛr nɩrɛ kaa ɛ, a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ ba bɛɛrɛ nɩrɛ kaara ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa yelbier vɔlaa lɛ ma bɛɛr wʋ kaa na a nyɔɔ wʋ.
A vɔlaa anyãna lɛ na tara pʋɔ naa dɔɔ bier, ka a bier nʋ̃ɔ dɔɔ kũu.
N yɛɛr nʋ̃nʋ̃nbɔ, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka ba bɛl yɩ ɛ.
Bʋ̃vɩla nɩ kʋfʋ vɩla jaa yire naa a chãa Sãa na be a saaju sɛ̃. Libe ba be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, waa lɩɛrɛ ɛ.
An wa ta a lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ, wʋ dɔɔ sɩn nɩ a wʋ yelmɩ̃ɛ 'yɛr ka sɩ ɩ birdɔ̃ɔ a bʋ̃maalsɩ a jaa pɔ.
N yɛɛr nʋ̃nʋ̃nbɔ, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a anyãna yɩ ma chɛlɛ fɔfɔɔ tɩ na yɩ ta ma 'yɛrɛ fɔfɔɔ ɛ, bɩɩ nyɛrɛ suur fɔfɔɔ ɛ.
Bojũu nɩrɛ wa nyɛ suur, wʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ maal yelvɩla ala a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ ɩka a ɩ ɛ.
A lɛ juu, yɩ bar yele jaa na ɩ dɛɛr bɩɩ bier, tɩ na yɩ siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ de a 'yɛrbir 'lɔ na bʋr a yɩ nyãa pɔ, ala lɛ na faa a yɩ sɩɩr.
Yɩ ta bɛlɛ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a 'yɛr yɩn chɛlɛ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩ yɩ ɩ a 'yɛr mamaalba.
A nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na wa wõ a 'yɛr tɩ ba sɔɔ de ɛ, wʋ kaara nɩtãa a 'lɔ na chaar a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kaa chãana pɔ,
wʋn wa yi baar wʋ ĩin a lɛ bar wʋn kaara.
