Tɩchɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir turo a nɛbinãa na ba tara chɛfʋ ɛ, na ma vɛ̃ ka fʋ so a fʋ mɩ̃ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn na sʋ̃ʋ wʋ naa nɩ bon jaa pɔ wʋn maal, ala ɩ wʋ chɛl tɩ sɔɔ, tɩ a ba ɩ wõ tɩ ĩin ɛ.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ tɩɛr ɩka wʋ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn puorbo tɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ nyɔɔ a wʋ jãlbir ɛ, wʋ bɛlɛ na wʋ mɩ̃ɛ, ka a wʋ puorfʋ ɩ pɔrɔ.
Puorfʋ 'lɔ na pɛlɛ a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ na wʋ ɩ chɛchɛ na ba tara dɛɛr ɛ. Sʋ̃nɔ̃ a bala na ɩ a kpɩɩr, nɩ a pɔɔkɔɛ, a ba dɔɔyɛ pɔ, tɩ nyɔɔ fʋ mɩ̃ɛ ka a wɛr ta sɔ̃ɔ fʋ ɛ.
N yɛɛr, yɩn sɔɔ de a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tɩɩr sʋɔ, yɩ taa turo nɩbɛ nʋ̃nɔ̃ ɛ.
Ala ɩ nɩbɛ ayi wa kpɛ naa a yɩ lɔ̃ɔfʋ jie, ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ pɩ̃ɛ na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔn sɛlma mʋtʋɔ, tɩchɛ ka a ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ ɩ nɔ̃ɔ sʋɔ su bʋ̃jarsɩ.
Ka yɩ lɩɛb 'yɛr kʋ a 'lɔ na pɩ̃ɛ, "Jɩ̃nɛ ka a dakɔɔ ju," tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a 'lɔ mɩ na su a bʋ̃jarsɩ, "Ara ka bɩɩ wa jɩ̃nɛ ka a tẽe a n gbɛɛ par."
Ala ɩ lɛ lɛ, a ba ɩ yɩ turo naa a nɩbɛ bamɩne nʋ̃nɔ̃ na yɩ de tɩɛr dɛɛr tɔɔrɔ nɩ a ba 'yɛr ɛ?
N yɛɛr yɩ chɛlɛ, Nãaŋmɩn ir a bala a wɛr nɩbɛ na nyɛ ka ba ɩ nɔ̃n dẽme ka ban tara sɔɔfʋ tɩ kpɛ̃n a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ wʋn tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ a bala na nʋ̃ wʋ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ ma kpɛrɛ na a nɔ̃ɔ sʋɔ. A ba ɩ a taraa dẽme lɛ ma ge yɩ ɛ. A ba ɩ bala lɛ ma nyɔɔ yɩ chiin a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ jie ɛ?
A ba ɩ bala lɛ sɔ̃ɔ a yovɩla 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ yɩ ɛ?
Ala ɩ yɩ tu naa a nɛɛ 'lɔ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Fʋ nʋ̃ a fʋ tɔ sʋɔ a fʋ kaar," yɩ maal vɩla.
Tɩchɛ yɩn wa turo nʋ̃nɔ̃, yɩ maal dɛɛr, ka a nɛɛ 'yɛr ɩka yɩ bɔr naa na yɩ ɩ a nɛɛ sɔ̃sɔ̃ɔnbɔ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na turo a nɛɛr a jaa tɩ wa 'mab bʋ̃'yen, wʋ sɔ̃ɔn a jaa.
A 'lɔ na 'yɛr, "Taa sɛ̃nɛ ɛ," 'lɔ mɩ lɛ 'yɛr, "Taa kʋrɔ nɩrɛ ɛ." Fʋ̃ʋ ba sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩ kʋ nɩrɛ, fʋ sɔ̃ɔn a jaa.
Yɩ 'yɛrɛ tɩ maala bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Nãaŋmɩn na tɔɔr a yɩ 'yɛr nɩtãa lɛ a nɛɛ 'lɔ na ma vɛ̃ ka nɩrɛ so a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ na 'yɛr.
Bojũu a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ daar, fʋ̃ʋ nyã na ba dɔ̃ɔ tara nɩbibaal jofʋ ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ mɩ jo a fʋ nɩbibaal ɛ. Nɩbibaal jofʋ tʋ̃ɔn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ.
Vɩla buor nɩ nyã n yɛɛr, ala ɩ nɩrɛ 'yɛr naa ɩka wʋ tara na sɔɔfʋ, tɩchɛ ba lɔ̃ɔn tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɛ, a sɔɔfʋ nyã na tʋ̃ɔ faa wʋ ɔ?
Ala ɩ yɛbɛ ɩn ɩ̃gãn kpãakpol tɩ ba tara bʋ̃diir ɛ,
ka a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ 'yɛr kʋ wʋ, "Chiine nɩ nyã'maar, a ɩ vɩla kʋ fʋ ka fʋ nyɛ di tɩɩ," tɩchɛ na faa sʋ̃ʋ wʋ a ɩ̃gãn bʋ̃bʋɔrsɩ ɛ, bo vɩla lɛ a ɩ?
A lɛ jũu, sɔɔfʋ ka tʋ̃mɔ̃ ba pʋɔ ɛ, wʋ ɩn bʋ̃kũu.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ na 'yɛr naa, "Fʋ̃ʋ tara na sɔɔfʋ ka maa mɩ tara a tʋ̃mɔ̃." Wiil ma a fʋ sɔɔfʋ ka tʋ̃mɔ̃ ba pʋɔ ɛ, tɩ n mɩ wiil fʋ a n sɔɔfʋ nɩ a tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Fʋ sɔɔ naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃'yen tɛɛ lɛ be be. A ɩn vɩla. A sɩdɛbɛ gba mɩ sɔɔn de a lɛ, tɩ na ba mɩ joro dãbɩ̃ɛ.
Fʋ̃ʋ jɔl nyã, sɔɔfʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ na ba pʋɔ ɛ, faa bɔ̃ɔ ka bʋ̃kũu lɛ ɛ?
A ba ɩ a sɩ sãakpã Abraham wiil a sɔɔfʋ nɩ a tʋ̃mɔ̃, wʋn dɔ̃ɔ de a wʋ bie Isaakɩ ɩka wʋ lon bɔɔr ɛ?
Faa nyɛ a sɔɔfʋ nɩ a tʋ̃mɔ̃ na 'mataa ɛ, ka a wʋ sɔɔfʋ sɛɛ nɩ a lɛ wʋn tʋ̃.
Ka a lɛ na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ ɩka, "Abraham sɔɔn de Nãaŋmɩn, ka a lɛ vɛ̃ ka wʋ ɩ nɩtor." Ka Nãaŋmɩn bʋɔl wʋ wʋ baraa.
Yaa nyɛ, nɩrɛ na ɩn nɩtor Nãaŋmɩn niem a lɛ wʋn tʋ̃, a ba ɩ a wʋ sɔɔfʋ tɛɛ ɛ.
A lɛ nɩ wʋ ju lɛ ba dɔ̃ɔ kaa a sɛ̃sɛ̃ pɔɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Worahab ka wʋ ɩ nɩtor, wʋn dɔ̃ɔ de a tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ wiil ba sɔyuo ka ba lɩɛb kul.
A lɛ a sɩɛ na ma wa yi a ɩ̃gãn pɔ ka wʋ ɩ bʋ̃kũu, lɛ mɩ lɛ a sɔɔfʋ ka tʋ̃mɔ̃ ba pʋɔ ɛ mɩ ɩ bʋ̃kũu.
N yɛɛr, yɩ jaa yɩ ta bʋɔrɔ ɩka yɩ ɩ wiwiilbe ɛ, bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a sɩn bala na ɩ a wiwiilbe na nyɛn 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ gar nɩrɛ jaa.
Sɩ jaa ma maal 'mab. Ala ɩ nɩrɛ jaa ba 'yɛr 'mab ɛ, wʋ ɩn nɩtor na wʋ nyɔɔrɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ.
Sɩ ma 'yɔ̃ɔn a kur a wiisɩ nɛɛr pɔ, ka a ma tu a sɩ nɛɛr, ka sɩ ma lɩɛb chiin jie jaa sɩn bʋɔrɔ.
Bɩɩ yɩ kaa a gbor bɛrɛ ala a man kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ a sɛsɛkpɛ̃ɛ na ma furo chiine, tɩchɛ a gbor mɔ̃nɔ̃ ma den a vuur mɔ̃ chiin jie jaa wʋn bʋɔrɔ.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ a jãlbir na ɩ jaa pʋʋrbile a ɩ̃gãn pɔ tɩ ma fere. Wʋ kaara fɩka bũu bir na lo tuu kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ di wʋ jaa.
A jãlbir mɩ ɩn bũu na ɩ a wɛr dɛɛr na be a sɩ ɩ̃gãn pɔ na wʋ sɔ̃ɔ a ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa bar, na wʋ chʋmɔ̃ a ɩ̃gãn nɩ a bũu dagel 'lɔ na ba kpĩine ɛ.
Nɩrɛ ma tʋ̃ɔn guol mɔdʋ̃ɔ jaa bʋrɔ, nɩ lubil jaa bʋrɔ, bʋ̃vuuraa jaa bʋrɔ, nɩ a man pɔ bonsɩ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ maa tʋ̃ɔ a wʋ jãlbir ɛ, wʋ ɩn bʋ̃bier na ba pɛ̃nɛ ɛ, na wʋ mɩ ɩ lɔɔ na kʋrɔ.
A jãlbir nyã lɛ sɩ ma de pɛɛn a sɩ Sãa na ɩ a sɩ Soro, na sɩ lɛ de ma pɔn 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala a Nãaŋmɩn na mɛ ka ba kaara a wʋ kaar.
A nɛbʋ̃'yen 'lɔ pɔ lɛ a pɛɛfʋ nɩ pɔ'yɔ̃ɔfʋ ma yire. N yɛɛr a ba tor ɛ.
Kɔ̃vɩla nɩ kɔ̃dɛɛr na tʋ̃ɔ yire bul bʋ̃'yen pɔ bɩɩ?
N yɛɛr, kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ na tʋ̃ɔ wɔ̃ dãbɩ̃ɩnãa bɩɩ dãbɩ̃ɩnãa na tʋ̃ɔ wɔ̃ kɔ̃kɔ̃ɔ ɔ? Lɛ mɩ lɛ, kɔ̃vɩla nɩ kɔ̃dɛɛr kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ 'mataar yire bul bʋ̃'yen pɔ ɛ.
A yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ tara na yɛ̃ nɩ bɔ̃ɔfʋ bɩɩ? Vɛ̃ ka a wiil a wʋ maalfʋ pɔ, nɩ lɛ wʋn siir a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ maala nɩ yɛ̃.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a yɩ nyãa pɔ, nyuur dɛɛr nɩ tuo, nɩ yobɔyele ben be, yɩ ta wile yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ŋmara jirsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
A yɛ̃ nyã bʋrɔ ba yi saaju wa ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ ɩ naa a wɛr nyã yɛ̃ nɩsaal na tara ka wʋ yi a sɩdɛɛr sɛ̃.
Bojũu jie 'lɔ nyuur, nɩ tuo, nɩ yobɔyele na be, be lɛ guor taa ba be ɛ, ka tʋ̃ dɛɛr jaa bʋrɔ be be.
Tɩchɛ a yɛ̃ 'lɔ, na yi saaju ɩn chɛchɛ na wʋ tara nyã'maar nʋ̃fʋ, nɩ sʋ̃ʋfʋ, nɩ mɩ̃ɛ siirfʋ, nɩ vɩla maalfʋ, na wʋ joro nɩbaal, na wʋ wɔ̃nɔ̃ bisʋ̃n, na waa ooro ɛ, bɩɩ tara nɛɛr ayi ɛ.
A bala na ba bʋɔrɔ jɛɛr ɛ, na bʋr nɩ nyã'maar, na ŋman yeltorsɩ.
Nyɩnɛ lɛ a jɛɛr nɩ nɛchɩrɛ yi be a yɩ chara pɔ? A ba ɩ a yi naa a vɔlaa 'lɔ na be a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ jɛɛr ɛ?
Yɩ ma bʋɔrɔ na bon kɔ̃ɔ tɩ yɩ maa nyɛ ɛ, na yɩ ma kʋrɔ taa. Na yɩ ma tara nyuur nɩ bomo, tɩ na yɩ maa nyãa ɛ, na yɩ pãa tara jɛɛr nɩ nɛchɩrɛ, tɩ maa nyãa ɛ, bojũu yɩ maa sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn ɛ.
Yɩn wa sʋɔr a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, yɩ maa nyɛ ɛ, bojũu yɩ sʋɔr naa nɩ pʋtɩdɛɛr na de maal a lɛ na pɛl a yɩ pʋɔ.
Yɩn sɛ̃sɛ̃ nɩbɛ ba nyã, yaa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka nɩrɛ nyã na ɩ a wɛr baraa 'laar Nãaŋmɩn ɛ? Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ŋmaa a wɛr nyã baraa ɩn Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃ sʋɔ.
Ta baala a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr ɩka, yelmɩ̃ɛ jaa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kaara a Sɩɛ 'lɔ wʋn de 'yɔ̃ɔ sɩ.
Tɩchɛ Nãaŋmɩn ma kʋ sɩ naa a wʋ wɩ̃ɛfʋ, ala lɛ so a Nãaŋmɩn gãn na 'yɛr, "Nãaŋmɩn ma tɔr naa bala na bʋɔr yuor, tɩ na wʋ ma wɩ̃ɛ a bala na siir ba mɩ̃ɛ."
A lɛ jũu, yɩ siir a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ Nãaŋmɩn, na yɩ tɔɔ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin a sɩdɛɛr sʋɔ sɛ̃, wʋn bar yɩn tɩ jo.
Yɩ tɔɔ gbʋr Nãaŋmɩn, wʋ mɩ na tɔɔn gbʋr yɩ. Yɩn yelbe-ɩrbɛ, yɩ pɛɛ a yɩ nuur na yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr, yɩn tɩɛr ayi dẽme.
Yɩ waala, na yɩ tara pʋsɔ̃ɔ, na yɩ kõnõ. Yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ laar lɩɛb kõn, ka a yɩ pʋpɛl lɩɛb pʋsɔ̃ɔ.
Yɩ siir a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a sɩ Soro niem, wʋn 'mɔɔ yɩn ka yɩ do.

N yɛɛr, yɩ ta sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa yoe ɛ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ yuor, wʋ tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr, wʋ tɔɔrɔ naa a nɛbinãa 'lɔ 'yɛr. Fʋ̃ʋ wa tɔɔrɔ a nɛbinãa 'yɛr, faa turo a lɛ a nɛbinãa na 'yɛr ɛ, tɩ ɩ a wʋ 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn lɛ bin a wʋ nɛɛ kʋ sɩ, na wʋ ɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ, 'lɔ lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ faa bɩɩ sɔ̃ɔ bar. Tɩchɛ fʋ̃ʋ mɩ nɩ ana na fʋ tɔɔrɔ a fʋ tɔ sʋɔ 'yɛr?
Yɩ chɛlɛ, a yɩn bala na ma 'yɛr ɩka, "Dɩna bɩɩ bio sɩn chen tẽkpɛ̃ɛ pɔ tɩ maal yuon, da bomo, da nyɛ libie."
Yaa bɔ̃ɔ lɛn na ɩ bio ɛ, bo lɛ a yɩ nyɛvʋr? Wʋ kaara fɩka ul na lo tɩ wɛl ajienaa.
Yɩ ta ma 'yɛr ɩka, "Ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn sɔɔ naa ka sɩ tara nyɛvʋr, sɩn maal nyã bɩɩ anyãna."
Tɩ lɛ an be nɩ nyã, yɩ bʋɔrɔ na yuor, na yɩ wile yɩ mɩ̃ɛ, ka a mɩ̃ɛ wiilfʋ nyã ɩ yelbier.
Nɩrɛ jaa na pãa bɔ̃ɔ vɩla tɩ ba maal ɛ, wʋ ɩn bier.
Yɩ chɛlɛ, yɩn tara dẽme, yɩ kõnõ ŋmiere chɛlsɩ a yele 'lɔ na waara a yɩ ju.
A yɩ nãbomo pʋ̃ɔ naa, ka yɛlɛ mʋʋ a yɩ fɔɔr.
A yɩ sɛlma nɩ a libie lon sɔrɔ, ka a ba sɔrɔ lofʋ wiil ɩka an di yɩn bũu kaar. A baarfʋ ta naa, tɩ yɩ chɛnɛ bin a nãbomo.
Yɩ nyɛ a bala yɩn de ka ba tʋ̃nɔ̃ a yɩ por pɔ, tɩ yɩ mɔ̃ɔ ba a yar ka ba kõnõ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ yɩ, ka a yɩ bʋ̃ŋmarba kõn ta a sɩ Soro na ɩ a Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ.
Yɩ din nʋ̃ɔ ka a wɛr pɔ lɛ yɩn bʋɔrɔ. Yɩ guol naa yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a lɛ kʋfʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Yɩ ma 'yɔ̃ɔn a bala na tor 'yɛr, na yɩ kʋ ba, tɩ baa maal bon jaa ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, yɛɛr yɩ tara kãnyir tɩ tãn a sɩ Soro waa daar. Kaa nyɛ a lɛ a kʋɔraa na ma tara kãnyir chɛlɛ nɩ a bonsɩ wɔ̃fʋ daar, na wʋ tara kãnyir chɛlɛ a sadɔ̃ɔ nɩ a sabaaraa.
Yɩn mɩ, yɩ tara kãnyir na yɩ ara kpɛ̃ɔ, bojũu a sɩ Soro waa gbʋr naa.
Yɛɛr yɩ ta hũhũnõ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa na yɩ taa nyɛ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ ɛ. A 'yɛr tɔɔrɔ ara naa a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ.
Yɛɛr, yɩ kaa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ bala na de a sɩ Soro yuor 'yɛr 'yɛr, din dɔɔyɛ tɩ tara kãnyir.
Ala lɛ so ka sɩ bʋɔlɔ ba bɔɔsʋ̃n dẽme. Yɩ wõn a Job kãnyir wʋn tara na yɩ mɩ nyɛ a lɛ a sɩ Soro na maal kʋ wʋ a baaraa. A sɩ Soro ɩn nɩbaal joro, na wʋ maala vɩla.
N yɛɛr, ala na chɛ lɛ a anyã, yɩ taa pɔrɔ nɩ saaju ɛ, bɩɩ a tẽe ɛ, bɩɩ bon jaa ɛ, tɩ yɩ vɛ̃ ka yɩ ɔ̃ɔ, ɩ ɔ̃ɔ, ka yɩ kai, mɩ ɩ kai. Ka yɩ taa kpɛ 'yɛr pɔ ɛ.
Wõm pɔɔn a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ bɩɩ? Wʋ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn. Nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ̃n a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ bɩɩ? Wʋ yiele yiel dãna nɩ Nãaŋmɩn.
A yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ bɩɛrɛ na bɩɩ? Wʋ bʋɔl a pupuorbiir nɩbɛrɛ ka ba wa jɛ wʋ kãa nɩ a sɩ Soro yuor, na ba sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn kʋ wʋ.
A Nãaŋmɩn ban sʋɔr nɩ sɔɔfʋ na sa naa nɩnyɩnɛ baal, a sɩ Soro na nyɔɔ wʋ naa ka wʋ ir. Ala ɩ wʋ mɩ maal dɛɛr, Nãaŋmɩn na vɛ̃n kʋ wʋ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ 'yɛrɛ a yɩ maal dɛbɛ kʋrɔ taa, na yɩ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ taa, ka wʋ sãana yɩ. Nɩtor Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ tara na kpɛ̃ɔ na maal bon.
Elaija ɩn nɩrɛ a sɩ kaar, wʋ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn nɩbijɩɛ ɩka saa wʋ ta wa ɛ, ka war ŋmaa yuomo ata nɩ ŋmaa.
Wʋ lɛ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn go ka a saa wa, ka a bonsɩ bul a tẽe naa wɔ̃.
N yɛɛr, ala ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ 'mab naa a yelmɩ̃ɛ sɔr pɔ, ka a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ lɩɛb wʋ waan,
yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a anyã ɩka, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na lɩɛb yelbe-ɩrɛ yin a wʋ yelbier pɔ, wʋ faa wʋn yin kũu pɔ, na wʋ mɩ pɔɔ yelbebe yɔɔ jaa.
Maa Pita na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nãa lɛ sɛɛrɛ a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a yɩn a Nãaŋmɩn na chɛl ir a yɩ ɩ sãanba yɛ̃yɛl ka a wɛr pɔ, na yɩ be a Pontus, nɩ Galatiya, nɩ Kapadosiya, nɩ Asɩya, nɩ a Bitiniya.
A Sãa Nãaŋmɩn den nie bɔ̃ɔ yɩ, ka a wʋ Sɩɛ oo yɩ, a yɩ ɩ chɛchɛ, yɩn wõnõ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto toor jũu, ka wʋ mɩr yɩ a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ. Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar na dɔɔlɔ yɩn taa.
Pɛɛfʋ wʋ ta a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto Sãa! A wʋ nɩbaal bɛrma naa, ka wʋ dɔɔ sɩ dɔɔ paalaa, na wʋ kʋ sɩ tɩɛrtɔ vʋr tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wʋn sɩ̃ɩ a kũu pɔ,
nɩ a nãbomo ala wʋn bin gun sɩ be a saaju, a ba wɛrɛ ɛ, a ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ, bɩɩ jʋɔlɔ ɛ.
A tu naa yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn Kpɛ̃ɔ ger pɔɔ yɩ, tɩ tãn a bɩbir baaraa 'lɔ a faafʋ 'lɔ na chɔɔr baar na wa nyɩr.
A anyãna pɔ lɛ yɩ chɩlɛ yɔɔ jaa, an sɔɔ ɩ ɩka yɩn din dɔɔyɛ bɛɛr kaa bʋrɔ bʋrɔ pɔ.
A anyãna wa naa ka a yɩ sɔɔfʋ na kpɛ̃mɛ gar a sɛlma na ɩ bʋ̃sɔ̃ɔnãa ban ma dʋʋl bũu pɔ ir a dɛɛr bar. A yɩ sɔɔfʋ na lɩɛb ɩ pɛɛfʋ, nɩ tɩɩr, nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na wa nyɩr.
Yɩ gba na ba nyɛ wʋ ɛ, tɩ na yɩ nʋ̃ wʋ. Yaa gba nyɛ wʋ a pʋ̃pãanyã ɛ, tɩ sɔɔ wʋ, na yɩ sɛɛn a pʋpɛl tɩɩr 'lɔ nɩrɛ na kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ man ɛ.
Bojũu yɩ nyɛrɛ naa a yɩ sɔɔfʋ bon na ɩ a yɩ sɩɩr faafʋ.
A faafʋ nyã 'yɛr lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a wɩ̃ɛfʋ nyã na wa a yɩ sɛ̃. Ba vɩɛr naa a faafʋ nyã na ba chɛ̃pɛ̃ wʋ jaa nɛ nɛ.
Ba mʋ̃ɔn nɩbir ɩka ba bɔ̃ɔ a sɔ̃ɔ nɩ a yelsɩ ala a Kɩrɩsɩto Sɩɛ na be a ba sɛ̃ na wile ba, a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr a dɔɔyɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto na di nɩ a tɩɩr ala na turo.

Nãaŋmɩn wiil naa a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ banyãna ɩka a ba ɩ ba mɩ̃ɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ ba tʋ̃nɔ̃ a lɛ ɛ, tɩ chɛ yɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ. A lɛ ban 'yɛr a nyãna yɩn ben wõnõ a pʋ̃pãanyã a bala na mʋɔlɔ a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ tu a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ wʋn tʋ̃ a wʋ yi a saaju. A malakasɩ mɩ gba ta bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka ba muul kaa a anyãna.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ chɔɔr a yɩ tɩɛr gun tʋ̃mɔ̃, na yɩ nyɔɔrɔ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ. Yɩ de a yɩ tɩɛrtɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a wɩ̃ɛfʋ 'lɔ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na kʋ yɩ a wʋ waa daar.
Yɩn wõnõ a Nãaŋmɩn toor jũu, yɩ taa lɛ maala a kõro mamaalbie ɛ, a lɛ yɩn ba dɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩtãa lɛ a 'lɔ na bʋɔl yɩ na ɩ chɛchɛ, yɩ mɩ ɩ chɛchɛ a yɩ yelmaalsɩ a jaa pɔ.
Bojũu a sɛb ɩka, "Yɩ ɩ chɛchɛ, bojũu n ɩn chɛchɛ."
Yɩn ma bʋɔlɔ wʋ a yɩ Sãa, 'lɔ lɛ na tɔɔr nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr, na waa turo ɛ, yɩ kpɩɛrɛ a yɩ kpɛfʋ nɩtãa sãanba, na yɩ joro wʋ dãbɩ̃ɛ.
Bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a ba ɩ bʋ̃sɔ̃ɔnãa fɩka libir, bɩɩ sɛlma lɛ Nãaŋmɩn de yab den yɩ yin a yɩ sãakpãmɩne yelpɔrsɩ ala na lũ yɩ pɔ ɛ,
tɩchɛ a ɩ naa a Kɩrɩsɩto jɩ̃ɩ vɩla ala na ɩ a pɛraabile na ba tara chɛfʋ ɛ, bɩɩ jɩ̃nɛ jaa ɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn ir wʋ naa tɩ wa bɩɛr maal a wɛr, tɩchɛ wʋ vɛ̃n ka wʋ nyɩr a sɔ̃ɔ baaraa a yɩ jũu.
A wʋ jũu lɛ yɩ sɔɔ de a Nãaŋmɩn na ir wʋ a kũu pɔ na wʋ kʋ wʋ tɩɩr, ka a yɩ sɔɔfʋ nɩ a yɩ tɩɛrtɔ na be a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã yɩn chɔɔr a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yɩn turo a yelmɩ̃ɛ jũu, yɩ nʋ̃nɔ̃ naa a yɛɛr sɩrɛ jaa. Yɩ nʋ̃nɔ̃ taa nɩ a yɩ nyãa wʋ jaa.
Bojũu yɩ nyɛn dɔɔ paalaa 'lɔ na ba ɩ bʋ̃kpiraa ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋn ben be, na ba tu a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr na ɩ vʋr, na be be bɩbir jaa.
Bojũu, "Nɩsaal kaara naa fɩka mʋɔr, ka a ba tɩɩr wʋ jaa kaara fɩka a mɔpuul. A mʋɔr wa jʋɔl, a puul mɩ ma suor naa.
Tɩchɛ a sɩ Soro 'yɛr 'lɔ ben be bɩbir jaa." A 'yɛr nyãna lɛ ba mʋɔl kʋ yɩ.
A lɛ jũu, yɩ ir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin a yosɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr, bɛlfʋ, nɛɛr ayi tarfʋ, nyuur, nɩ kporfʋ jaa bʋrɔ pɔ.
Yɩ kaara fɩka bipɩlɛ, na yɩ bʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ka ɩ yɩ vɔlaa a bɩr kaar, a yɩn tʋ̃ɔ nʋ̃ɔ a yɩ faafʋ pɔ,
bojũu an ɩ yɩ lɛm kaa lɛ a sɩ Soro na nʋ̃mɔ̃.
An ɩ yɩ wa naa a wʋ sɛ̃ na ɩ a Kʋsɩr vʋr a nɩsaal na tɔr bar, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn ir wʋ a wʋ ɩ bʋ̃sʋ̃,
yɩn mɩ na ɩ fɩka a kʋsɩvʋɛ a ba mɛn yɩ, nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn yir ka yɩ ɩ a wʋ bɔɔrlo chɛchɛsɩ, na yɩ loro a wʋ bɔɔr wʋn sɔɔ tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
A sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ ɩka, "Nyɛ, n bin a kʋsɩr be a Jiyon tẽe pɔ, a kʋsɩr vɩla 'lɔ ɩn kaa ir ka wʋ ɩ a kʋsɩr ju, ka nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ de wʋ, vɩ̃ kʋ̃ di wʋ ɛ."
Pʋ̃pãanyã a yɩn bala na sɔɔ de wʋ, wʋ ɩn kʋsɩr sʋ̃. Tɩchɛ a bala na ba sɔɔ de wʋ ɛ, "A kʋsɩr 'lɔ a mɩmɩɛrbɛ na tɔr bar, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a kʋsɩr ju,"
na, "Wʋ ɩ a kʋsɩr 'lɔ a nɩbɛ na ŋmiere a gbɛɛ, na wʋ ɩ a pie 'lɔ ban bãra loro." Ba ŋmiere naa ba gbɛɛ bojũu ba tɔr naa a 'yɛr 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na dɔ̃ɔ bin ba.
Tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ, Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ir yɩ a yɩ ɩ a wʋ bɔɔrlo nãmɩne, na yɩ ɩ nɩchɛchɛsɩ, na yɩ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sofʋ, ka yɩ na pɛɛrɛ wʋ, an ɩ 'lɔ lɛ bʋɔl yɩ yin a libe pɔ waan a wʋ chãa herete pɔ.
Yaa dɔ̃ɔ ɩ a wʋ nɩbɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã yɩ ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ. Yaa dɔ̃ɔ tara a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbaal ɛ, tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã yɩ tara wʋ naa.
N barmɩne, n sʋɔrɔ yɩ naa nɩtãa nɩyʋɔrsɩ nɩ sãanba ka a wɛr pɔ ɩka, yɩ ir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin a ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa na ma jɛɛrɛ nɩ a yɩ sɩɩr.
Yɩ kpɩɛrɛ vɩla a bala na ba puoro sɛ̃, ban sɔɔ gba kpɛrɛ yɩ ɩka dɛɛr lɛ yɩ maala, bala wa nyɛ a yɩ vɩla maalfʋ ban 'yɔ̃ɔn Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr a wʋ waa bɩbir.
A sɩ Soro jũu, yɩ siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a tʋ̃ɔfʋ dẽme, ala sɔɔ ɩ a nãkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ lɛ,
bɩɩ a nãbil bala wʋn ir bin a tẽn tẽn ka ba kpãana a bala na maala dɛɛr tɩ pɛɛrɛ a bala mɩ na maala a lɛ na tor.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ lɛ ɩka yɩn maala vɩla na yɩ pɔɔ a ba bɔ̃ɔ dẽme na ɩ a jɔlɔ nɛɛr.
Yɩ kpɩɛrɛ nɩtãa sumɩne, tɩchɛ yɩ taa de a mɩ̃ɛ sofʋ nyã pɔɔn yelbier ɛ, tɩ yɩ kpɩɛrɛ fɩka Nãaŋmɩn gbãgbaar.
Yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩrɛ jaa na yɩ nʋ̃ a yɩ taa Yesu turbo, na yɩ joro Nãaŋmɩn dãbɩ̃ɛ, tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a nãa.
Gbãgbaar, yɩ siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a yɩ tʋ̃nbɔ nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, a ta ɩ a bala na bal nɩbir maala yɩ vɩla tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bala mɩ na kpɛ̃mɛ a nɩbir.
Bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn na maal vɩla kʋ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara tɩɛr vɩla, na wʋ di dɔɔyɛ na ba tara sɔr ɛ, bojũu wʋ tara na Nãaŋmɩn tɩɛr.
Tɩchɛ bo lɛ na ɩ a yɩ tɔ̃nɔ̃, ala ɩ ba ŋme yɩ naa yɩn tʋ̃ dɛɛr jũu? Tɩchɛ ala ɩ yɩ din dɔɔyɛ yɩn maal vɩla jũu, an ɩn tɔ̃nɔ̃ kʋ yɩ Nãaŋmɩn niem.
A anyãna jũu lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn bʋɔl yɩ, bojũu Kɩrɩsɩto mɩ dɔ̃ɔ di dɔɔyɛ, na wʋ maal wiil yɩ ɩka yɩ turo a wʋ pala.
"Ka waa dɔ̃ɔ maal dɛɛr jaa ɛ, bɩɩ ka bɛlfʋ yi a wʋ nɛɛ pɔ ɛ."
A lɛ ban dɔ̃ɔ tʋrɔ wʋ, waa mɩ tʋ yaa a sãn ɛ. A dɔɔyɛ na pɔɔ wʋ, waa jo dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ wʋ den a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɔɔrɔ a 'yɛr jaa dẽ dẽ.
A wʋ mɩ̃ɛ lɛ tuo a sɩ yeldɛbɛ a wʋ ɩ̃gãn pɔ a daa ju, ka sɩ mɩ na kpi kʋ yelbier tɩ be be kʋ yeltorsɩ. A wʋ fɛlɛ ala jũu lɛ sãa sɩ.
Na yɩ kaara fɩka piir na dɔ̃ɔ bɔrɔ, tɩchɛ pʋ̃pãanyã yɩ lɩɛb wa a pɛchinɛ na kaara a yɩ sɩɩr sɛ̃.
Pɔbɔ, a lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ, yɩ sɩɩr yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a yɩ sɩrbɛ. Bamɩne baa sɔɔ puor ɛ, tɩchɛ a yɩ befʋ na tʋ̃ɔn lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr a ba puoro,
bala wa nyɛ a lɛ a yɩ maalfʋ na ɩ vɩla, nɩ lɛ yɩn 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ.
Yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a yɩ vɩla ɩ a yõo pɩ̃ɛfʋ tɛɛ ɛ, nɩtãa a ju wobfʋ, sɛlma bɔ̃jɔrsɩ yarfʋ, nɩ a fɔnɩbikpɩ̃ɛn sɛfʋ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ pɩ̃ɛfʋ be pʋɔm na ba jʋɔlɔ ɛ, na ɩ vɩla, hɛ lɛ lɛ lɛ, nɩ jomm, ala lɛ ɩ vɩla a Nãaŋmɩn niem.
Bojũu nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃ lɛ a mama pɔɔsʋ̃n bala na tara a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɛr ma maal a ba mɩ̃ɛ vɩla. Na ba sɔɔ turo, na ba sɩɩr ba mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a ba sɩrbɛ.
Lɛ mɩ lɛ a Saara na dɔ̃ɔ wõnõ a Abraham toor na wʋ ma bʋɔlɔ wʋ a wʋ soro. Yɩn lɛ ɩ a wʋ bibiir, ala ɩ yɩ maala na a lɛ na vɩɛlɛ na yɩ kʋ̃ joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ.

Sɩrbɛ a lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ, yɩ tɩɛrɛ a yɩ pɔbɔ yɩn lɔ̃ɔ kpɩɛrɛ nɩ. Yɩ kaara ba nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, bojũu baa tara kpɩ̃ɛn jɩ̃ yɩ ɛ, tɩ na ba pʋɔ yɩ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ kʋfʋ 'lɔ na ɩ nyɛvʋr, ka bon jaa taa var a yɩ Nãaŋmɩn sʋɔrfʋ ɛ.
A 'yɛr baaraa lɛ a anyã, yɩ jaa yɩ tara tɩɛr bʋ̃'yen, na yɩ kaara taa nɩbaal, na yɩ nʋ̃ taa maala vɩla kʋrɔ taa nɩ mɩ̃ɛ siirfʋ.
Yɩ ta de yelbier yãan yelbier sãn ɛ, bɩɩ tʋbir yãan tʋbir sãn ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ 'yɛr nɛvɩla 'yɔ̃ɔ ba, bojũu a anyã 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn bʋɔl yɩ ɩka yɩn nyɛn sʋ̃ʋfʋ.
Bojũu, "Ala ɩ nɩrɛ nʋ̃n nyɛvʋr na wʋ bʋɔrɔ bɩbivɩɛlsɩ wʋ ir wʋ nɛɛ yin 'yɛrdɛɛr nɩ bɛlfʋ pɔ.
Wʋ lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ yelbier tɩ maala vɩla, na wʋ bʋɔrɔ nyã'maar joro turo a wʋ puor.
Bojũu a sɩ Soro kaara naa a bala na tor, na wʋ wõnõ a ba sʋɔrfʋ. Tɩchɛ a sɩ Soro pʋɔ ma sɔ̃ɔ naa nɩ a bala na ma maala yelbier."
An lɛ na ge yɩ ala ɩ yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir maala vɩla?
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ yɩ gba din dɔɔyɛ yɩn maala vɩla jũu, Nãaŋmɩn na sʋ̃ʋ yɩ naa. "Yɩ ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ nɩ a ba vuurfʋ ɛ. Yɩ taa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ,"
Tɩchɛ a yɩ nyãn pɔ, yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a yɩ Soro. Na yɩ ma chɔɔr sɔ̃ɔ jaa ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa sʋʋr yɩ naa a tɩɛrtɔ 'lɔ yɩn tara, tɩchɛ yɩ ma man naa jomm nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ,
na yɩ vɛ̃ ka a yɩ tɩɛr chaar, ka a bala na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yɩ yuor yɩn turo a Kɩrɩsɩto jũu, ka vɩ̃ na kpɛ ba, nɩ a ba yosɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr.
An ɩn vɩla ala ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ lɛ, yɩn di dɔɔyɛ vɩla maalfʋ jũu, gar yɩn na di dɔɔyɛ dɛɛr maalfʋ jũu.
Bojũu Kɩrɩsɩto kpi naa a yɩ yelbier jũu gbɛbʋ̃'yen tɛɛ, a 'lɔ na tor kʋ a bala na ba tor ɛ, ɩka wʋ waan yɩ Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃. Ba kʋ naa a wʋ ɩ̃gãn, tɩchɛ ka a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ sɩ̃ɩ wʋ a kũu pɔ,
a Sɩɛ nyã lɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto chiin a kpĩi tẽe na wʋ tɩ mʋɔl kʋ a kpĩisɩ bala na be a pɔɔfʋ die pɔ.
A banyãna lɛ tɔr a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ, tɩchɛ ka wʋ di kãnyir ka a Nowa wa maal a daka bulomtum baar. A nɩbɛ bɩ̃lãa na ɩ aniin tɛɛ wa nyɛn faafʋ a kʋ̃ɔ pɔ.
A kʋ̃ɔ nyã nyɛtãan fɩka a Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ sofʋ na faa yɩ mɩ a pʋ̃pãanyã, a ba ɩ ɩ̃gãn dɛɛr pɛɛ barfʋ lɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a nɛɛ yɩn tɩr kʋ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ pʋtɩvɩla. Yɩ nyɛn faafʋ tu a Kɩrɩsɩto kũu irfʋ pɔ.
'Lɔ lɛ do a saaju tɩ jɩ̃nɛ, a Nãaŋmɩn nũsʋ̃ɔ jie ka a malakasɩ, nɩ a tʋ̃ɔfʋ dẽme, nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme ba jaa turo a wʋ nɛɛ.
A lɛ jũu, a Kɩrɩsɩto na di dɔɔyɛ a wʋ ɩ̃gãn pɔ, yɩ mɩ su a tãjɛbonsɩ ala gun a tɩɛr 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, bojũu a 'lɔ na di dɔɔyɛ a wʋ ɩ̃gãn pɔ ba lɛ pʋɔ yelbier pɔ ɛ.
Ala lɛ so, wʋ ta lɛ kpɩɛrɛ a wɛr pɔ nɩ a ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ kpɩɛrɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔrɔ.

Bojũu a kõro jaa, yɩ mɩ sɔ̃ɔn sɔ̃ɔ na yɩ maala a lɛ a bala na ba puoro ɛ, na maala, na baa tʋɔrɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ nyɔɔrɔ ɛ. Ka a ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa, nɩ dãburo, nɩ a pepe dib, na yɩ pʋɔ a dãnyurbo gbul pɔ, na yɩ maala tɩbɛ na sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ.
Ban tɩɛr naa ɩka yelsãan lɛ, yɩn ba lɛ pʋɔ ba a befʋ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ pɔ ɛ, ka ba pãa piel tʋrɔ yɩ.
Tɩchɛ ban man a ba nɛɛ 'yɛr kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn na wa tɔɔr a vʋɛ nɩ a kpĩisɩ 'yɛr.
A anyãna jũu lɛ so ka ba gba mɩ mʋɔl a 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ kʋ a kpĩisɩ, ɩka ban tɔɔr a ba 'yɛr nɩtãa lɛ ban na tɔɔr nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr, tɩchɛ ka ba kpɩɛrɛ a sɩɩr pɔ Nãaŋmɩn kaar.
A bonsɩ a jaa baarfʋ tara naa, a lɛ jũu yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir na yɩ kpãa a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ tʋ̃ɔ sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn.
A ala na gar a jaa lɛ a anyã, yɩ chɛnɛ vɛ̃ ka a nʋ̃fʋ be a yɩ pɔ, bojũu nʋ̃fʋ ma pɔɔn yeldɛbɛ yɔɔ.
Yɩ ma diere taa a yɩ yie tɩ ta ma ɩrɛ gbʋrɔ̃ gbʋrɔ̃ ɛ.
Ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ de a Nãaŋmɩn kʋfʋ wʋn nyɛ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ nɩ a wʋ taaba nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ a jaa.

Ala ɩ nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛrɛ na, wʋ 'yɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrbie ala. Ala ɩ wʋ ɩn tʋ̃tʋ̃nɔ̃, wʋ tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ wʋ, ka a yele a jaa pɔ, ka Nãaŋmɩn nyɛ tɩɩr tu a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto pɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ so a tɩɩr nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ bɩbir bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
N yɛɛr nʋ̃nʋ̃nbɔ, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka nɛɛ 'maa yɩ nɩ a bɛɛr kaa tuo na vulo yɩ fɩka yelsãan kɔ̃ɔ lɛ ɩrɛ yɩ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ chɩlɛ an ɩ yɩ pʋɔ naa a Kɩrɩsɩto dɔɔyɛ difʋ pɔ, ka nʋ̃ɔ na kpɛ yɩ a wʋ tɩɩr wa nyɩr.
Ala ɩ ba tʋ yɩ naa yɩn bʋɔlɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto yuor jũu, Nãaŋmɩn na sʋ̃ʋ yɩ naa, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ben a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Ala ɩ yɩ din dɔɔyɛ, a ta ɩ fɩka nɩkʋrɔ, bɩɩ nãnyie, bɩɩ nɩdɛɛr, bɩɩ tɔ'yɔ̃ɔnbɔ lɛ yɩ ɩ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa dire na dɔɔyɛ wʋn turo Kɩrɩsɩto jũu, wʋ ta vɛ̃ ka vɩ̃ kpɛ wʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ pɛɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn a yuor nyã wʋn di jũu.
Bojũu a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ sɔ̃ɔ ta naa, ka Nãaŋmɩn na piel tɔɔrɔ a wʋ nɩbɛ 'yɛr. Ala ɩ sɩn lɛ wʋn piel, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an kaara kʋ a bala na tɔr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nʋ̃ɔ?
A sɛb ɩka, "Ala ɩ an ɩn kpɛ̃ɔ kʋ a nɩtor, ŋmɩnɛ lɛ an kaara kʋ a bala na ba puor ɛ, nɩ a yelbe-ɩrbɛ?"
A lɛ jũu, vɛ̃ a bala na dire a dɔɔyɛ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ jũu, de ba mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ na mɛ ba, tɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir maala vɩla.
A maa na ɩ a nɩdiere naa nyɛ a Kɩrɩsɩto dɔɔyɛ nɩ nɩbir, naa mɩ ɩ nɩrɛ nyã na pʋɔ a tɩɩr 'lɔ na wa nyɩr, n 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ na a nɩdierbe na be be a yɩ pɔ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn,
ɩka ba kaara a Nãaŋmɩn piir a wʋn de 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩ nuur pɔ, na yɩ tʋ̃nɔ̃ kaara nɩ ba, a ta ɩ fɩrfʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ a ɩ yɩ bɔfʋ, bojũu lɛ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn bʋɔrɔ. A ta ɩ libie 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ ka a nʋ̃mɔ̃ yɩ a tʋ̃fʋ.
Yɩ ta pirpire a bala yɩn kaar ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ɩ jɩ̃nɛ kʋ a piir.
A pɛchiin gbɔɔraa wa wa, yɩn nyɛn a sãyar na ɩ a tɩɩr na ba jʋɔl ɛ.

Lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ a yɩn bala na ɩ a pɔlbil, yɩ siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a yɩ nɩdierbe. Yɩ jaa jaa yɩ ma siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ na yɩ ma tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ taa, bojũu a sɛb ɩka, "Nãaŋmɩn 'laar a bala na 'mɔɔrɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ, tɩ ma sʋ̃nɔ̃ a bala na ma siir ba mɩ̃ɛ."
A lɛ jũu, yɩ siir yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn kpɛ̃ɔ sʋɔ nuur pɔ, ka wʋ 'mɔɔ yɩ a yɩ do a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ wʋn bʋɔrɔ.
Yɩ de a yɩ yelwõnsɩ a jaa kʋ wʋ, bojũu 'lɔ lɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a yɩ tɔɔ.
Yɩ gu yɩ mɩ̃ɛ na yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ jũmɔ̃, a yɩ dɔ̃sʋɔ tɩɩ kaara naa jukpɛ̃ɛ kaar, na uoro yʋɔrɔ na wʋ pãa kaara bʋɔrɔ nɩrɛ ɩka wʋ nyɔɔ 'wɔb.
Yɩ var wʋ sɔr, na yɩ ba gbɛr ara a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ, bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a yɩ taaba na be a wɛr wʋ jaa, mɩ dire na a dɔɔyɛ nyãna tɔ yɩn dire.

Yɩn wa di a dɔɔyɛ nyãna bɩ̃lãa a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a wɩ̃ɛfʋ sʋɔ a 'lɔ na bʋɔl yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a tɩɩr nyã na ba tara baarfʋ pɔ a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ, wʋ mɩ̃ɛ na maal yɩ naa na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ ɩ̃kpɛ̃ɔ tɩ na wʋ vɛ̃ a yɩ ara kpɛ̃ɔ kʋ̃ dãm ɛ.
'Lɔ lɛ so a kpɛ̃ɔ bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.
Silasɩ na ɩ a yɛbɛ yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ lɛ sʋ̃ʋ ma ka n sɛb a gãn bile nyãna, naa 'yɔ̃ɔn yɩ ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn din dãasɩɛ ɩka anyãna lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn sɩrɛ wɩ̃ɛfʋ. Yɩ ara kpɛ̃ɔ.
A yɩ taaba pupuorbiir na be a Babilon Nãaŋmɩn na 'mataa ir yɩ, puor yɩ naa, ka a n bidaba Maakɩ mɩ puoro yɩ.
Yɩ puor puor taa nɩ nʋ̃fʋ. Nyã'maar wʋ be a yɩn bala na be a Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Maa Simon Pita na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto gbãgbaa nɩ a wʋ nɩtʋ̃nãa lɛ sɛɛrɛ a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a yɩn na tu a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn yeltorsɩ pɔ, nɩ a sɩ Fafaara Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na yɩ nyɛ a sɔɔfʋ 'lɔ na kpɛ̃mɛ a sɩ kaar.
Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar a dɔɔlɔ yɩ taa tu a bɔ̃ɔfʋ yɩn bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu.
A Wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ lɛ wʋ kʋn sɩ bon jaa sɩn bʋɔrɔ a nyɛvʋr nyã jũu nɩ Nãaŋmɩn puor vɩla tu a sɩ bɔ̃ɔfʋ sɩn bɔ̃ɔ a 'lɔ na bʋɔl sɩ, nɩ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ tɩɩr nɩ a wʋ maal vɩla.
Tu anyãna pɔ lɛ wʋ kʋn sɩ a bon na bɛrma nɩ a bʋ̃sʋ̃n wʋn tɩr a nɛɛ ɩka, a tu a pɔ, ka yɩn pʋɔ a befʋ 'lɔ na ba sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ɛ, na yɩ jo yi a wɛr nyã a yelbier vɔlaa na sɔ̃ɔ.
A anyãna jũu, yɩ mɔ̃ na yɩ de vɩla maalfʋ pʋɔ a yɩ sɔɔfʋ pɔ, na yɩ de bɔ̃ɔfʋ mɩ pʋɔ a vɩla maalfʋ pɔ,
ka a mɩ̃ɛ nyɔɔfʋ mɩ pʋɔ a vɩla maalfʋ pɔ, ka a nɩbir mʋɔfʋ pʋɔ a mɩ̃ɛ nyɔɔfʋ pɔ, ka a Nãaŋmɩn puor vɩla pʋɔ a nɩbir mʋɔfʋ pɔ,
ka a yɛɛr maal vɩla pʋɔ a Nãaŋmɩn puor vɩla pɔ, na yɩ de nʋ̃fʋ pʋɔ a yɛɛr maal vɩla pɔ.
Bojũu ala ɩ yɩ tara naa anyãna a jaa ka a pʋɔrɔ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃, an sʋ̃ʋ yɩ naa ka yɩ kʋ̃ tara yãan na yaa tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ wɔ̃nɔ̃ wɔ̃mɔ̃ a bɔ̃ɔfʋ yɩn bɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ nɩrɛ baa tara a anyãna ɛ, waa nyɛrɛ ɛ, na wʋ ɩ jɔ̃ɔ, na wʋ ĩin ɩka Nãaŋmɩn pɛɛn a wʋ kõro jaa yeldɛbɛ bar.
A lɛ jũu n yɛɛr, yɩ ba gbɛr ka a yɩ bʋɔlfʋ nɩ a yɩ chɛl irfʋ ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ. Ala ɩ yɩn maala a anyãna, yaa be jaa na wa lo ɛ.
Ka a sɔr yuo kʋ yɩ a yɩ kpɛ a sɩ Soro nɩ a Fafaara Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nãalʋ̃ʋ na ba tara baarfʋ pɔ.
A lɛ ɩn ma jɛɔ yɩ naa a yelsɩ anyãna, yɩ gba na bɔ̃ɔ yaa ka yɩ ba gbɛr ara a yelmɩ̃ɛ yɩn tara pɔ.
A tara na sɔr ka n jɛɔ a yɩ tɩɛr ɩn chɛnɛ vʋrɔ a ɩ̃gãn vaar pɔ,
bojũu n bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a kʋ̃ lɛ kor ɛ tɩchɛ ka n kpi ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na man kʋ ma.
Ɩn ɩ naa lɛ jaa ɩn na tʋ̃ɔ, maa wa sɔɔ kpi, tɩ ka yɩ ma chɛnɛ tʋ̃ɔ tɩɛrɛ a yelsɩ anyãna.
A ba ɩ fuol nɩ yɛ̃ 'yɛr lɛ sɩ de 'yɛr kʋ yɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto waa ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩn mɩ̃ɛ lɛ nyɛ a wʋ kpɛ̃ɛ nɩ nɩbir.
Wʋ nyɛn 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ tɩɩr yi a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ lɛ a kɔkɔr na yi a tɩɩr jikpɛ̃ɛ jie wa a wʋ sɛ̃ 'yɛrɛ, "Nyã lɛ ɩ a n Bie 'lɔ ɩn nʋ̃, a wʋ yele pɛl naa n pʋɔ."
Sɩn mɩ̃ɛ wõn a kɔkɔr nyãna na yi a saaju wa, an ɩ sɩn nɩ 'lɔ jaa lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be a tɔ̃chɛchɛ par.
Sɩn lɛ tara a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ na dɔ̃ɔ be be 'yɛr na chaar, yɩ yuo toor chɛlɛ a 'yɛr. A kaara naa fɩka chãa na chaara libe pɔ, tɩ tãn a wɛr na chaar ka a bivɩɛ ŋmɛrbir pur 'yɔ̃ɔ a yɩ nyãn pɔ.
A yelkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ ɩka, yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a par ɩka Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ jaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ de a wʋ yɛ̃ wiil a ala na sɛb a Nãaŋmɩn gãn pɔ par ɛ.
Bojũu nɩrɛ maa kpu 'yɛr a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ ma 'yɛr a lɛ na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, an ɩ a wʋ Sɩɛ lɛ tara ba.

Tɩchɛ a jir ŋmarba 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ be be a nɩbɛ pɔ, nɩtãa lɛ a jir ŋmarba wiwiilbe na wa be a yɩ pɔ. Ban sɔɔl wiil sɔ̃ɔfʋ 'yɛr, na ba chɩɩr a Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ na da ba na ba waan sɔ̃ɔfʋ wa 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba mɩ̃ɛ.
Nɩyɔɔ na turo naa a ba vɩ̃ sɔɩ anyãna, tɩ na ba kpɛrɛ a yelmɩ̃ɛ sɔr.
A bɔgar wiwiilbe banyãna na 'mʋ̃ɔn yɩ naa nɩ a ba nɛnʋ̃ɔ 'yɛrbie. Nãaŋmɩn guor naa a ba 'yɛr kõro jaa ka a ba sɔ̃sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ ba guro ɛ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn ba dɔ̃ɔ bar a malakasɩ bala na maal a dɛɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ban a bɔɔ fulom libe 'lɔ pɔ bar chɛlɛ nɩ a ba 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ daar.
Waa dɔ̃ɔ bar a kõr nɩbɛ ɛ, na wʋ vɛ̃ ka a kʋ̃ɔ wa paal pɔɔ a bala na ba puoro ɛ, tɩ na wʋ faa a Nowa na ɩ yeltorsɩ 'yɛr mʋɔlɔ nɩ nɩbɛ ayopõi.
Nãaŋmɩn den bũu chʋm a Sodom nɩ a Gomora nɩbɛ ka a di lɩɛb tãpɩɛl, a nɩtɔ̃ wiil ɩka lɛ lɛ na ɩ a bala na ba puoro ɛ.
Wʋ mɩ faa naa Lotɩ na ɩ a nɩtor a wʋ pʋɔ na ma sɔ̃ɔn a bala na tʋ̃nɔ̃ a dɛbɛ.
Bojũu a nɩtor nyãna lɔ̃ɔn kpɩɛrɛ nɩ ba bɩbir jaa, ka a wʋ tɩɛr ma sɔ̃ɔ lɛ wʋn ma nyɛ tɩ wõ ban ɩrɛ.
An ɩ nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a be, a sɩ Soro bɔ̃ɔn lɛ wʋn pãa na ɩ faa a bala na puoro yin a wõm pɔ, tɩ tara a bala na ba puoro ɛ, a ba be a ba gefʋ pɔ tɩ tãn a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ bɩbir.
A anyãna ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ a bala na turo a ba ɩ̃gãn sɔ̃ɔnaa nyã dɛɛr vɔlaa, baa turo a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme nɛɛ ɛ. Ba ɩn jukpɩ̃ɛn dẽme na ba 'mɔɔrɔ ba mɩ̃ɛ, baa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩ ma kpɛrɛ a saaju bʋ̃maalsɩ.
Tɩchɛ a malakasɩ gba na ɩ gãdaar na ba tara kpɩ̃ɛn, ba maa 'la kpɛ a bʋ̃maalsɩ anyãna a sɩ Soro niem ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a nɩbɛ banyãna ma fere naa nɩ a bonsɩ ala ban ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ. Ba kaara naa mɔdʋ̃n kaar bʋ̃maalaa na ba tara tɩɛrɛ, ba dɔɔ ba naa na nyɔɔr ba kʋ, ba mɩ kaara a mɔdʋ̃n kaar na ba mɩ na wɛ.
A dɛɛr ala ban maal, a dɛɛr ala lɛ ban yãan ba a sãn. A ba tɩɛr vɔlaa ban ma maala a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ, a nʋ̃mɔ̃ ba naa, ban lɔ̃ɔn dire nɩ yɩ na ban sɔ̃ɔ a yɩ befʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ yɩ vɩ̃.
A ba nɩbie sɛɛn naa a sɛ̃sɛ̃yele, a ba maa bar dɛɛr ɩfʋ ɛ. Ba ma bɛlɛ naa a bala na bal na ba ɩ bɔgar dẽme, ba ben pɔ'yɔ̃ɔfʋ pɔ.
Ba bar a sɔr dẽ dẽ 'lɔ tɩ bɔr, na ba tu a Balaam na ɩ a Beor bidaba sɔr. 'Lɔ lɛ nʋ̃ sãyar na ba ɩ ɛ,
tɩchɛ wʋ nyɛn a wʋ bawõno tɔ̃nɔ̃, bʋ̃ɔ na ɩ dʋ̃ɔ den nɩrɛ kɔkɔr 'yɛr 'yɛr na wʋ ŋmaan a 'yɛ'yɛrɛ nyãna dãbol yele sɔr.
A nɩbɛ banyãna ɩ naa fɩka kʋlsɩ na ba tara kʋ̃ɔ ɛ, bɩɩ uul sɛsɛbɛ na furo chiine. Libe jaa gbɛb lɛ guro ba.
Bojũu yobɔ 'yɛr pɔrsɩ lɛ ba ma 'yɛrɛ, na ba bʋɔlɔ a ɩ̃gãn vɔldɛɛr, na ba bɛlɛ nɩ a nɩbɛ bala na faa joro a bala na bɔr sɛ̃.
Ba ma tɩr nɛɛ kʋ ba ɩka ban faa ban a gbãgbayele pɔ, tɩchɛ ka a bala mɩ̃ɛ ɩ a yelsɔ̃ɔnsɩ gbãgbaar, bojũu nɩrɛ ɩn gbãgbaa kʋ bon 'lɔ jaa na tʋ̃ɔ wʋ.
Ala ɩ ba faan ba mɩ̃ɛ yin a wɛr nyã bɔdɛɛr pɔ, ban wa bɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Soro nɩ a Fafaara Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tɩ na ba lɛ tɩ kpɛ a ala pɔ ka a tʋ̃ɔ ba, a ba baarfʋ na ɩn dɛɛr gar a lɛ ban dɔ̃ɔ be.
An taa sa naa ala ɩ baa ta bɔ̃ɔ a sɔr toraa ɛ, gar ban ben bɔ̃ɔn tɩ lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɛbin chɛchɛ 'lɔ ban de kʋ ba.
Bala 'lɔ, a sʋkpa nyã ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ ban dɔ̃ɔ lɔb ɩka, baa lɩɛb tɩ di a ala wʋn ti bar, ka a dobaa ban so kʋ̃ɔ mɩ lɩɛb tɩ mamar a mɛmɛrɛ.
N barmɩne, a gãma ayi sʋɔ lɛ anyã ɩn sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ. A jaa ayi pɔ, n sɛb ɩka n lɛ jɛɔ yɩ tɩɛr 'lɔ na tor pɔ.
N bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka yɩ lɩɛb tɩɛr a 'yɛrbie ala a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrchɛchɛ bala na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a sɩ Soro nɩ a Fafaara na dɔ̃ɔ man ba tu a wʋ nɩtʋ̃nsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Yɩ de nie bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a ber baaraa sɔ̃ɔ, nɩlaarba na turo a ba ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa na wa naa wa laara yɩ.
Ban wa sʋrɔ yɩ naa, "Nyɩnɛ lɛ a 'lɔ na tɩr a nɛɛ kʋ yɩ ɩka wʋn wa naa? A lɛ daar jaa a sɩ sãamɩne na kpi a yelsɩ a jaa mɩ chɛnɛ na chiine a lɛ nɛ an piel."
Tɩchɛ ba bɔ̃ɔn naa tɩ maala fɩka ba ĩin naa a kõro jaa an ɩ Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrbie lɛ wʋ maal a saaju, nɩ a tẽe a kʋ̃ɔ ju, nɩ a kʋ̃ɔ par.
A tẽkor, kʋ̃ɔ mɩ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ paal pɔɔ a wɛr a wʋ sɔ̃ɔ.
A 'yɛr nyãna nɩ wʋ ju lɛ wʋ bar a saaju, nɩ a tẽe go gun a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ, na wʋn sɔ̃ɔn a bala na ba puoro ɛ, nɩ bũu.
Tɩchɛ yɩ ta ĩin a yelbʋ̃'yen nyãna ɛ, n barmɩne. A sɩ Soro sɛ̃, bɩbir bʋ̃'yen kaara naa fɩka yuon tur, ka a yuon tur kaara fɩka bɩbir bʋ̃'yen a wʋ sɛ̃.
A sɩ Soro ba baala nɩ a wʋ nɛɛ wʋn tɩr ɛ, nɩtãa lɛ a bamɩne na 'yɛr ɩka a kor naa ɛ. Wʋ din kãnyir kʋ yɩ, wʋn ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wʋ wɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ lɩɛb a yɩ tɩɛr.
A sɩ Soro bɩbir na wa naa fɩka lɛ nãnyie na ma wa, ka a saaju pɔɔn gɔ̃mɔ̃ wʋ jaa, na wʋ po chen. A bonsɩ ala na be a saaju ka a bũu nyɩl na wʋ pãa yuo yele a jaa a nɩbɛ na maala ka a gã chãa pɔ.
An ɩ a bonsɩ a jaa na wa sɔ̃ɔn a nɩtɔ̃nɔ̃, nɩbotɔ lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka yɩ ɩ? A sɛɛ naa ka a yɩ maalfʋ ɩ chɛchɛ, na yɩ puoro Nãaŋmɩn,
nɩtãa lɛ yɩn ben kaara a Nãaŋmɩn waa bɩbir na yɩ 'mi'mine nɩ a wʋ waa. A bɩbir nyãna na waan nɩ sɔ̃ɔfʋ, a saaju wʋ jaa na di naa, ka a bonsɩ a jaa mɩ nyɩl nɩ a tʋl.
Tɩchɛ sɩn chɛlɛ naa tẽpaalaa nɩ a saaju paalaa na ɩ a nɩtorsɩ tẽe, 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na tɩr a nɛɛ.
A lɛ n barmɩne, yɩn pãa na chɛlɛ a anyãna jũu, yɩ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir na yɩ taa tara chɛfʋ nɩ mabfʋ jie ɛ, na yɩ tara wʋ nɩ nyã'maar.
Yɩ tɩɛr a anyã ɩka a sɩ Soro kãnyir ɩ naa a yɩ faafʋ lɛ, nɩtãa lɛ a sɩ yɛbɛ Pɔɔl mɩ na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb kʋ yɩ nɩ a yɛ̃ 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ wʋ.

A wʋ gãma a jaa pɔ, a 'yɛr bʋ̃'yen lɛ wʋ sɛb, na wʋ 'yɛrɛ a yelsɩ anyãna. A wʋ gãma pɔ yelsɩ ben be na ɩ tuo a par bɔ̃ɔfʋ, ka a ba bɔ̃ɔ nɩ a a bala na ba bɔ̃ɔ ara dẽme lɩɛb a bur bur nɩtãa lɛ ban lɩɛr a Nãaŋmɩn gãma amɩne, ka a na ɩ ba mɩ̃ɛ sɔ̃ɔfʋ.
A lɛ jũu, n barmɩne, yɩn ben de nie bɔ̃ɔn a nɩtɔ̃, yɩ guro a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ka a ba bɛlfʋ ta wa vɛ̃ ka yɩ faa lo tɩ bar a yɩ gbɛr bafʋ jie ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ nʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ a sɩ Soro nɩ a Fafaara Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ a wʋ bɔ̃ɔfʋ pɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ so a tɩɩr a pʋ̃pãanyã, nɩ bɩbir, nɩ a bɩbir jaa. A ɩ a lɛ.

Maa Jɔɔn sɛɛrɛ na kʋrɔ a yɩn na turo a Yesu. A 'yɛr na dɔ̃ɔ be be a wɛr pielfʋ daar, 'lɔ lɛ sɩ wõ a wʋ yele na sɩ nyɛ wʋ. Sɩ nyɛ wʋ naa nɩ a sɩ nɩbie na sɩ sɩɩr wʋ nɩ a sɩ mɩ̃ɛ nuur. A 'yɛr nyã lɛ ɩ a nyɛvʋr.

A nyɛvʋr nyã lɛ yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ka wʋ de wiil sɩ a sɩ nyɛ wʋ, 'lɔ lɛ sɩ dire a wʋ dãasɩɛ na sɩ mʋɔlɔ kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ. 'Lɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, ka wʋ wa ir wʋ wiil sɩ.
Sɩ 'yɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ a lɛ a sɩn mɩ̃ɛ na nyɛ tɩ wõ, ka a lɛ na vɛ̃ ka sɩn nɩ yɩn na tara nɛbʋ̃'yen, ka a sɩn nɩ a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn 'matãan a wʋ Bie Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tara a nɛbʋ̃'yen.
A nyã lɛ sɩ sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ kaa sɩ chɩlfʋ na sɛɛ.
A 'yɛr wʋn kʋ sɩ ka sɩ mʋɔlɔ kʋrɔ yɩ nɩ nyã, Nãaŋmɩn ɩn chãa ka libe ba be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ jaa ɛ.
Ala ɩ sɩ 'yɛr naa ɩka sɩn nɩ 'lɔ tara na nɛbʋ̃'yen tɩ chɛnɛ chiine a libe pɔ, sɩ ɩn jir ŋmarba na saa turo a yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ ala ɩ sɩ chiine naa a chãa pɔ nɩtãa lɛ a 'lɔ na be a chãa pɔ, sɩn tara na nɛbʋ̃'yen ka a wʋ Bie Yesu jɩ̃ɩ pɛɛ a sɩ yeldɛbɛ a jaa bar.
Ala ɩ sɩ 'yɛr ɩka saa tara yeldɛɛr jaa ɛ, sɩ bɛlɛ na sɩ mɩ̃ɛ, na saa tara yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Ala ɩ sɩ 'yɛr naa a sɩ yeldɛbɛ kʋ Nãaŋmɩn, wʋn vɛ̃n kʋ sɩ, tɩ pɛɛ a sɩ yeldɛbɛ a jaa bar, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ nɩ nɩtor.
Ala ɩ sɩ 'yɛr naa ɩka saa maal yeldɛɛr jaa ɛ, sɩ bʋɔlɔ na Nãaŋmɩn jir ŋmara, na saa de a wʋ 'yɛr a sɩ nyãa pɔ ɛ.
N bibiir, n sɛɛrɛ naa anyã kʋrɔ yɩ ka yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa taa wa ɩrɛ yeldɛɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ wa ɩn yeldɛɛr, sɩ tara na po pire na be a Sãa sɛ̃. 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na ɩ a Torfʋ Sʋɔ.
'Lɔ lɛ lo a sɩ yeldɛbɛ bɔɔr kʋ sɩ, a ba ɩ sɩn tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ a wɛr wʋ jaa.
A nɩtɔ̃ lɛ sɩ de bɔ̃ɔn ɩka sɩ be naa a wʋ sɛ̃, sɩn turo a wʋ nɛbinsɩ jũu.
Nɩrɛ 'yɛr ɩka wʋ bɔ̃ɔn Nãaŋmɩn tɩ ba ɩrɛ a lɛ wʋn bin a nɛɛ ɛ, a nɩnyɩnɛ ɩn jir ŋmara na waa tara yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ jaa na turo a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr, sɩrɛ jaa Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃fʋ sɛɛn a wʋ pɔ. Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ sɩ de bɔ̃ɔn ɩka sɩ be naa a wʋ pɔ.
Nɩrɛ jaa na 'yɛr ɩka wʋ be naa Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ, wʋ chiine a lɛ a Yesu na dɔ̃ɔ chen.
N barmɩne, a ba ɩ nɛbin paalaa lɛ n sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bʋ̃koraa 'lɔ yɩn tara yi a pielfʋ lɛ, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a nɛkoraa yɩn wõ.
Tɩchɛ wʋ ɩn bʋ̃paalaa, bojũu a ɩn sɩrɛ a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ, naa mɩ ɩ sɩrɛ a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, bojũu a libe tɔɔn 'laa, ka a sɩrɛ chãa chaara.
Nɩrɛ jaa wa 'yɛr ɩka maa ben chãa pɔ, tɩ 'laar a wʋ yɛbɛ, wʋ chɛnɛ na be a libe pɔ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na nʋ̃ a wʋ yɛbɛ ben a chãa pɔ, ka bon jaa ba be be na vɛ̃ ka wʋ ŋme gbɛr ɛ.
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na 'laar a wʋ yɛbɛ ben a libe pɔ, na wʋ yʋɔrɔ a libe pɔ, na waa bɔ̃ɔ a jie wʋn chiine ɛ, bojũu a libe jɔ̃ɔ wʋ naa.
N bibiir, n sɛɛrɛ na a gãn nyã kʋrɔ yɩ bojũu Nãaŋmɩn vɛ̃ naa a yɩ yeldɛbɛ kʋ yɩ a lɛ a Yesu na ɩ kʋ yɩ jũu.
Sãamɩne, n sɛɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ bojũu, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a 'lɔ na yi a wɛr pielfʋ. Pɔlbil, n sɛɛrɛ na kʋrɔ yɩ bojũu yɩ tʋ̃ɔn a dɛɛr sʋɔ. Naa mɩ sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ a yɩn bibiir bojũu yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn.
N sɛb kʋ a yɩn sãamɩne bojũu, yɩ bɔ̃ɔn a 'lɔ na yi a wɛr pielfʋ daar. N sɛb kʋ a yɩn pɔlbil a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr na be a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ jũu, yɩ kpɛ̃mɛ na, na yɩ jɛb tʋ̃ɔ a dɛɛr sʋɔ.
Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa nʋ̃nɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃sɩ bɩɩ bon jaa ban tara ɛ. Ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa nʋ̃n a lɛ, a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃fʋ ba be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
Bojũu a bonsɩ anyã sɩn nyɛ ɩ naa a ɩ̃gãn nyã vɔlaa nɩ a nɩbie vɔlaa bɩɩ tara jɩ̃ jɩɩr nɩ bʋ̃tarsɩ. A nyãna a jaa wʋn na ɩrɛ ba yi a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ, tɩchɛ a yi naa dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃sɩ sɛ̃.
A bɔdɛbɛ anyã mɩ poro na chiine, tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ɩrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn bɔfʋ na ben be sɔ̃ɔ jaa.
N bibiir, a wɛr baarfʋ ta naa, nɩtãa lɛ yɩn dɔ̃ɔ wõ ɩka a bala na 'laar a Kɩrɩsɩto na wa naa, ba yɔɔ lɛ a banyãna na be ka gba. Ala lɛ sɩ de bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a baraa sɔ̃ɔ lɛ.
A nɩbɛ banyãna dɔ̃ɔ be a sɩ sɛ̃ tɩ wa yi. Ka a ba yifʋ wiil ɩka baa tara sɩ nɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen ɛ, sɩn nɩ bala ta ɩ bʋ̃'yen, ban taa be naa sɩ sɛ̃, tɩchɛ a ba yifʋ wiil ɩka baa pʋɔ sɩ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩn 'lɔ, Yesu kʋ yɩ naa a wʋ Sɩɛ ka yɩ jaa bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ.
N ba sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ yɩ bojũu yɩn ba bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩn bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ lɛ. Bojũu yɩ mɩ bɔ̃ɔn a jir na tɛɛ nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ.
An lɛ ɩ a jir ŋmara? Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛr ɩka a Yesu ba ɩ a Nɩ-iraa ɛ, a nɩrɛ 'lɔ lɛ 'laar a Kɩrɩsɩto. A nɩnyɩnɛ tɔr naa a Sãa nɩ a Bie jaa.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tɔr a Bie mɩ tɔr a Sãa, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na 'yɛr chãa pɔ ɩka Yesu lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, tara na nɛbʋ̃'yen nɩ a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn.
Yɩ chɛnɛ tara a lɛ nɛ yɩn wõ a Yesu 'yɛr a pielfʋ, yɩn wa chɛnɛ tara a lɛ, yɩn tara na nɛbʋ̃'yen nɩ a Sãa nɩ a wʋ Bie.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr ɩka wʋn ɩ naa wʋn vɛ̃ naa ka sɩ tara nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.
N sɛɛrɛ na a anyãna kʋrɔ yɩ ɩka yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃ nɩ a bala na bar yɩ tɩ yi, ba bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka ba bɛl yɩ yin.

A yɩn 'lɔ, ba kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ bɛl yɩ ɛ, bojũu Yesu kʋ yɩ naa a Sɩɛ ka wʋ be a yɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ. A Sɩɛ na ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ na wile yɩ jũu, yaa lɛ bʋɔrɔ ɩka nɩrɛ wʋ wiil yɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ go ɛ, tɩchɛ a Sɩɛ a Yesu na kʋ yɩ vɛ̃ naa ka yɩ bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ, ka ala mɩ a Sɩɛ na wile ɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ, jir jaa ba be be ɛ. A lɛ jũu, yɩ chɛnɛ tara a Yesu nɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen nɩtãa lɛ a Sɩɛ na 'yɛr yɩ.
A lɛ jũu n bibiir, yɩ chɛnɛ tara a Yesu nɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen, ka 'lɔ wa yi a saaju lɩɛb waara a wɛr pɔ, sɩn tara na nyãa ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kʋ̃ kʋrɔ sɩ a wʋ tuorfʋ ɛ.
Yɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka a Yesu yele tor naa, nɩrɛ jaa mɩ na maala a lɛ, mɩ ɩ naa a Nãaŋmɩn bie.
Nyɛ lɛ a sɩ Sãa na nʋ̃ sɩ jɩ̃. Wʋ sɔɔn bʋɔlɔ sɩ a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir, ka sɩ mɩ sɩr ɩ! A lɛ jũu, a wɛr nɩbɛ ba bɔ̃ɔ wʋ ɛ, ala lɛ so ban ba bɔ̃ɔ sɩ ɛ.
N barmɩne, pʋ̃pãanyã, sɩ ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn bibiir, saa bɔ̃ɔ lɛ sɩn na be daar kɔ̃ɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka, a Yesu wa lɩɛb wa a wɛr nyã pɔ, sɩn nyɛ naa a lɛ wʋn na be, na sɩ kaara a wʋ kaar.
Yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na tara a tɩɛrtɔ nyãna a Yesu 'yɔ̃ɔ, wʋ ir wʋ mɩ̃ɛ yin dɛɛr pɔ, nɩtãa lɛ a Yesu na ɩ chɛchɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na chɛnɛ ɩrɛ yeldɛɛr, a nɩnyɩnɛ sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ naa a Nãaŋmɩn nɛbinsɩ ala wʋn bin, bojũu waa tara Nãaŋmɩn nɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen ɛ.
Tɩchɛ yɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Yesu ba maal dɛɛr ɛ, a lɛ ka wʋ wa ɩka wʋ wa de a sɩ dɛbɛ bar.
A lɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na tara Yesu nɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen, wʋ maa lɛ chɛnɛ ɩrɛ yeldɛɛr go ɛ, tɩchɛ a nɩnyɩnɛ wa chɛnɛ ɩrɛ yeldɛɛr, waa bɔ̃ɔ a Yesu nɩ a nɩnyɩnɛ wʋn ɩ ɛ.
N bibiir yɩ bɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sʋ̃, ka nɩrɛ jaa taa bɛlɛ yɩ ɛ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na maala a lɛ na tor, wʋ ɩ naa nɩtor nɩtãa lɛ Yesu na ɩ nɩtor.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na chɛnɛ ɩrɛ yeldɛɛr yi naa a tɩɩ sɛ̃, bojũu 'lɔ lɛ ɩrɛ yeldɛbɛ yi a wɛr pielfʋ. Ala lɛ so ka Yesu na ɩ Nãaŋmɩn Bie wa ɩka wʋ wa sɔ̃ɔ a tɩɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na wa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bie, maa lɛ sɛɛ ɩka wʋ lɛ ɩrɛ yeldɛbɛ go ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn befʋ be naa a wʋ yɔ̃ɔ. Wʋ kʋ̃ lɛ chɛnɛ ɩrɛ yeldɛbɛ go ɛ, bojũu wʋ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn bie.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ sɩ de bɔ̃ɔn a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir nɩ a Tɩɩ bibiir. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ba wa turo a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ 'lɔ wʋn bin bɩɩ na waa lɛ nʋ̃ a wʋ yɛɛr, waa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bie ɛ.
An yi a daar 'lɔ jaa yɩn piel sɔɔ Yesu, yɩ wõ naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr bie na 'yɛr ɩka sɩ nʋ̃ taa.
Yɩ ta ɩ a sɩ kaara a Kain kaar ɛ, wʋ tara na a dɛɛr sʋɔ tɩɛr na wʋ kʋ a wʋ yɛbile. Bo lɛ so wʋn kʋ a yɛbile? Bojũu a Kain tʋ̃mɔ̃ ɩn dɛɛr, tɩchɛ ka a wʋ yɛbile tʋ̃mɔ̃ tor.
N yɛɛr, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka a fɛr yɩ ala ɩ a nɩbɛ na be a wɛr pɔ wa 'laar yɩ naa ɛ.
Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka sɩ nʋ̃ naa a sɩ taaba. A wiil ɩka sɩ yin kũu pɔ, tɩ kpɛ nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ pɔ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba nʋ̃ a wʋ yɛbɛ ɛ, wʋ chɛnɛ na be kũu pɔ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na 'laar a wʋ yɛɛr ɩn nɩkʋrɔ a wʋ nyãa pɔ, ka yɩ mɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka nɩkʋrɔ ba tara nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.
Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn lɛ a nʋ̃fʋ na be, bojũu Yesu sɔɔn kpi kʋ sɩ, ka a mɩ sɛɛ ɩka, sɩ mɩ sɔɔ kpi kʋ a sɩ yɛɛr.
Ala ɩ a yɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ tara naa ka a sɛɛn wʋ, tɩ nyɛ a wʋ taa yɛɛr an wõnõ ka wʋ lɩɛb puor yɔ̃ɔ ba, a Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃fʋ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ be a wʋ sʋɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
N bibiir, yɩ ta vɛ̃ ka sɩ nʋ̃fʋ ɩ 'yɛrbie nɩ jãlbir 'yɛrbie ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ ɩ ka sɩ sʋ̃nɔ̃ taa nɩtãa lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na nʋ̃ sɩ sɩrɛ jaa.
A sɩ befʋ pɔ lɛ sɩn bɔ̃ɔ ɩka sɩ be naa a yelmɩ̃ɛ pɔ sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa sɩn wa ara a Nãaŋmɩn niem sʋɔrɔ wʋ, sɩ kʋ̃ lɛ joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ,
ala gba ɩ a sɩ tɩɛr 'yɛr ɩka sɩ maal dɛɛr. Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn bɔ̃ɔn yele jaa a sɩ nyãn pɔ, na wʋ bɔ̃ɔ yele jaa sɩn ɩrɛ.
N barmɩne, ala ɩ sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa a sɩ tɩɛr pɔ, ɩka sɩ maa chɛnɛ maala dɛɛr ɛ, sɩn wa sʋɔrɔ Nãaŋmɩn, sɩ kʋ̃ joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ,
sɩn nyɛn bon jaa sɩn sʋɔr yi a wʋ sɛ̃, bojũu sɩ turo naa a wʋ nɛɛ na sɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ na pɛlɛ a wʋ pʋɔ.
Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ wʋn bin nɩ nyã, ɩka sɩ sɔɔ a wʋ Bie Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto yuor na sɩ nʋ̃ a sɩ taaba, nɩtãa a lɛ wʋn 'yɛr sɩ.
Bala jaa na turo a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ wʋn bin, ba ben a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka wʋ mɩ be a ba 'yɔ̃ɔ. Sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka wʋ ben a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, a Sɩɛ 'lɔ wʋn de kʋ sɩ jũu.

N barmɩne, yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa sɔɔ nɩrɛ jaa na 'yɛr ɩka wʋ tara na a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ yɩ bɛɛr a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ kaa, ka ala ɩ a 'yɛr wʋn 'yɛrɛ yin a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃. Bojũu jir 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ yi naa jie jaa na ba 'yɛrɛ ɩka a lɛ ban 'yɛrɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʋ ba.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ yɩn de bɔ̃ɔn a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, nɩrɛ 'lɔ nɩ wa 'yɛr ɩka Yesu wa naa a wɛr pɔ nɩtãa nɩsaal, a nɩrɛ 'lɔ lɛ yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Nɩrɛ jaa wa tɔr a lɛ ba yi Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ, a nɩrɛ nyã lɛ 'laar a Kɩrɩsɩto, a 'lɔ yɩn wõ ɩka wʋn wa naa, 'lɔ lɛ be be a wɛr pɔ a pʋ̃pãanyã.
N bibiir, yɩn 'lɔ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ na yɩ tʋ̃ɔ ba, bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'lɔ na be a yɩ pɔ, bɛrma naa gar a dɛɛr sʋɔ 'lɔ na be a wɛr pɔ.
A jir dẽme banyãna na 'yɛr ɩka Nãaŋmɩn lɛ kʋ ba a wiilfʋ anyãna ɩ naa a wɛr nyã nɩbɛ. Ka a ba wiilfʋ ɩ a wɛr nyã pɔ wiilfʋ, ka a bala na ba ɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ɛ, ma sɔɔ a ba wiilfʋ.

Sɩn 'lɔ ɩn naa a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn, ma sɔɔ naa a lɛ sɩn wile, tɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, maa sɔɔ a lɛ sɩn wile ɛ. Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ sɩn tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔn ka a nɩnyɩnɛ na 'yɛrɛ tara naa Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'lɔ na ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ, bɩɩ nɩrɛ 'lɔ na yi a Satan sɛ̃ na ɩ a jir ŋmara.
N barmɩne, yɩ vɛ̃ a sɩ wile taa nʋ̃fʋ. N 'yɛr naa a nɩtɔ̃ bojũu Nãaŋmɩn lɛ ma vɛ̃ a sɩ ma tʋ̃ɔ nʋ̃ taa. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na wa nʋ̃ a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ, a wiil ɩka Nãaŋmɩn bie lɛ wʋ ɩ na wʋ bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na baa wa nʋ̃ a wʋ taaba ɛ, ba bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn befʋ wʋ jaa ɩn nʋ̃fʋ.
A sɔr nyã lɛ Nãaŋmɩn tu wiil a wʋ nʋ̃fʋ kʋ sɩ. Wʋ vɛ̃n a wʋ Bibʋ̃'yen tɛɛ ka wʋ wa a wɛr pɔ, a wʋ jũu, sɩ tara na a yelmɩ̃ɛ nyɛvʋr.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a nʋ̃fʋ be, a ba ɩ sɩn lɛ nʋ̃ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, tɩchɛ 'lɔ lɛ nʋ̃ sɩ, na wʋ tʋ̃ a wʋ Bie ka wʋ wa lo a sɩ yeldɛbɛ bɔɔr kʋ sɩ.
N barmɩne, an ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ nʋ̃ sɩ a nɩtɔ̃, a mɩ sɛɛ naa ɩka, sɩ mɩ nʋ̃ taa.
Nɩrɛ jaa ba nyɛ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ wʋn be ɛ, tɩchɛ sɩn wa nʋ̃ taa, sɩn nɩ Nãaŋmɩn tara na nɛbʋ̃'yen. Ka a Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃fʋ 'lɔ na be a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ chaar kʋ a nɩbɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn kʋ sɩ naa a wʋ Sɩɛ, a lɛ jũu lɛ sɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka, Nãaŋmɩn ben a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka sɩ mɩ be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ, ala lɛ so sɩn nɩ Nãaŋmɩn na tara nɛbʋ̃'yen.
Sɩ nyɛ naa na sɩ mɩ di dãasɩɛ ɩka a Sãa tʋ̃ naa a wʋ Bie ka wʋ wa faa a wɛr nɩbɛ.
Nãaŋmɩn tara na nɛbʋ̃'yen nɩ nɩrɛ nyã na 'yɛr chãa pɔ, tɩ sɔɔ ɩka Yesu ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn Bie, ka sɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a nɩnyɩnɛ tara na nɛbʋ̃'yen.
A lɛ sɩn 'lɔ, sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa na sɩ sɔɔ de ɩka, Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃ sɩn sɔ̃ɔ jaa. Nãaŋmɩn ɩn nʋ̃fʋ sʋɔ. Nɩrɛ mɩ na nʋ̃ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a wʋ taaba, wʋ ben Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka Nãaŋmɩn mɩ be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Sɩn 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃fʋ chaara a sɩ pɔ, ka dãbɩ̃ɛ kʋ̃ kʋrɔ sɩ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ sɩn wa ara a wʋ niem a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ daar ɛ. Bojũu a wɛr nyã pɔ sɩ kaar naa nɩtãa Yesu.
Dãbɩ̃ɛ ba be nʋ̃fʋ pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ nʋ̃fʋ na chaar ma diin dãbɩ̃ɛ bar, bojũu dãbɩ̃ɛ ma kpɛ̃n nɩrɛ wʋn joro gefʋ. Nʋ̃fʋ mɩ na chaar, ba joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ.
Bojũu Nãaŋmɩn lɛ de nie nʋ̃ sɩ, ala lɛ so a sɩ mɩ nʋ̃ wʋ.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ 'yɛr ɩka wʋ nʋ̃n Nãaŋmɩn, tɩ chɛnɛ 'laar a wʋ yɛɛr, a nɩnyɩnɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩn jir ŋmara. Bojũu nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na ba nʋ̃ a wʋ tɔ sʋɔ wʋn nyɛn nɩbir, kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ nʋ̃ Nãaŋmɩn wʋn ba nyɛn nɩbir ɛ.
A nɛɛ lɛ a nyã a Nãaŋmɩn na 'yɛr bin, nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na nʋ̃ a 'lɔ Nãaŋmɩn sɛɛ naa ɩka wʋ nʋ̃ a wʋ taaba.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ ɩka Yesu lɛ ɩ a Nɩ-iraa, ɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn bie. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na nʋ̃ a sãa mɩ nʋ̃ naa a bie.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ sɩn de bɔ̃ɔn ɩka sɩ nʋ̃ naa a Nãaŋmɩn bibiir ala ɩ sɩ nʋ̃n a Nãaŋmɩn na sɩ turo a wʋ nɛɛ wʋn bin.
Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ sɩn de bɔ̃ɔn ɩka sɩ nʋ̃n Nãaŋmɩn sɩrɛ jaa, ala ɩ sɩ tun a lɛ jaa wʋn 'yɛr ka sɩ tu. A ba ɩ tuo ka sɩ na tu a lɛ jaa wʋn 'yɛr ɩka sɩ tu ɛ.
Bojũu nɩrɛ jaa na ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bie ma lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɔr dɛbɛ ala a nɩbɛ na turo. A lɛ vɛ̃ naa, ka wʋ ma tʋ̃ɔ tɔr a sɔr dɛbɛ ala a nɩbɛ na turo, Yesu wʋn sɔɔ jũu.
An lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb puor 'yɔ̃ɔ a wɛr? Nɩrɛ 'lɔ tɛɛ na sɔɔ ɩka Yesu lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie.
A Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nyã lɛ wa a ba so wʋ Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ɔ nɩ a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ. Waa so a kʋ̃ɔ tɛɛ ɛ, tɩ wʋ kpi naa na wʋ kpaar a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ, ka a Sɩɛ mɩ di a wʋ dãasɩɛ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ma 'yɛrɛ naa yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Bojũu dãasɩɛsɩ ata lɛ be be,
a Sɩɛ, nɩ a kʋ̃ɔ, nɩ a jɩ̃ɩ, ka a jaa ata dãasɩɛ ɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen.
Ala ɩ sɩ ma sɔɔ naa nɩsaal dãasɩɛ, sɩn sɔɔ naa Nãaŋmɩn dãasɩɛ 'lɔ wʋn di a wʋ Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ, bojũu Nãaŋmɩn dãasɩɛ bɛrma naa gar nɩsaal dãasɩɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na sɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie, a dãasɩɛ nyã be naa a wʋ nyãa pɔ. Nɩrɛ nyã jaa na ba wa sɔɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, wʋ bʋɔl wʋn jir ŋmara bojũu waa sɔɔ a dãasɩɛ wʋn di a wʋ Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ ɛ.
A dãasɩɛ nɩ nyã, Nãaŋmɩn kʋ sɩ naa nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, ka a nyɛvʋr nyã be a wʋ Bie 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara a Bie, tara na nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba wa tara a Bie ɛ, ba tara nyɛvʋr ɛ.
N sɛb kʋ a yɩn bala na sɔɔ a Nãaŋmɩn Bie yuor, ka yɩn bɔ̃ɔ ɩka yɩ tara na nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.
A 'lafʋ nyã lɛ sɩ tara ɩka, sɩn wa sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn a lɛ wʋn bʋɔrɔ, wʋn wõ naa naa.
Ka ala ɩ sɩ bɔ̃ɔn na ɩka Nãaŋmɩn wõ naa a lɛ sɩn ma sʋɔr wʋ, sɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka sɩ tara na bon jaa sɩn sʋɔr wʋ.
Ala ɩ yɩ wa nyɛ naa a yɩ tɔ sʋɔ na ɩrɛ yeldɛɛr kɔ̃ɔ na kʋ̃ sʋ̃ʋ wʋ ɛ, yɩ sʋɔr Nãaŋmɩn ka wʋ vɛ̃ kʋ wʋ. Tɩchɛ yeldɛbɛ amɩne ben be fʋn na ɩ ka Nãaŋmɩn kʋ̃ vɛ̃ kʋ fʋ ɛ, n ba 'yɛr ɩka yɩ sʋɔr a ala ɛ.
Yeldɛbɛ a jaa ɩn yelbier, tɩchɛ yelbier a jaa baa kʋrɔ kũu ɛ.
Sɩn bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na wa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn bie, kʋ̃ lɛ chɛnɛ ɩrɛ yeldɛɛr ɛ, Nãaŋmɩn Bie na gu ba naa ka a dɛɛr sʋɔ kʋ̃ sɩɩr ba ɛ.
Sɩn bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka sɩ ɩn Nãaŋmɩn bibiir, ka a wɛr wʋ jaa be a dɛɛr sʋɔ tʋ̃ɔfʋ pɔ.

Sɩ mɩ bɔ̃ɔn naa ɩka Nãaŋmɩn Bie wa naa, 'lɔ lɛ vɛ̃ ka sɩ bɔ̃ɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ. Sɩ be naa a Nãaŋmɩn nyã nɩ a wʋ Bie Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ.
N bibiir, yɩ tɔɔ yɩ mɩ̃ɛ yin bʋtɩbɛ jaa pɔ.
Maa nɩkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ a fʋ̃ʋ pɔɔ nyã Nãaŋmɩn na ir nɩ a fʋ bibiir. N nʋ̃ fʋ naa nɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ, a ba ɩ maa tɛɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ bala jaa mɩ na bɔ̃ɔ a yelmɩ̃ɛ mɩ nʋ̃ fʋ naa.
An ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ ben a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ jũu, na wʋn be a sɩ sɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ jaa.
Wɩ̃ɛfʋ, nɩ nɩbaal, nɩ nyã'maar na yi a sɩ Sãa Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a wʋ Bie Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto a be a sɩn bala na be a yelmɩ̃ɛ nɩ a nʋ̃fʋ pɔ.
Nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ma naa ɩn nyɛ a fʋ bibiir bamɩne na chiine a yelmɩ̃ɛ pɔ, nɩtãa lɛ a Sãa na bin a nɛɛ kʋ sɩ.
Pʋ̃pãanyã n yɛpɔɔ, a ba ɩ nɛbin paalaa lɛ n sɛɛrɛ kʋrɔ fʋ ɛ, tɩchɛ a bʋ̃koraa 'lɔ lɛ na 'yɛr ɩka sɩ nʋ̃ taa.
A nʋ̃fʋ nɩ nyã ɩka sɩ turo a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na bin a wʋ nɛɛ kʋ sɩ. Wʋ 'yɛr ɩka sɩ nʋ̃ taa nɩtãa lɛ sɩn wõ yi a pielfʋ, sɩ ɩrɛ a lɛ nɛ.
Bɛ̃bɛlbɛ sɛɛn a wɛr, bala lɛ ba sɔɔ ɩka Yesu wan a wɛr pɔ nɩtãa nɩsaal ɛ. A nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ ɩ a bɛ̃bɛlbɛ tɩ 'laar a Kɩrɩsɩto.
Yɩ guro yɩ mɩ̃ɛ ka a yɩ tʋ̃mɔ̃ ta lo ɛ, tɩchɛ ka yɩ nyɛ a yɩ sãyar.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na ba wa turo a lɛ a Yesu na wiil ɛ, waa tara nɛbʋ̃'yen nɩ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ, tɩ fʋ̃ʋ nyã na turo a lɛ wʋn wiil, tara naa Sãa nɩ a Bie.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ wa wa naa a yɩ sɛ̃, tɩ ba tara a wiilfʋ nyã ɛ, yɩ ta sɔɔ ka wʋ kpɛ a yɩ yir bɩɩ puor wʋ ɛ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na puor a nɩnyɩnɛ nyãna mɩ pʋɔ naa a wʋ tʋ̃dɛɛr pɔ.
N chɛnɛ na tara yelyɔɔ ɩn taa sɛb kʋ fʋ, tɩchɛ ɩn bʋɔrɔ ɩka n wa a yɩ sɛ̃ jũu, maa wa wa sɩn 'mataa jɩ̃nɛ 'yɛrɛ ka nʋ̃ɔ nyɔɔ sɩ.
A yɛpɔɔ nyã mɩ a Nãaŋmɩn na ir bibiir mɩ puor fʋ naa.
Maa na ɩ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ sɛb a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a fʋ̃ʋ Gayus na ɩ a n baraa, ɩn nʋ̃ a yelmɩ̃ɛ jũu.
N baraa, n sʋɔrɔ na Nãaŋmɩn ɩka a fʋ ɩ̃gãn wʋ kpɛ̃mɛ ka a yele a jaa ɩ vɩla kʋ fʋ, nɩtãa lɛ a fʋ sɩɛ na kpɛ̃mɛ.
Nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ ma naa lɛ a yɛɛr bamɩne na wa 'yɛr a lɛ fʋn turo a yelmɩ̃ɛ na fʋ chiine a yelmɩ̃ɛ pɔ.
Bon jaa maa ɩ ma nʋ̃ɔ jɩ̃ ɩn maa wõ ɩka a n bibiir chiine naa a yelmɩ̃ɛ pɔ.
N baraa, fʋ tara na yelmɩ̃ɛ a lɛ fʋn maala kʋrɔ a yɛɛr, ba gba na ɩ sãanba a fʋ sɛ̃.
Ban wa, ba wa 'yɛr naa a fʋ nʋ̃fʋ kʋ a pupuorbiir a ka. Mɔ̃ na fʋ ma bar ba a sɔr a lɛ nɛ, lɛ lɛ pɛlɛ a Nãaŋmɩn pʋɔ.
Yesu yuor jũu lɛ ba chiine, na ba maa sɔɔ de bon jaa a bala na ba ɩ a Yesu turbo sɛ̃ ɛ.
Sɩn lɛ a sɛɛ ɩka sɩ sʋ̃ʋ ba na sɩ pʋɔ ba 'mataa tʋ̃ kʋ a yelmɩ̃ɛ.
N sɛb sɛbile kʋ a pupuorbiir na be a fʋ sɛ̃, tɩchɛ a Diotɩrefes na bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ ɩ a nɩdiere, sɩn nɩ 'lɔ ba tara nɛbʋ̃'yen ɛ.

Ala lɛ so, maa wa tɩ ɩn 'yɛr yɩ naa a lɛ wʋn yʋɔrɔ hũhũnõ ŋmara a jirsɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ sɩ. A lɛ tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ, tɩ wʋ maa sɔɔ de a sɩ yɛɛr ɛ. Wʋ ma ŋmaan a bala na bʋɔrɔ ɩka ba de ba sɔr tɩ ma dii ba bar a puorfʋ jie.
N baraa, ta tɔɔr yeldɛɛr ɛ, tɩchɛ tɔɔrɔ yelvɩla, nɩrɛ 'lɔ na maala vɩla bɔ̃ɔn Nãaŋmɩn. Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ 'lɔ mɩ na maala dɛɛr ba bɔ̃ɔ Nãaŋmɩn ɛ.
Demetirus, nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr a wʋ vɩla maalfʋ 'yɛr, a yelmɩ̃ɛ mɩ din a wʋ dãasɩɛ. Sɩn mɩ din a wʋ vɩla dãasɩɛ, ka yɩn mɩ bɔ̃ɔn ɩka a sɩ dãasɩɛ ɩn sɩrɛ.
N chɛnɛ na tara yelyɔɔ ɩn taa sɛb kʋ fʋ, tɩchɛ n ba bʋɔrɔ ɩka n sɛb ɛ.
A kʋ̃ lɛ kor ɛ, n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n nyɛ fʋ a sɩ jɩ̃nɛ 'yɛr.
Nyã'maar wʋ be a fʋ sɛ̃. A sɩ barmɩne na be ka puor fʋ naa, mɩ puor a sɩ barmɩne na be a be bʋ̃'yen 'yen.
Maa Judɩ na ɩ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto gbãgbaa, naa mɩ ɩ a Jemesɩ yɛbɛ, lɛ sɛɛrɛ a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a yɩn bala a Sãa Nãaŋmɩn na bʋɔl a yɩ be a wʋ nʋ̃fʋ pɔ ka wʋ gu yɩ taa lɛɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ.
Nɩbaal nɩ nyã'maar nɩ nʋ̃fʋ a dɔɔlɔ yɩ taa.
N barmɩne, n dɔ̃ɔ mʋ̃ɔ nɩbir ɩka n sɛb a faafʋ nyã sɩ jaa na põ, naa nyɛ ɩka a sɛɛ naa ka n sɛb kpãkpãan yɩ a yɩ mʋɔrɔ nɩ a sɔɔfʋ 'yɛr 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na de kʋ a wʋ nɩbɛ.

Nɩbɛ bamɩne sɔ̃ɔfʋ yele na dɔ̃ɔ sɛb bin kõr jaa sɔɔl naa na ba fʋɔl kpɛ a yɩ pɔ. Baa puoro ɛ, ba nyɔɔn a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn wɩ̃ɛfʋ yele lɩɛb na ba nyɛ sɔr sɛ̃nɛ tɩ na ba tɔr a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto tɛɛ na ɩ a sɩ Tʋ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a sɩ Soro.
Yɩ gba den nie bɔ̃ɔn a anyãna, tɩ n bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka n lɛ jɛɔ yɩ ɩka, a sɩ Soro faan a wʋ nɩbɛ yin a Ijipitɩ tẽe pɔ, tɩchɛ wʋ lɛ wa nyʋɔl a bala jaa na ba sɔɔ ɛ.
A malakasɩ bala na ba ara a ba tʋ̃ɔfʋ araa jie ɛ, tɩchɛ na ba tɔr a ba mɩ̃ɛ yir bar, bala lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn lũn a bɔ̃jɔr kpɩ̃ɛn 'yɔ̃ɔ be a libe pɔ chɛlɛ nɩ a 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ bɩbir kpɛ̃ɛ daar.
A lɛ nɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ, a Sodom nɩ a Gomora, nɩ a tẽchɛɛlsɩ ala na jilʋ̃ de a ba mɩ̃ɛ kʋ a sɛ̃sɛ̃yele, ka dɔɔr gãna nɩ taa, ka a bũu na ba kpĩine ɛ, di ba, naa ɩ yelmanaa gã.
A lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ, a jãna dẽme banyãna sɔ̃ɔn a ba ɩ̃gãma, baa turo a sɩ Soro binfʋ ɛ. Ba ma kpɛrɛ naa a saaju bʋ̃maalsɩ.
Tɩchɛ a Maɩkɩl gba na ɩ a malakasɩ nɩkpɛ̃ɛ a 'lɔ naa Tɩɩ na dɔ̃ɔ chɩrɛ taa nɩ Mosesɩ ɩ̃gãn yele, waa 'la tu a Tɩɩ bɩɩ kpɛ wʋ ɛ, tɩ na wʋ 'yɛr, "A sɩ Soro lɛ na kpãa fʋ."
Tɩchɛ a nɩbɛ banyãna ma kpɛrɛ naa a bonsɩ ala ban ba bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, ka a yelsɩ ala ban ba bɔ̃ɔ yi a ba dɔɔfʋ daar, kaara fɩka dʋ̃n na ba tara tɩɛr ɛ, a yelsɩ anyãna lɛ na sɔ̃ɔ ba.
Nɛbier nyɔɔ ba naa, bojũu ba den a Kain sɔr. Tɔ̃nɔ̃ jũu a ba far kpɛ a Balaam bɔrfʋ pɔ. A nɛchɩrɛ jũu, ba mɩ nyʋɔl naa a Kora kaar.

A nɩbɛ banyãna kaara fɩka bʋ̃sɔ̃ɔnsɩ na jɛr yɩ a yɩ nɛbʋ̃'yen lɔ̃ɔ di daar. Ba maa bɛɛ nɩrɛ ɛ, ba mɩ̃ɛ lɛ ba kaara. Ba ɩn julõjuur na ba tara kʋ̃ɔ ɛ, ka a sɛsɛbɛ furo yʋɔrɔ nɩ. Ba kaara fɩka kpãchãan tɩɩr na ba tara wɔ̃mɔ̃ ɛ, ka ba vɔ̃ dɩɛl bar ka a kpi.
Ba kaara na fɩka a man kpɛ̃ɛ a sɛsɛkpɛ̃ɛ na furo ka a ba vɩ̃ furo a kʋ̃ɔ fuul kaar, na ba kaara fɩka ŋmarbie bɔrɔ yʋɔrɔ ka a Nãaŋmɩn chɔɔr jilibe jaa gbɛb guro nɩ ba.
Enok na ɩ a Adama yɔ̃ɔ suulaa ayopõi sʋɔ mɩ dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr a nɩbɛ banyãna 'yɛr, "Nyɛ, a sɩ Soro waara naa nɩ a wʋ nɩchɛchɛsɩ turo turo.
Wʋn wa tɔɔr nɩrɛ jaa 'yɛr, na wʋ 'yɛr a lɛ a bala na ba puoro ɛ, a lɛ jaa ban tʋ̃ nɩ a lɛ ban maal tɔr a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a 'yɛr bikpɩ̃ɛn ala ban 'yɛr dɔɔl wʋ."
A nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ ma ɩrɛ gbʋrɔ̃ gbʋrɔ̃, na ba nyɛrɛ a ba taaba bɔrfʋ. Ba ma turo naa a ba mɩ̃ɛ vɔldɛɛr, a ba mɩ̃ɛ yobɔ 'yɛr lɛ ba ma 'yɛrɛ bɛlɛ nɩ a ba taaba tɔ̃nɔ̃ jũu.
Tɩchɛ n barmɩne, yɩ tɩɛr a lɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩtʋ̃nsɩ na dɔ̃ɔ 'yɛr.
Ba 'yɛr kʋ yɩ ɩka, "A ber baaraa sɔ̃ɔ, nɩlaarba na turo a ba ɩ̃gãn vɔlaa na wa naa."
A nɩbɛ banyãna lɛ ma waan ootaa, na ba turo a ɩ̃gãn bɔfʋ na baa tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ a yɩn n barmɩne, yɩ mɛ a yɩ mɩ̃ɛ dɔɔl a yɩ sɔɔfʋ chɛchɛ ju, na yɩ sʋɔrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a wʋ Sɩɛ kpɛ̃ɔ.
Yɩ sɔɔl yɩ mɩ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nʋ̃fʋ pɔ na yɩ chɛlɛ a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto nɩbaal, a wʋ waan a nyɛvʋr na ba tara baarfʋ ɛ, wa kʋ yɩ.
Yɩ tara a bala na baala nɩ nɩbaal.
Yɩ vʋ̃ɔ a bamɩne yin a bũu pɔ na yɩ faa ba. Na yɩ mɩ kaa a bamɩne nɩbaal tɩ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ jʋ̃mɔ̃, na yɩ taa maal a ba dɛɛr ala ban maala ɛ.
A 'lɔ na gu yɩ ka yɩ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ lo ɛ, na wʋn wa waan yɩ a wʋ tɩɩr niem a yɩ kʋ̃ tara chɛfʋ ɛ, ka a nʋ̃ɔ kpɛ̃ɛ kpɛ yɩ.
A Nãaŋmɩn bʋ̃'yen nyã tɛɛ lɛ ɩ a sɩ Fafaara, wʋ nyɛ tɩɩr, nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ, nɩ tʋ̃ɔfʋ tu a sɩ Soro Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto 'yɔ̃ɔ sɛrɛ tɩ wʋ wa maal a wɛr nɩ pʋ̃pãanyã bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa! A ɩ a lɛ.
A yelwiilsɩ ala a Nãaŋmɩn na kʋ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto ɩka wʋ wiil kʋ a wʋ gbãgbaa ala kʋ̃ yaar tɩ ɩ ɛ. Yesu tʋ̃ naa a wʋ malaka ɩka wʋ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ a wʋ gbãgbaa Jɔɔn.
Jɔɔn mɩ man naa a ala a jaa wʋn nyɛ na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nɩ lɛ a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto na 'yɛr.
Pʋpɛl sʋɔ lɛ a 'lɔ na kar a gãn nyã. Pʋpɛl dẽme mɩ lɛ a bala na wõ tɩ de 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba nyãn pɔ, lɛ an sɛb a gãn nyã pɔ, bojũu a bɩbir gbʋr naa.

Maa Jɔɔn lɛ sɛb a gãn nyã kʋrɔ a yɩn pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ayopõi na be Asɩya paal pɔ. Wɩ̃ɛfʋ nɩ nyã'maar yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ, 'lɔ lɛ be be, nɩ 'lɔ lɛ na wa, naa yi a Sɩɩr ayopõi na ara a Nãaŋmɩn dakɔɔ niem,

naa yi a Yesu Kɩrɩsɩto sɛ̃, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ dãasɩɛ sʋɔ, na wʋ ɩ a bidɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ na ir a kũu pɔ ɩ vʋr, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a nãmɩne ba jaa nãkpɛ̃ɛ na be ka a wɛr pɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ nʋ̃ sɩ na wʋ de a wʋ jɩ̃ɩ pɛɛ sɩ yin a sɩ yeldɛɛr pɔ na wʋ faa sɩ,
na wʋ maal sɩ a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ nɩbɛ nɩ Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lorbo ka sɩn tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ a wʋ Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a Sãa, 'lɔ lɛ so a tɩɩr nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ a bɩbir nɩ bɩbir jaa! A ɩ a lɛ.
Yɩ nyɛ, wʋn yi naa a sajulõjuur pɔ waara, ka a nɩbɛ ba jaa nyɛ wʋ lɔ̃ɔn a bala na chɔr wʋ, a nɩbʋrsɩ na be ka a tẽe na kõnõ naa a wʋ waa jũu. Lɛ lɛ an ɩ! A ɩ a lɛ.
A sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ jaa sʋɔ 'yɛr naa, "Maa lɛ a Pielfʋ nɩ a Baaraa. Maa lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be. Maa lɛ chɛnɛ be be. Maa lɛ na wa."

Maa Jɔɔn na ɩ a yɩ yɛbɛ, n pʋɔ yɩ naa a dɔɔyɛ pɔ a Yesu tufʋ jũu. Maa nɩ yɩn jaa ben a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ tɩ chɛnɛ tara kãnyir. N ben a man dõdol pɔ ban bʋɔlɔ Patimosɩ bojũu n 'yɛr naa a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr naa di a Yesu dãasɩɛ.
A sɩ Soro Bɩbir Daar, Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ ir ma naa ka n wõ nɛkpɛ̃ɛ na tãn a n puor fɩka ɩɩl ban pɛɛl,
ka a kɔkɔr 'yɛr, "Sɛb a ala a jaa fʋn nyɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ a gãn pɔ, na fʋ tɩr kʋ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ayopõi. Efesus, Semena, Pergamum, Tayatira, Saadisɩ, Feladelfiya nɩ Laodisea."
N lɩɛb ɩka n kaa an lɛ 'yɛrɛ a lɛ kʋrɔ ma. Ɩn wa lɩɛb, n nyɛn sɛlma fɩ̃tɩnɛ dɔɔlfʋ jie jiir ayopõi.
A fɩ̃tɩnɛ dɔɔlfʋ jiir anyãna sãlsɔɔ, n nyɛn nɩrɛ na kaara fɩka Nɩsaal Bie na wʋ su fuu wõo ka wʋ ta a gbɛɛ pɔ, tɩ a sɛlma gãn bãbɩ̃ a wʋ nyãa ju.
A wʋ jukɔɔl pɛl fɩka gõn, ka a nɩbie kaara fɩka bũu na 'lɩrɛ.
Ka a gbɛɛ nyɩlɛ fɩka kur jɩɛ ban juu ir sãa pɔ, ka a kɔkɔr wʋn 'yɛrɛ nyɛtãan kɔ̃kpɛ̃ɛ na joro.
Ŋmɛrbie ayopõi be naa a wʋ nũsʋ̃ɔ pɔ, ka a sɔbʋraa na dire a jiir a jaa ayi, yi a wʋ nɛɛ pɔ. Ka a wʋ nie nyɩlɛ fɩka mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ na ara gar ju sãlsɔɔ.
Ɩ̃n wa nyɛ a lɛ, ka n lo kpa a wʋ niem gã fɩka kũu. Ka wʋ pãa dɔɔl ma a wʋ nũsʋ̃ɔ tɩ 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Ta joro dãbɩ̃ɛ ɛ. Maa lɛ a Pielfʋ nɩ a Baaraa.
Maa lɛ ɩ a Nyɛvʋr Sʋɔ. Nyɛ, n dɔ̃ɔ kpi, tɩchɛ n ir naa ɩ vʋr, n kʋ̃ lɛ kpi go ɛ. Maa lɛ tara a kũu nɩ a kpĩisɩ tẽe pãn bir.
"A lɛ juu sɛb a ala fʋn nyɛ na dɔ̃ɔ ɩ nɩ a pʋ̃pãanyã, nɩ a ala na wa ɩ daar kɔ̃ɔ.

A yelsɔɔlaa 'lɔ na be a ŋmɛrbie ayopõi ala fʋn nyɛ a n nũsʋ̃ɔ pɔ nɩ a sɛlma fɩ̃tɩnɛ dɔɔlfʋ jie jiir ayopõi par nɩ nyã. A ŋmɛrbie ayopõi ala ɩ naa a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ayopõi malakasɩ, fɩ̃tɩnɛ dɔɔlfʋ jie jiir ayopõi mɩ ɩ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ ayopõi.
"Sɛb kʋ a malaka 'lɔ na ara kʋ a Efesus pupuorbiir ɩka, a 'lɔ na tara a ŋmɛrbie ayopõi a wʋ nũsʋ̃ɔ pɔ na wʋ chiine a sɛlma fɩ̃tɩnɛ dɔɔlfʋ jie jiir ayopõi sãlsɔɔ 'yɛr lɛ a anyãna.

N bɔ̃ɔ naa a lɛ fʋn be, naa bɔ̃ɔ a fʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ nɩ a fʋ kãnyir. N bɔ̃ɔn naa a lɛ fʋn ba 'maa nɩbir kʋ a putudẽme ɛ, ala lɛ so ka fʋ bɛɛr a bala na 'yɛr ɩka Yesu nɩtʋ̃nsɩ lɛ ba ɩ na fʋ nyɛ ka ba ɩ jir ŋmarba.
Fʋ tara na kãnyir na fʋ di dɔɔyɛ a n yuor jũu, tɩ faa bal ɛ.
Tɩchɛ n chɛnɛ na tara fʋ nɩ 'yɛr. Fʋ bar naa a fʋ dɔ̃ɔ nʋ̃fʋ 'lɔ.
Tɩɛr kaa a lɛ fʋn dɔ̃ɔ be tɩ wa lo! Lɩɛb a fʋ tɩɛr na fʋ be a lɛ fʋn dɔ̃ɔ be. Ala ɩ fʋ̃ʋ ba wa lɩɛb a fʋ tɩɛr ɛ, ɩn wa naa wa 'lɔɔ a fʋ fɩ̃tɩn dɔɔlfʋ jie bar.
Tɩchɛ a lɛ fʋn ba nʋ̃ nɩ nyã, fʋ 'laar naa a Nikolayitɩ nɩbɛ maalfʋ, n mɩ 'laar naa a ba maalfʋ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor wʋ chɛlɛ a ala a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ. A 'lɔ na jɛb tʋ̃ɔ, ɩn kʋ wʋn sɔr ka wʋ kpɛ a Nãaŋmɩn jɔɔ pɔ pɔr a nyɛvʋr tɩɛ wɔ̃mɔ̃ na wʋ di.
"Sɛb kʋ a malaka 'lɔ na ara kʋ a Semena pupuorbiir ɩka, a 'lɔ na ɩ a Pielfʋ nɩ a Baaraa, a 'lɔ na kpi tɩ ir ɩ vʋr 'yɛr lɛ a anyãna.
N bɔ̃ɔ naa a fʋ wõm nɩ a fʋ nɔ̃ɔ tɩchɛ fʋ ɩn taraa sʋɔ! N bɔ̃ɔ naa a gagarsɩ bala na 'yɛr ɩka Juu nɩbɛ lɛ ba ɩ tɩ na baa ɩ ɛ, ba ɩ naa Satan lɔ̃ɔfʋ dẽme.

Taa joro dãbɩ̃ɛ a dɔɔyɛ na wa a fʋ sɛ̃ ɛ. Nyɛ, a tɩɩ na vɛ̃ naa ka ba nyɔɔr a yɩ bamɩne 'yɔ̃ɔ pɔɔfʋ die pɔ, bɛɛr yɩ kaa, ka yɩ di dɔɔyɛ ber pie. Ala ɩ yɩn kpin gba, yɩ taa bara a yɩ sɔɔfʋ ɛ, ka ɩn kʋ yɩ a nyɛvʋr 'lɔ na kaara a nãa jupil kaar.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor wʋ chɛlɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ. Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na jɛb tʋ̃ɔ, a gbɛɛ ayi kũu kʋ̃ lɛ sɩɩr wʋ go ɛ.
"Sɛb kʋ a malaka 'lɔ na ara kʋ a Pergamum pupuorbiir ɩka, a 'lɔ a sɔbʋraa na dire a jiir a jaa ayi 'yɛr lɛ anyãna.
N bɔ̃ɔ naa a jie fʋn kpɩɛrɛ, be lɛ ɩ a Satan dʋʋ, tɩ faa vɛ̃ a n yuor bʋɔlfʋ ɛ. Fʋ chɛnɛ na sɔɔ a n yuor. Fʋ gba na wa nyɛ a Antipasɩ na dire a n dãasɩɛ ka ba kʋ wʋ a yɩ tẽe pɔ be a Satan dʋʋ na be.

Tɩchɛ n chɛnɛ na tara fʋ nɩ 'yɛr. Fʋ chɛnɛ na tara nɩbɛ ka ba turo a Balaam wiilfʋ, 'lɔ lɛ wiil a Balak ɩka wʋ bɛr a Isɩral nɩbɛ nɛɛ ka ba maal dɛɛr na wʋ ɩka ba di a bʋtɩbɛ bʋ̃diir na ba gãna nɩ taa.
A lɛ nɩ wʋ ju mɩ lɛ fʋ mɩ chɛnɛ tara a nɩbɛ na turo a Nikolayitɩ nɩbɛ wiilfʋ.
Lɩɛb a fʋ tɩɛr, ka lɛ ba lɛ ɛ, ɩn wan fɔɔ wa jɛb a nɩbɛ bala nɩ a sɔbʋraa 'lɔ na yi a n nɛɛ pɔ.

Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor, wʋ chɛlɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ. A 'lɔ na jɛb tʋ̃ɔ, ɩn kʋ wʋn a maana ala na sɔɔl. Naa lɛ kʋ wʋ kusɩr pɩla ban sɛb yopaalaa dɔɔl nɩrɛ jaa na ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, a 'lɔ na so lɛ bɔ̃ɔ.
"Sɛb kʋ a malaka 'lɔ na ara kʋ a Tayatira pupuorbiir ɩka, a Nãaŋmɩn Bie 'yɛr lɛ a anyãna. A 'lɔ nɩbie na kaara a bũu 'lɩraa kaar ka a wʋ gbɛɛ nyɛtãan fɩka kur jɩɛ na be bũu pɔ.
N bɔ̃ɔ naa a fʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃, a fʋ nʋ̃fʋ, a fʋ sɔɔfʋ nɩ a fʋ kãnyir. A lɛ fʋn tʋ̃nɔ̃ a pʋ̃pãanyã gar a lɛ fʋn dɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃.
Tɩchɛ n chɛnɛ na tara fʋ nɩ 'yɛr. Fʋ bal kʋ a pɔɔ 'lɔ ban bʋɔlɔ a Jejebɛl 'lɔ na bʋɔlɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛ'yɛrɛ. Wʋ wile naa a n tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ ka ba sɛ̃nɛ na ba ɔɔrɔ nɩ a bʋtɩbɛ nʋ̃nɔ̃.
N kʋ wʋn sɔ̃ɔ ɩka wʋ lɩɛb a wʋ tɩɛr yin a wʋ sɛ̃sɛ̃yele pɔ, tɩchɛ waa sɔɔrɔ ɛ.
Lɛ ɩn vɛ̃n ka baal nyɔɔ wʋ ka bala naa 'lɔ na sɛ̃nɛ, ka bala baa lɩɛb bar a wʋ sɔr ɛ.
Ɩn kʋ naa a bala na turo wʋ, ka a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ bɔ̃ɔ ɩka maa lɛ bɔ̃ɔ nɩrɛ tɩɛr nɩ nɩrɛ nyãa naa na yab ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa nɩ wʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃.
Tɩchɛ a yɩn na chɛ a be a Tayatira na ba de a pɔɔ wiilfʋ bɩɩ jãn a Satan yelsɔɔlsɩ ɛ, n chɛnɛ na tara 'yɛr na 'yɛr kʋ yɩ. N kʋ̃ de yele jaa dɔɔl yɩ ɛ.
Yɩ chɛnɛ nyɔɔ a lɛ nɛ wa tãn a daar 'lɔ ɩn na wa.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na jɛb tʋ̃ɔ na wʋ ɩrɛ a lɛ ɩn bʋɔrɔ, ɩn kʋ wʋn kpɛ̃ɔ ka wʋ tʋ̃ɔ a paalsɩ ba jaa,
'Wʋn kaara ba naa nɩ kur dãgbal na wʋ ma ŋmɛr ba lamɩɛr kaar.' Nɩtãa lɛ ɩn nyɛ a kpɛ̃ɔ yin a n Sãa sɛ̃.
N mɩ na kʋ wʋ naa a bivɩɛ ŋmɛrbir.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor wʋ chɛlɛ a ala Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ.
"Sɛb kʋ a malaka 'lɔ na ara kʋ a Saadisɩ pupuorbiir ɩka, a 'lɔ na tara a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɩr ayopõi nɩ a ŋmɛrbie ayopõi, n bɔ̃ɔ naa a fʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃. A fʋ yuor yire na ɩka fʋ ɩn bʋ̃vʋr tɩchɛ bʋ̃kũu lɛ fʋ ɩ.
Jɛɔ ir! Na fʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ a bala na chɛ na kpire ɩ̃kpɩ̃ɛn, bojũu n jʋʋr nyɛ ka a fʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ ba sɛɛ a n Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ɛ.
Tɩɛr tɔ a ala fʋn de tɩ wõ, turo a ala tɩ na fʋ lɩɛb a tɩɛr. Tɩchɛ fʋ̃ʋ ba jɛɔ ir ɛ, ɩn wan nãnyie kaar ka fʋ kʋ̃ bɔ̃ɔ a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn na wa a fʋ sɛ̃ ɛ.
Tɩchɛ fʋ chɛnɛ na tara nɩbɛ bɩ̃lãa a ba be a Saadisɩ ka a ba fɔɔr ba nyɔɔr dɛbɛ ɛ. Bala nɩ maa na 'mantaa chiine, ka ba su bʋ̃pɩɛl, bojũu ba sɛɛn naa.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na jɛb tʋ̃ɔ a ba kaar mɩ na sun a bʋ̃pɩɛl. N kʋ̃ kpĩin a wʋ yuor bar a nyɛvʋr gãn pɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ ɩn pʋr a wʋ yuor a n Sãa nɩ a wʋ malakasɩ niem.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor, wʋ chɛlɛ a ala a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ.

"Sɛb kʋ a malaka 'lɔ na ara kʋ a Feladelfiya pupuorbiir ɩka, a 'lɔ na ɩ a chɛchɛ sʋɔ nɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ 'yɛr lɛ a anyã, 'lɔ lɛ tara a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ David pãn bir. 'Lɔ wa yuo, nɩrɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ pɔɔ ɛ, 'lɔ mɩ wa pɔɔ, nɩrɛ kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ yuo ɛ.
N bɔ̃ɔ naa a fʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ a jaa. Nyɛ, n yuo naa a pãn bar, nɩrɛ jaa na kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ pɔɔ ɛ. N bɔ̃ɔ naa a fʋ kpɛ̃ɔ na ba jɩ̃ bon ɛ, tɩchɛ fʋ chɛnɛ na tara a n 'yɛr na faa chiir a n yuor ɛ.
N bɔ̃ɔ naa a bala na ɩ a Satan lɔ̃ɔfʋ dẽme tɩ na ba 'yɛr ɩka Juu nɩbɛ lɛ ba ɩ, jir ŋmarba lɛ ba ɩ. Ɩn vɛ̃ naa ka ba wa gbur dumo a yɩ niem na ba bɔ̃ɔ ɩka n nʋ̃ yɩ naa.
A lɛ fʋn tu a n 'yɛr na fʋ di kãnyir, ɩn gu fʋ naa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ a dɔɔyɛ na wa a nɩbɛ ba jaa jie na kpɩɛrɛ ka a wɛr pɔ.
N kʋ̃ kor tɩ wa ɛ. Nyɔɔ a lɛ nɛ fʋn tara, ka nɩrɛ jaa taa faa a fʋ nãa jupil ɛ.

A 'lɔ na jɛb tʋ̃ɔ, ɩn maal wʋn a luur a n Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir. Wʋ kʋ̃ lɛ vʋ̃ɔ go ɛ. Ɩn sɛb naa a n Nãaŋmɩn yuor nɩ a n Nãaŋmɩn tẽe yuor na ɩ a Jerusalɛm paalaa wʋn bar ka wʋ yire a saaju suro waara mar wʋ, naa mɩ lɛ sɛb a n yopaalaa mar wʋ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor, wʋ chɛlɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ.
"Sɛb kʋ a malaka 'lɔ na ara kʋ a Laodisea pupuorbiir ɩka, a 'lɔ 'yɛrbie na ɩ A Ɩ A Lɛ, a yelmɩ̃ɛ dẽ dẽ sʋɔ nɩ a yelmɩ̃ɛ dãasɩɛ sʋɔ, 'lɔ 'yɔ̃ɔ lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn tu mɛ bomo a jaa.
N bɔ̃ɔ naa a fʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃, faa 'maa ɛ, faa lɛ tʋlɔ mɩ ɛ. An taa nʋ̃mɔ̃ ma naa ala ɩ fʋ ta 'maa naa bɩɩ tʋlɔ.
A lɛ fʋn ben ɩ a ʋlɔ ʋlɔ jũu, faa tʋlɔ ɛ, faa mɩ lɛ 'maa ɛ, ɩn chɩr fʋn bar a n nɛɛ pɔ.
Fʋ 'yɛr ɩka taraa sʋɔ lɛ fʋ ɩ, na fʋ tara nãbonsɩ na faa faa bon jaa ɛ. Tɩchɛ faa bɔ̃ɔ ɩka fʋ ɩn nɩkɔ̃ɔ nɩ nɩbaal nɩrɛ, nɩ nɔ̃ɔ sʋɔ, na fʋ ɩ jɔ̃ɔ nɩ sal'mʋɔr.
N sʋɔrɔ fʋ naa ɩka fʋ da sɛlma a n sɛ̃ ɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ bũu pɔ maal na fʋ ɩ tara sʋɔ. Na fʋ mɩ da fɔpɩla a n sɛ̃ pɔɔ a fʋ sal'mʋɔr vĩ, na fʋ lɛ da a nɩbie tɩ̃ɩ mɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a nɩbie pɔ nyɛrɛ.
N ma gɔ̃ naa a bala ɩn nʋ̃, naa tɔɔ ba toor. A lɛ mɔ̃ nɩbijɩɛ lɩɛb a fʋ tɩɛr.
Nyɛ, n ara naa dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ bʋɔlɔ, ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa wõ naa a n kɔkɔr na wʋ yuo a pãn, ɩn kpɛ naa ka a maa naa nɩnyɩnɛ a sɩ tɩ 'mataa dire.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na jɛb tʋ̃ɔ, ɩn kʋ wʋn sɔr ka wʋ jɩ̃nɛ a n lõboor nɩtãa lɛ ɩn jɛb tʋ̃ɔ naa jɩ̃nɛ a n Sãa lõboor.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor, wʋ chɛlɛ a lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ na 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ."
A anyã puor, n lɛ kãan nyɛ a saaju pãn na yuo ara. Ka a kɔkɔr 'lɔ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ wõ a ɩɩl ban pɛɛl kaar 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Do wa, ka n wiil fʋ a ala na ɩ a anyã puor."
Ajienaa kaa ɩ Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ de ma naa ka n nyɛ a nãa dakɔɔ a be a saaju nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ na jɩ̃nɛ.
Ka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju nyɩlɛ jaa pala pala fɩka gar kʋsɩr, nɩ kʋsɩr wolo wolo, ka a sagõgoraa na nyɩlɛ ŋmaa jilʋ̃ a nãa dakɔɔ.
Dakɔɔr lɩjɛr nɩ anaar mɩ ben be jilʋ̃ a nãa dakɔɔ, ka a nɩbɛrɛ lɩjɛr nɩ anaar mɩ jɩ̃nɛ a ju, na ba su bʋ̃pɩɛl na ba sun sɛlma jupile.
Saa nyɩɩrfʋ nɩ gɔ̃mɔ̃ na tãna yire naa a nãa dakɔɔ par. Ka a fɩ̃tɩnɛ ayopõi mɩ 'lɩrɛ a nãa dakɔɔ par, anyãna lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɩr ayopõi.
A nãa dakɔɔ niem bon ben be kaara man kʋ̃ɔ kaar jaa wel wel wel, na wʋ nyɩlɛ chãana kaar. A bʋ̃nɩbie anaar jil naa a nãa dakɔɔ tara nɩbie a jiir a jaa a puor nɩ a niem.
A bʋ̃nɩbir 'lɔ na de nie nyɛtãan jukpɛ̃ɛ, ka a ayi sʋɔ mɩ nyɛtãan narbile, ka a ata sʋɔ mɩ nyɛtãan nɩsaal, ka a anaar sʋɔ mɩ nyɛtãan tuu.

A bʋ̃nɩbie anyãna ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa tara naa pɩbɛ ayʋɔb, ka a nɩbie pɔɔ a ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa naa pɩbɛ pɔ. Ba ma yiele nɩ yiel mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ ɩka, "Chɛchɛ, chɛchɛ, chɛchɛ 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ jaa sʋɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ be be, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ, 'lɔ lɛ na wa."
Sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jaa a bʋ̃nɩbie ala na ma wa puoro pɛɛrɛ dãna nɩ a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju, 'lɔ lɛ be be jaa kpo kpo,
a nɩbɛrɛ lɩjɛr nɩ anaar bala gãn kpa tẽe tɩ puor a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju, 'lɔ lɛ na be be jaa kpo kpo. Ba yãan a ba nãjupile bin a nãa dakɔɔ par tɩ 'yɛrɛ,
"A sɩ Soro nɩ a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn, fʋ̃ʋ lɛ a sɛɛn ɩka fʋ de a tɩɩr, 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ. Bojũu fʋ̃ʋ lɛ maal a bomo a jaa, a fʋ bɔfʋ pɔ lɛ a jaa maal naa be be."
N pãa nyɛn a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju ka wʋ tara a kõr gãn 'lɔ ban pilʋ̃ a wʋ nũsʋ̃ɔ pɔ, ka a sɛbie be a pʋɔ pɔ nɩ a yõo, na ba de jɩ̃nsɩ ayopõi mar pɔɔ.
N nyɛn a malaka kpɛ̃ɔ sʋɔ 'lɔ na de nɛkpɛ̃ɛ sʋʋr, "An lɛ sɛɛ ɩka wʋ 'lɔɔr a jɩ̃nsɩ tɩ yuo a gãn?"
Tɩchɛ nɩrɛ jaa ba be a saaju, bɩɩ a wɛr pɔ, bɩɩ a tẽe par na tʋ̃ɔ yuo a gãn kar ɛ.
Ka n kõ nɩbaal kõn bojũu nɩrɛ jaa na ba be be sɛɛn na yuo a gãn kar kaa ɛ.
Be lɛ a nɩbɛrɛ bala ɩ̃sʋɔ pãa 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Ta kõnõ ɛ. Nyɛ a Jukpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ na yi a Juda bʋrɔ pɔ, na ɩ a Nãkpɛ̃ɛ David yɔ̃ɔ na jɛb tʋ̃ɔ. 'Lɔ lɛ sɛɛ na tʋ̃ɔ 'lɔɔr a jɩ̃nsɩ ala bar tɩ yuo a gãn."

N pãa lɛ nyɛn Pɛraabile ka wʋ nyɛtãan bon ban dɔ̃ɔ kʋ ka wʋ ara a nãa dakɔɔ par, ka a bʋ̃nɩbie anaar nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ ara jilʋ̃ wʋ. Wʋ tara na ɩlɛ ayopõi nɩ nɩbie ayopõi, ala lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɩr ayopõi wʋn ma tʋ̃ a wɛr pɔ jiir a jaa.
'Lɔ lɛ tɩ de a gãn a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju nũsʋ̃ɔ pɔ.

Wʋn wa de a gãn ka a bʋ̃nɩbie anaar bala nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ lɩjɛr nɩ anaar bala, ba jaa gãn kpa tẽe a Pɛraabile niem, ka ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa tara kõrõjom nɩ sɛlma lapʋɛ na sɛɛn a tɩ̃ɩ nyũu vɩla, ala lɛ ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ sʋɔrfʋsɩ.

Bala lɛ yiele a yiel paalaa na ba 'yɛrɛ, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ sɛɛn ɩka fʋ de a gãn na fʋ 'lɔɔr a jɩ̃nsɩ, bojũu fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ba kʋ, ka fʋ de a fʋ jɩ̃ɩ yab den nɩbʋrɔ, 'yɛr bʋrɔ, balsɩ ba jaa nɩ a paalsɩ a jaa kʋ Nãaŋmɩn.
Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ maal ba ka ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nãalʋ̃ʋ nɩbɛ nɩ a bɔɔrlorbo tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn, bala lɛ na wa ɩ a wɛr nyã wʋ jaa nãmɩne."
Be lɛ n pãa kaa nyɛ malakasɩ turo turo fʋn kʋ̃ bɔ̃ɔ a ba nɛɛ ɛ, ka ba ara jilʋ̃ a nãa dakɔɔ nɩ a bʋ̃nɩbie ala nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ bala.
Ba yiele naa nɩ kɔkɔkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛrɛ, "A Pɛraabile 'lɔ ban dɔ̃ɔ kʋ lɛ sɛɛn ɩka wʋ tara a kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ a nãbomo, nɩ a yɛ̃, nɩ a fɔ̃ɔ, nɩ a 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, nɩ a tɩɩr, nɩ a dãnfʋ."

Be lɛ n wõ a bʋ̃maalsɩ a jaa na be a saaju, nɩ a tẽe, nɩ a tẽe par, nɩ a man pɔ, nɩ bomo a jaa na be a ba pɔ, na ba yiele yiel 'yɛrɛ, "A 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju, nɩ a Pɛraabile lɛ so a dãnfʋ, nɩ a 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, nɩ a tɩɩr, nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ, bɩbir jaa."
Ka a bʋ̃nɩbie anaar bala 'yɛr, "A ɩ a lɛ," ka a nɩbɛrɛ bala gbur dumo puor a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju nɩ a Pɛraabile.
Ka n kaa naa nyɛ a Pɛraabile na 'lɔɔ a jɩ̃nsɩ ayopõi ala ban mar a gãn 'lɔ na de nie, be lɛ n wõ a bʋ̃nɩbie anaar bala ɩ̃sʋɔ kɔkɔr fɩka saa na tãn, ka wʋ bʋɔl, "Wa!"
Be lɛ n kaa nyɛ ka a ɩ wii pɩla lɛ, ka a 'lɔ na do, jã tam a ba de nãa jupil kʋ wʋ ka wʋ yin darfʋ an ɩ tʋ̃ɔfʋ sʋɔ lɛ wʋ ɩ.
A Pɛraabile na lɛ 'lɔɔ a jɩ̃nsɩ ayi sʋ̃ɔ, n wõn a bʋ̃nɩbie ala ayi sʋɔ na 'yɛr, "Wa!"
Ka a wii jɩɛ wa yi, a 'lɔ na do ba kʋ wʋn kpɛ̃ɔ ɩka wʋ faa a nyã'maar tɩ vɛ̃ ka jɛɛr ir a wɛr wʋ jaa, ka a nɩbɛ kʋrɔ taa. Ka ba kʋ wʋ a jɛɛr sɔkpɛ̃ɛ.
A Pɛraabile na lɛ 'lɔɔ a jɩ̃nsɩ ata sʋɔ, n wõn a bʋ̃nɩbie ata sʋɔ na 'yɛr, "Wa!" Ka n kaa ka a ɩ wii sɔɔlaa lɛ, ka a 'lɔ na do tara bʋ̃mansɩ a nũu pɔ.

Be lɛ n wõ a bʋ̃nɩbie anaar bala chara pɔ fɩka kɔkɔr na 'yɛrɛ, "Kɔ̃ lo naa, chi bʋ̃manãa nɛbʋ̃'yen na da naa nɩbʋ̃'yen bɩbir gbul sãyar. Ka a kamaana mɩ nɛɛr ata mɩ da nɩbʋ̃'yen bɩbir gbul sãyar, tɩ taa ɩrɛ wa sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a kãa nɩ a dãa bara ɛ."
A Pɛraabile na lɛ 'lɔɔ a jɩ̃nsɩ anaar sʋɔ, n wõ naa a bʋ̃nɩbie anaar sʋɔ na 'yɛr, "Wa!"

Ka n kaa nyɛ wii ul a nɩdaa. Ka a 'lɔ na do yuor di kũu, ka a kpĩisɩ tẽe mɩ turo a wʋ puor. Ba kʋ ban kpɛ̃ɔ ɩka ba de sɔkpɛ̃ɛ, nɩ kɔ̃, nɩ baal, nɩ mɔdʋ̃n kʋn a wɛr nɩbɛ ala ɩ ba põn a tẽe a wʋ jiir anaar.
Wʋn lɛ 'lɔɔ a jɩ̃nsɩ anũu sʋɔ, n nyɛn a nɩsɩɩr bala ban dɔ̃ɔ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr nɩ a wʋ dãasɩɛ jũu ka ba be a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lofʋ jie pĩlem.
Ba tãna naa nɩ nɛkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛrɛ, "A Tʋ̃ɔfʋ sʋɔ, nɩ chɛchɛ sʋɔ, nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ, a wa ta dabor ka fʋ tɔɔr a wɛr nɩbɛ 'yɛr na fʋ yab a sɩ jɩ̃ɩ sãma?"
Be lɛ ba kʋ ba jaa bʋ̃pɩɛl tɩ 'yɛr ɩka ba di kãnyir bɩ̃lãa ka ba baar kʋ a ba tʋ̃tʋ̃taaba nɩ a yɛɛr a ba kaar ka a ta.
N kaara naa ka wʋ lɛ 'lɔɔ a jɩ̃nsɩ ayʋɔb sʋɔ. Ka a tẽe mĩi wʋ jaa, ka a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ sɔb fɔsɔɔlaa kaar, ka a ŋmɛraa mɩ lɩɛb jɩ̃ɩ kaar jaa kpɩ̃n kpɩ̃n,
ka a ŋmɛrbie mɩ yi a saaju pɔrɔ loro a tẽe pɔ fɩka tɔ̃ɔ kara sɛsɛkpɛ̃ɛ na fu lɔb.
Be lɛ a saaju pilʋ̃ fɩka sɔ̃gãnãa ban pil, ka a tɔ̃n a jaa nɩ a dõdolsɩ a jaa mɩ ir a ba jiir.
Ka a tẽe nyã nãmɩne, a tẽe nyã nɩbɛrɛ, a fɔ̃ɔ dẽme, taraa dẽme, a gãdaar, nɩ a gbãgbaar ba jaa, nɩ a sumɩne ba jaa pãa sɔɔlɔ a tɔ̃n bɔɔr pɔ nɩ a tɔ̃n kʋsɩbɛ pɔ.
Ba pãa bʋɔlɔ na a tɔ̃n naa kʋsɩpãnsɩ, "Yɩ lo pii sɩ ka sɩ taa lɛ nyɛ a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju ɛ, na sɩ ta mɩ lɛ nyɛ a Pɛraabile suur ɛ!
A ba sukpɛ̃ɛ bɩbir vɩɛ naa, an lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ ara a ba niem?"
A anyã puor, n nyɛn a malakasɩ anaar ka ba ara a tẽe lõbobo anaar, na ba nyɔɔ a sɛsɛbɛ taa lɛ ɩka wʋ taa furo a wɛr pɔ, naa man pɔ, bɩɩ tɩɛ ju ɛ.

Be lɛ n nyɛ a malaka ɩ̃sʋɔ ka wʋ yi a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʋ jie waara na wʋ tara a Nãaŋmɩn vʋr sʋɔ jɩ̃nɛ. Wʋ bʋɔl naa a malakasɩ anaar bala nɩ nɛkpɛ̃ɛ ban kʋ sɔr ɩka ba sɔ̃ɔ a tẽe wʋ jaa naa man 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ ba,
"Yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a tẽe, naa man, naa tɩɩr ɛ, a sɩ 'yɔ̃ɔ a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ a jɩ̃nsɩ a ba gbersɩ pɔ baar."
N pãa wõ naa a nɩbɛ bala ban 'yɔ̃ɔ a jɩ̃nsɩ nɛɛ ka ba ɩ, nɩbɛ turo kɔbaa lɩjaayi nɩ anaar (144,000) na yi a Isɩral balbʋrsɩ pɔ.
A bala na yi a Juda bʋrɔ pɔ ban 'yɔ̃ɔ a jɩ̃nsɩ ɩn nɩbɛ turo pie naa yi (12,000), ka a Wuruben bʋrɔ mɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000), ka a Gad bʋrɔ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000),
ka a Aserɩ bʋrɔ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000), ka a Naftalɩ bʋrɔ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000), ka a Manasɛ bʋrɔ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000),
ka a Simeon bʋrɔ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000), ka a Levi bʋrɔ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000), ka a Isakar bʋrɔ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000),
ka a Jebulun bʋrɔ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000), ka a Josefʋ bʋrɔ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000), ka a Benjamin bʋrɔ mɩ ɩ a nɩbɛ turo pie nɩ ayi (12,000).

A anyã puor, n lɛ nyɛn nɩyɔɔ nɩrɛ na kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ba sɔr ɛ, ka ba yi a paalsɩ a jaa pɔ, balbʋrsɩ, nɩbʋrsɩ, 'yɛrbʋrsɩ a jaa pɔ, na ba ara a nãa dakɔɔ nɩ a Pɛraabile niem. Ba sun fɔpɩɛl tɩ tara bɛ wilsɩ a ba nuur pɔ.
Bala lɛ chɩlɛ 'yɛrɛ, "A faafʋ yi naa a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju nɩ a Pɛraabile sɛ̃."
Ka a malakasɩ bala na ara jilʋ̃ a nãa dakɔɔ, nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ, nɩ a bʋ̃nɩbie anaar bala gãn kpa a nãa dakɔɔ niem puoro a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛrɛ,
"A ɩ a lɛ! Nãaŋmɩn son pɛɛfʋ nɩ tɩɩr, nɩ yɛ̃, nɩ dãnfʋ, nɩ 'yɔ̃ɔfʋ, nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ fɔ̃ɔ. A ɩ a lɛ!"
Be lɛ a nɩkpɛ̃ɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ sʋʋr ma, "A bala na su a bʋ̃pɩɛl, ba boo lɛ, nɩ nyɩnɛ lɛ ba yi?"
Ka n 'yɛr ɩka, "Nɩkpɛ̃ɛ, fʋ̃ʋ ba lɛ bɔ̃ɔ ba." Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "A banyãna, bala lɛ yi a dɔɔyɛ kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ pɔ. Ba pɛɛn a ba fɔɔr nɩ a Pɛraabile jɩ̃ɩ.
Ala lɛ so ka ba ara a Nãaŋmɩn nãa dakɔɔ par tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ wʋ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ a wʋ puorfʋ yir. A 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju na 'yɩɛr pɔɔ ba.
Kɔ̃ kʋ̃ lɛ kpɛ ba go ɛ, kɔ̃nyũur mɩ kʋ̃ lɛ kpɛ ba go ɛ. Mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ kʋ̃ lɛ ŋme ba go ɛ, tʋl kʋ̃ lɛ kʋrɔ go ɛ.
A Pɛraabile na ara a nãa dakɔɔ sãlsɔɔ lɛ na chɩ̃nɛ ba. Wʋn ma ŋmaa ban chiin a nyɛvʋr kʋ̃ɔ par, ka Nãaŋmɩn pãa 'yɩɛr a ba nɩbikʋ̃ɔ a jaa bar."
Be lɛ a Pɛraabile 'lɔɔ a jɩ̃nsɩ ayopõi sʋɔ ka a saaju wʋ jaa ŋmaa vʋʋr jaa chɩr chɩr chɩr kor bɩ̃lãa.
Ka n nyɛ a malakasɩ ayopõi bala na ara a Nãaŋmɩn niem ka ba kʋ ba ɩɩl pɛɛlsɩ ayopõi.

A malaka ɩ̃sʋɔ na tara a sɛlma lapʋr, wa ara naa a bɔɔrlo bomo chʋmfʋ jie. Ba den a tɩ̃ɩ nyũu vɩla ala kʋ wʋ ɩka wʋ de pʋɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ba jaa sʋɔrfʋsɩ a sɛlma bɔɔrlo bomo chʋmfʋ jie kʋ a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju.
A tɩ̃ɩ nyũu vɩla jʋʋr yire naa a sɛlma lapʋr 'matãan a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ sʋɔrfʋ yi a malaka nũu pɔ, duoro a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃.
Be lɛ a malaka lɛ mʋ̃ɔ bũu bie a sɛlma bɔɔrlo bomo chʋmfʋ jie sɛɛ a lapʋr na wʋ lɔb bar ka a wɛr pɔ ka tãnfʋ, nɩ gɔ̃mɔ̃, nɩ saa nyɩɩrfʋ ka a tẽe wʋ jaa dam.
Ka a malakasɩ ayopõi bala na tara a ɩlɛ, go a pɛɛlfʋ.
A malaka 'lɔ na de nie pɛɛl naa a wʋ ɩɩl, ka a sakpʋlõbie nɩ bũu na 'matãan jɩ̃ɩ loro a wɛr pɔ. Ka a tẽe jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen di wʋ jaa, ka a tɩɩr mɩ jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen mɩ di lɔ̃ɔn a mɔ'yɔlɔ a jaa.
Ka a malakasɩ ayi sʋɔ mɩ pɛɛl a wʋ ɩɩl, ka ba 'lɔb bon na nyɛtãan tɔ̃kpɛ̃ɛ na nyɔɔ bũu 'yɔ̃ɔ a man pɔ. A man jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen lɩɛb jɩ̃ɩ,
ka a bʋ̃nɩbie mɩ jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen kpi, ka a gborbɛrɛ ala mɩ jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen mɩ wɛ.
Ka a malakasɩ ata sʋɔ mɩ pɛɛl a wʋ ɩɩl, ka a ŋmɛrbir kpɛ̃ɛ na 'lɩrɛ fɩka bũu yi a saaju lo a põnsɩ nɩ a bulsɩ jiir ata a jibʋ̃'yen pɔ.
A ŋmɛrbir yuor din, Bʋ̃tuo. Ka a kɔ̃n jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen be tuo, ka a nɩbɛ bala na nyũ a kɔ̃tuo ala, ka yɔɔ jie kpi.

A malakasɩ anaar sʋɔ pɛɛl naa a wʋ ɩɩl, ka ba ŋme a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen nɩ a ŋmɛraa jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen naa ŋmɛrbie ka ba jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen ɩ libe. A bɩbir jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen ba tara chãa ɛ, ka a ŋmɛraa naa ŋmɛrbie mɩ ba chaar a tɩ̃sɔɔ jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen ɛ.
Be lɛ n kaa naa wõ tuu na ɔɔrɔ be a saaju 'yɛrɛ nɩ nɛkpɛ̃ɛ, "Nɛbier! Nɛbier! Nɛbier! Yele na wa naa nɩsaal jaa na be a wɛr pɔ, ala ɩ a malakasɩ ata bala na chɛ wa pɛɛl naa a ba ɩlɛ."
A malakasɩ anũu sʋɔ na wa pɛɛl a wʋ ɩɩl, ka n nyɛ a ŋmɛrbir 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ yi a saaju lo a tẽe. A ŋmɛrbir nyã lɛ ba de a bɔɔ fulom pãn bir kʋ.
Wʋn wa yuo a bɔɔ fulom nyã nɛɛ, ka jʋʋr yire fɩka bũu kpɛ̃ɛ jʋʋr. A jʋʋr anyãna na yire a bɔɔ fulom nyãna pɔ liin pɔɔ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ naa tẽe wʋ jaa.
A jʋʋr anyãna pɔ lɛ soor yi yaar a tẽe wʋ jaa ka ba kʋ ba lɔɔ fɩka lɔ̃n lɔɔ.
Ba 'yɛr kʋ ba ɩka ba taa ɩrɛ wa ɔɔrɔ mɔɩ bɩɩ bʋ̃bul nɩ a tɩɛ vaar ɛ, tɩchɛ a dʋ̃nɔ̃ a nɩbɛ bala tɛɛ na ba tara a Nãaŋmɩn jɩ̃nɛ a ba gbersɩ pɔ ɛ.
Baa kʋ ba sɔr ɩka ba kʋrɔ ɛ, tɩchɛ ba ge a nɩbɛ ŋmɛrsɩ anũu. Ka a ba dʋ̃fʋ ɔɔr kaara fɩka lɔ̃ɔ na dʋ̃ nɩrɛ ɔɔrɔ.
A ber anyãna pɔ nɩbɛ na bʋɔrɔ na kũu tɩchɛ ba kʋ̃ nyɛ wʋ ɛ. Ban bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka ba kpi tɩchɛ a kũu kʋ̃ lɛ kʋ ba gba ɛ.
A soor nyɛtãan wiisɩ ban pɩ̃ɛ jɛɛr 'yɔ̃ɔ, ka a jur kaara fɩka sɛlma jupile ban su, ka a ba nin nyɛtãan nɩsaal nie.
A ba kɔɔl kaara fɩka pɔbɔ jukɔɔl, ka a nyɩmɛ mɩ kaara fɩka jukpɛ̃ɛ nyɩmɛ.
Ba tara na nyãa pɔɔrsɩ ka a kaara fɩka kue, ka a pɩbɛ dɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ fɩka torkosɩ a wiisɩ na tɔɔrɔ joro chiine jɛɛr jie.
Ba tara na jʋɛ dʋ̃nɔ̃ nɩ lɔ̃n kaar, a jʋɛ ala tara na fɔ̃ɔ na dʋ̃n nɩbɛ ge ba ŋmɛrsɩ anũu.
Ba tara na nãa na kaara ba, 'lɔ lɛ a malaka 'lɔ na kaara a bɔɔ fulom 'lɔ. Heburu nɩbɛ bʋɔlɔ wʋ naa, Abadɔn, ka a Greek nɩbɛ mɩ bʋɔlɔ, Apolyɔn. A par lɛ, sɔ̃sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃.
A nɛbier 'lɔ na de nie lɛ a nyã na tal, tɩchɛ ka a ayi sʋɔ chɛnɛ be puor waara.
Ka a malakasɩ ayʋɔb sʋɔ pɛɛl a wʋ ɩɩl, n wõn kɔkɔr na yire a sɛlma tɩ̃ɩ nyũu vɩla chʋmfʋ jie kpʋ̃kpʋɛ, be lɛ ba ma chʋm a kãnyũu na be a Nãaŋmɩn niem.
A kɔkɔr 'yɛr kʋ a malaka ayʋɔb sʋɔ 'lɔ na tara a ɩɩl, "For a malakasɩ anaar bala ban lũ a be a Yufɩrɩtɩ põn kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ."
A wʋ for a malakasɩ anaar ba nyãna ban dɔ̃ɔ lũ gun a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃, a bɩbir 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ nɩ a chuu 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ naa yuon 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ ɩka ba kʋ a nɩsaal jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen bar.
Ka a bala na do a wiisɩ ba bʋɔl naa a ba nɛɛ fʋn kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ba sɔr ɛ.
A wiisɩ nɩ a bala na do ɩn nyɛ a jãna pɔ, a nyãa pɔɔrsɩ mʋ̃ɔ naa fɩka bũu, ka amɩne mɩ ɩ bufulo, ka amɩne mɩ ɩ bʋ̃dʋɔr. Ka a wiisɩ jur nyɛtãan jubɛrɛ jur, ka a bũu jʋʋr nɩ jerbɩ mɩ yire a ba nɛɛ pɔ.
A gefʋ ata ala na yi a wiisɩ nɛɛ pɔ lɛ, bũu, nɩ jʋʋr, nɩ jerbɩ, ala lɛ ba kʋn nɩbɛ jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen.
A wiisɩ anyã fɔ̃ɔ be naa a ba nɛɛ pɔ naa jʋɛ pɔ, a ba jʋɛ kaara fɩka waba naa tara jur, ala lɛ ba de gere nɩ a nɩsaal.

A nɩsaalba bala na chɛ, na baa kpin a gefʋ nyã ɛ, ba sɔɔ bar a tɩbɛ ala ban maal nɩ a ba nuur ɛ. Ba chɛnɛ na puoro a sɩdɛbɛ, nɩ a bʋtɩbɛ ban maal a sɛlma, nɩ a kur pɩɛl, nɩ a kur jɩɛ, nɩ a kusɩbɛ, nɩ a daar na ba wõnõ 'yɛr ɛ, ba kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ chen ɛ.
Baa mɩ lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr bar a nɩkʋyelsɩ, nɩ sɔyelsɩ, nɩ sɛ̃sɛ̃yelsɩ, nɩ nãnyiyelsɩ ɛ.
N lɛ nyɛn a malaka kpɛ̃ɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ na yi a saaju suro waara. Wʋ vaar naa julõjuur ka a sagõgoraa dɔɔl a jum. A nie kaara fɩka mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ, ka a gbɛɛ mɩ kaara fɩka bũu lɩraa.
Wʋ tara na gãn bile na yuo a wʋ nũu pɔ, na wʋ de a nũsʋ̃ɔ gbɛr 'lɔr a man pɔ tɩ a gʋbaa gbɛr dɔɔl a gogoro ju,
tɩ na wʋ pãa tãn kpɛ̃ɔ jaa fɩka jukpɛ̃ɛ na uor. Wʋn wa tãn a lɛ ka a kɔkɔɛ ɩ ayopõi mɩ tãn satanaa kaar.
An wa tãn a gbɛɛ ayopõi a lɛ, ka n ta bʋɔrɔ ɩka n sɛb tɩchɛ n wõn kɔkɔr na yi a saaju 'yɛr, "A tãnfʋ ayopõi ala na 'yɛr sɔɔl bar, ta sɛb bin ɛ."
Be lɛ a malaka 'lɔ ɩn nyɛ na 'lɔr a nũsʋ̃ɔ gbɛr a man pɔ tɩ dɔɔl a a gʋba gbɛr a gogoro ju, jɛɛn a nũsʋ̃ɔ a saaju.
Wʋ pɔn naa a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na be be jaa kpo kpo, 'lɔ lɛ mɛ a saaju, nɩ a tẽe, nɩ a man, nɩ bomo a jaa na be a ba pɔ, "A kʋ̃ lɛ kor go ɛ!
Tɩchɛ a bɩbir 'lɔ a malakasɩ ayopõi sʋɔ na wa pɛɛl a wʋ ɩɩl, a Nãaŋmɩn yelsɔɔlaa na pãa maal baar nɩtãa a lɛ wʋn man kʋ a wʋ gbãgbaar 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ."
Be lɛ a kɔkɔr 'lɔ ɩn dɔ̃ɔ wõ a saaju lɛ 'yɛr kʋ ma go, "Chen tɩ de a gãn bile 'lɔ na yuo a malaka 'lɔ na ara a man pɔ naa gogoro ju nũu pɔ."
Ka n chen a malaka sɛ̃ tɩ sʋɔr wʋ ɩka wʋ kʋ ma a gãn bile. Ka wʋ 'yɛr, "De 'wɔb, wʋn mire naa a fʋ pʋɔ pɔ tɩ nʋ̃mɔ̃ a fʋ nɛɛ pɔ sɩkãa kaar."
N den a gãn bile a malaka nũu pɔ 'wɔb. Ka wʋ nʋ̃mɔ̃ a n nɛɛ pɔ a sɩkãa kaar, tɩchɛ ɩn wa vɔl baar, ka wʋ mire a pʋɔ pɔ.
A ba lɛ 'yɛr kʋ ma go, "'Yɛr 'yɛr kʋ a nɩbʋrɔ, nɩ paalsɩ, nɩ 'yɛrbʋrsɩ nɩ a nãmɩne."
Be lɛ a nɩrɛ kɔ̃ɔ de dãgbal na kaara a damanaa kaar kʋ ma tɩ 'yɛr, "Chen tɩ man a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir nɩ a bɔɔr lofʋ jie na fʋ sɔr a nɩbɛ bala na puoro a be.
Tɩchɛ taa ɩrɛ wa mana a yõo ɛ, bojũu be lɛ a bala na ba ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ ɛ, na be 'mu 'mulo a tẽchɛchɛ nyãna ŋmɛrsɩ lɩjaayi nɩ ayi.
Ɩ̃n kʋ naa a n yelmɩ̃ɛ dãasɩɛ nɩbɛ ayi ka ba su fɔjãrsɩ tɩ mʋɔlɔ na ba 'yɛrɛ ber tur dɔɔl kɔɔr ayi nɩ lɩjaata (1,260)."
A dãasɩɛ dẽme ayi bala ɩ naa a kãa tɩɩr ayi nɩ a fɩ̃tɩnɛ dɔɔlfʋ jie jiir ayi, ba ara naa a Soro nyã na ɩ a wɛr wʋ jaa niem.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ bʋɔrɔ naa ɩka wʋ maal ba bier, bũu ma yi naa a ba nɛɛ pɔ di a bala na ɩ a ba dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃sɩ. Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tɩɛr a ba sɔ̃ɔfʋ ma kpi.

A nɩbɛ bala tara na kpɛ̃ɔ na nyɔɔ saa a saaju ka a saa kʋ̃ wa a sɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban mʋɔlɔ ɛ. Ba mɩ tara na kpɛ̃ɔ na lɩɛb a kɔ̃n a jaa ka a ɩ jɩ̃ɩ, na ba mɩ na tʋ̃ɔ vɛ̃ ka yelbier wa a tẽe pɔ sɔ̃ɔ jaa ban bʋɔrɔ.
Ala ɩ ba wa baar naa a dãasɩɛ difʋ, a mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ na yi a bɔɔ fulom 'lɔ pɔ na ŋmaan ban jɛɛr na wʋ tʋ̃ɔ ba na wʋ kʋ.
Ka a ba ɩ̃gãma gã be a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ sɔkpɛ̃ɛ ju. A tẽkpɛ̃ɛ nyã lɛ ba lɔɔrɔ sʋkpa bʋɔlɔ nɩ Sodom bɩɩ Ijipitɩ, be lɛ ba kpa a ba Soro a daa ju.
Nɩbʋrɔ, nɩ 'yɛrbʋrɔ, nɩ balsɩ ba jaa, nɩ paalsɩ a jaa na kaara naa a ba ɩ̃gãma ban tɔr a ũufʋ bɩbie ata nɩ bʋ̃ŋmaa.
Nʋ̃ɔ na kpɛ̃n a nɩbɛ na kpɩɛrɛ a wɛr pɔ ka ba chɩlɛ kʋrɔ taa bonsɩ, bojũu ba kʋ naa a 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ayi banyãna na dɔ̃ɔ ge a wɛr nɩbɛ.
Tɩchɛ a bɩbie ata nɩ a bʋ̃ŋmaa ala na wa po, Nãaŋmɩn 'yɔ̃ɔ ban nyɛvʋr ka ba lɛ ir ɩ vʋɛ, ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a bala na nyɛ ba.
A 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ ayi banyãna pãa wõn nɛkpɛ̃ɛ na yi saaju 'yɛr, "Yɩ do wa ka." Ka ba tu a julõjuur pɔ duoro a saaju ka a ba dɔ̃dɔ̃mɔ̃sɩ kaara ba.
Be lɛ ajienaa ka a tẽe mii ka a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ yie jiir pie jibʋ̃'yen lo naa kʋ nɩbɛ tur ayopõi (7,000) ka a dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ a bala na chɛ a ba pɛɛrɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na be a saaju.
A nɛbier ayi sʋɔ lɛ a nyã na po, tɩchɛ a ata sʋɔ mɩ turo naa.
A malakasɩ ayopõi sʋɔ pɛɛl naa a wʋ ɩɩl, ka a kɔkɔyɔɔ 'yɛrɛ be a saaju, "A wɛr nyã nãalʋ̃ʋ ɩ naa a sɩ Soro nɩ a wʋ Nɩ-iraa nãalʋ̃ʋ, 'lɔ lɛ na di a nãa jaa kpo kpo."
A nɩbɛrɛ lɩjɛr nɩ anaar bala na jɩ̃nɛ a ba nãa dakɔɔr ju a Nãaŋmɩn niem gãn kpa tẽe puor a Nãaŋmɩn
tɩ 'yɛrɛ, "Sɩ puor naa a Soro Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ, 'Lɔ lɛ ɩ, nɩ 'Lɔ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be, bojũu wʋ den a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ piel kaara nɩ a wɛr wʋ jaa.

A paalsɩ vʋ̃n fʋn nɛɛ ka fʋ suur mɩ dire. A sɔ̃ɔ ta naa ka fʋn tɔɔr a kũn 'yɛr, na fʋn yab a fʋ gbãgbaar na ɩ a 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ lɔ̃ɔn a fʋ nɩbɛ naa bala na 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a fʋ yuor, a bil naa bɛrɛ ba jaa, na fʋn sɔ̃ɔ a bala na sɔ̃ɔ a wɛr."
Ka a Nãaŋmɩn yir na be a saaju pãn pãa yuo ka ba nyɛ a nɛtɩraa daka be a yir pɔ. Ka saa nyɩɩrfʋ, gɔ̃mɔ̃, nɩ tãnfʋ, ka a tẽe wʋ jaa mii, ka a sakpʋlõbibɛrɛ loro.
A nɛ'maa yelbɛrɛ na yi a saaju ka a pɔɔ vaar mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ fɩka fɔbaa tɩ dɔɔl a gbɛɛ a ŋmɛraa ju, ka a ŋmɛrbie pie nɩ ayi ɩ nãa jupil ka wʋ su.
Pʋɔ lɛ wʋ tara ka wʋ dɔɔfʋ ta ka wʋ kõnõ nɩ.
Be lɛ ka a nɛ'maa yele ɩ̃sʋɔ lɛ yi a saaju kaara fɩka dajɩl na ɩ jɩɛ na wʋ tara jur ayopõi nɩ ɩlɛ pie ka a nãa jupile be a jur pɔ.
A wʋ jʋʋr pɩɩr naa a ŋmɛrbie jiir ata jibʋ̃'yen a saaju 'lɔb a tẽe. Tɩ ara gu a pɔɔ 'lɔ na bʋɔrɔ a dɔɔfʋ ɩka 'lɔ wa dɔɔ wʋ vɔl a bie.
A pɔɔ dɔɔn a bie ka wʋ ɩ dabile, 'lɔ lɛ na kaara a paalsɩ a jaa nɩ la kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ na kaara a kur dãgbal kaar. Ba jãan a pɔɔ bie nyã don a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ ka wʋ tɩ be a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ pɔ.
Tɩ ka a pɔɔ mɩ jo kpɛ a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ na wʋ tɩ be a jie Nãaŋmɩn na chɔɔr bar ka ban kaara wʋ maal ber tur kɔɔr ayi dɔɔl lɩjaata (1,260).
Ka a jɛɛr lo be a saaju. Maɩkɩl nɩ a malakasɩ jɛɛr nɩ naa a dajɩl, ka a dajɩl nɩ a wʋ malakasɩ mɩ lɩɛb jɛɛrɛ nɩ a Maɩkɩl nɩ a wʋ malakasɩ.
Tɩchɛ ba tʋ̃ɔ naa a dajɩl nɩ a wʋ malakasɩ, dii ba bar a be a saaju.
Ba lɔb a dajɩl kpɛ̃ɛ nyã bar a yõo, a kõr waa 'lɔ̃nɔ̃ na ɩ a dɛɛr sʋɔ, nɩ a Satan, 'lɔ lɛ bɛlʋ̃ a wɛr nɩbɛ ba jaa. Ba lɔb wʋn bar ka a wɛr pɔ, nɩ a wʋ malakasɩ.

Be lɛ n wõ nɛkpɛ̃ɛ na 'yɛr be a saaju, "Pʋ̃pãanyã, a faafʋ bɩbir vɩɛ naa, a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn wiil naa a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ, nɩ a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ, nɩ a wʋ Nɩ-iraa kpɛ̃ɔ. Bojũu a 'lɔ na bɛrɛ a sɩ yɛɛr nɛɛ, 'lɔ lɛ bɛrɛ ba a nɛɛ a Nãaŋmɩn niem mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ, ba daa wʋn lɔb.
Ba tʋ̃ɔ wʋ naa nɩ a Pɛraabile jɩ̃ɩ nɩ a ba dãasɩɛ 'yɛrbie. Ba sɔɔn kũu na baa de a ba nyɛvʋr ka wʋ ɩ bon ɛ.
A lɛ jũu, saaju naa bala na kpɩɛrɛ a be, yɩ chɩlɛ! Tɩchɛ nɛbier ben a yɩn na be a wɛr nɩ a man pɔ, yɩn din dɔɔyɛ, bojũu a dɛɛr sʋɔ suun a yɩ sɛ̃! Ka a wʋ suur dire, bojũu a wʋ ber ba waa ɛ."
Lɛ a dajɩl na wa nyɛ ka a ɩ tẽe lɛ wʋ lo, wʋ dire naa a pɔɔ 'lɔ na dɔɔ a dabile.
Ka ba kʋ a pɔɔ tuu kpɛ̃ɛ pibɛ ayi, ɩka wʋ ɔɔ chen a jie ban chɔɔr bar be a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ, be lɛ ban tɩ kaara wʋ yuom ata nɩ bʋ̃ŋmaa ka a waa taa pɔɔ wʋ ɛ.
Be lɛ ka a waa chɩr kʋ̃ɔ a nɛɛ pɔ põn kʋ̃ɔ kaar, ɩka a di a pɔɔ,
tɩchɛ ka a tẽe sʋ̃ʋ a pɔɔ haa a nɛɛ nyũ a kʋ̃ɔ ala a dajɩl na chɩr a nɛɛ pɔ.
Ka a dajɩl pãa nyɛ suur 'yɔ̃ɔ a pɔɔ na wʋ chen tɩ ŋmaan a pɔɔ bibiir bala na chɛ jɛɛr. A bala na turo a Nãaŋmɩn nɛɛ na ba mɩ tara a Yesu 'yɛr yelmɩ̃ɛ.
Ka a dajɩl ara a man gogoro nɛɛ. N nyɛn mɔdʋ̃ɔ na yire a man pɔ na wʋ tara jur ayopõi tɩ bul ɩlɛ pie ka a nãa jupile su a ɩlɛ ala pɔ. A jur ala pɔ yoe ben be na fere sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ Nãaŋmɩn yuor.
