A mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn nyɛ nyɛntãan gbɔ̃gbɔ̃ɔ tɩchɛ ka a gbɛɛ kaara fɩka pɛɛlaa gbɛɛ ka a nɛɛ mɩ kaara fɩka jukpɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ. Ka a dajɩl de a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ a wʋ nãa dakɔɔ nɩ a wʋ tʋ̃ɔfʋ kʋ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ̃nɔ̃.
A mɔdʋ̃ɔ ju ɩ̃sʋɔ kaara fɩka bon ban chɛ ɩrɛ na kʋ tɩchɛ ka a chɛfʋ jie 'lɔ 'mɔ̃ pɔɔ. Nɛɛ 'maan a nɩrɛ jaa na be a wɛr pɔ tɩ na ba turo a mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ.
Ka nɩrɛ jaa pãa pɛɛrɛ a dajɩl bojũu 'lɔ lɛ de a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ kʋ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ na ba mɩ pɛɛrɛ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ 'yɛrɛ nɩ tɩ sʋrɔ, "An lɛ kaara a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nyã kaar? Nɩ an lɛ na tʋ̃ɔ ŋmaan wʋ jɛɛr?"
A mɔdʋ̃ɔ nyã tara na nɛɛ na 'yɛrɛ ɛ jɩ̃jɩɩr 'yɛr na wʋ fere, wʋ tara na sɔr ɩka wʋ 'yɛr a wʋ yobɔ 'yɛr maal ŋmɛrsɩ lɩjaayi nɩ ayi (42).
A wʋ 'yɛrbie chɩrɛ nɩ naa Nãaŋmɩn na wʋ fere sɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn yuor nɩ a jie 'lɔ wʋn be nɩ a bala na kpɩɛrɛ a saaju.
Ba kʋ wʋn sɔr ɩka wʋ jɛb a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ na wʋ tʋ̃ɔ ba na wʋ mɩ tʋ̃ɔ a nɩbʋrɔ, nɩ 'yɛrbʋrɔ, nɩ balbʋrɔ, nɩ paalsɩ.
A bala ba jaa yuor na ba dɔ̃ɔ sɛb a Pɛraabile ban dɔ̃ɔ kʋ a nyɛvʋr gãn pɔ ɛ, tɩ a wɛr wa mɛ, na gbur dumo puor a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nyãna.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ na tara toor, wʋ chɛlɛ.
Ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa nyɔɔfʋ lɛ ban nyɔɔ wʋ, ban nyɔɔ wʋn chiin. Ala ɩ sɔkpɛ̃ɛ mɩ lɛ ban kʋn ɩ̃sʋɔ, a sɔkpɛ̃ɛ lɛ ban kʋn wʋ. A lɛ jũu a bala na ɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ, ba tara kãnyir nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ.
N pãa lɛ nyɛn a mɔdʋ̃ɔ ɩ̃sʋɔ na yire a tẽe tara ɩlɛ ayi fɩka pɛraabile tɩ 'yɛrɛ fɩka a dajɩl.
Wʋ yin de a mɔdʋ̃dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ kpɛ̃ɔ na wʋ wiil wʋ mɩ̃ɛ a mɔdʋ̃dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ niem tɩ fɩr a nɩbɛ ba jaa na be ka a wɛr pɔ ka ba gbur dumo puor a mɔdʋ̃dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ chɛfʋ jie na 'mɔ pɔɔ.
Wʋ tʋ̃n nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃sɩ na wʋ gba ma vɛ̃ ka bũu yi saaju suu wa a tẽe ka nɩbɛ ba jaa nyɛ.
A wʋ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ anyãna jũu, ba kʋ wʋn kpɛ̃ɔ ka wʋ de a mɔdʋ̃dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ jie, na wʋ bɛl a wɛr nɩbɛ. Ka wʋ 'yɛr ba ka ba mɛ bʋtɩbɛ 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ nɩ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ ban dɔ̃ɔ chen a sʋɔ tɩ wʋ 'mɔ pɔɔ.
Ba kʋ wʋn sɔr ɩka wʋ kʋ a bʋtɩɩ 'lɔ nyɛvʋr wʋn mɛ ka wʋ nyɛtãan a mɔdʋ̃dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ, ka wʋ na tʋ̃ɔ 'yɛr ka ba kʋ a bala na tɔr a bʋtɩɩ puorfʋ.
Wʋ mɩ fɩr nɩrɛ jaa, ka bile lɛ wʋ ɩ bɩɩ kpɛ̃ɛ lɛ, taraa sʋɔ bɩɩ nɔ̃ɔ sʋɔ, sumɩne bɩɩ gbãgbaa, ka ba 'yɔ̃ɔ ba jaa jɩ̃nsɩ a nũsʋ̃ɔ nũu pɔ bɩɩ a gberaa pɔ.
Nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ daara bɩɩ da bon ka baa 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ a jɩ̃nɛ na ɩ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ yuor bɩɩ a wʋ jɩ̃nɛ 'lɔ na ɩ a wʋ yuor ɛ.
Ka 'lɔ yɛ̃ 'yɛr lɛ, ala ɩ nɩrɛ tara na bɔ̃ɔfʋ, wʋn tʋ̃ɔ sɔr a mɔdʋ̃ɔ sɛbie an ɩ nɩsaal sɛbie lɛ. A sɛbie ɩ naa kɔɔr ayʋɔb dɔɔl lɩjaata nɩ ayʋɔb (666).
Be lɛ n kaa nyɛ a Pɛraabile ka wʋ 'mataa ara nɩ nɩbɛ turo kɔbaa lɩjaayi nɩ anaar (144,000) a Jiyon tɔ̃ɔ ju ka wʋ yuor nɩ a Sãa yuor sɛb 'mar a ba gbersɩ pɔ.
N wõn kɔkɔɛ a saaju na gɔ̃nɔ̃ fɩka kɔ̃kpɛ̃ɛ na joro bɩɩ saa na tãn. A gɔ̃mɔ̃ mɩ kaara fɩka kõrõjomsɩ ban ŋmiere.

Ba yiele naa yiel paalaa a nãa dakɔɔ niem nɩ a bʋ̃nɩbie anaar bala nɩ a nɩbɛrɛ bala niem. Nɩrɛ jaa ba be be na tʋ̃ɔ a yiel jãn ɛ, ka a nɩbɛ turo kɔbaa lɩjaayi nɩ anaar (144,000) bala tɛɛ a Nãaŋmɩn na faa ka a wɛr pɔ ba lɛ ɛ.
A banyãna lɛ ba sɔ̃ɔ ba mɩ̃ɛ nɩ pɔbɔ ɛ, bojũu ba gun ba mɩ̃ɛ ɩ chɛchɛ, na ba ma turo a Pɛraabile jie jaa wʋn chiine, bala lɛ ba da de kʋ Nãaŋmɩn fɩka bʋ̃dɔ̃ɔ ban de kʋ Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Pɛraabile.
Baa haa nɛɛ ŋmaa jir ɛ. Baa tara chɛfʋ bɩ̃lãa jaa ɛ.
N pãa lɛ nyɛn a malakasɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ na ɔɔrɔ be a saaju tɩ tara a 'yɛr kpo kpo bʋɔrɔ ɩka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ a bala na be ka a wɛr pɔ, nɩ paalsɩ a jaa, nɩ balbʋrsɩ a jaa, nɩ 'yɛrbʋrsɩ a jaa, nɩ nɩbʋrsɩ a jaa.
Wʋ tãn na nɩ nɛkpɛ̃ɛ, "Yɩ joro a Nãaŋmɩn dãbɩ̃ɛ na yɩ kʋrɔ wʋ tɩɩr, bojũu a wʋ bɩbir vɩɛ naa ka wʋn tɔɔr a nɩbɛ 'yɛr. Yɩ puor wʋ, 'lɔ lɛ maal a saaju, nɩ a wɛr, nɩ a man nɩ a kʋ̃ɔ yifʋ jiir."
A malakasɩ ayi sʋɔ mɩ tun wa 'yɛrɛ, "Wʋ wɛl naa, wʋ wɛl naa, a Babilon tẽkpɛ̃ɛ nyã 'lɔ lɛ maal a paalsɩ a jaa a ba nyũ a wʋ sɛ̃sɛ̃yele dãa ala na tɔɔ Nãaŋmɩn suur waan."
Ka a malakasɩ ata sʋɔ mɩ tu wa 'yɛrɛ nɩ kɔkɔkpɛ̃ɛ, "Ala wa ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa puor naa a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nyãna naa bʋtɩɩ nyãna ban mɛ a wʋ kaar, na wʋ sɔɔ ka ba 'yɔ̃ɔ wʋ a jɩ̃nɛ a gberaa pɔ bɩɩ a nũu pɔ,
wʋ mɩ na nyũn a dãa ala na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn suur, ala lɛ ba pʋr 'yɔ̃ɔ a ŋmele pɔ na ɩ a suur. Ban ge wʋ naa nɩ a jerbɩ bũu na dire a malaka chɛchɛsɩ bala naa Pɛraabile niem.

A ba gefʋ jʋʋr na uro ba tara ŋmaafʋ ɛ. Pɛ̃nfʋ ba be be kʋ a bala na gbur dumo puor a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nɩ a bʋtɩɩ 'lɔ ban mɛ a wʋ kaar mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ bɩɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ ɛ, bɩɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na sɔɔ de a jɩ̃nɛ na ɩ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ yuor ɛ."
A lɛ jũu, a bala na ɩ Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ na ba turo a wʋ nɛɛ na ba mɩ ara nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ kʋ a Yesu ba tara kãnyir.

N pãa lɛ wõn kɔkɔr na yi a saaju 'yɛrɛ, "Sɛb a anyãna an yi a dɩna chiine, pʋpɛl sʋɔ lɛ a 'lɔ na kpi a Soro sɔr pɔ." "Ɔ̃ɔ," lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn Sɩɛ 'yɛr, "Ban pɛ̃n naa a ba dɔɔyɛ pɔ. Bojũu a lɛ ban dɔ̃ɔ tʋ̃, na turo ba naa."
N lɛ kãan nyɛ julõjupɩla, ka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a julõjuur ju kaara fɩka nɩsaal bie na wʋ su sɛlma jupil a ju pɔ, tɩ na wʋ tara bʋ̃ŋma sɔkpɛ̃ɛ na dire a nũu pɔ.

Be lɛ a malaka ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ yi be a Nãaŋmɩn yir wa bʋɔlɔ 'yɛrɛ kpɛ̃ɔ jaa kʋrɔ a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a julõjuur ju, "De a sɔkpɛ̃ɛ na fʋ piel tʋ̃mɔ̃ bojũu a tʋ̃mɔ̃ sɔ̃ɔ ta naa, bojũu a wɛr nyã ban na ŋma mʋ̃ɔ naa."
Lɛ lɛ a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a julõjuur ju jaal a sɔkpɛ̃ɛ bar a wɛr pɔ na wʋ ŋma a wɛr wʋ jaa.
A malaka ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ na yi a be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir a saaju na wʋ mɩ tara a bʋ̃ŋma sɔkpɛ̃ɛ diir ɩ̃sʋɔ.

Ka a malaka ɩ̃sʋɔ mɩ 'lɔ lɛ kaara a bũu ka wʋ wa yi a be a tɩ̃ɩ nyũu vɩla chʋmfʋ jie bʋɔl a 'lɔ na tara a bʋ̃ŋma sɔkpɛ̃ɛ diir kpɛ̃ɔ jaa tɩ 'yɛr, "De a fʋ bʋ̃ŋma sɔkpɛ̃ɛ diir 'lɔ na fʋ ŋman a tɩɛ wɔ̃mɔ̃, a wɛr lɛ ɩ a tɩɛ ka wʋ wɔ̃mɔ̃ mʋ̃ɔ."
A malaka jaal a wʋ sɔkpɛ̃ɛ bar ka a wɛr pɔ ka wʋ ŋmara a wɔ̃mɔ̃ kpaara 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a be ban ma nɛɛrɛ ŋmɛrɛ, na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn suur.
Ba nɛɛrɛ ban a be a nɛŋmɛrfʋ jie a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ yõo, ka a jɩ̃ɩ joro a ŋmɛrfʋ jie ɩrɛ na ta mɛl kɔɔr ayi ka a wii mɩ ma kpɛ ka a nɛɛ 'lɔr.
N nyɛ naa a nɛ'maa yelwiilaa jɩ̃nɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ a saaju, malakasɩ ayopõi na tara wõmsɩ ayopõi, ala lɛ ɩ a baaraa na vɛ̃ ka Nãaŋmɩn suur lo.
N lɛ nyɛn bon na kaara fɩka man kʋ̃ɔ jaa wel wel nyɩlɛ chãana kaar lɔ̃ɔtãan bũu ka nɩbɛ ara a wʋ gogoro par. Bala lɛ jɛb tʋ̃ɔ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nɩ a wʋ bʋtɩɩ nɩ a yuor jɩ̃nɛ. Nãaŋmɩn kʋ ban kõrõjomsɩ
ka ba yiele nɩ a wʋ gbãgbaa Mosesɩ nɩ a Pɛraabile yiele 'yɛrɛ, "A Soro Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ, a fʋ tʋ̃mɔ̃ 'maan nɛɛ tɩ põn bar, fʋ ɩn nɩtor nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ, fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a nãmɩne ba jaa Nãa.
An lɛ kʋ̃ joro a fʋ̃ʋ Soro dãbɩ̃ɛ na wʋ kʋ a fʋ yuor tɩɩr ɛ? Bojũu fʋ̃ʋ tɛɛ lɛ ɩ chɛchɛ. A paalsɩ a jaa na wa gãn kpa tẽe a fʋ niem, bojũu nɩrɛ jaa nyɛ naa a fʋ tʋ̃torsɩ."
Bojũu a anyã puor, n kãan nyɛ a saaju ka a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir a jichɛchɛ 'lɔ na ɩ a dãasɩɛ jie ka wʋ yuo.
Ka a malakasɩ ayopõi yi a jichɛchɛ nyãna na ba tara a Nãaŋmɩn suur wõmsɩ ayopõi sun bʋ̃pɩɛl na nyɩlɛ ka a sɛlma bʋ̃lunsɩ bãbɩ̃ a ba nyãn pɔ.
Be lɛ ka a bʋ̃nɩbie anaar bala ɩ̃sʋɔ kʋ a malakasɩ ayopõi bala sɛlma laar ayopõi na sɛɛr nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na be be jaa kpo kpo suur.
Ka a jʋʋr sɛɛ a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir yi a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr nɩ a wʋ kpɛ̃ɔ pɔ, ka nɩrɛ jaa kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ kpɛ a puorfʋ yir ka a malakasɩ ba wa baar a Nãaŋmɩn suur wõmsɩ ala baar ɛ.
N wõn nɛkpɛ̃ɛ na yi a be a puorfʋ yir 'yɛrɛ kʋrɔ a malakasɩ ayopõi bala, "Yɩ chen tɩ kpaar a Nãaŋmɩn suur a laar pɔ bar a wɛr."
Ka a malaka dɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ chen tɩ kpaar a wʋ laa bar ka a tẽe ka a natɩdɛbɛ na bɩɛrɛ tɛ a nɩbɛ bala na tara a mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ jɩ̃nɛ tɩ mɩ gbur dumo puor a bʋtɩɩ.
A malaka ayi sʋɔ mɩ kpaar a wʋ laa bar a man pɔ, ka a kʋ̃ɔ lɩɛb fɩka kũu jɩ̃ɩ, ka a bʋ̃vʋʋrsɩ a jaa na be a man pɔ kpi.
A malaka ata sʋɔ mɩ kpaar a wʋ laa 'yɔ̃ɔ a põnsɩ nɩ kʋlsɩ pɔ, ka a kɔ̃n mɩ lɩɛb jɩ̃ɩ.
Be lɛ n wõ a malaka 'lɔ na kaara a kɔ̃n 'yɛr, "Fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ a Torfʋ Sʋɔ, a fʋ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ nyã tor naa, fʋ̃ʋ lɛ ɩ, fʋ̃ʋ mɩ lɛ dɔ̃ɔ be be Chɛchɛ Sʋɔ a yelsɩ anyãna fʋn tɔɔr a 'yɛr jũu.
Bojũu a putudẽme bala lɛ kʋ a fʋ nɩbɛ nɩ a fʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ a fʋ kʋ ba a jɩ̃ɩ ɩka ba nyũ, a lɛ sɛɛn ba naa."
Be lɛ n wõ kɔkɔr na 'yɛr be a bɔɔr lofʋ jie, "Ɔ̃ɔ, n Soro Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ, a fʋ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ tɩ mɩ tor."
A malakasɩ anaar sʋɔ kpaar a wʋ laa 'yɔ̃ɔ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ ka wʋ tara kpɛ̃ɔ vuul a nɩbɛ nɩ bũu.
A mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ tʋl vuul ba naa tɩ ba chɛnɛ tʋrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn yuor an ɩ 'lɔ lɛ tara a gefʋ anyãna a jaa kpɛ̃ɔ na baa lɩɛb ba tɩɛr kʋ wʋ tɩɩr ɛ.
A malakasɩ anũu sʋɔ kpaar a wʋ laa 'yɔ̃ɔ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nãa dakɔɔ ju, ka a wʋ nãalʋ̃ʋ wʋ jaa lɩɛb libe, ka a wõnõ a nɩbɛ ka ba ɔɔrɔ jãlbie
tɩ chɛnɛ tʋrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn nyã na be a saaju a ba natɩɛ nɩ an bɩɛrɛ ba jũu. Tɩchɛ baa lɩɛb a ba tɩɛr bar a ba tʋ̃dɛbɛ ɛ.
A malakasɩ ayʋɔb sʋɔ mɩ kpaar naa a wʋ laa 'yɔ̃ɔ a Yufɩrɩtɩ põn kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ, ka a kʋ̃ɔ sɩr chɔɔr a sɔr bar kʋ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʋ jie nãmɩne.
N lɛ nyɛn a sɩdɛbɛ na kaara pãtɩɛ kaar ka a yire a bon 'lɔ na kaara a dajɩl kaar nɛɛ pɔ, naa lɛ yire a mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ mɩ nɛɛ pɔ, naa mɩ lɛ yire a jir ŋmarba 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nɛɛr pɔ.
A sɩɩr anyã ɩ naa a tɩɩ sɩɩr na tʋ̃nɔ̃ nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃sɩ. Ba chen naa a wɛr wʋ jaa nãmɩne sɛ̃ tɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa na ŋmaan a Nãaŋmɩn Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ jɛɛr a wʋ bɩbir kpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ daar.
"Nyɛ ɩn wan nãnyie kaar. Bɔɔsʋ̃n sʋɔ lɛ a 'lɔ na ba gur ɛ, tɩ mɩ tara a wʋ bʋ̃sursɩ jɛn na wʋ kʋ̃ wa chiine nɩ sal'mʋɔr ka a ɩrɛ wʋ vĩ ɛ."
Be lɛ a sɩɩr lɔ̃ɔtaa a nãmɩne a jie 'lɔ a Heburu nɩbɛ na bʋɔlɔ Amagedɔn.
A malakasɩ ayopõi sʋɔ kpaar naa a wʋ laa 'yɔ̃ɔ sɛsɛbɛ pɔ, ka kɔkɔr yi be a Nãaŋmɩn puorfʋ yir a nãa dakɔɔ par 'yɛrɛ kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, "A maal naa!"
Be lɛ ka saa nyɩɩrfʋ, nɩ gɔ̃mɔ̃, nɩ saa tãnfʋ wa, ka a tẽe dam wʋ jaa miin kpɛ̃ɔ. An yi a lɛ daar jaa, nɩsaal na be ka a wɛr pɔ a tẽe ba mii a kpɛ̃ɔ a lɛ ɛ.
Ka a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ 'mar jiir ata, ka a paalsɩ tẽbɛrɛ mɩ lo lo. Nãaŋmɩn chɛnɛ na tɩɛr tɔ a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ Babilon na wʋ gbʋ̃m wʋ a dãa na sɛɛ ŋmele na ɩ a wʋ suur.
Dõdolsɩ a jaa bɔr naa ka fʋ kʋ̃ lɛ nyɛ tɔ̃ɔ go ɛ,
ka a sakpʋlõbibɛrɛ na tɩrɛ yire a saaju loro ŋmiere a nɩbɛ ka ba tʋrɔ a Nãaŋmɩn a sakpʋlõbie gefʋ nyã jũu.
A malakasɩ ayopõi na tara a laar ayopõi, ɩ̃sʋɔ wan wa 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Wa, ɩn wiil fʋn a lɛ a pɔɔ baa nyã yuor na yi na jɩ̃nɛ a mansɩ nɛɛ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ.
'Lɔ lɛ a wɛr nãmɩne gãn ka a wɛr nɩbɛ mɩ buu nɩ a wʋ sɛ̃sɛ̃yele."
Be lɛ, a malaka 'mɔɔ man a Sɩɛ pɔ chiin a mɔgɔ̃ɔ pɔ. Be lɛ n tɩ nyɛ a pɔɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a mɔdʋ̃jɩɛ ju. Ka a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nyã ɩ̃gãn wʋ jaa pɔɔn yoe na fere nɩ Nãaŋmɩn na wʋ tara jur ayopõi nɩ ɩlɛ pie.
A pɔɔ vaar naa fɔjɩ ile ile na wʋ pɩ̃ɛn sɛlma nɩ kʋsɩsʋ̃n nɩ lɛrbikpɩ̃ɛn. Wʋ tara naa a sɛlma ŋmele a wʋ nũsʋ̃ɔ pɔ a wʋ tʋ̃ kakaba nɩ a wʋ sɛ̃sɛ̃yele na sɛɛ.
Yuor sɛb mar a wʋ gberaa pɔ, "Fʋn kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ bɔ̃ɔ a par ɛ, a Babilon na yi yuor, pɔɔ baar ma, nɩ a wɛr tʋ̃ kakabsɩ ma."
N nyɛn a pɔɔ na nyũ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ jɩ̃ɩ buu, a bala na di a Yesu dãasɩɛ. Ɩn wa nyɛ wʋ a lɛ, nɛɛ 'maa ma naa.
Ka a malaka sʋʋr ma, "Ŋmɩnɛ a nɛɛ 'maa fʋ? Ɩn wiil fʋ naa a pɔɔ nɩ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ wʋn do na tara jur ayopõi nɩ ɩlɛ pie yelsɔɔlaa par.

A mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ fʋn nyɛ, wʋ dɔ̃ɔ be be, pʋ̃pãanyã waa lɛ be be go ɛ. Wʋn yi naa a bɔɔ fulom pɔ na wʋ chen a sɔ̃ɔfʋ jie. A wɛr nɩbɛ bala yoe na ba sɛb a nyɛvʋr gãn pɔ ɛ, yi a wɛr maalfʋ daar ɛ, bala wa nyɛ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nyã, nɛɛ na 'maa ba naa bojũu wʋ dɔ̃ɔ be be na waa lɛ be be ɛ, tɩ na wʋn lɩɛb wa.
"A ka ɩ naa tɩɛr na tara yɛ̃ 'yɛr. A jur ayopõi ɩ naa a tɔ̃n ayopõi a pɔɔ na jɩ̃nɛ, nɩ a nãmɩne ayopõi.
A ba anũu kpi naa tɩ ka bʋ̃'yen chɛnɛ, bʋ̃'yen mɩ ba wa sɛrɛ ɛ. Tɩchɛ 'lɔ wa wa, wʋn kor bɩ̃lãa.
A mɔdʋ̃ɔ 'lɔ na dɔ̃ɔ be be na waa lɛ be be go ɛ, wʋ ɩ naa a nãmɩne aniin sʋɔ na pʋɔ ayopõi bala pɔ na chiine a sɔ̃ɔfʋ jie.
"A ɩlɛ pie ala fʋn nyɛ ɩ naa nãmɩne pie na ba di a nãa sɛrɛ ɛ, tɩchɛ ban kʋ ban kpɛ̃ɔ ka ba ɩ nãmɩne lɔ̃ɔn a mɔdʋ̃ɔ sɔ̃ɔ bɩ̃lãa.
Ba jaa tɩɛr ɩn bʋ̃'yen, ka ba de a ba kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ fɔ̃ɔ kʋ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ.
Ban ŋmaan naa a Pɛraabile jɛɛr, tɩchɛ ka a Pɛraabile na tʋ̃ɔ ba, bojũu 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a sorbo ba jaa Soro nɩ a nãmɩne ba jaa Nãa. A bala wʋn bʋɔl na wʋ chɛl ir ka ba turo nɩ yelmɩ̃ɛ, na pʋɔ wʋ naa."
Ka a malaka 'yɛr kʋ ma, "A kɔ̃n ala fʋn nyɛ be a pɔɔ baa 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ, ɩ naa a nɩbʋrsɩ, nɩyɔɔ, paalsɩ nɩ 'yɛrbʋrsɩ.
A mɔdʋ̃ɔ nɩ a ɩlɛ pie ala fʋn nyɛ ban 'laar naa a pɔɔ baa nyãna na ba tɔɔ wʋ chɩɛr tɩ chɛ wʋ sal'mʋɔr. Ban 'wɔb wʋ naa tɩ chɛ 'yɔ̃ɔ bũu pɔ ka wʋ di.
Bojũu an ɩ Nãaŋmɩn lɛ de 'yɔ̃ɔ a ba tɩɛr pɔ ka ba na ɩ a wʋ bɔfʋ, ka ba jaa tɩɛr ɩ bʋ̃'yen ka ba sɔɔ de a ba kpɛ̃ɔ kʋ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ ka wʋ di nãa ka Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr wa maal baar.
A pɔɔ fʋn nyɛ ɩ naa a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ nãa na tʋ̃ɔ a wɛr nãmɩne ba jaa."
A anyã puor, n nyɛn a malaka ɩ̃sʋɔ na yi a saaju suro waara. Wʋ tara na kpɛ̃ɔ. A chãa na be a wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ chaar naa a wɛr wʋ jaa.
Na wʋ tãn kpɛ̃ɔ nɩ nɛkpɛ̃ɛ 'yɛrɛ, "Wʋ wɛl naa! A Babilon tẽkpɛ̃ɛ 'lɔ wʋ wɛl naa! Wʋ lɩɛb dɛɛr dẽme gaa jie, nɩ sɩdɛbɛ, nɩ lubil dɛbɛ nɩbɛ na ba ɔɔrɔ ɛ kpɛfʋ jie.
Bojũu an ɩ a paalsɩ ba jaa buu naa nɩ a wʋ sɛ̃sɛ̃yele, ka a nãmɩne na be ka a wɛr pɔ gãn wʋ. A yayarba na be a wɛr pɔ len tu a wʋ bʋ̃yɔɔ pɔ."
Be lɛ n lɛ wõ kɔkɔr ɩ̃sʋɔ na yi a saaju 'yɛr, "Maa nɩbɛ, yɩ wa yi a wʋ pɔ na yɩ taa ɩrɛ wa pʋɔ a wʋ dɛɛr pɔ ɛ, bɩɩ na yɩ pʋɔ a wʋ wõm pɔ ɛ.
Bojũu a wʋ maal dɛbɛ dɔɔl taa tɩ ta a saaju, ka Nãaŋmɩn tɩɛr tɔ a wʋ dɛɛr wʋn maal.
Yɩ kʋ wʋ nɩtãa lɛ wʋn kʋ yɩ. Yɩ yab wʋ tɩ lɛ dɔɔl wʋ. Yɩ kʋ wʋ a dãa nɩ a wʋ ŋmele nɛɛr ayi ka wʋ nyũ.
Ge wʋ ka wʋ waal, a yuor nɩ a nʋ̃ɔ wʋn bʋɔrɔ kʋrɔ a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ. Wʋ ma chɛn nyãa 'yɛr, 'N ɩn pɔɔ nãa jɩ̃nɛ, n ba ɩ pɔɔ kʋɔr ɛ. Nɩbaal kʋ̃ wa kpɛ ma jaa ɛ.'
A lɛ jũu, bɩbir bʋ̃'yen lɛ a wõm na wa a wʋ ju, kũu, nɩ kõn, nɩ kɔ̃. Bũu lɛ ɩ a di wʋ an ɩ a Soro Nãaŋmɩn nyã na tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr ɩn tʋ̃ɔfʋ sʋɔ.
"Ka a wɛr nãmɩne na dɔ̃ɔ gãn wʋ na ba 'mataa din wʋ a nʋ̃ɔ, bala wa nyɛ a lɛ wʋn dire ka a jʋʋr uro, an ɩrɛ ban nɩbaal ka ba kõnõ kʋrɔ wʋ.
Dãbɩ̃ɛ kpɛ ba naa a ger nyã jũu, ban ara na tɛɛr jaa tɩ kõnõ 'yɛrɛ, 'Nɛbier, nɛbier, a fʋ̃ʋ tẽkpɛ̃ɛ nyã, pa Babilon, a fʋ̃ʋ nyã na tara a kpɛ̃ɔ, bɩbir bʋ̃'yen lɛ a sɔ̃ɔfʋ be wa a fʋ ju.'
"A yayarba na be a wɛr pɔ na kõnõ na tɩ waala bojũu nɩrɛ ba be be na da a bonsɩ go ɛ.

A sɛlma, kpãna, kʋsɩsʋ̃n nɩ a lɛrbikpɩ̃ɛn, nɩ fuu pɩɛl, nɩ fuujɩ ile ile, nɩ fuu saalsɩ, nɩ a fuujɩ kpɩ̃n kpɩ̃n, nɩ a daar ala nyũu na nʋ̃mɔ̃, nɩ bomo ala jaa ban de wab chɛlɛ maal. A daar ala daa na be tuo, a kurjɩɛ, nɩ kursɔɔlɔ, nɩ a kʋsɩkpũlo bie.
A kãnyũu vɩɛl ala, nɩ a dãn, nɩ a kãn, nɩ a jɔ̃n, nɩ chir, nɩ a niin, nɩ a piir, nɩ a wiisɩ, nɩ a wiisɩ torkosɩ, nɩ a gbãgbaar.
"A bʋ̃vɩɛlsɩ ala na ɩrɛ fʋ a vɔlaa, a jaa chen naa. A fʋ nãbomo naa fʋ yobɔyele a jaa bɔr naa. Fʋ kʋ̃ lɛ nyãa go ɛ.
A yayarba na da a bomo kʋ wʋ na ba le, nɛɛ na 'maa ba naa a wʋ ge fʋ nyã pɔ, ka ba sɛr yi tɛɛr jaa tɩ kõnõ waala
'yɛrɛ nɩ, 'Nɛbier, nɛbier, a fʋ̃ʋ tẽkpɛ̃ɛ nyã, a fʋ̃ʋ na ma su a fɔpɩɛl, nɩ a fɔjɩ ile ile, nɩ a fɔkpɩ̃n kpɩ̃nsɩ. Na fʋ ma pɩ̃ɛn a sɛlma, nɩ a kʋsɩsʋ̃n, nɩ a lɛrbikpɩ̃ɛn.
Mɔ̃tɔ̃ bʋ̃'yen lɛ a fʋ nãbomo anyãna be wɛ a jaa.' A bala na kaara a gborbɛrɛ ala a man kpɛ̃ɛ pɔ, nɩ a nɩbɛ bala na be be, nɩ a bala jaa na tʋ̃nɔ̃ dire be a man pɔ, na ara na tɛɛr.
Bala wa nyɛ a jʋʋr ban kõnõ na 'yɛrɛ nɩ, 'Tẽbuor lɛ be ka na wʋ ta a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ nyã?'

Ban ɔɔn tãna 'yɔ̃ɔnɔ̃ a jur pɔ tɩ kõnõ tɩ waala 'yɛrɛ nɩ, 'Nɛbier, nɛbier, a fʋ̃ʋ tẽkpɛ̃ɛ nyã. A jie nyã a bala jaa na tara a gborbɛrɛ yʋɔrɔ nɩ a man pɔ, ba jaa len tu a fʋ jie, tɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ bʋ̃'yen a fʋ be wɛ a nɩtɔ̃?'
Saaju, chɩlɛ a wʋ jũu, yɩn Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ nɩ a nɩtʋ̃nsɩ nɩ a 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ yɩ chɩlɛ. Nãaŋmɩn tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr nɩtãa a lɛ wʋn maal yɩ."
Be lɛ ka a malaka kpɛ̃ɔ pãa 'mɔɔ kʋsɩr kpɛ̃ɛ na jɩ̃tãan nɩɛr lɔb 'yɔ̃ɔ a man pɔ tɩ 'yɛr, "Nɩtɔ̃ lɛ ɩn lɔb fʋ bar, a fʋ̃ʋ Babilon tẽkpɛ̃ɛ nyã ka nɩrɛ kʋ̃ lɛ nyɛ fʋ jaa go ɛ.
Ba kʋ̃ lɛ wõ kõrõjom ŋmefʋ, nɩ yiel yielbe, nɩ daa pɛɛlbɛ, nɩ ɩlɛ pɛɛlbɛ jaa go ɛ. Tʋ̃tʋ̃nbɔ jaa bʋrɔ kʋ̃ lɛ be be go ɛ, ba kʋ̃ lɛ wõ jɔ̃ nɩ̃ɛnbɛ dɔ̃ɔn go ɛ.
Fɩ̃tɩn bũu kʋ̃ lɛ chaar be go ɛ. Ba kʋ̃ lɛ wõ pɔɔ paalaa nɩ wʋ sɩrɛ kɔkɔr go ɛ. A fʋ yayarba lɛ dɔ̃ɔ yi yuor a wɛr pɔ. A fʋ tɩ̃sɔɔ yele lɛ fʋ de bɛl a paalsɩ jaa ka ba bɔr.
A wʋ pɔ lɛ ba nyɛ a 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ jɩ̃ɩ nɩ bala ba jaa ban dɔ̃ɔ kʋ a wɛr pɔ."
A anyã puor, n wõn gɔ̃mɔ̃ fɩka nɩyɔɔ na tãna be a saaju 'yɛrɛ nɩ, "Dãnfʋ wʋ ta Nãaŋmɩn! Faafʋ nɩ tɩɩr nɩ kpɛ̃ɔ ɩ naa a wʋ tʋɔr,
bojũu a wʋ 'yɛr tɔɔrfʋ ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ tɩ mɩ tor. Wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔn a pɔɔ baa na 'yɛr, 'lɔ lɛ sɔ̃ɔ a wɛr nɩbɛ nɩ a wʋ sɛ̃sɛ̃yele. A wʋ gbãgbaar wʋn kʋ, wʋ yab wʋn a sãn."
Ba lɛ tãna na go, "Dãnfʋ wʋ ta Nãaŋmɩn. A wʋ jʋʋr na uro duoro ba tara ŋmaafʋ ɛ."
Ka a nɩbɛrɛ lɩjɛr nɩ anaar nɩ a bʋ̃nɩbie anaar bala gãn kpa tẽe puor a Nãaŋmɩn na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju pɛɛrɛ wʋ 'yɛrɛ nɩ, "A ɩ a lɛ. Dãnfʋ wʋ ta a Nãaŋmɩn."
Be lɛ ka a kɔkɔr yi be a nãa dakɔɔ par 'yɛrɛ, "A yɩn na ɩ a Nãaŋmɩn gbãgbaar na yɩ joro wʋ dãbɩ̃ɛ. Ka bil bɩɩ bɛrɛ lɛ, yɩ pɛɛrɛ a sɩ Nãaŋmɩn!"
N pãa lɛ wõn dɔ̃ɔn fɩka nɩyɔɔ na gɔ̃nɔ̃, bɩɩ fɩka kɔ̃kpɛ̃ɛ na joro, bɩɩ saa na tãna kpɛ̃ɔ jaa, "Dãnfʋ wʋ ta Nãaŋmɩn! Bojũu a sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ, lɛ di a nãa.
Yɩ ɩ a sɩ chɩlɛ ka sɩ ɩ̃gãn 'maa a sɩ kʋ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr an ɩ a wʋ Pɛraabile pɔɔ kulfʋ bɩbir vɩɛ naa, ka a pɔɔ mɩ chɔɔr a wʋ mɩ̃ɛ baar.
Wʋ sun bʋ̃pɩɛl na vɩɛlɛ tɩ nyɩlɛ." A bʋ̃pɩɛl anyãna lɛ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ yeltorsɩ.
Ka a malaka 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Sɛb a anyãna, 'An ɩn pʋpɛl kʋ a bala ban bʋɔl a Pɛraabile pɔɔ kulfʋ lɔ̃ɔ di jie.' " Ka a malaka mɩ 'yɛr pʋɔ, "A Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr anyãna ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ."

Ka n gã kpa tẽe ɩka n puor wʋ, tɩchɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Ta maal a lɛ ɛ. N mɩ ɩ naa a gbãgbaa nɩtãa a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a fʋ yɛɛr kaar, bala lɛ tara Yesu dãasɩɛ. Puor Nãaŋmɩn! Bojũu, a Yesu dãasɩɛ lɛ ɩ a Sɩɛ 'yɛr."
N nyɛn a saaju na yuo, ka a ɩ wii pɩla lɛ, ka a nɩrɛ 'lɔ na do yuor di, yelmɩ̃ɛ sʋɔ nɩ nɩtor. Yeltorsɩ lɛ wʋ ma tɔɔr a wʋ 'yɛr tɩ ŋmaan wʋ jɛɛr.
A wʋ nɩbie 'lɩrɛ naa fɩka bũu, ka a nãjupil yɔɔ su a wʋ ju pɔ. Yuor sɛb mar wʋ nɩrɛ jaa na ba bɔ̃ɔ ɛ, ka 'lɔ tɛɛ ba lɛ ɛ.
A fuu wõo wʋn su ɩn jɩ̃ɩ wʋ jaa ka a yuor di, "Nãaŋmɩn 'Yɛr."
A saaju sojasɩ sun bʋ̃pɩɛl don wii pɩɛl turo nɩ wʋ.

Ka a sɔkpɛ̃ɛ diir yi a wʋ nɛɛ pɔ, 'lɔ lɛ wʋ de chɩɛrɛ nɩ a paalsɩ ba jaa, "Wʋn kaara ba jaa nɩ a kpɛ̃ɔ 'lɔ na kaara a kur dãgbal kaar." Wʋn nɛɛrɛ ban ŋmɛrɛ be a tɩɛ wɔ̃mɔ̃ nɛŋmɛrfʋ jie nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ a Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ suur.
Yuor nyãna lɛ be a wʋ fuu wõo na suu a gbɛkpɛ̃ɛ pɔ ɩka, A NÃMƖNE BA JAA NÃA, NƖ A SORBO BA JAA SORO.
N nyɛn malaka na ara a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ ju tɩ bʋɔl a lubil a jaa na ɔɔrɔ be a saaju nɩ kɔkɔkpɛ̃ɛ, "Yɩ lɔ̃ɔ taa wa a Nãaŋmɩn lɔ̃ɔ di jie.
Lɛ lɛ, yɩ wa dire a nãmɩne ɩ̃gãma nɩ a fɔ̃n dẽme nɩ a kpɩ̃ɛn dẽme, a wiisɩ nɩ a ba duorbo, gbãgbaar nɩ sumɩne, a bil nɩ a bɛrɛ, a nɩbɛ banyãna ba jaa ɩ̃gãma."
Ka n nyɛ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nɩ a wɛr nãmɩne nɩ a ba sojasɩ lɔ̃ɔn taa ŋmaan a 'lɔ na do a wii nɩ a wʋ sojasɩ jɛɛr.

Tɩchɛ ba nyɔɔn a mɔdʋ̃ɔ lɔ̃ɔn a jir ŋmara 'yɛ'yɛrɛ na tʋ̃ a nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ niem. A nɛ'maa tʋ̃mɔ̃ anyãna lɛ wʋ de bɛlʋ̃ a bala na tara a mɔdʋ̃ɔ jɩ̃nɛ tɩ puor a bʋtɩɩ. Ba lɔb ba jaa ayi bʋ̃nɩbie 'yɔ̃ɔ a jerbɩ bũu na dire pɔ.
A bala na chɛ, a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a wii ju kʋ ba naa nɩ a sɔkpɛ̃ɛ diir 'lɔ na yi a wʋ nɛɛ pɔ, ka a lubil pãa di a ba ɩ̃gãma tɩɩ.
N nyɛn a malaka na yi a saaju suro waara tara a bɔɔ fulom 'lɔ pãn bir nɩ bɔ̃jɔr gbor.
Wʋ tʋ̃ɔ naa a dajɩl 'lɔ na ɩ a kõr waa, 'lɔ lɛ ɩ a dɛɛr sʋɔ na ɩ a Satan na wʋ lũ wʋ nɩ a bɔ̃jɔr gbor ka wʋ̃n maal yuomo tur (1,000).
Wʋ lɔb wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ a bɔɔ fulom nyã pɔ, tɩ kpal na wʋ 'yɔ̃ɔ jɩ̃nɛ a wʋ kʋ̃ lɛ tʋ̃ɔ a paalsɩ bɛl go ɛ, ka a yuomo tur (1,000) wa baar. A ala puor, ban yuo wʋ naa ka wʋ maal ber bɩ̃lãa.

N nyɛn nãa dakɔɔr, ka a bala na jɩ̃nɛ, ba kʋ ban sɔr ɩka ba tɔɔr 'yɛr. N lɛ nyɛ naa a bala na dɔ̃ɔ dire a Yesu dãasɩɛ nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn 'yɛr jũu ban kʋ, n nyɛn a ba sɩɩr. Bala lɛ ba sɔɔ puor a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nɩ a bʋtɩɩ ɛ, bɩɩ sɔɔ de a wʋ jɩ̃nɛ a ba gber pɔ bɩɩ a nuur pɔ ɛ. Ba ir naa a kũu pɔ ɩ vʋɛ ka bala naa Yesu lɔ̃ɔ di nãa a yuomo tur (1,000).
A kũn bala na chɛ baa ir ɛ, ka a yuomo tur (1,000) ala ba wa baar ɛ. A dɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ kũu pɔ irfʋ lɛ a anyã.
Pʋpɛl lɛ kʋ a nɩ chɛchɛsɩ banyãna na de nie ir a kũu pɔ ɩ vʋɛ. A gbɛɛ ayi kũu kʋ̃ lɛ pɔɔ ba go ɛ, tɩchɛ ban ɩn a Nãaŋmɩn bɔɔr lorbo, ka bala nɩ a Nɩ-iraa lɔ̃ɔ di nãa a yuomo tur (1,000) ala pɔ.
A yuomo tur wa ta, a malaka na yuo naa a Satan a bɔɔ fulom 'lɔ pɔ na wʋ for wʋ bar,
ka wʋ yi bɛlʋ̃ a wɛr kõkobo anaar wʋ jaa nɩbɛ, Gɔɔg nɩ Magɔgɩ na wʋ lɔ̃ɔ ba jaa ka ba ŋmaa jɛɛr. A nɩbɛ waa naa fʋn kʋ̃ tʋ̃ɔ ba sɔr ɛ.
Ba yɛr a wɛr wʋ jaa na ba wa jilʋ̃ a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ jaa jie a tẽe 'lɔ a Nãaŋmɩn na nʋ̃. Tɩchɛ ka a bũu yi saaju lo di ba jaa.
Ka a dɛɛr sʋɔ 'lɔ na bɛlʋ̃ ba, ba lɔb wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ a jerbɩ bũu na dire pɔ, be lɛ a mɔdʋ̃ɔ nɩ a jir ŋmara 'yɛ'yɛrɛ be. Ban ge ba naa mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ nɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ wʋ jaa, ka ba be be jaa kpo kpo.
N pãa lɛ nyɛn a nãa dakɔɔ pɩla, ka a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ. A tẽe nɩ a saaju bɔr a wʋ niem, baa lɛ tara jie go ɛ.
N nyɛn a kũn, bil naa bɛrɛ ka ba ara a nãa dakɔɔ niem, a ba yuor gãma bin. Ba lɛ yuon a gãn ɩ̃sʋɔ na ɩ a nyɛvʋr gãn. Ba tɔɔr naa a kũn bala 'yɛr nɩtãa a lɛ ban dɔ̃ɔ maal a ba sɛb 'yɔ̃ɔ a gãn pɔ bin.
A man tɩr naa a kũn ala wʋn tara, ka a kũu nɩ a kpĩisɩ tẽe mɩ tɩr a kũn bala ban tara, ka ba tɔɔr nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa 'yɛr a lɛ wʋn dɔ̃ɔ maal.
Ba lɔb a kũu nɩ a kpĩisɩ tẽe 'yɔ̃ɔ a bũu dagel pɔ. A bũu nyã na dire lɛ a kũu gbɛɛ ayi.
Ala ɩ nɩrɛ jaa yuor ba wa sɛb a be a nyɛvʋr gãn pɔ ɛ, ban lɔb wʋn 'yɔ̃ɔ a bũu dagel nyã pɔ.
A anyã puor, n pãa nyɛn saaju paalaa nɩ tẽpaalaa, bojũu a saaju koraa nyã nɩ a tẽkoraa nyã bɔr naa, ka a man ba lɛ be be go ɛ.
N nyɛn a Tẽchɛchɛ na ɩ a Jerusalɛm paalaa ka wʋ yi a saaju a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ suro waara fɩka, pɔɔsaraa na pɩ̃ɛn bʋ̃kãkaɛ gun a sɩrɛ kulfʋ.
Ka n wõ kɔkɔr na yi a be a nãa dakɔɔ par 'yɛrɛ, "Pʋ̃pãanyã, Nãaŋmɩn na kpɩɛraa a nɩsaalba pɔ, na wʋ be a ba sɛ̃. Ban ɩn a wʋ nɩbɛ, ka wʋ mɩ be a ba sɛ̃ ɩ a ba Nãaŋmɩn.
Wʋn 'yɩɛr naa a ba nɩbikʋ̃ɔ a nie pɔ bar. Kũu kʋ̃ lɛ be be go ɛ. Waal ba lɛ be be go ɛ. Kõn mɩ ba lɛ be be go ɛ. Nɩrɛ ba lɛ bɩɛrɛ be go ɛ. Bojũu a yelkoro a jaa põn chen."
Ka a 'lɔ na jɩ̃nɛ a nãa dakɔɔ ju 'yɛr, "N maala naa a bomo a jaa bʋ̃paalaa!" Na wʋ pãa lɛ 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Sɛb a anyãna bin, baal ba be be ɛ, a ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ."
Wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ma, "A maal naa. Maa lɛ a Pielfʋ nɩ a Baaraa. 'Lɔ jaa a kɔ̃nyũur na kpɛ, ɩn kʋ wʋn a nyɛvʋr kʋ̃ɔ na yi a bulo pɔ ka wʋ nyũ pɔrɔ.
Nɩrɛ 'lɔ jaa na jɛb tʋ̃ɔ, ɩn kʋ wʋn a anyãna a jaa. Ka n ɩ a wʋ Nãaŋmɩn ka wʋ mɩ ɩ a n bie.

Tɩchɛ a bala na ɩ a dãbɩ̃n dẽme, nɩ bala na ba sɔɔ de ɛ, nɩ tɩɛr dɛbɛ dẽme, nɩ nɩkʋrbɔ, nɩ sɛ̃sɛ̃nbɛ, nɩ sʋɔbɔsɩ, nɩ tɩpuorbo, nɩ jir ŋmarba ba jaa, a ba jie ɩ naa be a jerbɩ bũu dagel pɔ. A nyã lɛ ɩ a kũu gbɛɛ ayi."
Ka a malakasɩ ayopõi na tara a wõm ayopõi 'lɔ na tara a baaraa wa 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Wa, ka n wiil fʋ a pɔɔsaraa na ɩ a Pɛraabile pɔɔ."
A malaka 'mɔɔ man a Sɩɛ pɔ don a tɔ̃ wõo kpɛ̃ɛ ju na wʋ tɩ wiil ma a Tẽchɛchɛ na ɩ a Jerusalɛm na yi a Nãaŋmɩn sɛ̃ suro waara.
Wʋ chaar wʋ jaa nɩ a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr, a chaarfʋ kaara fɩka a kʋsɩsʋ̃n na wʋ nyɩlɛ chaar jaa wel wel a kʋsɩbɛ ala ban bʋɔlɔ a jasɩpa kaar.
Dachin wõo na kpɛ̃mɛ jilʋ̃ wʋ jaa na wʋ tara dɔ̃dɔɩ pie nɩ ayi, ka a dɔ̃dɔr ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa tara malaka na kaara. Ba sɛb a Isɩral bal pie nɩ ayi yoe mar a dɔ̃dɔɩ pɔ.
Dɔ̃dɔɩ ata ben a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ purfʋ jie, ka ata mɩ be a kõkoor, ka ata mɩ be a kõkoor nyã, ka a ata mɩ be a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ mʋrfʋ jie.
Dachin par kparsɩ pie nɩ ayi ju lɛ a dachin dɔɔl. Ala pɔ lɛ ba sɛb a Pɛraabile nɩtʋ̃nsɩ pie nɩ ayi yoe dɔɔl.
A malaka 'lɔ na 'yɛrɛ nɩ ma tara na sɛlma damanaa ɩka wʋ man a tẽe dɔ̃dɔɩ nɩ a dachin.
A tẽe par kparaa jɩ̃taa, a wõofʋ nɩ a yalfʋ wʋ jaa. Wʋ man a tẽe nyɛ ka wʋ ɩ mɛl tur dɔɔl kɔɔr anaar (1,400). A wõofʋ nɩ a yalfʋ, a dofʋ, nɩ a jãafʋ.
Wʋ man a dachin ka a yal ɩ gbɛɛ kɔɔr ayi dɔɔl pie nɩ ayʋɔb (216). A malaka man a lɛ a nɩsaal na ma man.
A kʋsɩbɛ ala ban bʋɔlɔ a jasɩpa lɛ ba mɛn a dachin, ka a tẽe wʋ jaa ɩ sɛlma na wʋ chaar chãana kaar.
Kʋsɩsʋ̃n a jaa bʋrɔ lɛ ba de kpar a tẽe par kparaa. A par kpardɔ̃ɔ 'lɔ ɩn a kʋsɩsʋ̃n ala ban bʋɔlɔ a jasɩpa, ka a ayi sʋɔ mɩ di safer, ka a ata sʋɔ di agete, ka a anaar sʋɔ mɩ di ɛmerald,

ka a anũu sʋɔ di ɔnɩksɩ, ka a ayʋɔb sʋɔ mɩ di kanɩlian, ka a ayopõi sʋɔ di keresolɩtɩ, ka a aniin sʋɔ mɩ di berl, ka a pie forbir sʋɔ di topajɩ, ka a pie sʋɔ di kɩrɩsopɩrase, ka a pie nɩ bʋ̃'yen di jasɩntɩ, ka a pie nɩ ayi sʋɔ mɩ di amɛtesete.
A dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ pie nɩ ayi ala ɩ naa a kʋsɩsʋ̃n pie nɩ ayi. Kʋsɩbʋ̃'yen lɛ ba maal a jaa. A sɔkpɛ̃ɛ na be a tẽkpɛ̃ɛ nyã pɔ sɛlma lɛ wʋ jaa ka wʋ chaar chãana kaar.
N ba nyɛ puorfʋ yir be a tẽe pɔ ɛ, bojũu a sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn na ɩ Tʋ̃ɔfʋ Sʋɔ nɩ a Pɛraabile lɛ ɩ a puorfʋ yir.
A tẽe nyã ba bʋɔrɔ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ, bɩɩ ŋmɛraa chãa ɛ, bojũu a Nãaŋmɩn tɩɩr lɛ ɩ a chãa, ka a Pɛraabile ɩ a wʋ fɩ̃tɩn.
A chãa nyã pɔ lɛ a paal bʋrsɩ nɩbɛ na yʋɔrɔ, ka a wɛr nãmɩne mɩ waan a ba nãbomo a be.
A wʋ dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ ba be na wa pɔɔ a mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ ɛ, an ɩ tɩ̃sɔɔ ba lɛ be be go ɛ.
A paal bʋrsɩ nɩbɛ nãbomo nɩ a ba tɩɩr, ban waan naa be.
Bʋ̃dɛɛr kʋ̃ kpɛ be ɛ, bɩɩ bala na tʋ̃nɔ̃ vĩ tʋ̃mɔ̃, bɩɩ nɩbɛlbɛ, tɩchɛ a bala tɛɛ yuor na sɛb a Pɛraabile nyɛvʋr gãn pɔ.
Ka a malaka pãa wiil ma a nyɛvʋr põn kʋ̃ɔ ka wʋ ɩ jaa wel wel ka a joro yire a Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Pɛraabile nãa dakɔɔ par,

naa joro a tẽe sɔr kpɛ̃ɛ sãlsɔɔ. Nyɛvʋr tɩɛ ara naa a põn lõbobo, ka a jaa ma wɔ̃nɔ̃ wɔ̃bʋrsɩ pie nɩ ayi yuon jaa, ka a wiil ɩka a ma wɔ̃ naa ŋmɛraa jaa gbɛbʋ̃'yen. A vaɩ lɛ ban sãan a paalsɩ a jaa nɩbɛ baal.
Nãaŋmɩn pɔ'yɔ̃ɔfʋ ba lɛ be bon jaa pɔ go ɛ. Nãaŋmɩn nɩ a Pɛraabile nãa dakɔɔ na ben a tẽe pɔ, ka a wʋ gbãgbaar tʋ̃nɔ̃ kʋrɔ wʋ.
Ban nyɛn a wʋ nie, ka a wʋ yuor be a ba gber pɔ.
Tɩ̃sɔɔ kʋ̃ lɛ be be go ɛ. Baa lɛ bʋɔrɔ fɩ̃tɩn chãa ɛ, bɩɩ mɔ̃tɔ̃ɔ chãa ɛ. Bojũu a sɩ Soro Nãaŋmɩn mɩ̃ɛ na chaar ba naa a wʋ chãa, na ba di nãa bɩbir jaa.
Ka a malaka 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Baal ba be a 'yɛrbie anyãna pɔ ɛ, a ɩn yelmɩ̃ɛ. A Soro Nãaŋmɩn na ma kʋ a wʋ Sɩɛ a wʋ 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ tʋ̃ naa a wʋ malaka ɩka wʋ wa wiil a wʋ gbãgbaa yele ala na kʋ̃ yaar tɩ ɩ ɛ."
"Nyɛ, n kʋ̃ yaar tɩ wa ɛ! Pʋpɛl sʋɔ lɛ a 'lɔ na sɔɔ a 'yɛrbie anyãna a jaa na sɛb a gãn nyã pɔ."
Maa Jɔɔn lɛ wõ tɩ nyɛ a anyãna. Ɩn wa wõ tɩ nyɛ a lɛ baar, n gãn kpa tẽe ɩka n puor a malaka, 'lɔ lɛ wile ma a anyãna.
Tɩchɛ ka wʋ 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Ta maal a lɛ ɛ! N mɩ ɩ naa a gbãgbaa nɩtãa a fʋ̃ʋ nɩ a fʋ yɛɛr 'yɛ'yɛrbɛ nɩ bala jaa na turo a gãn nyã 'yɛr. Puor Nãaŋmɩn!"
Ka a malaka pãa 'yɛr kʋ ma, "Ta sɔɔl a 'yɛ'yɛrɛ 'yɛr nyãna a gãn nyãna pɔ bar ɛ, bojũu a sɔ̃ɔ gbʋr naa.
Vɛ̃ ka a 'lɔ na ɩ nɩdɛɛr, wʋ chɛnɛ ɩrɛ a dɛɛr. Vɛ̃ ka a 'lɔ mɩ na maala yeldɛbɛ, ka wʋ chɛnɛ maala a yeldɛbɛ. Vɛ̃ ka a 'lɔ na tor, wʋ chɛnɛ ɩ a nɩtor. 'Lɔ mɩ na ɩ chɛchɛ, wʋ chɛnɛ ɩ a chɛchɛ."
"Nyɛ, n kʋ̃ yaar tɩ wa ɛ! N tara na a n yar na kʋ nɩrɛ jaa lɛ wʋn tʋ̃.
Maa lɛ a Pielfʋ nɩ a Baaraa, a nidɔ̃ɔn nɩ a puor sʋɔ.
"Pʋpɛl dẽme lɛ a bala na pɛɛ a ba fuusɩ. Ban tara na sɔr di a nyɛvʋr tɩɛ wɔ̃mɔ̃, na ba tu a dɔ̃dɔr nɛɛ kpɛ a tẽe pɔ.
Tɩchɛ baar, nɩ a sʋɔbɔsɩ, nɩ a sɛ̃sɛ̃nbɛ, nɩ a nɩkʋrbɔ, nɩ a tɩpuorbo, nɩ a bala jaa na nʋ̃ jir ŋmaafʋ, ban ara na a yõo.
"Maa Yesu lɛ tʋ̃ a n malaka nɩ a dãasɩɛ nyãna a yɩ sɛ̃ kʋ a pupuorbiir gbulsɩ. Maa lɛ ɩ a David nyɩɩr nɩ a wʋ yɔ̃ɔ, nɩ a bivɩɛ ŋmɛrbir na chaar."
Ka a Sɩɛ nɩ a pɔɔ paalaa 'yɛr, "Wa!" Ka a 'lɔ mɩ na wõ naa 'yɛr, "Wa!" Nɩrɛ jaa kɔ̃nyũur na kpɛ, vɛ̃ ka wʋ wa, nɩrɛ jaa na bʋɔrɔ, vɛ̃ ka wʋ wa de a nyɛvʋr kʋ̃ɔ kʋfʋ nyũ pɔrɔ.
N kpãan ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa na wõnõ a 'yɛ'yɛrɛ 'yɛr a gãn nyãna pɔ. Ala ɩ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa wa den bon dɔɔl a 'yɛr nyã pɔ, Nãaŋmɩn mɩ na dɔɔl wʋ naa a wõm ala a gãn nyã na 'yɛr a ba 'yɛr.
Ka ala ɩ nɩrɛ ɩ̃sʋɔ jaa mɩ wa ir bon bar a 'yɛ'yɛrɛ 'yɛr a gãn nyã pɔ bar, Nãaŋmɩn mɩ na mɔ̃ɔ wʋ naa a nyɛvʋr tɩɛ wɔ̃mɔ̃ nɩ a tẽchɛchɛ pɔ kpɛfʋ a gãn nyã na 'yɛr a wʋ 'yɛr.
A 'lɔ na di a anyãna dãasɩɛ 'yɛr naa, "Ɔ̃ɔ, n kʋ̃ yaar tɩ wa ɛ." A ɩ a lɛ. Wa sɩ Soro Yesu.
A sɩ Soro Yesu wɩ̃ɛfʋ wʋ be a Nãaŋmɩn nɩbɛ sɛ̃. A ɩ a lɛ.
